original: REPCONBasementTerminalNote1
translation: 瑞普康地下室终端记录1

original:
REPCONN Inter-office Correspondence #3457892

To: RobCo HQ Supply Department
From: Bill Martin, REPCONN Custodian

Dear RobCo Supply:

First off let me say that everyone here is really excited about the merger. It's super to be part of a company as exciting as RobCo!

Have we got some kinks in the supply chain? Yesterday a bunch of crates got delivered here containing two gross of devices called "Stealth Boys." Is it okay if I ask what these things are? Do they really make you invisible? That sounds wild. What will RobCo think of next?

Let me know if the shipment came here by mistake. No problem if it didn't - I bet you can have a lot of fun with these things!

Thanks,

Bill Martin
translation:
REPCONN公司内部通信 #3457892

收件人：罗科总部 供应部门
发件人：比尔·马丁，REPCONN仓管部

亲爱的罗科公司供应部门：

首先我想说是的是，这里的每个人都对并购一事感到非常兴奋。能够加入罗科这样充满激情的公司，成为当中的一分子真是太棒了！

我们的供应链是不是出了点问题？昨天有好多箱子被送到我这儿，里面有两箱标着“隐形小子”的设备。我可以问问这是什么东西吗？它们真的会让你隐形吗？那听上去太疯狂了。罗科公司下一步的计划是什么？

如果是你们送错了，请告诉我。如果没错也没问题，我打赌这玩意肯定能搞出不少乐子！

谢谢，

比尔·马丁

original: Stealth Boy Shipment Update
translation: 隐身小子货运记录更新

original:
REPCONN Inter-office Correspondence #3486209

To: RobCo HQ Supply Department
From: Sanjeev Rajan, REPCONN Custodian

Hi RobCo Supply:

We are sending back two (2) crates of devices labeled "Stealth Boys" back to you. According to the manifest, each crate contained one gross (144) of the devices. As a result of employee misbehavior (not mine!), one crate was opened and is missing five (5) Stealth Boys. Sorry about that.

Sincerely, 

Sanjeev Rajan, Custodian
translation:
REPCONN公司内部通信 #3486209

收件人：罗科总部 供应部门
发件人：桑杰夫·拉杰，REPCONN仓管部

罗科公司供应部门：

我们把两箱贴有“隐形小子”的设备送还给你们。根据清单，每箱里面有144个设备。由于某些员工的不当行为（不是我干的！）有一个箱子被打开了，丢失了五个“隐形小子”，对此我很抱歉。

真诚的，

桑杰夫·拉杰，REPCONN仓管部

original: Military Orders
translation: 军事命令

original:
Lieutenant Hayes,

You and your men are ordered to secure the area around Primm in preparation for the assault on the prison. Recon indicates that the Powder Gangers are lax in their defenses and should quickly fall to a surprise assault. In the unlikely event that the attack fails, you are to hold position near Primm and await further instructions.

Major Gerard
translation:
海耶斯中尉，

你和你的部下要保护好普瑞姆附近的区域，为突袭监狱做好准备。情报表明炸药帮的防御有所松懈，一旦发动突袭必然瓦解。万一袭击失败，你要在普瑞姆附近坚守阵地，并等待进一步的指示。

杰勒德少校

original: Primm Slim Corrupted Memory Block
translation: 普瑞姆·斯利姆损坏的记忆模块

original:
*Start speech to text logging protocol 0579241*

Male: Is it still in there?
Female: Yep, it's here Sam.
Male: Well, hot damn! Let's grab it and go.
Primm Slim: Howdy Partners! Welcome to the Vikki and Vance Casino and museum!
Male: Can you shut that thing up Pauline?
Female: Sure thing honey! You grab the gun, and we'll get going.
Primm Slim: Please do not touch the exhibits.
Female: I almost got it. I'll wipe the memory file as well.
Male: Ok! Let's get going. I'm going to stick this bad boy in my safe until we are ready.
Female: Alright, once I'm done with this memory block we'll head back to Westside until we're ready to go.

<END CORRUPTED DATA>
translation:
*开始语音转文本记录程序编号0579241*

男：它还在那里吗？

女：是的，山姆，它在这儿。

男：好极了！咱们拿了就走吧。

普利姆·斯利姆：你好，伙伴！欢迎来到“维姬与万斯”赌场博物馆！

男：鲍林，你能把这玩意关掉吗？

女：亲爱的，肯定能！你去拿枪，我们马上就走。

普利姆·斯利姆：请不要触摸展品。

女：就快搞定了。我会把记忆文件也抹掉的。

男：好！我们动身吧。我要把这玩意存在保险箱里，等大干一票时再拿出来。

女：好的，等我搞定了这个内存块，我们就回西区，寻找时机出发。

original: RE: Isley
translation: 回复:伊斯雷

original:
To: *@%!@#--!
From: @#%@!%

I've managed to get the password to Isley's computer. I'll forward it to you with the release notes to the Q-35. The prototype is going to be stopping here on its way to the Department of Defense. You should be able to intercept it on the road.
translation:
收件人：*@%!@#--!
发件人：@#%@!%

我已经拿到了莱斯利计算机的密码。我会把密码和Q-35的版本说明一并转发给你。Q-35的原型机会在送往国防部的途中在这里稍作停留，你应该能截住它。

original: The leader of this community, Marcus, said I should start keeping a journal to get my mind off of Rhonda. He also said I might find something interesting inside this stupid old building. What could possibly be interesting here? The only thing that works in here is this junky old terminal.
translation: 这个组织的领袖马可世说我应该开始写日记，好把我的心思从朗达身上移开。他还说，我或许会在这幢愚蠢的老建筑中发现一些有意思的东西。哪会有什么有意思的啊？这地方唯一能用的就是这台破烂的老电脑了。

original: Retrieve the Corpse of Ranger Morales
translation: 回收游骑兵莫莱拉斯的尸体

original: Private Morales has asked me to find and retrieve the corpse of her dead husband. His body is apparently being used as a lure to draw in NCR troops and slaughter them. Better keep a look out for traps and snipers...\n\nThe body is just east of REPCONN HQ and I should carry it to the troopers camped out on the north side of the railroad tracks.
translation: 列兵莫拉莱斯让我去找回她死去丈夫的尸体。他的尸体显然被做成了诱饵，恶魔帮用它来吸引NCR士兵，好对他们实施埋伏。必须对尸体附近的陷阱和狙击手保持警惕。\n\n这具尸体就躺在REPCONN总部的东边，我要把它带到位于铁轨北部的NCR哨站。

original: Crimson Caravan Payment
translation: 深红商队的报酬

original: Alice McLafferty at the Crimson Caravan Company in New Vegas has told you to return in a few days for payment as a result of your undetected theft of the Gun Runners' manufacturing secrets.
translation: 新维加斯深红商队公司的爱丽丝·麦克拉弗让你几天后再来找她，鉴于你成功盗取了军火贩子的机密，她会支付你一笔赏金。

original: Cachino's Journal
translation: 卡奇诺的日志

original:
Cachino's Journal documents a couple months of Cachino's activities. It contains a detailed ledger describing many of his business deals over the last few months, including the sales of chems and weapons. It is clear at a quick glance that these transactions are his own personal finances, and this is done behind the backs of the Omerta Family management structure.

He also talks, in great detail, about many sexual encounters with Gomorrah prostitutes, including Joana.

After nearly every off-the-books sale or sexual tryst, he vows this one will be his last.
translation:
卡奇诺的日志记录了他这几个月来的活动。当中包含了一笔详细的账目，列出了最近几个月他完成的数笔交易，包括药品和武器倒卖。一眼就能看出这几桩生意都是他背着黑手党的管理层，在私底下秘密进行的。

他还极其详尽地描述了自己与多名蛾摩拉妓女发生关系的过程，其中就包含了琼娜。

几乎每一次干私活或招妓过后，他都表示自己会就此收手。

original: HouseToolsTerminal2
translation: 豪斯工具厂终端机2

original:
From: Cindy-Lou Kreb (Human Resources)
To: All Personnel
Subject: New Employee Policies *UPDATED PLEASE READ*

Hello again everybody!

Mr. H. has requested that the following rules be added to the H&H Tools Employee Policies. Please note that these rules are effective *IMMEDIATELY.*

1) Employees will conduct all spoken-language business in English. Yes, this includes dealing with international clients.

2) Rooftop access is strictly prohibited.

3) All employees must submit to random DNA screenings to isolate the "traitor gene."

Cindy-Lou Kreb
H&H Tools Human Resources
translation:
发件人：辛迪-洛·克雷伯（人力资源部）
收件人：全体员工
主题：新员工政策（已更新，请务必阅读）

很高兴再见到大家！

H先生要求在H&H五金工具厂的员工政策中加上以下几条。请注意，以下守则即刻生效：

1）员工必须使用英语处理所有涉及口语的业务。是的，包括接待国际客户。

2）严禁进入屋顶。

3）所有员工必须服从随机的基因筛选以隔离“叛徒基因”。

辛迪-洛·克雷伯
H&H五金工具人力资源部

original: H&H Tools Journal Entry 05/14/2061
translation: H&H工厂日志记录 05/14/2061

original: As the years roll on, I find myself missing Father's advice more and more. I wonder if he would be proud of the decisions I've made - but no, such second-guessing does me no good. I won't be weighed down by the past, and I won't waste energy on ancient family history, especially when that history isn't really family at all.
translation: 随着岁月的流逝，我发现我越来越怀念父亲的忠告。我不知道他是否会为我所做出的决定感到骄傲——不，这样的事后猜测对我没有任何好处。我不应当被过去的重担压垮，我也不该在我古老家族的历史上浪费精力，毕竟这段所谓的“家族史”也不见得有多么光彩。

original: H&H Tools Journal Entry 04/14/2062
translation: H&H工厂日志记录 04/14/2062

original: I'm beginning to mistrust Henderson. I think he's conspiring with my bastard half-brother to seize the company. I built this company, dammit! I won't be ousted by some Johnny-come-lately fancy college man with his robots and his degrees. I've asked Cindy-Lou to keep an eye on him, to monitor his e-mail for suspicious activity.
translation: 我开始不信任亨德森了。我觉得他正在和我那个同父异母的混蛋弟弟密谋夺取这家公司。该死！是我建立了这家公司！我才不会被一个成天卖弄机器人和学历的菜鸟大学毕业生赶下台。我已经要求辛迪-洛盯着他了，监视他的电子邮件，寻找任何可疑的活动。

original: H&H Tools Journal Entry 07/12/2062
translation: H&H工厂日志记录 07/12/2062

original: It's worse than I feared. Henderson sent a 10-point memo outlining the benefits of mechanization and automation. As if I wouldn't know he's been plotting with my half-brother the entire time! I knew he was a weasel-dick traitor from the moment I laid eyes on him. Only one thing to do.  One thing, and the company - my father's LEGACY - is safe forever. Cindy-Lou will bring him to me, and then I'll make an example. The Bastard will learn why you don't cross the House.
translation: 比我担心的更糟。亨德森发了一份含有十个要点的备忘录，简要叙述了机械化和自动化的优点。他还以为我不知道他在和我那同父异母的混蛋弟弟狼狈为奸！当我看到他第一眼的时候，我就知道他是一个狡猾肮脏的两面派。现在只剩下一件事要做。做完这件事，这家公司——我父亲的遗产——就能永远安全。辛迪-洛会把他带来见我，然后我要拿他以儆效尤。要让那个混蛋知道，永远不要得罪豪斯家族。

original: H&H Tools Journal Entry 11/08/2063
translation: H&H工厂日志记录 11/08/2063

original: Matsumoto cornered me in the hall like a wild animal today! Kept asking if I was all right, but I see the lies bubbling in his throat behind that sussurating smile. He knows. He must know. Has my brother gotten to him, too? Have to talk to Cindy-Lou, she always knows what to do.
translation: 松本今天像关野兽一样把我困在大厅的角落里！一直问我有没有事，可在他那虚假的笑容背后，我看到了从他喉咙中迸出的谎言。他知道。他一定知道。我弟弟也收买他了吗？我得和辛迪-洛谈谈，她知道该怎么办。

original: H&H Tools Journal Entry 04/06/2068
translation: H&H工厂日志记录 04/06/2068

original: No more haircuts no more trims. They can use it to steal your thought energy with their eyes. I have a special hat that stops them, though. Special hat and special shotgun.\n\nFather, why have you stopped talking to me? You always loved him best, didn't you?
translation: 不能再理发，不能再修面。他们可以用它来窃取你的思想，只要用他们那双眼睛。虽然我有一顶特别的帽子可以阻挡他们。特别的帽子和特别的霰弹猎枪。\n\n爸爸，为什么你不再和我说话了？其实你最爱的是他，对吗？

original: H&H Tools Journal Entry 12/27/2074
translation: H&H工厂日志记录 12/27/2074

original: Nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless nevertheless

original: H&H Tools Journal Entry 06/19/2077
translation: H&H工厂日志记录 06/19/2077

original:
They've all turned against us, haven't they? Cindy-Lou is right. I've had no choice. May god forgive me for what I've done. All my employees, all those people I thought loyal friends...

Was I wrong? Am I crazy? I've scattered this journal across all the terminals in the office, just in case. They won't take me without a fight.

As soon as I finish this entry, I'm activating the security systems. If you're reading this and you're American, GOD BLESS THE USA! If you're reading this and you're my brother, SEE YOU IN HELL!

-Anthony House
translation:
他们所有人都开始反对我们了，对吗？辛迪-洛是对的。我别无选择。愿上帝原谅我所做的一切。我所有的员工，那些我以为忠诚的朋友……

我错了吗？我疯了吗？为了以防万一，我把这篇日志分散发送到了办公室所有的终端上。他们休想轻易抓我的把柄。

等我写完这篇日志，我就激活安全系统。如果你正在读这篇文章，并且你是美国人，那愿上帝保佑美国！如果你是我弟弟，那我们地狱里见吧！

——亚历山大·豪斯

original:
From: Daniel Raati
To: *ALL STUDENTS*

Hello,
I'm sure you've heard by now that the doors of the schools will be closed for an undetermined amount of time. Your individual classroom teachers will be sending all of you updated reading lists, and some workbooks to continue your studies. Please spend some of your newfound free time taking care of these assignments.

Thank you,
Daniel
translation:
发件人：丹尼尔·拉蒂
收件人：*全体学生*

你们好，
你们应该已经听说学校会关闭一段时间，关闭时长还没有确定。各班的班主任会把最新的书单和练习册发到你们手上，以便你们继续学习。请务必花些空余时间来关心一下这些作业。

谢谢，
丹尼尔

original: Allen Marks' Last Words
translation: 艾伦·马克的遗言

original: Nellis Missiles
translation: 内利斯的导弹

original: Raquel, the Master at Arms for the Boomers, would be grateful if I brought her some missiles.
translation: 如果我能给大炮族的军需官拉奎尔带去一些导弹，她一定会非常感激。

original: Matchbook
translation: 火柴盒

original: The following is scrawled across the back of the matchbook:\n\nSteam Room. 4 PM.
translation: 以下文字潦草地写在火柴盒背面：\n\n蒸汽房，下午四点。

original: Followers Need Supplies
translation: 天启追随者需要补给

original: Julie Farkas from the Followers would like me to arrange a trading agreement with someone to supply Med-X, RadAway, and Fixer.  The Crimson Caravan are apparently asking for too many caps for the supplies.  I'll need to ask around to see if I can work out a deal.
translation: 天启追随者的朱莉·法卡斯想让我帮忙找一个能供应吗啡针-X，辐特宁和瘾头解的物资商。深红商队的要价显然太高，也许我得去其他地方问问。

original: Philippe's Recipes
translation: 菲利普的食谱

original: This is a stack of hand-written recipes, obviously experimental, with many sections crossed out and notes scribbled in the margins. The one that seems to have gone through the most revision is called "Sweet Veal," however the notes indicate a desire to make it taste not like veal but human flesh.
translation: 这是几张手写的食谱，显然只是试验性的，很多段落被划掉了，在空白处有笔记，涂改过最多次的那道菜叫做“蜜汁小牛肉”，然而注释上写着作者想让它尝起来更像是人肉，而不是小牛肉。

original: Ambassador Crocker's Note
translation: 克罗克大使的便条

original:
I wish to speak with you immediately in regards to important matters. 

I trust you have learned enough in your travels to know that the New California Republic is an honorable nation engaged in a beneficent mission in the Mojave in general and New Vegas in particular. It is in addition a wealthy nation that well rewards persons who dedicate themselves to its national interests, whether for reasons patriotic or material. 

Allow me to reassure you that if you have committed any crimes or misdemeanors against the Republic, it is in my power to pardon misconduct of this sort. 

I stand ready to receive you at your earliest convenience in my offices at the New California Republic Embassy at the south side of the Vegas Strip. 

God bless the New California Republic, 

Dennis Crocker
Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary
Department of State, New California Republic
translation:
兹有要事相商，烦请速来与我会面。

想必阁下在旅途中已听闻不少有关新加州共和国的事迹。作为一个高尚的国家，她为莫哈维，尤其是新维加斯的繁荣发展做出了巨大的贡献。此外，她也是一个富裕的国家，凡是甘愿为其利益奉献自我的人们，无论是出于爱国情操，还是物质诱惑，都将得到慷慨的奖赏。

我可以担保，无论阁下以往对共和国犯下过多么严重的罪行，我都有能力将其赦免。

若阁下愿拨冗莅临，我将随时在维加斯长街南部的新加州共和国大使馆办公室中敬候大驾。

愿上帝保佑新加州共和国，

丹尼斯·克罗克
新加州共和国国务院
特命全权大使

original: Hey, you!
translation: 嘿，你！

original:
What's shaking, my cool bro!

You'll be happy to know that our vault is packed and coasting along! Even with those legionnaires bad news we still get plenty of NCR squares down here. They are all chirpy and don't appear to mind that Caesar is crusin' for a bruisin' all over the place. Maybe the NCR is stronger than we thought, uh? Don't know... you think we can trust them over Mr. House?

I still feel all clutched over what he did to our home! I mean, yeah it is good that we got to keep part of our vault but I can't shake the thought that one of these days he'll just push me out into the open - once he does not need us any more. I tell you, we should have never accepted his challenge. That shuckster cheated us, I am sure!

Anyway, you've heard all of that before and I just wanted to bring you a smile! Cheer up, buttercup! I miss you!

Sarah.
translation:
你还好吗，我的酷老哥！

我们的避难所最近人气旺得很，经营得也还不错，你一定很高兴吧！虽然时常能听见军团作恶的坏消息，但来我们这儿的NCR百姓依然络绎不绝。他们相当热情，似乎也不担心凯撒的威胁。可能NCR比我们想象的要强大？不知道……你觉得比起豪斯先生，我们更应该信任他们吗？

说起那家伙，我还是对他毁灭我们家园的事情耿耿于怀！没错，我们是能保留一部分避难所，可我总是担心，万一他哪天不需要我们了，就会把我一脚踹出去。我和你说，当初我们就不该接受他的挑战。这个老狐狸绝对出了老千，我百分百肯定！

不管怎样，虽然都是些老生常谈，但我还是希望你能有好心情！振作起来吧，宝贝！我想你！

莎拉

original: Charlie Station Requisition List
translation: 查理驻站申请表

original: Attn NCR Staff,\n\nWe received nearly ten times the medical supplies requested. We had an incident of a broken leg - not a missile strike. Please arrange a supply shipment to redistribute - no doubt there's an NCR military camp that desperately needs the supplies.
translation: 全体NCR人员请注意，\n\n我们获得的医疗物资比申请的多了接近十倍。我们只是有个人意外摔断了腿，不是遭受了导弹袭击。请求重新分配——毫无疑问，肯定有别的NCR营地急需这些物资。

original: Sgt. Reyes List
translation: 雷耶斯中士的表单

original:
Here's what I need you to research.

1) Several casualty reports have come in saying that Alpha Station sustained heavy casualties and injuries in the vicinity of Hoover Dam - yet no new reinforcements have been sent in weeks. Speak with Senior Ranger Rebecca Lineholm, get an accurate casualty count and asses the situation, as several of us have been worried that something horrible is stalking the Hoover Dam area if it can claim NCR's elite Rangers.

2) Ranger Station Bravo hasn't requested a resupply in four months. While the Rangers I can reach on the radio say things are 'just fine' I need you to speak to Ranger Ericsen, the commanding officer, and find out how they've been running on no supplies for so long.

3) Charlie station received a substantial shipment of medical supplies despite having only a few serious injury reports. Check up on them and see if they have a surplus that could be redistributed to needed locations - I'm having a hard time getting anyone on the radio lately.

4) Delta station radioed in a report of an NCR Trooper cadre being murdered to the last man in a horrifying display of brutality. The report mentioned a squad of Super Mutants wearing Caesar's colors. This report has unsettled NCR command I need you to speak to Senior Ranger Pason to confirm the report and get an accurate count of Super Mutants spotted.

5) Echo Station has had a five-fold spike in reported enemy contacts, but NCR crews dispatched to follow up have a mere 10% success rate in intercepting these hostiles. The ghouls I've reached by the radio insist everything is 'just fine' but the numbers disagree - so speak to Senior Ranger Erasmus for me please. Perhaps they're short-handed and need more spotters.

6) Foxtrot station called in a report of an NCR Trooper patrol slaughtered by a Great Khan hunting team with trained Deathclaws. Senior Ranger Kudlow called in the report but I can't seem to contact her for a more detailed account of the incident - please to speak to her and confirm/deny this rather disturbing report.
translation:
我需要你帮忙调查以下几件事。

1) 最近有报告称游骑兵阿尔法驻站在胡佛大坝附近遭遇重大伤亡，但数星期过去仍没有得到增援。请你向高级游骑兵丽贝卡·莱霍姆了解具体伤亡数字，并且评估状况。如果NCR的精锐游骑兵都能遭到如此重大损失，我们担心胡佛大坝可能存在严重威胁。

2）游骑兵驻站布拉沃4个月来都没有申请物资补给。我通过电台联系到了该地的游骑兵，他们回答情况“还不错”，但我需要你和该驻站的指挥官埃里克森进行确认，弄清楚他们究竟是怎样在没有补给的情况下坚持那么长时间的。

3）游骑兵驻站查理最近只发生了几起重伤事故，却收到了大量的医疗物资。查一下他们的情况，看看他们有没有多余的药品可以重新分配给其他急需的地方——我最近很难通过无线电联系到他们。

4）游骑兵驻站德尔塔用无线电上报称有一支NCR精锐部队被残忍地全数歼灭。报告提到了一队身着凯撒军团服装的超级变种人。这份报告中还有未执行的NCR命令，我要你和高级游骑兵帕森谈谈，确定报告的真实性，并了解超级变种人部队的具体规模。

5）游骑兵驻站艾柯最近报告的遇敌数量多了整整五倍，但派出的NCR增援部队却只拦截到了10%左右的敌人。我用无线电联系了驻扎在那里的尸鬼，他们一口咬定情况“还不错”，但报告上的数字却存在出入。所以请替我向高级游骑兵伊拉斯谟了解情况。也许他们缺乏人手，需要更多的侦察人员。

6）游骑兵驻站狐步舞报告说有一支NCR巡逻队被驯养了死亡爪的大汗帮狩猎小队屠杀了。报告是高级游骑兵库德罗提供的，但我联系不到她，也无法确认袭击的具体细节。请务必向她求证这起令人不安的事件是否真实。

translation: 雷耶斯中士的表单

original: Vault Status Log
translation: 避难所状况日志

original:
* Most recent events displayed*

* 11/14/2279, 03:47: Radiation leak detected.

* 11/14/2279, 03:48: Maintenance bot dispatched.

* 11/14/2279, 03:50: Power surge detected.

* 11/14/2279, 03:50: Maintenance bot non-responsive.

* 11/14/2279, 03:54: Moving to Security Alert Level 1. 

* 11/14/2279, 03:55: Protectrons activated. 

* 11/14/2279, 03:55: Turrets activated.

* 11/14/2279, 03:55: Sentry Bots on standby.
Ambassador Phillip Granger's Final Report
translation: 菲利普·格兰格大使的最后报告

original:
Final Report - Ambassador Phillip Granger

With my term here coming to a close, I'm taking a moment to reflect on my accomplishments here. Sadly, they are few and far between. The politics between the Families and Mr. House have made it incredibly difficult to deal with any of them. 

The Omertas are a group of sleazy lowlifes pretending to be something they aren't. The White Glove Society gives me the creeps (there's something strange going on with them, and I'm not sure I want to know what it is.) The Chairmen are thugs that dress themselves up in fancy suits pretending to be cool. 

I'm surprised that they've lasted this long without killing each other, although it's probably due to Mr. House and his Securitrons.

We have our work cut out for us here. I wish my term here was more fruitful than it was, but I'm glad to be returning to the NCR.


Phillip Granger
translation:
菲利普·格兰格大使的最后报告

在我的任期即将结束的时候，我决定花一点时间回顾自己在这里的成就。很遗憾，值得一书的成绩凤毛麟角。豪斯先生与三大家族之间存在的政治联系，使得与其中任何一方打交道都变得极为困难。

黑手党是一群肮脏的下等人，成天想着癞蛤嫫吃天鹅肉。白手套社团让我恶心（他们身上散发着一种奇怪的气质，但我并不想要深究）。董事会的人就是一群穿得花里胡哨、喜欢耍酷的恶棍。

我很惊讶他们居然相安无事了那么长时间，这很有可能要归功于豪斯先生和他的电子保安。

我们依旧面临着艰巨的工作。我希望我在任上所取得的成果能比前人更加丰硕，但我很高兴能够返回祖国。


菲利普·格兰格

original: Ambassador Susanna Edith's Final Report
translation: 苏珊娜·伊迪丝大使的最后报告

original:
Final Report - Ambassador Susanna Edith

The past two years serving as the NCR Ambassador to the Strip have been trying at best and downright horrid at worst.

Living here in New Vegas has been horrible. The accommodations here are barely serviceable, which is a deliberate and malicious act by Mr. House to hinder the NCR's efforts here in New Vegas. On top of that, I have constantly surrounded by drunken idiots who gamble away their money.

My work here has been fruitless. I've been unable to get anywhere with Mr. House (or actually meet Mr. House since all I have dealt with are his Securitrons that only serve to frustrate me further.) Still after all this time, we have been unable to find a common understanding between Mr. House and the NCR's goals for the area.

I look forward to returning home to the NCR and I wish my successor luck. You're going to need it.


Susanna Edith
translation:
苏珊娜·伊迪丝大使的最后报告

回顾过去两年担任NCR驻维加斯长街大使的经历，总结起来就是吃力不讨好。

新维加斯的生活条件非常糟糕。这里的房屋基本难以住人，纯粹就是豪斯先生为了阻挠NCR在新维加斯的发展而恶意安排的。除此之外，我还得经常对付那帮赌博输得身无分文又喝得酩酊大醉的白痴。

我在这里的工作没有取得多少成果。我无法和豪斯先生进行沟通（哪怕见上他一面都不行，因为我一直在和他的电子守卫打交道，这给了我更深的挫败感）。这么长时间以来，我们与豪斯先生也始终无法就这片地区的发展目标达成共识。

我期待着能回到NCR的家里。祝我的继任者好运。这是一句实话。


苏珊娜·伊迪丝

original: Strip Security Report
translation: 长街安全报告

original: I've noticed an increase in the amount of smuggling of restricted items into the Strip. I'm increasing security at the checkpoints to prevent more of this. A report has been sent to Ambassador Crocker via Liza to address this.
translation: 我注意到最近长街走私违禁品的数量有上升的趋势。我已经在检查站增派了安保人员，以杜绝这一情况。为了解决这个问题，我已经让丽莎给克罗克大使递交了一份报告。

original: President Kimball's Itinerary
translation: 金博尔总统的路线

original:
Hoover Dam Presidential Visit Schedule

The President will visit Hoover Dam to give a speech to the troops and award a medal to Private Watson for his bravery and service to the NCR.

The President is scheduled to arrive via vertibird from California. The vertibird will land on the top of the Visitor's Center where Colonel Moore will meet the President and escort him out to the stage.

After a brief introduction by Colonel Moore, the President will give his speech. The speech will only take approximately four minutes. During the speech the President will award a medal to Private Jeremy Watson for his service to the NCR.

Once the speech is over, the President will be escorted directly back through the visitor center to his vertibird for immediate departure.

In event of an emergency, the speech will be canceled and the President will be rushed to the vertibird for immediate departure. If there is a problem with the vertibird, a room on the second level of the visitor center will be used as a safe room to keep the President secure until any threat is over. Access to this room has been restricted and Colonel Moore has the key in her desk.
translation:
胡佛水坝总统访问日程

总统将访问胡佛水坝，向士兵做一场演讲，并为列兵沃森颁发NCR卓越功勋奖章。

总统将乘坐飞鸟直升机从加州抵达这里。飞鸟直升机将降落在访客中心顶层，莫尔上校会在那里迎接总统，并护送他前往演讲台。

在莫尔上校做完简短的介绍后，总统将发表演讲。演讲大约持续四分钟。演讲过程中，总统会为列兵杰里米·沃森颁发NCR服务勋章。

演讲结束后，总统将在军方的护送下回到访客中心，然后乘专机启程离开。

一旦发生紧急事态，演讲立刻取消，总统必须马上乘坐飞鸟撤离。假如飞鸟出现问题，访客中心二层的一个房间将作为安全屋，用以保障总统安全，直到危机解除。该房间严格限制人员入内，只有莫尔上校的书桌抽屉里才有房间钥匙。

original: V19Note
translation: 19号避难所字条

original: Again, not two hours after I had fallen asleep, I heard that noise again, it's mechanical, like something heavy being pushed then, it's hard to describe, something that sounds like an elevator perhaps? I've seen the blueprints of the vault, there's no way there could be an elevator there; what would it lead to? I think I'll take a walk around on the second floor, it is late no one will notice me, besides if anyone did it might be good for the experiment anyway.
translation: 又一次，在我睡着后不到两小时，我又听到那个噪音了，这是机械发出来的噪音，感觉是某种重型设备启动了，很难描述，大概听起来像电梯？我看过避难所的设计图，这里不可能有电梯。那它究竟是从哪儿来的？我要去二楼看看，现在很晚了，没人会注意到我。再说，就算有人注意到了，也许对实验反而更有帮助。

original: V19Note
translation: 19号避难所字条

original: Greetings residents,\nWe regret to inform you that there is a problem with one of the water purification filters. We assure you that we are working diligently to fix this problem; however, until the filter has been fixed please try to keep water usage limited and report directly to the clinic if you begin to feel ill in any way.
translation: 各位居民好，\n我们很遗憾地通知你们，有一个净水器的过滤设备坏了。我向你们保证，我们正在努力解决这个问题，但在过滤器修好之前，请尽量节约用水，如果你感到不舒服，可直接向诊所报告。

original: V19Note
translation: 19号避难所字条

original: I've been asking around, there is no reason for those filters to fail, it must have been sabotaged, there's a rumor going around that one of the Blues did it. It wouldn't surprise me, whenever I walk by a group of them in the cafeteria they all start whispering, I bet they're plotting out what to do next.
translation: 我问了一些人，过滤器没理由坏掉，肯定是有人捣乱。有传言说是红军干的。我一点也不觉得惊讶，每次我去餐厅，经过他们身边的时候，都能听到他们在窃窃私语。我打赌他们一定在耍什么阴谋诡计。

original: V19Note
translation: 19号避难所字条

original: I've been getting headaches; I think someone is poisoning us. I've been up every night this week, and night after night, an extra boost of air comes through the vents, it lasts for about five minutes, and then turns off. I spoke with one of the neighbors; he said he noticed the same thing in his room as well. We made a report to the maintenance officer; he informed us that the system was running perfectly and that there was nothing to worry about, I don't believe him, maybe he's in on it.
translation: 我开始头痛了，我怀疑有人在给我们下毒。这周我每天晚上都会醒来，而每晚也都会有大量的气体从通风口中涌出来，持续大约五分钟然后关闭。我和一个邻居说了这件事，他说他的房间里也出了这种事。我们把这一情况报告给了维修人员，他却说系统运转良好，无需多虑，我不相信他，也许这件事他也有份。

original: Ranger Lineholm Report
translation: 游骑兵兰霍姆的报告

original: This holotape contains a list of NCR personnel on active duty at Ranger Station Alpha. Aside from one Ranger who suffered a fractured ankle during a fall, the station has been at full strength for months.
translation: 这份全息磁带包含了游骑兵驻站阿尔法的NCR现役人员名单。除了有个游骑兵跌断了脚踝以外，这个驻站几个月来都人员充足。

original: HouseToolsTerminal16
translation: 豪斯工具厂终端机16

original:
From: Jenny DeSoto
To: Dobson O'Gill
Subject: This weekend

Hey sexy,

I just fed Alan a line about having to play the Loch Ness Monster in a play this weekend, so I'm free Friday night. Want me to bring the stovepipe and the souvenir moon rocks? :-*

-Jenny
translation:
发件人：珍妮·德索托
收件人：多布森·欧吉尔
主题：这周末

嘿性感宝贝，

我刚刚给阿兰发了一个消息，说我这周末要去扮演尼斯湖水怪，所以我周五晚上有空。想要我带上烟囱和月球岩石纪念品吗？:-*

——珍妮

original: HouseToolsTerminal17
translation: 豪斯工具厂终端机17

original:
From: Alan Dalton
To: Dobson O'Gill
Subject: RobCo

Dobs,

Jenny said your brother might know something about these RobCo guys that are kicking our asses on the trading floor. You heard anything?

Alan

PS: The wife's away this weekend and Jenny's busy. Why don't you bring over the rubber sheets and the souvenir elephant-foot trash can and remind me what I've been missing? ;)
translation:
发件人：阿兰·达尔顿
收件人：多布森·欧吉尔
主题：罗科

多布森，

珍妮说你兄弟可能知道一些关于罗科公司的情报，这帮家伙正在疯狂挤占我们的市场。你能帮我打听一下吗？

阿兰

另外：我妻子这周末出去，珍妮有事。你要不要带上橡胶床单和象足纪念垃圾桶，顺便提醒一下我是不是还错过了什么？;)

original: Cassidy Caravans Buyout Offer
translation: 盖西迪商队买断合同

original: This is an offer letter from Alice McLafferty at the Crimson Caravan Company to buy out Cassidy Caravans in its entirety - including equipment, Brahmin, and existing trade contracts - from Cass.
translation: 这是一份由深红商队公司的爱丽丝·麦克拉弗蒂所撰写的报价书，目的是从卡丝手里收购盖西迪商队的全部财产——包括设备、双头牛和现有的贸易合同。

original: V19Note
translation: 19号避难所字条

original: What does it mean?  Why was there a blue star under my bottle cap?  Are the Reds behind this?  Is this part of their mind control?  They must be making me see things now, things that shouldn't be there.  The star shouldn't be there, why do I see a star?  It won't go away.  No matter how long I close my eyes it won't go away.  I want the star to go away!
translation: 怎么回事？为什么我的瓶盖下面会有一颗蓝色的星星？是红军干的吗？这也是他们控制思想的手段吗？他们肯定是想让我产生幻觉，看到不该看到的东西。这星星不该出现在这里的，为什么我能看得见？它不会消失。无论我闭上眼睛多久它都没有消失。我只想让那个星星消失！

original: Fine Dining
translation: 精致佳肴

original:
These past few years, the very idea of "fine dining" has seemed beyond our grasp; indeed, where does one even begin to look for something artfully prepared and beautifully presented by a world-class chef? Well, fellow epicures, I have found the one place left on this Godforsaken earth with Real Food.

I present to you the Ultra-Luxe.

Ignore the rabble on the street, the petty farmers and everyman-types rubbing their pitiful few caps together in an attempt to elevate themselves to some semblance of class. Ignore the filthy, disease-ridden prostitutes of the Gomorrah, whoring themselves to anyone with coin. Walk briskly to the fabulous Ultra-Luxe, the only building in New Vegas worth your attention (you'll know it when you see it). Enter the doors of their restaurant, the Gourmand, and speak with the lovely Marjorie - she'll arrange for your care.

Dally not, for reservations must be made as early as possible. A sumptuous feast awaits you, dear friends.
translation:
过去数年里，“美食”这一概念对我们似乎已经遥不可及；确实，该去哪儿寻找由世界级大厨制作的色味俱佳、芳香四溢的佳肴呢？别担心，美食家们，我已经在这被上帝遗弃的土地上找到了一处仅存的圣地。

在此向您隆重推荐“奢华殿堂”。

不要理睬街上那些贱民，愚蠢的农夫与庸人，揉着几枚可怜巴巴的瓶盖，做着一夜暴富的美梦。无视那些肮脏的、疾病缠身的蛾摩拉妓女，她们甘愿为了金钱委身于任何人。轻快地走进这富丽堂皇的奢华殿堂吧，它是新维加斯唯一惹你眼球的建筑（只要你看到就会明白的）。走进餐厅里来吧，美食家们，来找可爱的玛乔里，她会依照您的喜好安排好一切。

别再耽搁了，尽早预定。亲爱的朋友们，无比丰盛的大餐正等着你们。

original: Strip Gang Report
translation: 合唱帮报告

original:
NCR Strip Gang Report #04-32-B27
The Strip - Omerta Activity

The receptionist at Gomorrah has proved invaluable for her services. Most of her tips have been fairly minor, however she did help us intercept a shipment of drugs as they were coming through Freeside.

We don't currently have any pending investigations, but she will receive a few "prepayments" for information. That should keep her fairly supple if the need arises to go to her for a tip in the future.

-end-
translation:
NCR长街帮派报告#04-32-B27
长街-黑手党活动

蛾摩拉的接待员基本不再有利用价值了。她的大部分情报收效甚微，但她确实帮助我们截获了一批企图通过自由城走私的毒品。

虽然我们目前没有悬而未决的案件，但她同意为将来的情报收取“预付款”。如果未来确实有必要用到她的话，那这笔钱应该能保证她乖乖地把情报告诉我们。

-结束-

original: Patient 5498465

Male, Age: 22\nPatient came to us claiming to be insane. Patient claimed he would often get the feeling of being 'outside' himself. This feeling was so intense that it would cause the patient to be off balance during episodes. Navigation through the clinic often difficult for him to achieve with out causing accidents.
translation: 男性，年龄：22\n患者主动登门称自己得了疯病。患者陈述他经常会感到自己的意识“离开”了身体。这一感觉十分强烈，以至于患者在发病时会失去平衡。在诊所内行走时，患者甚至难以不发生磕碰。

original: Note to Self
translation: 给自己的笔记

original: Remember to not roll off the cliff and kill yourself while you're sleeping. You'll show her... you'll show everyone! What does "too stupid to live" even mean anyway?
translation: 记得在睡觉的时候不要从悬崖上滚下来摔死了，不然你会在她面前……在全世界面前丢人现眼的！那可真是“蠢到死了”！

original: Vending Machine Code - "Return SM Armor"
translation: 售货机代码 - "退还安保护甲"

original: This is a restricted dispenser code for use in the Vending Machines that allows a user to return the selected item for Sierra Madre Chips.
translation: 这是一串限量发货代码，可在自动售货机上为用户退还指定物品，将其重新兑换成马德雷山脉赌场使用的筹码。

original: Vending Machine Code - "Return Outfit Item"
translation: 售货机代码 - "退还服装"

original: This is a restricted dispenser code for use in the Vending Machines that allows a user to return the selected item for Sierra Madre Chips.
translation: 这是一串限量配货代码，可在自动售货机上为用户退还指定物品，将其重新兑换成马德雷山脉赌场使用的筹码。

original: Vending Machine Code - "Hologram Rifle - Focusing Lens"
translation: 售货机代码 - "全息步枪 - 光学聚焦"

original: This is a restricted dispenser code for use in the Vending Machines.\n\nIt appears to increase the Holorifle's damage.
translation: 这是一串限量配货代码，可在自动售货机上使用。\n\n该物品似乎可以提升全息步枪造成的伤害。

original: Vending Machine Code - "Hologram Rifle - Advanced Calibration"
translation: 售货机代码 - "全息步枪 - 高级校准器"

original: This is a restricted dispenser code for use in the Vending Machines.\n\nIt decreases the Holorifle's spread.
translation: 这是一串限量配货代码，可在自动售货机上使用。\n\n该物品可以减少全息步枪的散布。

original: Grand Staircase Topographical Map
translation: 大阶梯地形图

original: Re: Shipping Error
translation: 回复：运送错误

original:
From: Horace Applebaum 
To: Mandy Patrice 
Date: 06/15/77

Hi Mandy,

This is Horace Applebaum out at the Zion General Store. I placed an order three weeks ago for the De-Luxe Mountain Man All-In-One Survival Kits - you know, the ones that come with a compass, a pair of walkie-talkies, and a full first aid kit?

I'm writing to you because, as of today (06/15/2077), I still haven't received the shipment. I'm fresh out of the kits here, and with the summer tourist season picking up I really need the new ones ASAP.

Thanks,
Horace
translation:
你好，曼蒂,

我是锡安百货店的霍勒斯.阿普勒鲍姆。我3个星期前预定了豪华登山超人大礼包，你知道吧，里面有一个指南针，一对对讲机，还有一套急救包。

我之所以给你写这封信，是因为截至今天(2057年6月15日)，我还没有收到任何包裹。我这里的装备都用完了，随着夏季旅游旺季的到来，我真的需要尽快买新的。

谢谢，
- 霍勒斯

original: Re: Shipping Problems (AGAIN!)
translation: 回复：运输问题（又一次！）

original:
From: Horace Applebaum 
To: Mandy Patrice 
Date: 07/03/77

Mandy,

Who the hell is running this shipping company? I've just received three crates of Dinky the Dinosaur(TM) Officially-Licensed Dino-Action Dolls! These things were supposed to go to some tourist trap in Nevada, how the hell did they get here?

Mandy, what the hell can I do with this stuff? Maybe if we file off the Dinky trademarking we can turn them around as kiddie souvenirs and make a few bucks, but I'm still looking at a major loss here.

Whatever's going on in your shipping department, take care of it, or I'll find somebody else to handle my orders, I swear to God.

Yours,
Horace

PS - I still haven't received that order of survival gear I requested last month. You know, things I can actually sell to people?
translation:
曼蒂,

你这个运输公司到底怎么回事？我刚刚收到了3箱大恐龙官方玩具！这不是应该要送到内华达某个旅游景点去的东西吗，怎么跑这来了？

曼蒂，你让我怎么处理这些玩意？我倒是可以把这些恐龙卖给小孩赚点钱，可我还是亏大了。

你们的运输部门到底怎么搞的？好好管管，不然我再也不在你们家下订单了，我发誓。

此致，
贺拉斯

PS - 我上个月定的登山装备到现在还没收到。你让我怎么做买卖？

original: Re: Bus Tour?
translation: 回复：巴士旅行？

original:
From: Horace Applebaum 
To: Alan Mitchum 
Date: 06/25/77

Dear Scoutmaster Mitchum,

Thanks for following up! You'll be happy to know that the Li'l Scout Lunchboxes you ordered have arrived. You can pick them up from the General Store when you arrive in Zion. The General Store is open Monday through Saturday, 7 am till nightfall. We look forward to seeing you and your scouts on Independence Day!

All the best,
Horace Applebaum
translation:
亲爱的童子军团长米切姆,

感谢您的持续关注！我们高兴地通知您，您预定的“里尔”童子军午餐盒已经送达。等您到了锡安公园，可以来我们的杂货店领取。杂货店营业时间为早7点到日落，周日休息。我们衷心期待能在独立日与你和你的童子军们如期相见！

祝您一切顺利,
- 霍勒斯.阿普勒鲍姆

translation: <感激的哗哗声>{NPCRobotEdESonarBeep}

original: Thank goodness you're here. My squad needs help.
translation: 感谢上帝你来了。我的小队需要帮助。

original: A tribe called the Great Khans has joined us. They'd better be good fighters.
translation: 一个叫做大汗帮的部落加入了我们。他们最好都是些优秀的战士。

original: {delighted}If it isn't the courier who's done everything he can to defy the will of mighty {KAI-zar}Caesar!
translation: {delighted}这不就是那个拼尽全力跟伟大的{KAI-zar}凯撒作对的邮差吗！

original: {delighted}If it isn't the courier who's done everything she can to defy the will of mighty {KAI-zar}Caesar!
translation: {delighted}这不就是那个拼尽全力跟伟大的{KAI-zar}凯撒作对的邮差吗！

original: The Legion holds Nelson, Profligate! This is where you'll die. {call to arms}Brothers, attack!
translation: 军团已经掌控了纳尔逊，荒淫之人！这里就是你的葬身之处。{call to arms}兄弟们，进攻！

original: You shouldn't have crossed the Powder Gangers! Now you're going to pay!
translation: 你不该和炸药帮结梁子！现在你得付出代价！

original: I have a present for you from the Powder Gangers... I hope you like dynamite!
translation: 我带来了炸药帮给你的礼物……希望你喜欢炸药！

original: You'll pay for what you did to the Powder Gangers!
translation: 你对炸药帮如此残暴，你会付出代价的！

original: Nobody screws with the Powder Gangers and lives!
translation: 敢惹炸药帮的人必死无疑！

original: Here he is, boys! Let's show him what happens when you cross the Powder Gangers!
translation: 他在这儿，小伙子们！让他看看招惹炸药帮是什么下场！

original: Well howdy, pardner! Good to see you again. Boss is waiting for ya upstairs, so get a move on!
translation: 你好啊，朋友！再次看到你真是太好了。老板正在楼上等你呢，快上去吧！

original: Any word on Station Charlie?
translation: 关于查理驻站有什么消息吗？

original: Hello. I'm Rose of Sharon Cassidy.
translation: 你好。我是罗撒香·盖西迪。

original: Hoi! White Legs don't leave survivors often. You're some kind of lucky, let me tell you.
translation: 嚯！白腿部落通常不会留下任何幸存者。我得跟你说，你很幸运。

original: You came from outside, didn't you? From the civilized lands? Wow... Joshua will want to hear about this.
translation: 你来自外面的世界，对吧？来自文明的土地？哇哦...约书亚一定对此很感兴趣。

original: Hoi! What you doing? There's still White Legs back there!
translation: 嚯！你在干什么？白腿部落的人还在后面！

original: Wait - you came from outside, didn't you? From the civilized lands? Wow... Joshua will want to hear about this.
translation: 等等...你是从外面来的，对吧？来自文明的土地？哇哦...约书亚一定对此很感兴趣。

original: {Hello}Yah ah tahg! I saw you at the southern passage - you... um... you do know there were still White Legs alive when you ran off, right?
translation: 你好！我之前在南部通道那儿看见你了。你...你该知道当你跑掉时那里还有很多白腿部落的人，对吧？

original: You come to the wrong place, traveler. Primm's dying. If you got any sense, you'll be moving on.
translation: 你来错地方了，旅行者。普瑞姆现在已经是个死城了。如果你够聪明，就快点走吧。

original: Quite a town we got here. Sheriff gets murdered, and Deputy Beagle dragged off for ransom to the Bison Steve. That should bring back the tourists.
translation: 瞧瞧我们这小镇。警长死了，副警长比格尔也被拖进野牛史蒂夫旅店做了人质。这副光景说不定还真能招揽到一些游客呢。

original: Rather be left alone to my misery, if you don't mind.
translation: 如果你不介意的话，我想一个人静静。

original: Before the Powder Gangers came to town, Johnson Nash ran the local store and the Mojave Express station.
translation: 在炸药帮进城以前，约翰逊·纳什负责运营本地商店和莫哈维快递中转站。

original: I ain't got nothing for you to eat. If you're hungry, see Ruby Nash.
translation: 我这没有可以给你吃的东西。如果你饿了的话，就去找鲁比·纳什。

original: Thanks for freeing the deputy. A bit, anyway.
translation: 感谢你救出了副警长。虽然也没什么好谢的。

original: Thanks for freeing Deputy Beagle. He's better than nothing. Maybe.
translation: 感谢你救出了副警长比格尔。有他总比没有强。也许吧。

original: Now you freed Deputy Beagle, all Primm needs is a law man who can shoot a gun without wetting hisself.
translation: 既然你救出了副警长比格尔，那么接下来普瑞姆也该再找一个开枪时不会尿裤子的执法官了。

original: I hear you're going to help find Primm a new sheriff. Mighty kind of you to take an interest.
translation: 听说你正在帮普瑞姆物色新警长。真是非常感谢你的好意。

original: So you're the one's going to bring the law back to Primm? I'll believe it when I see it.
translation: 你会给普瑞姆找个新执法官？我只能说眼见才为实。

original: I hear you aim to bring rule of law back to our town. God knows we need the help.
translation: 听说你要帮助我们恢复秩序。我们确实需要帮忙啊。

original: Thanks for bringing the NCR to town, stranger. Things're finally looking up for Primm.
translation: 感谢你让NCR来管理城镇，陌生人。普瑞姆的情况终于开始好转了。

original: Thanks to you I got a mess of soldiers watching every move I make, plus I got to pay taxes for the privilege!
translation: 托你的福，现在无论我想干点什么事，都会有一堆士兵盯着我，而我还得为这个特权缴税！

original: Those soldiers you brought down on us is all business, stranger. Better than lawlessness, though. So you've got my thanks.
translation: 你带回来的那帮士兵管得可真宽，陌生人。不过总比无法无天要好。所以还是谢谢你。

original: This new Sheriff Meyers you brought to us is a lawman through and through. Primm's looking up, stranger.
translation: 你带回来的这个新警长迈尔斯是个刚正不阿的执法官。普瑞姆的情况开始好转了，陌生人。

original: Thanks for convincing Meyers to come sheriff for us. First time I feel safe in a long time.
translation: 谢谢你说服迈尔斯来给我们担任警长。这么久以来，我第一次有了安全感。

original: This Sheriff Meyers you found for us is working out. Knows his business. We owe you a debt.
translation: 你帮我们找来的这个迈尔斯警长已经走马上任了。他很专业。我们欠你一个人情。

original: {Desparate, relieved}Oh, thank God! I didn't think I'd ever see another human face down here.
translation: {Desparate, relieved}噢，谢天谢地！没想到我居然还能在这儿见到活人。

original: Please, buddy, you've got to help me. I don't know how much longer I'm going to last with my leg like this.
translation: 求你了，伙计，你得救救我。我腿都这样了，不知道还能撑多久。

original: Come on man, my leg is killing me.
translation: 拜托，老兄，我的腿疼死了。

original: Is it safe to leave yet?
translation: 现在可以安全离开了么？

original: The Caesar has marked you for death... and the Legion obeys. Ready yourself for battle.
translation: 凯撒已经对你下了格杀令……而军团永远服从他的命令。准备战斗吧。

original: Now you will serve as an example to all who dare oppose Caesar's Legion. Defend yourself!
translation: 我们要杀了你，让那些胆敢和凯撒军团作对的人知道他们的下场！拿起武器吧！

original: You have defied Caesar for the last time! Your life ends now!
translation: 你居然敢和凯撒作对！受死吧！

original: Heard some more people got attacked last night.
translation: 听说昨晚又有人受袭击了。

original: What the fuck just happened?
translation: 他妈的发生了什么事？

original: What is going on?
translation: 怎么了？

original: The Legion is attacking! Run for your lives!
translation: 军团打过来了！赶紧逃命吧！

original: I'm too young to die!
translation: 我还年轻，不想死！

original: Quiet, I'm trying to listen to the speech.
translation: 安静，我在听演讲。

original: Not right now. President Kimball is giving his speech.
translation: 别说话。金博尔总统正演讲呢。

original: Shh! I want to hear what is going on.
translation: 嘘！我在认真听呢。

original: Leave me alone, I'm trying to pay attention.
translation: 别烦我，我在集中注意力。

original: {Drunk, pathetic}Ya got any change, man? I've got five kids to feed.
translation: {Drunk，pathetic}你有零钱吗，老兄？我有五个孩子要养活。

original: {Drunk rambling}You're a crazy son of a bitch, you hear me! The Tops!? Ha! Crazy.
translation: {Drunk rambling}你是个疯杂种，疯杂种！九重天！？哈！彻底疯了。

original: {Drunk, pathetic}Ya got any change, man? I've got five kids to feed.
translation: {Drunk，pathetic}你有零钱吗，老兄？我有五个孩子要养活。

original: {Drunk rambling}Yeah I saw Benny running through here! He had the fear of the devil {in-im}in him!
translation: {Drunk rambling}没错，我看见本尼跑过去了！{in-im}像是被鬼追一样！

original: {Drunk rambling}You killed ol' cheeser!? They said he was a God! Ha, who ever heard of a God of cheese?
translation: {Drunk rambling}你杀了老干酪！？他们说他是神！哈，谁听说过干酪之神？

original: {Drunk rambling}Cheeser's dead!? They said he was a God! Ha, who ever heard of a God of cheese?
translation: {Drunk rambling}老干酪死了！？他们说他是神！哈，谁听说过干酪之神？

original: {Drunk rambling}There are many good things in life, but peeing is definitely the best.
translation: {Drunk rambling}生命中美好的事很多，撒尿绝对是其中最美好的。

original: {Drunk upset}Hey! Don't poke me!
translation: {Drunk upset}嘿！别戳我！

original: {Drunk upset}Ow! Why are you poking me!
translation: {Drunk upset}哎呦！干嘛老戳我！

original: {Drunk upset, you gotta}You've got to keep {yer}your bitches in line!
translation: {Drunk upset, you gotta}管好你的那些婊子！

original: {Drunk upset, you gotta}You've got to keep {yer}your bitches in line!
translation: {Drunk upset, you gotta}管好你的那些婊子！

original: {Drunk upset}Go bother someone else.
translation: {Drunk upset}去烦别人去。

original: {Drunk rambling}A man is never drunk if he can lie on the floor without holding on.
translation: {Drunk rambling}只要没人扶还能在地板上躺稳，就不算醉。

original: {Drunk cheer}Woooooo!
translation: {Drunk cheer}呜——！

original: {Drunk confused}Where'd {da}The {kins}Kings go?
translation: {Drunk confused}猫王帮去哪了？

original: {Drunk happy}Hey doc! You got any Fixer?! I've got a bender planned that would make a hobo cry.
translation: {Drunk happy}嘿，医生！你那儿还有瘾头解吗？我想到了一个整蛊流浪汉的好方法。

original: {Drunk, scared whisper}I think your friend wants to eat me! Please don't let him!
translation: {Drunk, scared whisper}我觉得你朋友想要吃我！求你管好他！

original: {Drunk, wistful}Is there anything more beautiful than a beautiful busty brahmin riding a caravaneer off into the sunset... Wait I don't think that came out right.
translation: {Drunk, wistful}有比丰满的双头牛骑着商队成员消失在落日里更美的景象吗……等等，好像哪有点不对。

original: {Drunk rambling}I'll give you five caps for the {robe-it}robot!
translation: {Drunk rambling}我愿意出5个瓶盖买那个机器人！

original: {Drunk rambling}Your ghoul friend looks shifty. Watch your pockets, buddy!
translation: {Drunk rambling}你的尸鬼朋友看起来鬼鬼祟祟的。看好你的口袋，伙计！

original: What happened to your buddy's face?
translation: 你朋友的脸怎么了？

original: {Drunk, very slurred speech}I am not an alcoholic, sir. I'm a drunk! There's a difference!
translation: {Drunk，very slurred speech}我不是酒鬼，先生。我是喝醉了！这是两码事！

original: {Drunk, very slurred speech}I am not an alcoholic, ma'am. I'm a drunk! There's a difference!
translation: {Drunk，very slurred speech}我不是酒鬼，女士。我是喝醉了！这是两码事！

original: {Drunk ramble}The problem with some people is when they're not drunk, they're sober.
translation: {Drunk ramble}有些人最大的问题就是，没醉的时候太清醒了。

original: {Drunk ramble}People ask me how much it takes me to get drunk. I don't know. I usually can't remember numbers, let alone where I am the next morning.
translation: {Drunk ramble}有人问我要喝多少才会醉。我不知道。我通常都记不住数字，更别说第二天早晨起来在哪了。

original: {Drunk ramble}Hey! Watch your back! There be a pack of ol' ladies runnin' round here somewhere! Don't let {em}them catch you unawares!
translation: {Drunk ramble}嘿！当心点！附近有一群老太太在乱窜！别被她们偷袭了！

original: I can't believe it. Caesar's Legion attacks in force, and I actually survived!
translation: 我真不敢相信。凯撒军团发动了猛攻，而我居然活下来了！

original: Damn muties. Wasteland is better off without 'em.
translation: 该死的变种佬。简直是废土毒瘤。

original: Can't wait to get the rest of our pay for this job.
translation: 我等不及要领剩下的报酬了。

original: Wish the muties would make a move. Getting sick of waiting.
translation: 但愿那些变种佬赶紧滚蛋。我已经等恶心了。

original: It's much cooler up here. I love it.
translation: 这上面凉快多了。我喜欢。

original: Muties aren't so tough if you've got the firepower.
translation: 如果你火力强大，那些变种佬也不算个事。

original: {Player not in NCR gear}Gotta wonder what the hell a civilian is doing here.
translation: {Player not in NCR gear}我想知道一个平民在这做什么。

original: {Player in NCR gear}You from Camp Golf or McCarran? Never mind. Don't really care.
translation: {Player in NCR gear}你从哪来？高尔夫还是麦卡伦？算了，反正我也不是真的在乎。

original: {Player not in NCR gear}{fearful}You're here for the money. I told the Omertas I was good for it! I just need more time!
translation: {Player not in NCR gear}{fearful}你是来讨钱的吧。我跟黑手党说了，钱没有问题！只要再给我点时间就行了！

original: {Player in NCR gear}{paranoid}You're not part of my unit... no, you're here for the money! I told the Omertas I was good for it!
translation: {Player in NCR gear}{paranoid}你不是我们的人……不，你是来讨钱的！我跟黑手党说过了，钱没有问题！

original: {Angry}Die, NCR filth!
translation: {Angry}死吧，NCR渣滓！

original: {Peaceful, accepting}Thank you for your advice. You've helped me see more clearly.
translation: {Peaceful， accepting}谢谢你的建议。你让我看得更清楚了。

original: A pleasure to meet you! I'm Dr. Thomas Hildern, Director of Operations, OSI East. I presume you're here about Vault 22?
translation: 很高兴见到你！我是托马斯·希尔丹博士，东部科工部的项目总管。我想你来这是为了22号避难所的事吧？

original: This is a restricted area. Step away immediately.
translation: 这是禁区。请马上离开。

original: <groan>
translation: <呻吟>

original: <grunt>
translation: <咕噜声>

original: Fiends... cracked-out junkies. All those chems make them a real bitch to take down.
translation: 恶魔帮……脑子进水的垃圾。恰恰就是他们嗑的这些药，让他们变得特别难对付。

original: Dammit, I didn't want you to kill him, just find me some evidence!
translation: 该死，我不是让你杀了他，只要给我找些证据来就可以了！

original: {Helped Joe Cobb}Got some fresh grub coming in from Goodsprings.
translation: {Helped Joe Cobb}清泉镇又送了些新鲜的吃食过来。

original: Howdy pardner! Welcome to the Vikki and Vance Casino and Museum.
translation: 你好啊伙计！欢迎来到“维姬与万斯”赌场及博物馆。

original: This job's boring enough without talking to you. Go see Alexander.
translation: 就算不和你聊天，这工作也是无聊透顶。去见亚历山大吧。

original: Alexander doesn't pay me to talk.
translation: 亚历山大付钱给我，不是让我聊天的。

original: We're just muscle. Alexander's the man to talk to.
translation: 我们只是马仔，亚历山大才是管事儿的。

original: Oh, you here to work? I think I have an extra shovel around here somewhere.
translation: 哦，你是来干活的？这儿倒是还多一把铲子。

original: Sorry, I don't have time to talk right now. Talk to Trent, he might be able to help you out.
translation: 抱歉，我现在没时间聊天。去跟特伦特说吧，也许他能帮你。

original: Greetings! {Slight Pause}Pardon my enthusiasm. I'm not accustomed to meeting so many new people, but I find you fascinating.
translation: 你好啊！{Slight Pause}请原谅我的热情。本来我是不习惯见到这么多生面孔的，但我觉得你人不错。

original: I've tried to learn as much as possible about the surface world since our community left our home.
translation: 自从离开家园之后，我就一直在适应地面的生活。

original: Hello again, outlander.
translation: 又见面了，外乡人。

original: {Dumbfounded}Why are the outlanders killing each other? Why do they treat us like machines?{Lamenting his fate} I wish we had remained in the safety, and sanity, of our Vault.
translation: {Dumbfounded}那些外乡人为什么要自相残杀？为什么他们把我们当机器对待？{Lamenting his fate}早知道我们就应该待在安全又平静的避难所里。

original: Hello, outlander.
translation: 你好，外乡人。

original: It's good making your acquaintance.
translation: 能和你结识真是太好了。

original: Excuse me, I'm{dubitative}... not from around here.
translation: 很抱歉，我{dubitative}……不是本地的。

original: Horowitz is our leader.
translation: 霍洛维茨是我们的领头。

original: {Emotional to meet savior}You're the one who saved us! Thank you.
translation: {Emotional to meet savior}是你救了我们！谢谢你。

original: {Complicit and congratulatory}I heard you talking to Horowitz, and can't thank you enough for what you've done for us.
translation: {Complicit and congratulatory}我听到你跟霍洛维茨说的话了，你为我们做了这么多，真不知道怎么谢谢你。

original: {Emotional to meet savior}I hope everyone on the surface is like you.
translation: {Emotional to meet savior}希望地面上的每个人都能像你这样。

original: {Sincere thankfulness}We're in your debt. Thank you, outlander.
translation: {Sincere thankfulness}我们都欠你一份情。谢谢你，外乡人。

original: {Lamenting fate}I wish we were back at our Vault.
translation: {Lamenting fate}我想回我们的避难所去。

original: {Lamenting fate}The surface world is a cruel place.
translation: {Lamenting fate}地上的世界太可怕了。

original: {Angry disbelief}Why are you people treating us like this?
translation: {Angry disbelief}你们为什么要这样对待我们？

original: {Angry Disappointment}We're heading back home. I hope our troops do the same. This land can't be saved.
translation: {Angry Disappointment}我们要回家了。希望我们的军队也能一起回去。这片土地没救了。

original: {Sorrowful}Trying to grow crops in this heat, with so little water, is bad enough, but now we've got radiation seeping into the farmlands east of New Vegas.
translation: {Sorrowful}在这种又热又缺水的地方种庄稼已经够糟了，现在我们在新维加斯以东的农田又受了辐射污染。

original: {Angry Disappointment}We're done. Let the people of this hell-hole deal with their problems, I say.
translation: {Angry Disappointment}我们受够了。要我说，就让这鬼地方的人去自生自灭吧。

original: I'm so much happier now. Thank you again.
translation: 我现在高兴多了。再次感谢你。

original: Well, you ain't the fittest horse that ever ran a race, but you don't appear in immediate danger of keeling over. I can patch you up if you want.
translation: 好吧，你不算是最强健的，但也不会就这样倒下。只要你愿意，我就能治好你。

original: Welcome home, Citizen! Find any seditious materials out there?
translation: 欢迎回家，公民！找到什么反动材料了吗？

original: {Groggy, just "waking up"}Ah! Good day, Citizen! Library Processing Unit 232.7 is on-line and ready to eradicate sedition!
translation: {Groggy, just "waking up"}啊！日安，公民们！图书处理单元232.7已启动，随时准备铲除反动！

original: We should have given you a better welcome on your first visit to Zion, but from what I hear, the White Legs beat us to it.
translation: 我们本应该热烈欢迎你第一次光临锡安，但可惜的是，白腿部落抢先了一步。

original: White Legs seem to be the only visitors we have these days, and I wouldn't have expected anyone from the Mojave to come looking for us.
translation: 白腿部落似乎是近一段时间内我们唯一的访客，我也没想到还会有人从莫哈维来这个地方找我们。

original: And you're a courier, no less. Not the one I was expecting, but I suppose he wouldn't have come with a caravan.
translation: 而你还是个邮差。不是我期待的那个人，但我想他也不会带着一整支商队来的。

original: I don't know if you were close to the other members of your group, but you have my sympathy.
translation: 我不知道你和商队里其他成员关系怎么样，但我还是要对你表示同情。

original: I pray for the safety of all good people who come to Zion, even Gentiles, but we can't expect God to do all the work.
translation: 我为每一位来到锡安的善良平民祈祷他们一切平安，即使他们是异教徒我也不会区别对待。但我们不能指望上帝做所有的工作。

original: {Hi!}Hoi!
translation: {Hi!}嗨！

original: {Cold, her voice is slightly torn, still healing up.}You made it. Good. I'm getting tired of waiting for you - and Elijah. {Beat}Surprised? Yeah... I made it here, just like you did.
translation: {Cold, her voice is slightly torn, still healing up.}你来了，很好。我实在是不想再等你，也不想再等以利亚了。{Beat}很惊讶吗？没错…我和你一样，也来到了这里。

original: {Relieved, voice thick from surgery}You made it. Good... <Coughs> ugh... {Winces}Hurts to talk. I'll keep this quick in case my... voice goes out.
translation: {Relieved, voice thick from surgery}你来了，很好…… <咳嗽>呃……{Winces}发出声音都难受，我会说得快一些，免得待会又哑了。

original: {Dean hates the player}Well, now, if it isn't my ball, chain, and dog collar rolled all into one.
translation: {Dean hates the player}哎呀，这不是那位老喜欢折腾和使唤我的大人物吗？

original: {Dean's neutral to the player}You have that sad, questioning look in your eye. Not sure talking to me's going to make it any better.
translation: {Dean's neutral to the player}你满脸都是悲伤而疑惑的表情，感觉我也没法让你喜笑颜开。

original: Can you hear me...? Damn transceivers... {To himself}let me link the collars to the speaker in the tower... then... there.
translation: 能听清我说话吗…？该死的收发器……{To himself}我得把项圈和塔上的扩音器连起来…好了…行了。

original: I'm going to make my way to that little town we talked about.
translation: 我准备到我们之前聊到的那个小镇上去。

original: All right, smoothskin, I'm letting you in. You better watch yourself. I'll sure as hell be watching you.
translation: 好吧，滑皮肤。我让你进来。但你最好注意点，我会盯着你的。

original: Sorry, friend, you've crossed the NCR one too many times - you've been marked for death... and we're here to take care of that.
translation: 对不起，朋友，你跟NCR作对太多次了，他们要取你的项上人头……而我们就是替他们办事的。

original: Nothing personal - orders - you know how it is. {pause}Well, let's get to it.
translation: 无关私人恩怨，只是公事公办而已，希望你理解。那么，咱们动手吧。

original: Hey, have you been able to bug Mr. House's network yet?
translation: 嘿，你把木马装进豪斯先生的系统了没有？

original: We're all impressed with the work you've done for us. I thought you might be able to make use of this.
translation: 你为我们做的事让我们非常感动。我想你可能用得上这玩意。

original: It's a key to a little hideaway south of here. We've used it as a place for Rangers to rest and resupply. I thought you might get good use out of it.
translation: 这是南边一个小藏身处的钥匙。游骑兵偶尔会在那里休息和补给。我想对你应该能派得上用场。

original: I know who you are. I'm a patient man, but you'd better have a damn good reason to be standing here right now. Spit it out.
translation: 我知道你是谁。虽然我很有耐心，但你最好还是赶快把来这地方的理由说清楚。快说。

original: Look who it is. I haven't had the privilege, but I'm told you've been an angel on our shoulder. What can we do for you at Camp McCarran?
translation: 看看是谁来了。能亲眼见到你真是三生有幸，大家都说你是我们的守护天使。不知您来麦卡伦营地有什么事？

original: I'm glad we could finally meet. My sources tell me you've done some good work for us. What brings you to Camp McCarran?
translation: 很好，很高兴我们终于见面了。我的手下说你为我们立下了不少功劳。是什么风把你吹到麦卡伦营地来的？

original: Haven't had any reports from Station Charlie in a while - hope everything's okay.
translation: 有一段时间没收到查理驻站的报告了——希望那边没出什么事。

original: Don't tell the troopers, but the grub here is way better than the mess tent.
translation: 你可别跟士兵们说啊，这儿的伙食要比下面的大锅饭好多了。

original: You should talk to Chief Hanlon if you have any questions. He's usually up on the balcony.
translation: 如果你有问题就去找汉隆军士长吧。他通常在二楼阳台上。

original: I can't believe Caesar is dead. What will we do now?
translation: 不敢相信凯撒居然死了。我们现在怎么办？

original: Caesar has been seen walking among the troops. A good omen.
translation: 有人看到凯撒徒步检阅部队了。这是个好兆头。

original: One of our agents successfully assassinated the NCR president.
translation: 我们的特工成功暗杀了NCR的总统。

original: {Fearful Suspicion}I've seen what those creatures do, and I don't know how you trust them.
translation: {Fearful Suspicion}我见过那些畜生的真面目，真不懂你怎么能相信他们。

original: {Primm, NCR rule}The NCR's all over Primm. Steer clear.
translation: {Primm, NCR rule}现在普瑞姆到处是NCR的人。躲远点吧。

original: {Kimball dead}Somebody whacked the NCR president. Got what was coming to him.
translation: {Kimball dead}有人干掉了NCR的总统。我就知道他会是这下场。

original: The food here is to die for. No one cooks Brahmin like Philippe.
translation: 能尝到这里的佳肴，真是死了都不亏。菲利普做的双头牛肉无与伦比。

original: With their leader gone, the Legion will likely tear itself apart. It's what most violent tribal societies do.
translation: 既然他们的领袖死了，军团很可能会四分五裂。大多数依靠暴力组织起的部落社会，最后都是这个结果。

original: Someone blew up the monorail the NCR uses to travel to the Strip and back. We should use this time to strike!
translation: 有人把NCR用于往返长街的单轨铁路炸了。我们应该抓住这个时机进攻！

original: There's a rumor going around that you saved the NCR president's life. I'm surprised you have the stones to show your face around here.
translation: 有传言说就是你救了NCR总统的狗命。我真好奇你怎么还有胆子到这里来。

original: There was an attempt on the NCR president's life recently. Too bad it didn't succeed.
translation: 最近有一起针对NCR总统的刺杀行动。可惜没有成功。

original: Were you the one who killed the NCR president? I'd like to shake your hand!
translation: 你就是宰了NCR总统的那个人？我想和你握握手！

original: Did you hear? Someone actually managed to assassinate the NCR's president! And we just sit here!
translation: 你听说了么？真的有人成功刺杀了NCR总统！可我们却还坐在这儿！

original: The other day I heard some bigwig in the NCR military died. Hopefully it disrupts their chain of command some.
translation: 前几天我听说NCR军方的某个大人物死了。希望这能打乱他们的指挥系统。

original: Did you hear about that NCR higher up that died? That he was trying to sabotage them? Hope he wasn't the only one.
translation: 你听说过NCR那个死了的高层吗？他居然一直在暗中搞破坏？希望这么干的不止他一个。

original: We just had word that the town of Primm is now part of the NCR. At this rate, they'll be running the whole region soon.
translation: 我们刚刚才听说普瑞姆现在已经归顺NCR了。这样下去，他们很快就会控制这一整片地区。

original: It's the quiet before the storm up top. For once, I'm almost glad we're down here.
translation: 这只是暴风雨前的宁静。我第一次觉得我们待在这下面真好。

original: Keep an eye on Veronica here. She's a sharp one.
translation: 多留心维罗妮卡。她可不是省油的灯。

original: Try to keep Veronica out of trouble, would you?
translation: 别让维罗妮卡受委屈，好吗？

original: If you're planning to take Veronica with you, be sure to have a good pair of earplugs with you. I'm kidding, Veronica! Put the power fist down!
translation: 要是你准备带上维罗妮卡同行，那你一定要准备一副好耳塞。我开玩笑的，维罗妮卡！把动力拳套放下！

original: What a fascinating animal. I'm sure the scribes will want to take a look at him.
translation: 多奇妙的动物啊。我肯定学士们会想研究一下他的。

original: Is that a {Mark}Mk. III Support Model you have with you? I've seen references to them, but never with my own eyes. I imagine he makes a great pet.
translation: 你带的那个是III型支援模组？我在一些资料上看到过类似记载，但从没亲眼见过。他做宠物肯定很听话吧。

original: Where did you get that Eyebot? I've never seen one modified quite like that.
translation: 你从哪搞来的这个眼球机器人？我从没见过这样的改装。

original: Keep that mutant in line, or we'll put it down.
translation: 管好你的变种人，不要让我们来帮你管。

original: Oh good, now I have to put up with the stench of rotting ghoul as well. I hope the air filters are working.
translation: 妙极了，现在我还要忍受腐烂尸鬼身上的味道。希望空气净化器没出毛病。

original: I've heard that your friend there can put some of the senior scribes to shame.
translation: 听说你的朋友知识渊博，连不少高阶学士也相形见绌。

original: Why is your friend there glaring at me like that? Did I bump into him or something?
translation: 为什么你的朋友这样打量我？我是撞着他了还是怎么着？

original: I hear that woman can kill with her eyes! Stay away from me!
translation: 我听说那个女人可以用眼神杀人！离我远点！

original: Your lady friend needs to lighten up.
translation: 你那个女性朋友应该阳光一点。

original: Better watch out, I hear Rex likes to eat his owners. Why do you think the King was so eager to give him away?
translation: 你最好小心点，我听说雷克斯喜欢吃他的主人。要不猫王干嘛那么急着把它送人？

original: Good to see Rex still around and kicking.
translation: 见到雷克斯还这么鲜活的真好。

original: That's one ragged Ghoul you've got with you. Seems like a good guy, though.
translation: 跟着你的尸鬼还真是破衣烂衫的。不过看起来是个好人。

original: That ghoul with you looks like he's older than the war! My the things he must have seen.
translation: 跟你一起的那个尸鬼看起来像是战前出生的！他肯定见识过许多事。

original: Oh no, I hear those things eat people! Stay back, freak!
translation: 哦，不，我听说那些玩意会吃人！退后，怪物！

original: Odd company you keep. I thought all Super Mutants were crazed cannibals.
translation: 你那跟班真奇怪。我还以为所有的超级变种人都是丧心病狂的食人族呢。

original: Weird robot. I don't think I've ever seen one of those before.
translation: 奇怪的机器人，我好像从没见过这型号的。

original: That looks like one of those spybots I hear House has been secretly releasing at night.
translation: 据说豪斯会在晚上偷偷放些监视机器人出来，这个机器人好像就是其中之一。

original: Business and luck don't often go hand-in-hand in the Mojave. Watch your back.
translation: 在莫哈维可不能光靠运气。你最好多加小心。

original: Check out the Wrangler if she needs booze.
translation: 她如果想要烈酒，就去原子牛仔看看。

original: Keep your guns to yourself and there won't be any trouble.
translation: 你把枪收好，就不会有麻烦。

original: You're not doing yourself a favor by having him tag along. NCR aren't welcome here.
translation: 你让他跟着你可不是什么好事。NCR在这里不受欢迎。

original: I hear that guy has hundreds of kills, not all of them deserving of death.
translation: 我听说那家伙杀了几百人，其中不少是无辜的平民。

original: I always thought there was more to Arcade than met the eye. I bet he'll do great things without the Followers holding him back.
translation: 我一直都认为阿卡德没有发挥出他真正的实力。要不是天启追随者扯后腿，我打赌他能成大事。

original: I'm surprised to see Arcade venturing out of the Old Mormon Fort. I thought science types preferred to stay indoors.
translation: 看到阿卡德走出旧摩门教要塞，我很吃惊，我还以为这种科学人才都足不出户呢。

original: Witch! Witch! You should be burned for all the people you've turned into newts!
translation: 巫师！巫师！应该把你烧死，为那些被你变成蜥蜴的人报仇！

original: Some say you like to trip old ladies crossing the street. Others say you regularly string up thugs.
translation: 有人说你喜欢把过街的老太太放倒。其他人则说你经常收拾暴徒。

original: People just don't know what to think of you.
translation: 大家都不知道你到底在想什么。

original: Hmm?
translation: 嗯？

original: Yeah?
translation: 嗯？

original: What's up?
translation: 怎么了？

original: {Before Prison Attack}Gotta wonder why the NCR hasn't come for us.
translation: {Before Prison Attack}NCR的人怎么还不来。

original: {After Prison Attack}We sure showed those bastards in the NCR.
translation: {After Prison Attack}我们给那些NCR的杂种好好上了一课。

original: {Meyers became Sheriff}Haven't seen Meyers around. Did he run off or something?
translation: {迈尔斯 became Sheriff}最近都没见迈尔斯，他是逃了还是怎么的？

original: Scrambler's crazier than usual. Watch yourself.
translation: 爬行者比平时更疯狂了。你自己小心。

original: {Scrambler dead}Man, I'm glad Scrambler's gone.
translation: {爬行者 dead}老兄，爬行者死了我是真高兴。

original: House is dead, wonder if Motor-Runner will let us hit the Strip now.
translation: 豪斯死了，不知道轰鸣恶煞现在会不会让我们杀进长街。

original: Your pet ghoul smells like ass.
translation: 你这宠物尸鬼闻起来跟屎一样。

original: Is that Mean Sonofabitch? They all look the same to me.
translation: 那是无耻杂种吗？我看他们都长一个样。

original: {Laughs nervously}A flying robot? Man, I must be fucked up.
translation: {Laughs nervously}会飞的机器人？伙计，我一定是疯了。

original: I wouldn't mind hitting that. She put out?
translation: 我不介意和她干一炮，她能撩吗？

original: Someone is targeting us, I'm gonna kill that fucker when I find out who did it.
translation: 有人想干我们。等我揪出那个狗日的，一定要宰了他。

original: Fuck, where are we gonna get our shit from now that the Khans are all buddy buddy with the NCR?
translation: 操，大汗帮都和NCR称兄道弟了，我们以后从哪儿搞药啊？

original: Motor-Runner dead? Who the fuck gonna run the show now?
translation: 轰鸣恶煞死了？那现在他妈的是谁说了算 ?

original: {Overtly flirtatious, boisterous before friends}That a pretty gal! Want to share?{laughter} Ha ha ha!
translation: {Overtly flirtatious, boisterous before friends}哎呀，漂亮妹子啊！要不有福同享啊？{laughter}哈哈哈 !

original: One of these days I'll save up enough to get out of here. One of these days...
translation: 总有一天等我攒够了钱，就要离开这里。总有一天……

original: Hey stranger, if you're hungry, there's a man around here somewhere telling people where to get free food and water.
translation: 嗨，陌生人，如果你饿了，这附近有个人可以告诉你从哪里有免费的食物和水。

original: I kinda like being a farmer.
translation: 我有点向往农夫的生活了。

original: Don't worry boss, I'm sure Caesar just wants to invite you over for coffee or something. That's all.
translation: 老大，别担心，我敢肯定凯撒只是想请你去喝杯咖啡之类的。仅此而已。

original: I'm glad you decided to off one of the most powerful men in the Mojave. Life was getting boring anyway. Really.
translation: 我很高兴你决定把莫哈维沙漠中最有权势的人之一置于死地。反正生活也很乏味。真的。

original: Did blowing up that vault serve any purpose, or do you just like explosions?
translation: 把那个避难所炸飞有什么意义吗，还是你只是单纯地喜欢看爆炸？

original: Just to be clear, we're not planning to visit any NCR facilities, right boss? Like, ever again?
translation: 就是确认一下，咱们并没有打算访问NCR的任何设施，对吧，老大？永远不会有？

original: Well, the President's dead, but don't worry. History has shown that that sort of thing almost never leads to massive destabilizations or world wars.
translation: 好了，总统已经死了，不过别担心。历史已经一再证明，这种事情从来就不会导致大规模动乱或者世界大战。

original: {Shocked, numb}I just can't believe it... the President's dead. It doesn't even feel real.
translation: {Shocked， numb}我没法相信……总统死了。我真的无法相信。

original: Well, well, well, if it ain't the best-loved cat on the Strip in my theater! What can Tommy do for you, baby?
translation: 哎呀，哎呀，瞧瞧又有贵客上门了，这不是长街上最受人喜爱的小猫咪么！不知汤米能为你做些什么呀，宝贝？

original: Now baby, you know I welcome everybody here at the Aces, but I gotta ask you to keep any mayhem to a minimum, you dig?
translation: 听我说，宝贝，虽然王牌剧场来者不拒，但我真的得麻烦您，别在我们这儿惹事，明白吗？

original: I got to hand it to you, baby, you did an 18-karat job on this one. My schedule's so full I couldn't put on new acts if I wanted to!
translation: 我得跟你说实话，宝贝，你干得太漂亮了，简直和18克拉钻石一样。现在我的节目表满当当的，新场子都安排不过来了！

original: Thanks again for saving my ass.
translation: 多谢你救了我的小命。

original: Any luck finding Anders?
translation: 找到安德斯了么？

original: You're not one of my regulars. What do you want?
translation: 你好像不是我的老主顾呀。你想要什么？

original: Did you make that delivery yet?
translation: 你的货送到了吗？

original: Hey, what's up?
translation: 嘿，怎么了？

original: I understand you've been invited to meet with Caesar. You should be aware of the honor you've been granted.
translation: 我知道你已受邀觐见凯撒。你应该清楚自己获得了怎样的荣耀。

original: Greetings in the name of {KAI-zar}Caesar.
translation: 以{KAI-zar}以凯撒之名，向您致意。

original: {Sarcastic}How much ass did you have to kick to get Papa Khan to like you so much?
translation: {Sarcastic}你到底是做了什么不得了的事，会让父汗这么喜欢你？

original: Hey, doll, how's my favorite girl? Got a kiss for me?
translation: 嘿，我心爱的小美女，最近过得还好吗？愿意赏我一个吻吗？

original: Couldn't stay away, huh baby? Shoulda known. What can I do for you?
translation: 舍不得走是吗，宝贝？我就知道。需要我做点什么？

original: Nice work with the assassination attempt! If my troops were half as dedicated as you, we'd win the war in a week!
translation: 你成功阻止了刺杀！要是我的人能有你一半用心，没准我们一个礼拜就能打赢战争了！

original: Thanks for your help, I feel like we can take on the world!
translation: 感谢你的帮助，我觉得我们可以拿下全世界了！

original: Haven't seen you around before, soldier.
translation: 以前没见过你，士兵。

original: Not very often we see civilians on-base. What's your story?
translation: 我们很少在营地见到平民。你是什么来头？

original: I hear Caesar's dead. Maybe that means the war will be over soon.
translation: 我听说凯撒死了。也许战争很快就会结束了。

original: I can spot a Brotherhood spy from a thousand yards. Even the cute ones.
translation: 我能在一千码就发现兄弟会的间谍。就算是个美女都瞒不过我。

original: I've never seen a ghoul up close. Not sure I wanted to.
translation: 我从没近距离看过尸鬼。还是别看的好。

original: That thing is housebroken, right?
translation: 这东西受过管教吧？

original: I like you big mutants. You're easy to sight.
translation: 我就喜欢你们这些大个子变种人。目标大，容易看见。

original: Did you know you have a robot following you?
translation: 你知道有个机器人跟着你吗？

original: Whatever you're selling, we have plenty.
translation: 不管你要卖什么，我们都不缺。

original: Keep your distance, soldier.
translation: 士兵，保持距离。

original: {suspicious}A doctor? Who's your supplier?
translation: {suspicious}医生？谁给你供药？

original: Like I said, I won't run out on you, but I can't let my people get dragged through the mud for this.
translation: 我说过，我不会对你不利，但我也不能因为这件事而让我的部下蒙羞。

original: You did good and you did it well. Work a ranger would be proud of. I'll handle the rest from here.
translation: 你做得很对，也很出色。即便是游骑兵，也会感到光荣。剩下的事就交给我自己处理吧。

original: Jimmy? Little Jimmy - my, how you're grown up. So good of you to come visit your {gramma}grandma.
translation: 吉米？小吉米——天啊，你都长这么大了。你能来看望奶奶真是太好了。

original: My word, but that was a lot of chopping at that casino, dear.
translation: 我说，亲爱的，你刚在赌场里闹得也太凶了吧。

original: Naughty children run from their punishment, but we'll find Benny, won't we, Leo?
translation: 坏小孩就该被打屁股，我们会找到本尼的。是吧，利奥 ?

original: Heavens to Betsy, but Mr. Benny met a nasty end. I hope you've realized, pumpkin, that crime doesn't pay.
translation: 我的老天哟，本尼先生终于得到了应有的惩罚。希望你能从他身上学到教训，小南瓜，恶有恶报。

original: My, but that Lucky 38 is a large building. And so fancy!
translation: 天啊，幸运38真够大的。真豪华！

original: Leo doesn't like that you left that House man alive, dearie. He thinks you should have let us chop him.
translation: 利奥不喜欢你让那个叫豪斯的家伙活着，小宝贝。他觉得我们应该剁了他。

original: You should have heard Leo, sweetie. He laughed and laughed when that old man in the box exploded.
translation: 你真该听听利奥的反应，小甜心。那个盒子里的老头爆炸时，他笑得可高兴了。

original: Leo thinks there will be lots more chopping to do now that Caesar is dead. I do hope you'll be careful, pumpkin.
translation: 利奥觉得，凯撒死了以后，咱们要砍的人就多了。小南瓜，希望你能小心点。

original: {Gramma}Grandma's so proud of her little pumpkin, rescuing the President like that!
translation: {Gramma}奶奶真骄傲，她的小南瓜救下了总统！

original: Now sweetie, if at first you don't succeed, try, try again. That goes for learning to ride bikes and killing Presidents!
translation: 小甜心，如果第一次没成功，那就再试一次。学骑单车是这样，杀总统也是这样！

original: {Gramma}Grandma's so proud of her little pumpkin, assassinating the President like that!
translation: {Gramma}奶奶真骄傲，她的小南瓜利落地干掉了总统！

original: Leo's very grumpy, pumpkin. He wanted to chop the President!
translation: 利奥发飙了，小南瓜。他想要剁了总统！

original: Look at you, sweetness! Blowing up a robot army all by yourself, isn't that precious?
translation: 瞧瞧你啊，甜心！你一个人就把整支机器人大军都炸翻了，多了不起啊？

original: {Gramma}Grandma's so worried about her little baby! It's getting dangerous out there in the Wasteland!
translation: {Gramma}奶奶太担心她的小宝贝了！废土越来越危险了！

original: Leo's getting more and more agitated, sweetie. I think he can smell the fight coming.
translation: 利奥越来越焦躁了，小甜心。我猜他是感觉到大战要来临了。

original: I hope you're not thinking about rushing off to that big dam, pumpkin! It's sure to be very dangerous!
translation: 希望你没打算跑到那座大坝上去，小南瓜！那里太危险了！

original: Damn, that was some light show out there.
translation: 那地方怎么他妈怎么亮。

original: I hear the Legion's fixing to attack Hoover Dam. Good thing I ain't there.
translation: 听说军团正策划进攻胡佛水坝。幸好我不在那儿。

original: I hear the Great Khans just packed up and left Red Rock Canyon. Always thought the NCR and them would fight it out again.
translation: 听说大汗帮卷铺盖离开了红岩峡谷。我一直以为他们会和NCR再打一仗呢。

original: That President Kimball nearly got killed at Hoover Dam. Now he knows how we feel about the NCR around here.
translation: 金博尔总统差点在胡佛水坝被杀。这下他该明白我们对NCR的感觉了吧。

original: That tower on the Strip, the one you can see for miles? I hear it ain't sealed up no more.
translation: 长街那座高塔，就是好几里外都能看到的那座，我听说它终于开放了。

original: {Apprehensive}Kimball's dead, I wonder how long until the Legion's at our walls.
translation: {Apprehensive}金博尔死了，不知道军团兵临城下还需要多久。

original: {Companion Reaction - Arcade}{pretending surprise}Imagine, a Follower brave enough to leave Freeside.
translation: {Companion Reaction - Arcade}{pretending surprise}想不到啊，天启追随者居然还有人敢离开自由城。

original: {Companion Reaction - Rex}The dog is part-machine... but its brain is flesh.
translation: {Companion Reaction - Rex}这只狗一半是机器……但大脑还是狗的大脑。

original: {Companion Reaction - Raul}{disgusted by ghoul's appearance}What a revolting sight. {incredulous}To call that a friend?
translation: {Companion Reaction - Raul}{disgusted by ghoul's appearance}真恶心。{incredulous}你和那玩意做朋友？

original: {Companion Reaction - ED-E}That machine looks like a floating eye. I don't like it.
translation: {Companion Reaction - ED-E}那台机器好像一个会飞的眼睛。我不喜欢它。

original: {Companion Reaction - Lily}How does one get that blue monster to obey?
translation: {Companion Reaction - Lily}你是怎么让那个蓝色怪物听话的？

original: {celebratory}I always knew House would give in! Sixth state of the union, here we come!
translation: {celebratory}我就知道豪斯会屈服的！联邦的第六个州，马上要成立了！

original: {Pessimistic}Bitter Springs... a name like that could've only brought bad luck.
translation: {Pessimistic}苦泉……这样的名字只会招来厄运。

original: {Dumbfounded}Everywhere I go, people are talking about our President's assassination.
translation: {Dumbfounded}不管我走到哪里，人们总在谈论总统遇刺的事。

original: {Avarice}With House out of the way, I hope someone opens the Lucky 38.
translation: {Avarice}豪斯已经不在了，我希望有人能打开幸运38的大门。

original: {Disdainful}I see you prefer the company of anarchic cultists to civilized peoples.
translation: {Disdainful}比起文明人，我想你更喜欢和无政府主义的邪教徒们打交道。

original: {Fearful yet Determined}This is it. War's almost upon us.
translation: {Fearful yet Determined}快了。大战就要来了。

original: {Disbelief}Did you hear about Hanlon? What a blow!
translation: {Disbelief}你听说汉隆的事了吗？真是个打击！

original: {Fearful Anger}You killed him! What have we done to you?
translation: {Fearful Anger}你杀了他！我们没把你怎么样啊？

original: {Indignated}I hear some asshole freed our enemy from McCarran.
translation: {Indignated}我听说有傻逼从麦卡伦营地放走了我们的敌人。

original: {Celebratory}With Mr. House dead and gone, Vegas can finally join the NCR!
translation: {Celebratory}豪斯先生死了，维加斯也终于可以加入NCR了！

original: {Intrigued}Your robot looks worth quite a few caps.
translation: {Intrigued}你的机器人看起来值不少瓶盖啊。

original: {Hopeful}I hope the Fiends stop their raids now that their boss is gone.
translation: {Hopeful}我希望这些恶魔帮别再出来打劫了，他们的老大都挂了。

original: {Dumbfounded}Bad weather ahead, I tell you. The death of our President's just the start.
translation: {Dumbfounded}要变天了，我跟你说。总统的死只是个开始。

original: Some Khans got cornered in the ruins of Boulder City and the NCR killed them. It's like Bitter Springs all over again.
translation: 大汗帮的人被困在巨石城的废墟里，最后全被NCR杀了。简直是苦泉的翻版。

original: Someone finally put down that sick Motor-Runner sonofabitch. Good riddance.
translation: 终于有人把轰鸣恶煞那个狗日的干掉了。死得好啊。

original: I'm glad those nighttime raids have stopped. I was getting worried.
translation: 我很高兴那些夜袭终于停了。本来我真是有些担心了。

original: Doc seems to be doing all right patching people up, at least.
translation: 至少医生在尽心尽力地救治伤员。

original: I never thought they'd actually send us reinforcements.
translation: 我从没想过他们真的会派增援来。

original: You looking for a good time?
translation: 你想找乐子吗？

original: If I wasn't working right now, I'd show you a real nice time.
translation: 要不是我现在正在工作，我真想好好疼爱你一番。

original: Enjoying the show?
translation: 喜欢这场表演吗？

original: I wouldn't mind taking a bite of you.
translation: 我真想咬你一口。

original: Damn, you're looking tasty.
translation: 该死的，你看上去真好吃。

original: So Mr. House sells Vegas out to the NCR, {ay}eh? I always knew that freak was a rat.
translation: 这么说，豪斯先生把维加斯卖给了NCR，{ay}是吗？我就知道那个怪胎是奸细。

original: I got kicked outta Ultra-Luxe the other day. Man, that place gives me the fucking freaks.
translation: 我前几天才被从奢华殿堂里赶出来。老兄，那地方真他妈吓人。

original: Business is good. All the Families got money. Of course Gomorrah is where the action is.
translation: 生意不错。每个家族都赚到了钱。当然人气最旺的还是要数蛾摩拉。

original: I think there is something wrong with that dog.
translation: 我觉得那条狗有点不对劲。

original: Uh{hesitates}, I don't think we allow{uh} her kind in here.{pause} I'll let it go this time though.
translation: 啊{hesitates}，我觉得她这样的人应该是不得入内的。{pause}不过这次就算了吧。

original: What the fuck is that thing?
translation: 那他妈是什么玩意？

original: Big tough ranger better not start any trouble in here.
translation: 就算是最强的游骑兵，在这里最好也别惹麻烦。

original: Let me know if the pretty lady with you is looking for some work.
translation: 如果你身边这位美丽的女士正在找工作，请务必告诉我。

original: That Follower fucker is going to have some trouble if he tries to liberate any of our employees.
translation: 那个天启追随者杂碎要是敢在这里搞他解放劳工的那一套，老子要他吃不了兜着走。

original: Khans finally got what they had coming. Glad we won't have to worry about them again.
translation: 大汗帮自作自受。很高兴我们不用再担心他们了。

original: Kimball managed to get himself knocked off. Serves him right.
translation: 金博尔管天管地，终于把自己管死了。这就叫报应。

original: Did Benny beg before you burned his sorry ass?
translation: 你点燃本尼屁股的时候，他有没有求饶？

original: {Laughs}Nice work at the Tops, buddy.
translation: {Laughs}你在九重天干得不错，伙计。

original: Your ghoul wants to have some fun he can, we don't discriminate.
translation: 如果你的尸鬼也想找乐子，我们不会歧视的。

original: I apologize, wanderer, but I must go tend to my flock!
translation: 我很抱歉，流浪者，但我必须去照看我的同胞！

original: Even that old House bastard gave in to the NCR. We're the only ones to make a stand!
translation: 就算豪斯那个老混蛋向NCR投降了，我们也要抵抗到底！

original: What are we going to do now that Papa's dead?
translation: 老爷子死了，我们该怎么办？

original: Your friend's cute - is she single?
translation: 你朋友真可爱——她单身吗？

original: I hope Papa knew what he was doing when he left you in charge.
translation: 我希望父汗让你当老大的决定是正确的。

original: A robot dog? Never seen one of those before.
translation: 机器狗？以前从没见过呢。

original: Your pal's one ugly motherfucker.
translation: 你的朋友真他妈逼丑。

original: {Shocked, a little afraid}Holy hell, is that a Nightkin?
translation: {Shocked, a little afraid}我的妈，那是个夜行族？

original: {Slightly sarcastic}Nice robot.
translation: {Slightly sarcastic}机器人不错嘛。

original: You know you're traveling with a fucking murderer?
translation: 你知道你是在和一个他妈的杀人凶手同行吗？

original: Haven't seen a Follower around here in years.
translation: 有年头没在这儿见过天启追随者了。

original: Not enough food, not enough medicine, and definitely not enough sleep.
translation: 食物不足，药物不足，甚至连睡眠都不足。

original: I say, would you like some of this absolutely delightful confection I found? I've been grazing on it all day!
translation: 我说，你想来试试这些我找到的甜点吗？美味无比！我简直离不开它了！

original: I like you! Will you take Barnabas Bear to New Vegas when you go?
translation: 我喜欢你！你去新维加斯的时候能带上先知小熊吗？

original: Can't believe the Legion hit us in such numbers. They're stronger than we think.
translation: 难以相信军团会派出这么多人攻击我们。他们比我们想象的要强大。

original: I coughed up blood this morning. I think I'm really sick.
translation: 今天早上我咳出了血。我想我真的病了。

original: No attacks for a while now. That's a good sign, right?
translation: 敌人有段时间没有进攻了。是个好迹象，对吗？

original: I think there's something wrong with the food.
translation: 我认为食物有点问题。

original: I swear I saw somebody sneaking out of the graveyard the other night.
translation: 我发誓那天晚上我看见有人偷偷溜出了墓地。

original: Lieutenant Markland always looks like he's afraid the kids are gonna bite him.
translation: 马克兰中尉好像总是害怕孩子们会咬他。

original: Markland seems to be getting better with his bedside manner.
translation: 看来马克兰对病人的态度正在改善。

original: Finally got enough pills to chase off that damn infection.
translation: 终于有足够的药品来阻止那该死的感染了。

original: Doc's gotten real handy with the kids these days.
translation: 这些天医生真的很用心地在帮助孩子们。

original: Hope the Doc can give me some meds this week.
translation: 希望这周医生能给我些药。

original: Nice to see more guards on patrol. Maybe Caesar won't murder us all.
translation: 很高兴巡逻队的人手多了起来。也许凯撒不会那么轻易杀了我们。

original: Finally starting to get some decent food around here.
translation: 终于开始有些像样的食物了。

original: Not enough soldiers here to stop Caesar if he rolls through.
translation: 如果凯撒想要横扫这里的话，我们可没有足够的士兵能阻止他。

original: So tired....
translation: 太累了……

original: Haven't had a decent meal in weeks.
translation: 几个星期都没吃过一顿像样的饭了。

original: Legion just came out of nowhere.
translation: 军团不知从哪儿就冒出来了。

original: The man with the spiky hat comes into camp at night!
translation: 戴尖帽子的人晚上在营地出没！

original: Colonel Hsu really knows what he's doing. Now if only someone'd explain that to ol' General Wait-and-See Oliver...
translation: 许上校的计划非常有可行性。现在要是有谁能向那位整天只懂得观望的奥利弗将军解释一下就好了……

original: I pity anyone who crosses Boyd. That woman is relentless.
translation: 我很同情那些得罪了博伊德的人。那女人根本不讲情面。

original: We still haven't gotten Ranger Morales' body back from the Fiends. Sure doesn't inspire confidence in the guys you're serving with.
