translation: 我们依然没从恶魔帮手里夺回游骑兵莫拉莱斯的遗体。显然这件事并不会对士兵们有什么激励作用。

original: Contreras is holding out on me. I know he's got more to sell.
translation: 孔特雷拉斯一定藏了东西。我知道他手上还有更多的货。

original: Man, Doc Kemp really fixed me up right the last time I got shot. He's the man to see if you need some fixin'.
translation: 老兄，我上次中枪以后就是肯普医生把我治好的。你要是需要治疗就该去找他。

original: Farber is doing the best with what he's got, but man could I go for a nice cut of brahmin steak.
translation: 条件艰苦，法伯已经尽力了，但我还是想尝尝双头牛肉排。

original: The most important POW we've ever taken and he gets away. He must've had help.
translation: 最重要的那个战俘跑掉了。他肯定得到了某人的帮助。

original: This chainlink fence perimeter is worthless. We might as well be defending a cage from the inside.
translation: 周围的铁丝网根本就没用，真打起仗来，我们就和困在笼子里没两样。

original: This place is off-limits to civilians. You don't like it, take it up with Lieutenant Haggerty.
translation: 此地不许平民进入，你要是有意见，去找哈格蒂中尉。

original: Hey man, when in Rome.
translation: 嘿，老兄，入乡随俗。

original: That we hold Nelson, that is {KAI-zar's}Caesar's will.
translation: 我们会守住纳尔逊，这是凯撒的意志。

original: The {cutting}"great" republic couldn't find enough soldiers to liberate this camp, so they sent {emph}you? Pathetic.
translation: {cutting}"堂堂"共和国居然无人可用，只好派你来送死？真是可悲。

original: {AH-way}Ave. Why have you come to Nelson?
translation: {AH-way}致敬。你来纳尔逊干什么？

original: I hear the Kings were wiped out by some kind of Super Mutant ninja assassin paid by the NCR! Who else could have taken them down?!
translation: 我听说猫王帮被NCR雇的超级变种忍者刺客消灭了！不然还能有谁这么厉害呢？！

original: Some people are saying the Great Khans got drugged up out of their minds and attacked the dam.
translation: 据说大汗帮的人嗑药嗑到丧失理智，进攻了水坝。

original: I heard the Khans went wild at Hoover Dam. I suppose they were looking for one last blaze of glory.
translation: 我听说大汗帮在水坝发狂了。估计他们是要追寻最后的荣耀。

original: I hear the Great Khans staged their own deaths to trick the NCR.
translation: 我听说大汗帮至死都在和NCR作对。

original: People say the Khans got wiped out at Red Rock. That's one less bunch of crazies to worry about.
translation: 都说大汗帮在红岩峡谷被一锅端了。又少了一伙让人担心的疯子。

original: The Great Khans aren't gone. They're just hiding, biding their time...
translation: 大汗帮并没有消失。他们只是藏在暗处，等待时机……

original: The Great Khans moved out? One less mob of degenerates to worry about, if you ask me.
translation: 大汗帮离开了？要我说，又少了一伙需要担心的暴徒。

original: I heard Motor-Runner got taken down. Maybe the Fiends will finally destroy themselves now that he's gone.
translation: 我听说轰鸣恶煞被干掉了。没了他，恶魔帮最终可能会自我毁灭吧。

original: I hear Hanlon was working for the aliens and NCR found out.
translation: 我听说汉隆其实是为外星人服务的，而且被NCR发现了。

original: Chief Hanlon is dead? I hear that guy couldn't order himself out of a cardboard box, let alone command troops.
translation: 军士长汉隆死了？我听说那家伙连指挥自己从纸箱里爬出来都做不到，还怎么率领部队啊。

original: My friends say you're working for the Illuminati, and that's why you killed Kimball. Watch your back. {paranoid whisper}They have listening devices everywhere!
translation: 我朋友都说你为光明会工作，所以你才要杀金博尔。小心点，{paranoid whisper}他们到处都安了监听器！

original: Killing Kimball is going to make a mess of things around here. The troopers coming through here are mean enough already.
translation: 金博尔一死，这里的局势更混乱了。不断增加的部队已经证明了这点。

original: You freed that Silus guy from McCarran? Guess you've got your reasons for helping the Legion.
translation: 你把那个叫希鲁斯的家伙从麦卡伦给放了？我想你肯定有自己的理由才帮军团的。

original: Rumor has it Mr. House joined the NCR on account of some secret love child he never even knew he had.
translation: 传言说豪斯先生之所以加入NCR，是因为他有个自己都不知道的私生子在NCR手里。

original: House must have special plans for you to get into the Lucky 38 and come out alive.
translation: 豪斯让你活着进出幸运38，肯定是有什么特别的目的。

original: How do we know if Mr. House is really gone? No one's ever seen him in the first place!
translation: 我们怎么知道豪斯先生是不是真死了？根本就没有人见过他！

original: Colonel Moore survived four tours against the Brotherhood back west. If anyone can help take on the Legion, it's her.
translation: 莫尔上校在西部的时候，曾经历过与兄弟会的四次大战。如果说还有谁能对付军团的话，那肯定就是她。

original: You hear that rumor that Colonel Moore was kicked out of Gomorrah a while back? I heard she's had it in for the Omertas ever since.
translation: 你听过莫尔上校前不久被蛾摩拉赶出来的传言吗？我听说从那以后她就和黑手党结下了梁子。

original: I'm really surprised Colonel Moore accepted the Brotherhood's help. I heard she lost a lot of men in war with them back west.
translation: 真不敢相信莫尔上校居然会接受兄弟会的帮助。要知道在西部的时候，她很多弟兄都死在兄弟会枪下。

original: Man, I'm exhausted. Moore's got us running drills non-stop.
translation: 老兄，我受够了。莫尔根本把不拿我们当人。

original: Just between us, Colonel Moore scares me sometimes.
translation: 别跟旁人说啊，我好几次都被莫尔上校吓到了。

original: I'm glad Ringo's back. Got a good story to tell, too.
translation: 很高兴林戈回来了。他一定有很多故事要说。

original: I actually got to fly Pearl for a little bit during that bombing run. Hot damn, what an honor.
translation: 事实上，我在那次轰炸中稍微驾驶了一下珀尔。干他妈，真是太光荣了。

original: I can't believe we may see the superfortress built in my lifetime.
translation: 真不敢相信，居然能在我有生之年看到超级堡垒建成。

original: Really? So we may see our dream of flight soon?
translation: 真的？我们很快就能看到梦想中的飞机了？

original: {Surprised, then impressed}A Ranger, here in the Strip? Fine company, sir!
translation: {Surprised, then impressed}游骑兵，在长街？这可是好伙伴啊，先生！

original: {Relieved}Good riddance, Caesar! We can finally enjoy some R&R without worrying about a Legion attack at McCarran.
translation: {Relieved}凯撒死得好啊！我们终于可以真正休个好假，而不必担心军团进攻麦卡伦了。

original: {Surprise mixed with disgust}What's a mutant doing in the Strip?
translation: {Surprise mixed with disgust}变种人跑到长街来干什么？

original: {Surprise mixed with disgust}They let Ghouls into the Strip, now?
translation: {Surprise mixed with disgust}长街现在还放尸鬼进来了？

original: {Player killed President Kimball}{Officer}I've heard the stories of how you assassinated Kimball. It's all my Legionaries will talk about.
translation: {Player killed President Kimball}{Officer}我听说了你刺杀金博尔的事。这正是我们军团的目标。

original: {Player killed President Kimball}Kimball's assassin is always welcome here.
translation: {Player killed President Kimball}刺杀金博尔的人在这里是永远受欢迎的。

original: {Silus freed}The {Ken-TOO-ree-on}Centurion Silus will be punished for letting himself be captured. Coward.
translation: {Silus freed}The {Ken-TOO-ree-on}百夫长希鲁斯居然甘当俘虏，他会受到严惩的。懦夫。

original: The Mark of {KAI-zar}Caesar protects you.
translation: {KAI-zar}凯撒的徽记庇护你。

original: {Caesar cured}{officer}Never once did I believe that Caesar was near death. I have friends in high places.
translation: {Caesar cured}{officer}我从来都不相信{KAI-zar}凯撒快死了。我在高层有朋友。

original: {Mixed}Why is your degeneracy tolerated?
translation: {Mixed}为什么你的堕落得到了容忍？

original: {Revolted}Don't dump your Ghoul here, we've already got enough shit around us.
translation: {Revolted}别把你的尸鬼扔这儿，我们周围的破事已经够多了。

original: {Admiringly}People of my trade respect the merchants of these territories.
translation: {Admiringly}干我们这行的都很尊敬这片地区的商人。

original: {Celebratory}House was the only thing keeping Vegas from joining the NCR!
translation: {Celebratory}豪斯是阻止维加斯加入NCR的唯一障碍！

original: {Slight Relief}Our guys put the Monorail back to work!
translation: {Slight Relief}我们的人修好了列车！

original: {Rueful Indignation}Our own President, murdered! Things aren't looking good.
translation: {Rueful Indignation}我们的总统被谋杀了！大事不妙。

original: {Unspoken Suspicions}Hanlon was a brave soldier, what could've driven him to despair?
translation: {Unspoken Suspicions}汉隆曾是一位勇敢的士兵，是什么事情把他逼上绝路？

original: {Self-Righteousness}I knew those Khans couldn't be trusted!
translation: {Self-Righteousness}我就知道大汗帮的那些人信不得！

original: {Proud}Civilizing Primm will show what we can do for everyone else in these territories.
translation: {Proud}普瑞姆的开化会向这片土地上的所有人展示我们的实力。

original: {Curious}I've seen Followers of the Apocalypse in my travels before.
translation: {Curious}我之前在旅途中见过天启追随者。

original: {Admiringly}NCR Rangers deserve all my praise.
translation: {Admiringly}我所有的赞美都归于NCR游骑兵。

original: {Admiringly}Is your friend one of those elite troops we've been hearing about?
translation: {Admiringly}你的朋友就是那支传说中的精英部队的一员？

original: {Admiringly}Your merchant friend would make a fine NCR woman.
translation: {Admiringly}你的商人朋友会成为NCR的优秀女性公民。

original: {Intrigued}I've never seen a robot like that before.
translation: {Intrigued}我之前从未见过这种机器人。

original: {Fearful Suspicion}The Super Mutant's under control, I hope.
translation: {Fearful Suspicion}我希望你能管好那个超级变种人。

original: {Fearful Suspicion}I've seen what those creatures do, and I don't know how you trust them.
translation: {Fearful Suspicion}我了解那些畜生的本性，我不知道你怎么会信任他们。

original: {Fearful Suspicion}I've seen what those creatures do, and I don't know how you trust them.
translation: {Fearful Suspicion}我了解那些畜生的本性，我不知道你怎么会信任他们。

original: {Fearful Suspicion}I've seen what those creatures do, and I don't know how you trust them.
translation: {Fearful Suspicion}我了解那些畜生的本性，我不知道你怎么会信任他们。

original: {Fearful Suspicion}I've seen what those creatures do, and I don't know how you trust them.
translation: {Fearful Suspicion}我了解那些畜生的本性，我不知道你怎么会信任他们。

original: {Revolted}Your Ghoul friend better not be radioactive.
translation: {Revolted}你的尸鬼朋友最好身上没有辐射。

original: {Unabashed Curiosity}What on earth is *that* creature?
translation: {Unabashed Curiosity}*那个*生物到底是什么？

original: {Thoughtful Curiosity}Your lady friend seems out of place here.
translation: {Thoughtful Curiosity}你的女性朋友看起来和这个地方不太搭。

original: {Thoughtful Curiosity}Your friend seems too civilized for a place like this.
translation: {Thoughtful Curiosity}你的朋友太文明了，跟这地方一点都不搭。

original: {apologetic - got in someone's way}Excuse me.
translation: {apologetic - got in someone's way}借光。

original: {Random}My feet are killing me.
translation: {Random}我的脚痛死了。

original: {Great Khans attack everyone at Dam}The Great Khans tribe went mad. During the battle at the Dam, they attacked both the Legion and the NCR.
translation: {Great Khans attack everyone at Dam}大汗帮真是疯了。他们居然在大坝之战中同时攻击军团和NCR。

original: {Companion Reaction - Rex}How disgusting. You can see that strange mechanical mongrel's brain.
translation: {Companion Reaction - Rex}真恶心。那野狗的脑袋居然就这样露在外面。

original: {Companion Reaction - Raul}Ugh. One of the burned people walks in our camp.
translation: {Companion Reaction - Raul}啊。有个被烧伤的家伙跑到我们的营地来啦。

original: {Companion Reaction - ED-E}What a strange floating robot. Is it useful for anything?
translation: {Companion Reaction - ED-E}这个浮空机器人可真奇怪。它能有啥用？

original: {Companion Reaction - Lily}What is that thing? I've never seen a blue mutant.
translation: {Companion Reaction - Lily}那是什么东西？我从没见过蓝色的变种人。

original: {Rascal 2}The Followers are always on the look out for new friends like yourself.
translation: {Rascal 2}天启追随者一直在寻求你这样的新朋友。

original: {Companion Reaction - Veronica}I didn't know the Brotherhood had any people out here.
translation: {Companion Reaction - Veronica}没想到兄弟会在外面还有人啊。

original: {Companion Reaction - Rex}Look at that - a cyber-dog. There can't be many of those left.
translation: {Companion Reaction - Rex}看呐——一只机械狗。这玩意可是挺稀罕的。

original: {Companion Reaction - Lily}{awe}Look at that - a friendly Nightkin. What's it doing here?
translation: {Companion Reaction - Lily}{awe}看呐——一个友善的夜行族。它在这儿干啥？

original: {Companion Reaction - ED-E}{a bit amused}That is one battered Eyebot. It's a miracle it's still functioning.
translation: {Companion Reaction - ED-E}{a bit amused}这个眼球机器人可够破的。它还能运转可真是奇迹。

original: {Companion Reaction - Cass}Isn't that Cass? I heard she'd gotten out of the caravan business.
translation: {Companion Reaction - Cass}那不是卡丝吗？我听说她不再跑商队了。

original: {Companion Reaction - Boone}{slight awe}That's a First Recon beret. They're the best marksmen in the NCR military.
translation: {Companion Reaction - Boone}{slight awe}那是第一侦察营的贝雷帽。他们是NCR军队里最顶尖的神枪手。

original: {Companion Reaction - Raul}I'll never get used to the sight of ghouls.
translation: {Companion Reaction - Raul}我就是不习惯见到尸鬼。

original: {Companion Reaction - Arcade}{concern for a friend}Don't let anything happen to Arcade, all right?
translation: {Companion Reaction - Arcade}{concern for a friend}别让阿卡德出事，好吗？

original: A veteran Ranger inspires awe. Stick around for when they get here, you'll see. If I live to earn the Black Armor, I can die a happy woman.
translation: 精英游骑兵会让人肃然起敬。等过一阵子他们来了，你就明白了。要是能穿上那样一套黑色盔甲，我这辈子也值了。

original: Don't get many chances to catch a legionary alive. Burns me up that we botched ours.
translation: 活捉军团士兵的机会本来就少。好不容易抓到一个却被我们自己给弄死了，真让人窝火。

original: Wish I had a First Recon guy looking after me.
translation: 真希望能有个第一侦察营的家伙来掩护我。

original: I heard we captured a live Centurion and then let him get away. That never would've happened if I was in charge.
translation: 听说我们活捉了一名百夫长，又让他跑了。这事让我来办，是绝不可能搞砸的。

original: Sounds like we're running Primm now. I'd still rather take my leave at the Strip.
translation: 听说普瑞姆现在归我们管了。但我还是宁愿去长街。

original: First Recon's at Camp Forlorn Hope. Now we've got a chance to hold it.
translation: 第一侦察营已经进驻飘零希望营地。这下我们守住的机会就大了。

original: I ought to bleed you.
translation: 我就该给你放点血。

original: Fuck off and die.
translation: 滚你妈的，去死吧。

original: Like we don't have enough problems.
translation: 还嫌我们麻烦不够多啊。

original: Just get the fuck out of here.
translation: 马上给老子滚蛋。

original: What the fuck are you doing showing your face here?
translation: 你他妈的还敢在这出现？

original: Why are you even here?
translation: 你来干什么？

original: Crazy-ass mother fucker.
translation: 狗娘养的疯子。

original: You been dosing on too many of Jack's chems?
translation: 你是不是嗑多了杰克做的药？

original: You're almost as crazy as some Fiends I know.
translation: 你怎么和那些恶魔帮一样疯疯癫癫的。

original: {Sarcastic}Oh great, just who I wanted to see.
translation: {Sarcastic}哎哟，真是想谁来谁啊。

original: You going to fuck shit up again?
translation: 你又想干他妈的什么？

original: {Cautious}What do you want this time?
translation: {Cautious}这次你想干什么？

original: You should have been with us in our glory days. You'd have loved it.
translation: 你真该跟我们一起经历那些光辉岁月。你会爱上那一切的。

original: Share a whiskey with me sometime?
translation: 有空一起喝两杯？

original: I wish there were more like you.
translation: 真希望能有更多像你这样的人。

original: I like you, stranger. You've stood by us when not many would.
translation: 我喜欢你，陌生人。在众人离弃我们的时候，你选择了和我们站在一起。

original: Good to see you again.
translation: 很高兴又见到你。

original: Why'd you come here?
translation: 你来这儿干嘛？

original: Come to gawk at the Great Khans, have you? Fuck off.
translation: 又来大汗帮盯梢了？快滚蛋。

original: What do you want?
translation: 你想要什么？

original: So you've been sucked into the decadence of the Strip as well, have you?
translation: 看来你也跟着长街一起堕落了嘛？

original: NCR spreads its infection to another town, I hear.
translation: 我听说另一个镇子也中了NCR的流毒。

original: I'm glad our brothers have returned home from Boulder City.
translation: 我很高兴弟兄们能从巨石城平安归来。

original: Why did you kill our brothers in Boulder City?
translation: 你为什么要在巨石城杀我们的弟兄？

original: More Khan brothers cut down by NCR in Boulder City. We should kill a hundred of them in response!
translation: 又有弟兄在巨石城惨遭NCR毒手。我们应该百倍奉还！

original: The 1st Recon butchers are in the field again. I'd love to head down to Forlorn Hope and show them we haven't forgotten.
translation: 第一侦察营的屠夫又出动了。我真想马上到飘零希望营地去让他们尝尝厉害。

original: Diane's going nuts trying to find a new contact in the Fiends now that Motor-Runner's dead.
translation: 现在轰鸣恶煞死了，黛安像发疯一样地在恶魔帮里找新联络人。

original: So, the big bad chief ranger couldn't take the pressure, huh? Good.
translation: 看来那个牛逼哄哄的游骑兵头头顶不住压力了，是吧？很好。

original: If you're going to assassinate the president of the NCR, you could at least do it right.
translation: 如果你要去刺杀NCR的总统，那你至少下手要利落。

original: Why the hell would you stop someone from killing Kimball?
translation: 你他妈为什么阻止别人杀金博尔？

original: If you ask me, a true warrior wouldn't let himself be captured at all - but busting that Legionnaire out of McCarran was an impressive stunt.
translation: 要我说，真正的战士根本就不会被俘，不过那军团士兵居然能从麦卡伦脱身，也是叫人佩服。

original: Not many get the favor of Caesar - even Papa hasn't been to the Fort.
translation: 很少有人能得到凯撒的青睐——就算是父汗也没去过城堡。

original: Mr. House isn't a man to be trusted. Watch yourself.
translation: 豪斯先生不是能相信的那种人。你自己小心。

original: You're the one who killed Kimball! If we had a bar here, I'd buy you a drink!
translation: 你杀了金博尔！如果这里有酒吧，我一定请你喝一杯！

original: There's nothing here for you, human, though it is always good to see you.
translation: 这儿已经不再需要你了，人类，不过我们随时欢迎你回来。

original: I don't even remember where we were going, but it'll be good to travel around with Rhonda again.
translation: 我都记不得我本来要去哪里，但能再次和朗达一起旅行真是太好了。

original: {Prompt after 1st Caravan Found}You know what, what happened to my caravan - not the first time I've heard about an attack like that.
translation: {Prompt after 1st Caravan Found}你知道吗，像我商队这样的遭遇，我可不是头一回听说。

original: One of our caravans got hit a few months back, and the caravan'd been burned, too, along with the cargo.
translation: 还有个商队在几个月前也被袭击，连人带货都化成了灰。

original: I wonder if he made the same mistake, and that other caravan got hit with energy weapons too.
translation: 我在想他是不是犯了同样的错误，而且那支商队也是被能量武器袭击的。

original: {Prompt after 2nd Caravan Found}What's that? Looks like a map - got the route along the West of Vegas, and...
translation: {Prompt after 2nd Caravan Found}这是什么？看着像是一张地图——画着维加斯西边的道路，然后……

original: ...they've marked another spot. Over here, along this stretch. That's fucked up - middle of nowhere.
translation: ……他们标记了另外一个位置。就在这里，沿着这条直线。可这他妈——哪儿都不是啊。

original: {Final}That does it, that's all I need to know.
translation: {Final}够了，我想事情已经很清楚了。

original: Crimson Caravan and the Van Graffs... they were behind burning these caravans, and they've got to answer for them.
translation: 深红商队和范格拉夫家族……他们就是袭击这些商队的幕后黑手，我要找他们讨个说法。

original: I'm going to get some extra ammo, a few bottles of whiskey, and then show them how Cassidys settle accounts.
translation: 我去补充点弹药，带上几瓶威士忌，然后我要让他们见识见识盖西迪家族的人是如何找人算帐的。

original: {Alt: Enemies near}Keep your voice down, we got movement out there.
translation: {Alt: Enemies near}别出声，那边有动静。

original: {Warning 3}You and me, we're done traveling together. I want nothing more to do with you.
translation: {Warning 3}我不想再和你结伴旅行了。我不想再和你扯上更多关系了。

original: I thought there was a {emph}chance you'd change - {shakes head}not any longer, being a fucker is who you are.
translation: 我还以为你能改呢——但我不再这么想了，你就是个彻头彻尾的混蛋。

original: {Uneasy, in Lucky 38 casino}Ready to leave yet? This place puts my teeth on edge.
translation: {Uneasy, in Lucky 38 casino}还不准备走吗？这地方让我牙齿打颤。

original: {Killed Van Graffs, grim, but happy}Just trimmed the Van Graff family tree, I think Freeside'll breathe a little easier now.
translation: {Killed Van Graffs, grim, but happy}修剪了范格拉夫家这颗歪树，我想自由城的空气会清新不少。

original: {Killed an entire camp of Crimson Caravan, grim, but happy}And that's it for the Crimson Caravan.
translation: {Killed an entire camp of Crimson Caravan, grim, but happy}这就是深红商队的下场。

original: {Prompt for Political Manuevering}You find any "evidence" yet? I'm not going to wait forever.
translation: {Prompt for Political Manuevering}你找到什么证据了吗？我可没耐心永远等下去。

original: {Story Stage 10, to herself}Never thought I'd pass the Vegas wall. Never seen so many lights in one place before.
translation: {Story Stage 10, to herself}真没想到我也能穿过维加斯的高墙。更没想到居然还有这么灯火通明的地方。

original: {Story Stage 20, wary}Not sure who this friend of yours is, but if he's looking down on Vegas, he's either God or the moon.
translation: {Story Stage 20, wary}虽然不确定你这个朋友到底是谁，但如果他正在俯视维加斯，他不是天神就是月亮。

original: {announcing elevator stops}Penthouse floor!
translation: {announcing elevator stops}顶楼！

original: {announcing elevator stops}High-Roller Suite!
translation: {announcing elevator stops}高档套房！

original: {announcing elevator stops}B2! Physical Plant!
translation: {announcing elevator stops}B2！机械工厂！

original: {Banned}Okay, that's that. No more games for you. Go rob the Tops. You're done here.
translation: {Banned}好了，到此为止。你别再玩了，要抢去抢九重天，这里不会再让你玩了。

original: Have some drinks, talk to some dancers but you are done at my tables.
translation: 你可以去喝点东西，也可以和舞女聊聊天，但赌桌是不会再让你上了。

original: {Curious, but not in a nice way, more wtf}Hnh. Heard your footsteps coming up the ramp, didn't sound like a trooper or one of the merchants.
translation: 呵——我听见你上来的脚步声了，不过你看起来不像是士兵或者商人。

original: You check out the Nipton Town Hall yet? Smoke trail's not getting any shorter.
translation: 你去尼普顿市政厅看过了吗？浓烟还没散呢。

original: You a courier? If so, this might be your lucky day... if you don't mind walking a bit {emph}and your eyes are good.
translation: 你是个邮差？那说不定今天是你的幸运日呢……只要你愿意跑腿，眼神也够好。

original: Me and Carmine - that's my repeater here - will do our best to cover you from this ridge. Good luck.
translation: 我会和卡迈恩——那是我的连发枪——会尽力从山崖上提供掩护的。祝你好运。

original: You're always welcome around the {nickname for camp}Hope, Courier - least as far as I'm concerned.
translation: 飘零希望永远欢迎你，邮差——至少我管事的时候都是这样。

original: I can still hear our boys screaming down there.
translation: 我现在都能听见我们的小伙子在下面的惨叫。

original: {Story Stage 20, Talked to House}So... you talked to a big movie screen? Feeling like I'm walking down a yellow brick road, and there's bad news at the end.
translation: {Story Stage 20, Talked to House}所以……你去和那个大屏幕说话了？感觉我是走在了黄砖路上，只不过终点还有个坏消息在等着我。

original: {Story Stage 20, Multiple Invites}First Vegas, now NCR {emph}and Legion? You're being courted more than a Redding widow.
translation: {Story Stage 20, Multiple Invites}先是维加斯，现在是NCR{emph}和军团？你简直比浓妆艳抹的寡妇还抢手。

original: {Beat, wary}Hope you can answer them politely, or there's no safe place in the Mojave for you.
translation: 希望你能和他们好好打交道，要不就算莫哈维再大，也没有你能容身的地方了。

original: {Story Stage 40}Mojave's almost buzzing like a Cazador now... must be all the blood Legion and NCR are spilling over the Colorado.
translation: {Story Stage 40}莫哈维现在的局势就像猎蜂振翅一样让人烦躁……肯定是因为军团和莫哈维在科罗拉多河两岸大打出手。

original: {Story Stage 50}Guess there's no turning back now, it's war. If Hoover Dam's where it's going to go down, better make it count.
translation: {Story Stage 50}看来没有什么回头路了，战争已经爆发了。如果胡佛水坝就是终点，但愿我们能死得其所。

original: {In Party, Random Opener from Wheel}Oh, you look like you got something else to say besides ordering me around.
translation: {In Party, Random Opener from Wheel}噢，看来除了把我来回使唤之外，你终于有点别的话要说了。

original: {In Party, Random Opener from Wheel}Let's hear it, you look all serious.
translation: {In Party, Random Opener from Wheel}有什么话就说吧，你看起来很严肃。

original: {In Party, Random Opener from Wheel}Something to say to me other than guns, distance, and stimming?
translation: {In Party, Random Opener from Wheel}终于有话要说了？不是枪啦，距离啦，吃药之类的话题了？

original: {In Party, Random Opener from Wheel}Whoa, why you leaning in all of a sudden?
translation: {In Party, Random Opener from Wheel}哇，你突然靠这么近干什么？

original: {FIRST TALK}{dumbfounded - as though seeing a ghost}What in the goddamn...?
translation: {FIRST TALK}{dumbfounded - as though seeing a ghost}这他妈怎么……？

original: {keeping voice down}{Trying to contain the situation}Let's keep this in the groove, hey? Smooth moves, like {drawing words out}smooth little babies...
translation: {keeping voice down}{Trying to contain the situation}咱们有话好商量，行吗？冷静一点，别冲动……

original: {FIRST TALK, PLAYER HAS VISITED L38}{dumbfounded, as though seeing a ghost}What in the goddamn...?
translation: {FIRST TALK, PLAYER HAS VISITED L38}{dumbfounded, as though seeing a ghost}这他妈怎么……？

original: {keeping voice down}{Trying to contain the situation}Let's keep this in the groove, hey? Smooth moves. {drawing it out}Smooth...
translation: {keeping voice down}{Trying to contain the situation}咱们有话好商量，行吗？冷静一点，别冲动……

original: {just dawning on you, keeping voice down}Hello! That broad everyone saw go in the Lucky 38, that was you? {gift of gab failing}Oh shit.
translation: {just dawning on you, keeping voice down}你好啊！那个大摇大摆走进幸运38的人就是你吗？{gift of gab failing}哦，见鬼。

original: {FIRST TALK, PLAYER WIPED OUT KHANS IN BC}{dumbfounded, as though seeing a ghost}What in the goddamn...?
translation: {FIRST TALK, PLAYER BROKE UP OMERTAS}{dumbfounded, as though seeing a ghost}这他妈怎么……？

original: {keeping voice down}{Trying to contain the situation}Let's keep this in the groove, hey? Smooth moves. {drawing it out}Smooth...
translation: {keeping voice down}{Trying to contain the situation}咱们有话好商量，行吗？冷静一点，别冲动……

original: {just dawning on you, keeping voice down}Hello! It was you, wiped out the Khans down in Boulder City? You did that? {gift of gab failing}Oh shit.
translation: {just dawning on you， keeping voice down}你好啊！就是你把巨石城里的大汗帮给一锅端了吧？{gift of gab failing}哦，见鬼。

original: {FIRST TALK, PLAYER FREED KHANS IN BC}{dumbfounded, as though seeing a ghost}What in the goddamn...?
translation: {FIRST TALK, PLAYER BROKE UP OMERTAS}{dumbfounded, as though seeing a ghost}这他妈怎么……？

original: {keeping voice down}{Trying to contain the situation}Let's keep this in the groove, hey? Smooth moves. {drawing it out}Smooth...
translation: {keeping voice down}{Trying to contain the situation}咱们有话好商量，行吗？冷静一点，别冲动……

original: {just dawning on you, keeping voice down}Hello! It was you, set the Khans free down in Boulder City? You did that? {gift of gab failing}Oh shit.
translation: {just dawning on you， keeping voice down}你好啊！就是你把巨石城里的大汗帮给放了吧？{gift of gab failing}哦，见鬼。

original: {FIRST TALK, PLAYER HAS STRIP REP}{dumbfounded, as though seeing a ghost}What in the goddamn...?
translation: {FIRST TALK, PLAYER BROKE UP OMERTAS}{dumbfounded, as though seeing a ghost}这他妈怎么……？

original: {keeping voice down}{Trying to contain the situation}Let's keep this in the groove, hey? Smooth moves. {drawing it out}Smooth...
translation: {keeping voice down}{Trying to contain the situation}咱们有话好商量，行吗？冷静一点，别冲动……

original: {just dawning on you, keeping voice down}Hello! The gasser everyone's been talking about, making a splash on the Strip. That's been you? {gift of gab failing}Oh shit.
translation: {just dawning on you， keeping voice down}你好啊！大伙都在谈论你，那个近来在长街声名鹊起的家伙就是你吧？{gift of gab failing}哦，见鬼。

original: I comped you the prez so we can talk there, hey? No need to keep tugging at my sleeve.
translation: 我带你去总统套房，咱们可以在那儿谈，怎么样？没必要在这儿揪着我领子。

original: {annoyed}Wait {'til}until we get to the Presidential, {pal-ee}pally. I don't need you tugging at my sleeve.
translation: {annoyed}等{'til}到了总统套房再说吧，{pal-ee}亲爱的。我可不喜欢你拽着我的领子。

original: {in pain, recognizing player as an enemy of Powder Gangers}{outraged}Are you fucking kidding me?
translation: {in pain, recognizing player as an enemy of Powder Gangers}{outraged}你他妈在逗我？

original: First I get my legs smashed, and then in walks the Powder Gangers' Grim fucking Reaper? What the fuck have you got against us, man?
translation: 先是我的腿废了，然后我们又一头撞进了炸药帮的死对头怀里？我们到底跟你有什么仇啊，老兄？

original: Jesus fucking Christ, if you want me dead just gimme 15 Med-X and I'll fucking O.D. for ya, okay? Fuck!
translation: 狗日的，你要是想让我死，给我15支吗啡针-X，我马上就嗑药死给你看，好不好？操！

original: {in pain, recognizing player as an enemy of Powder Gangers}{outraged}Are you fucking kidding me?
translation: {in pain, recognizing player as an enemy of Powder Gangers}{outraged}你他妈在逗我呢？

original: First I get my legs smashed, and then in walks the Powder Gangers' Grim fucking Reaper? What the fuck have you got against us, bitch?
translation: 先是我的腿废了，然后我们又一头撞进了炸药帮的死对头怀里？我们到底跟你有什么仇啊，老兄？

original: Jesus fucking Christ, if you want me dead just gimme 15 Med-X and I'll fucking O.D. for ya, okay? Fuck!
translation: 狗日的，你要是想让我死，给我15支吗啡针-X，我马上就嗑药死给你看，好不好？操！

original: Hey, thanks for all the hard work back there. I'm going to run a tight ship here, don't you worry.
translation: 嘿，感谢你所做的一切。我会多加注意的，不用担心。

original: It's time for the meeting with the bosses. We can't chit chat right now.
translation: 该去见老板们了。我们可没时间在这瞎扯。

original: I don't know if you know, but since Jeannie May passed, I've been keeping an eye on her properties for her.
translation: 不知你是否知道，珍妮·梅走了以后，我一直在帮她看管财产。

original: I think it's time we gave everything back to you, so take this key and make yourself at home at our motel.
translation: 我想是时候报答你了，拿着这把钥匙，这座旅店永远为你敞开大门。

original: It'll open the room on the second floor, closest to the lobby. Hope it suits you.
translation: 你的房间在二楼，离门廊最近的那间。希望你喜欢。

original: New guy, eh? The more the merrier around here!
translation: 新来的小子吗？人越多越热闹啊！

original: New gal, eh? The more the merrier around here!
translation: 新来的小丫头吗？人越多越热闹啊！

original: Hey there. The name's Sexton. Private James Sexton. Welcome to Forlorn Hope.
translation: 你好。我叫塞克斯顿。列兵詹姆斯·塞克斯顿。欢迎来到飘零希望营地。

original: {Angry}Head voices don't *like* you, squishy man!
translation: {Angry}脑子里的声音不*喜欢*你，软软人！

original: So, Mr. House doesn't care that one of Caesar's most notorious Legion spies is walking around on the Strip.
translation: 看来，豪斯先生并不介意凯撒手下最臭名昭著的间谍在长街上招摇过市。

original: Either that or his Securitrons' AI is too primitive to recognize the threat. Neither answer is particularly comforting.
translation: 要不然，就是他的电子保安还不够智能，根本没有检测到风险。不管哪个答案，都无法让人特别放心呀。

original: I've read about REPCONN. I think they did some work with the...{catching himself, was about to say "Enclave"} the government before the war. Rockets and some energy weapon prototypes, I think.
translation: 我读过瑞普康的资料。我想他们曾经跟……{catching himself, was about to say "Enclave"}战前政府有过合作。包括火箭啊，能量武器原型机啊什么的。

original: Interesting way of handling things. Very {soob}sub {roh-sah}rosa.
translation: 你处理问题的方式很有趣。简直瞒天过海。

original: I don't know if the Scorpions deserve to be wiped out for something they didn't do, but that's one less problem Westside has to deal with.
translation: 我不知道毒蝎帮该不该因为自己没做过的事而落得个被全灭的下场，但西区确实少了一个麻烦。

original: I shouldn't be surprised at what happened with Moreno. I hoped that after all this time, he could put his anger behind him.
translation: 莫雷诺变成这样，我并不奇怪。我曾希望时间能让他放下心中的仇恨。

original: Maybe everything good in Orion Moreno died at Navarro, and it was foolish to think there was anything in him left to salvage.
translation: 但那个善良的厄里翁·莫雷诺也许早就已经死在纳瓦罗了，指望他心里还残留着一点良心，真是太蠢了。

original: In case it's not obvious, I think you should redirect the power to Freeside and Outer Vegas.
translation: 该怎么选是明摆着的，你应该把电力送到自由城和维加斯外围去。

original: I'm not exactly a mercenary, but taking out scumbags of this magnitude wouldn't cause me to lose any sleep.
translation: 虽然我算不上什么雇佣兵，但解决这种级别的人渣并不会让人心生愧疚。

original: Caesar may be dead, but I think the toga is here to stay. You simply can't buy better thigh accentuation.
translation: 凯撒是死了，但我想他们那种长袍风格会继续流行下去。毕竟你找不到更能突出大腿的服饰了。

original: You're a killer. Go away.
translation: 你这个凶手。走开。

original: We're being held here against our will! I beg you, help us!
translation: 我们是被人关到这里的！求你了，帮帮我们！

original: Are you going to free us, or what?
translation: 你是准备放了我们吗？

original: {miserable}Oh, it's just awful here. Can't you help us?
translation: {miserable}喔，这地方太糟糕了。你就不能帮帮我们吗？

original: {desperate}You're still gonna free us, aren't you?
translation: {desperate}你还是会放我们出去的，对吧？

original: {you don't like being eclipsed, KAI-zar}Caesar may have deemed you worthy to bear his mark, but your reputation preceeds you.
translation: {you don't like being eclipsed, KAI-zar}或许凯撒认为你配得上他的徽记，但你的坏名声早就人尽皆知了。

original: Your presence will be tolerated, but you are not welcome here. Lucullus awaits you on the docks.
translation: 我们可以容忍你在这里走动，但这不代表我们欢迎你。卢库勒斯正在码头上等你。

original: {Angry, do NOT}Do not make {KAI-zar}Caesar wait! Lucullus awaits you on the dock.
translation: {Angry,doNOT}别让{KAI-zar}凯撒等你！卢库勒斯正在码头上等你。

original: {you don't like being eclipsed}A Profligate bearing the Mark of {KAI-zar}Caesar? What is the world coming to?
translation: {youdon'tlikebeingeclipsed}一个荒淫之人居然戴着{KAI-zar}凯撒的徽记？这个世界怎么了？

original: Cursor {Luh-CUL-us}Lucullus is waiting for you with the barge at the docks. He will take you to The Fort to speak with {KAI-zar}Caesar.
translation: 库瑟·{Luh-CUL-us}卢库勒斯正在码头边的驳船上等你。他会带你去城堡觐见{KAI-zar}凯撒。

original: {Annoyed}Get moving, Profligate! Do not make {KAI-zar}Caesar wait!
translation: {Annoyed}快走，荒淫之人！别让{KAI-zar}凯撒等你！

original: {Shocked}I warned them about that truck weeks ago. Always be prepared for any hazardous radiation I said.
translation: {Shocked}我几个星期前就警告过他们货车的事。我当时就说了要做好受到超量辐射的准备。

original: {Saddened sigh}Those headstrong fools should have listened...
translation: {Saddenedsigh}那些死脑筋的笨蛋为什么就是不肯听我的……

original: {Tired}Are you ready to head upriver?
translation: {Tired}你准备好朝上游进发了吗？

original: {Cold}I'll give you this, you've got a lot of guts walking in here like this.
translation: {Cold}不得不说，你居然敢大摇大摆地出现在这儿，真是胆量十足。

original: Well, if there was any question on whether I should leave, I guess there's my answer.
translation: 如果对于我是否应该离开还有什么疑问，我想这就是我的答案。

original: {Horrified}Why did you do that? They were going to let us walk away. Why did you attack them?
translation: {Horrified}你为什么要那样做？他们都要放我们走了。你为什么要攻击他们？

original: I don't care that they started it. What you did was inexcusable. You need to go.
translation: 不管是谁先动的手，你做的事都是无法原谅的。你走吧。

original: Clearly you're determined to fight the Brotherhood. Well, you can add my name to your hit list because you're on your own.
translation: 显然你是决定和兄弟会为敌了。很好，把我的名字也加进你的黑名单里吧，从今往后你就自己干。

original: Pretty addictive, right? You do it once, it just makes you want to do it more.
translation: 看吧？相当过瘾，对吧？你只要做过第一次就会想做第二次。

original: You can't help but notice that the Brotherhood barely exist to these people out here. We're like an urban myth. No real presence on the Outside.
translation: 你肯定察觉到了，兄弟会对这里的人来说几乎是不存在的。我们像都市传说一样。外界根本察觉不到我们的存在。

original: We just don't adapt like we should. Used to be that all you needed to get your way was a suit of power armor and a laser rifle.
translation: 我们本该与时俱进的，但我们没有。我们习惯了穿着动力装甲，拿着激光步枪，以为这样就能摆平一切。

original: Now... people are armed and organized. They're not afraid. But we still stick to our old approach, because it's all we know.
translation: 可如今……人人都有枪有组织。他们已经不再害怕了。可我们还在用老办法解决问题，因为我们作茧自缚太久了。

original: Wow, Mr. House is looking for you, huh? What do you think he wants? Bowling partner?
translation: 哇，豪斯先生在找你啊？你猜他会找你干什么？一起去打保龄球？

original: Well look at that! You aren't a Powder Ganger after all. I'd suggest against wearing that outfit around the townsfolk. You may get shot by accident.
translation: 嗨呀，瞧啊！原来你不是炸药帮的人。我建议你平时在镇上还是不要穿着这身衣服了，你可能会莫名挨枪子的。

original: I don't suppose you came here to rescue me?
translation: 我想你不是来这儿救我的吧？

original: This has been a dream come true to work on the Lady. I don't think I've seen Loyal this frisky in years.{test}
translation: 能够再见到淑女，简直是美梦成真。我已经很多年没有见到罗亚尔这样手舞足蹈了。{test}

original: Have you seen her? The redhead of my dreams?
translation: 你见到她了吗？我梦中的那位红发女郎？

original: Hi! I can't believe I'm going to meet my red-headed lady soon! I'm really nervous about it!
translation: 嗨！真不敢相信我马上就要见到红发女郎了！我现在还真有点紧张！

original: You're a terrible person! I loved her! And you let her run right into our killzone. Why didn't you stop her?
translation: 你这该死的东西！我爱她！而你居然眼睁睁地看着她去送死。你为什么没有阻止她？

original: {Player responsible for the death of his love}Go to hell, outsider. Stay away from me.
translation: {Player responsible for the death of his love}去死吧，外来者。离我远点儿。

original: Hey there. Back for more?
translation: 你好。又回来了？

original: That was pretty incredible. I've never seen anyone come out of the Boomers' rain of death alive before.{test}
translation: 真是相当不得了。我以前从没见过有人能从大炮族的火力压制下活着走出来。

original: Hey there lady! Can you help me find Mister Cuddles?
translation: 你好，女士！你能帮我找抱抱先生吗？

original: Hey there mister! Can you help me find Mister Cuddles?
translation: 你好，先生！你能帮我找抱抱先生吗？

original: Hi again! Have you found Mister Cuddles?
translation: 嗨！你找到抱抱先生了吗？

original: Pearl sent word saying it's all right to tell you about the Lady in the water.
translation: 珀尔让我给你带个话，她说现在可以告诉你关于水中淑女的事情了。

original: It's going to be a dream come true once you've raised that bomber from Lake Mead!
translation: 如果你能把轰炸机从米德湖里捞出来，那才真是梦想成真！

original: I hope Pearl knows what she's doing, letting you wander around Nellis as you please.
translation: 真不知道珀尔在做什么，居然会允许你随心所欲地在内利斯乱逛。

original: What is it, Outsider?
translation: 什么事，外来者？

original: Hey! Do you have any toys outside of here? I sure could use something fun.
translation: 嘿。外面有没有玩具？我肯定有些很有意思的东西。

original: I've heard about what you've done around here, and I have nothing to say to you, outsider.
translation: 我听说过你的事迹了，我没什么好和你说的，外来者。

original: Hold it right there! Don't you move!
translation: 站住！不要动！

original: How the hell did you survive that bombardment?
translation: 你他妈怎么从炮击里活下来的？

original: Yes, Outsider?
translation: 是，外来者？

original: I told you I wouldn't work against the NCR. I meant it.
translation: 我跟你说了我不会和NCR作对。我是认真的。

original: I'm out of here.
translation: 我要走了。

original: Still helping the Legion. You're gonna get what's coming to you. I promise you that.
translation: 你还在帮军团做事。我敢打包票，你不会落得什么好下场的。

original: We're through working together.
translation: 我们不会再一起共事了。

original: {FIRST TALK, BAD NCR REP}{appraising}So I finally get to meet the courier who's caused so much trouble for the New California Republic.
translation: {FIRST TALK， BAD NCR REP}{appraising}终于见到这位给新加州共和国造成无数麻烦的邮差了。

original: {FIRST TALK}So I finally get to meet the courier who's accomplished so much in so little time. That's why I summoned you here, right?
translation: {FIRST TALK}终于见到那位声名鹊起的邮差了。不过也是因为这样我才召见你的，不是吗？

original: I mean, a man nearly kills you, and your response is to track him across the breadth of the Mojave?
translation: 你为了报复那个差点杀了你的人，居然追着他横穿了整片莫哈维沙漠？

original: There are rewards for doing as I command. Today, your reward is vengeance. You get to decide how Benny dies.
translation: 服从我的人，都能得到奖赏。今天，你的奖赏就是复仇：我允许你来决定本尼的死法。

original: Go to Benny, let him know what you've decided. My Praetorians will perform the execution - {giving player credit}unless you want to perform it yourself.
translation: 去找本尼，亲自向他下达你的判决。我的禁卫军会遵照执行——{giving player credit}除非你想自己动手。

original: {SUDDEN PAIN}I want you to forge an alliance between Caesar's Legion and the White Glove Society.
translation: {SUDDEN PAIN}我要你代表凯撒军团去和白手套社团结盟。

original: They used to be cannibals. I expect that information can be used to manipulate them. Go to -{stopping short as pain eplodes inside head}
translation: 他们以前是食人族。希望这则情报能有助于你说服他们。快去——{stopping short as pain eplodes inside head}

original: {sudden, excruciating pain in head}{gritting teeth}Ehhhh! Goddammit!
translation: {sudden， excruciating pain in head}{gritting teeth}呃啊啊啊！该死！

original: Have you been successful in your efforts to recruit the White Glove Society?
translation: 你成功征募白手套社团了吗？

original: All right, let's state the obvious. There's something wrong with me.
translation: 很好，我们就开门见山吧。我的身体有些不对劲。

original: The headaches started a couple of months ago. They weren't too bad at first... but now they come frequently and they're... {beat}debilitating.
translation: 几个月前就开始头痛了。起先并不厉害……可现在越来越频繁了，而且……病痛让我变得非常虚弱。

original: For the past two weeks, my left leg has been dragging. It's stiffer, hard to move. And you've seen me blank out.
translation: 过去的两周，我的左腿一直是瘸的。现在它变得更加僵硬，几乎不听使唤。你也看到了我昏厥的样子。

original: Lucius says I stare into space, blink a few times, then keep talking like nothing happened. So what's the diagnosis?
translation: 卢修斯说我有时会突然两眼放空，眨巴几下之后又若无其事地继续说话。你觉得我这究竟是什么症状？

original: {Kimball quest resolved}My forces are in a position to assault the Dam. {Leh-GAH-tus Lah-Nee-OOS}Legatus Lanius has assumed command.
translation: {Kimball quest resolved}我的部队已经就位，随时准备突袭水坝。{Leh-GAH-tus Lah-Nee-OOS}战斗将由副帅兰尼乌斯指挥。

original: Are you ready to go to him? To tell him to begin the assault?
translation: 你准备好去找他了吗？告诉他开始进攻？

original: {Amazed at the Player}Wow... I've never seen anyone go into the Lucky 38 before.
translation: {Amazed at the Player}哇哦……我还真没见过有谁能进入幸运38的。

original: {Amazed at the Player}Don't mind me. I was just passing by.
translation: {Amazed at the Player}不用理我。我就路过。

original: {Amazed at the Player}I bet everyone's going to hear about you going into the 38.
translation: {Amazed at the Player}我打赌你进入幸运38的事很快就会传开。

original: {Amazed at the Player}My pals said nobody has ever been inside the Lucky 38.
translation: {Amazed at the Player}我的哥们都说从来没有人进过幸运38。

original: {Amazed at the Player}Hey, sexy, come by the Tops later. I'd love to hear your story.
translation: {Amazed at the Player}嘿，性感美人，等会来九重天吧。我很想听听你的故事。

original: Yes? What is it?
translation: 是吗？什么事？

original: {Flustered}Look, this isn't a great {time}ti- oh, what the hell, it's not like we're making any progress. I'm Ibsen, and I hope your day is going better than mine is.
translation: {Flustered}听着，现在可不是{time}什——嘿，搞什么鬼，看来我们根本没取得什么进展。我是易卜生，希望你今天不会像我过得一样糟。

original: Howdy, doc. Strange to see you wandering around.
translation: 你好啊，医生。在这儿见到你还真是稀奇。

original: I admire a woman who can hold her liquor. Cute to boot.
translation: 我就喜欢泼辣女人。特别过瘾。

original: She looks like she knows how to handle herself in a fight.
translation: 她看起来很能打。

original: I hope you programmed that thing to be friendly to Freesiders.
translation: 希望你已经把那东西的程序设置成对自由城友善了。

original: Super Mutant? You don't look so super to me.
translation: 超级变种人？我看也没那么超级啊。

original: How's it hangin', old man? Oh, sorry.
translation: 最近怎么样啊，老头？哦，抱歉。

original: Hey, Rex. I see your new master is keeping you polished up. Good for you.
translation: 嘿，雷克斯。你的新主人把你打扮得锃光瓦亮的嘛。挺好。

original: Cheer up, lady. You've still got your youth.
translation: 高兴点，女士。你还很年轻呢。

original: NCR Trooper, reporting for duty!
translation: NCR士兵，向您报道！

original: Trooper, ready to fight!
translation: 士兵，准备战斗！

original: You called for a Trooper?
translation: 是你呼叫士兵支援的？

original: You called for an extra gun?
translation: 是你呼叫额外人手的？

original: I got your call and came running.
translation: 我收到你的呼叫就赶来了。

original: Guns and gear - at your service.
translation: 整装待发，为您效劳。

original: Someone said you needed backup? I'm it.
translation: 听说你需要增援？我就是增援。

original: You called for backup?
translation: 你呼叫了增援？

original: Where's the fight, sir?
translation: 敌人在哪儿，长官？

original: For the Republic!
translation: 为了共和国！

original: Ranger at the ready!
translation: 游骑兵准备就绪！

original: NCR Ranger, reporting for duty!
translation: NCR游骑兵，向您报道！

original: Here we are, you just point and we'll shoot.
translation: 我们来了，全听您指挥。

original: Here I am, just point at what needs killing.
translation: 我来了，你只要告诉目标在哪儿就行。

original: One riot, one ranger... let's get this done.
translation: 哪里有骚乱，哪里就有游骑兵……动身吧。

original: Heard you were in a spot of trouble, friend. Let's fix that.
translation: 我听说你遇到了麻烦，朋友。让我们来搞定它。

original: For the Republic!
translation: 为了共和国！

original: You called for an extra gun?
translation: 是你呼叫援军？

original: You're lucky I happened to be nearby.
translation: 你真幸运，我恰好就在附近。

original: I got your flank - you just shoot what's in front of you!
translation: 我来掩护你的侧翼——你只管射击前方的目标！

original: Ranger here - where's the fight?
translation: 游骑兵就位，敌人在哪儿？

original: You ain't heard anything about my boy, have you?
translation: 你有没有我儿子的消息？

original: You double-crossing snake! I have nothing to say to someone so lowly and ill-mannered.
translation: 你这两面派！我跟你这样的卑鄙小人无话可说。

original: {Pissed}I wanted Mr. Gunderson out of the way, not slaughtered in my hotel! Our business is concluded. Good day!
translation: {Pissed}我是想让冈德森先生别再和我们作对，不是想让他死在我的酒店里！咱们这桩生意没得做了。再见！

original: Ah, you're back. You're always a welcome guest here.
translation: 啊，你回来了。这里永远欢迎你。

original: Why are you standing still? Do you think the world waits for you while you stand there drooling? Get back out there and get to work!
translation: 你还傻愣着干什么？你是不是以为自己站着发愣的时候全世界都会停下来等你？赶紧滚回去干活！

original: Why are you standing still? Do you think the world waits for you while you stand there drooling? Get back out there and get to work!
translation: 你还傻愣着干什么？你是不是以为自己站着发愣的时候全世界都会停下来等你？赶紧滚回去干活！

original: You! What do you think you're doing?
translation: 你！你以为你在干什么？

original: Now it can truly be said that not only do we dress better than anyone, we eat better as well.
translation: 现在终于可以毋庸置疑地说，我们不光穿的比别人好，吃的也比别人好。

original: Did you see Heck Gunderson the brahmin baron at the bar? He may be a wastelander, but his taste clearly befits his status.
translation: 看到吧台边的赫克·冈德森了吗，就是那个双头牛大亨？虽然他来自废土，但他的品位彰显了他的格调。

original: Our executive chef Philippe is the toast of New Vegas. His Brahmin Wellington is absolutely sublime.
translation: 我们的行政主厨菲利普是新维加斯最棒的大厨。他做的惠灵顿牛排是人间一绝。

original: You watch yourself around Mr. Gunderson.
translation: 在冈德森先生身边时注意点。

original: Keep your distance. Who are you, and what do you want?
translation: 站那儿别动。你是谁，你想干什么？

original: {Sarcastic}So, last day on Earth, huh? Getting your affairs in order? Or are you still trying to work on that bad reputation of yours?
translation: {Sarcastic}那么，终于到最后一天了，嗯？把该办的都办完了吗？还是说你仍在努力改善你的坏名声？

original: The NCR just wants to be friends, but you don't seem to want to play nice. See you tomorrow.
translation: NCR只是想交个朋友，可你似乎却不那么上道啊。明天见了。

original: {annoyed at town conspiracy theorist}Don't listen to a word No-bark says. He spouts nothing but nonsense.
translation: {annoyed at town conspiracy theorist}疯嘴说的话一个字都不能信，他只会满嘴胡说八道。

original: {successful rocket launch}Good thing none of those rockets crashed into Novac.
translation: {successful rocket launch}好消息是没有一枚火箭在诺瓦克坠毁。

original: {Boone shot Andy}Hell of a thing for Boone to kill Ranger Andy like that.
translation: {Boone shot Andy}布恩怎么把游骑兵安迪给杀了。

original: {Chupacabra alive}The McBrides think some mysterious creature is shooting up their Brahmin. Gotta be somebody in town doing it.
translation: {Chupacabra alive}麦克布莱德家的人总觉得有什么神秘生物在袭击他们家的双头牛。肯定是镇上的人干的。

original: {rocket launch failed}Knew those ghouls were up to no good. Look where it got us.
translation: {rocket launch failed}就知道那帮尸鬼干不了好事。瞧瞧这都是些什么。

original: My gang's here, but we'll still need a plan before we rush the town. I don't want to embarrass myself and get beat by a bunch of townies.
translation: 我的人到齐了，不过在进攻这个小镇之前我们还是得先想出个计划。我可不想冲进去被居民一顿暴打，那多丢面子啊。

original: We ain't got much in the way of supplies, so if you could shake down the old doctor and the store owner for some stuff, we'd be in good shape.
translation: 我们的补给有限，所以如果能敲上那个老医生和店主人一笔，我们的情况应该会大有改观。

original: Once you're done with that stuff - or none of it - say the word and we'll make our move.
translation: 这些事情，不管你最后搞定还是没搞定，都告诉我一声，我们就开始行动。

original: So, you're planning on taking on Joe Cobb's gang. It's a big risk, but I suppose you have to do what you think is right.
translation: 好吧，看来你是打定主意要和乔·科布的人动手了。这么做的风险可不小，但想必你也有自己的理由吧。

original: I hope you didn't just bring a heap of trouble down on Goodsprings by killing Joe Cobb like that.
translation: 希望你不会因为杀了乔·科布而给清泉镇带来麻烦。

original: His friends might come looking for him, and I don't think they're going to care who was involved in his death or not.
translation: 他的朋友可能会来找他，依我之见，他们可不会在乎这儿的人与他的死究竟有没有关系。

original: Well, what's done is done. So, uh, what can I do for you?
translation: 好吧，反正木已成舟。那么，呃，你想要点什么？

original: I'm glad that business is over. I like it when Goodsprings is nice and quiet.
translation: 很高兴事情都了结了。我喜欢安详美丽的清泉镇。

original: Can't do business now! There's a gunfight!
translation: 现在不做生意！有枪战 !

original: Thank you!
translation: 谢谢你！

original: {Nods to player}Been doing a lot of good work out there, setting an example for the others - I know Ranger Jackson appreciates it.
translation: {Nods to player}你坚持行善，为他人树立了榜样——游骑兵杰克逊肯定会感激你的。

original: Back 'round? Just my luck... what'll it be this time?
translation: 回来了？瞧我这运气……这次你又有什么事 ?

original: You're back. Do you need medical attention?
translation: 你回来了。需要医疗服务吗？

original: If you're looking for supplies, Chet over at the general store can help you out.
translation: 如果你要买东西，杂货店的切特能帮上你。

original: Be advised, NCR President Aaron Kimball was struck down in a cowardly attack at Hoover Dam.
translation: 请注意, NCR总统亚伦·金博尔在胡佛水坝遭暴徒袭击后不幸身亡。

original: The Strip offers many fine cocktail lounges where grieving persons may drown their sorrows.
translation: 长街各家鸡尾酒沙龙皆可供诸位伤心人共寄哀思。

original: Welcome to Vegas. Don't make trouble.
translation: 欢迎光临维加斯。请遵纪守法。

original: No offense, but I need to focus on getting more rest when I'm off duty. I'm not sleeping so good. So now's not a good time.
translation: 我没别的意思，但我需要在不当班的时候好好休息。我睡得不好。所以现在不是聊天的时候。

original: If you want to talk, catch me when I'm on duty. I'm up in the dinosaur after 9 pm.
translation: 如果你真有话要说，那就等我当班的时候来找我吧。我早上9点以后都在恐龙嘴里执勤。

original: Let's get out of this first.
translation: 让我们先把这事解决了。

original: Pisses me off that Legion slavers can just operate on NCR turf like that.
translation: 军团的奴隶贩子在NCR的地盘上还敢那么明目张胆，真是气死我了。

original: If we hadn't caught up to them they'd probably have a clear path to the river. No one to stop them.
translation: 如果我们没追上他们，他们搞不好已经轻松抵达河对岸了。这一路上都没人阻止他们。

original: There should be patrols. Checkpoints. We got greedy, overstretched. Now our own territory isn't secure.
translation: 本来是应该有巡逻队和哨站的。我们太贪心，把战线拉得太长，结果现在连我们自己的地盘都不安全了。

original: Hey. I want to thank you for bringing me to Bitter Springs. Things seem... clearer now.
translation: 嘿，我要谢谢你带我来苦泉。事情现在……似乎明朗多了。

original: Let's get going, we have a battle to win.
translation: 咱们动身吧，还有一场胜利在等着我们呢。

original: {At Bunker, Moreno dead}If I had any idea Moreno was capable of doing something like that, I'd have warned you. I'm sorry it played out like this.
translation: {At Bunker, Moreno dead}要是我知道莫雷诺会做这种事，肯定会提醒你的。事情闹到这一步真的很抱歉。

original: {At Bunker, helping Legion}I'm not sure helping the Legion is the right idea. But, I'm going along with it.
translation: {At Bunker, helping Legion}不知道帮助军团是不是正确的选择。不过我会服从命令的。

original: {At Hoover Dam battle}Keep your head down - could be snipers around.
translation: {At Hoover Dam battle}别抬头——附近可能有狙击手。

original: {Remnants helping Legion}Since Johnson won't be coming with us, you might as well take his suit of Power Armor. I'll teach you the basics of how to use it.
translation: {Remnants helping Legion}既然约翰逊不肯跟我们一起来，你把他那套动力装甲拿走吧。我会简单教你怎么用的。

original: {Moreno convinced to stay}I appreciate you keeping Orion in the group. Since I won't be needing my armor - makes the cockpit a bit cramped - you should take it.
translation: {Moreno convinced to stay}谢谢你让厄里翁留了下来。我不需要护甲了——座舱里已经够挤了，你拿去吧。

original: It'll take a few hours to show you how to use it properly, so let's get started.
translation: 不过要学会用这玩意可需要好几个小时，咱们马上开始吧。

original: We've got a lot to do to prepare for the President's visit and not much time.
translation: 总统要来视察，太多事情要准备，但我们时间太少。

original: Is there a problem here?
translation: 有什么问题？

original: You again. What's your problem?
translation: 又是你。怎么了？

original: Make it quick. We don't have much time.
translation: 快点。我们时间不多。

original: I still haven't found my lucky helmet yet.
translation: 我还没找到我的幸运头盔呢。

original: Thanks for finding my lucky helmet. It's my favorite!
translation: 谢谢你找到了我的幸运头盔。它是我的最爱！

original: It's unlikely the Legion will try anything, but we'll be prepared for it anyway.
translation: 军团搞小动作的可能性不大，但我们也不能掉以轻心。

original: I'm so excited about the President visiting. This is going to be great!
translation: 总统来视察让我非常兴奋。这真是伟大的一刻！

original: I'm looking forward to seeing the President.
translation: 我一直都期待能见到总统。

original: I'm just glad to have the day off for this.
translation: 今天能请到假真是太好了。

original: I wonder what President Kimball is going to talk about today.
translation: 不知道金博尔总统今天都会说些什么。

original: That was a great speech.
translation: 真是精彩的演讲。

original: President Kimball is really well-spoken.
translation: 金博尔总统讲得真好。

original: It was such an honor to be here today. I'm so lucky.
translation: 今天能到这里真的很荣幸。我真的很幸运。

original: That's a nice suit President Kimball had.
translation: 金博尔总统的西装真帅气。

original: Nothing is going to happen to the President on my watch.
translation: 有我保护总统，不会发生任何事的。

original: {Caesar died via Auto-Doc}{confused, angry}I don't understand - the machine was supposed to cure {KAI-zar}Caesar. {growing anger, blaming player}You did this - his blood is on your hands.
translation: {Caesar died via Auto-Doc}{confused， angry}我不理解，这台机器能本该治好{KAI-zar}凯撒的。{growing anger， blaming player}是你干的——你手上沾满了他的血。

original: It is a great honor for anyone outside the Legion to get an audience with Caesar.
translation: 作为一名外人，能够得到凯撒的接见，真是莫大的荣幸啊。

original: {Liked, once only}You've proven yourself to be a true friend of the Legion. We have a safehouse available to our agents in the Mojave - here's the key.
translation: {Liked， once only}你已经证明了你是军团真正的朋友。莫哈维有座安全屋是专为我们的特工准备的，这是钥匙。

original: It's an excellent place to rest and store extra equipment. In addition, one of our veterans, Atticus, visits the house every few days.
translation: 你可以在那里放心休息，存放多余的装备。另外，阿提卡斯，我们的一位老兵，每隔几天就会去那里一趟。

original: While he's there, you can acquire items useful for stealthy operations against our enemies from him.
translation: 他去的时候，你可以在他那里获取执行隐秘行动所需要的物资。

original: {Rex hired}The mechanical dog you have with you - where did you get it?
translation: {Rex hired}你的那只机械狗，是从哪搞来的？

original: {Caesar cured, Female PC}{contempt}A woman actually proved useful for once. {KAI-zar}Caesar was bold to put his life in your hands.
translation: {Caesar cured, Female PC}{contempt}终于有个女人证明自己的价值了。{KAI-zar}凯撒敢把自己的性命交到你手里，也真是胆大。

original: {Strip, High Rep}The eyes of the mighty{KAI-zar} Caesar are upon you. He appreciates your service, and bestows upon you the exceptional gift of his Mark.
translation: {Strip，High Rep}伟大的{KAI-zar}凯撒始终注视着你。他感谢你一直以来尽忠职守，因而决定将他的徽记赐予你作为赠礼。

original: My Lord requires your presence at his camp, at Fortification Hill. His Mark will guarantee your safe-conduct through our lands.
translation: 我的主人想请你去他在堡垒山的营地一叙。他的徽记将确保你在我们的领地内畅通无阻。

original: {Strip}The eyes of the mighty {KAI-zar}Caesar are upon you. He admires your accomplishments, and bestows upon you the exceptional gift of his Mark.
translation: {Strip，High Rep}伟大的{KAI-zar}凯撒一直在注视着你。他很赞赏你所取得的成就，因而决定将他的徽记赐予你作为赠礼。

original: Any crimes you may have perpetrated against the Legion are hereby forgiven. {KAI-zar}Caesar will not extend this mercy a second time.
translation: 你对军团犯下的所有罪行都将在此被宽恕。{KAI-zar}凯撒的仁慈只会展现一次。

original: My Lord requires your presence at his camp, at Fortification Hill. His Mark will guarantee your safe-conduct through our lands.
translation: 我的主人想请你去他在堡垒山的营地一叙。他的徽记将确保你在我们的领地内畅通无阻。

original: You may go.
translation: 你可以走了。

original: Don't talk to me, rookie!
translation: 别跟我说话，菜鸟！

original: They're all dead. Guy must've had some kind of explosive on him, set off all the ordnance in this place at once.
translation: 他们都死了。那个家伙肯定在身上绑了炸药，一下把这里全炸开了花。

original: Congratulations, rookie. You just cost me my job. Don't think I don't appreciate it.
translation: 祝贺你，菜鸟。你帮我省了不少事。我还是要感谢你的。

original: I was just telling Gloria about your performance. Hell of a first day, huh?
translation: 我刚还在和格罗利亚说你的表现呢。第一天就吃了不少苦头啊？

original: I'm kind of busy, what do you want?
translation: 我有点忙，你有什么事？

original: If you're looking for Ambassador Crocker, he's not here. He was removed from office and sent home.
translation: 如果你想找克罗克大使，他不在。他已经被革职回家了。

original: I guess they disagreed with how he handled some of the events out here. It's unfortunate. He was a good man.
translation: 我想上级可能对他在部分事务上的做法有些不满。可惜了，他人还挺不错的。

original: Keep your nose clean on the Strip, soldier.
translation: 别在长街惹是非，士兵。

original: Aren't you the guy that was shooting up The Tops?
translation: 你就是大闹九重天的那个家伙吧？

original: Guess you must have some special deal with House to be able to do that and not get in trouble.
translation: 你肯定是跟豪斯签了什么特别协议，不然你闯了那么大的祸，怎么可能安然无恙。

original: Holy shit, did you hear about the Monorail being destroyed? How the fuck did that happen?
translation: 妈的，你是来调查铁路被炸毁的事的吗？这他妈到底是怎么回事？

original: I'm just glad to be safe over here on the Strip.
translation: 还好我一直在长街，这里很安全。

original: I don't want any trouble, mister. What do you want?
translation: 别惹麻烦，先生。你有什么事？

original: Don't miss The Lonesome Drifter, LIVE at the Aces Theater!
translation: 别错过《寂寞流浪汉》，王牌剧场正在上演！

original: Songs so sad and lonesome, audience members of the opposite sex will be fighting over who gets to go back to the room with you - guaranteed!
translation: 歌声惆怅寂寥，所有异性观众听了都会为和你同房而互不相让——我敢打包票！

original: Ready to tap your toes and snap your fingers? Don't miss Bruce Isaac, LIVE at the Ace Theater!
translation: 想跟着节拍摇摆吗？别错过《布鲁斯·艾萨克》，王牌剧场正在上演！

original: "Fuck off, ass-breath!" You've already heard my spiel - you really gotta go see Hadrian!
translation: "滚开，臭嘴！"——既然你听见我吆喝了，那你就该去看哈德良的演出！

original: "Pull my finger, {puh-leeze}please!"
translation: "来，{puh-leeze}臭屁来袭！"

original: See Billy Knight, King of the One-Liners - LIVE at the Aces Theater! If you miss it, you'll "Take your life, please!"
translation: 段子王比利·奈特，就在王牌剧场！错过一下子，后悔"一辈子！"

original: "I bet you could stop gambling!" {laugh}See Billy Knight, King of the One-Liners, LIVE at the Aces Theater! "I had amnesia once - I think!"{laugh}
translation: "我打赌你能戒赌！"{laugh}段子王比利·奈特，就在王牌剧场！"我得过一次失忆症——我记得可清楚啦！"{laugh}

original: It's good to see such an outstanding citizen of the NCR. What can I do for you, my friend?
translation: NCR能涌现出你这样的英雄，真是太好了。我能为你做些什么，朋友？

original: I bet it feels real nice to be carrying those weapons around on the Strip.
translation: 我敢打赌，能带着武器在长街转悠，那感觉肯定很棒。

original: That damn Mr. House has forbid any NCR military personnel from carrying any sort of firearms on the Strip. Well, except for Captain Pappas.
translation: 该死的豪斯先生禁止NCR的军事人员携带任何武器进入长街。呃，除了帕帕斯队长。

original: Mr. House still doesn't trust the NCR. A word of advice, the Securitrons won't put up with any funny stuff out there, so don't do anything stupid.
translation: 豪斯先生还是不信任NCR。给你个建议：那些电子保安可不是摆设，千万别干傻事。

original: This your first time on the Strip?
translation: 你是第一次来长街吗？

original: Hello. Did you need something?
translation: 你好。需要什么？

original: What do you want?
translation: 你想要什么？

original: As I live and breathe, Rose of Sharon Cassidy. The {emph}late Rose of Sharon Cassidy. Was hoping you were on that caravan I massacred, but...
translation: 真是百闻不如一见啊，罗撒香·盖西迪。凋谢的{emph}罗撒香·盖西迪。我本以为会在商队的尸体堆里见到你，但……

original: Crimson Caravan and Van Graffs won't need to worry about you anymore, Mojave's ours, and we're shutting you down for good.
translation: 深红商队和范·格拉夫家族不必再担心你了，莫哈维是我们的，今天就是你的死期。

original: Ah, just the person I was looking for. Your name came up in a discussion we had recently.
translation: 啊，真是巧了，我们刚才还聊到你了。

original: My sister is very impressed with you so far, but I'm not. I don't think you have what it takes to work for this family.
translation: 迄今为止我妹妹对你的印象都不错，但我却相反。我觉得你缺少一种为我们家族工作所需要的品质。

original: Luckily for you, I'm going to give you the chance to prove me wrong. What do you say? Want to make some real money?
translation: 不过你很走运，我打算给你一个机会来证明自己。你怎么说？想不想赚点正经钱？

original: Eh? You want something?
translation: 嗯？你要干什么？

original: Well, looks like you came through after all. She's not half bad looking, is she? It's almost a shame...
translation: 哎呀，看来你还是走到这一步了。她长得挺俊的，不是么？可惜了……

original: Crimson Caravan and Van Graffs won't need to worry about you anymore, Mojave's ours, we're shutting you down for good.
translation: 深红商队和范·格拉夫家族不必再担心你了，莫哈维是我们的，今天就是你的死期。

original: The same robots on the Strip, I seen one or two of them roll past town time to time. Well, the face on {'em}them looked meaner.
translation: 长街上那种机器人，我时不时能看见它们有一两个从这儿路过。它们的嘴脸比以前更难看了。

original: Who cares if Caesar's dead? Don't affect our town one bit.
translation: 谁关心的凯撒死活啊？跟我们镇子又没半点关系。

original: So much for the might of the NCR! Their President got killed over at Hoover Dam!
translation: NCR的实力也就那么回事！他们的总统死在了胡佛水坝！

original: You hear how the President of the NCR got killed? Gonna be hard to score chems around here for a while...
translation: 你听说了NCR总统被人谋杀了吗？看来这阵子很难再搞到药品了……

original: How's the NCR gonna protect Vegas if it can't even protect its own President?
translation: 如果NCR连自己的总统都保护不了，他们凭什么来保护维加斯？

original: The NCR's top Ranger, Chief Hanlon, put a gun in his mouth. Think he would've done that if the NCR stood a chance at beating the Legion?
translation: NCR的王牌游骑兵军士长汉隆，饮弹自尽了。你想想，如果NCR有一丝打败军团的希望，他会这么做吗？

original: Have you seen that tower on the Strip all lit up? You can see it for miles!
translation: 长街那座塔完全点亮了，你看见没？几英里外都能看见啊！

original: The Great Khans up and left Red Rock Canyon. Who's gonna brew fresh chems now?
translation: 大汗帮离开了红岩峡谷。我们以后去找谁做药？

original: I hear the Great Khans got massacred again. No survivors this time, though.
translation: 听说大汗帮又被屠杀了。不过这次没有幸存者了。

original: There was some kind of massacre at one of the Ranger Stations. I don't know which one.
translation: 某个游骑兵驻站发生了屠杀。具体是哪个就不知道了。

original: Some Khans got cornered in the ruins of Boulder City, but the NCR let them go. That's unusual.
translation: 大汗帮的人被困在巨石城的废墟里，但NCR最后居然放了他们。这太不正常了。

original: You ever seen one of those Rangers in black armor? I wouldn't want to make one of those mad!
translation: 你见过那些穿黑色盔甲的游骑兵吗？我可不想惹到他们！

original: Goddamn that Mr. House for selling Vegas out to the NCR! The whole Mojave will have to join up.
translation: 该死的豪斯先生把维加斯整个卖给了NCR！全莫哈维必须联合起来了。

original: {Hopeful Excitement}I hope Red Lucy gives us the{slight emphasis in "big"} *big* monsters, next.
translation: {Hopeful Excitement}希望血手露西下次能派真正的{slight emphasis in "big"}*大*家伙上场。

original: {Bewildered}What the hell?{slight pause} Is that a half-robot dog?
translation: {Bewildered}什么东西？{slight pause}那是一条半机械狗吗 ?

original: {Gratitude}You better control that{slight pause, sizing E-DE} thing. Bots can't be trusted.
translation: {Gratitude}你最好能管住{slight pause, sizing E-DE}那东西。机器人都不可信。

original: {Gratitude}A Follower is always welcome among our people.
translation: {Gratitude}天启追随者在这里是非常受欢迎的。

original: {Restrained Warning}Keep the Ranger on a leash around here.
translation: {Restrained Warning}把你的游骑兵拴好。

original: {Inquisitive}Another Super Mutant roaming outer New Vegas, huh?
translation: {Inquisitive}怎么又来一个在新维加斯外围闲逛的超级变种人 ?

original: {Proud Assertion}All humans are welcome here, even Ghouls.
translation: {Proud Assertion}这里欢迎任何人，包括尸鬼。

original: {Satisfied}Even Presidents die, huh? Good.
translation: {Satisfied}就连总统都死了？很好。

original: {Pessimistic Resignation}Caesar's death don't change shit down here.
translation: {Pessimistic Resignation}凯撒的死能对这里有个屁的影响。

original: {Defiant, then relieved}That Legion boss would've never taken the city, but I'm glad he's a goner.
translation: {Defiant, then relieved}那个军团老大根本夺取不了这座城市，不过他死了是最好的。

original: If there's war in the end, it won't affect our city.
translation: 就算以后真打仗，也影响不到我们的城市。

original: Rumors of imminent war have made it all the way down here.
translation: 这里谣言四起，都说战争要打响了。

original: {Indolent}Going to stay down here until all the trouble outside blows over.
translation: {Indolent}在外面的麻烦事结束前，我还是躲在这里比较好。

original: Looks like the entire region's going straight where we are - knee-deep in shit.
translation: 感觉这地方的人就快和我们差不多了，都一脚踩进膝盖深的屎里。

original: {Almost annoyed}Only one bad thing about The Thorn, it brings all the idiots, assholes and topsiders down here.
translation: {Almost annoyed}荆棘街唯一的问题就是，它把所有的白痴、杂种和上面的人都集中到这下面来了。

original: {Excited}I can't wait to hit The Thorn. I wouldn't mind hitting on Red Lucy either, but she's outta my league.
translation: {Excited}我等不及要去荆棘街了。虽然我不介意和血手露西来一发，但她应该看不上我。

original: {Excited}One of these days, Red Lucy's going to show off her Deathclaws.
translation: {Excited}过不了几天，血手露西就该让她的死亡爪出场了。

original: {Thankful}Good to see you respect the Followers.
translation: {Thankful}很高兴你能尊重天启追随者。

original: {Cautionary}Make sure the NCR dog behaves, you're in the Mojave now.
translation: {Cautionary}管好你身边那条NCR的狗，你现在是在莫哈维。

original: {Approving}Your merchant friend is always welcome among us.
translation: {Approving}非常欢迎你的商人朋友。

original: {Apprehensive Curiosity}That bot of yours don't look like anything I've seen in the Mojave.
translation: {Apprehensive Curiosity}你这个机器人和我在莫哈维见过的东西都不一样。

original: {Overt Curiosity}Your friend's not from the desert, is she?
translation: {Overt Curiosity}你的那个朋友不是从沙漠里来的吧？

original: {Suspicious}We tolerate Wasteland savages, as long as they respect our rule around here.
translation: {Suspicious}只要守我们这里的规矩，我们也可以容忍废土的野人。

original: {Female PC, in Powder Ganger gear}{puzzled}Hadn't heard there were women Powder Gangers, but a bounty's a bounty. The NCR will probably pay up either way.
translation: {Female PC，in Powder Ganger gear}{puzzled}虽然没听说过炸药帮里还有女的，不过悬赏就是悬赏。NCR不管男女都会照付。

original: I'm going to assume you had reason to kill Dermot and his pet. Always had a bad feeling about them. {stern}But everyone else here is hands-off.
translation: 我想你应该也是有什么仇怨才会杀了德莫特和他的跟班吧。他们确实让人生厌，{stern}但这里的人从来都不会去过问。

original: You can just talk to the whores, you know. You and me, we don't need to talk unless there's trouble.
translation: 你可以去和那些妓女聊天。除非有什么麻烦，否则你我之间没什么可说的。

original: {unstable, issues with women}When I talk to a girl, I start the conversation! And I didn't start no conversation with you.
translation: {unstable，issues with women}每次和姑娘说话，都是我先开口！而我还没和你开口说话呢。

original: {Male PC}Hey, baby. What say you and me get acquainted?
translation: {Male PC}嘿，宝贝。来和我玩玩？

original: {playing at being a showman}Welcome to Casa Madrid - cheapest, cleanest whores in all New Vegas. If you want to know the rates for poon, talk to the whores.
translation: {playing at being a showman}欢迎来到卡萨·马德里——新维加斯最便宜、最干净的妓女都在这里。如果你想谈价钱，就和你中意的姑娘说话吧。

original: Hi there. Welcome to the Westside Co-op. I'm Clayton Etienne. Let me know if you have any questions.
translation: 你好。欢迎来到西区合作社。我是克莱顿·埃迪尼。如果你有什么不清楚的，尽管问我。

original: Welcome back. How can I help you?
translation: 欢迎回来。需要点什么？

original: Uh... hi.
translation: 呃……嗨。

original: You mustn't ask why we wear our masks. We are forbidden to speak of it.
translation: 你绝对不要问我们为什么要戴面具。这个话题是禁忌。

original: {Mr. House agreed to surrender Vegas to the NCR}If Mr. House is going to lower his standards, we'll just have to raise ours!
translation: {Mr. House agreed to surrender Vegas to the NCR}既然豪斯先生要降低他的标准，那我们就得提高我们的！

original: {snort}NCR, no better than common thieves. Where do they get off stealing our armor?
translation: {snort}NCR，跟小偷没什么区别。他们什么时候才能不再偷我们的护甲 ?

original: {Player just won the battle}Caesar on the cross, been a long time since I've seen the kind of work you've laid down today... a {emph}damn long time.
translation: {Playerjustwonthebattle}凯撒兵败身死，我已经好久没见过有人能像你今天这样……立下卓越的战功。

original: {Wistful}And the screams of those Legion bastards as they kicked dirt running East... like a choir of angels to my ears.
translation: {Wistful}听听那些军团渣滓们仓皇逃回老家时的哀嚎吧……对我来说简直就像天籁。

original: Speaking of - that crazy lightshow over the Fort, what the fuck was that, some kind of thumb of God you called down? {Wistful}Amazing, fucking amazing.
translation: 说到这个，城堡上的那场烟火秀到底是他妈怎么回事，难道连上帝都被你招来显灵了？{Wistful}漂亮，太他妈漂亮了。

original: Could use a hundred of you, just scatter you over the East like jacks, give those plumed fucks the what-for.
translation: 要是能给我一百个像你这样的士兵，把你们全派到东部去，岂不是能把他们翻个底朝天。

original: {Angry, frustrated}As if I didn't have enough to worry about, one of our facilities was recently broken into and its power diverted.
translation: {Angry,frustrated}估计老天爷嫌我的烦心事还不够多，最近我们有一间设施遭到入侵，电力也被截流了。

original: Have you seen that damned tower in the Strip, all aglow? Of course you've seen it. Everyone's seen it.
translation: 你看到长街那座该死的塔了么，就是灯火通明的那座？你肯定看到了。谁都看得到。

original: That was {stressed}our power that did that, and I {stressed}will find out who did it. {beat, realizes the player's there, rant ends}Did you have something to report?
translation: 我们的电就是被送到那儿去了，我{stressed}一定会查出来是谁干的好事。{beat,realizestheplayer'sthere,rantends}你有什么要报告的？

original: Have you discovered what the Omertas are up to?
translation: 你搞清楚黑手党到底在打什么主意了吗？

original: {Player sent to Lanius by Caesar or Lucius}You are the courier Lord Caesar has spoken of. The slaughter begins, then.
translation: {PlayersenttoLaniusbyCaesarorLucius}你就是凯撒大人提到的那个邮差了。看来屠杀可以开始了。

original: We are executing your commands.
translation: 我们正在执行你的命令。

original: {Suspicious, slow}An envoy of Vegas, yet you carry yourself for battle. If so, you cannot *truly* be of that city of cowards.
translation: {Suspicious,slow}一位维加斯的使节，但你依然勇敢地投身战场。这样看来，你与城里那帮懦夫截然不同。

original: {Suspicious, slow}And who are you to come before me... you don't bear the mark of the Bear, yet you are ready for battle.
translation: {Suspicious,slow}站在我跟前的这位又是何人……你身上虽然没有狗熊的标志，可你却也做好了与我们决一死战的准备。

original: {Sensing unpleasant reversal}What is this Brahmin shit? I'm not getting the feeling we're all about to sing kumbaya here.
translation: {Sensing unpleasant reversal}这他娘又唱的哪出。我有种不详的预感，这帮家伙肯定不是来和我们搞联欢的。

original: {Walking away, grumbling}Should have known, Greeks and gifts. That, and next time, shoot the messenger.
translation: {Walkingaway,grumbling}我就知道，黄鼠狼给鸡拜年。下次，见到送信的就直接打死。

original: Hello there! Welcome to the Crimson Caravan Company. How can I help you today?
translation: 你好！欢迎来到深红商队公司。有什么能为你效劳的吗？

original: I hope you're not planning on visiting {spoken with distaste}the Strip.
translation: 希望你不是打算要去{spoken with distaste}长街。

original: {Overtly Suspicious, Confident in Himself}Humph... I see a lot of folks come and go, but none fit your type. Where you come from, stranger?
translation: {Overtly Suspicious， Confident in Himself}嗯……我见过形形色色的人，不过你倒是个异类。你从哪里来，陌生人？

original: You again? Get outta here, smoothface.
translation: 又是你？滚出去，滑皮肤。

original: What... what have I done!? Mother...
translation: 我……我都干了什么！？妈妈……

original: {Companion Reaction - Lily}Holy fuck. Never seen a mutant like that before.
translation: {Companion Reaction - Lily}我的妈呀。从没见过那样的变种人。

original: {Companion Reaction - Rex}Didn't know they still had robo-dogs around.
translation: {Companion Reaction - Rex}原来现在还有机器狗啊，我都不知道。

original: {Companion Reaction - Raul}Wouldn't want to live forever if I had to look like a ghoul.
translation: {Companion Reaction - Raul}要是变成尸鬼那样，我宁愿不要长生不死。

original: {Companion Reaction - Boone}{slight awe, respectful}That guy's got cold eyes. Definitely ex-military.
translation: {Companion Reaction - Boone}{slight awe, respectful}这家伙眼神冰冷，绝对在部队里混过。

original: {Companion Reaction - Veronica}Now there's a fine-looking woman. Just needs to ditch the robe.
translation: {Companion Reaction - Veronica}这女人挺漂亮。要是能脱掉袍子就更好了。

original: {Companion Reaction - Cass}Tough-looking woman. Something tells me she aims for the crotch.
translation: {Companion Reaction - Cass}挺彪悍的女人。我估计她瞄人都是直接瞄裤裆的。

original: {Companion Reaction - Arcade}We bought and sold guys like Four-Eyes over there like property back in the prison.
translation: {Companion Reaction - Arcade}当年关牢里的时候，我们可是把这些四眼田鸡当东西卖的。

original: No way I'm going back to prison.
translation: 我绝对不回监狱。

original: {Companion Reaction - Lily}Holy fuck. Never seen a mutant like that before.
translation: {Companion Reaction - Lily}我的妈呀。从没见过那样的变种人。

original: {Companion Reaction - Boone}{slight awe, respectful}That guy's got cold eyes. Definitely ex-military.
translation: {Companion Reaction - Boone}{slight awe, respectful}这家伙眼神冰冷，绝对在部队里混过。

original: {Companion Reaction - Cass}Tough-looking woman. Something tells me she aims for the crotch.
translation: {Companion Reaction - Veronica}这女人挺漂亮。要是能脱掉袍子就更好了。

original: Never gets old when something blows up.
translation: 炸东西玩永远不会腻。

original: {Companion Reaction - EDE}Wouldn't mind having one of those little flying robots myself.
translation: {Companion Reaction - EDE}我倒是不介意能有一个会飞的小机器人。

original: {Violent}I should kill you myself for what you did to Kimball, and fuck the law!
translation: {Violent}我就该亲手杀掉你这个谋害总统的人，去他妈的法律！

original: {Violent}I bet I'd get a reward for bringing your head to the authorities, assassin!
translation: {Violent}如果把你的脑袋交给政府，我敢打赌一定会拿到一笔赏金，刺客！

original: {Resigned}Kimball's luck ran out.
translation: {Resigned}金博尔的好运到头了。

original: {Proud}It's good to hear that Primm has accepted our law.
translation: {Proud}很高兴普瑞姆接受了我们的法律。

original: {Casual Acknowledgement}What's up?
translation: {Casual Acknowledgement}最近如何 ?

original: {Casual}Hey.
translation: {Casual}嘿。

original: {Unabashed Curiosity}Never seen a guardian dog like that before.
translation: {Unabashed Curiosity}我以前从没见过那样的警卫犬。

original: {Proud}NCR will civilize all this Wasteland, Primm is only the beginning.
translation: {Proud}NCR会将文明传播到废土的每一个角落，普瑞姆只是个开始。

original: {Visibly Worried}Despite our strength, the Legion army looks fierce enough to make me waver.
translation: {Visibly Worried}虽说我们也有实力，但看军团部队的阵势，真让我有些心虚。

original: {Irritated Warning}What the hell are you doing here? Civilians shouldn't be here.
translation: {Irritated Warning}你他妈到这来干什么？好市民不该在这里出现。

original: {Slight Concern for the player}You should go topside.
translation: {Slight Concern for the player}你该回上面去。

original: Hanlon is pretty legendary. People talk about what he did at the first battle of Hoover Dam with awe and respect.
translation: 汉隆真是个传奇，大家说起他在第一次胡佛水坝之战中的表现时，都带着赞叹和尊重。

original: Dawes said he let somebody in. So, you going to give me a reason not to kill you and throw your body back outside?
translation: 道斯说他放了个人进来。你最好能给我个理由，不然我就宰了你，再把尸体扔出去。

original: You're the one Cobb mentioned. Maybe you feel like helping us out around here.
translation: 你就是科布提起过的那个人。也许你会愿意帮助我们脱离险境。

original: {Powder Ganger Good Rep 2+ reached}I've been thinking that since you've been good to us, we can be good to you.
translation: {Powder Ganger Good Rep 2+ reached}我一直在想，既然你对我们好，我们也应该对你好。

original: We've got plenty of spare powder and dynamite around. Say the word and we can give you some of it every couple days.
translation: 我们这附近的火药和炸药管够。只要你说话，我们每隔几天就能送一些给你。

original: {Mixed Rep reached}Hey, I've been sent to tell you that, while you're not exactly a friend, we know you've helped us out some all the same.
translation: {Mixed Rep reached}嗨，有人让我给你带个话，虽然你不能算是朋友，但我们一直记着你帮了我们。

original: We figure some kind of truce is in order. As long as you don't come too close to any of our camps, we'll let you pass without trying to kill you.
translation: 看来咱们应该暂时休战。只要你别太靠近我们的营地，我们可以让你安全通过。

original: Of course, the truce is off once we know you're an enemy.
translation: 当然，如果你表现出敌意，那就别怪我们动手了。

original: Got nothing else to say to you.
translation: 没什么和你说的。

original: Some of the machinery's frozen up. Need someone to take a look at it.
translation: 有机器不能用了。得找个人过去看看是什么情况。

original: Perimeter's been quiet since you left. The Fiends are running scared. I doubt they'll give us any more trouble, not for a long while.
translation: 你离开以后周边都还算太平。恶魔帮都被吓跑了。我猜他们得有一段时间不敢露面了。

original: I haven't got any more bounties for you. It's been quiet and calm since you last reported in. Just how I like it.
translation: 我再没有其他悬赏任务可以给你了。自从你上次向我报告之后，一切都很太平。我就喜欢这样。

original: I heard you killed Driver Nephi. My team would've liked to get a shot at him... but we're still glad he's dead.
translation: 我听说你干掉了球杆尼法。虽然我的手下很想亲自给他来一枪……不过我们还是很高兴他已经死了。

original: {Moving into position}K-killing some Fiends? Shit, yeah! It's about t-t-time!
translation: {Moving into position}你弄、弄死了恶魔帮的杂碎？操，就是这样！也该、该是时候了！

original: {Nephi dead, 10 of Spades didn't get a hit}{disappointed}Shit. I didn't even get a shot at that Nephi b-b-bastard before he went down.
translation: {Nephi dead，10 of Spades didn't get a hit}{disappointed}操、操了。我一下都没打中尼法那个混、混、混蛋。

original: {Nephi dead, 10 of Spades got a hit}Right here, Fiends! This is what payback looks like! First Recon, hooah!
translation: {Nephi dead，10 of Spades got a hit}就是这样，恶魔帮的杂碎们！这才是真正的复仇！第一侦察营，万岁！

original: {Nephi dead, Betsy didn't get a hit}What a pointless trip. Here I thought I'd get a shot at that junkie bastard.
translation: {Nephi dead，Betsy didn't get a hit}真是白跑一趟。我还以为能给那个杂碎来一枪呢。

original: I've been seeing Usanagi, and things are better. I'm not so angry all the time, you know? And, uh, I'm not trying to jump every woman in camp.
translation: 我已经去见过宇佐木了，情况好些了。其实我也不爱老发脾气，你懂吗？此外，呃，我以后再也不会对营地里的女性下手了。

original: Well, not all the time, anyway.
translation: 嗯，当然不是绝对。

original: {Nephi dead, Sterling didn't get a hit}Took some skills to bring down that Fiend. You done good.
translation: {Nephi dead，Sterling didn't get a hit}三两下就把那个恶魔帮的杂碎干掉了。干得漂亮。

original: {Nephi dead, Bitter-Root didn't get a hit}Wish I'd gotten a bullet in that Fiend...
translation: {Nephi dead，Bitter-Root got a hit}真希望是我一枪崩了那个恶魔帮的杂碎……

original: {Gorobets dead}Never lost a {see-OH: commanding officer}CO before. It doesn't feel right.
translation: {Gorobets dead}我以前从来没失去过{see-OH: commanding officer}长官。这真让人不舒服。

original: Did you hear about that Legion POW escape? I don't like our chances of taking him alive twice.
translation: 你听说军团战俘逃跑的事情了吗？我想再次活捉他的希望不大。

original: That POW escape presents some real security concerns. That was our base camp, for crying out loud.
translation: 战俘逃亡暴露出来的是实实在在的安保隐患。搞什么鬼，那可是我们的大本营。

original: Can't believe Hanlon was working against us.
translation: 没想到汉隆居然暗中和我们作对。

original: {LATER, BUNKER, MISSION}I see you reached your destination safely. Shall we get to work?
translation: {LATER，BUNKER，MISSION}我看到你安全抵达了目的地。我们可以开始了吗？

original: {BUNKER, FORT SECS DEST}{devastated}Do you have the slightest idea of what you've done, of what you've destroyed?
translation: {BUNKER，FORT SECS DEST}{devastated}你到底知不知道你干了什么，你摧毁的是什么？

original: You've doomed Vegas to be ruled by corrupt bureaucrats or fanatical savages.
translation: 你的行为将使维加斯沦陷到官僚主义或者狂热野蛮的统治之中。

original: Singlehandedly, you've brought mankind's best hopes of forward progress crashing down. No punishment would be too severe.
translation: 你只手毁掉了人类前进的最佳希望。任何惩罚都无法弥补你犯下的滔天罪行。

original: {PLAYER DIDN'T GET CHIP}{Should be Securitron on the Strip}Benny is dead, and yet you don't appear to be carrying the Platinum Chip.
translation: {PLAYER DIDN'T GET CHIP}{Should be Securitron on the Strip}本尼死了，而你依然没有得到白金筹码。

original: I don't suppose you forgot to search his body?
translation: 我想你该不会是忘记搜他的尸体了吧？

original: {FIRST, HAS CHIP, BENNY DEAD TOPS}You've been a busy courier, haven't you? You take your obligation to deliver a package very seriously - an ethic for which I am grateful.
translation: {FIRST，HAS CHIP，BENNY DEAD TOPS}你可真是个勤奋的邮差啊，不是吗？你以十分负责的态度履行了邮递物品的义务——我很赞赏你的职业素养。

original: I will admit, when you ignored my invitation, I predicted... negative outcomes. But - you have a way of exceeding expectations, don't you?
translation: 我得承认，当你无视我的邀请时，我就已经预料到了…不好的结果。不过——你总能出人意料，不是吗？

original: Well, enough. Let's have the Chip, then.
translation: 好了。还是把筹码交给我吧。

original: {TERMS, NO TOPS}Have you considered the terms of my offer? There's little else for us to discuss until you have.
translation: {TERMS，NO TOPS}你是否考虑了我提出的条件？如果还没有，那我们就没什么好谈的。

original: Your next assignment won't take you far. It concerns the Omertas and their den of vice, Gomorrah.
translation: 下一个任务不需要你跑远路。它跟黑手党及其罪恶巢穴——蛾摩拉有关。

original: As the decisive encounter between the bull and the bear looms close, my concerns about the Omertas have grown.
translation: 随着牛与熊之间的决战日益临近，我对黑手党的担忧也与日俱增。

original: I've never expected loyalty, mind you. A reliably underhanded tribe is just as constant to deal with as one that always runs true.
translation: 实话告诉你，我从没指望过什么忠诚。一个可靠的秘密团体就算时不时闹些小动静，也实属正常。

original: But that's just it - lately the Omertas' cooperative silence has been deafening. Not a single complaint? They're up to something.
translation: 可问题就在这里——黑手党最近太安静了。难道他们一丝抱怨都没有吗？肯定在背地里盘算些什么。

original: As I said before, I need you to investigate the Omertas, to see what they're up to.
translation: 就像我此前说过的，我要你去调查黑手党，看看他们到底在盘算些什么。

original: Your next assignment is to locate and destroy remnants of the Mojave chapter of the Brotherhood of Steel.
translation: 你的下一个任务是找到并消灭钢铁兄弟会莫哈维分会的残余力量。

original: The NCR nearly did the job at HELIOS One a few years ago, but there seem to have been survivors, unfortunately.
translation: 几年前NCR在太阳神一号几乎将他们全歼，但不幸的是，现在看来他们似乎还有幸存者。

original: Given the Brotherhood's fanatical views on technology, they can be counted on to oppose my regime.
translation: 鉴于兄弟会对技术的狂热，他们完全有能力反对我的政权。

original: Please - put them out of my misery.
translation: 请你——让他们从我的眼前消失吧。

original: {REPUTATION OKAY}Your reputation with the NCR isn't exactly stellar, so I'll have to vouch for you. It'll make a scene, but it's worth it.
translation: {REPUTATION OKAY}你跟NCR的交情实在是马马虎虎，所以我得给你好好包装一番。可能会出些洋相，但绝对值得。

original: Kimball is dead - what a mess you've made!
translation: 金博尔死了——看看你干的好事！

original: Razz said the candy he got us was special! I wonder what he- {sudden, psychotic break}Gnaaah, kill, kill, rip and kill! -{right back to normal}meant by that?
