translation: 拉兹说他给我们的糖果很特殊！我很好奇他说的——{sudden，psychotic break}啊呀，杀，杀，冲啊，杀呀！-{right back to normal}到底是什么意思？

original: Y'all sure are a big ol' hero. I gotta write my mama and tell her I met you!
translation: 你就是传说中的大英雄。我要写信告诉妈妈我见到你了！

original: Ever since consuming those "illicit rations" Razz offered us, I have felt a steadily-increasing desire to kill.
translation: 自从吸了拉兹给我们的那些"违禁品"，我感觉自己的杀戮欲望越来越强烈。

original: You've done an excellent job ingratiating yourself to the top brass. I assume this is some sort of strategem?
translation: 你的成绩很出色，上级长官都对你青睐有加。你是不是耍了什么小聪明？

original: {Tripping out on a drug almost like but legally distinct from meth}Ha ha, fuck me, Jack's shit is still the best!
translation: {Tripping out on a drug almost like but legally distinct from meth}哈哈，我操，还是杰克的货最正！

original: Hey, stranger! Where ya been, uh? I missed you!
translation: 嘿，陌生人！你去哪了，嗯？我想你了！

original: This man's prices are steep, but I hear he's worth it.
translation: 这人开出的价格是高了些，但我听说物超所值。

original: Thanks, mister!
translation: 谢谢，先生！

original: Thanks, lady!
translation: 谢谢，女士！

original: Something you need, kid?
translation: 需要什么吗，孩子？

original: Hey man, can you spare a few caps?
translation: 嗨，伙计，能给我几个瓶盖吗？

original: How are you today? Santiago is fabulous!
translation: 你今天好吗？圣地亚哥过得很好！

original: Ah... I wasn't expecting you to return.
translation: 啊……我没想到你会回来。

original: Hello. Lovely to meet you.
translation: 你好。很高兴见到你。

original: I have nothing more to give. Leave me be.
translation: 我没东西能给你了。快走开。

original: You seen Dixon around? He said he'd be back today.
translation: 你见到迪克森没有？他说今天就回来的。

original: The King just sent a messenger over, saying these guys are off-limits. He's probably already heard about what you did here.
translation: 猫王刚捎来口信，不许我们再和这些家伙有任何瓜葛。估计他已经听说你在这里的所作所为了。

original: Looks like you get to be a hero. Enjoy it while it lasts.
translation: 看来你成了一名英雄。尽情享受这点威风吧。

original: Why Rexie, you look all better, boy! Good as new! {talks in dog-owner-schmoopy voice}Did my Rexie get a new brain?
translation: 雷克斯，你看上去精神多了，好孩子！像重生了一样！{talksindog-owner-schmoopyvoice}我的雷克斯换了新脑子没有？

original: Things have been a lot better since you helped with those soldier boys. Thanks again. So, what can I do for you?
translation: 你摆平了那些阿兵哥以后，情况改观了不少。再次感谢你。所以，有什么我能帮忙的？

original: Hold up. What's the password?
translation: 站住。口令。

original: {saddened sigh}I wish I'd never gotten involved with the Omertas. All of this bloodshed...
translation: {saddenedsigh}我真希望自己从没和黑手党帮扯上关系。瞧瞧死了这么多人……

original: {vindictive}One of these days, those bastards will get what's coming to them. {calm realization}In the meantime, I'll be sure to be more careful with my sales.
translation: {vindictive}总有一天那些混蛋会遭报应的。{calmrealization}不过从今往后，我也得更小心地选择生意对象了。

original: {back to business}Anyway, is there anything I can get you?
translation: {backtobusiness}好了，你要买什么？

original: {Matter of fact}That was a real mess the Omertas were looking to create. {grateful, long glaaad}Glad you could get all that sorted.
translation: {Matteroffact}黑手党的人就是来搞破坏的。{grateful,longglaaad}还好你把他们都摆平了。

original: {financially strained, but relieved}May have cost me some business, but at least we avoided a shitstorm.
translation: 虽然我可能会少挣一点，但至少我们逃过了一劫。

original: {back to business}Anything I can get {ya}you?
translation: {backtobusiness}要来点什么{ya}？

original: {Gruff}All of the scumbags are coming out of the woodwork now that the Kings are keeping everyone in line.
translation: {Gruff}自从猫王帮开始维持秩序，各种三教九流的家伙都冒出来了。

original: {resigned sigh}At least gun sales are better than ever. {back to business}Now what can I get you{getcha}?
translation: {resignedsigh}好在枪比以前好卖多了。{backtobusiness}你想来点什么{getcha}？

original: {Amused}People say Mr. House hasn't been heard from in a while. Good riddance.
translation: {Amused}大家都在说有段时间没听到豪斯先生的音讯了。这家伙终于滚蛋了。

original: {Back to business as usual}Now what can I get for {yuh}you?
translation: {Backtobusinessasusual}你想买点什么{yuh}？

original: {happy to see player}Welcome back, buddy!
translation: {happytoseeplayer}欢迎回来，哥们！你想要点什么{getcha}？

original: If you're looking for guns, talk to Mick. Otherwise, I've got a nice selection of general supplies.
translation: 如果你要买枪，去找米克谈。如果不是，我这里还有不少精选的货物与其他服务。

original: {Giddy}Man, Jacob's Absinthe is phenomenal stuff. I don't think I've slept this well in ages...{trails off}
translation: {Giddy}老兄，雅各布的苦艾酒真是不一般。我已经有好几百年没睡过那么香了……{trailsoff}

original: {back to business}If you haven't tried it yet, he's been supplying the Wrangler with the stuff. So, what can I get {ya}you?
translation: {backtobusiness}如果你还没尝过，那在原子牛仔就有卖的。好了，你想买点什么{ya}？

original: {Sarcastic}So, Ambassador Fancypants has graced us with his presence! {sarcastic}I apologize if you're looking for Pre-War pipes and smoking jackets, I'm clean out.
translation: {Sarcastic}瞧瞧，咱们光彩照人的花裤子大使驾到了！{sarcastic}如果你想买战前烟斗或者浴袍，那不好意思，都卖完了。

original: Hey, what can I get you?
translation: 嘿，来点什么？

original: The only rule in Freeside is don't mess with the Kings.
translation: 自由城唯一的规矩就是：不要招惹猫王帮。

original: Watch yourself around here.
translation: 自己小心一点。

original: If you're heading to the Strip, just go through the gate there.
translation: 如果你要去长街，可以从那边的大门进去。

original: Freeside is the Kings' turf. Remember that.
translation: 自由城是猫王帮的地盘。记好了。

original: Great, another one come in from the wastes. Like this place isn't crowded enough.
translation: 真棒，又来了一个废土游民。好像这地方还不够挤似的。

original: {Mixed}I don't care how you get your work done, but you keep your nose clean in Freeside.
translation: {Mixed}我不知道你平时行事风格怎样，但是在自由城，你就得守规矩。

original: {Cheery}People are saying the Securitrons are acting funny. {Cold}I hope that old geezer, House, is dead. Might give the locals a chance to take control.
translation: {Cheery}大家都说电子保安举止滑稽。{Cold}希望是因为豪斯那个怪老头死了。这样一来，本地人终于有机会当家做主了。

original: {Concerned}People are getting nervous about the Legion amassing on the other side of the river. I hope the NCR can hold against another attack.
translation: {Concerned}军团在河对扎营搞得大家人心惶惶。希望NCR可以再次击退军团的进攻。

original: One of my aides said you got into the Lucky 38. If you see someone by the name of Emily near there, we would like you to work for us.
translation: 我听一个助手说你进入了幸运38。如果你在那附近见到一个叫艾米丽的人，希望你能跟她合作。

original: You looking to join the Kings?
translation: 你想加入猫王帮？

original: Word on the street is that the leader of the Legion bought it. Too bad, someone was finally going to do something about all the NCR around here.
translation: 据说军团的首领死了。太糟了，我还指望有人能收拾这里的NCR呢。

original: You hear how Mr. House said "uncle?" Vegas is gonna join the NCR. So much for Freeside.
translation: 你听见豪斯先生是怎么"认输"的没有？维加斯就要加入NCR了。自由城离那一天也不远了。

original: I can't believe someone stopped the NCR president from getting killed. If anyone deserves it, it's that jerk.
translation: 不敢相信居然有人阻止了针对NCR总统的暗杀行动。依我看，那家伙最该死了。

original: Someone took a shot at the NCR president, but the lucky bastard got away. Oh well, it was a good try.
translation: 有人朝着NCR总统来了一枪，但那家伙狗屎运，躲开了。好吧，吓吓他也挺不错。

original: Hey, did you hear the NCR president got whacked? Good for whoever did it, I say. Couldn't have happened to a nicer guy.
translation: 嘿，你听说NCR总统遇袭的事没有？活该，这就是报应。不管是谁干的，我要为他叫声好。

original: There's mutterings from the NCR people around here that some local hero of theirs died. Whatever.
translation: 据附近NCR的人说，他们有个平民英雄死了。管他呢。

original: Turns out some military hero the Squatters admired was actually a slimeball. An NCR soldier who's actually a dick? Who would've thought?
translation: 没想到那帮流民崇拜的英雄居然是个混蛋。谁想得到哟？NCR军队内部竟然还能出败类？

original: Great, just when you think the NCR can't possibly sink their claws deeper, the town of Primm signs up to join the Republic.
translation: 棒极了，本以为NCR的爪子不会再伸长，谁知一转眼普瑞姆就加入了共和国。

original: Word is those tough guy rangers are here. I ain't seen them myself, but how scary can they be?
translation: 据说那些凶悍的游骑兵已经到了。我还没亲眼看见他们，不过他们能恐怖到哪去呢？

original: Hey, isn't that the King's dog?
translation: 嘿，这不是猫王的狗吗？

original: Heya Rex, how you doing boy?
translation: 你好呀，雷克斯，你还好吗？

original: I see you've hired a Follower doctor. Smart move, Freeside being what it is.
translation: 我看见你雇的天启追随者医生了。明智之举，自由城人就该帮自由城人...

original: That friend of yours NCR? He looks like he's NCR.
translation: 你那个朋友是NCR的吗？他看着就像NCR的。

original: Hellooo, cowgirl! You mind if I talk to your lady friend a bit instead of you?
translation: 噫呀，牛仔姑娘！介意我和你的美女朋友聊两句吗？

original: Huh. Nice robot. You with the Followers or something?
translation: 呵。这机器人挺不错呀。你是天启追随者的人？

original: Whoa. That's a whole lotta mutant you got with you there. Still, long as it doesn't cause trouble it's all good.
translation: 哇哦，你身边居然跟了一个这么高大的变种人。算了，只要它别惹麻烦就没问题。

original: Nice to see a human palling around with a ghoul. I see a lot of people around here avoid them.
translation: 人类与尸鬼和睦相处，这场面真温馨。我们这儿的多数人对他们可是避之不及呢。

original: Your girl's kinda cute, but not my type at all. I don't go for smart chicks.
translation: 你马子还挺可爱的，可惜不是我中意的类型。我不喜欢太精明的姑娘。

original: Thank god the Followers are here. I'd probably be dead now if it weren't for their doctors.
translation: 感谢上帝，这儿还有天启追随者。要不是他们的医生，我早就死了。

original: {Self Justification}It's cramped in here, sure, but who really needs a fancy room, anyway?
translation: {Self Justification)这里空间很狭窄，的确如此，不过，谁需要那么花哨的房间呢 ?

original: Hey, come on, pal, I'm trying to put on a show here, you're welcome!
translation: 嘿，拜托，老兄，我在演出啊！

original: Does Ramos know you're walking around without a guard?
translation: 你怎么在这乱晃，也没个警卫跟着，拉莫斯知道吗？

original: Are you adjusting to the bunker, outsider?
translation: 你适应地堡里的生活了吗？外来者？

original: Just between you and me, I'm glad you're here. This place needed a fresh face.
translation: 私下跟你说，我很高兴你能来。这地方需要新面孔。

original: So you're one of us now, eh? Truly it is a rare honor.
translation: 这么说你现在是我们的一员了，嗯？真是少有的荣誉。

original: Ramos is keeping an eye on you, outsider. Remember that.
translation: 拉莫斯在盯着你，外来者。记住了。

original: Hardin is a tough man, but fair. I'd follow him into battle any day.
translation: 哈丁虽然严厉，但处事公正。我任何时候都愿意跟随他冲锋陷阵。

original: There are whispers that McNamara's lost his nerve. I can't believe that, not after what he did at HELIOS One.
translation: 有传闻说麦克纳马拉胆小怕事。我可不信，尤其是见证了他在太阳神一号的壮举之后。

original: How long before we resume normal patrols?
translation: 还有多久我们才能恢复正常巡逻？

original: After the battle at HELIOS One, some people were worried about the NCR coming after us, but this bunker is secure.
translation: 太阳神一号之战后，有人担心NCR会追杀我们，但地堡是绝对安全的。

original: Ramos runs a tight ship. We haven't had an incident in over a year. Your arrival excluded, of course.
translation: 拉莫斯把这里一直都管理得井井有条，一年多来我们没出过任何纰漏。当然，你的到来是个例外。

original: Hardin will be Elder soon, mark my words.
translation: 记住我的话，哈丁过不了多久就会当上长老。

original: Why are we hiding down here? We should be avenging our fallen brothers!
translation: 为什么我们要躲在地底下呢？我们应该为牺牲的兄弟报仇！

original: When are these night missions going to end?
translation: 这些夜间任务什么时候才到头？

original: Ugh, more VR training. Maybe I'll hit the shooting range instead.
translation: 呃，又是VR模拟训练。我宁愿去靶场练习射击。

original: After this, I have some weapons to repair.
translation: 这事完了之后，我还得去修理武器。

original: I heard the Elder's got Taggart working on some kind of secret project.
translation: 听说长老派塔格特执行什么秘密任务去了。

original: You've been outside. Is the NCR really still hunting us?
translation: 你在外面呆过。NCR真的还在追杀我们吗？

original: Hardin owes his life to McNamara. That's why he won't challenge him outright.
translation: 哈丁欠麦克纳马拉一条命，所以他不敢公开挑战他。

original: The Lucky 38's reactor has been restarted... it can be seen from miles away.
translation: 幸运38的反应堆重启了……几英里外都能看到。

original: Doc Schuler is a lifesaver. I was hurt in training the other day and she fixed me right up.
translation: 舒勒医生真是妙手回春。有一次我在训练中受了伤，就是她把我治好的。

original: {astonished, but in a manly way}What the hell? You're that courier Benny wasted back in Goodsprings. You're supposed to be dead.
translation: {astonished, but in a manly way}活见鬼了！你是那个在清泉镇吃了本尼枪子的邮差。你不是应该死了吗？

original: {slight threat}I'm getting real tired of talking.
translation: {slight threat}我现在真的没心情和别人说话。

original: {Speech path}How are the negotiations with the Great Khans going?
translation: {Speech path}你和大汗帮谈得怎么样了？

original: {Speech path - bribe paid}The Great Khans can go, just as we agreed.
translation: {Speech path - bribe paid}大汗帮的人可以走了，就按商量好的条件。

original: {Both hostages rescued}Thanks for getting both of my people out of there.
translation: {Both hostages rescued}感谢你把我的两个人都救了出来。

original: {Sneak path - one hostage rescued}I'm sorry that you couldn't get both hostages out alive, but that's how it goes sometimes. Thanks for your help.
translation: {Sneak path - one hostage rescued}很遗憾你没能把两个人质都救出来，但有时候现实就是这样。谢谢你的帮助。

original: {Sneak path - hostages dead}I'm sorry you couldn't get either hostage out alive, but that's how it goes sometimes. Thanks for your help.
translation: {Sneak path - hostages dead}很遗憾你没能把人质救出来，但有时候现实就是这样。谢谢你的帮助。

original: I really don't have time to chatter right now.
translation: 我现在真的没空和你闲聊。

original: {Player killed President Kimball}{Veteran}{recognizing player}Kimball's assassin. Nicely done.
translation: {Player killed President Kimball}{Veteran}{recognizing player}刺杀金博尔，干得漂亮。

original: You're new here aren't you? Don't tell me we're actually going to get reinforcements.
translation: 你是新来的吧？可别告诉我你就是我们等待的援军。

original: {Player in NCR gear}{suspicious}You're not a part of this post as far as I know. What do you want?
translation: {Player in NCR gear}{suspicious}据我所知，你并不是我们的人。你想要干什么？

original: {Player in NCR gear}No run-ins with the Great Khans, I hope? They've been more restless than usual.
translation: {Player in NCR gear}没和大汗帮发生冲突吧？最近他们比以前更嚣张了。

original: {Player not in NCR gear}This area isn't safe for civilians. You don't want to get caught by the Great Khans.
translation: {Player not in NCR gear}对平民来说，这个地区可不太平。小心别被大汗帮给撞见。

original: You hear some crumb tried to kill the president of the NCR? Gutsy, baby. Real gutsy.
translation: 听说有些小混混想要暗杀NCR的总统？有种，宝贝。太有种了。

original: Don't get too close to Mr. Benny.
translation: 别往本尼先生身边凑。

original: No sudden moves around the boss, got it?
translation: 在老板身旁的时候老实点，懂了？

original: I got my eye on you, so no funny business.
translation: 我会盯着你的，别动歪脑筋。

original: Keep those hands where I can see 'em.
translation: 把手放在我能看见的地方。

original: I thought Benny was a stand up guy - hard to believe he was a fink all along.
translation: 我还以为本尼是个光明磊落的人——想不到他居然一直在密谋造反。

original: You hear some crazy crumb killed the president of the NCR? Gutsy, baby. Real gutsy.
translation: 你听说没，有个疯子杀了NCR的总统！有种啊，宝贝。太有种了。

original: Baby, you couldn't pay me enough to step off the Strip these days. Legion cats are out there thick as fleas on a dog, and they ain't no bums, neither.
translation: 宝贝儿，现在就算你倒贴钱给我，我也不会离开长街。外面的军团多得就跟狗身上的跳蚤一样，而且他们也不是什么等闲之辈。

original: House selling out to the NCR? Who woulda figured him for a fink?
translation: 豪斯把我们卖给NCR了？谁能想到他居然是叛徒？

original: {Player in NCR gear}I don't remember getting informed about any new transfers to this post.
translation: {Player in NCR gear}我不记得有通知说有人要调到这个哨站来。

original: {Player not in NCR gear}This is a military post. You sure you're in the right place?
translation: {Player not in NCR gear}这里是军事驻地，你确定你没走错地方？

original: Is there something you need from me?
translation: 我能帮你什么？

original: You'll get the hang of that takedown. I had trouble learning it at first, too.
translation: 你会掌握击倒的窍门的。我刚开始学的时候也是一样乱七八糟。

original: What's new?
translation: 有什么新鲜事吗？

original: You seen Alice? Ain't like her to be gone this long.
translation: 你见到爱丽丝了吗？出门这么久不是她的风格啊。

original: Find anything?
translation: 有什么发现吗？

original: Did you see all the commotion at REPCONN? I hope that doesn't mean trouble for our town.
translation: 你瞧见瑞普康的那一通乱子了吗？希望不会给我们的镇子带来麻烦。

original: I could've sworn we were under attack. Did you see those rockets?
translation: 我敢肯定我们受到攻击了。你看见那些火箭没？

original: I really hope that incident at REPCONN doesn't drive people away. Novac was starting to do well!
translation: 真心希望瑞普康的事故不会把客人都吓跑。诺瓦克才刚开始有点起色！

original: All the noise at REPCONN scared the hell out of me.
translation: 瑞普康的动静可是把我给吓坏了。

original: Don't listen to a word No-bark says. I don't think he ever sleeps, so it's no wonder he spouts nothing but nonsense.
translation: 疯嘴说的话也能信？我觉得他是太长时间没睡觉了，所以才满嘴疯言疯语的。

original: Good thing none of those rockets crashed into Novac.
translation: 幸好那些火箭没有一头栽进诺瓦克。

original: Those rockets over at REPCONN were the NCR's doing. Trying to keep us scared so they can stick around to "protect" us.
translation: 那些从瑞普康头上飞过去的火箭准是NCR干的好事。他们就是想吓唬我们，好继续赖在这儿"保护"我们。

original: {Kimball dead}Somebody whacked the NCR president. Got what was coming to him.
translation: {Kimball dead}有人除掉了NCR的总统。他终于遭报应了。

original: {Late Game}Best to lay low. The NCR and the Legion are about to have it out.
translation: {Late Game}最好低调点。NCR和军团的大战一触即发。

original: {Hated}Fuck you.
translation: {Hated}去你妈的。

original: You're back. What's the word from Papa Khan?
translation: 你回来了，从父汗那里带回了什么消息 ?

original: {Kimball dead}Somebody whacked the NCR president. Got what was coming to him.
translation: {Kimball dead}有人除掉了NCR的总统。他终于遭报应了。

original: {Caesar dead}Someone took out the Legion's boss. Doubt it'll stop them for long, though.
translation: {Caesar dead}有人干掉了军团的老大。但我认为这并不会延缓他们扩张的脚步。

original: {Middle Game}Lot more troops on the road these days. Wonder what's up.
translation: {Middle Game}最近往来的部队增加了不少，不知发生了什么事情。

original: {Late Game}Best to lay low. The NCR and the Legion are about to have it out.
translation: {Late Game}最好低调点。NCR和军团的大战一触即发。

original: I've still got guns and ammo, if you need them.
translation: 如果你需要的话，我这儿还有枪支和弹药。

original: Can you spare some caps, mister?
translation: 能给几个瓶盖吗，先生？

original: Can you spare some caps, ma'am?
translation: 能给几个瓶盖吗，女士？

original: I lost everything I had at The Tops, but if you gave me 500 caps, I'd head straight back. Sick, huh?
translation: 我在九重天输得精光，但如果你给我500瓶盖，我还是会直接回去。中毒不浅，对吧？

original: Go East! they say. Scrap lying in the sun for you to grab. Yeah, right.
translation: 去东部！他们说的，满地废品等你捡。好吧，也没错。

original: I don't work for freelancers. So move along.
translation: 我可不为自由职业者工作。请你走开。

original: Stay out of my way and I'll stay out of yours, got it?
translation: 你别挡我的道，我也不挡你的道，明白了？

original: It's quiet out here. We like to keep it that way.
translation: 这里很平静，我们就喜欢这样。

original: Back for more?
translation: 又来买东西了？

original: Cooke left the vault, good thing too, he was going to get us all killed.
translation: 库克离开了避难所，这真是个好消息，我们不会被他全害死了。

original: Cooke is going to get us all killed.
translation: 库克会把我们全害死。

original: Lem wants to run back to the NCR and turn himself in, spineless bastard.
translation: 莱姆打算找NCR自首，软骨头的废物。

original: Oliver's head is as good as mine!
translation: 奥利弗可不比我笨！

original: Is it true the fighting outside has stopped already?
translation: 外面的战斗真的已经结束了吗？

original: Upstairs, or down? If I were a coward, where would I hide?
translation: 楼上，还是楼下？如果我是胆小鬼的话，我会躲在哪呢？

original: Make good use of cover. The time to strike is when they reload.
translation: 好好利用掩体。他们换弹夹的时候就是最好的进攻时机。

original: Their guns aren't quite as effective in these close quarters.
translation: 他们的武器在近距离作战时发挥不出最佳效果。

original: Soon this place will belong to the Legion.
translation: 这地方很快就会属于军团。

original: I've added eight notches to my belt already. How many for you?
translation: 我已经干掉八个了。你干掉了几个？

original: I hope the Legion doesn't get in here.
translation: 希望军团别攻到这里来。

original: Sorry, but I'm busy with patients right now.
translation: 对不起，我现在得料理伤员。

original: Julie Farkas wasn't kidding when she said we would be needed here.
translation: 朱莉·法卡斯从不拿“这里需要我们”开玩笑。

original: All this bloodshed. Such a waste of human life.
translation: 流了这么多血。真是草菅人命。

original: Please don't hurt me!
translation: 请不要伤害我！

original: I'm just a medic! Please don't hurt me!
translation: 我只是个医疗兵！请别伤害我！

original: I bet dirty business is going on at Gomorrah.
translation: 我敢打赌蛾摩拉现在正进行着什么肮脏的交易。

original: I bet dirty business is going on at Gomorrah.
translation: 我敢打赌蛾摩拉现在正进行着什么肮脏的交易。

original: Wish I could've seen what's inside the 38.
translation: 真希望我能见识见识幸运38里面里面是什么样。

original: If you're looking to join up, head on by the Embassy.
translation: 如果你想加入我们，请去大使馆。

original: Look,{"friend" is said in a sarcastic, but serious, tone} "friend," don't get near me - you're too well respected for my business.
translation: 你看，{"friend" is said in a sarcastic, but serious, tone} "朋友，"你可以离我远一点——你这样好名声的人，和我的生意可不太搭。

original: {concerned}They've got our guys down there.
translation: 我们的人还被他们扣在下面。

original: Wish we could do something for the troopers down there.
translation: 真希望我们能为下面的士兵做点什么。

original: Thanks for the help with the hostages!
translation: 谢谢你救了人质！

original: {Impressed}I can't believe you broke into the mine and saved those miners.
translation: {Impressed}真不敢相信你居然杀进了矿洞，还救出了矿工。

original: The hostages are safe. We owe you.
translation: 人质安全了。我们都欠你的情。

original: {Companion Reaction - Boone}{impressed}First Recon is a top-notch unit. They're always buying sniper rifles from us.
translation: {Companion Reaction - Boone}{impressed}第一侦察营是顶级精锐。他们只买我们这里生产的狙击枪。

original: {Companion Reaction - ED-E}That Eyebot looks like it's gone through hell.
translation: {Companion Reaction - ED-E}那个眼球机器人看起来已经饱经沧桑了。

original: {Companion Reaction - Lily}I had no idea there was such a thing as a friendly Nightkin. Look at that thing.
translation: {Companion Reaction - Lily}这世上居然还有友好的夜行族。你看看那家伙。

original: {Companion Reaction - Rex}I've never seen a dog like that. Who thinks up these things?
translation: {Companion Reaction - Rex}我从没见过这样的狗。都是谁想出来要造这种玩意的？

original: Mr. House finally wised up and said he'd join the NCR in a year or something like that. Good news all around.
translation: 豪斯先生最终还是开窍了，据说他准备在一年后加入NCR。到处都是好消息。

original: {Random}Have you seen what one of those anti-materiel rifles can do to a Deathclaw?
translation: {Random}你见过那些反器材步枪能把死亡爪打成什么样吗？

original: {Default}Demand for Gun Runner weapons is high, so don't expect them to stay in stock for very long.
translation: {Default}军火贩子的武器供不应求，错过了可就没有了。

original: You look like someone in need of a reliable supplier.
translation: 你看起来需要一个可靠的物资供应商。

original: So you're back.
translation: 你回来了。

original: What did Contreras say?
translation: 孔特雷拉斯怎么说的？

original: Be careful out there. We already lost Jackson doing what you're trying to do.
translation: 千万要小心。杰克逊就是因为这个死的。

original: {Terse, sigh}You again? What do you need?
translation: {Terse，sigh}又是你？要点什么？

original: {Good-humored}Howdy, looking for chow?
translation: {Good-humored}你好，想吃点什么吗？

original: Welcome to the Crimson Caravan Company, New Vegas branch. What may I do for you?
translation: 欢迎来到深红商队公司新维加斯分部。我能为你做些什么？

original: Have you heard the news? Caesar's agents assassinated President Kimball - it'll be war for sure, now.
translation: 你听说了吗？凯撒的刺客刺杀了金博尔总统——这下肯定要爆发战争了。

original: Have you found out what happened to those missing refugees?
translation: 发现失踪难民的线索了吗？

original: Good to see you - something else I can do for you?
translation: 很高兴见到你——还有什么事要我帮忙的吗？

original: Back again? What can I do for you?
translation: 又回来了？我能为你做些什么？

original: You're back. Have you changed your mind about helping out?
translation: 你回来了。改变主意想要帮忙了吗？

original: They never told us how expensive it was to get onto the Strip!
translation: 他们从来没说过去一趟长街要花这么多钱！

original: I never should have left California.
translation: 我就不该离开加利福尼亚。

original: That son of a bitch Keith cheated me! I know he did!
translation: 基斯那个狗娘养的骗了我！我就知道是他！

original: You lose all your money too?
translation: 你也把钱全弄丢了？

original: You must be new around here. Something I can do for you?
translation: 你肯定是新来的吧。需要点什么？

original: You're new, aren't you? What can I do for you?
translation: 你是新来的，对吧？想要点什么？

original: I've heard of you. Just remember whose side you're on out there.
translation: 我听说过你。你最好记好自己是哪边的。

original: Hi! Nice to see you again!
translation: 嗨！很高兴再次见到你！

original: {singsong}Sooooo... we can blow up the dam's generators, {draw out}or I could route the dam's entire power output to the Fort.
translation: {singsong}那么……我们可以炸掉水坝的发电机，{drawout}或者我也可以把水坝的电力全部改送去城堡。

original: That'll activate a certain army of Securitrons and set them loose to ravage the Legion! What do you say?
translation: 这样就能启动一支电子保安大军，用它们一举摧毁军团！你怎么说？

original: {greeting player in control room at Hoover Dam}This is neat! From this console I could've routed the dam's power input over to the Fort and activated that dormant army of Securitrons!
translation: 真是太漂亮了！我可以通过这个控制台把水坝的电力转移到城堡，并且激活休眠状态下的电子保安大军！

original: So go ahead and blow up the dam's generators! And when that's done, head back upside and finish off the Legion and the NCR.
translation: 去把水坝的发电机炸上天吧！然后我们再回上面去解决军团和NCR。

original: Don't you just love that Platinum Chip? Buzzes with power and possibilities, doesn't it?
translation: 那白金筹码难道不让你着迷吗？它蕴含着无限的力量和可能，不是吗？

original: If I were you, I'd almost want to deliver the Chip to Mr. House just to learn all its tricks!
translation: 如果换做我，肯定会立马把筹码给豪斯送去，好一谈其中的奥秘！

original: That is, unless you want to bring the NCR or Caesar's Legion to power! I wouldn't want to tell you what to do!
translation: 但如果你是想把力量留给NCR或者凯撒军团的话，那就另当别论了！我是不会干涉你的决定的！

original: Wow, you really blew up all those Securitrons at the Fort! {beat}{trying to convince yourself}Great! No problem!
translation: 哇哦，你真的把城堡里的电子保安全都炸上天了！{beat}{tryingtoconvinceyourself}厉害！没问题！

original: The Securitrons at the Fort are on standby... I see a status log here confirming that the Mark II OS upgrade installed correctly...
translation: 城堡的电子保安已经就位……我看到日志文件上说II型操作系统的升级程序已经安装完毕……

original: They'll be all set to go once we boost my transmitting power and bring them online with the network! But we'll worry about that later!
translation: 只要我们把电力输送过来，并联上网，它们就可以启动了！不过这个问题我们过后再考虑吧！

original: We showed them a thing or two.
translation: 我们好好教训了他们一顿。

original: A little payback feels real good.
translation: 报仇的感觉真好。

original: These bastards got what they deserved.
translation: 这些混蛋活该。

original: This has been a long time coming. The rest of the Legion better watch out.
translation: 这一刻终于来了。军团剩下的人最好都小心点。

original: It's hard to stay awake on watch with only a few hours of sleep. I wish we actually had some time to rest around here.
translation: 只有几小时睡眠时间，还要保持清醒放哨，太难受了。我真的希望我们有时间休息。

original: Private Sexton was thinking of having a contest to see who can kill the most Legion. I wonder if he ever got that going.
translation: 列兵塞克斯顿想举办一场军团猎杀比赛。也不知道他办起来没有。

original: I heard you won Private Sexton's Legion killing contest. Nice job, that'll teach those Legion bastards!
translation: 听说你赢下了列兵塞克斯顿举办的军团猎杀比赛。干得好，你给那些军团杂种好好上了一课！

original: Holy shit! Did you hear that Caesar is dead? Maybe we actually have a fighting chance now.
translation: 我的天！你听说凯撒已经死了吗？也许我们现在有翻身的机会了。

original: I hear we got reinforced by the troops that were in Boulder City. It's good to have some extra support around here.
translation: 听说巨石城的增援已经到了。能有帮手真好。

original: I hear more troops are gathering at Hoover Dam. Things are probably going to get pretty messy over there real soon.
translation: 听说还有更多部队再往胡佛水坝集结。看来很快就会爆发一场血战的。

original: The Legion is torturing captive troopers in Nelson. I'd rather die fighting than be captured.
translation: 军团正在折磨纳尔逊被俘的士兵。我宁愿战死也不想被俘。

original: Quartermaster Mayes was yelling at us about rationing again. Where does the guy get the energy to yell so much while on rations?
translation: 军需官迈厄斯又在冲着我们吼什么定量配给。你说都定量配给了，那家伙哪来那么大力气吼人？

original: I got bit by one of those dirty dogs the Legion has. I wonder if they've got rabies... maybe I should see Dr. Richards.
translation: 我被军团的那些脏狗给咬了。不会得狂犬病吧……我得找理查兹医生给看看。

original: Major Polatli is putting everyone on double shifts to make up for recent losses to the Legion. That guy never gives up.
translation: 波拉特里少校给所有人都排了双班岗，以弥补最近我们在与军团作战中损失的人力。那家伙真是不饶人啊。

original: I can't wait for General Oliver to get out here. He could turn this place around.
translation: 我真希望奥利弗将军能早点来。他肯定能扭转乾坤。

original: I don't know how we're going to hold off the Legion here and at Hoover Dam, we just don't have the manpower.
translation: 真不知道该怎么在这里和胡佛水坝挡住军团，我们人手真的不够。

original: I heard Private Stone was caught stealing medical supplies. I always hated that guy.
translation: 听说列兵斯通在偷医疗用品时被抓了个正着。我一直都很讨厌那家伙。

original: I heard Private Stone turned himself in for stealing medical supplies. We're all stressed out here, but stealing medical supplies is low.
translation: 听说列兵斯通自首了，就是他偷了医疗用品。我知道大家都有压力，但偷医疗用品就真的太缺德了。

original: {Self-satisfied}Well, well, it looks like we've cleared them out, damn inbred mutant freaks. Think I'll start heading back to California now.
translation: {Self-satisfied}哎呀，哎呀，看来我们把这些恶心的变种怪物都杀光了。我要启程返回加州了。

original: There have been way too many catastrophic NCR foul-ups around here for me to risk my life by sticking around.
translation: NCR在这地方惹出来的乱子实在太多了，我再继续待下去怕是有生命危险。

original: We've got nothing left to talk about.
translation: 我们没什么好谈的。

original: Like I said, once the Chairmen are running Vegas, you'll get a percentage. Until then I'll pay you a retainer and bonuses for "special missions."
translation: 我说了，等董事会控制了维加斯，你就会拿到分红。在那之前，我会先预付给你一笔定金，以及执行"特殊任务"的奖金。

original: {BEFORE BUNKER, BENNY'S FATE}{player has mentioned possibly freeing you}Last we spoke, you were leaning in a more {emphasis}merciful direction...?
translation: {BEFORE BUNKER， BENNY'S FATE}{player has mentioned possibly freeing you}记得上次我们谈的时候，你好像更{emphasis}倾向于仁慈的方法……？

original: There's too much light. Why is there always too much light?
translation: 太亮了。为什么那里总是那么亮？

original: I think those Nightkin are going to cause a lot of trouble, but I guess giving them the specs was better than killing them.
translation: 虽然我也认为那些夜行族是烫手的山芋，不过把实验型设备给他们总比杀了他们强。

original: I did get a lot of useful data from the experiment, and I'm much closer to a cure than I was before.
translation: 通过实验我获得了大量的有效数据，我感觉自己就快要成功了。

original: It's occurred to me that this brief test might not yield a cure any time soon. However, if Lily were to continue to wear the prototype...
translation: 我早就知道这样的简单实验难以在短时间内帮助我们找出有效的治疗手段。但如果莉莉能继续穿着原型机的话…

original: I really appreciate those books. They've already been a huge help.
translation: 我真的很喜欢那些书。它们令我受益匪浅。

original: {Annoyed}You're the one {Luh-CUL-us}Lucullus said would come? {Blunt}You'll find him waiting for you, down at the docks.
translation: {Annoyed}你就是{Luh-CUL-us}卢库勒斯说的那个人？{Blunt}你去下面码头就能找到他，他在等你。

original: {Angered}What are you doing standing around, whelp? {KAI-zar)Caesar awaits!
translation: {Angered}你还在这瞎转悠什么，小崽子？{KAI-zar)凯撒正等着你呢！

original: You're the one {Luh-CUL-us}Lucullus said would come. You'll find him waiting for you, down at the docks.
translation: 你就是{Luh-CUL-us}卢库勒斯说的那个人吧。你去下面码头就能找到他，他在等你。

original: {KAI-zar}Caesar does not like to be kept waiting. I would find Cursor {Luh-CUL-us}Lucullus quickly and travel to The Fort, if I were you.
translation: {KAI-zar}凯撒不喜欢等人。如果我是你，我会马上去找{Luh-CUL-us}库瑟·卢库勒斯，让他带我前往城堡。

original: He should still be waiting at the docks.
translation: 他应该还在码头等着。

original: {LATIN}{AH-way}Ave. Have you come to sell or trade for captures?
translation: {LATIN}{AH-way}致敬。你是来买卖俘虏的吗？

original: {player healed Snuffles}Snuffles' leg seems to have gotten better.
translation: {玩家 healed 鼻涕虫}鼻涕虫的腿看起来好多了。

original: Poor Snuffles. Wish somebody could do something about his leg.
translation: 可怜的鼻涕虫。但愿有人能帮他治好腿。

original: Howdy. Something I could help you with?
translation: 你好。有什么我能帮忙的？

original: You showed up just in time to say goodbye. Me and a couple of the others are packing it in and heading back to California.
translation: 你来得正巧，刚好跟你道个别。我和其他几个人正准备收拾铺盖卷回加利福尼亚了。

original: The water ration's still a problem, and the NCR doesn't look like it's going to do anything about it anytime soon.
translation: 用水额度问题依然没解决，NCR看来短期内也不打算采取什么措施了。

original: Something else you need before I go?
translation: 我走之前你还有什么想说的？

original: Can't grow crops if they don't give us the water.
translation: 他们不给我们水，没法种庄稼。

original: I'm glad to see a fellow trooper. My squad is in trouble.
translation: 真高兴能在这儿遇到战友。我的小队有麻烦了。

original: {surprised}Well, isn't this a surprise. I was just finishing up here. To think that we might have missed each other!
translation: {surprised}喔，真是惊喜。我这刚完事。要不是你来得巧，我们差点就见不着了！

original: It's fitting you got to see how I punished this town, for such is your fate. You will die for your crimes against the Legion!
translation: 你真该看看我是怎么惩罚这个镇子的，因为你的下场也将如此。为你对抗军团的罪行偿命吧！

original: I was just finishing up making an example of this town, teaching a lesson, if you will.
translation: 我刚把这座镇子树立成了反抗军团下场的典型。如果你愿意的话，就用这个去为军团布道吧。

original: When you move on, teach everyone you meet the lessons Caesar's Legion taught here. Especially any NCR troops you run across.
translation: 你离开以后，去西边的莫哈维沙漠前哨站，告诉那些荒淫之人你在这里都看到了什么。

original: {surprised}Hah! And we were just finishing up here. To think that we might have missed you!
translation: {surprised}哈！我们这刚完事。要不是你来得巧，我们差点就见不着了！

original: If anyone belongs on a cross, it's you! For your crimes against the Legion, you will die!
translation: 如果有谁最该被钉上十字架，那就是你！你对军团犯下了不可饶恕的罪行，受死吧！

original: Player assaulted The Tops Casino.
translation: 玩家攻击了九重天赌场。

original: Player killed Benny at The Tops.
translation: 玩家在九重天杀死了本尼。

original: Player caused Benny to flee the Strip.
translation: 玩家吓得本尼逃往长街。

original: Player survived Benny's ambush.
translation: 玩家中了本尼的埋伏，但是活了下来。

original: Player foiled RACKET.
translation: 玩家识破了骗局。

original: Player enters Lucky 38.
translation: 玩家进入了幸运38。

original: Securitrons on the Strip upgraded.
translation: 长街的电子保安升级了。

original: Mr. House unplugged.
translation: 豪斯先生的导管被拔了。

original: Mr. House killed.
translation: 豪斯先生被杀死了。

original: Player has Mark of Caesar.
translation: 玩家拥有凯撒的徽记。

original: Caesar cured.
translation: 凯撒痊愈了。

original: Player known to have killed Caesar.
translation: 人们知道玩家杀了凯撒。

original: Caesar dies during operation.
translation: 凯撒死在手术台上了。

original: Caesar killed by lieutenants.
translation: 凯撒被上尉杀死了。

original: Player upgraded Securitron Army.
translation: 玩家升级了电子保安军队。

original: Player destroyed Securitron Army.
translation: 玩家摧毁了电子保安军队。

original: Monorail at McCarran destroyed, no NCR troops on Strip for 3 days
translation: 麦卡伦的列车被毁，长街3天都不会有NCR士兵

original: Monorail at McCarran destroyed, NCR troops start visiting again
translation: 麦卡伦的列车被毁，NCR士兵再次开始出现

original: Player frees Silas from McCarran
translation: 玩家从麦卡伦释放了西拉斯

original: Player saves President Kimball
translation: 玩家救下了金博尔总统

original: Player fails to kill President Kimball
translation: 玩家没能杀死金博尔总统

original: Player kills President Kimball
translation: 玩家杀了金博尔总统

original: President Kimball assassinated (player not a suspect)
translation: 金博尔总统被刺（玩家不是嫌疑犯）

original: Chief Hanlon dead, treason unexposed
translation: 军士长汉隆死了，叛国罪行未败露

original: Chief Hanlon dead, treason exposed
translation: 军士长汉隆死了，叛国罪行败露

original: Motor-Runner killed
translation: 轰鸣恶煞被杀

original: Fiend bosses killed
translation: 恶魔帮大佬被杀

original: Legion attacks Bitter Springs camp
translation: 军团进攻了苦泉营地

original: Great Khans join Caesar
translation: 大汗帮加入了军团

original: Great Khans sign treaty with NCR
translation: 大汗帮和NCR签订了协议

original: Great Khans leave the Mojave
translation: 大汗帮离开了莫哈维

original: Great Khans wiped out
translation: 大汗帮被消灭了

original: Kings wiped out (probably by NCR)
translation: 猫王帮被消灭了 (可能是NCR所为)

original: Kings resolve differences with NCR
translation: 猫王帮与NCR消除了分歧

original: Brotherhood of Steel destroyed
translation: 钢铁兄弟会被毁

original: Player wipes out Legion at Nelson
translation: 玩家在纳尔逊消灭了军团

original: Player wipes out NCR at Forlorn Hope
translation: 玩家在飘零希望消灭了NCR

original: Player wipes out both locations
translation: 玩家消灭了双方势力

original: 1st Recon transferred to Forlorn Hope
translation: 第一侦察营转移到了飘零希望

original: Ranger Station Charlie
translation: 游骑兵查理驻站

original: Boulder City Khans killed by NCR
translation: 巨石城的大汗帮被NCR杀了

original: Player killed Boulder City Khans
translation: 玩家杀了巨石城的大汗帮

original: The Khans escaped alive
translation: 大汗帮活着逃跑了

original: Primm led by new Sheriff
translation: 普瑞姆被新的治安官领导

original: Primm accepts NCR rule
translation: 普瑞姆接受了NCR的统治

original: Legion's dogs killed
translation: 军团的狗被杀

original: Rumors of Black Armor Rangers coming
translation: 黑甲游骑兵到来的谣言

original: Black Armor Rangers arrive
translation: 黑甲游骑兵抵达

original: Legion Veterans arrive
translation: 军团老兵抵达

original: Player has made a splash on the Strip
translation: 玩家在长街引起了轰动

original: Middle Game has begun
translation: 游戏到达了中期

original: Late game has begun
translation: 游戏到达了后期

original: Battle for Hoover dam available
translation: 胡佛水坝之战可用

original: Player won Battle for Hoover Dam
translation: 玩家赢得了胡佛水坝之战

original: Player won Battle for Hoover Dam, for the NCR
translation: 玩家帮助NCR赢得了胡佛水坝之战

original: Player won Battle for Hoover Dam, for Caesar's Legion
translation: 玩家帮助凯撒军团赢得了胡佛水坝之战

original: Player won Battle for Hoover Dam, for Mr. House
translation: 玩家帮助豪斯先生赢得了胡佛水坝之战

original: Player won Battle for Hoover Dam, for Independent Vegas with Securitrons
translation: 玩家赢得了胡佛水坝之战，利用电子保安让维加斯独立了

original: Stupid Bighorners were making noise all night again.
translation: 傻逼大角羊又在一整夜制造噪音了。

original: I like it up here. Nice and cool.
translation: 我喜欢这地方。凉爽怡人。

original: Better watch out. Lily's been babbling about her grandkids again.
translation: 咱们最好小心点。莉莉又开始念叨她的孙子孙女了。

original: Some days, I miss being in the Master's army.
translation: 有时候我真的很怀念在主教军队里的日子。

original: The Legate is expecting you.
translation: 特使正在等你。

original: It is important that you go see the Legate.
translation: 你必须尽快去见特使。

original: The Legate would have my head if I were to let you pass.
translation: 如果我放你过去的话，特使会要了我的命。

original: I haven't fed them in days. The Legate wants them hungry for the battle to come.
translation: 我已经好几天没有给它们喂吃的了。为了即将到来的战斗，特使希望它们饿着。

original: Where did the rest of my kin go? All alone now...
translation: 我其他的同类都去哪里了？现在就剩我一个了……

original: {About to attack player}I admire your bravery, but coming down here after what you've done is just foolish. So be it, Legion dog!
translation: {About to attack player}我敬佩你的勇气，但你干了坏事之后还敢来这里，简直是愚蠢。来吧，军团狗！

original: {Serious, Seething Anger}We're watching you{two seconds pause}... {Slightly drawn out "sss." Morrowind!}stranger!
translation: {Serious, Seething Anger}我们会盯着你的{two seconds pause}……{Slightly drawn out "sss." Morrowind!}陌生人！

original: {Serious, Seething Anger}Don't fuck with the caged beasts.
translation: {Serious,  Seething Anger}别去挑逗笼子里的那些野兽。

original: {Cautionary Warning, Calm}Follow the rules of The Thorn.
translation: {Cautionary Warning, Calm}遵守荆棘街的规矩。

original: {Cautionary Warning, Calm}Don't feed the creatures.
translation: {Cautionary Warning, Calm}别喂那些动物。

original: {Proud}Nowhere else will you find something like The Thorn.
translation: {Proud}你在别处是绝对找不到荆棘街这样的地方的。

original: {Proud. As if the last sentence is a conclusion of obeying the first two}Take advice. Don't break the rules. And we won't kill you.
translation: {Proud. As if the last sentence is a conclusion of obeying the first two}记住：别破坏规矩。否则我们就要你的命。

original: {Amiable, Joking Tone}Come to see the fights, or Red Lucy?
translation: {Amiable, Joking Tone}是来观战的，还是来找血手露西的？

original: {Amiable, Joking Tone}Enjoy the show, and don't give us a reason to shoot you, okay?{Chuckles}
translation: {Amiable, Joking Tone}好好欣赏表演，别给我们开枪的理由，好吗？{Chuckles}

original: {No more water from NCR}Crops aren't getting as much water lately.
translation: {No more water from NCR}最近都没有足够的水来灌溉庄稼了。

original: {Saint James and Dermot dead}We're better off with those slaver bastards Saint James and Dermot.
translation: {圣詹姆斯 and 德莫特 dead}没有圣詹姆斯和德莫特那两个杂种奴隶贩子，我们的日子好过多了。

original: That Sweetie sure is something.
translation: 那个小甜甜本事不错。

original: {Anderson dead or gone}I'm gonna miss having Anderson around.
translation: 我会想念有安德森在的日子的。

original: Oh, hi. Thanks again for helping us with that data. {a bit disappointed}I mean the feed only lasted about thirty seconds and it's not that useful, but... {sighing}well, we tried.
translation: 哦，嗨。数据的事多谢你帮忙了。{abitdisappointed}虽说传输只持续了30秒，没什么太大的用处……{sighing}但至少我们尽力了。

original: Thanks again for helping with Mr. House's data network. Come see me at the Old Mormon Fort if you get a chance.
translation: 豪斯先生数据网的事，再次感谢你。有空就来旧摩门教要塞找我吧。

original: Have you found out anything to help me?
translation: 你想到帮我的办法了吗？

original: Man, thanks for finding out that shit. Fuck Big Sal.
translation: 老兄，谢谢你找到那个人渣，该死的大萨尔。

original: Good to see you again. I hope you're winning some money in here.
translation: 很高兴又见面了，希望你能赢钱。

original: I'm happy to see you again. Carlitos and I have been living here since our escape. We'll never forget what you've done for us.
translation: 很高兴再次见到你。自从逃跑之后，卡利托斯和我就一直住在这里。我们永远不会忘记你为我们所做的一切。

original: Sorry, but I don't have time to talk right now. I'm going back to the ranch.
translation: 抱歉，我现在没时间聊天。我得回牧场去了。

original: You've made it! Thanks so much for your help. I owe you more than- Wait! What's that?
translation: 你成功了！非常感谢你的帮助。我欠你——等等！怎么回事？

original: Just talk to Big Beard next to me, pal. Whoever's got the biggest whiskers, does the talking...
translation: 有话就去和我边上的大胡子说吧，伙计。这地方，只有胡子最密的人才有发言权……

original: I don't know how we pulled this off. For a minute there, I thought we were not going to make it.
translation: 我都不知道我们是怎么逃出来的，有那么一分钟我真的以为我们都完了。

original: Without you, we'd have been in the losing end. Thank you so much for your help, friend.
translation: 没有你的话，我们早就死无葬身之地了。非常感谢你的帮助，朋友。

original: Hey, friend! It's good to see you again.
translation: 嘿，朋友！能再次看到你真是太好了。

original: This place doesn't have the glitter of the Strip, but I've got Joana - that's all I'll ever need.
translation: 这地方没有长街那样光彩夺目，但是我有琼娜——这就足够了。

original: Confound it, Cheyenne, why'd you have to go running in like that? You were supposed to stay.
translation: 该死，夏安，你为什么要冲进去？你应该呆在我身边的。

original: I'm sorry, you shouldn't have to see me like this. I'm not gonna be very good company right now.
translation: 抱歉，不该让你看到我这个样子。我现在情绪不太稳定。

original: I did have another thing to teach, but I'll understand if you'd rather I just pay you so you can be on your way.
translation: 虽然我还可以教你些别的东西，但如果你现在就想拿了钱立刻上路的话，我也完全理解。

original: Ah, hell's bells. There's not a day passes by I don't tell people not to come here by themselves.
translation: 啊，见鬼！我每天都在警告人们不要孤身来这里。

original: Some people, your word just isn't good enough for them. Then this happens.
translation: 有些人就是不把别人的忠告当回事，结果就落得这个下场。

original: Well, it's a part of life out here. Best to accept it.
translation: 唉，这种事在外头也算常有了，你最好习惯它。

original: But you did what you promised, staying out here with me. Here's my end of the deal.
translation: 不过你确实遵守承诺，陪我跑了这么一趟。这是说好的酬劳。

original: Everything all right?
translation: 一切都还好吗？

original: Excuse me, but I'm busy.
translation: 抱歉，我在忙。

original: Well, well! If it isn't the Vault explorer himself! Welcome back.
translation: 哎呀！这不是我们的避难所探险家么！欢迎回来。

original: Well, well! If it isn't the Vault explorer herself! Welcome back.
translation: 哎呀！这不是我们的避难所探险家么！欢迎回来。

original: What are you doing here!? I don't want to be near you ever again! Leave, leave... just leave, okay!?
translation: 你在这干什么？！我不想再见到你！走开，走开……快走开，行不行？！

original: Behave, and don't give me a reason to kick you out.
translation: 守规矩，别让我把你轰出去。

original: I bet you'd make an awesome Boomer.
translation: 我打赌你会成为一个了不起的大炮族成员。

original: Yes? Something else you needed?
translation: 嗯？你还有什么事？

original: I received a pleasant call from Dr. Keely. It seems we have you to thank for keeping her alive. Very charitable of you.
translation: 我刚接到了一通来自基利博士热情洋溢的电话。看来我们得谢谢你让她活了下来。你可真是善良哟。

original: Ah! I was just wondering what had become of you.
translation: 啊！我还在想你怎样了呢。

original: What are you doing in my office? You're not welcome here, get out!
translation: 你在我的办公室里干什么？这里不欢迎你，出去！

original: Little busy at the moment. But I can talk.
translation: 我现在有些忙，不过还是能聊两句。

original: If you can find Keely and keep her safe, I'll pay you what I can. I gave my word, and I meant it.
translation: 如果你能找到基利并且保证她的安全，我会尽我所能报答你。说话算话。

original: Keely just called in. You should have heard the Director. "But I-" "Wait a-" "Now look here-"
translation: 基利刚刚打电话来了。你真该听听总管是怎么说的："但是我——""等等——""听我说——"

original: She wouldn't let him finish a sentence. Just reamed him out for sending all those people to the Vault. I've never seen his face so red and twitchy.
translation: 她连一句完整的话都没让他说完，反倒是他骂得狗血淋头，因为他派了那么多人去避难所。我从没见过他脸红成那样，整张脸都扭曲了。

original: Thanks for keeping her safe. Here's the caps I promised. I knew I had a good feeling about you.
translation: 谢谢你救了她。这是我答应给你的瓶盖。我就知道我没看错你。

original: Did you find Keely? You haven't been back for a while, so I was hoping...
translation: 你找到基利了吗？ 你有段时间没有回来了，所以我想……

original: Oh! Good to see you again.
translation: 噢！再次见到你真是太高兴了。

original: You're new? I'm Angela. Williams. Were you just looking around, or...
translation: 你是新来的？我是安吉拉·威廉姆斯。你是随便逛逛呢，还是……

original: I hear you took care of Motor-Runner. I could have handled that on my own.
translation: 我听说你已经料理了轰鸣恶煞。我本可以自己解决的。

original: Thanks for the help back at Vault 3. I couldn't have gotten out of there without the assist.
translation: 谢谢你在3号避难所帮了我。要是没有你，我肯定出不来。

original: What do you need? I have a job to do.
translation: 你有什么事？我还有活要干。

original: I'm ready to take out Motor-Runner when you are.
translation: 我已经准备好去干掉轰鸣恶煞了，就等你一句话。

original: How the hell did you get in here? And who the hell are you?
translation: 你他妈到底怎么进来的？还有你他妈到底是谁？

original: What are you doing here, soldier? I didn't call for any support.
translation: 你在这里干什么，士兵？ 我没有呼叫增援啊。

original: Rick is dead, but I'd still welcome my freedom!
translation: 虽然瑞克死了，但我还是很高兴能获得自由！

original: Are you going to free me or what?
translation: 你到底要不要放了我啊？

original: What the fuck are you doing here?
translation: 你他妈的在这里干什么？

original: Man, are you turned around. Motor-Runner is on the other side of the complex.
translation: 老兄，你迷路了吧。轰鸣恶煞在这迷宫的另一边。

original: What are you doing here? You don't have clearance.
translation: 你在这干什么？你还没获准进入。

original: Well?
translation: 嗯？

original: Man, am I bored.
translation: 老兄，我好无聊。

original: You weren't supposed to kill him! Goddamn it. Not only did we not get any information, but now you've ended his suffering, too.
translation: 你怎么把他杀了！妈的。我们本来可以从他嘴里套点情报出来的，这下好了，你倒是帮他解脱了。

original: Shit, guess I can forget about a promotion this decade. Thanks a lot, asshole.
translation: 娘的，看来我这十年之内都别指望升官了。真是感谢你啊，蠢货。

original: Fuck. What am I going to tell the colonel?
translation: 操他妈。这下我怎么跟上校交代？

original: Poor guy. He's all tuckered out. Well, I guess we'll have to pick up where we left off tomorrow. Good work.
translation: 可怜的家伙，他完全崩溃了。我看还是明天再继续吧。干得好。

original: I'm sure he'll have had enough after a few days of this. Or if we're lucky, a few months.
translation: 我敢说未来几天他都会消停了。要是我们运气好，说不定是几个月。

original: I'll get someone in here to clean up the mess he made. You can head out for the day. Let's let him sleep.
translation: 我会叫人来收拾他的烂摊子，你可以走了，让他睡一觉吧。

original: This Vault-Tec machinery is so fragile. I had to jury-rig this elevator a few days... and it's on the fritz again already.
translation: 这些避难所科技的机器太容易坏了。几天前我才把这电梯勉强修好，现在它又坏了。

original: Ah, that's got it. See you upstairs.
translation: 啊，搞定了。楼上见。

original: I suppose you have questions. Hurry up and ask them.
translation: 我想你肯定有疑问。快点儿，有问题就赶紧问。

original: Ah, good. You survived. I was beginning to think you hadn't. You'll be pleased to know that the spores should no longer be a problem.
translation: 啊，很好。你活了下来。我还在想你没准活不成了。我得告诉你个好消息，孢子问题终于解决了。

original: Now all that's left is to ensure that none of this ever happens again. The research that led to these abominations must be erased.
translation: 剩下要做的就是杜绝这种事再次发生。所以引发这次事故的所有研究资料都必须销毁。

original: Welcome to the range. Feel free to use any open lane.
translation: 欢迎来到靶场。你可以随意使用空的射击位。

original: The lockdown is lifted! The patrols are going to start up again! Do you know what this means? I'll actually be able to get into a real fight!
translation: 封锁解除了！巡逻队又要出发啦！你知道这意味着什么吗？我终于可以真刀真枪地干一场啦！

original: I wonder what it'll be against? Raiders? Radscorpions? {super excited}Deathclaws? Oh, I can't wait. So what's up?
translation: 不知道在外面都会碰到些什么？掠夺者？辐射蝎？{super excited}还是死亡爪？噢，我都等不及啦。对了，你有什么事？

original: Hey, so Hardin becoming Elder was because of you, huh? Good job. Now that the lockdown is lifted, I may get a chance to get into a real fight!
translation: 嘿，原来哈丁是仰仗你才当上长老的啊？干得好。现在只要封锁一解除，我就有机会来一次实战了！

original: I wonder what it'll be against? Raiders? Radscorpions? {super excited}Deathclaws? Oh, I can't wait. So what's up?
translation: 不知道在外面都会碰到些什么？掠夺者？辐射蝎？{super excited}还是死亡爪？噢，我都等不及啦。对了，什么事？

original: Yeah?
translation: 嗯？

original: {Ramos Greeting for players with Veronica}{Stern}Listen up. I'm in charge of security around here, and I can't say I'm too happy about having an outsider waltzing around.
translation: {Ramos Greeting for players with Veronica}{Stern}听好了。我负责这里的安保工作，有个外来者在附近晃来晃去的我可高兴不起来。

original: {Eases up, first part was just for show}But since you came in with Veronica, I'm inclined to cut you a little slack. Just behave yourself and we won't have any problems, okay?
translation: {Eases up，first part was just for show}不过既然你是和维罗尼卡一起来的，我可以对你稍微网开一面。管好你自己，这样大家都轻松，明白吗？

original: Oh, and the Elder's going to want to talk to you. He's on the second level. Just take a right once you get down there.
translation: 噢，还有，长老想和你谈谈。他在二层。你下楼梯后右转就到。

original: My office is right here in case you need anything. Just ask for Ramos.
translation: 如果你有什么需要找我的，我的办公室就在这儿。说找拉莫斯就行。

original: Your presence here... Let's just say it's highly irregular.
translation: 你的出现……只能说非常地不寻常。

original: Outsiders aren't even allowed to know that our bunker's here, let alone come and go freely.
translation: 外来者甚至都不可能知道我们的地堡在这儿，更别说来去自如了。

original: You impressed Elder McNamara, obviously. He must believe that you'd be very useful.
translation: 显然你让麦克纳马拉长老印象深刻啊。他肯定是觉得你会派上大用场。

original: Shhh. I thought I heard something up by the entrance.
translation: 嘘。我好像听见门口有动静。

original: Powder Ganger scum! Hands up or die!
translation: 炸药帮的杂碎！快投降！否则格杀勿论！

original: Thought you'd sneak up on me, you filthy Powder Ganger?
translation: 你以为靠偷袭就能干得了我吗，炸药帮的贱狗？

original: Sorry, outsider, but I'm not allowed to sell you anything without the Elder's say so.
translation: 对不起，外来者，没有长老的允许，我不能卖东西给你。

original: Besides, I'm a little busy right now.
translation: 况且，我眼下有点忙。

original: At least with the lockdown lifted I'll be able to resupply my store more often. So what are you here for?
translation: 真不敢相信哈丁现在居然成了长老。但至少解除封锁以后我的货源更广了。那么，你想买点什么？

original: Have you heard the news? Elder McNamara has lifted the lockdown! Good news for this store, let me tell you. I can't wait to start getting more goods.
translation: 你听说没有？麦克纳马拉长老解除了封锁！要我说，这对我的小店来说真是好消息！我都等不及要去搞些更好的货品来了。

original: So what are you here for?
translation: 那么，你想买点什么？

original: The word came down from the Elder that I'm to offer you some of our lesser wares, as if I didn't have other matters on my mind.
translation: 长老发话说我可以向你提供一些小型商品，可我手头上的事情还多着呢。

original: Hello, you must be the outsider everyone's talking about. I'm Linda Schuler. If you ever need medical attention, this is the place to come.
translation: 你好，你肯定就是那个大家都在谈论的外来者吧。我是琳达·舒勒。如果你需要医护，可以随时来找我。

original: What is it?
translation: 这是什么？

original: Always good to see you, pardner! Anything I can help you with?
translation: 见到你总是那么高兴，伙计！有什么我可以帮你的吗？

original: It is almost time for the Great Journey!
translation: 伟大旅程就要起航了！

original: It is almost time for the Great Journey!
translation: 伟大旅程就要起航了！

original: Nice enough speech, I guess.
translation: 讲话还挺精彩。

original: Well, it's up to you to go launch the rockets. There's a small mission control room all the way back upstairs. Should be as easy as pressing a button.
translation: 好吧，发射火箭的任务就交给你了。原路返回楼上，那里有个小型"任务控制"室。应该只要按下按钮就行，非常简单。

original: It seems my work here is done, so I'll be on my way to Novac. We'll see how that works out.
translation: 看来我在这里的工作已经完成了，我准备去诺瓦克了。接下来就看这事情怎么收场吧。

original: Did you hear him? As though some fancy speech can make what they did to me less of a crime?
translation: 你听见他的那番话了吗？好像只要发表一些高论，就能减轻他们对我犯下的罪行？

original: Go launch the rockets! There's a cramped little "mission control" room all the way back upstairs. Should be as easy as pushing a button.
translation: 好吧，发射火箭的任务就交给你了。原路返回楼上，那里有个小型"任务控制"室。应该只要按下按钮就行，非常简单。

original: Enjoy the view. I hear the "Great Journey" is going to be shorter than they expected. Sweeter, too.
translation: 好好欣赏吧。我估计"伟大旅程"会比他们预计的要短。也更美妙。

original: Leave me alone.
translation: 离我远点。

original: Come and get it, you big dumb -
translation: 放马过来啊，你这个傻大个——

original: Hey! You're not one of those things out there. Who the hell are you?
translation: 嘿！你跟外面那些不是一伙儿的。你到底是谁？

original: RL-3 is ready for another tour of duty, sir!
translation: RL-3已准备好听候您的下一个命令，先生！

original: <says nothing>
translation: <沉默>

original: Protect and serve.
translation: 保护与服务。

original: Protect and serve.
translation: 保护与服务。

original: PLAYER THROW GRENADE
translation: 玩家扔手雷

original: {Player threw a grenade}Watch the blast!
translation: {Player threw a grenade}小心爆炸！

original: {DUPE of AvoidThreat: Player threw a grenade}Explosive!
translation: {DUPE of AvoidThreat： Player threw a grenade}爆炸！

original: {grenade!}Nih mah sih!
translation: {grenade!}手榴蛋！

original: {bomb!}Bahm buh!
translation: {bomb!}嘭！

original: {grenade!}{GREE-nah!}Grenah!
translation: {grenade!}{GREE-nah!}守雷！

original: {bomb!}Boomb!
translation: {bomb!}炸蛋！

original: Be advised, a grenade has been thrown.
translation: 小心，手雷扔出去了。

original: Be advised, an explosive has been thrown.
translation: 小心，炸药扔出去了。

original: Out of the way!
translation: 快闪开！

original: Hot potato!
translation: 手雷！

original: Scoot!
translation: 快跑！

original: Hop to it!
translation: 快走开！

original: Watch out!
translation: 小心点！

original: Scatter!
translation: 快散开！

original: Get down!
translation: 趴下！

original: Oh, crap... take cover!
translation: 哎呦，我靠…快隐蔽！

original: Here it comes!
translation: 过来了！

original: Here comes the boom!
translation: 来炸弹了！

original: Run!
translation: 跑！

original: Get away!
translation: 让开！

original: Grenade!
translation: 手雷！

original: Hit the dirt!
translation: 卧倒！

original: Explosive!
translation: 要爆炸啦！

original: Clearing the chamber?
translation: 清空房间？

original: Better off saving ammo.
translation: 最好省点弹药。

original: Whoa! Are you like... some kind of crazy person?
translation: 哇！你是...你就像...某种疯子？

original: Do that again!
translation: 再来一次！

original: Cool. Can I try?
translation: 酷。我能试试吗？

original: Do that someplace else!
translation: 去别的地方找靶子吧！

original: You tryin' to get me killed?
translation: 你想打死我吗？

original: Holster that. And be quick about it.
translation: 把枪收好。快点。

original: Holster your iron, pardner!
translation: 收起枪，哥们！

original: Quit it!
translation: 死！

original: Stop that!
translation: 别这么做！

original: Hey! Do that somewhere else.
translation: 嗨！要开枪就去别的地方。

original: Be careful!
translation: 当心！

original: What in tarnation?
translation: 搞什么鬼？

original: What in blazes?
translation: 搞毛啊？

original: Ammo costs money, you know!
translation: 你要知道，买弹药是要花钱的！

original: What's wrong with you?
translation: 你什么毛病？

original: Knock it off!
translation: 别弄了！

original: Quit fuckin' around!
translation: 别他妈再捣乱了！

original: What's your problem?
translation: 你有什么问题？

original: {irritated that the player is shooting near him}Stop doing that, please.
translation: {irritated that the player is shooting near him}请不要再这样做了。

original: {annoyed}I'm not sure if you're trying to hit me or trying to miss me. Either way, stop it. Thanks.
translation: {annoyed}我不知道你是想开枪打我还是故意射偏。无论如何，别这样做了，谢谢。

original: Let me aim that for you next time.
translation: 下次我来给你示范下该怎么瞄准吧。

original: Am I gonna have to take that away from you?
translation: 要我把你那东西收起来吗？

original: Uh, hate to criticize boss, but I'm not actually immortal. Just old.
translation: 呃，我不是有意要找茬啊，老大，但你可别把我当成活神仙。我只是年纪大了而已。

original: Come on, boss, I know I'm ugly, but I {emphasis}am on your side.
translation: 得了吧，老大，我知道我很丑，但我……{emphasis}可是你这边的啊。

original: If you want me to split, you could just say so.
translation: 如果你想让我走人，说一声就好了嘛。

original: {annoyed growl}<growl>
translation: {annoyed growl}<咆哮>

original: {Irritated, player fired a gun near her}Would you keep it down?
translation: {Irritated，player fired a gun near her}就不能把那东西放下吗？

original: {Irritated, player fired a gun near her}Waste of ammo.
translation: {Irritated，player fired a gun near her}浪费弹药。

original: {Surprised, player fired a gun near her}What, you see a scorpion?
translation: {Irritated，player fired a gun near her}怎么，你看到蝎子了？

original: If you can't control it, keep it in your holster.
translation: 如果你玩不转那东西，那就让它待在枪套里面吧。

original: {Player fired a gun near Lily}You'll put someone's eye out with that, dearie!
translation: {Player fired a gun near Lily}小亲亲，那东西会打到别人的眼睛的！

original: {Player fired a gun near Lily}It's not nice to do things like that, dear!
translation: {Player fired a gun near Lily}亲爱的！这样做可不礼貌。

original: {Player fired a gun near Lily}This noise is making Leo get antsy!
translation: {Player fired a gun near Lily}这些噪音会让利奥发疯的！

original: {Slightly annoyed}Keep that up, human…
translation: {Slightly annoyed}没完了，人类？

original: Whoa, someone's just come from the Wrangler.
translation: 哇哦，有人刚从原子牛仔跑出来了。

original: Keep it down, would ya? I already got a splitting headache.
translation: 放下它，好吗？我快头疼死了。

original: Whatever. Knock yourself out, for all I care.
translation: 随你便。要是你走火伤了自己，我才不在乎呢。

original: Weapons use is discouraged. Thank you for your cooperation.
translation: 禁止使用武器，谢谢合作。

original: Please do not use your weapons. Thank you.
translation: 请勿使用武器，谢谢。

original: Whoo! Bang bang!
translation: 哇哦！嘣，嘣！

original: A pulled trigger's a happy trigger!
translation: 扣扳机不长眼才过瘾！

original: Yeah! Shoot it again!
translation: 哈哈！再开枪啊！

original: Cut it out, will you?
translation: 别闹了，好吗？

original: Whoa, whoa! Careful!
translation: 哇哦，哇哦！小心点！

original: {irritated}Put that away!
translation: {irritated}把那东西拿开！

original: {irritated}Mind your weapon!
translation: {irritated}收好你的武器！

original: Keep that shit away from me.
translation: 把那狗屁玩意收走。

original: What the fuck do you think you're doing?
translation: 你他妈的以为你在干嘛？

original: {irritated}Stow that weapon, Outsider.
translation: {irritated}收好你的武器，外来者。

original: {irritated}Drop that weapon.
translation: {irritated}放下武器。

original: {irritated}{"Stop such noise!"}{DAY-ha roo-WE-do}Deha ruido!
translation: {irritated}{"Stop such noise!"}{DAY-ha roo-WE-do}别炒了！

original: {irritated}{"Do not fire weapons!"}{no dis-CAR-gay AR-moose}No discarge armoos!
translation: {irritated}{"Do not fire weapons!"}{no dis-CAR-gay AR-moose}别凯枪！

original: {Sees a player lay a mine, scorn}A tactic of the Bear.
translation: {Sees a player lay a mine, scorn}熊的战术。

original: {Scorn, player laid a mine, "Hanlon's" a famous mine-layer}Worthy of Hanlon.
translation: {Scorn, player laid a mine, "Hanlon's" a famous mine-layer}配得上汉隆。

original: {explosive, bomb, yes?}Ah del tahi, bahm buh, ya?
translation: {explosive, bomb, yes?}炸要，炸蛋，对吧？

original: {a warning for white legs! Heh he!}A bil he neh fuhr jahd thli gai! Heh he!
translation: {a warning for white legs! Heh he!}白腿的警告！呵呵！

original: Analyzing. This behavior is not on file.
translation: 分析中。这种行为没有记录在案。

original: This behavior is not on file.
translation: 这种行为没有记录在案。

original: I hope I don't forget that's there.
translation: 希望我能记得这儿埋了个地雷。

original: Hard for me to step lightly with a bum leg.
translation: 我腿脚不利索，想要蹑手蹑脚趟过雷区可不容易啊。

original: Now why in tarnation would you put one of those, there.
translation: 天杀的，你为什么要会把这东西放在那里。

original: Guess we best watch where we step.
translation: 看来我们走路得小心点了。

original: You sure that's necessary?
translation: 你确定有必要么？

original: What was the point of that?
translation: 这么做意义何在？

original: What the hell? That's dangerous.
translation: 你干嘛？这太危险了。

original: Um... why are you setting that there?
translation: 呃…你为什么把这东西放在那里？

original: That'll show 'em!
translation: 谁踩谁中奖！

original: Got any more of those?
translation: 还有多余的么？

original: Hey, you dropped something.
translation: 嗨，你掉东西了。

original: Isn't that a little overkill?
translation: 这么做有点过了吧？

original: Why the fuck you puttin' that there?
translation: 你他妈的把它放在那里干嘛？

original: Pick that back up or you'll be eatin' it.
translation: 把它捡回来，要不我就让你吃了它。

original: What are you doing?
translation: 你在做什么？

original: I saw that.
translation: 我看到了。

original: {Player pointing gun at him}Fire, and I won't take it lying down.
translation: {Player pointing gun at him}开枪啊，我可不会俯首帖耳的。

original: {Player pointing gun at him, grim}Better be sure.
translation: {Player pointing gun at him, grim}最好是确定一下。

original: Think about it too hard and you'll get burned.
translation: 别老想着动粗，你这样会完蛋的。

original: Watch where you point that.
translation: 请注意你的指向。

original: That's not a good idea.
translation: 这不是个好主意。

original: What do you think you're doing?
translation: 你认为你在做什么？

original: You're not going to shoot me, are you?
translation: 你不会对我开枪的，对吧？

original: Is that loaded? Let me try it!
translation: 上膛了吗？让我试试！

original: Hey, I can almost see right down the barrel!
translation: 嘿，我几乎可以直接看到桶里的东西了！

original: How about you line that up on a tin can instead?
translation: 要不你找一个罐头盒试试？

original: Don't even kid about that.
translation: 这可不好笑。

original: You're lookin' at a heap of trouble if you want it.
translation: 要是你想惹麻烦，那你尽管来。

original: If you think you want trouble, then let fly.
translation: 要是你想找事，那就放马过来吧。

original: Don't even joke like that.
translation: 别开这种玩笑。

original: Point that somewhere else!
translation: 别拿枪头对着我！

original: That safety better be on.
translation: 这枪的保险最好打开了。

original: Point that somewhere else.
translation: 把枪头拿开。

original: For Pete's sake...
translation: 我的天……

original: No respect.
translation: 真没教养。

original: Stop that. I mean it!
translation: 说真的。住手！

original: Quit it. You're making me nervous.
translation: 枪放下。你让我很紧张。

original: Go ahead. Try me.
translation: 来吧。你有种试试。

original: Think you're tough, huh?
translation: 是不是觉得你自己很行，啊？

original: How about I aim my gun at you for a while, see how you like it?
translation: 要是我用枪死死瞄着你的脑袋，你会有什么感觉？

original: {player is aiming gun at Arcade}I assure you, you look extremely virile. Now, would you mind pointing that somewhere else? Thanks.
translation: {playerisaiminggunatArcade}我知道你厉害，你确实挺有气概的。所以，不介意的话，把枪指向别处如何？谢谢了。

original: {player is aiming gun at Arcade}Uh... {cautiously}what's up?
translation: {playerisaiminggunatArcade}呃…{cautiously}怎么了？

original: You looking for trouble?
translation: 你想找麻烦吗？

original: Why do we always hurt the ones we care about the most?
translation: 人们为什么总是会伤害自己最在意的人呢？

original: You, uhh, you want to point that someplace else, boss? I got enough holes in me.
translation: 你，呃，可以把枪指向别处么，老大？我身上的窟窿眼已经够多了。

original: Boss, why are you looking at me that way?
translation: 老大，为什么这样看着我啊？

original: I wouldn't mind this so much if it weren't for that maniacal gleam in your eye.
translation: 如果我没看到你眼中的那种疯狂，我也许还不会介意。

original: {threatening growl}<growl>
translation: {threateninggrowl}<咆哮>

original: {Player's aiming at her}Pull that trigger, you'll wish you hadn't.
translation: {Player'saimingather}扣下扳机的话，你会后悔一辈子。

original: {Player's aiming at her}Don't like no one drawing a bead on me.
translation: {Player'saimingather}我可不喜欢有人用枪对着我。

original: {Player's aiming at her}Better be rocksalt in that, or you're asking for an asskicking.
translation: {Player'saimingather}里面的子弹要是真家伙，你就死定了。

original: {Player's aiming at her}Don't make me take that away.
translation: {Player'saimingather}别逼我。

original: {Player's aiming at her}Are you drunk?
translation: {Player'saimingather}你喝多了？

original: {Gently chiding, player's aiming a gun at her}Pumpkin, don't point that at {gramma}grandma, there's a dear.
translation: {Gentlychiding，player'saimingagunather}小淘气，别把那东西对着{gramma}奶奶。

original: {Player's aiming a gun at her}Leo doesn't like that, dearie. You should stop.
translation: {Player'saimingather}利奥不喜欢这样，宝贝。你最好别这么做。

original: {Snarls}I wouldn't.
translation: {Snarls}我可不会这样。

original: {Snarls}I don't think so.
translation: {Snarls}这可不好。

original: You want to be getting that gun out of my face right now.
translation: 你最好马上把那把枪从我面前拿开。

original: That's not funny.
translation: 这可不好笑。

original: Quit screwing around!
translation: 别乱来！

original: Be advised, assaulting an officer of the law will not be tolerated.
translation: 请注意，攻击执法者是不可容忍的。

original: Be advised, assaulting an officer of the law is a serious offense.
translation: 请注意，攻击执法者是严重违法行为。

original: If you need to shoot me, I won't complain!
translation: 如果你非要对我开枪的话，我不会有半句怨言！

original: Hello! Look what's pointed at me!
translation: 喂！看看你在用什么指着我呢！

original: Don't worry about me! You can shoot if you want!
translation: 别在乎我！你要是想开枪，随便就是了！

original: {challenging}You think I don't see that?
translation: {challenging}你觉得我瞎了么？

original: {threatening}Don't tempt me.
translation: {threatening}别惹我。

original: {threatening}By {KAI-zar}Caesar, you're walking a fine line.
translation: {threatening}以凯撒的名义{KAI-zar}警告你，小心玩火自焚。

original: Who the fuck do you think you are?
translation: 你他妈的认为自己是谁？

original: Point that shit somewhere else.
translation: 把那鬼东西拿开。

original: {threatening}You're going to make this easy.
translation: {threatening}别自讨苦吃。

original: {threatening}Drop that weapon, Outsider.
translation: {threatening}放下武器，外来者。

original: Don't be ridiculous - point that somewhere else, will you?
translation: 少跟我开玩笑，你能不能别拿这玩意指着我？

original: [Christine frowns, points at your collar, then hers.]
translation: [克莉丝汀皱了皱眉，指了指你的项圈，又指了指她的。]

original: {Cold evil, player's pointing a gun at him}I didn't take you for suicidal.
translation: {Cold evil, player's pointing a gun at him}你该不会是想找死吧？

original: {Curious, player is pointing a gun at him, he doesn't understand what it means}Don't shoot. Bullets hurt.
translation: {Curious, player is pointing a gun at him, he doesn't understand what it means}别开枪。子弹打到会很痛。

original: You're not the first to have tried.
translation: 你不是第一个来试的。

original: Make the first shot count. You won't get a second.
translation: 一击必中，没有第二次机会。

original: {don't point weapons at me.}No tsaig tuh beh dah a hih jih gahni a meer.
translation: {don't point weapons at me.}别拿舞气纸着我。

original: {stop that please}Stahp dahs pleez.
translation: {stop that please}请憋炸样。

original: {anxious}{"I have not harmed you."}{may no err-RA-hu ah KAH-tu}Me no heranu a katu.
translation: {anxious}{"I have not harmed you."}{may no err-RA-hu ah KAH-tu}我妹有桑害你。

original: {offended}{"Lower your weapon."}{BAH-jay KAH AR-moo}Baje ka armoo.
translation: {offended}{"Lower your weapon."}{BAH-jay KAH AR-moo}把舞气放下。

original: {don't point weapons at me.}{doan poin AI-tee Ai Mee!}Do'an poin aiti ay me!
translation: {don't point weapons at me.}{doan poin AI-tee Ai Mee!}别拿舞气纸着我！

original: {stop that please}{SOO-bye thaah, saah}Subai thah, tsahh.
translation: {stop that please}{SOO-bye thaah, saah}停停。

original: {Deny Beep}<Makes beeping sounds>
translation: {Deny Beep}<发出哔哔声>

original: Hello
translation: 你好。

original: Paladin.
translation: 圣骑士。

original: Hello, outsider.
translation: 你好，外来者。

original: You're being watched, so don't get any ideas.
translation: 你已经被监视了，所以别耍小聪明。

original: The bunker takes a little getting used to, doesn't it?
translation: 这座地堡确实需要花点时间才能适应，不是吗？

original: Hello.
translation: 你好。

original: Look who's here.
translation: 瞧瞧这是谁呀。

original: Things are tense on the Strip right now. The head of one of Mr. House's Families was killed. Time to lay low, you ask me.
translation: 长街现在局势紧张。豪斯手下一个家族的老大都被杀了。要我说，还是低调点好。

original: Don't get too close to Mr. Benny.
translation: 别往本尼先生身边凑。

original: No sudden moves around the boss, got it?
translation: 在老板身旁的时候老实点，懂了？

original: I got my eye on you, so no funny business.
translation: 我会盯着你的，别动歪脑筋。

original: Keep those hands where I can see 'em.
translation: 把手放在我能看见的地方。

original: {LATIN}{AH-way}Ave, true to {KAI-zar}Caesar.
translation: {LATIN}{AH-way}致敬，凯撒{KAI-zar}万岁。

original: That's the mook that killed Benny!
translation: 那就是杀死本尼的蠢货！

original: That's the guy who killed Caesar!
translation: 那就是杀死凯撒的家伙！

original: That's the chick who killed Caesar!
translation: 那就是杀死凯撒的婊子！

original: {Neutral - doesn't care that the player killed the President, but impressed that the player walked into a casino full of people who do}Ain't you the cat that tried to ice the President? Gutsy, baby, showing your face in here.
translation: {Neutral - doesn't care that the player killed the President, but impressed that the player walked into a casino full of people who do}你不就是那个想要做掉总统的小猫咪吗？真有种啊，宝贝，还敢在这里露脸。

original: {Neutral - doesn't care that the player killed the President, but impressed that the player walked into a casino full of people who do}Ain't that the cat that tried to ice the President? Gutsy fella, showing his face in here.
translation: {Neutral - doesn't care that the player killed the President, but impressed that the player walked into a casino full of people who do}那不就是想要做掉总统的小猫咪吗？这小伙够有种的啊，还敢在这里露脸。

original: {Neutral - doesn't care that the player killed the President, but impressed that the player walked into a casino full of people who do}Ain't that the bird that tried to ice the President? Gutsy dame, showing her face in here.
translation: {Neutral - doesn't care that the player killed the President, but impressed that the player walked into a casino full of people who do}那不就是想要做掉总统的小鸟吗？这娘们够有种的啊，还敢在这里露脸。

original: Let's get going!
translation: 我们走吧！

original: Hey, good going with that hit on The Tops.
translation: 嘿，九重天那一票干得漂亮。

original: I wouldn't mind hitting that, does she put out?
translation: 我想打打那玩意，她不会介意吧？

original: Watch your step, sister.
translation: 留心脚下，姐妹。

original: If you can't keep that thing under control, I will.
translation: 如果你不能控制好那东西，就让我来。

original: I've never seen a ghoul up close. Not sure I wanted to.
translation: 我从没近距离看过尸鬼。还是别看的好。

original: Make my day, mutant.
translation: 我的天哪，变种人。

original: I can take care of that robot problem for you. Just saying.
translation: 你那个机器人有什么问题我都可以修好。尽管开口。

original: Whatever you're selling, we have plenty.
translation: 不管你要推销什么，我们都已经有了。

original: Once a republican, always a republican.
translation: 生是共和国的人，死是共和国的鬼。

original: You aren't stealing our medicine, are you, doc?
translation: 你没偷我们的药吧，没有吧，医生？

original: I got kicked outta Ultra-Luxe the other day. Man, that place gives me the fucking freaks.
translation: 我前几天才被从奢华殿堂里赶出来。老兄，那地方真他妈吓人。

original: Just give us an excuse. Been too long since I fired my weapon.
translation: 别自找麻烦。我好久没开过枪了。

original: Don't go fucking about, asshole.
translation: 别乱来，贱货。

original: Mess with any of the equipment here and I'll mount your head on a stick.
translation: 敢乱动这里的东西，我就把你的头砍下来插在棍子上。

original: Just try pulling some of your Brahmin shit here at the Dorado and see what happens.
translation: 你要是敢在多拉多胡作非为，那就不妨试试看。

original: Not much happens here at the Dorado, and that's how we like it.
translation: 多拉多这儿还算太平，所以我们才喜欢。

original: Only combat I seen lately was shooting some Geckos.
translation: 我最近唯一经历过的战斗就是打蜥蜴。

original: All the juice from Hoover flows right through the Dorado, and we send it west to keep the home lights burning.
translation: 胡佛水坝产出的电全都经由多拉多送往西部，这才保障了那里的万家灯火。

original: We keep an eye out for Legion raiding parties. They'd love to shut down the Dorado.
translation: 我们一直在提防军团的突袭小队。他们肯定会袭击多拉多。

original: My folks back home got lights at night thanks to what we're doing here.
translation: 我的人民不用忍受黑灯瞎火的日子，都是我们的功劳。

original: Just stay out of the control room and enclosure.
translation: 离控制室和围场远点就对了。

original: The power transmission cables are all underground. Good thing, or the old war might've knocked them down.
translation: 幸好这些电缆都埋在地下，否则过去的战争可能早就把它们摧毁了。

original: You visiting every NCR post just to see the sights? This here's the Dorado - it's where we send power back home.
translation: 你造访NCR哨站难道就是为了看风景？这儿是埃尔多拉多——是我们把电送回家的地方。

original: Look all you want, just don't mess with any of the equipment. The control room's off-limits, and so is the enclosure.
translation: 看可以随便看，但不要碰任何装备。控制室禁止进入，围场也一样。

original: <growl>
translation: <低吼>

original: THE ONE WHO DEFENDED US FROM MOBIUS. {Beat}HELLO.
translation: 那个帮助我们抵御莫比乌斯的人。{Beat}你好啊。

original: {Proud}If it isn't the beautiful ping of my radar-scan picking up a heroic Lobotomite.
translation: {Proud}叮，看我的雷达扫描到了谁，这不是英勇的小无脑人么。

original: -The ONE who SAVED us! To you, I bestow a hello. {Quieter}Hello.-
translation: -是救了我们的那个人！让我授予你问候。{Quieter}你好啊。-

original: *Thanks for helping us. Don't get a big head or anything, even if I am insanely jealous.*
translation: *谢谢你帮了我们。尽管我发疯一样嫉妒，也请不要介意。*

original: So nice seeing you again - for perhaps the first time.
translation: 再次见到你太好了，或许是第一次见到你。

original: Initiate.
translation: 新兵。

original: Greetings, Elder.
translation: 您好，长老。

original: Apprentice.
translation: 学徒。

original: With their leader gone, the Legion will likely tear itself apart. It's what most violent tribal societies do.
translation: 只要首领一死，军团就会土崩瓦解。靠暴力维生的部落社会最后都是这样的下场。

original: Someone blew up the monorail the NCR uses to travel to the Strip and back. We should use this time to strike!
translation: 有人把NCR用于往返长街的单轨铁路炸了。我们应该抓住这个时机进攻！

original: There was an attempt on the NCR president's life recently. Too bad it didn't succeed.
translation: 最近有人企图刺杀NCR总统。可惜没成功。

original: Did you hear? Someone actually managed to assassinate the NCR's president! And we just sit here!
translation: 你听说了吗？有人暗杀了NCR的总统！我们却还在这里傻坐着！

original: The other day I heard some bigwig in the NCR military died. Hopefully it disrupts their chain of command some.
translation: 不久前我听说NCR军方的一位高层死了。恐怕他们的指挥系统要阵脚大乱了。

original: Did you hear about that NCR higher up that died? That he was trying to sabotage them? Hope he wasn't the only one.
translation: 你听说有个NCR的高官死了吗？那人居然是个内鬼？希望他不是唯一的一个。

original: We just had word that the town of Primm is now part of the NCR. At this rate, they'll be running the whole region soon.
translation: 我们刚刚得到消息，普瑞姆已经成为NCR的一部分了。照这个势头发展下去，他们要不了多久就会占领整片地区。

original: It's the quiet before the storm up top. For once, I'm almost glad we're down here.
translation: 这只是暴风雨前的宁静。我第一次觉得我们待在这下面真好。

original: You must have some serious brass to fight off Benny's goons. Bravo.
translation: 你肯定是有不小的本事，才能搞定本尼身边的那群打手。厉害。

original: You made a real mess of the Omertas. Looks like the place will be under new management now.
translation: 你把整个黑手党搅得鸡犬不宁。看来那地方是该换新主人了。

original: You must have some real pull with House to get inside the Lucky 38.
translation: 豪斯肯定是有大事和你商量，才会把你请到幸运38去。

original: Hey, you're the one who slayed Caesar! That son of a bitch had it coming!
translation: 嘿，你就是干掉凯撒的那家伙！那狗日的终于遭报应了！

original: People say Caesar is dead. I hope someone worse doesn't replace him.
translation: 大家都说凯撒死了。希望别来一个更坏的人接班。

original: Good going destroying House's Securitron Army. That old boy's had too much power for too long.
translation: 能干掉了豪斯的电子保安军队真是太好了。那家伙独揽大权太久了。

original: I hear some Legionary named Silus got freed from McCarran. He's got quite the NCR kill count.
translation: 听说军团有个叫希鲁斯的人从麦卡伦逃脱了。他杀了NCR不少人呢。

original: Why didn't you just let Kimball get killed? What did he ever do for us to warrant saving his life?
translation: 你干嘛不让金博尔直接死掉？他对我们有什么恩惠，值得我们去救他一命？

original: You must have thought you were hot shit going after Kimball like that, huh?
translation: 你肯定认为杀了金博尔很风光，是不？

original: I hear you bagged Kimball. Damn fine work, kid.
translation: 我听说你料理了金博尔。干得真他妈漂亮啊，孩子。

original: Some President Kimball was. Chalk up another death to NCR incompetence.
translation: 金博尔算什么总统。又一个死了的NCR废物而已。

original: A veteran Ranger inspires awe. Stick around for when they get here, you'll see. If I live to earn the Black Armor, I can die a happy woman.
translation: 精英游骑兵会让人肃然起敬。等过一阵子他们来了，你就明白了。要是能穿上那样一套黑色盔甲，咱这辈子也值了。

original: First Recon's in Camp Forlorn Hope. Get some Rangers in there too and it'll be a damned impregnable fortress.
translation: 第一侦察营已经转移到了飘零希望营地。再来几名游骑兵，那里就会成为一座固若金汤的要塞。

original: President Kimball was a tough son-of-a-gun. The Rangers'll pick up where he left off.
translation: 金博尔总统是个顽强的家伙。游骑兵会继承他的衣钵的。

original: President Kimball was a soldier's soldier. It's up to us to make the Legion pay for what they did.
translation: 金博尔总统是战士们的榜样。只有靠我们来让军团血债血偿了。

original: {with esteem}You saved President Kimball, didn't you? Hell of a thing.
translation: {with esteem}就是你救了金博尔总统吧？真是厉害。

original: Don't get many chances to catch a legionary alive. Burns me up that we botched ours.
translation: 活捉军团士兵的机会本来就少。好不容易抓到却弄死了，真让人搓火。

original: Wish I had a First Recon guy looking after me.
translation: 真希望能有个第一侦察营的家伙来掩护我。

original: Oh my God, are you the one who saved President Kimball?
translation: 我的天，你就是那个救了金博尔总统的人？

original: I heard we captured a live Centurion and then let him get away. That never would've happened if I was in charge.
translation: 听说我们活捉了一名百夫长，又让他跑了。这事让我来办，是绝不可能搞砸的。

original: Sounds like we're running Primm now. I'd still rather take my leave at the Strip.
translation: 听说普瑞姆现在归我们管了。但我还是宁愿去长街。

original: First Recon's at Camp Forlorn Hope. Now we've got a chance to hold it.
translation: 第一侦察营已经入驻飘零希望营地。这下我们守住的机会就大了。

original: So I hear the honcho of one of them Strip families up and disappeared - poof! Yeah, they'll find his body someday...
translation: 我听说长街某个家族的老大突然失踪了——嘿！对，总有一天他们会发现尸体的……

original: Caesar may be dead, but I think the toga is here to stay. You simply can't buy better thigh accentuation.
translation: 凯撒是死了，但我想他们那种长袍风格会继续流行下去。毕竟你找不到更能突出大腿的服饰了。

original: {Lamenting}It's too bad the NCR boss got out alive.
translation: {Lamenting}NCR的老大居然活下来了，太糟了。

original: {Satisfied}Even Presidents die, huh? Good.
translation: {Satisfied}连总统都会死吗？很好。

original: {Pessimistic Resignation}Caesar's death don't change shit down here.
translation: {Pessimistic Resignation}凯撒死了也无法改变这堆烂摊子。

original: {Defiant, then relieved}That Legion boss would've never taken the city, but I'm glad he's a goner.
translation: {Defiant, then relieved}那个军团老大根本夺取不了这座城市，不过他死了是最好的。

original: {Almost annoyed}Only one bad thing about The Thorn, it brings all the idiots, assholes and topsiders down here.
translation: {Almost annoyed}荆棘街唯一的问题就是，它把所有的白痴、杂种和上面的人都集中到这下面来了。

original: {Excited}One of these days, Red Lucy's going to show off her Deathclaws.
translation: {Excited}每隔几天，血手露西就该炫耀她的死亡爪了。

original: {Drunk, rambling}Hey yeah. Hi.
translation: {Drunk, rambling}嘿，耶，嗨。

original: {Drunk, confused greeting}Was that a guy or a gal? Aw hell, I need to stop drinking.
translation: {Drunk, confused greeting}这个人是男是女啊？哦，见鬼，我不能再喝了。

original: {Drunk, confused greeting}Ugh?
translation: {Drunk, confused greeting}啊哈？

original: {Drunk, confused}What the hell? I didn't eat any corn this week.
translation: {Drunk, confused}妈的见鬼，我这周没吃玉米啊。

original: {Drunk, yelling}Ya got any grog?!
translation: {Drunk, yelling}有酒吗？！

original: {Drunk, pathetic}Ya got any change, man? I've got two kids to feed.
translation: {Drunk, pathetic}你有零钱吗，老兄？我有两个孩子要养活。

original: {Drunk, pathetic}Ya got any change, man? I've got three kids to feed.
translation: {Drunk, pathetic}你有零钱吗，老兄？我有两个孩子要养活。

original: {Drunk, pathetic}Ya got any change, man? I've got seven kids to feed.
translation: {Drunk, pathetic}你有零钱吗，老兄？我有两个孩子要养活。

original: {Drunk cheer}Woooooo!
translation: {Drunk cheer}喔哦哦哦哦哦哦哦哦！

original: {Drunk rambling}You seen Gourd around?
translation: {Drunk rambling}你看见高尔德了吗？

original: {Drunk rambling, indigestion}Oh, I don't think last night's rat is agreeing with me.{belch}
translation: {Drunk rambling, indigestion}噢，我不觉得昨晚那只耗子会同意我的话。{belch}

original: {Drunk inquiry}Hey lady! I know you've got some hooch somewhere in there!
translation: {Drunk inquiry}嘿，女士！我知道你肯定藏了酒！

original: {Drunk, comical}Hey! Nice hat, nancy boy!
translation: {Drunk, comical}嘿！帽子不错，小娘炮！
