original: <Lie> The attackers are all dead too. It's impossible to identify them.
translation: <撒谎>袭击者也死了。无法辨别出身份。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Those were good men at the station. Good men. This whole town was sleeping a lot easier because of them.
translation: 驻扎在那儿的都是些好家伙，好样的。这镇上的人们能够睡上安稳觉，可全都是仰赖他们啊。

original: At least they gave somebody some hell on their way out.
translation: 至少他们也让敌人付出了代价。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Those were good men at the station. Good men. This whole town was sleeping a lot easier because of them.
translation: 驻扎在那儿的都是些好家伙，好样的。这镇上的人们能够睡上安稳觉，可全都是仰赖他们啊。

original: At least they gave somebody some hell on their way out.
translation: 至少他们也让敌人付出了代价。

original: Well, thanks for telling me. I know that knowledge didn't come without risk.
translation: 好吧，谢谢你告诉我。我知道你为此冒了很大的危险。

original: Members of Caesar's Legion ambushed them.
translation: 凯撒军团的成员伏击了他们。

original: Those were good men at that station. Good men. This whole town was sleeping a lot easier because of them.
translation: 驻扎在那儿的都是些好家伙，好人。这镇上的人们能够安睡，可全都是仰赖他们啊。

original: Now, who knows what we're in for? The Legion? Christ, we'd be better off with Raiders.
translation: 驻扎在那儿的都是些好家伙，好人。这镇上的人们能够安睡，可全都是仰赖他们啊。

original: Those were good men at that station. Good men. This whole town was sleeping a lot easier because of them.
translation: 驻扎在那儿的都是些好家伙，好样的。这镇上的人们能够睡上安稳觉，可全都是仰赖他们啊。

original: Now, who knows what we're in for? The Legion? Christ, we'd be better off with Raiders.
translation: 这下好了，谁知道我们面对的是什么人？凯撒军团？天啊，如果是掠夺者我们还有些胜算。

original: Well, thanks for telling me. I know that knowledge didn't come without risk.
translation: 好吧，谢谢你告诉我。我知道你为此冒了很大的危险。

original: Your body is injured, not your mind. You're kidding yourself if you think you're useless.
translation: 受伤的是你的身体，可不是脑子。不要妄自菲薄了。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Heh. People don't exactly line up to find out what's in my head. Can't remember the last time someone suggested I knew something worth knowing.
translation: 呵。人们对我脑子里的东西又不感兴趣。我甚至都记不得我到底知道哪些有价值的东西。

original: You know, maybe there's something I can do for you. Since you've gone to all the trouble of flattering a crippled old soldier.
translation: 或许、或许我能为你做点事情。毕竟你花了这么大功夫来讨好我这跛脚老兵。

original: There's a move we have in the Rangers for knocking an opponent off his feet. Saved my butt a bunch of times, maybe it will for you too.
translation: 我们游骑兵内部流传着一套独特的招式，可以瞬间将敌人放倒。这套招式救了我很多次，希望你也能受用。

original: Let me show you how it's done.
translation: 我来示范给你看。

original: Let's talk about something else.
translation: 咱们说点别的吧。

original: <Laughs> Yeah. I'm with you there.
translation: <大笑> 行，那就说点别的吧。

original: You're with the NCR, right?
translation: 你是NCR的人，对吧？

original: Was. Was with them. That was back when my arm and leg used to work better.
translation: 曾经是。为他们卖命过。那时候我的胳膊和腿还能听使唤。

original: I still like to pretend I'm a Ranger, though. I'll check in with the guys up at the station pretty regular on the ham radio.
translation: 其实，我喜欢假装自己仍然是一名游骑兵战士。我经常用业余电台和驻站里面的哥们聊天。

original: Sometimes they stop by, tell me they're paying their respects, the smug bastards.
translation: 有时候他们会来拜访我，还向我表达敬意，这帮混球。

original: They haven't been responding to me, last couple days. I guess they got tired of hearing me talk, but it's still got me a little worried.
translation: 不过最近他们却不再回应我了。也许他们听腻了我的唠叨，但我很担心他们。

original: Hell, listen to me talk. Like some damn mother hen.
translation: 妈的，瞧我这多嘴的样子，就像一只叫唤不停的老母鸡。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Okay, I admit it. They've been collecting dust since before I got here. You can have them dirt cheap.
translation: [成功] 好吧，我承认。我来这里之前，这些东西就已经在吃灰了。你随便给点钱就好。

original: You don't have any offers for the rockets. You'd be lucky to get money at all.
translation: 你的火箭根本就卖不出去。你能有钱拿已经算走了狗屎运了。

original: Jeannie May sent me.
translation: 珍妮·梅推荐我来的。

original: Bless her. Seems like every traveler I get in here tells me the same thing.
translation: 上帝保佑她。几乎每个到这来的客人都这么说。

original: They see the sign and think, gift shop? That's just too good to be true. But Jeannie May always points them back in my direction.
translation: 他们看到招牌就会想，纪念品商店？怎么可能还有这种地方。可珍妮·梅总是能把他们引到我这儿来。

original: Well, a friend of Jeannie's is a friend of mine. And my friends get a discount at my store.
translation: 好吧，珍妮的朋友就是我的朋友。我的朋友都享受折扣。

original: Yes, cure me.
translation: 是的，治好我。

original: Okay, there you are. The convulsions should stop in the next one to twelve weeks. If they don't, try holding on to something that's very still.
translation: 好了。抽搐症状会在未来一至十二周内好转。如果没好转，那就找个牢靠的东西扶好。

original: Yes, cure me. Here's 50 caps.
translation: 是的，治好我。给你50瓶盖。

original: All right, there you go. And don't complain about the taste.
translation: 好了，可以了。别抱怨那个味道了。

original: Yes, cure me. Here's 50 caps.
translation: 是的，治好我。给你50瓶盖。

original: And there we go. Now, try to stay off the stuff, you hear?
translation: 可以了。记着，以后别再依赖那玩意了，听到了吗？

original: Yes, cure me. Here's 50 caps.
translation: 是的，治好我。给你50瓶盖。

original: There, that's got it. Don't be so eager to sample dangerous substances in the future, okay?
translation: 行了。别再拿那些危险的东西往自己身上试了，行吗？

original: Yes, cure me. Here's 50 caps.
translation: 是的，治好我。给你50瓶盖。

original: My supplies are rather limited, and we can only get more by trading. Which requires money. Money you don't have. Come back when you have some.
translation: 抱歉，我的医疗用品也很有限，需要的话只能去向别人买。而那就得花钱。可你没钱，所以还是等你有钱了再回来吧。

original: I can't afford treatment. I don't have 50 caps.
translation: 我负担不起治疗费用。我没有50瓶盖。

original: Okay... all done.
translation: 好的……搞定。

original: Yes, cure me. Here's 50 caps.
translation: 是的，治好我。给你50瓶盖。

original: Okay. Hold still. I don't want to make this any more painful than it already is.
translation: 好吧，别动。我不想让这事变得更痛苦。

original: Yes, cure me. Here's 50 caps.
translation: 是的，治好我。给你50瓶盖。

original: I think I might be addicted to something.
translation: 我想我或许对某些东西上瘾了。

original: Hey, pipe down. We can't talk about that here, out in the open.
translation: 嘘，小点声。我们不能在公开场合谈论这个。

original: Oh, you mean you want a cure. Oh.
translation: 哦，你是说你想要脱瘾。

original: If you've seen half the things I've seen out in the Wasteland, I can't say I blame you. I might be able to help with that.
translation: 如果你在废土的见闻有我的一半，那我也不好怪你。也许我可以帮你。

original: Well, then, take two shots of whiskey and call me in the morning. Heh heh, little doctor humor. Okay, let's have a look.
translation: 好吧，先喝两杯威士忌，明早再来找我。呵呵。这是咱们医生这一行的小笑话。行了，我来瞧瞧。

original: I can't say that's something I treat all the time, but I should have something to help you through it.
translation: 你这症状和我以前治过的那些病人有点不同，不过我还是有办法帮你渡过难关的。

original: Sure. I can help you out.
translation: 当然。我可以帮你。

original: His story didn't add up.
translation: 他的说辞讲不通。

original: You didn't have any proof?
translation: 你没有任何证据吗？

original: His story didn't add up.
translation: 他的说辞讲不通。

original: You didn't have any proof?
translation: 你没有任何证据吗？

original: Her story didn't add up.
translation: 她的说辞讲不通。

original: Just a hunch.
translation: 直觉而已。

original: You didn't have any proof?
translation: 你没有任何证据？

original: We'll kill more with two of us.
translation: 我们两人联手能杀的更多。

original: Yeah. That might be true. And that's reason enough for me to take you up on it, I suppose. But this isn't gonna end well.
translation: 是，这倒是真的。光凭这个理由，我倒是能接受你的邀请，但恐怕不会有好下场。

original: Fine. Let's get out of here.
translation: 好吧。让我们离开这里。

original: Snipers work better in pairs.
translation: 两人合作可以让狙击更有战斗力。

original: Hnh. Yeah. Working on your own, you're a lot less effective. I've been there and paid for it.
translation: 嗯。对。单干确实效果不佳。我之前曾为此付出过代价。

original: But this isn't gonna end well.
translation: 但我觉得这样做也不会有什么好结果。

original: I thought snipers worked in teams.
translation: 我听说狙击手是以小队为单位。

original: What's the news?
translation: 有什么消息吗？

original: I can't imagine that deputy of theirs is worth more than a spit. I was on lookout when he got frog marched over to Bison Steve.
translation: 我真想象不出，他们的副警长居然能比一口唾沫还值钱。他被押进野牛史蒂夫旅馆的时候，我刚好就在执勤。

original: If I had a long rifle or the order I would have taken out the Powder Gangers to save him, but I didn't. His tough shit I guess.
translation: 要是当时我能有一把长枪，我早就干掉那些炸药帮，把他救出来了。可惜我没有。也算他倒霉。

original: I rescued Primm's deputy, but the town's still lawless.
translation: 我救了普瑞姆的副警长。但镇上依旧缺个领头的。

original: Yeah, I just got word of that. There's a squad of rangers standing by.
translation: 是的，我刚听说了。有一队游骑兵正在待命。

original: Sergeant McGee will take over as sheriff and the rangers will be his deputies. This town will be an NCR territory.
translation: 麦吉中士会接任警长一职，游骑兵们会辅佐他。这座镇子将会变成NCR的领土。

original: This means that aside from protection, the citizens will also need to become registered NCR citizens and pay any appropriate and associated taxes.
translation: 这也意味着在接受保护的同时，镇上居民必须登记成为NCR公民，并承担相应的纳税义务。

original: I got extra troop support for Primm.
translation: 我为普瑞姆要来了增援。

original: That ranger squad is still standing by, and McGee is anxious to take over as sheriff. Are you ready for me to make the call?
translation: 游骑兵小队还在待命，而麦吉也等着要当这个警长呢。你要让我下达命令吗？

original: I want to talk about the NCR protecting Primm.
translation: 我希望请NCR来保卫普瑞姆。

original: What are you doing out here?
translation: 你们在这干什么？

original: We were sent out here to hold back the tide of convicts from the correctional facility.
translation: 我们是来阻击从劳教所里逃出来的犯人的。

original: As you can probably tell, we aren't doing the kind of job we could be doing.
translation: 但你也看出来了，我们目前一筹莫展。

original: What are you doing out here?
translation: 你们在这干什么？

original: Do you have anything for sale?
translation: 你有什么卖的吗？

original: Sure, have a look.
translation: 当然，随便看。

original: Well, yes and no. My shop's got plenty of stock.
translation: 嗯，算有吧。我的店里货物不少。

original: Problem is I ain't going into my shop until I know it's good and safe.
translation: 但问题是，除非我的店已经安全了，否则我是不会进去的。

original: Things are pretty good with Meyers watching over us. I can give you a little bit of a discount.
translation: 有迈尔斯保护我们，一切都很顺利。我可以给你打点折扣。

original: Yep, and I got more ammunition now that the NCR keeps supplies flowing in.
translation: 是的，我手上的弹药多得很，NCR一直在往这儿送呢。

original: On the other hand I'm payin' them NCR taxes, so now you got to as well.
translation: 另一方面，我也向他们交了税。所以恐怕你得多付钱了。

original: What happened to Primm?
translation: 普瑞姆出了什么事？

original: Let's see. Been tough around here for a good while now. Worse since them thugs kidnapped our deputy.
translation: 我想想啊，本来日子就不好过，自从我们的副警长被那伙强盗绑架后，情况就变得更糟了。

original: It started with the breakout from prison up the road. First there was just a few thugs rolling through town, but then they got organized.
translation: 一切都起源于公路那头的监狱暴动。一开始只有零星的暴徒在镇子周围徘徊，后来就成组织地出没。

original: Now they call themselves Powder Gangsters or something, and run around throwing dynamite and shooting people.
translation: 现在他们自称什么炸药帮，到处丢炸药，滥杀无辜。

original: Little while ago a good chunk of them left whatever kind of organization they got up there to squeeze all the food and drink out of us they could.
translation: 不久之前，他们中有些人脱离了那个所谓的组织，开始与我们争抢食物和水。

original: What's going on in Primm?
translation: 普瑞姆最近怎样？

original: Got a new sheriff, as you know. Meyers's a bit rougher-hewn than I might've liked, but he seems like a good sort. So far, so good.
translation: 我们总算有了一位新警长。迈尔斯比我想象的要独断，但他看上去人还不错。到目前为止一切都好。

original: How's Primm these days?
translation: 最近普瑞姆怎么样？

original: I have a bunch.
translation: 我有一堆呢。

original: Is that right? Then hand 'em over and I'll get to baking a whole batch of casseroles!
translation: 是吗？那就交出来，量这么多，都可以做一道满汉全席了！

original: I have a bunch of radscorpion glands.
translation: 我有一堆辐射蝎腺体。

original: I have 3 glands.
translation: 我有3个腺体。

original: Hand 'em over and I'll get to baking!
translation: 把它们给我，我这就开始做！

original: I've got a few radscorpion glands.
translation: 我有一些辐射蝎腺体。

original: I have 1 radscorpion gland.
translation: 我有1个辐射蝎腺体。

original: One's enough to make a helping. Hand it over!
translation: 一个已经够用了。拿过来！

original: I have one radscorpion gland.
translation: 我有2个辐射蝎腺体。

original: You don't. Ever. You don't even think about it.
translation: 你永远也不可能加入，这事你就别考虑了。

original: Even if we did recruit trespassers, you're far too old for us. Your relationship to technology has already been perverted.
translation: 即便我们现在还招募外来者，你的年纪也太大了。你对科技的态度早就被外界的偏见所扭曲。

original: How do I join the Brotherhood of Steel?
translation: 我怎样才能加入钢铁兄弟会？

original: The password is "Lives to fight another day."
translation: 密码是"留得青山在"。

original: {Thinks you're from one of the lost patrols}[You hear static.]
translation: {Thinks you're from one of the lost patrols}[你听到电流声。]

original: We were getting a little worried. Where's your partner? No, on second thought, don't tell me.
translation: 我们有点担心了。你的同伴呢？不，算了，还是别告诉我了。

original: Give your report to the Elder, then have the doc look you over. Oh, and welcome back.
translation: 去向长老报告吧，医生会给你做个体检的。噢，还有，欢迎回来。

original: You bastard! Those ghouls declared me a Saint!
translation: 你这个混蛋！那些尸鬼们可是把我当成圣人的！

original: I sabotaged the rockets.
translation: 我破坏了那些火箭。

original: I suppose there was always that risk. It's just that Jason was so certain...
translation: 凡事总是有风险的。只是杰森，他一直那么有把握……

original: It was some sort of mechanical failure.
translation: 发生了某种机械故障。

original: You did {stressed}not just destroy my radio.
translation: 你不止{stressed}毁掉了我的收音机。

original: [FAILED] I'll point my rifle at anything and anyone I please to! Got that, Powder Ganger?
translation: [失败] 我爱指谁就指谁！懂了吗，炸药帮？

original: Don't point! It's rude! Especially with guns!
translation: 别指着我！这很粗鲁！尤其是用枪头指！

original: I'm not a Powder Ganger!
translation: 我不是炸药帮的！

original: Relax, son. Just pulling your leg. What can I do for you?
translation: 放轻松，孩子。我逗你玩呢。你有什么事吗？

original: I'm not a Powder Ganger!
translation: 我不是炸药帮的！

original: I'm not a Powder Ganger.
translation: 我不是炸药帮的。

original: Exactly what Powder Ganger scum would say! Any last words before I pull this trigger?
translation: 炸药帮的人渣都这么说！在我扣动扳机之前，你还有什么遗言吗？

original: Did you have anything to do with Boone's wife's disappearance?
translation: 你和布恩妻子失踪这件事有什么关联吗？

original: Believe me. When I heard the news, my first thought was, I owe somebody. Big. I figured Boone would come around after a while.
translation: 相信我。当我听见这个消息时，我第一反应是欠了某人一个人情。大人情。我以为布恩很快就能平复下来。

original: But he hasn't. And I'm starting to think that if he doesn't find her, things will never go back to the way they were.
translation: 但他没有。我开始担心，如果他找不到她，那事情永远都不可能恢复正轨了。

original: This is a message to the NCR from the Legion.
translation: 这是军团给NCR的留言。

original: We are coming for you. Run, and we will catch you. Hide, and we will find you. No matter what you do, you are all going to die.
translation: 我们来找你们了。就算躲得再远，我们都会找到你们。不管你们做什么，你们都必死无疑。

original: We took one of the women alive.
translation: 我们活捉了你们的一个女兵。

original: I need medical supplies.
translation: 我需要医疗物资。

original: I don't give my help to enemies of the NCR. Maybe you can find a raider "medic" to fix you up.
translation: 我不会帮助NCR的敌人。你可以去找个掠夺者"医生"来帮你解决问题。

original: Yeah, and I need {emph}sterile medical supplies. But let's see what I have with me.
translation: 是啊，我也需要无菌的医疗物资。你先来看看我这儿卖的东西吧。

original: Sure.
translation: 当然。

original: Hmm... well, I am better set for supplies now that you helped me out. I guess I can part with some of them.
translation: 嗯……好吧，多亏了你的帮助，我的医疗物资现在比较充足。卖一些给你也无妨。

original: Here's what I've got.
translation: 来看看我的东西吧。

original: I suppose I have a few things around that I can spare.
translation: 我想我应该可以卖一点药品给你。

original: What else do you know about the deaths at the corral?
translation: 关于双头牛离奇死亡的事件，你都知道些什么？

original: I come face to face with the chupacabra himself one night whilst I was investigating whether this gecko was hiding his treasure from me.
translation: 有一天晚上，我和那只吸血怪魔撞了个对脸，当时我正在调查蜥蜴人是否在背着我偷藏财宝。

original: He was the meanest, ugliest chupacabra you could imagine. Had two heads, and fangs down to the ground.
translation: 那可真是一只既丑陋又凶恶的吸血怪魔，长着两个头，嘴里的毒牙长到可以碰着地面。

original: Best I could tell, anyways, since when he come up to me he was invisible.
translation: 我只看清了这些，因为他撞到我之前完全是隐形的。

original: Had himself a blunderbuss what would rotate and shoot bullets real fast out of a backpack. Never seen nothing like it.
translation: 他带了一杆会旋转的长枪，可以瞬间打光背包里所有的子弹。从未见过这么厉害的武器。

original: Walked right past me having an argument with somebody.
translation: 他从我旁边走过的时候，似乎还在和别人争吵。

original: But I only saw one chupacabra, so I guess the other fella had to be invisible too. Only more invisible than the other one.
translation: 但我只看到一只吸血怪魔，所以我肯定附近还躲了一只。只是那只藏得更深。

original: What's been going on in town?
translation: 镇上有什么新鲜事儿吗？

original: There's been things of a disturbing nature going on at the McBride Corral.
translation: 麦克布莱恩的牛圈里最近常常发生怪事。

original: Seems every night one of their herd meets a most unnatural death, and always there's holes all over the body.
translation: 好像每晚都会有一只双头牛离奇死亡，而且尸体上满是窟窿。

original: Work of the chupacabra, the livestock vampire, says No-bark, but they don't pay no mind. Too many holes, they say, and there's bullets in them.
translation: 这是吸血怪魔的杰作，疯嘴知道它们是专吸牲畜血的怪物，但别人都不信。他们说，尸体上的窟窿太多了，而且还有弹头留在里面。

original: Well, says No-bark, we got a chupacabra with an automatic weapon. And that's when they get real quiet, 'cause now they see the predicament we're in.
translation: 于是疯嘴就说，这是一只会使用全自动武器的吸血怪魔。结果大家就不再说话了，因为他们都知道了现在所处的窘境。

original: Who do you think is actually at the factory?
translation: 你觉得那座工厂里面有什么？

original: Ghosts. Commie ghosts what don't know they're dead.
translation: 有鬼。连自己死了都不知道的老共鬼。

original: Hoping to steal our rockets so they can fly up and paint the moon pink and draw a Lenin face on it.
translation: 梦想着偷乘我们的火箭飞上天，把月亮涂成赤色，再把列宁的脸画在上面。

original: I seen one of them disappear and reappear before my very eyes.
translation: 我亲眼见过他们中的一个人消失之后又现身。

original: Although, being a scientist, I have to admit I might've just blinked for longer than usual, what with the shock of seeing a commie ghost and so forth.
translation: 作为一名科学家，我必须承认，这也可能是因为我看到了共产主义的幽灵，过分震惊而眨眼时间稍长所致。

original: I give up! Please don't do no harm to me, missy, leastaways not my face. All I got left is my rugged good looks. What do you want to know?
translation: 我投降！请不要伤害我，女士，至少不要打我的脸。我身上能看的就剩这张沧桑的俊脸了。你想打听什么？

original: You're going to talk whether you like it or not.
translation: 无论你喜不喜欢，你都得老实交待。

original: No one is going to attack your corral from now on.
translation: 再也不会有人来袭击你们的牲口了。

original: Well we surely appreciate what you done for us. Even without our stock, just having peace of mind means the world to us.
translation: 我们真的很感谢你为我们做的一切。虽然牲口都没了，但能安享太平，对我们来说已经是最大的福气了。

original: Take this, compliments of Alice and myself. We'd give you more if we could, knowing you risked your neck for us.
translation: 收下吧，这是爱丽丝和我的一点谢意。你为我们差点掉了脑袋，可惜我们实在没有别的东西来报答你了。

original: Did you get a look at the attacker?
translation: 你看清袭击者了吗？

original: Beg your pardon ma'am, but them two-headed beeves ain't worth getting shot over.
translation: 请原谅，女士，为了这几只双头畜牲去玩命可太不值得了。

original: Not to mention what would happen if half of what No-bark says is true.
translation: 更何况，要是疯嘴说的那些话有一半是真的，那就太可怕了。

original: Best we can hope is that whoever's doing this'll move on, or get tired of it. I just hope it happens while we still got animals left.
translation: 我们顶多也只能希望袭击者能尽早离开，或者哪天杀腻了。希望那时候咱们还能有几头牲口剩下。

original: Whoever it is, I don't think they're from around town. Seems like they've taken to shooting from the west side.
translation: 不管凶手是谁，我想应该不是这镇上的人。他们好像是从西边开的枪。

original: How did you end up trapped down here?
translation: 你是怎么被困在这儿的？

original: First off, I'm not trapped. This was a tactical choice, all right?
translation: 首先，我没有被困在这儿。这叫战术，好吗？

original: I'm no match for those things out there, so I found a good defensive position, and I've been defending it, right?
translation: 好汉架不住人多，所以我找了个不错的制高点，然后进行防御，懂不？

original: ...Aw, who am I fooling? I'm trapped. Name's Harland. Pleased to meet you.
translation: ……唉，我骗谁呢？我确实被困在这儿了。我叫哈兰。幸会。

original: What happened was, I was escorting folks down to work when those things attacked us.
translation: 其实是这样的，我本来是要护送一些人下去干活，结果这些家伙突然袭击了我们。

original: Most of the fight was upstairs, but some folks panicked and made for the basement. And I went after them.
translation: 大部分战斗都是在楼上发生的，但有一些人慌了神，逃到了地下室。我就跟了过来。

original: Well, turns out there were even more of those bastards down here than upstairs, and things went to shit fast.
translation: 没想到下面的狗杂种比上面还多，接着情况就迅速恶化了。

original: I couldn't find the others, so I fell back to this room and set up a nice little kill zone. End of story.
translation: 我和其他人失散了，于是我就退到了这间屋子里，设下一个小小的陷阱，就是这样了。

original: You don't look like the other ghouls from Bright's group.
translation: 你跟辐光那伙尸鬼看着不太像啊。

original: Guess the outfit gives that away, huh? I never did buy into that religious mumbo-jumbo with the robes and all that shit.
translation: 是我这身行头让你有这样的感觉吧？我从来都不信他们那一套什么狗屁教义。

original: It gets lonely out in the wastes, okay? And I don't have to tell you that Bright's group has got some fine-looking ghoulettes in it!
translation: 但人在废土哪儿能没有伴儿呢，对吧？不用我说你也能想到，辐光的集团里还真有几个漂亮姑娘！

original: Eh... or maybe I would have to tell you...
translation: 呃……估计你也不太能理解……

original: Anyway, I helped them out, and they kept me supplied with ammo and pleasant company.
translation: 总之，我给他们帮忙，他们给我弹药补给，还提供欢乐和我相伴。还有美女作陪。

original: Yes, that's the stuff. And the container's shielding must be intact, or you'd be dead by now.
translation: 是的，就是这个。罐子的防护层应该还完好，否则你早就玩完了。

original: You already brought me the thrust control modules, so all that's needed now is three boxes of Sugar Bombs.
translation: 你把推进力控制模块带来了，所以现在就只差三盒甜麦炮弹。

original: I found an entire container of the igniting agent.
translation: 我找到了一整罐推进剂。

original: Yes, that's the stuff. And the container's shielding must be intact, or you'd be dead by now.
translation: 是的，就是这个。罐子的防护层应该还完好，否则你早就玩完了。

original: Now all I need is the thrust control modules and three boxes of Sugar Bombs.
translation: 我现在就只差推进力控制模块和三盒甜麦炮弹了。

original: I found an entire container of the igniting agent.
translation: 我找到了一整罐推进剂。

original: Well, you can call Beagle a deputy so long as you don't harbor too high an opinion of the word.
translation: 呵，你可以将比格尔称作副警长，不过建议你还是别太把这个头衔当回事。

original: Boy was 'bout as useful as tits on a radscorpion. Only qualification he ever had was to be brother to the wife of the sheriff.
translation: 那小子就和辐射蝎身上的乳头一样没用。他能当上副警长，全凭他是前任警长的小舅子。

original: Still, I s'pose he don't deserve what's befell him. We would've considered paying the ransom, if we'd had caps to spare.
translation: 但就算这样，我觉得他也不该遭这份罪。我们要是有钱的话，还是会考虑赎他出来的。

original: You say Powder Gangers kidnapped Primm's deputy?
translation: 你说炸药帮绑架了普瑞姆的副警长？

original: Simple! Up until now, we committed our crimes stealthily, leaving no evidence behind. So we never built a rep.
translation: 很简单！因为迄今为止，我们做的坏事都很隐蔽，从未留下过任何蛛丝马迹。所以我们当然没有名气啦。

original: But that's gonna change with our next score. You just wait and see.
translation: 但只要干完这一票，我们就会名扬天下。你等着瞧吧。

original: You sound pretty tough. I wonder why I've never heard of you.
translation: 听起来很厉害。可我为什么从没听说过你们呢。

original: Oh, no! I'm just the deputy. And I can't be a deputy without a sheriff. It's called chain of command!
translation: 不是那样的！我只是副职，如果没有警长的话，我这副职也只是个虚位。这就叫管理体系 !

original: What are you talking about? You're the sheriff now!
translation: 你在说什么呢？现在你就是警长了！

original: {Edited Line}My problem is that I'm no longer a deputy. I'm just a Beagle now.
translation: {Edited Line}问题就是我不再是副警长了，我现在只是比格尔。

original: Apparently two-and-a-half months of law enforcement experience doesn't count for anything. The new regime is just that - all new.
translation: 显然我这两个半月的执法经历一文不值。现在新的老大来了——所有规矩都变了。

original: He's rude. Don't tell him I said it. Primm has a sheriff now, just not as supportive as I would've hoped.
translation: 他是个粗人——可别说是我说的。普瑞姆现在是有了一个新警长，只不过和我预期中的有些偏差。

original: What's your problem now?
translation: 你又有什么问题？

original: {Edited Line}My problem is that I'm no longer a deputy. I'm just a Beagle now.
translation: {Edited Line}问题就是我不再是副警长了，我现在只是比格尔。

original: Apparently two-and-a-half months of law enforcement experience doesn't count for anything. The new regime is just that: all new.
translation: 显然我这两个半月的执法经历一文不值。现在新的老大来了——所有规矩都变了。

original: He's a good sheriff but a hard man. He doesn't abide by anyone slinking by the rules. I guess there won't be any trouble, but the man's law is hard.
translation: 他是个好警长，但对人太苛刻了。哪怕是最轻微的违法行为他都不能容忍。虽然我觉得这没什么问题，但他这人也太严厉了。

original: What's your problem now?
translation: 你又有什么问题？

original: {Edited Line}My problem is that I'm no longer a deputy. I'm just a Beagle now.
translation: {Edited Line}问题就是我不再是副警长了，我现在只是比格尔。

original: Slim is alright, I don't wish him no harm, but the law to him is a set of logic.
translation: 斯利姆小子干得还不错，我不是有意要埋汰他，但法律对它来说只不过是一套程序。

original: Not everything is black and white, not sure a robot can ever understand that.
translation: 这世上的事情可不全是非黑即白那么简单，我觉得一个机器人是理解不了的。

original: What's your problem now?
translation: 你又有什么问题？

original: Chris said you might know where I can find computer parts.
translation: 克里斯说你知道哪儿能找到电脑配件。

original: He did, did he? I swear, I should tear the rest of the hair out of that cocksucker's head.
translation: 他告诉你的？我发誓，回去后我一定要把那个王八蛋脑袋上仅剩的几根毛全都拔光。

original: Send a rescue mission after Harland? Nah, let's just send some smoothskin whose radio got broke!
translation: 派个救援小队救哈兰？不用，派个没带对讲机的滑皮肤下去就行了！

original: Harland's tough! He probably enjoys waiting to be attacked at any moment! He probably loves eating nothing but roach meat!
translation: 哈兰厉害得很！没准他就是喜欢莫名其妙挨枪子！没准他就是喜欢吃蟑螂肉！

original: Licking up condensation from a rusted pipe is his idea of fun! So's doing business in a corner, and smelling it for days!
translation: 舔锈管子滴下来的水，只有这样才能让他快乐！所以他才守着那个小角落，一蹲就是好几天！

original: But oh, that's right - the crisis is that you need some computer parts! Well, you can go fuck yourself until you get my friends out of this mess.
translation: 不过，哦，对——真正要紧的是你需要的那些电脑配件！很好，除非你把我的朋友全都带出这个鬼地方，否则就去你的吧！

original: Yes, I'm sure.
translation: 是的，我确定。

original: All right. Guess I'll be around Novac for a while longer, until I figure out what I want to do with myself. See you around.
translation: 好吧。我估计会回诺瓦克待一段时间，想清楚自己究竟该干什么。再见。

original: Yeah, that's what I think. You should head back home.
translation: 是，我是这么想的。你应该回家去。

original: That's why you're the boss. You always make the right decisions. I'll just head home. Home to my lonely, abandoned shack in the middle of nowhere.
translation: 所以你才能当老大啊，你的决定永远正确，我马上就回家，回我那风雨飘摇的小破屋去。

original: I think it's for the best.
translation: 我认为这是最好的方法。

original: Okay. Then I guess I'll be back at the 188. Maybe digging in some dirt for scrap metal or something.
translation: 好的。我想我会回188号贸易站的。也许还会在那儿挖点废旧金属呢。

original: I just think we should right now.
translation: 我认为我们现在就该这样做。

original: {Confirmation Beep}<Makes beeping sounds>
translation: {Confirmation Beep}<发出哔哔声>

original: <Companion Protocol::End Companion Protocol>
translation: <同伴协议::结束同伴协定>

original: I'll head back to the Old Mormon Fort. If you need me, just swing by.
translation: 我会回旧摩门教要塞的。如果你需要，随时都可以来找我。

original: {whimper}<whimper>
translation: {whimper}<呜咽>

original: {Slight sass, told to leave}Fine then.
translation: {Slight sass，told to leave}好吧。

original: {Slight sass, told to leave}I'll get out of your hair, then.
translation: {Slight sass，told to leave}那么我马上离你远远的。

original: All right, then, dearie. Now you promise to come visit {gramma}grandma soon, you hear?
translation: 好的，亲爱的，答应我要经常来看看{gramma}奶奶哦，听见了吗？

original: I'll miss you too, Lily, but it's time.
translation: 我也会想你的，莉莉，但是时候到了。

original: Do it.
translation: 来吧。

original: Okay. And remember, if this doesn't help, try taking a bath in tomato juice.
translation: 好的。记住，如果没用，那就用番茄汁洗澡。

original: Here's your 100 caps. Do it.
translation: 这是100个瓶盖，来吧。

original: Okay... all done.
translation: 好……搞定了。

original: Here's your 100 caps. Do it.
translation: 这是100个瓶盖，来吧。

original: Just stand still and try to ignore the tingling.
translation: 站着别动就行了，如果感觉刺痛也不要理睬。

original: Here's your 100 caps. Do it.
translation: 这是100个瓶盖，来吧。

original: This might tickle a little. Or it might cause searing, agonizing pain to shoot through your body. You never know.
translation: 可能会有点发痒，也可能会产生烧灼感，甚至可能会有深入骨髓的剧痛。很难讲。

original: Here's your 100 caps. Do it.
translation: 这是100个瓶盖，来吧。

original: Then I can't help you. Sorry.
translation: 那我帮不了你。对不起。

original: I don't have 100 caps.
translation: 我没有100个瓶盖。

original: And a quick shot... all done.
translation: 再来一针...全部完成。

original: Here's your 100 caps. Do it.
translation: 这是100个瓶盖，来吧。

original: Here we go. You'll be rad-free in no time.
translation: 好的，很快你就不用再忍受辐射了。

original: Here's your 100 caps. Do it.
translation: 这是100个瓶盖，来吧。

original: Can you heal my radiation?
translation: 你能治疗我的辐射吗？

original: I don't give my help to enemies of the NCR. Maybe you can find a raider "medic" to fix you up.
translation: 我不会帮助NCR的敌人。你可以去找个掠夺者赤脚"医生"来帮你解决问题。

original: Are you sure? You won't be able to read in the dark as well.
translation: 你当真吗？那样你以后就不能在躲在暗处看书了哦。

original: Sure. I can help you out.
translation: 当然。我能帮你。

original: Well, one thing we do have is a good supply of RadAway. Sure, I can help you with that.
translation: 好吧，好消息是，我们的辐特宁还算充足。当然，我可以帮你。

original: No, sorry, we're totally unprepared to deal with radiation sickness.
translation: 抱歉，我们没有处理辐射病的经验。

original: Ha ha, just kidding, of course I can!
translation: 哈哈，开个玩笑，我当然能！

original: We always make sure to keep an ample supply of RadAway. Most of us haven't had the exposure outsiders like you take for granted.
translation: 我们总是会尽量保证辐特宁的储备充足。毕竟对你们外来者辐射是家常便饭，对我们可不同。

original: Sure can. Quick and easy.
translation: 当然能。很快就好。

original: I killed Jeannie May. Do I still get my discount?
translation: 我杀了珍妮·梅。我还有折扣吗？

original: Ki- killed her? Why would you do something like that?
translation: 杀、杀了她？你为什么要这么做？

original: What do you think of the people who live here?
translation: 你觉得住这儿的人都怎么样？

original: Oh, we keep to ourselves, for the most part. Try not to pry. I think Jeannie May gets bothered that we aren't more sociable, but it's just our way.
translation: 哦，我们很少与人来往，也不爱打探别人的私事。估计珍妮·梅也因为我们不爱社交而大伤脑筋，可我们就习惯这样过日子。

original: Ain't that we don't appreciate what she's done, managing this town like she has, but I worry she feels that way anyhow.
translation: 倒不是说我们不感激她，毕竟她花了那么大功夫打理这个镇子，可我还是担心她误解我们。

original: Not that there ain't others who pry around here. That No-bark was skulking around our yard last week.
translation: 当然，爱打探的人也是有的。上个礼拜疯嘴就想溜进我们的农场来着。

original: <Laughs> I thought he was our cow-killer. Was about to lash him with our bullwhip till I saw who it was. He's harmless, though.
translation: <大笑> 我以为他就是那个杀牛的凶手。正打算用鞭子抽他，然后才看清楚是谁。他这人没什么危险。

original: Part of me wishes I could see things like he sees 'em, all full of mystery.
translation: 其实我还挺羡慕他那种处世的态度，看什么都充满了神秘感。

original: I just wanted to meet you.
translation: 我只是想见见你。

original: We set up this ranch years back when Novac was just getting settled.
translation: 诺瓦克刚开始有人定居的时候，我们就建了这个农场。

original: But now with all the danger on I-15, folks are starting to come through here from all over. Novac might just be the next Nevada boom town.
translation: 可现在15号州际公路不太平了，于是四面八方的人都开始从这儿经过。说不定诺瓦克会成为内华达的下一个新兴城市。

original: Have you lived here a long time?
translation: 你在这生活了很久了吧？

original: I have some Stealth Boys. I could give them to you.
translation: 我有些隐身小子。我可以给你。

original: Antler brings us here for hundreds of Stealth Boys, human. Antler thinks big. Antler IS big.
translation: 鹿角带我们来，是因为这儿的隐身小子多如牛毛，人类。鹿角高瞻远瞩。鹿角很伟大。

original: Antler don't bring us here for Stealth Boys some puny human carry. Pull head out of your ass.
translation: 鹿角带我们来，才不是为了你这个软弱的人类身上那几个隐身小子。别自作聪明了。

original: PC says what he's doing here.
translation: 电脑说它在这干嘛。

original: A stash of Stealth Boys. Are you kidding me?
translation: 藏在这里的隐身小子。你是在逗我吗？

original: If there was some big stash of devices in here that made you invisible, do you really think we'd be having this conversation?
translation: 要是这里真藏了一大堆能让人隐身的仪器，你真觉得我们还会有这次对话？

original: I'm looking for a stash of Stealth Boys in this room.
translation: 我在找藏在这间屋子里的隐身小子。

original: I understand your concerns, friend, and I thank you for voicing them. But the creator's will for us has been made manifest.
translation: 我理解你的担忧，我的朋友，我也感谢你能诚恳地指出来。但造物主的意愿已经彰显。

original: Are these surface-to-surface rockets? Or will they launch you into orbit?
translation: 这些是地对地火箭？还是会把你们送进轨道？

original: I understand your concerns, friend, and I thank you for voicing them. But the creator's will for us has been made manifest.
translation: 我理解你的担忧，我的朋友，我也感谢你能诚恳地指出来。但是造物主的意愿已经彰显。

original: Those rockets will convey you and your flock straight into the ground!
translation: 这些火箭会带着你和你的人直接撞向地面！

original: I am Jason Bright, the prophet of the Great Journey. All the ghouls you see here are members of my flock.
translation: 我是辐光杰森，是伟大旅程的领路人。这里所有的尸鬼，都是我的徒众。

original: Who are you?
translation: 你是谁？

original: But to Chris, we owe more than thanks. Chris, you have made this Great Journey a reality.
translation: 至于克里斯对我们之恩情，更是无以言谢。克里斯，是你，将这伟大旅程从预言变为了现实。

original: To our new friend, we say thanks, and promise never to forget how he cleared from our path the demons who sought to stay our Journey.
translation: 对我们的新朋友，我们由衷感谢，他为我们驱逐了妄图阻碍旅程的魔鬼，打开了前往光明的通路，此等义举，我们必定铭记在心。

original: My specialty is a radscorpion venom casserole. It's more appetizing than it sounds!
translation: 我的看家绝活是毒液蝎煲。可别被这名字吓到，它比听上去要美味多了！

original: The venom has a sharp, smokey flavor, and it numbs your mouth so fierce you'll forget you ever had a tongue!
translation: 这种蝎毒的味道相当浓烈，只要一入口，能麻得你连舌头都失去知觉！

original: It's perfectly safe, long as you don't have sores in your mouth for the venom to find your blood. 'Cause that'll kill you dead.
translation: 你完全可以放心食用，除非你的嘴巴里有溃疡，那样毒液会渗入你的血液，然后你就嗝屁了。

original: What do you cook?
translation: 你都会做什么菜？

original: Okay, we have some soldiers heading to town now. I'll have them sweep the Bison Steve before they start regular patrols.
translation: 好吧，我们有一部分士兵正在向镇子进发。我会让他们先肃清野牛史蒂夫旅馆里的敌人，再开始日常巡逻。

original: You pay me a stack of caps right now and I'll forget you have my job.
translation: 你给我一些瓶盖，我就会忘了你抢我饭碗这件事了。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Aw, man. How am I supposed to buy chems now? Fine. Here.
translation: [成功] 哦，伙计。那我以后该拿什么来买药品呢？好吧，给你。

original: [FAILED] Ha! You had me going for a second there. Then I remembered that there's only one Fantastic. I'm king of this dump.
translation: [失败] 哈！你差点耍了我。还好我想起来，这儿只有一个珍世邦。我才是这个垃圾堆里的王者。

original: How did you get this job?
translation: 你怎么搞到这份工作的？

original: It was easy, man. They were going door to door asking if anyone knew any scientists. I said look no further.
translation: 完全不费功夫，伙计。他们挨家挨户地问有没有人认识科学家。我就说，远在天边，近在眼前。

original: They asked me if I knew anything about power plants. I said as much as anyone I had ever met.
translation: 他们问我懂不懂得发电站的运作。我说和其他人懂得一样多。

original: They asked me how well I understood theoretical physics. I said I had a theoretical degree in physics. They said welcome aboard.
translation: 他们问我有多少理论物理知识。我就说我在物理学上确实获得了一个理论上的学位。于是他们就把我招来了。

original: I am now.
translation: 我这就去。

original: Well hey, if you find yourself up at the mainframe, do yourself a favor and make sure you send the power to the right place.
translation: 好吧，嘿，等你到了主控室，可得好好记着，你必须把电力送到正确的地方。

original: It needs to go to the Strip and McCarran.
translation: 这两个地方分别是麦卡伦空军基地和长街。

original: How would someone retarget the mirrors?
translation: 我该怎么重新定位这些镜子？

original: There's these two terminals outside. They control the mirrors. I tried fooling with them but didn't get very far.
translation: 外面有两台终端，专门控制这些镜子。我试着捣鼓了一下，但还是弄不大懂。

original: You'd have to get them to talk to the mainframe up in the tower, then do the rest from up there. I'm guessing. But it sounds good, right?
translation: 你必须把它们接到塔顶的主机上，然后再到最顶上进行操作。我是这样猜的，不过应该没猜错吧？

original: Hey, you're not thinking about going up there, are you?
translation: 嘿，你该不会是想上塔顶去吧？

original: What exactly do you do?
translation: 你到底是干什么的？

original: Fuck, man. Everything. I push buttons. I turn dials. I read numbers. Sometimes I make up little stories in my head about what the numbers mean.
translation: 见鬼，老兄。我什么都干，我负责按按钮，拨转盘，读数。有时候我还会胡思乱想这些数字的含义。

original: Like one time I imagined they were a code to get into a vault full of naked women. Man, how cool would that be?
translation: 比如有一次我就想象这些数字是通往某座避难所的密码，而里面全都是裸女。老兄，够酷吧？

original: <Lie> You're in trouble - the NCR is sending a battalion to take this place back.
translation: <撒谎]你有麻烦了——NCR派出了一个营的兵力要拿下这个地方。

original: Player turns the deputy loose
translation: 让代表放松下来。

original: Oh, that's just marvelous. I think I'll be making my way outside now. The air's a little close in here.
translation: 哦，太好了。我马上就到外面去，这儿的空气有些压抑。

original: I'll set you free now.
translation: 我现在就放了你。

original: Okay then, let's talk about something else.
translation: 好吧，那我们来谈点别的。

original: Did you know that Vance's gun is missing?
translation: 你们知道万斯的枪丢了么？

original: Just mosey on over to the display case and you'll see it plain as day. Quite a piece, that gun. Mint condition. Never fired.
translation: 请移步展厅，你会发现它仍完好如初地躺在陈列箱里。纹丝未动。整洁优雅。

original: Did you know that Vance's gun is missing?
translation: 你们知道万斯的枪丢了么？

original: Tell me about the Vikki and Vance.
translation: 和我说说维姬与万斯的故事.

original: Tell me about Primm.
translation: 和我说说普瑞姆吧。

original: I convinced Pauline that you shouldn't go through with this.
translation: 我已经说服了宝琳，她也觉得应该收手。

original: Really? Oh, thank god! I love that woman, but I swear this time she was gonna get us killed!
translation: 真的？哦，感谢上帝！我爱那女人，但她这一次真的差点害死我们！

original: The gun's in the safe. The combination's 05-23-34. Take it far away from here, before she changes her mind.
translation: 枪在保险箱里。密码是05-23-34。在她改变主意之前，带着枪赶紧走吧。

original: Pauline says you should give me the gun.
translation: 宝琳说你应该把枪给我。

original: Charm Pauline into Rethinking their plan.
translation: 吸引波淋以让他重新考虑他们的计划。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Really? You think so? We've only got the one gun, and there's two of us... and we've never done anything like this before...
translation: [成功] 真的吗？你也这么想？我们两个人，却只有一把枪……我们以前从没做过这种事……

original: We've never been on the Strip, either, so we don't know how many guards the casinos have. And I kept having these nightmares...
translation: 我们也从未进过长街，所以根本不知道那里的赌场有多少守卫。而且最近我还一直做噩梦……

original: What are we thinking? We're gonna get ourselves killed!
translation: 我们都在想什么呢？这根本就是送死嘛！

original: Look, tell Sammy to give you the gun, all right? Just take it! I don't want it around, tempting us to do something stupid!
translation: 听着，你去让萨米把枪交给你吧，行吗？拿走吧！我不想再看见它了，老是诱惑我们干蠢事！

original: That's the greatest plan I've ever heard in my entire life.
translation: 这是我这辈子听过的最伟大的计划。

original: Shouldn't there be more people than this defending a power plant?
translation: 难道不该多派一些人留守保护这座电站吗？

original: There should. But we're not getting much power out of it so none of our enemies have big interest in it either. Not like Hoover Dam, anyway.
translation: 理应如此。可我们也没从这里获得多少电力，所以敌人对此不感兴趣。毕竟这儿不是胡佛水坝。

original: We had a real fighting force here just long enough to take it from the Brotherhood of Steel. Then they got sent east to the dam like everybody else.
translation: 我们确实是有在此布下过重兵，可将钢铁兄弟会赶跑后，那些士兵就和其他人一样，都被派去保卫东边的水坝了。

original: Caesar's Legion sends skirmishers every so often. Prodding for weaknesses, mostly. The reality is, if they really wanted it, we'd all be dead.
translation: 凯撒军团时不时会派些散兵来骚扰。不过大多是来侦察的。要是他们真想拿下这个电站，那我们恐怕早都死光了。

original: <Lie> I heard my brother was stationed here. I want to know he's okay.
translation: <撒谎> 我听说我哥哥也驻扎在这里，我想知道他最近还好吗.

original: I notice your solar tower isn't collecting much sunlight. I can help.
translation: 我注意到你们的太阳能塔采光不是很好。我可以帮忙。

original: No need. We already have an expert hard at work on it.
translation: 不需要。我们已经有一位专家在里面工作了。

original: Then again... our expert is an idiot. Hell, he might as well be a saboteur. I guess you couldn't do any worse.
translation: 不过……我们的专家是个白痴。该死，说他是来搞破坏的都不为过。我猜你应该会比他强点儿吧。

original: Have him fill you in on the details. He's in the back of the building. You'll know him when you see him.
translation: 去找他问问相关细节吧。他就在这桩建筑物里，你见到他就知道了。

original: Keeps his sunglasses on all the time, even when he's sleeping.
translation: 他总是戴着一副太阳镜，就连睡觉的时候也不例外。真是个白痴。

original: <Attack> I'm taking over.
translation: <攻击] 我要接管这里。

original: We've held off tougher enemies than you.
translation: 比你强的敌人我们可见得多了。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Your being here is a start, soldier. We aren't exactly overflowing with troopers here.
translation: [成功] 你来得正是时候，士兵。我们这边正缺人手。

original: But if you really want to help us, talk to the idiot with sunglasses in the back of the plant building.
translation: 既然你真想帮我们，就去里头找那个戴太阳镜的白痴谈谈吧。

original: He's been trying to get this place running for months and hasn't made any forward progress.
translation: 这几个月他一直想让电站运作起来，却始终毫无进展。

original: <Lie> I'm with the NCR. Anything I can do to help?
translation: <撒谎>我支持NCR。有什么我能帮忙的吗？

original: [FAILED] That uniform's got an awful lot of blood on it, soldier, and you don't look injured to me. Doesn't fit you so well either.
translation: [失败] 你这身制服沾满了血迹，但你这样子可不像是受了伤。而且你这身衣服也不大合身。

original: You're trying to put one over on the wrong trooper.
translation: 想蒙混过关，可惜你找错人了。

original: I'm with the NCR. Anything I can do to help?
translation: 我支持NCR。有什么我能帮忙的吗？

original: Peace.
translation: 和平。

original: That's reassuring, although many who've made that claim to the Followers of the Apocalypse over the years have had less than pure intentions.
translation: 那就好，不过这话我们天启追随者也听过无数次了，通常说这种话的人都没安好心。

original: But if it's really as you say, then take my advice. This installation carries with it dangers that no one here has realized.
translation: 如果你真有这份心，那听我一句劝吧。这座电站里潜藏的危险是任何人都无法想象的。

original: Take care what you do here, and who you listen to. Some things are best left buried with the old world.
translation: 在这儿可得千万小心，无论你做什么，或是听谁的。有些东西，还是让它永远尘封于历史之中吧。

original: That's reassuring, although many who've made that claim to the Followers of the Apocalypse over the years have had less than pure intentions.
translation: 那就好，不过这话我们天启追随者也听过无数次了，通常说这种话的人都没安好心。

original: But if it's really as you say, then take my advice. This installation carries with it dangers that no one here has realized.
translation: 如果你真有这份心，那听我一句劝吧。这座电站里潜藏的危险是任何人都无法想象的。

original: Take care what you do here, and who you listen to. Some things are best left buried with the old world.
translation: 在这儿可得千万小心，无论你做什么，或是听谁的。有些东西，还是让它永远尘封于历史之中吧。

original: I want what you want.
translation: 我和你的目标一致。

original: That's reassuring, although many who've made that claim to the Followers of the Apocalypse over the years have had less than pure intentions.
translation: 那就好，不过这话我们天启追随者也听过无数次了，通常说这种话的人都没安好心。

original: But if it's really as you say, then take my advice. This installation carries with it dangers that no one here has realized.
translation: 如果你真有这份心，那听我一句劝吧。这座电站里潜藏的危险是任何人都无法想象的。

original: Take care what you do here, and who you listen to. Some things are best left buried with the old world.
translation: 在这儿可得千万小心，无论你做什么，或是听谁的。有些东西，还是让它永远尘封于历史之中吧。

original: My only true allegiance is to myself.
translation: 我不偏袒任何一方。

original: Then for everyone's sake, I hope you serve a worthy master. Are you a maker of war, or peace?
translation: 那么看在所有人的份上，拜托你还是去找个有名望的主子吧。你是期望战争，还是和平呢？

original: I'm in the Brotherhood of Steel.
translation: 我是钢铁兄弟会的人。

original: The Brotherhood? I never thought I'd say it, but I'm glad you're here.
translation: 兄弟会？真是稀客啊，很高兴见到你。

original: I'm a member of the Followers of the Apocalypse, and for once, we might want the same thing.
translation: 我是天启追随者的成员，也许这次我们站在一条船上了呢。

original: This place houses technology beyond anything I've seen. I'm afraid it could be dangerous if either of the warring factions here learns how to use it.
translation: 这里隐藏着我前所未见的科技。要是被交战中任意一方掌握，那可就太危险了。

original: The Brotherhood? I never thought I'd say it, but I'm glad you're here. For once, our organizations may want the same thing.
translation: 兄弟会？真是稀客啊，很高兴见到你。搞不好这次我们的目标是一致的。

original: This place houses technology beyond anything I've seen. I'm afraid it could be dangerous if either of the warring factions here learns how to use it.
translation: 这里隐藏着我前所未见的科技。万一被交战中任意一方掌握，那可就太危险了。

original: I serve Caesar.
translation: 我为凯撒效力。

original: I'm with the NCR.
translation: 我是NCR的人。

original: This is your turf. For all I know you could have me killed for my allegiance. Who are you with?
translation: 这儿是你的地盘，我知道，要是我说出支持哪方，你肯定会把我害死。所以，你站在哪边？

original: [SUCCEEDED] Very well. Yes. I'm part of the Followers of the Apocalypse.
translation: [成功] 好吧。呃，我是天启追随者的成员。

original: If you're not familiar, we seek peace and the spread of knowledge. Knowledge that must never be lost to the world.
translation: 我稍微介绍一下吧，我们的组织向往和平，传播知识。这个世界决不能没有知识。

original: Now your turn.
translation: 轮到你了。

original: {edited line}Well I guess you're gonna have to find us a new lawman.
translation: {edited line}我觉得你应该为我们找个新的执法者。

original: I suggest talking to those NCR troopers across the bridge. I also overheard the Powder Gangsters talking about some ex-sheriff on lockdown there.
translation: 我建议你去和桥对面的NCR部队谈谈。我还听炸药帮提起某个前任的警长也被关在那里。

original: Your deputy died in Bison Steve.
translation: 你们的副警长死在了野牛史蒂夫旅馆。

original: Right now Beagle is the closest Primm's got to any organized law, but he's still stuck up in Bison Steve.
translation: 目前能够胜任执法官角色的也就只有比格尔了，但是他还被关在野牛史蒂夫旅馆。

original: First thing I'd say is get his sorry butt outta there.
translation: 要我说第一件事还是先把那个倒霉蛋从那儿救出来吧。

original: What can I do to help Primm?
translation: 有什么我能为普瑞姆做的吗？

original: That's where we are. This here little casino brought some cash and bodies into the town before them Powder Gangsters came in.
translation: 是我们现在待的地方。这个小赌场不仅给我们带来了财运，也带来了人气，可惜现在冒出了个炸药帮。

original: They can't rush us without eating a good bit of hot lead, but we are in a kind of box canyon. Guess this is a fitting place for that as any.
translation: 他们要是敢闯进来，估计得吃好一顿枪子，但我们也差不多是瓮中之鳖。我猜也没有比这儿更合适的容身之地了。

original: I reckon that if they thought hard enough about it, they'd realize they got more bodies than we have bullets, but for now we're safe enough in here.
translation: 我思量着要是他们仔细琢磨的话，就会发现实际上他们的人数比我们的子弹还多，但就目前来说，我们还算安全。

original: What's at Vikki and Vance?
translation: 维姬与万斯赌场是什么？

original: Do all of the brothers use this equipment?
translation: 所有的兄弟们都用这套装备？

original: Everyone in the base has to spend a minimum of five hours a week running tactical simulations, but outside that, interest is scarce.
translation: 基地里的每个人每周至少要花五个小时进行战术模拟，不过除此之外，也没多少人会对这个感兴趣。

original: It wasn't always this way. When we first moved into the bunker, everyone was so excited that the VR systems were intact.
translation: 以前可不是这样的。我们刚进驻地堡时，模拟训练系统运转良好，每个人都跃跃欲试。

original: Over time, though, my fellows have become listless and less entertained by the wonders of technology around us.
translation: 不过，一段时间后，伙伴们就对这里的各种科技失去了兴致，变得无精打采了。

original: That's why Apprentice Watkins is such a joy to work with. Her unbridled enthusiasm for virtual combat is unparalleled.
translation: 所以我才会如此高兴能与学徒沃特金斯一块儿共事。她对模拟战斗似乎有着无限的热情。

original: That explains why there's been no sit-rep from Sergeant Lee.
translation: 难怪李中士一直没有向我报告情况。

original: It took months to get authorization for that assault. It'll be a long time before we take on the Powder Gangers again.
translation: 这次行动花了好几个月才获得上级批准。估计下次对付炸药帮又得等到猴年马月了。

original: The attack on the prison was a failure.
translation: 对监狱的进攻很成功。

original: Anything's better than staying here. Let's go.
translation: 总比留在这儿强。我们走吧。

original: Actually, do you want to tag along with me?
translation: 说实话，你想不想跟我一块儿走？

original: Sorry boss, but as much as I'd like to risk getting killed by your side, you seem to already have some help.
translation: 抱歉，老大。我可不想死在你旁边，再说你看起来不是已经有帮手了嘛。

original: Actually, do you want to tag along with me?
translation: 说实话，你想不想跟我一块儿走？

original: You got the caps, I got the skills.
translation: 只要你有瓶盖，我就有技术。

original: Can you repair some of my stuff?
translation: 你能修好我的东西吗？

original: It would be safer to run and find someplace to hide.
translation: 你们找个地方躲起来会更安全。

original: Maybe you're right. Come on, boys, let's get the hell out of here before the law shows up.
translation: 你说得对。来吧，伙计们，趁着条子还没来，我们赶紧离开这鬼地方。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Please do not make your way to the 2nd floor.
translation: [成功] 请不要上二楼。

original: I am not supposed to go upstairs, let me pass and I won't.
translation: 我没想过要上楼，让我过去。

original: [FAILED] Unauthorized access. You have 30 seconds to vacate before security is alerted.
translation: [失败] 非法闯入。在警报拉响之前，你有三十秒时间离开。

original: I've worked here for years. I forgot my badge at home.
translation: 我在这里已经工作了很多年。我把身份牌忘在家里了。

original: Show me what you have for sale.
translation: 让我看看你都卖些什么。

original: Sure, no problem.
translation: 当然，没问题。

original: Let's do it.
translation: 我们开始吧。

original: Here's the plan. The gate to Tabitha's compound is guarded by several Nightkin, all of them using devices that make them invisible.
translation: 计划是这样的。塔比瑟的院子大门由几个夜行族把守，他们全都使用了隐身装置，所以你看不到他们。

original: I'm going to draw them away from the gate by telling them I spotted an intruder in the village. Then you slip in.
translation: 我会骗他们说村子里有入侵者，好把他们引开，你就趁机溜进去。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Thank you, sir. Have a nice day.
translation: [成功] 谢谢你，先生。祝你一天愉快。

original: ICE CREAM!
translation: 冰激凌！

original: [SUCCEEDED] Thank you, ma'am. Have a nice day.
translation: [成功] 谢谢你，女士。祝你一天愉快。

original: ICE CREAM!
translation: 冰激凌！

original: [SUCCEEDED] Thank you, ma'am. Have a nice day.
translation: [成功] 谢谢你，女士。祝你一天愉快。

original: Ice Cream.
translation: 冰激凌。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Thank you, sir. Have a nice day.
translation: [成功] 谢谢你，先生。祝你一天愉快。

original: Ice Cream.
translation: 冰激凌。

original: [FAILED] No maintenance service request logged. Intruder alert!
translation: [失败] 未发现维修申请记录。入侵者警报！

original: I'm here to fix the broken wall.
translation: 我是来修理坏掉的墙壁的。

original: Tell me about RobCo.
translation: 和我说说罗科。

original: RobCo Industries purchased REPCONN in 2075 to assist with some of RobCo's military projects, as well as developing unmanned space exploration.
translation: 罗科工业在2075年收购了瑞普康，以协助军方开展相关项目及无人太空探索的研究。

original: The relationship between RobCo and REPCONN is mutually beneficial, and we hope that both companies bolster each other well into the next century.
translation: 罗科与瑞普康的合作本着平等互利的原则，我们希望两个公司能够携手走向下个世纪。

original: And in front of me is a model - not actual size - of the launch dome we are using to send our rockets screeeeaming into orbit.
translation: 我身前的这个模型是发射用的拱顶，当然真实尺寸可没那么小。我们就是用它将火箭呼啸着送入地球轨道。

original: In the lead-lined case behind me is a spent radioactive rod from one of our old reactors. No need to stand too close, let's move along, shall we?
translation: 我身后的这个铅箱里装的是从旧反应堆上拆下来的控制棒。不要站得太近。让我们继续往前参观，可以吗？

original: Thinking hurts you, too? Aw, I wish I could let you have the one on my head, but I can't. It hurts real bad when I don't wear it.
translation: 思考也让你感到痛苦了么？啊，我多希望我能把头上的这东西送给你，但是不行。如果不戴着它，我就会疼得不能自已。

original: I might be interested in buying your "headache medicine." How much?
translation: 你的"头痛药"有点意思。多少钱？

original: I need to take off my medicine...
translation: 我得把药取下来…

original: Local, local, the here and now... little of interest... things to buy, false hopes, and regrets watered down, washed down in dirty glasses.
translation: 这里啊，这里，现在…没什么有趣的…东西可买，虚假的希望，掺了水的悔恨，就着肮脏的玻璃杯一饮而尽。

original: With regret comes a girl... smiling sad, brown robe, name Veronica, half here. Wraps her and her heart up like a pack, in the pack, a key, some say.
translation: 来了一个悔恨的女孩…苦笑着，穿着棕色长袍，名叫维罗尼卡，未至半至。她紧紧包裹了自己的心，有人说，在那心里藏着一把钥匙。

original: {Slight upbeat at the end, different than the eeriness}Forecast: Cloudy, with a chance of friendship.
translation: {Slight upbeat at the end, different than the eeriness}预测: 乌云，但仍有发展友谊的可能。

original: {Frowns, winces}Ouch. Thinking small only hurts a little, but it's a sharp pain.
translation: {Frowns, winces}哎哟。原本思考些这类小事情只会有点疼，不过这次却疼得要命。

original: Do your thinking about "Here."
translation: 思考一下"这里。"

original: Let me take off my medicine...
translation: 等我把药取下来…

original: Bull and Bear over the Dam, at each other's throats... but a light from Vegas? Ball spinning on the wheel, more than two at the table, placing bets.
translation: 牛熊在坝上争斗，相互撕咬对方的喉咙……而维加斯却发出光亮？小球在轮盘里转动，不止两个人…正围着桌子下注。

original: All lose in different ways, a dam of corpses, towns of corpses, scattered across the sand. But whose, in what shares? Even the dealer doesn't know.
translation: 没有赢家，大坝上尸横遍野，城镇里血流成河，沙地里生灵涂炭。可那又是谁的尸体，谁又死伤最重？就连下注的人也无从知晓。

original: Forecast: A rain of blood will flood the desert and not purify it.
translation: 预报：一场血雨将冲洗整片沙漠，却无法洗净它。

original: Bleh. Thinking about Everywhere always makes me feel a little sick...
translation: 呃。要让我思考所有地方，我会有些恶心的…

original: Do your thinking about "Everywhere."
translation: 思考一下"所有地方"。

original: Okay. Let me take off my medicine...
translation: 好的。等我把药取下来…

original: {A little slower, more thoughtful}Your face does the thinking - two to the skull, yet one gets up. Odds are against you... but they're just numbers after the two-to-one.
translation: {A little slower, more thoughtful}你的面庞已经说明了一切——两发正中眉心，却大难不死。原本毫无生还可能……可就连这二中一的概率也被你幸运扭转。

original: You're playing the hand you've been dealt, but you don't let it rest, you shuffle and stack, and a gamble... a gamble that may pay off? {Frowns}But how?
translation: 你只有手中这一副底牌，可你并未认输，你重新洗牌，发牌，准备孤注一掷……一场赔率惊人的豪赌？可你该怎么下注？

original: Forecast: Rapidly changing conditions.
translation: 预测：不可捉摸，变幻莫测。

original: {Frowns, resumes normal voice}A lot of thinking - most of it in your face, it's almost shouting at me. {Beat, slight apology}Sorry if I said anything weird.
translation: {Frowns, resumes normal voice}所有的想法，全都写在你的脸上，它们就差没对着我大声吼了。{Beat, slight apology}如果我说了奇怪的话，我向你道歉。

original: Do your thinking about me.
translation: 思考一下我的事情吧。

original: That's all right, mister. You will someday.
translation: 没关系的，先生。有一天你会再来的。

original: Sounds interesting... I don't have 100 caps, though.
translation: 听起来很有趣…不过我没钱。

original: That's all right, ma'am. You will someday.
translation: 没关系的，女士。有一天你会再来的。

original: Sounds interesting... I don't have 100 caps, though.
translation: 听起来很有趣…不过我没钱。

original: I can take off my medicine and do some thinking. People say it's real interesting. I don't know, {'cause}because I never hear it.
translation: 我把药取下来就能进行思考。人们都说这很有趣。我不知道是不是真的，{'cause}因为我从来没听见他们说过。

original: Some people say that it's a gift. Other people say that it's the kind of thinking anyone could do if they watched more than they talked.
translation: 有人说这是天赋。有人则说这种所谓的思考，任何少说多看的人都能做到。

original: I don't know which is true. I see a lot, I think a lot. There's a lot to hear through the 188, too, that maybe accounts for the thinking.
translation: 我不知道哪个才是对的。我看了很多，也想了很多。在188贸易站能听到很多奇闻轶事，这也许正是我能思考的原因之一。

original: You sell *thoughts?*
translation: 你贩卖*思想*？

original: [SUCCEEDED] You might be on to something. I like to hang on to any weapons mods I run across...
translation: [成功] 你算是说到点子上了。我平生就好收集各种武器改装件……

original: Take a look.
translation: 看看吧。

original: I figure a guy like you gets his pick of killing gear.
translation: 我说，像你这样的人，对武器肯定有独特的喜好吧。

original: Take a look.
translation: 看看吧。

original: Let me see what you have for sale.
translation: 我看看你都有些啥好货色。

original: I'd like to see what you have for sale.
translation: 让我看看你的货。

original: Have a look.
translation: 看看吧。

original: You bet.
translation: 当然。

original: I'd like to see what you have for sale.
translation: 让我看看你的货。

original: I thought you'd say that.
translation: 我就知道你会这么说。

original: On second thought... maybe another time.
translation: 我认真想了下…还是下次吧。

original: Okay. Here.
translation: 好的。给你。

original: Thanks. We're leaving now, we don't want no more trouble.
translation: 谢谢。我们这就走，我们不想惹麻烦。

original: Show me what you have for sale.
translation: 让我看看你都卖些什么。

original: Of course.
translation: 当然。

original: I don't have that many caps.
translation: 我没有那么多瓶盖。

original: Alright, since you look new and didn't know better, we'll cut you some slack. 50 caps.
translation: 好吧，看你是新来的，什么也不懂，我们就放你一马。50个瓶盖。

original: Why, thank you! It's always gratifying to talk to one's fans. Hold on, I have something I need to do for a second.
translation: 谢谢你！能和自己的粉丝聊天真开心！不过请稍等，我有点事情要处理。

original: Aren't you the Super Mutant from the radio? I'm a huge fan.
translation: 你不是广播里的那个超级变种人吗？我可是你的铁杆粉丝！

original: What will you do now?
translation: 那你现在打算怎么办？

original: I don't know... it's been so long since I lost Rhonda, that I'm not sure...
translation: 我不知道……我已经太久没见到朗达了，而我不确定……

original: Hello. Could you please direct me to Mistress Tabitha?
translation: 您好。请问您是否能带我去见塔比瑟小姐？

original: I wonder what Mistress Tabitha has been doing with herself during my convalescence.
translation: 我也很想知道塔比瑟小姐在我康复期间都是怎么照顾自己的。

original: It is so good to be traveling with Mistress Tabitha again!
translation: 能再次和塔比瑟小姐一起旅行真是太好了！

original: You say that Super Mutants were *made*?
translation: 你说那些超级变种人是*造*出来的？

original: [Rhonda] <unnerved> Not the dreaded battle cattle training to hunt mutants?
translation: [朗达] 难道不只是那些可怕的凯撒战士们在训练捕杀变种人吗？

original: Something like that. Are you an NCR soldier?
translation: 大概吧。你是个NCR士兵？

original: Hell yes, sir. Well... not officially. Not anymore.
translation: 当然是，长官。好吧……严格来说不是。不再是了。

original: They mustered me out a year ago. Administrative discharge.
translation: 我在一年前被他们开除了。行政处分。

original: Hell yes, ma'am. Well... not officially. Not anymore.
translation: 当然是，长官。好吧……严格来说不是。不再是了。

original: They mustered me out a year ago. Administrative discharge.
translation: 我在一年前被他们开除了。行政处分。

original: Invalid response! You have 30 seconds to vacate before security is alerted.
translation: 验证无效！在警报拉响之前，你还有三十秒的时间离开。

original: Invalid response! You have 30 seconds to vacate before security is alerted.
translation: 验证无效！在警报拉响之前，你还有三十秒的时间离开。

original: Invalid response! You have 30 seconds to vacate before security is alerted.
translation: 验证无效！在警报拉响之前，你还有三十秒的时间离开。

original: Sorry, I was just leaving.
translation: 抱歉，我马上离开。

original: Invalid response! You have 30 seconds to vacate before security is alerted.
translation: 验证无效！在警报拉响之前，你还有三十秒的时间离开。

original: Invalid response! You have 30 seconds to vacate before security is alerted.
translation: 验证无效！在警报拉响之前，你还有三十秒的时间离开。

original: Invalid response! You have 30 seconds to vacate before security is alerted.
translation: 验证无效！在警报拉响之前，你还有三十秒的时间离开。

original: What will you do now?
translation: 你现在打算怎么办？

original: I still have a job to do here. Some Mutants may have heard Tabitha's broadcasts and are headed here even as we speak.
translation: 我在这里的工作尚未完成。目前，依然有很多变种人可能会因为听了塔比瑟的广播而朝这里来。

original: I'll remain and direct any one who show up toward Jacobstown, where they'll be much better off.
translation: 我会留在这里，指引那些人去雅各布斯镇，在那里他们会过得更好一些。

original: Punk? That's my line.
translation: 蠢货？这可是我的台词。

original: Are you deserters?
translation: 你们是逃兵？

original: I like to think that we're Prisoners Of War that managed to escape before capture.
translation: 我觉得更像是被抓之前就逃出来的战俘。

original: I don't know how long it'll be before the Legion crosses the river, but sure as fuck I don't want to be wearing an NCR uniform when they get here.
translation: 我不知道军团还有多久会渡河，但我绝对不想在他们来的时候还穿着NCR制服。

original: You're right. You're totally screwed.
translation: 你说得对。你们完蛋了。

original: Show me what you have for sale.
translation: 让我看看你卖些什么。

original: I am ready to process our transaction.
translation: 我已经准备好交易了。

original: I'm here to provide support. Is there anything I might be able to help with?
translation: 我是来提供支援的。有什么我能帮忙的？

original: Hmm... you don't cook by any chance, do you? Farber's doing his best, but it's hard to manage an army with half my staff in line for the latrine.
translation: 嗯……你会做饭吗？应该不会吧？法伯已经尽力了，但如果你手下一半的兵都在等着排队上厕所，那你是没办法指挥军队的。

original: Honestly, we're fighting a lot of fires right now. The Fiends keep pressing their position from Vault 3.
translation: 说实话，我们现在四面都有仗要打。那些从3号避难所里出来的恶魔帮一直在骚扰我们。

original: We've got the Legion breathing down our necks across the river. We actually took an officer alive last week, but so far he hasn't spoken a word.
translation: 河对岸还有军团在虎视眈眈。上周我们刚活捉了他们一个军官，但他到现在都没开口说一个字。

original: I'm up for hire if you need some extra manpower around the base.
translation: 如果你需要额外的人手，随时可以雇我。

original: There are a lot of things I can't spare troops for right now. If you can help us, we can definitely pay you for your work.
translation: 现在确实有太多事情我抽不出人手去做。如果你肯帮我们，我们一定会付你报酬的。

original: I could look into who's leaking NCR intelligence.
translation: 我可以调查是谁在泄露NCR的情报。

original: You? I think you've done enough.
translation: 你？我想你已经做得够多了。

original: I bet I could make the Legion prisoner talk.
translation: 我也许可以让那个军团俘虏开口。

original: I have Lieutenant Boyd on that already, and she's excellent. But I think she's hit a wall.
translation: 我已经让博伊德中尉负责这件事了。她虽然很优秀，但目前看来她是遇到困难了。

original: Talk to her, if you like. See if she has any use for you.
translation: 你愿意的话就去找她聊两句吧，看她需不需要你帮忙。

original: Her office is right above mine, but I think she might be interrogating right now. So she'd be upstairs on the other side of the building.
translation: 她的办公室就在我这间屋子的正上方。但我觉得她现在可能在审讯犯人，所以她应该会在楼上的另一侧。

original: Goodbye.
translation: 再见。

original: Wrong turn? Happens all the time. Do they give me a secretary? Of course not.
translation: 搞错了？这种事时有发生。比如他们老说要给我安排一位秘书，有吗？没有。

original: You won't be having problems with intelligence leaks anymore.
translation: 你再也不用担心什么泄密问题了。

original: I know who bombed the monorail.
translation: 我知道是谁炸毁单轨列车的了。

original: What? Who?
translation: 什么？谁？

original: All right. I'll do it.
translation: 好吧，我干。

original: Good. No need to check in with the NCR authorities, I can authorize your payment from OSI accounts.
translation: 很好。不必去找NCR报备了，我可以代表科工部直接发酬劳给你。

original: Vaults typically contain a server room on a lower level, where they would have backed up their research data. A computer room, you understand?
translation: 避难所的底层一般都会有个控制室，那里一定有他们备份的研究数据。就是有电脑机房，你明白吗？

original: Download all the information on the central server to your Pip-Boy. And you'll be certain to bring me any notes or samples that you find, won't you?
translation: 把中央服务器里的所有数据都下载到你的哔哔小子里去。如果还有其他记录或样本，也要记得一并带给我，好吗？

original: I'm listening.
translation: 我听着呢。

original: Imagine, if you will, the wasteland in bloom... vast fields of corn that grow from seeds and produce their bounty in the space of a month...
translation: 想想看，只要你一转念，废土上就能开遍鲜花……不用一个月时间，广袤的玉米地里就将结出甜美的果实……

original: ...orchards of trees, their branches weighed halfway to the ground, hung with fat, ripe oranges. A harvest that could feed a city... or a nation.
translation: ……漫山的绿树，半垂着枝桠，无数硕大而成熟的橘子挂在上头。只要迎来丰年，这些作物就可以养活整座城市……乃至整个国家。

original: And all of this... all this, requiring no more than a few drops of precious water, and the efforts of only a handful of human farmers. Impossible?
translation: 而这一切……这一切……只需几滴甘霖，和几位农民辛勤的耕耘，你觉得这难道不可能吗？

original: Show me what you have for sale.
translation: 让我看看你卖的东西。

original: Glad to do it.
translation: 乐意之至。

original: He confessed it to me before he died. He used the word "frumentarius."
translation: 他在断气前向我认了罪。他提到了"弗鲁曼塔里伊"这个词。

original: [SUCCEEDED] That's what the Legion calls their spies. I was afraid of this. Caesar's reach is longer than anybody guessed.
translation: [成功] 这是军团对他们手下间谍的称呼。我怕的就是这个。凯撒真是无孔不入。

original: [FAILED] That's not exactly airtight.
translation: [失败] 依然有疑点。

original: He confessed it to me. Right before he died.
translation: 他向我承认。就在他去世之前。

original: If only we'd caught this sooner, before he got to the monorail...
translation: 要是我们能早点发现就好了，在他去车站之前……

original: Still, this investigation has been valuable to us, and you deserve to be compensated for it.
translation: 但这次调查依然对我们很有价值，你理应获得报酬。

original: The NCR appreciates the work you've done. Will there be anything else?
translation: NCR感谢你所做的一切。还有其他事吗？

original: Private Crenshaw. He's dead now.
translation: 列兵克伦肖。他已经死了。

original: Crenshaw... I've met Crenshaw. At his disciplinary hearing. Still, this is hard to imagine - he was just a prankster.
translation: 克伦肖…我见过克伦肖，他因为违反纪律而接受过一次聆讯。但实在难以想象他会做出这样的事——他只是爱捣蛋而已。

original: I've been fighting for the wrong side. Let me prove myself to you.
translation: 我以前站错了边。给我个证明自己的机会。

original: [FAILED] Forget it. We have no use for you here.
translation: [失败] 算了吧。我们这里不需要你。

original: We don't have much to go on right now. Lately every raiding party in New Vegas seems to have a map of our troop movements.
translation: 我们目前的情况很不顺利。最近一段时间，仿佛新维加斯所有的掠夺者帮派都掌握了我们的动向。

original: It derails everything. Supplies, reinforcements. And it'll only get worse, the longer we let it go on.
translation: 部署全乱套了。补给、增援。如果我们不马上采取措施，事态只会变得更加糟糕。

original: Captain Curtis is heading up the investigation right now. He can fill you in.
translation: 柯蒂斯上尉正在调查此事。他会向你说明详细情况。

original: I'll go to Vault 3 and see if I can find your ranger.
translation: 我会去3号避难所，也许能找到你的游骑兵。

original: That Vault is a hornet's nest. If you have second thoughts, no one would think less of you for it. But if you can get him home, it'd mean a lot.
translation: 那座避难所就是个马蜂窝。你要是临阵改变主意，我们也不会有意见。但如果你真能把他带回来，那可就帮我们大忙了。

original: Watch for civilians, too. The Fiends have been kidnapping locals. They just walk right into people's homes in the middle of the day and take them.
translation: 顺便也注意一下里面有没有平民。恶魔帮一直在绑架本地老百姓。他们都是光天化日之下直接闯进民宅里抢人。

original: But the man you're looking for is Bryce Anders. Anders was trying to find the leader, Motor-Runner.
translation: 不过记住，你要找的正主是布里斯·安德斯。安德斯本来是要去铲除恶魔帮的首领轰鸣恶煞的。

original: You hear something like a chainsaw, you've found Motor-Runner. Put a bullet in his head, and you'll have some new friends around here.
translation: 如果你听到类似电锯的声音，那就说明轰鸣恶煞来了。要是你能给他的脑门来一枪，那你在这儿肯定能交到一批新朋友。

original: I'd be careful with that data. You didn't see those plants in the Vault.
translation: 对待那些数据可要千万小心，你是没见过避难所里的那些植物。

original: Your concerns are perfectly understandable, but I assure you, they're entirely misplaced. We would never use technology that wasn't fully tested.
translation: 你的担心我完全可以理解，但我向你保证，那些植物完全是实验失败的牺牲品。我们是不会随意采用未经严格测试的技术的。

original: We aren't some motley band of Vault alchemists. We're with the government, for goodness sake. Have a little faith in us!
translation: 我们可不是避难所里那群鱼龙混杂的江湖术士。老天，我们可是代表官方的。要对我们有信心啊！

original: No problem. I can wait.
translation: 没关系，我可以等。

original: I think... Williams' decryption algorithms seem to be working...
translation: 我想……威廉姆斯的解密算法似乎奏效了……

original: Yes... here it is! The data is mostly uncorrupted. This will make the board of directors finally sit up and take notice...
translation: 没错……成功了！数据大多完好。这下那些大佬们终于得好好坐下来听报告了……

original: Here, then... as promised. An agreeable sum, payable upon delivery of the data. You've more than done your part.
translation: 拿着吧……这是答应给你的酬劳。里面还包括了成功将数据送达的奖金，你已经超额完成任务了。

original: I've brought the data from Vault 22.
translation: 我把22号避难所的数据带来了。

original: Wonderful! Excellent work! Let me see it... it'll take a moment to decode on my terminal...
translation: 太棒了！干得漂亮！让我瞧瞧……看来我的电脑得需要一段时间来解密这些数据了……

original: Goodbye.
translation: 再见。

original: Yes... goodbye.
translation: 好的……再见。

original: Of course, we're very grateful for your efforts, and I'll make certain that you're credited in our final report. Good day to you.
translation: 当然，我们非常感激你为此付出的努力。我会在最终报告里提及你的名字的。再见。

original: What can you tell me about this place?
translation: 关于这个地方你了解多少？

original: What are you looking to find out?
translation: 你想问什么？

original: The monorail is destroyed.
translation: 列车被炸了。

original: I've got connections. Maybe we could make an arrangement?
translation: 我也是有些门路的。也许我们可以谈谈条件 ?

original: [SUCCEEDED] Now you're talking my language. I do have an expanded inventory for people I can trust.
translation: [成功] 这才像话嘛，我确实有些特别的货物，只卖给我信任的人。

original: If you're willing to do a little legwork for me, I could give you access to my stash, and at a discount.
translation: 如果你愿意为我稍稍跑跑腿，我可以允许你以折扣格购买我这儿的私货。

original: Many of these items aren't available in the NCR, and you'll be hard-pressed to find them at a better price anywhere else.
translation: 里面有很多东西在NCR是买不到的，在其他地方你也找不到更好的价格了。

original: [FAILED] I don't think so. This is what I've got. Take it or leave it.
translation: [失败] 不行。我就这么些货。不买拉倒。

original: I've got caps. Name your price.
translation: 我有的是钱，你开个价吧。

original: I can be pretty resourceful. Perhaps we could work out a deal?
translation: 我还是挺有人脉的。或许我们可以做笔交易 ?

original: [FAILED] I don't think so. This is what I've got. Take it or leave it.
translation: [失败] 不行。我就这么些货。不买拉倒。

original: Come on, man. Hook me up.
translation: 拜托，伙计，行个方便嘛。

original: What's the hold-up - if you don't mind my asking?
translation: 你到底是怎么被困在这的？不介意我这么问吧。

original: What's it look like? I caught one in the leg. I killed a dozen of those degenerates sneaking my way in, but... one got a drop on me.
translation: 你觉得呢？我腿上中枪了。我摸进来干掉了很多敌人……却被其中一个碰巧打中了。

original: I holed up here after I killed that one. They're too stupid to unlock the doors, so I knew they'd figure whoever attacked had just taken off.
translation: 我杀了那家伙，之后就一直守在这里了。他们很蠢，连门都打不开，所以我想他们肯定会以为袭击他们的人已经翘辫子了。

original: I just need a day or two, then I'll take out Motor-Runner myself. I even got his key to the Maintenance Wing. Situation's under control.
translation: 只要再给我一两天时间，我就能亲手干掉轰鸣恶煞。我已经拿到了通往维修区的钥匙。一切都在我的掌握中。

original: SPEECH attempt to convince Bryce to help take out Motor-Runner
translation: 口才 试图说服布莱斯帮忙除掉机车手

original: [SUCCEEDED] I guess you're right. I won't be able to move fast, but I can more than hold my own in a firefight.
translation: [成功]你说得对，虽然我的腿脚不利索了，但如果真打起来，我还是能发挥点作用的。

original: Goddammit! Is there nothing I can't fuck up here? I've lost the goddamn key!
translation: 该死！我他妈怎么这么走霉运！我把钥匙给丢了！

original: Well, this whole thing's improvised, and now we'll have to improvise some more and find another way through. I'll follow you down.
translation: 好吧，反正都是临时行动，再临时点也无妨。咱们找别的路吧。我会跟在你后面。

original: The only way you're going to take out Motor-Runner is if we work together.
translation: 你唯一能干掉轰鸣恶煞的办法就是和我联手。

original: What is this place?
translation: 这是什么地方？

original: This was Vault 3, but I'm sure you can tell that by all the 3s all over the damn place. Now it's a drug den for the goddamn Fiends.
translation: 这里以前是3号避难所，光看这鬼地方到处都贴着3的标志，你也应该知道了。现在这里已经成了恶魔帮的毒窟。

original: What can you tell me about what happened here?
translation: 能告诉我这里出了什么事吗？

original: The Fiends killed everyone living here, and now they're squatting in their home.
translation: 瘾君子杀了这里的所有人，现在这地方成了他们的老巢。

original: Do you need any help?
translation: 你需要帮忙吗？

original: Yeah, so far this has gone exactly as expected - poorly. But with the work you've done for NCR already, you might be just what I've been looking for.
translation: 是的，就拿我手头这件事来说，情况一点也不出乎我的意料——进展十分缓慢。不过凭你为NCR所做的贡献，也许你就是我要找的人。

original: We captured an honest-to-God centurion of Caesar's Legion recently.
translation: 我们最近抓到了一个货真价实的凯撒军团百夫长。

original: Sorry, this is state business, what I'm working on. You'd have to do a lot more NCR ass-kissing before they'd let you help me with this one.
translation: 抱歉，这是公务。我看你得再多为NCR做点事情，他们才会允许你插手此事。

original: I have a doctor's bag right here. It should be enough to get you on your feet.
translation: 正好我手上有个诊疗包。应该足以治好你的腿了。

original: What are you waiting for? I've got a high-value target to kill!
translation: 我们还等什么？我还有一个重要目标要杀！

original: <Lie> I'm an independent contractor with the NCR.
translation: <撒谎> 我是受NCR雇佣而来的。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Oh, my apologies sir. I was sent here by Colonel Hsu to exterminate Motor-Runner, the leader of the Fiends.
translation: [成功] 噢，对不起，长官。许上校派我来这里消灭轰鸣恶煞，他是恶魔帮的领导人。

original: What else can you tell me about Anders?
translation: 你还能告诉我有关安德斯的其他事情吗？

original: I don't know him very well, myself. I seem to remember that he was the man to call on if you needed someone to get in and get out quietly.
translation: 我并不怎么了解他。在我的印象里，他是那种很善于干偷鸡摸狗勾当的人。

original: Colonel Hsu would really be the person to talk to.
translation: 这事应该去问问许上校。

original: I'll see what I can find out about Cpl. White for you.
translation: 我会尽力寻找怀特下士的下落的。

original: Word around the base is he'd been going regularly to visit a hooker named Dazzle at Gomorrah. That's a casino on the Strip. Classy place.
translation: 有传言说他最近经常和蛾摩拉里一个叫达泽的妓女在一起鬼混。那是长街上的一个赌场，纸醉金迷的地方。

original: His belongings are up in the barracks in the concourse building. First bunk on your left if you're facing it from the center.
translation: 他的行李还放在候机厅的兵营里。进去后，正对中央面朝里，左手边第一个铺位就是。

original: I haven't had a chance to look through his things yet, so that might be a good place to begin.
translation: 我还没翻过他的东西，不过也许里面会有些线索。

original: You said there have been thefts?
translation: 你说有贼？

original: Not the kind of things you like to see go missing.
translation: 是啊，连续几周都发现物资出现短缺。大部分是枪和弹药，都不是常人以为会丢那种的东西。

original: No witnesses yet. I've got my money on Sergeant Contreras, who's supposed to be in charge of distribution, the little weasel.
translation: 暂时还没有目击者。我怀疑是孔特雷拉斯中士，他是管物资分配的，这个狡猾的黄鼠狼。

original: But he's too slick to let anyone catch him doing it. We've searched his possessions a dozen times. Nothing.
translation: 他太能躲了，谁也抓不到证据。我们已经搜过他的财物不下几十遍了。一无所获。

original: Tell me about the break-ins.
translation: 跟我说说基地遭人闯入的事。

original: Maybe break-in isn't the right word. We didn't find signs of forced entry. But I've had reports of someone sneaking into the control tower at night.
translation: 说“闯入”也许不大恰当。我们没有发现任何武力闯入的痕迹。不过我们确实收到报告称有人在夜间摸进了指挥塔。

original: It's probably just a meeting spot for a steamy military base love affair. <Sighs> Kids today.
translation: 也许只是几个干柴烈火的新兵蛋子在暗中幽会吧……<叹气>现在的年轻人啊。

original: But it bothers me that they didn't break in. It means they have an access code. Most soldiers around the base don't have that.
translation: 不过正是非武力闯入这点让我感到担心。这说明闯入者有口令。而基地里的多数士兵都没有。

original: Who's missing?
translation: 谁失踪了？

original: Well, there's Anders. He's a Ranger. That one's not suspicious so much as worrisome - he left on a dangerous assignment.
translation: 好吧，安德斯。他是位游骑兵。也不知该怀疑他还是担心他——他去执行一项危险的任务去了。

original: Colonel Hsu sent him out. Now I think he feels guilty not having any way to check up on him.
translation: 是许上校派他去的。估计他现在正在后悔没有好好审查这家伙呢。

original: Show me what you have for sale.
translation: 让我看看你都卖些什么。

original: Sure thing!
translation: 当然的！

original: I didn't come here to do your job for you.
translation: 我不是来替你干你的活的。

original: Well, take this goddamn key anyways. It'll get you into the Maintenance Wing. Maybe you'll brave up and do the right thing. Good luck.
translation: 无所谓，反正这把破钥匙给你了。它能让你进入维修区。希望你能鼓起勇气做点好事。祝你好运。

original: So who *did* train you?
translation: 那你是在哪里深造的？

original: Before the bombs, I might have studied at any number of colleges, universities. They gave a man a chance to advance himself... or so I've heard.
translation: 放在核战之前，我可能会去上大学，或者专科学院。人们能在那里提高自己的知识水平……至少我听说是这样。

original: But after the bombs - until a few years ago - anyone with half a brain had one choice. The Followers of the Apocalypse.
translation: 但核战之后，直到几年之前，有才华的人想要通古博经，只有一个选择，那就是找天启追随者。

original: Didn't matter if you agreed with them or not. You either played along or you were turned away.
translation: 不管你是否认同他们，你要么就跟他们学，要么你就滚蛋。

original: Keely wiped the data. It's gone.
translation: 基利销毁了资料。都没了。

original: Now get out of this office. Get out!
translation: 滚出我的办公室。滚出去！

original: Right... Well, I'll keep that in mind.
translation: 好的……嗯，我会记住的。

original: Be sure you do.
translation: 相信你能做到。

original: If you get this last job done, full access to my stash. At a discount, even. Just because I like you.
translation: 如果你能完成这项最后的工作，我的所有货物都向你开放。甚至还能打折，因为我喜欢你。

original: Get moving, watch out for raiders, and do {emph}not lose that package. Good luck.
translation: 去吧，路上小心掠夺者，另外{emph}别把包裹弄丢了，祝你好运。

original: I'm ready for the next task.
translation: 我准备好进行下一个任务了。

original: Well, I'm not. Come back tomorrow and the stuff will be ready to transport.
translation: 嗯，可我还没准备好，明天再来吧，到时货物应该就备妥了。

original: All right, I need you to pass something off to a merchant. The guy's name is Price. The exchange goes down at Miguel's Pawn Shop in Westside.
translation: 好吧，我要你带些东西给一个商人，他叫普莱斯。交易地点在西区的米格尔典当行。

original: This next bit is very important. He's paranoid. Maybe a little schizo. You have to identify yourself with a passcode or he'll shoot you right there.
translation: 有件事非常重要。他有妄想症，也许还有点精神分裂。你要和他对暗号来表明身份，不然他肯定会对你开枪。

original: Just tell him you're looking for some betting advice. Then he'll say the surest move is to bet on the house.
translation: 只要告诉他，你想向他讨教一些赌博的技巧。然后他会回答最可靠的方法就是押庄家。

original: <Lie> I'm with the Legion. I'm here to kill you before you talk.
translation: <撒谎> 我和军团是一伙儿的。我要杀了你，免得你走漏了风声。

original: [?] No! Listen, Caesar's secrets are safe with me. I stayed alive because Caesar would've wanted it. I'm useless to him dead.
translation: [?] 么？不！听着，凯撒的秘密我半个字都不会泄露。我得活着，因为凯撒需要我。我死了对他没有好处。

original: No. Hildern didn't mention anyone else.
translation: 没。希尔丹没提到过其他人。

original: Listen. I make a fair wage, but I'm not rich, not by any means. Maybe my kind of money wouldn't appeal to your average merc.
translation: 听着。我工资虽然不低，但我也不是有钱人。可能我开的价在你眼里不算什么。

original: But I'm willing to pay you, if you'll find Keely and make sure she's safe. Ain't right leaving her out there, no idea if she's alive or dead.
translation: 但是如果你能把基利平安带出来，我愿意付给你钱。不能就这样把她丢在那里，生死不明。

original: What is there to do here?
translation: 这儿有什么事可做吗？

original: Keep your nose to the ground, stranger, that's what. Mind your own business and let us mind our own. Are we clear?
translation: 老实点就行，陌生人。咱们各扫门前雪，你管好你自己就行，我们的事我们自己解决，明白了 ?

original: If you've got a mind to loot the old H&H Tools factory, don't even bother. That place is sealed tighter than a Radscorpion's bunghole.
translation: 如果你有打算去H&H五金工具厂里探险，我劝你还是趁早放弃。那地方比辐射蝎巢还要危险。

original: Every salvager who tries gets blown up, flattened, or gutted by traps. Then he starts to stink up the town and we're the ones to clean up the mess.
translation: 每个试图进去的拾荒者不是被陷阱炸飞、碾成肉酱，就是被大卸八块。最后臭味都飘到镇上来了，还得我们进去给他们收尸。

original: Don't worry. I paid him off. He won't be a problem.
translation: 别着急，我付他钱了，他不会再来坏你的事了。

original: You bribed a {emph}Ranger? Ha! That's gotta be some kind of special talent.
translation: 你贿赂{emph}了一个游骑兵？哈！你真有本事。

original: Don't worry. He won't be telling anyone anything ever again.
translation: 别担心，他什么也不会说了。

original: Good to hear.
translation: 很好。

original: <Hand Contreras the package> Nah, but he is definitely looking for you.
translation: <把包裹交给孔特雷拉斯> 没有，不过他肯定会来找你的。

original: Thank God. You're going to need to take him out.
translation: 感谢上帝，你需要去把他干掉。

original: If McCarran hears I've been selling contraband, we're both dead.
translation: 如果营地内部知道我在销售违禁品，我们俩就死定了。

original: I didn't really have a choice.
translation: 我别无选择。

original: Now you're just going to have to take him out. I can't afford having NCR knowing about my side business...
translation: 那你现在就只能把他干掉了。我绝不能让NCR知道我的生意……

original: ...and I don't think you want to go in front of a firing squad either. You take care of this, my entire stock is available to you.
translation: ……你也不想被他们抓起来枪毙吧。只要你把这事搞定，我这里的货物任你挑。

original: Hell, I might even throw in something extra to sweeten the deal.
translation: 该死，哪怕再多给你点甜头我都愿意。

original: Price is being held by the NCR. A Ranger replaced him.
translation: 普莱斯被NCR抓住了，一个游骑兵顶替了他。

original: Ah shit. Well, please tell me you didn't hand him the package.
translation: 啊，妈的。好吧，你没有把包裹给他吧。

original: Just some supplies for McCarran from the Crimson Caravan.
translation: 只是深红商队送给麦卡伦营地的一些物资。

original: [SUCCEEDED] All right, if you hear anything, report it to myself or Lt. Boyd immediately. We need to track down his source.
translation: [成功] 好吧，如果你听到什么消息，立马向我本人或者博伊德中尉报告。我们需要追查他的货源。

original: [FAILED] <Takes Contreras' package> Bullshit, let's see what you've got here...
