original: Now that I think of it, there was a Cpl. Farber back at McCarran who'd probably be interested in it. There's a sample of it around here somewhere.
translation: 哦，对了。在麦卡伦营地有一位法伯下士，他可能会对这个感兴趣。样本的话这附近就有一个。

original: Nice to meet you.
translation: 很高兴见到你。

original: A pleasure to meet you, madam. What may I do for you?
translation: 很高兴见到你，女士。我能为你做些什么？

original: Do you have trouble speaking?
translation: 你说话很吃力吗？

original: Mmm-hm. [Points to stump of tongue in his mouth.]
translation: 嗯，哈。[从他嘴里露出残缺的舌头。]

original: I have bo go bow. Goobye!
translation: 窝得肘了。掰拜。

original: Nothing today. Goodbye.
translation: 今天没什么事情。再见。

original: I'm here to buy out Cassidy Caravans for the Crimson Caravan Company.
translation: 我是来代表深红商队公司收购盖西迪商队的。

original: Okay! Sold!
translation: 好的！成交！

original: Goodbye.
translation: 再见。

original: Bye.
translation: 拜。

original: Actually, I'm supposed to be getting a body out of there.
translation: 实际上，我是受人之托，要去那里给人收尸。

original: I'm looking for ways to make myself useful.
translation: 我正想着怎么才能帮你们呢。

original: If that's so, how about you look into repairing the solar arrays on the roof of the generator building?
translation: 那样的话，你去试试把发电机房顶上的太阳能电池板修好怎么样？

original: Nothing too complicated about it, but it's a long ways to walk my old bones, and there's been that ant problem over near there.
translation: 事情本身不复杂，可我这把老骨头走不了太远的路，而且那边还在闹蚂蚁。

original: You can't miss the array. It's on top of the generator building smack dab in the middle of Nellis between the two runways.
translation: 太阳能板很好找。就在内利斯基地两条跑道中间那座发电机房的楼顶。

original: Tell me again what I need to do.
translation: 再说一遍我需要做什么。

original: I wish you'd paid attention the first time! All you need to do is attach the deployable ballast to the plane.
translation: 我真希望你第一次的时候有认真听讲！你要做的是把可展开式浮袋装到飞机上。

original: Some of my robots will carry a remote activation station out to the shore. Attach the ballast, hit a button, and they'll handle the rest.
translation: 我的机器人会把一个遥控启动器带去湖边。给飞机装上浮袋，按下按钮，剩下的事情就交给机器人去做吧。

original: Where is the bomber located?
translation: 轰炸机的位置在哪？

original: I told you, at the bottom of Lake Mead! I'll make sure the location is displayed on your Pip-Boy map.
translation: 我跟你说了，就在米德湖底！我会把地点标记在你的哔哔小子上。

original: Where is the bomber located?
translation: 轰炸机的位置在哪？

original: It's at the bottom of Lake Mead. I'll mark its location on your Pip-Boy map.
translation: 就在米德湖底。我会把地点标记在你的哔哔小子上。

original: Just take all of it.
translation: 都拿走吧。

original: Hey, thanks!
translation: 嘿，谢了 !

original: He's doing well. I'll come back when I have some more information.
translation: 他近况很好。再有其他消息我会回来告诉你的。

original: Okay, talk to you soon.
translation: 好吧，回头再聊。

original: I'm not sure. Let me think about it and I'll come back to you.
translation: 我不知道。我考虑考虑再回来告诉你。

original: Okay, let me know when you have an idea.
translation: 好吧，想出办法了再跟我说。

original: <Lie> You have permission. They know you're coming.
translation: <撒谎> 你可以通过，他们知道你会来。

original: [SUCCEEDED] {Surprise}Really? Thank you so much! I'll get going right away.
translation: [成功] {Surprise}真的？太谢谢你了！我马上出发。

original: He's a special sort of guy - perfect for a special sort of gal.
translation: 他是个很特别的小伙，对一位很特别的姑娘来说，简直是绝配。

original: Ooh, I've just got to meet him! Is there any way the Boomers would let me visit Nellis?
translation: 哦，我要去见他！有什么办法能让大炮族放我进内利斯吗？

original: He's nice, maybe a little naive. Seems convinced you're the love of his life.
translation: 挺好的，虽说有些孩子气。他似乎早就对你情有独钟了。

original: Really? That's so sweet!
translation: 真的吗？太棒了！

original: I'd love to go meet him. Is there any way the Boomers would let me visit Nellis?
translation: 我真想见见他。有没有什么办法能让大炮族放我进内利斯基地？

original: Oh, I almost forgot. Take off the hood.
translation: 还真忘了。把罩子摘下来吧。

original: How else are we supposed to get back, genius?
translation: 那我们该怎么回去啊，天才？

original: East? You moron! That'll take us days out of our way.
translation: 往东？你傻了？这得多走好几天路程呢。

original: I'm glad you made it out here. You're even more stunning up close than you were at a distance.
translation: 很高兴你能来。虽然远看也很美，但近了看，你可更加显得迷人了。

original: Hi there, it's great to meet you as well.
translation: 嘿，你好，我也很高兴能见到你。

original: Sounds like you're a little disappointed in your troops.
translation: 听起来你对你的士兵有些失望。

original: Disappointed? We call 'em the Misfits for a reason. They're undisciplined, lazy, and they have absolutely no esprit de corps.
translation: 失望？大家管他们叫后进生，这个绰号可不是白叫的。他们目无纪律、慵懒涣散，而且丝毫没有团队精神。

original: The squad leader's got some promise, kid named Mags, but as for the rest...{Trails off} I don't see much hope.
translation: 那个叫玛格丝的人是他们的队长，还算有点潜力。至于其他人嘛……{Trails off}我不抱多大期望。

original: I'm going to make them shape up if it kills me, though. Or them, for that matter.
translation: 就算把我累死，也得把这队伍整出点样子来。否则到时候，死的就是他们。

original: Sgt. McCredie asked me to talk to you about getting your squad in shape.
translation: 麦克雷迪军士派我来和你商量该怎么整顿你的小队。

original: He did, huh? Well, good luck with that. You'd have an easier time teaching radroaches to march in formation.
translation: 他真这么说的？嚯，那可祝你好运咯。这比训练蟑螂齐步走还难。

original: Hoo-hoo! Hot damn, it's gonna be a party in the camp tonight!
translation: 呜——呼！太屌了，今晚要在营地里开派对！

original: I got you the stuff.
translation: 我拿到你要的东西了。

original: Yo, I'll tell you what this squad needs. A healthy dose of angry juice.
translation: 哟，我告诉你这小队真正需要什么。他们需要来针兴奋剂。

original: That seems highly illogical. What reason would he have for doing that?
translation: 这感觉很不合逻辑啊。他这么做有什么理由呢？

original: To me? Well, I'll tell you what I think this squad needs: a little more basic human niceness.
translation: 你问我？我告诉你这小队真正需要什么：他们需要一点点人情味。

original: It helped, but we've still got a grenade range inspection to pass.
translation: 有点帮助，但我们还必须通过手雷投掷考试。

original: So, did the shooting range practice take care of things?
translation: 打靶射击这招管用了吗？

original: Yeah, what about it? I told you, we need marksmanship and explosive handling improvements.
translation: 怎么样？我跟你说过，我们需要射击以及爆破练习。

original: So, about those improvements....
translation: 关于整顿队伍这件事……

original: Like I said, you get the juice, we'll cut loose.
translation: 我说了，只要你搞到药，我们天王老子都不怕。

original: About getting the squad's readiness reports up....
translation: 关于提高队伍成绩这件事……

original: And what do you propose?
translation: 那你有什么主意？

original: Going back to those squad improvements, I had an idea.
translation: 关于提高小队作战能力这方面，我倒有个点子。

original: You did? Does that mean you're going to help?
translation: 是吗？那么说你愿意帮忙了？

original: I thought about what you said about basic human niceness.
translation: 我想了想你所说的人情味这件事。

original: Can you tell me anything about Camp Golf?
translation: 你对高尔夫营地有什么了解？

original: What do you want to know? Whole place used to be some kinda rich bastard resort, back before the war.
translation: 你想知道什么？这破地方在战争爆发前可是个给专供富佬们使用的度假胜地。

original: Now the Rangers use the old resort, and we grunts get to live in tents. Fucking typical.
translation: 现在那些旧宅子都给游骑兵占去了，而我们这些兵卒子就只能睡帐篷。真他妈可以。

original: What's a Master-At-Arms?
translation: 警卫长是什么职务？

original: I oversee the security of the Nellis homeland, from the coordination of its defense to the training and fitness of its population.
translation: 我负责内利斯的安保工作，除了协调防卫体系，还要训练居民们的体格。

original: All right. Lead the way.
translation: 好。带路吧。

original: Follow close - and mind your behavior.
translation: 跟紧了——还有，注意你的举止。

original: I hear you've got dynamite. It would help us beat the Powder Gangers.
translation: 我听说你这儿有炸药。那玩意可以帮我们痛打炸药帮。

original: Show me what you have for sale.
translation: 让我看看你都卖些什么。

original: I respect the way you've conducted yourself around here. Reminds me of myself in some ways.
translation: 我很佩服你在这里的处事方式。某些方面让我想起了以前的自己。

original: From now on, you want to buy from Chet's, I'll give you wholesale prices.
translation: 从现在起，只要你想从我切特手里买东西，我都会给你批发价。

original: Can do.
translation: 可以。

original: Show me what you have for sale.
translation: 让我看看你都卖些什么。

original: {Positive Rep Bonus}Got a special discount for you, after what you done for us.
translation: {Positive Rep Bonus}你帮了我们这么多，我会给你打个特别折扣。

original: I'm sure I've got something you'll like.
translation: 我保证有你喜欢的东西。

original: What are you going to do?
translation: 你们打算怎么办？

original: Some of the others, like Sunny, will probably stand up for Ringo if he asks for help, which he hasn't.
translation: 我觉得如果林戈向我们求助，那其他一些人，比如桑妮，可能会帮助他，但他到现在也没有向我们开口。

original: Personally, I hope he sneaks out of town one night and takes the Powder Gangers with him.
translation: 就我个人而言，我倒是希望他能找一天晚上偷偷溜出镇子，把炸药帮的人都引走。

original: Where is Ringo now?
translation: 林戈现在在哪？

original: He's holed up at the abandoned gas station up the hill.
translation: 他藏在小丘上的废弃加油站里。

original: I overheard your argument. What was that all about?
translation: 我听到你们吵架了。怎么回事？

original: Looks like our little town got itself dragged into the middle of something we don't want anything to do with.
translation: 看来我们的这个小镇已经被卷进了一场人人都避之不及的风波里。

original: About a week ago, this trader, Ringo, comes into town. Survivor of an attack, he says. Bad men after him, needs a place to hide.
translation: 大概一周前，有个叫林戈的商人来到镇上。他说被人袭击了，有坏人在追他，需要找个地方躲一躲。

original: We figured he was just in shock, so we gave him a place to lie low. We didn't actually expect anyone to come after him.
translation: 我们觉得他可能是吓坏了，所以就给他安排了个地方藏身。没想到还真有人追着他来了。

original: Why are the Powder Gangers out to get you?
translation: 为什么炸药帮要找你？

original: My caravan was on the return trip from California and heading back to the company branch in New Vegas when we got jumped.
translation: 我的商队在从加州返回新维加斯分部的途中遭遇了伏击。

original: Not even a "drop your weapons and hands up" before the bullets started flying. We put up a good fight, but there was too many of them.
translation: 连句"放下武器，举起手来"都没有，子弹就开始乱飞。我们打得不错，但他们人太多了。

original: I took a few of the bandits down before I ran, so I figure their friends are out for revenge.
translation: 我逃跑以前放倒了好几个掠夺者，所以他们的朋友估计是想来报复我吧。

original: What do you know about the situation with the Powder Gangers?
translation: 关于炸药帮与镇子的纠纷你都知道些什么？

original: If Ringo doesn't head out on his own, I think we should hand him over. The town shouldn't get itself mixed into the problem.
translation: 如果林戈不主动离开的话，我觉得我们应该把他交出去。这个镇子真的经不起折腾了。

original: Don't mistake that for coward talk, though. We're a town of survivors. We'll fight tooth and nail if pushed, but we don't go looking for trouble.
translation: 不过你可别误会，我们并不是软弱。这镇上的人也都是经历过风雨的，迫不得已的话我们会反抗到底，我们只是不想惹麻烦。

original: I'm going to help Ringo take on the Powder Gangers. I might need your help.
translation: 我要帮助林戈对付炸药帮。可能需要你帮忙。

original: It's odd that Cobb wasn't able to find Ringo. The town's not that big.
translation: 科布没能找到林戈也够奇怪的。镇子又不大。

original: Cobb hasn't exactly been looking for Ringo too hard - I think he's afraid that Ringo will ambush him, which is probably true.
translation: 科布根本就没去找林戈——我觉得他应该是害怕林戈偷袭他，这是非常有可能的。

original: How many Powder Gangers are out there?
translation: 外面总共有多少炸药帮的人？

original: I need medical treatment.
translation: 我需要医疗用品。

original: Seeing as you're a friend of ours, I suppose we could trade for what you need.
translation: 看在你是朋友的份上，我们可以互通有无。

original: I'm afraid medications are in short supply. Maybe you should seek medical treatment away from Nellis.
translation: 恐怕我们也缺乏医疗用品。也许你应该去内利斯之外的地方看看。

original: <Lie> Yep, power on, ants dead, all good.
translation: <撒谎> 对，来电了，蚂蚁死了，一切都好了。

original: Mother Pearl said you have a "bug problem?"
translation: 珀尔妈妈说你需要"处理虫害？"

original: Long story short, the power failed a few days ago because giant ants have tunneled into the generator room and set up a nest.
translation: 长话短说吧，前几天停电就是因为有巨型蚂蚁爬进了发电机房，还在那儿建了个蚂蚁窝。

original: I led a team down to exterminate them, but there were... so many of them. We lost: Two killed, three wounded.
translation: 我领了一队人马想去消灭它们，但是……蚂蚁数量太多了。我们死了两个，伤了三个。

original: Personally, I think it's more than a savage can handle, but if you want to kill those ants and switch the power back on, feel free.
translation: 就我个人老说，我觉得你一个野蛮人根本处理不了这种事，但如果你真的愿意消灭蚂蚁，恢复供电，我也没理由拦着你。

original: [SUCCEEDED] You have to keep in mind that you're our first contact with the outside world since I was barely a woman.
translation: [成功] 你必须要记住，自打我成人以来，你是我们接触到的第一个外来访客。

original: Seclusion has kept us safe, but the world around us is changing. Neon lights in the distance, patrolling robots, soldiers...
translation: 与世隔绝令我们得到了安全，可我们周围的世界却在不停变化。远方的霓虹灯光，巡逻的机器人，还有士兵们……

original: My youngers think our guns can keep out the world, but I think we need to let it in, just a little, or become its victim.
translation: 我的后辈认为我们的大炮能把世界拒之门外，但我觉得我们还是应当开放，哪怕只有一点点，否则我们就会变成时代的牺牲品。

original: You're that little bit of the world, child. Welcome to Nellis.
translation: 而你，就是那溜进来的那一点点世界，孩子。欢迎来到内利斯。

original: How can we trust each other if you're going to be keeping secrets?
translation: 你要这样什么都不说，我们怎么相信彼此？

original: <Lie> I'm sorry Lindsay. Mister Cuddles is dead.
translation: <撒谎> 对不起，林赛。抱抱先生死了。

original: [SUCCEEDED] No! Not Mister Cuddles!
translation: [成功] 不！抱抱先生不会死的！

original: Okay, I'll look for him.
translation: 好的，我会去找他的。

original: Any ideas how to get to the bottom of Lake Mead without drowning?
translation: 有没有什么办法能潜到湖底还不被淹死？

original: Might try holding your breath. If that doesn't sound good enough, talk to Jack. He was working on a rebreather once.
translation: 试试憋气咯。如果不行，那就去找杰克吧。他之前在研究一种呼吸器。

original: That sounds really creepy, Loyal.
translation: 这词儿用的有些诡异啊，罗亚尔。

original: Ain't nothing creepy about it. It's a term of respect!
translation: 什么诡异。这是表示尊重！

original: <Lie> She was so excited to see you, she wouldn't wait.
translation: <撒谎> 她太想见你了，一分钟都等不下去。

original: [FAILED] Then why didn't you stop her? You could've tackled her or something! You knew how much she meant to me!
translation: [失败] 那你为什么不阻止她？你为什么不拖住她，或者想点别的办法！你明明知道她对我有多重要！

original: Just - just go away!
translation: 你——你走开！

original: <Lie> It's a tragedy. She loved you so much, she risked it all.
translation: <撒谎> 这是一场悲剧。她那么爱你，冒了那么大的危险。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Oh, my sweet blameless Red! Curse the walls of Nellis! Curse our guns and isolation! Her blood is on our hands!
translation: [成功] 噢，我无辜的爱人啊！该死的内利斯之墙！该死的大炮和隔离带！是我们害死了她！

original: Only if we stop shelling everyone who comes close will some good come from this tragedy. If you'll excuse me...
translation: 如果我们能停止炮击靠近的行人，悲剧就不会重演了。抱歉，请让我静一静……

original: I told her how to get through the artillery barrage.
translation: 我告诉她怎么穿过炮火隔离带了。

original: Wow, that seems dangerous, but if you really think it's safe, I'll trust you. You did make it here, after all.
translation: 哇，这有点危险啊，不过如果你觉得没问题，我也相信你。毕竟你都自己经历过了。

original: I've seen her, but we haven't talked about you yet.
translation: 我见过她了，不过还没有谈到你。

original: What are you waiting for? I've been losing sleep... wonder what she'll say!
translation: 你还在等什么？我成天在猜她的心思，害我都睡不着觉了 !

original: Tell me about her.
translation: 跟我说说她。

original: Does Goodsprings get many visitors?
translation: 清泉镇的外来者多吗？

original: Mostly traders looking to buy Bighorner meat and hides. The traders are the main reason the general store manages to stay in business.
translation: 大部分是来买大角羊肉和皮的商人。也正是因为这些商人，杂货店才能经营得下去。

original: Most travelers heading south on the I-15 just push on towards Primm unless they're in desperate need of supplies.
translation: 除非是物资短缺，否则绝大多数的旅行者都会沿着15号公路直接往南去普瑞姆。

original: What other towns are nearby?
translation: 附近还有其他镇子吗？

original: Southeast of here is Primm - can't miss it, since it has the giant old rollercoaster right in the middle of town. The NCR's got an outpost there.
translation: 东南方是普瑞姆——镇子的正中央有一个巨大的过山车，非常显眼。NCR在那里设了个前哨。

original: If you follow the road north, you'll eventually hit Sloan and Quarry Junction. They mine rocks or something, but I heard they got troubles lately.
translation: 如果你沿着路往北走，最终会抵达斯隆和采石场。他们好像在那儿挖石头，但我听说他们最近遇到了一点麻烦。

original: I wouldn't head that direction if I were you, though. Got critters up there that don't take kindly to getting shot.
translation: 如果我是你的话，我可不会往那边走。那附近游荡的生物都不是善茬。

original: Let's talk about the areas around Goodsprings.
translation: 我们说说清泉镇周边的地方。

original: Sure. What do you want to know?
translation: 当然，你想知道什么 ?

original: Now, the threat of legal action forces me to say that Nuka-Cola is a swell beverage, but sometimes people just wanted something different, you know?
translation: 我不想惹官司，我承认核子可乐是一种时髦的饮料，但老喝一种东西，人们总会腻的，你说对吧？

original: Looooong ago, people didn't really have many choices when it came to soft drinks. It was either water, or Nuka-Cola.
translation: 在很——久以前，人们能喝到的软饮料是非常少的，要么喝白水，要么就是核子可乐。

original: Wahoo, you did it pardner! Bully for you! Ol' Festus knew you could do it. I suppose you'll be wanting that prize now.
translation: 哇哦，你做到了，朋友！你真可牛！老费斯特斯就知道你能行。我猜你是想要奖品了。

original: Well then, hold onto your hat, because it's a doozy. Not many people have heard the true story behind Sunset Sarsaparilla. It's a right honor.
translation: 那好吧，可要把帽子摁紧咯，因为我要揭晓一个惊天大秘密。并非所有人都知道夕阳沙士背后的故事。这可是无上的荣耀。

original: And now, without further ado, your prize - The Legend of the Star...
translation: 好了，事不宜迟，接下来就是你的奖品——星星的传说……

original: Looooong ago, people didn't have a heap of choices when it came to soft drinks. It was either water, or Nuka-Cola.
translation: 在很——久以前，人们能喝到的软饮料是非常少的，要么喝白水，要么就是核子可乐。

original: Now, the threat of legal action forces me to say that Nuka-Cola is a swell beverage, but sometimes people just wanted something different, you know?
translation: 我不想惹官司，我承认核子可乐是一种非常时髦的饮料，但老喝一种东西，人们总会腻的，你说对吧？

original: So one day a man, a saloon owner in a small town, decided to make a new type of soft drink, and asked his patrons what flavor they'd like it to be.
translation: 于是某天，有一个人，一位镇上的沙龙老板，决定制作一种新型的软饮料。他问酒吧里的顾客喜欢什么口味。

original: After getting no help from them, a stranger at the end of the bar suggested the man make a sarsaparilla flavored drink.
translation: 但客人们也想不出什么好主意，这时坐在酒吧角落里的一位陌生人发话了，他建议老板做一款沙士口味的饮料。

original: The stranger said he would happily share his family's recipe for the drink, on one condition.
translation: 陌生人说，只要肯答应他的一个条件，他就把自己的祖传饮料配方送给这位老板。

original: The condition being that the stranger would be allowed to sample a bottle whenever he liked, to ensure the recipe was being followed to the letter.
translation: 而条件就是陌生人可以随时对饮料进行抽样，以确保饮料完全依照配方制作。

original: The man happily agreed, thinking the drink would make him rich, and the stranger promised to meet him by sundown the next day.
translation: 老板欢天喜地的答应了，他觉得这饮料一定能让他发大财。于是他和陌生人约定，在次日的傍晚时分见面。

original: The next morning, the sheriff stopped by and reported that the stranger's body was found on the side of the town road. He'd been killed by bandits.
translation: 第二天早晨，治安官却在小镇路边发现了这个陌生人的尸体。他是被强盗杀死的。

original: The man, cursing his luck, closed the saloon early that day, just as the sun began to set.
translation: 沙龙老板咒骂自己运气太差，那天太阳还未下山，他就早早关门打烊了。

original: But after he had locked the doors, he turned around to find an unfamiliar bottle on the bar, with a note beneath it.
translation: 可就在他关上门的时候，他转身发现酒吧里有一个从未见过的小瓶。瓶子上贴了封信。

original: The note was sealed with blue wax in the shape of a star. Opening it, the man found it contained a recipe for a sarsaparilla-flavored drink.
translation: 信的背后有块星形的蓝色封蜡。打开信后，他发现信上写的正是沙士饮料的配方。

original: Sampling the bottle's contents and finding it singularly delicious, the man gave silent thanks to his mysterious benefactor, wherever he was.
translation: 老板尝了一口瓶子里的东西，发现味道异常可口。他默默地感谢了那位神秘的恩人，虽然不知道他在哪里。

original: Being an honorable man, the saloon owner paid for the stranger's funeral, thinking it was the least he could do to repay him.
translation: 作为一个义重如山的男人，沙龙老板为陌生人举行了盛大的葬礼。他认为这是唯一能报答他的方式。

original: The saloon owner went on to become rich selling the new drink, and to this day some bottles of Sunset Sarsaparilla have a blue star under their caps.
translation: 很快，沙龙老板就靠着这种新型饮料飞黄腾达。时至今日，仍然有少数夕阳沙士的瓶盖背面印着蓝色的星星。

original: Some say the saloon owner ordered it done, in honor of the stranger. Others say it's the stranger, sampling the bottles like he promised.
translation: 有人说，这是老板为了纪念陌生人而特意制作的。也有人说，这是陌生人留下的，因为他还遵守着自己的诺言，在对饮料进行抽样。

original: And that's the Legend of the Star. Hope you enjoyed it, and hope you continue enjoying Sunset Sarsaparilla!
translation: 这就是星星的传说。希望你能喜欢，同时也希望你能继续享用夕阳沙士！

original: <Deposit your Sunset Sarsaparilla Stars in the slot.>
translation: <将你的夕阳沙士星标放进槽中。>

original: Lucky Horseshoes is played with cards numbered two through ten and aces, which have a value of one.
translation: 幸运马蹄铁使用的牌是从2到10，外加一张A，算作1点。

original: You and ol' Festus will take turns drawing cards. Each time we draw a card, we add it to our total, trying to hit the magic number of twenty one.
translation: 你和老费斯特斯轮流抽牌。每抽一张，就把牌上数字相加，争取牌的总点数接近21。

original: If either of us draws a card that brings our total up to the same number as the other, it pushes the other player's total up one.
translation: 如果某个人抽牌后，两边点数一样，那另一个玩家的总点数就要加一。

original: When this happens, it's called Lucky Horseshoes! Ol' Festus thought of the name himself, I'll have you know.
translation: 这种情况就称作幸运马蹄铁！告诉你吧，这名字可是老费斯特斯自己起的。

original: When one of us is closer to twenty one and the other can't get any closer, either by going over or because he or she held, the closer player wins.
translation: 如果我们俩中有一个人的点数更接近21，而另一个人由于不再叫牌或者爆点，已经无法再往下加了，那接近21点的那个人就算赢。

original: Ol' Festus likes the game because there are no ties in Lucky Horseshoes. If someone's sitting pretty on twenty one, Lady Luck can still bump 'em off!
translation: 老费斯特斯喜欢这规则的原因是幸运马蹄铁中不存在平局。即便某人正好是21点，幸运女神也可以踢掉他！

original: But enough jawing. By now you're as eager as I am to get tossing.
translation: 说得够多了。现在你应该也迫不及待，想来试一把了吧。

original: How do I play?
translation: 我要怎么玩？

original: Let's go.
translation: 咱们走吧。

original: Oh, Easy Pete came through with the dynamite. Here's your supply. I really hope I don't blow myself up.
translation: 哦，轻松皮特送来了一些炸药。分给你一点吧。希望我不会把自己炸飞。

original: I'll be set up near the store. Let's hope that the gang doesn't manage to make it that far.
translation: 我会守在商店附近。希望他们不会打到这里来。

original: I'm just passing through.
translation: 我只是路过。

original: I'm just passing through.
translation: 我只是路过。

original: I'm just passing through.
translation: 我只是路过。

original: [Offer Radioactive Gum] Does La Fantoma need some power gum?
translation: [给辐射口香糖] 夜魔侠要不要来点超级口香糖？

original: [Offer Chems] You know what will help you box better? Psycho. Would you like some?
translation: [给药品] 想知道怎样才能变得更厉害吗？这儿有一些疯狂药，你想来一点吗 ?

original: [Offer Radioactive Gum] I hear dinosaurs like gum.
translation: [给辐射口香糖] 我听说恐龙喜欢口香糖。

original: [Offer Radioactive Gum] Here you go kid, gum is fun!
translation: [给辐射口香糖] 这个送你，小孩，口香糖可好吃了！

original: [Offer Toy Rocket] I believe La Fantoma could use a rocket toy to enhance her flight.
translation: 我觉得夜魔侠可以用玩具火箭来增加她的飞行能力。

original: [Offer Toy Rocket] Mission control, you can't fly without a rocket. Here, take this toy rocket.
translation: 控制中心，没有火箭你不能飞，这个玩具火箭送给你。

original: [Offer Toy Dinosaur] Woah there, Red-Brick, why don't you box with this dinosaur toy?
translation: [送玩具恐龙] 哇，红发小子，这个玩具恐龙送你玩儿怎么样。 ?

original: [Offer Toy Rocket] I found this rocket toy you can have.
translation: [给玩具火箭] 这个玩具火箭送给你。

original: A rocket! Yay! {Rocket sounds}Vrooom!
translation: 火箭，耶！{Rocket sounds} 呼-姆 !

original: [Offer Radioactive Gum] Hey kid, I have some gum here. It is good for you!
translation: [给辐射口香糖] 嘿，小鬼，我有口香糖，要不要尝尝？

original: What say I help you take over this town?
translation: 我帮你占了这所镇子怎么样？

original: What the hell for? Just farmers and ranchers out here. Not much worth stealing.
translation: 图个什么呢？这里就只有农夫和农场工人。值得偷的东西都没几件。

original: Didn't you already ask me about this? What the hell for - this place is worthless.
translation: 你不是问过我了吗？图个什么呢——这地方连鸡都不拉屎。

original: Exhale before you fire. Squeeze the trigger, don't jerk it.
translation: 在你开火前，要先呼气，轻叩扳机，不要太用力。

original: [FAILED] I'm really not sure how this works.
translation: [失败] 我觉得这个方法不太可能有用。

original: You're never going to hit anything shooting in one direction. Fire wildly!
translation: 光朝一个方向开枪是永远打不中东西的。射击时要狂野一点！

original: Ah, a job well done is its own reward. Good riddance to this rubbish.
translation: 啊，能把活干完就是最好的奖赏。这些垃圾总算清扫干净了。

original: Get the troops lined up. I'll help you with it.
translation: 让部队集合，我来帮你。

original: After the help you gave us at the shooting range, we'll take any advice you've got. I'll line them up.
translation: 你对我们的射击指导相当管用，我们愿意听从你的任何建议。我这就去整队。

original: I have 10 spare missiles.
translation: 我有10发导弹可以给你。

original: Good work.
translation: 干得好。

original: I have 5 spare missiles.
translation: 我有5发导弹可以给你。

original: Thanks. Those'll last us a day.
translation: 谢谢。够我们用一天了。

original: I have 1 spare missile.
translation: 我有1发导弹可以给你。

original: It's better than nothing.
translation: 有总比没有好。

original: Here's three doses of RadAway.
translation: 这是3袋辐特宁。

original: Hold still. This'll burn for a moment.
translation: 忍着点，可能会感觉有些烫。

original: All right. Here's two doses of Fixer.
translation: 好吧，这是2剂瘾头解。

original: You're going to feel a little pinch.
translation: 可能会有点疼。

original: You can really get hurt out there.
translation: 你需要更加小心，在外面很容易受伤的。

original: Here are two Stimpaks.
translation: 给你2个治疗针。

original: This'll make you feel better.
translation: 这会让你感觉好点。

original: Here's two doses of RadAway.
translation: 这是2袋辐特宁。

original: Hold still. This'll burn for a moment.
translation: 忍着点，可能会感觉有些烫。

original: All right. Here's three doses of Fixer.
translation: 好吧，这是三剂瘾头解。

original: You're going to feel a little pinch.
translation: 可能会有点疼。

original: I'm suffering from radiation sickness.
translation: 我正饱受辐射病之苦。

original: I can help you in exchange for Stimpaks.
translation: 我可以帮你，只要你愿意拿几个治疗针来换。

original: I can help you in exchange for Stimpaks.
translation: 我可以帮你，只要你愿意拿几个治疗针来换。

original: I need help with an addiction.
translation: 我想解除上瘾症状。

original: I can unburden you of that, in exchange for doses of RadAway.
translation: 我可以帮你解除，但需要你拿几剂辐特宁来换。

original: I can unburden you of that, in exchange for doses of RadAway.
translation: 我可以帮你解除，但需要你拿几剂辐特宁来换。

original: I have wounds that need mending.
translation: 我有伤口需要治疗。

original: I can patch you up in exchange for doses of Fixer.
translation: 我可以帮你包扎伤口，但需要你拿几剂瘾头解做交换。

original: I can patch you up in exchange for doses of Fixer.
translation: 我可以帮你包扎伤口，但需要你拿几剂瘾头解做交换。

original: I'm pleased that you listened to the entire story! Perhaps there are details you'd like to know more about? Let me know.
translation: 谢谢你能听完我们的整段历史！也许你还想知道更多的细节？请告诉我。

original: I repaired the solar arrays.
translation: 我把太阳能电池板修好了。

original: Well, how about that! I'll have to check out your handiwork.
translation: 啊，真的吗！我得亲自去看看你的杰作。

original: And here I thought we had them running as best we could before they broke down again. Thanks for getting those sorted for me.
translation: 我还以为在这次损坏以前，我们已经把它们的工作效率调整到最佳状态了。谢谢你帮我解决了这些问题。

original: I fixed the arrays and improved their efficiency a bit too.
translation: 我修好了太阳能电池板，还略微提高了它们的效率。

original: Well, how about that! Turns out you aren't completely useless, working with your hands.
translation: 啊，真的吗！这么说你也不是一无是处，还是有点技术的。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Of course. You been through a lot. Ain't much, but these'll do you right if the pain flares up.
translation: [成功] 当然。你受苦了。虽然不多，但如果你的疼痛加剧，这些至少会让你好受点。

original: Isn't it customary for a doctor to prescribe follow-up medication?
translation: 对医生来说，把后续用药先开出来不是很正常吗？

original: Well, I already told you I came from a vault. After that, I was a traveling doctor for a spell.
translation: 好吧，我告诉过你了，我是从避难所来的。离开避难所后，我当了一段时间的游医。

original: Seemed like a good idea at the time. Most folks out here ain't educated, so people with medical knowhow are hard to come by.
translation: 当时这份营生还不错。因为这儿大多数人从来没受过什么教育，更别提懂医术了。

original: Found that I could help a lot of people with what I knew, and that was all right with me.
translation: 我发现我所学的知识能帮助很多人，感觉还挺好的。

original: Eventually, I went back and married my childhood sweetheart and that was the end of my traveling days. Didn't miss it none then. Still don't.
translation: 后来，我回去和我的青梅竹马结了婚，游医的日子也结束了。我一点也不怀念那段时光。一点也不。

original: Tell me about yourself, Doc.
translation: 介绍一下你自己吧，医生。

original: That'd be Victor. Curious fella. He's sort of odd. And I don't just mean 'cause he's a robot. I couldn't tell you much about him.
translation: 那就是维克多，奇怪的家伙，是那种怪人。不光因为他是个机器人我才这么说。关于他更多的事我也说不上来了。

original: He's real friendly, don't get me wrong. You just get the sense that ain't the whole picture. Just a feeling.
translation: 你别误会，他非常友好。但我总觉得他没那么简单。就是有种感觉。

original: Keeps to himself, mostly. You want to know more about him, you'll have to ask him yourself. He has a shack on the southern edge of town.
translation: 大部分时间他都独来独往。如果你想了解他的情况，可以自己去问他。他在镇子的南边有个棚屋。

original: Who was it that rescued me?
translation: 救我的人是谁？

original: Yeah, you've been a real bundle of laughs.
translation: 是的，你们就是一群笑话。

original: Yeah, right. Bitch.
translation: 是，没错，婊子。

original: Yeah, right. Dick.
translation: 是，很对，傻逼。

original: I guess you could start the engines underwater and hop it up onto shore...
translation: 我猜如果你在水下发动引擎，它就会直接跳出水面……

original: [FAILED] I'm not a mechanic, but after 300 years I don't think those engines would start up.
translation: [失败] 虽然我不是机械师，不过我觉得，都过了300年了，那些引擎不太可能发动得了。

original: But a little radiation didn't keep your people away!
translation: 但是一点点辐射并没有把你的人吓跑！

original: That's right! Our Geiger counter indicates that the base was radioactive, but not dangerously so. Enough time has passed.
translation: 对的！我们的盖格计数器显示这个基地确实还存在辐射，但已经没那么危险了。毕竟时间已经过了足够久。

original: I'm looking to make myself useful. Who needs help around here?
translation: 我希望能为你们做点事。这里有谁需要帮忙吗？

original: Gosh, there's a lot of folks. Argyll's our doctor - he could use help tending to any injured we got.
translation: 哎哟，要帮忙的人可多了去了。阿盖尔是我们的医生——他需要有人帮他照料伤员。

original: Another time, maybe.
translation: 也许下次吧。

original: If you're interested in knowing more about us, it seems like you'd be pretty amazed by our mural. Is there something else?
translation: 如果你真的对我们的历史感兴趣，那壁画一定会震撼到你的。还有什么事吗？

original: Sure, I can spare the time.
translation: 当然，我有大把时间。

original: Excellent. Imagine - you're the first outsider to ever hear our tale! <clears throat>
translation: 很好。想象一下吧，你是第一个听我们讲述历史的外来者！<清清嗓子>

original: <Lie> Make it 700 caps or I'll tell the Boomers to adjust their trajectory.
translation: <撒谎> 给我700个瓶盖，不然我就叫大炮族调整弹道。

original: [SUCCEEDED] You drive a hard bargain. Here you go. Have a nice {sarcasm on nice}day.
translation: [成功] 你很能讲价钱。给你。祝你过得愉快。

original: <Speech>
translation: <口才技能>

original: [FAILED] Who I am and what I am doing is my business. Now are you in the market for info or not?
translation: [失败] 我是谁，我是干什么的，这些都和你无关。你到底要不要买我的情报？

original: Who the hell are you?
translation: 你到底是谁？

original: <Science skill>
translation: <科技技能>

original: [FAILED] Sorry, there is no way it would withstand submersion. It has to be watertight, and the past few times I've tested it I've gotten a mouthful of water.
translation: [失败] 抱歉，这东西不防水。呼吸器必须得防水才行。我测试过几次，每次都要呛好大一口水。

original: A pressure cooker would have the gaskets and valving I need to seal it up.
translation: 压力锅上有我做密封装置所需要的垫圈和阀门。

original: Aw c'mon, it looks fine. I bet the seal will hold.
translation: 啊，拜托，没关系的。密封性应该没问题。

original: I need to get to Primm. Can you suggest a route?
translation: 我要去普瑞姆。你可以给我指条路吗？

original: Sure can. Take the road southeast out of town till it hits the freeway. Primm is the town with the roller coaster, straight south. Can't miss it.
translation: 当然可以。沿着镇外东南边的路，一直走到高速公路。普瑞姆小镇上有一台过山车，就在正南边。你肯定能找得到

original: NCR patrols do a good job of keeping the highway clear, but I'd keep your gun where you can reach it easily. You never know who you'll run into.
translation: NCR的巡逻队把高速公路上的治安维持得挺不错，但我个人还是情愿把枪放在最顺手的地方。你永远想不到自己会遇到什么状况。

original: Off the road, you'll probably start running into hostile wildlife. My advice would be to stick to the highway when you can.
translation: 如果离开大路的话，你可能会遇到充满敌意的野生动物。所以我的建议是尽量走高速公路。

original: I fixed your radio.
translation: 我把收音机修好了。

original: Yeah, I heard it turn right back on after you got done tinkering with it. Here's some caps for the work.
translation: 是的，你刚修完我就听到它响了。这是给你的报酬。

original: A man named Joe Cobb was looking for you, but I killed him.
translation: 有一个叫乔·科布的人在找你，不过我已经把他杀了。

original: Err, thanks, I guess. Cobb wasn't the problem, though - I could've handled him if he ever found me.
translation: 呃，看来我该谢谢你。但其实科布不是问题——如果他找到我，我自己就能把他解决掉。

original: Cobb's friends are the bigger problem, and when he doesn't get back, they'll be coming here for blood. There's no way I can fight them all.
translation: 科布的那些朋友才是真正的麻烦，如果他没回去，他们很可能会回来寻仇。我可没办法对付那么多人。

original: What does he actually do around here?
translation: 他在这到底是干些什么？

original: Other than rolling around once in a while, it doesn't do anything useful as far as I can tell.
translation: 无非就是到处转悠，要我说的话，他就没干过什么有用的事情。

original: I don't know why it took an interest in you, but I'd be careful. It's never helped anyone before.
translation: 我不知道它为什么会对你感兴趣，但换成我的话肯定会多留个心眼。它以前从没救过人。

original: I repaired the solar arrays and increased their efficiency.
translation: 我修好了太阳能电池板，还提高了功率。

original: An impressive piece of work. I'll keep that in mind if jobs come up in the future.
translation: 技术真不错。要是以后有类似的活，我还找你。

original: Doc Mitchell said you could teach me to survive in the desert.
translation: 米切尔医生说你能教我沙漠求生技巧。

original: Yeah, I guess there's a thing or two I could show you. Sounds like you need all the help you can get after what they done to you.
translation: 对，我是可以教你一两样东西。听起来你还是挺需要帮助的嘛，毕竟受了这样的打击。

original: Meet me outside, behind the saloon.
translation: 来外面找我吧，就在酒馆后面。

original: Looks like I got an eight, pardner.
translation: 看样子我拿到了一张8，朋友。

original: <Watch Festus draw a card.>
translation: <看费斯特斯抽了一张牌。>

original: <Press the blue button to draw a card.>
translation: <按下蓝色键抽牌。>

original: Looks like you got an eight, pardner.
translation: 看样子你拿到了一张8，朋友。

original: <Press the blue Draw button.>
translation: <按下蓝色键抽牌。>

original: Who is Mother Pearl?
translation: 珀尔妈妈是谁？

original: As I said, she is our Eldest. Mother Pearl has lived at Nellis from the start, and has the wisdom of her age.
translation: 我说过了，她是我们的长老。珀尔妈妈从内利斯建立起就在这里了，她有着与年龄相称的智慧。

original: She said that this day would come, and that any savage to reach our gates should be brought to her.
translation: 她说这一天迟早会到来，只要出现能抵达我们门口的野蛮人，都必须要带去见她。

original: I ain't got much, but it'll do you more good out there than it will in here. Take what I got.
translation: 我手上的东西并不多，不过你拿去用总比留在这儿强。都给你吧。

original: They'll be using explosives. Do you have something for more serious injuries?
translation: 他们会使用炸药。你有没有什么威力更大的东西？

original: Here are three Stimpaks.
translation: 给你3个治疗针。

original: This'll make you feel better.
translation: 这会让你感觉好点。

original: Powder Gangers?
translation: 炸药帮？

original: Who was that man you were arguing with?
translation: 跟你吵架的那个人是谁？

original: He's a convict. Just without the chains. Said his name was Cobb. "Powder Gangers" is what they call themselves. Plenty more like him out there.
translation: 一个犯人，没戴镣铐而已。他说他叫科布。他们自称"炸药帮"，像他那样的人还有不少。

original: The NCR troopers have been paid to look the other way.
translation: NCR士兵已经收了贿赂，他们不会再管你们了。

original: Then we are out of here. Here - a souvenir for you. It's Benny's lighter. Shove it up his ass when you catch up with him.
translation: 那我们马上走。这个送你，就当留个纪念吧。这是本尼的打火机。等你追上他，记得替我把这玩意塞进他的屁眼里。

original: Ha ha ha, oh, that's rich. You're not exactly my type, no offense. No, I meant I could give you a tip. Earn my money, so to speak.
translation: 哈哈哈，你想象力真丰富。恕我直言，你不是我喜欢的类型。不，我的意思是，我可以给你些建议，顺便给自己挣点钱。

original: Are you soliciting me?
translation: 你在拉客吗？

original: Sure, here you go.
translation: 当然，给你。

original: The first thing you should know is that Freeside is run by a pack of yahoos that call themselves the Kings.
translation: 你要知道的第一件事就是，自由城是被一群自称猫王帮的地痞流氓们所把控。

original: Their leader, who oddly enough calls himself the King, currently has his hands full trying to prevent an all-out riot in Freeside.
translation: 他们的领袖，不知为啥管自己叫猫王，现在正忙着阻止自由城发生大暴动呢。

original: That's two tips, but what the hell. You're a new customer so the extra one's on me. Wanna hear another?
translation: 我就这两点忠告。算了，看在你是新主顾的份上，我就再告诉你一件事情好了。想听吗？

original: At the northwest end of Fremont Street you'll find the Silver Rush. It's run by a rather scary family called the Van Graffs.
translation: 费蒙街的西北尽头是银色冲击。由恐怖的范格拉夫家族经营。

original: These are {stressed}not people you want to mess with. But if lasers and such are your thing, the goods they sell are second to none.
translation: 相信我，你惹不起那些人。不过如果你喜欢激光枪或者其他这类小玩意的话，他们那儿卖的绝对是上等货。

original: If you've been around the Kings, you may have met one of them named Pacer. He's always stomping around trying to show off his authority.
translation: 如果你去找猫王帮，可能会遇到他们中一个名叫佩瑟的家伙。这人经常横行霸道，以势压人。

original: Being new, you weren't around when it happened, but a few months ago Pacer pissed off the Van Graff family big time.
translation: 你是新来的，所以可能不知道，几个月前佩瑟惹怒了范格拉夫家族，闹得可大了。

original: No one knows what went down, but word is the Van Graffs still want him dead.
translation: 没人知道事情是怎么平息的，但有流言说范格拉夫仍然想要他的命。

original: The Chairmen run a casino on the Strip called the Tops. It's a pretty classy place, by all reports.
translation: 董事会在长街经营着一个名叫九重天的赌场。据说那是个相当上档次的地方。

original: I haven't been there myself, but I hear security there is kinda tight.
translation: 我还没去过那里，但听说那里的安保很严密。别指望你能带着武器进去。

original: Traders have been griping for a while now about I-15 being too dangerous to travel. I'd steer clear of it unless you're armed to the teeth.
translation: 商人们在抱怨现在的15号洲际公路太危险了，除非你武装到牙齿，否则最好还是避开。

original: What do you need?
translation: 你需要什么？

original: Med-X, RadAway, and Fixer are Freeside essentials. I can't pay you for any supplies you bring in, but I could discount the charge for our services.
translation: 吗啡针-X、辐特宁、瘾头解都是必需品。虽然我没法付给你报酬，但我可以为你提供打折服务。

original: What goods and services do you have to offer?
translation: 你都提供些什么商品和服务？

original: We've got liquor, chems, and whores aplenty. Pick your fix and we'll oblige. Our only rule is no sampling the merchandise. Caps paid in advance.
translation: 我们有酒，有药，还有女人。你提要求，我们来满足。唯一的规矩是我们不提供免费试用。你得先付瓶盖。

original: If you'd like to do a bit of gambling, we have an exchange at the back of the casino on the left.
translation: 如果你想小赌一把，在赌场左后方有个地方可以兑换筹码。

original: Anything going on around here?
translation: 最近有什么新变化吗？

original: Just the usual. Legion scouts try to slip across the river a couple of times a week, but they always end up floating downriver with holes in their heads.
translation: 老样子，军团的斥候每星期都想溜过河。不过他们最后的结局都是脑门上多了几个窟窿，顺着河飘走了。

original: Heck Gunderson said he was here to talk business with you. What business?
translation: 赫克·冈德森说他是来和你谈生意的。什么生意？

original: What else? Mr. Gunderson and I have been discussing his livestock.
translation: 还能是什么生意？我们和冈德森先生正在讨论从他那儿购买畜肉。

original: It's put us in a rather delicate position, you see, his coming here. Not that we aren't grateful for his generous offer.
translation: 这次他突然登门造访，倒是让我们的处境变得有些为难了。虽然对于他的慷慨提议，我们深表感激。

original: But our executive chef Philippe has transformed brahmin steak into a delicacy. He really is a genius. Everyone wants it.
translation: 但我们的主厨菲利普是能将普通的双头牛排变成美味佳肴的人。他确实是个天才。每个人都想品尝他的手艺。

original: But a delicacy is just that - delicate. If everyone can get it, it ceases to be a delicacy. It becomes a perfectly ordinary staple.
translation: 然而美味佳肴有一点是不可或缺的——精致。如果人人都能品尝，那它就不是什么美味佳肴，而只能算是家常菜了。

original: And if the Gourmand served staples, it would no longer draw the caliber of people it deserves. It would be a diner or... a family restaurant.
translation: 如果美食家餐厅供应家常菜，那就没法再吸引有品位的客人了。我们的餐厅会沦落成小餐馆，甚至……家庭饭店。

original: So as much as we'd all love for there to be enough steak for everyone, I'm afraid there are more important things to consider.
translation: 所以尽管我们也十分希望每个人都能吃上牛排，但恐怕我们还有更重要的事情需要考虑。

original: I'm investigating someone else. A man. And he just recently went missing.
translation: 我正在调查另外的人，一个男的。他也是最近失踪的。

original: A man? Well then this... well this can't be. Two disappearances in my hotel? What will people say?
translation: 男的？这……这不可能啊。我的酒店居然接连发生了两起失踪事件？这要传出去，人们会怎么说啊？

original: I'm going to have a word with my staff about security on the premises.
translation: 看来我得和员工们谈谈酒店的安全问题了。

original: Whether these people are found or not, our guests simply must feel safe in their own rooms.
translation: 不管能不能找到那两个人，我们都必须保证客人在房间里能住得放心。

original: It's okay. I eat people too. You can tell me the truth.
translation: 没关系，我也吃人的。你可以告诉我真相。

original: You disgust me. How dare you say such a filthy thing in my establishment? I ought to have you arrested.
translation: 你真让人恶心。你怎么敢在我的地盘说这么肮脏的事？我真该叫人逮捕你。

original: You'll kindly mind your tongue, or we shan't speak any further.
translation: 麻烦你注意一下自己的言辞，否则我们实在没必要再聊下去了。

original: I'm looking for someone who went missing here recently.
translation: 最近有人失踪了，我在找他。

original: This again? I thought this was all settled. I answered every one of that investigator's questions to his satisfaction and gave all the help I could.
translation: 又来？我还以为全都解决了呢。那侦探提出的所有问题，我都一一回答到他满意为止了，能帮的忙也全帮了。

original: I know our reputation hasn't always been spotless, but that's all in the past now. How some people can't get over it is beyond me.
translation: 我知道我们不是没有污点，可那都是过去的事了。为什么有些人总喜欢揪着过去不放呢。

original: For the last time, the White Glove Society has never and will never consume human flesh for any reason. It's written in the charter.
translation: 我最后再说一次，白手套社团从来没有、将来也不会出于任何原因食用人肉。这一点已经明白地写在我们的章程里了。

original: So you're a rancher?
translation: 你是个牧场主？

original: Yep, got a whole mess of brahmins to my name. Bighorners, too.
translation: 没错，我名下有一大群双头牛。还有大角羊。

original: Used to just have the one ranch, but land was easy to grab before the soldiers moved in.
translation: 起初我只有一座牧场，不过在NCR部队开进来之前，想要搞到土地还是挺容易的。

original: Before I knew it I was running one of the biggest ranching operations east of California.
translation: 不知不觉中，我就当上了加州东部规模最大的牧业集团的老板。

original: Now everywhere I go, folks I never even met shake my hand and call me "Mr. Gunderson." Don't quite know what to make of that.
translation: 现在，不管我去哪儿，都会有一些我从来没见过的家伙跑来和我握手，叫我"冈德森先生"。真不明白他们为什么要这样。

original: You lost your son?
translation: 你儿子不见了？

original: My boy, Ted. He was right here. I didn't leave him but a minute. I told him to stay put while I talked some things over with the White Glove folks.
translation: 我儿子泰德。他之前还在这儿的。我离开他连一分钟都不到。我都跟他说了，在我和白手套社团谈生意的时候别四处乱跑。

original: He was never one to stay tied down to a spot, though. Gets that from his mother.
translation: 可他就是坐不住，都是从他老妈那儿遗传来的。

original: Got most of my staff out looking for him now. I'd be out myself, but I keep hoping he'll show up back here.
translation: 我已经派出大部分手下去找他了。我本来也想去的，但我还是希望这小子能自己懂得回来。

original: Course if he does that I'll whup him till his skinny hide turns to leather for putting me through this. But that don't mean I wouldn't be grateful.
translation: 等他回来了，我非把这兔崽子抽得皮开肉绽不可。害我提心吊胆这么久。不过只要他能回来，我也就谢天谢地了。

original: I'd like to help you with your debt collection.
translation: 我想帮你去收账。

original: Great. There are three people who need to be tracked down, a real mixed basket of fruits. Their names are Grecks, Santiago, and Lady Jane.
translation: 太好了。有三个人需要还钱，都是一帮歪瓜裂枣。他们分别是格里克斯、圣地亚哥和简女士。

original: James tells me you already handled Santiago by getting him to work for us. We'll just garnish his wages.
translation: 詹姆斯告诉我你已经搞定了圣地亚哥，让他来为我们工作。我们会从他的工资里扣的。

original: Great. There are three people who need to be tracked down, a real mixed basket of fruits. Their names are Grecks, Santiago, and Lady Jane.
translation: 太好了。有三个人需要还钱，都是一帮歪瓜裂枣。他们分别是格里克斯、圣地亚哥和简女士。

original: <Speech more money>
translation: <说服对方付更多钱>

original: [SUCCEEDED] Alright. 50/50 it is, but you better bring back all of the caps. If we hear you crossed us, the next bounty hunter will be coming for you.
translation: [成功] 好吧。五五开就五五开，但你最好能把所有瓶盖都要回来。如果你敢骗我们，我们就会另找赏金猎人收拾你。

original: Hey, I'm doing all of the work here. 50/50 and I'm game.
translation: 嘿，所有的活儿可都是我一个人干哪。你得给我五五分账。

original: [FAILED] Who the hell do you think you're talking to? Keep talking like that and your ass is going to be in the gutter. 25%. Take it or leave it.
translation: [失败] 你以为自己算哪根葱？你再敢那样说话，我就把你丢到阴沟里。25%，不干拉倒。

original: Twenty-five percent?! Fifty-fifty, or I walk.
translation: 才25%？五五开，否则免谈。

original: You've got yourself a deal.
translation: 成交了。

original: Great. There are three people who need to be tracked down, a real mixed basket of fruits. Their names are Grecks, Santiago, and Lady Jane.
translation: 太好了。有三个人需要还钱，都是一帮歪瓜裂枣。他们分别是格里克斯、圣地亚哥和简女士。

original: James tells me you already handled Santiago by getting him to work for us. We'll just garnish his wages.
translation: 詹姆斯告诉我你已经搞定了圣地亚哥，让他来为我们工作。我们会从他的工资里扣的。

original: Great. There are three people who need to be tracked down, a real mixed basket of fruits. Their names are Grecks, Santiago, and Lady Jane.
translation: 太好了。有三个人需要还钱，都是一帮歪瓜裂枣。他们分别是格里克斯、圣地亚哥和简女士。

original: Eh, sorry. I've got some other things I need to handle first.
translation: 嗯，对不起。我还有些别的事要先处理。

original: Do you have any work you need done around here?
translation: 你有没有什么事情需要帮忙的？

original: I have some work I need handled. Back before we instituted the caps up front rule, we used to allow customers tabs.
translation: 确实有件事需要处理。在我们要求客人先付瓶盖以前，曾经允许过顾客记账消费。

original: Well, needless to say, a few customers snuck out without paying their bills. We need someone to collect. The job would pay a percentage.
translation: 不用说，有些客人没付钱就悄悄溜了。我们需要有人去收账。这活儿是有提成的。

original: I'd like a room.
translation: 我想要个房间。

original: Just a few caps and it's yours.
translation: 只要几个瓶盖，它就是你的了。

original: I'd like to see what you have on tap.
translation: 我想看看你这儿都有什么现成的东西。

original: Caps up front. We don't do tabs here.
translation: 先付瓶盖。恕不赊账。

original: I'm not a kid, old man.
translation: 我可不是小家伙，老家伙。

original: {Irritated}You've got a mouth on you, kid. If I weren't busy working for the Garrets, I might give you a few lessons in common courtesy. Get lost.
translation: {Irritated}嘴挺厉害的嘛，小家伙。我要不是忙着给加勒特家干活，肯定会教你懂点礼貌。滚开。

original: Marjorie said you gave a free room to a private investigator.
translation: 玛乔里说你给那个私家侦探安排了一间免费客房。

original: Private investigator... Ah, yes. I remember the gentleman.
translation: 私家侦探……啊，是的。我记得那位绅士。

original: This was about the missing bride. Such an awful thing. I do hope he finds her whereabouts.
translation: 他在调查失踪新娘的案子。真是太惨了。我衷心希望他能找到她的下落。

original: If I might pry, have you found something that will help his investigation?
translation: 如果您不介意，我想打听一下，您有没有发现什么有助于他调查的线索？

original: What guns do you have for sale?
translation: 你都卖什么枪？

original: Have a look.
translation: 瞧一瞧。

original: How's business?
translation: 生意如何？

original: Things were better when the Omertas were buying, but we get by. Good selection from traders and the Van Graffs keep things running.
translation: 以前黑手党经常光顾，那时生意相当不错，现在也还行。货源很充足，我们也沾了范格拉夫家族的光。

original: Things were better when the Omertas were buying, but we get by. Van Graffs getting killed is making a mess of things, but we have other customers.
translation: 以前黑手党经常光顾，那时生意相当不错，现在也还行。范格拉夫家族完蛋以后，情况差了不少，好在我们还有其他客户。

original: Who is The King?
translation: 猫王是谁？

original: If you haven't heard of The King, you must have been living under a rock or something.
translation: 如果你连猫王都没听说过，那你肯定是从山洞里钻出来的。

original: The King has his boys all over Freeside. He controls the water pump and is essentially the go-to guy for what goes around here.
translation: 自由城到处都有猫王的手下。他控制着水泵，在这儿遇到任何问题，都得先去找他。

original: What do you have in stock?
translation: 你有什么现货？

original: Take a gander.
translation: 看一看吧。

original: Good news. The Omertas say they'll buy arms from you again.
translation: 好消息。黑手党说他们会再来你这里购买武器。

original: Outstanding! You have no idea how much this means to me, but I think this little beauty will give you an idea.
translation: 太好了！你绝对想不到这对我来说有多重要，不过这个小礼物应该能让你了解个大概。

original: They found a way to smuggle guns in at a lower price.
translation: 他们有渠道走私枪支，价格便宜好多。

original: Well, that would explain why they stopped buying. Them not telling me why leads me to think I'd rather not know the particulars.
translation: 难怪他们不来我这儿买了。既然他们不肯告诉我，那我最好还是别知道得太多吧。

original: Thanks for digging that up for me. If there is any way you could convince them to reestablish, I have a few extra special items you can have.
translation: 谢谢你帮我找到了原因。如果你有办法说服他们再来买枪，我可以给你提供一些特殊商品。

original: They're too pricey for anyone around here to afford, but getting the Omerta's sales back would be a worthy trade.
translation: 它们价格太贵，附近的人都买不起，不过如果你能把黑手党拉回来，这笔交易还是挺划算的。

original: I think I figured out why the Omertas stopped buying.
translation: 我想我知道为什么黑手党不买枪了。

original: Really? What did you learn?
translation: 真的？什么原因？

original: I found this ledger that proves some of your side business.
translation: 我发现这个账目里记载着你在外面干私活。

original: Where the fuck did you get that? {Nervous}Okay, listen buddy... That's some dangerous shit you got there.
translation: 你他妈在哪搞到这个的？{Nervous}好吧，伙计，听着……这玩意儿他妈的很危险。

original: That book can get me killed if the wrong people see it. Let's talk, what do you want? What can I do for you?
translation: 这本册子如果被不该看到的人看到了，我这条命就保不住了。我们谈谈吧，你想要什么？我能为你做点什么？

original: I hear you've been dealing with some business that is off limits for the family.
translation: 我听说你在经营一些违反家规的生意。

original: I don't give half a dick what you've heard. Now get the fuck out of my face before I burn your sorry ass.
translation: 你听到的那些鸟事都跟老子没关系。快他妈滚蛋，要不老子把你屁股燎了。

original: The Omertas won't take kindly to hearing about your relationship with Joana.
translation: 黑手党可是不会体谅你和琼娜的关系的。

original: Joana? That bitch spreading lies about me? I've got a lesson to teach her about loose lips.
translation: 琼娜？那个婊子在散布有关我的谣言？我已经因为她的大嘴巴教训过她一次了。

original: I've got evidence that Benny tried to kill me and stole a Platinum Chip from me.
translation: 我有证据可以证明本尼企图谋杀我，还偷走了白金筹码。

original: Whoa, hey now, kid, that's some kind of serious charge you're dropping. You want to be real careful what you say next.
translation: 哇哦，嘿，我说小鬼，这可不是闹着玩的啊。你最好考虑清楚了再告状。

original: Yeah? What else you got?
translation: 是吗？你还弄到了什么？

original: I've got more evidence that proves Benny tried to kill me.
translation: 我有更多的证据可以证明本尼想要杀我。

original: Who are you?
translation: 你是谁？

original: Ain't been on the Strip long, have you, pal? Name's Swank. This is my joint.
translation: 初来乍到是吧，伙计？我叫斯万克，这里是我的地盘。

original: Every bit helps. Thanks.
translation: 都很有用，谢谢。

original: Hey wait! I just remembered something. I might've heard one of the guys that attacked us call another by name.
translation: 嘿，等下！我突然想起来一件事。我似乎听到有个打人的家伙喊了另外一个人的名字。

original: We had just about had it when one of them said "Hey Lou, we gotta go." At least I think he said Lou. It might have been something else.
translation: 我们当时都快不行了，就听到有人说了一句"嘿，钟，我们得走了。"反正我听他说的是钟，也可能是别的。

original: Now that I think of it, he said Lou-something. Something with a "T". Tenant! That's what he called him. Lou Tenant.
translation: 现在回想起来，他好像说了钟什么来着，似乎是有一个"未"字。对了！他是这么叫的，钟未。

original: Not much. He seemed legit to me.
translation: 我看他没什么问题。

original: Oh he did, did he? Well that just ain't good enough. Get back out there and hire him again. Hire him a hundred times if that's what it takes.
translation: 哦，没问题吗？那说明你的功夫还不到家。回去再雇他一次。如果有必要，雇上一百次也在所不惜。

original: And before you ask, I'm not gonna cover the cost this time. It's bad enough I'm giving the man *more* business.
translation: 提前说一句，这次我不会再承担任何费用了。让那个人再多赚一单生意已经够亏的了。

original: <Lie> Of course I act on behalf of Mr. House. Why else would I be here?
translation: <撒谎) 我当然是代表豪斯先生来的。不然我来这儿干什么 ?

original: <Lie> A messenger?... Why, yes! Of course, Mr. House and I go way, waaaay back.
translation: <说谎) 传话的？……啊，是！当然，豪斯先生和我可是老——交情了。

original: Mickey, photography is a risky business. This is going to cost you. A lot.
translation: 米开，摄影是一项冒险的工作。你得花钱。而且钱还不少。

original: There's an opportunity for profit anywhere, huh? Even if it means preying on the helpless. Okay, you... shuckster - 150 caps each if they are good.
translation: 你是掉钱眼儿里了吗，啊？连一个手足无措的人你都不放过。好吧，你这……吸血鬼——150瓶盖一张，前提是保证质量。

original: I'll help you. Do you have any landmarks in mind?
translation: 我会帮你的。你有什么想要看的地标吗？

original: I've always wanted to see the Dinosaur and its Thermometer sign at Novac. Then there's the famous Bison Steve sign.
translation: 我一直想看看诺瓦克的大恐龙和温度计。还有，著名的野牛史蒂夫旅馆招牌。

original: The McCarran Airfield and the HELIOS One power station signs are of much interest to my work - like the Sunset Sarsaparilla Headquarters' bottle.
translation: 麦卡伦机场和太阳神一号发电站也会对我的创作大有帮助——此外还有夕阳沙士总部大楼上的瓶子。

original: Several years of psychoanalysis and a few thousand caps a month will fix you.
translation: 只要坚持精神疗法，每月花个几千瓶盖，过几年你就会治好了。

original: Artists are scarce. I bet you get paid handsomely. Cough up 300 caps.
translation: 艺术家可是稀缺资源，我打赌你肯定挣了不少钱。拿300瓶盖出来。

original: {Taking Offense}[FAILED] What!? I don't get paid near enough to what my talent deserves!? 150 caps is my final offer.
translation: {Taking Offense}[失败] 什么！？我拿的报酬可远远配不上我的天赋啊！？我最多出150瓶盖。

original: Have you seen the cost of pliers, duct-tape and saws lately? 300 caps.
translation: 你知道最近老虎钳，胶带和锯子都涨到多少钱了吗？300瓶盖。

original: {Angry Resignation}[SUCCEEDED] Yeah, I imagine that it takes a lot to fill the void of such a bottomless soul. Take the caps and leave me to my sorrows.
translation: {Angry Resignation}[成功] 是哦，这么多钱应该足够填满一个贪得无厌的灵魂了。瓶盖你拿走，不必再来可怜我了。

original: You seem to dread hearing about Mr. House's requests. What is the problem?
translation: 听起来你很害怕豪斯先生的要求。怎么了？

original: {Accusative, then thoughtful nostalgia}It's this place - my inspiration ebbs and I don't know how to stop it! I can't feel the warmth anymore...
translation: {Accusative, then thoughtful nostalgia}问题就出在这间工作室——我的灵感正在衰竭，我却不知道该怎么办！我再也感受不到温暖了……

original: It sounds as if you don't like this place. What is wrong with it?
translation: 听起来好像你不喜欢这个地方。怎么了？

original: I feel haunted by something terrible. Working in such a huge workshop often makes me shiver... I can't even leave the Strip!
translation: 感觉有什么吓人的东西在缠着我。这么大的工作间，让我浑身都不自在……我甚至都不敢离开长街！

original: You exhibit clear symptoms of acute agoraphobia. I can help.
translation: 你表现出了明显的广场恐惧症。我能帮你。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Ah, an educated fellow? Now that is almost as rare as artistry! So, how can you help me regain my inspiration?
translation: [成功] 啊，你受过高等教育？简直和艺术一样稀有！那么，你要怎么帮我重获灵感？

original: <Lie> So, uh, wasn't it clever how I tricked you? I'm... working for Mr. House!
translation: <撒谎) 那，呃，我耍你的方式高不高明？我……我为豪斯先生工作 !

original: <Lie> You really believed I wasn't working for Mr. House? Chump.
translation: <说谎) 你真以为我不是在为豪斯先生工作？蠢货。

original: [SUCCEEDED] I should've known that Mr. House wouldn't have sent just anybody. Anything I might offer to, well, encourage discretion?
translation: [成功] 我早该猜到豪斯先生不会随便派个人来的。不知我该怎样才能让您，呃，替我美言几句？

original: I guess you're having trouble with Mr. House's requests. What's the problem?
translation: 看来你没办法满足豪斯先生的要求。是什么问题？

original: Artists are scarce. I bet you get paid handsomely. Cough up 300 caps.
translation: 艺术家可是稀缺资源，我打赌你肯定挣了不少钱。拿300瓶盖出来。

original: {Taking Offense}[FAILED] What!? I don't get paid near enough to what my talent deserves! 150 caps is my final offer.
translation: {Taking Offense}[失败] 什么！？我拿的报酬可远远配不上我的天赋啊！？我最多出150瓶盖。

original: Better cough up some caps or Mr. House finds out about your sorry excuses.
translation: 你最好吐点瓶盖出来，否则你那点拙劣的借口，豪斯先生轻而易举就会识破的。

original: [FAILED] Sorry excuses?... That does it! Tell Mr. House to hire a better artist, if he can find one in this barren wasteland!
translation: [失败] 拙劣的借口？……我受够了！告诉豪斯先生，让他另请高明吧，我倒要看看他还能在这荒凉的废土上找到几个艺术家！

original: Your failure would not amuse Mr. House. Unless I could be persuaded otherwise...
translation: 要是你干得不好，豪斯先生可是会生气的。除非你能说服我。

original: Let's see... You've got that thingy... there. Power, uh, re-circulators here....
translation: 我看看……你怎么还有那个玩意……电力，呃，这儿还有循环泵…….

original: Okay, I'll hire you.
translation: 好吧，我雇你。

original: Done and done. I want to mention a few things up front. In order to ensure your safety, I need you to follow my instructions to the letter.
translation: 那就不废话了。有些话得说在前面。为了保证你的安全，我要你一字不差地照我说的做。

original: We'll be heading down the main street here the whole way down. No detours. You go off sightseeing and I go off to find another customer.
translation: 我们沿着主路一直走到底，不绕弯。你要是跟丢了，我就去另找主顾。

original: I'll keep a brisk pace, so try not to fall behind. Now let's head out.
translation: 我会走得比较快，所以千万别落单。出发吧。

original: No way your materials and expenses require that. How about half?
translation: 材料和成本不可能要这么多钱。一半怎么样？

original: [SUCCEEDED] Hah! I like your style, kid, but the best I can do is meet you halfway. 375 caps, and we can call it a deal.
translation: [成功] 哈，我喜欢你的风格，孩子，但我可没法降太多。375个瓶盖，咱们就成交。

original: [FAILED] Heh, who are you shitting?
translation: [失败] 呵，你开什么玩笑 ?

original: I appreciate your brass, but 500 is the price. Take it or leave it.
translation: 我欣赏你的胆量，但500块钱是一口价。不要拉倒。

original: Ah, now I see why you want to keep this low key.
translation: 现在我终于知道你为什么行事如此低调了。

original: Hey, if you're interested and have the caps, they go for 500. Any less and it ain't worth the risk {"of" omitted intentionally}of getting caught.
translation: 嘿，如果你感兴趣，手头也够宽裕，那给我500个瓶盖我就帮你做。我可是冒着被抓的风险，少于这个数我不干。

original: What do you say? You game?
translation: 怎么样？这买卖做吗？

original: Goodbye.
translation: 再见。

original: Stop back if you need anything.
translation: 有需要再来。

original: How do you know what happened to the girl?
translation: 你怎么知道那个女孩出了事？

original: Because I distracted her fiancé while they took her. Well, I'm not proud of it! But I had to. They could see I was having second thoughts.
translation: 因为她被抓的时候，我负责分散她未婚夫的注意力。唉，我也不想干啊！可我没办法，只要稍一犹豫就会被他们看出来。

original: Some of the White Gloves began meeting privately a while back. Started talking about how we'd lost our identity.
translation: 一些社团成员前不久开始秘密集会，讨论我们如何迷失了本性。

original: I started attending because I thought it was about changing our politics.
translation: 起初我还以为他们是要修改社团的纲领，于是就参加了。

original: Then they started talking about returning to the old ways, and there was no way out. They'd kill me for the things I heard them say.
translation: 结果他们就开始大肆鼓吹要复兴传统，我一听就明白自己跑不掉了。我知道的太多，他们肯定会杀了我的。

original: The reasons for these attacks are yet unknown.
translation: 请务必牢记，这一情况背后可能还另有隐情。目前我们尚不清楚攻击的原因。

original: It may be possible to avoid further bloodshed if you discover the cause at the root of this recent outbreak of violence.
translation: 如果你能查清楚事情缘由的话，也许能避免更多的流血事件。

original: We've actually already met. It's good to see you again.
translation: 我们其实已经见过面了。能再见到你真好。

original: What kind of specialist is Clanden?
translation: 克兰顿是哪方面的专家？

original: I got no fucking idea. They let him have the run of the place though. He seems like a nice guy, but he makes me nervous.
translation: 我他妈也不清楚。不过老板们却好吃好住地供着他。他看起来人不错，就是让我不舒服。

original: He's a little arrogant, but he's too nice. Too open, I've never seen him fucking or gambling. Everyone has a vice, but this guy seems like the Pope.
translation: 有点自大，但品行却好到不正常。一身干干净净，我从没看见过他嫖妓或赌博。每个人都有恶习，要比起来，这家伙简直就是个圣人。

original: <Barter Option>
translation: <砍价选项>

original: [FAILED] Do I look like some kind of fool? I'm not paying you so you can double deal on me.
translation: [失败] 我看起来像傻瓜吗？我不会付钱给你的，别想耍我两次。

original: Err... Well, if you give me everything you have, I'll consider making a deal.
translation: 嗯……如果你把你的东西都给我，我会考虑和你谈笔交易的。

original: I think I'm going to keep this for a little while.
translation: 我觉得这东西我还是再保管一阵这东西好了。

original: All right, all right. I can't stop you, but I think we can help each other out.
translation: 好，好。我不会阻止你的，不过我想你应该是个聪明人，知道怎么做对咱俩都好。

original: I know Not-At-Home and the NCR would be happy to get some dirt on the Family. I can help you get that dirt, and you got me by the short hairs.
translation: 我知道“不在家”先生和NCR都很希望得到一些对家族不利的情报。我能帮你搞到这些情报，毕竟我的小辫子还在你手里呢。

original: Do you think the Family would like to see this?
translation: 你认为家族会喜欢这东西吗？

original: I can't stop you, but that's gonna mean my death. I can make it worth your while to give it to me though.
translation: 我无法阻止你，但那样做会要了我的命。如果你把它给我的话，我会让你觉得物超所值的。

original: Plus, if you go to the bosses I can't help you stop what they've been doing.
translation: 另外，如果你非要去见老板的话，我就不能帮助你阻止他们的计划了。

original: Is this journal worth 100 caps to you?
translation: 这日志对你来说值100瓶盖吗？

original: Oh, here are some caps. Now give me the journal. Right, there we go. So let me tell you what I know about the Family's business.
translation: 噢，给你钱。现在把日志给我。好了，我们成交了。我再告诉你一些我掌握的有关家族生意的情报。

original: The Bosses, Big Sal and Nero, have been working for a while on this. They're arming themselves like an army, using this new guy, Troike.
translation: 我的老板，大萨尔和尼禄，已经精心策划了有一段时间了。拜卓伊克这个新面孔所赐，他们现在就像军队一样武装到牙齿。

original: They also brought in a specialist named Clanden. At least that's what they introduced him as.
translation: 他们还引进了一个名叫克兰顿的专家。起码他们在介绍他的时候是这么说的。

original: Okay, 100 caps and you help me break up whatever your bosses have planned.
translation: 行，100瓶盖，然后你帮我破坏你老板策划的那些阴谋。

original: He tried to make it look like an accident - just a traveler killed and robbed in the Wasteland.
translation: 他想把这件事伪装成一起意外，一名旅行者在废土上被人劫杀。

original: [SUCCEEDED] He's trying to pull a fast one on the big man? Crazy bastard. You got any more?
translation: [成功] 他想跟大佬作对？他疯了。你还知道些什么？

original: [FAILED] Kid, that doesn't even pretend to make sense. You want to try again?
translation: [失败] 孩子，瞎掰也掰得像一点。你还能编出什么故事来？

original: Benny's going to steal all of House's robots! Don't you see?
translation: 本尼要偷走豪斯所有的机器人！你还不明白？

original: Benny tried to kill me and stole a Platinum Chip I was hired to deliver.
translation: 本尼想杀我，还把我递送的白金筹码给偷走了。

original: [FAILED] Kid, I think you really better shut up and stop making baseless accusations unless you got some proof. Well?
translation: [失败] 孩子，我觉得你最好闭嘴，没有证据，就不要瞎告状。懂了？

original: Benny stole my chip! And he tried to kill me, Mr. House said so!
translation: 本尼偷走了我的筹码，还想杀我！豪斯先生是这么说的！

original: That's it. What do you think?
translation: 就这些。你觉得呢？

original: I think you might just be onto something here, kid. Tell you what, I can't actively back your play, but I'll keep the Chairmen off your back.
translation: 我觉得这当中一定另有文章，孩子。实话告诉你，虽然我不能公开支持你，但我可以保证不让董事会在你背后捅刀子。

original: I'll tell the doormen you're cool to pack heat inside - trust me, you're gonna need it.
translation: 我会告诉门卫你可以带家伙进来——相信我，你会用得上它们的。

original: You'll still have to deal with Benny's private goon squad, though. I got no play with those cats. You want more help, I'll need more proof.
translation: 你还得想办法解决本尼的私人保镖。我可不希望招惹那帮人。如果你还想要我帮忙，就得给我更多的证据。

original: Look, I found these cigarette butts by the grave he buried me in.
translation: 你看，这是我在他们埋我的坟边上捡到的烟头。

original: Huh. Well, yeah, okay, these are Benny's brand, and they ain't too common. You got anything else?
translation: 嗯，是吗，好吧，这的确是本尼常抽的牌子，而且它们确实不太常见，你还找到了些什么？

original: I took all the pictures you wanted. There was something about a reward...
translation: 你想要的照片我都拍来了。至于报酬……

original: You have earned it, my friend! Now I can finally unveil my masterpieces to the world, all thanks to you. Come visit me again sometime.
translation: 都是你应得的，我的朋友！多亏了你，现在我终于能向全世界展示我的杰作了。以后常来坐坐。

original: What landmarks did you want me to photograph?
translation: 你想让我拍摄些什么地标？

original: I've always wanted to see the Dinosaur and its Thermometer sign at Novac. Then there's the famous Bison Steve sign.
translation: 我一直想看看诺瓦克的大恐龙和温度计。还有，著名的野牛史蒂夫旅馆招牌。

original: The McCarran Airfield and the HELIOS One power station signs are of much interest to my work - like the Sunset Sarsaparilla Headquarters' bottle.
translation: 麦卡伦机场和太阳神一号发电站也会对我的创作大有帮助——此外还有夕阳沙士总部大楼上的瓶子。

original: You mentioned growing up in Vault 21. Can you tell me about that?
translation: 你提到你是在21号避难所长大的。能和我说说那里吗？

original: Most people don't, uh, understand what it means to grow up in a vault. Its corridors, its walls, radiate a warmth that feels, safe, honest.
translation: 很多人都，呃，不理解在避难所长大的感觉。它的走廊，墙壁，四处都散发着温暖的气息，安全，可靠。

original: But here everything is huge and threatening - so empty that I think one of these days I'll just... snap.
translation: 但这里，所有东西都大得可怕——太空虚了，空虚到让我觉得自己说不定哪天就会……垮掉。

original: Tell me about yourself again.
translation: 再跟我说说你自己的事。

original: I am Sheldon, from Vault 21, although here I go by my artistic name, "Michael Angelo."
translation: 我叫谢尔顿，来自21号避难所。不过在这儿我都用艺名，“米开·朗琪罗”。"

original: I'm glad we have an understanding. Now, do you have any landmarks in mind?
translation: 很高兴我们达成了共识。那么，你有什么想看的地标吗？

original: I've always wanted to see the Dinosaur and its Thermometer sign at Novac. Then there's the famous Bison Steve sign.
translation: 我一直想看看诺瓦克的大恐龙和温度计。还有，著名的野牛史蒂夫旅馆招牌。

original: The McCarran Airfield and the HELIOS One power station signs are of much interest to my work - like the Sunset Sarsaparilla Headquarters' bottle.
translation: 麦卡伦机场和太阳神一号发电站也会对我的创作大有帮助——此外还有夕阳沙士总部大楼上的瓶子。

original: Okay, you've got a deal. I'll return with the pictures.
translation: 好吧，就这么定了。我会拍好照片回来的。

original: All right. I'll bring you more next time. Goodbye.
translation: 好的。下次我会给你带回更多的照片。再见。

original: All right. I'll bring you more next time. Goodbye.
translation: 好的。下次我会给你带回更多的照片。再见。

original: All right. I'll bring you more next time. Goodbye.
translation: 好的。下次我会给你带回更多的照片。再见。

original: All right. I'll bring you more next time. Goodbye.
translation: 好的。下次我会给你带回更多的照片。再见。

original: I have a couple more questions.
translation: 我还有一些问题。

original: Okay, toss 'em at me.
translation: 好的，问吧。

original: That's all the questions I have for now. I may have more later.
translation: 我现在没问题了。晚点有了再问你。

original: Okay. You can find me here, or upstairs in my room. I'll let the muscle know you're a friend of mine. That should let you get around a little easier.
translation: 没问题，你可以在这里或者我楼上的房间里找到我。我会和手下说你是我朋友的，这会让你来去更方便点。

original: Tell me about this Troike.
translation: 告诉我卓伊克的事。

original: He's a skittish little fucker. Spends half the day pumping his body full of chems and the other half pumping hookers with his willy.
translation: 他就是个没长性的孬种。每天一半的时间花在毒品上，另一半时间花在妓女上。

original: He has some kind of connections, so he's able to smuggle huge shipments of weapons into the Strip.
translation: 他有些关系，能把大批军火偷运进长街。

original: The bosses got him by the short hairs. We covered up a hooker he killed while flying on some Psycho, so he gets us guns in exchange for not ratting.
translation: 老板抓住了他的把柄。有次他发狂杀了一个妓女，我们掩盖了这件事，为了不让事情败露，从此他就给我们提供军火了。

original: Actually, I'm looking for someone named Cachino.
translation: 实际上我在找一个叫卡奇诺的人。

original: Get the fuck away from me. Don't ask me about Cachino.
translation: 离我他妈的远点。别问我什么卡奇诺。

original: Deal.
translation: 成交。

original: Follow me.
translation: 跟我来。

original: What do you think about Benny?
translation: 你怎么看本尼？

original: Benny? Ahh, he's an all right cat, you dig? He don't got much musical talent, but he knows how to run a business. When he's around, anyways.
translation: 本尼？啊，他这人挺不错的，你知道吗？他虽然没什么音乐天赋，但做生意很在行。当然，我指的是他没外出的时候。

original: What do you do here?
translation: 你在这儿是做什么的？

original: Well, apart from serving as a talent manager, show scheduler, and all-around man in charge of this fine theater, I happen to be its headline act.
translation: 这个嘛，我不光是这个剧院的人力总监、舞台调度以及全权负责人，我还是它的当家明星。

original: Every night from eight till midnight, come on by to see the Rad Pack Revue live, only right here at the Aces Theater!
translation: 每晚八点至午夜，你都能这儿来欣赏核子欢乐汇现场秀，只在王牌剧场独家上演哦！

original: What's Benny planning to do with the Chip?
translation: 本尼打算拿白金筹码做什么？

original: Oh! He wants to kill Mr. House and use the Platinum Chip to copy my neuro-computational matrix onto the Lucky 38's mainframe.
translation: 噢！他想要杀死豪斯先生，然后用白金筹码把我的神经计算矩阵复制到幸运38的主控电脑里。

original: That should give me control over all Mr. House's defenses, most prominently his Securitrons. And then I just do what Benny tells me - easy-peasy!
translation: 那样我就能控制豪斯先生所有的防御系统，主要是他的电子保安。接着，我就能完成本尼交待给我的工作了，小菜一碟！

original: Sergeant Reyes at Camp Forlorn Hope sent me with a security update for your radio.
translation: 飘零希望营地的雷耶斯军士派我来给你的无线电进行安全更新。

original: {Player in NCR gear}Oh, right. She radioed ahead and mentioned that somebody was coming by.
translation: {Player in NCR gear}哦，是的。她之前在无线电里提到过会有人来。

original: Oh, right. She radioed ahead and mentioned that somebody was coming by. Odd that she'd send a civilian instead of a trooper, though.
translation: 哦，是的。她之前在无线电里提到过会有人来。不过来的不应该是个士兵么？怎么是个平民。

original: Listen here shitwad, tell me where I can find Cachino.
translation: 听着，你这狗屎混蛋，告诉我在哪能找到卡奇诺。

original: Whoa, simmer down! Head over to Brimstone. I'll have him find you there.
translation: 别，冷静点！去硫磺火，你会在那找到他的。

original: <Black Widow/Lady's Man Options>
translation: <黑寡妇/登徒子选项>

original: I bet you say that to all the girls. Yeah, head over to Brimstone, he'll find you there.
translation: 我打赌你对所有的女孩都这么说。好吧，去硫磺火，你会在那找到他的。

original: A gorgeous lady like you has to know where I can find Cachino.
translation: 像你这样的美人儿肯定知道能在哪找到卡奇诺。

original: Gorgeous, you can have anything you want from me. Cachino is in Brimstone.
translation: 好了好了，我投降。卡奇诺在硫磺火。

original: I bet a sexy lady like you could tell me where I could find someone named Cachino.
translation: 像你这样的性感女郎一定会告诉我在哪能找到卡奇诺。

original: Well thank you, gorgeous. Yeah, look for Cachino in Brimstone.
translation: 谢谢夸奖，真入耳。好了，去硫磺火找卡奇诺吧。

original: If I told you you have a beautiful body, would you tell me where Cachino is?
translation: 如果我告诉你，你的身材真火辣，你会告诉我卡奇诺在哪吗？

original: Well thank you, gorgeous. Yeah, look for Cachino in Brimstone.
translation: 谢谢夸奖，真入耳。好了，去硫磺火找卡奇诺吧。

original: A handsome man like you has to know where I can find Cachino.
translation: 像你这样的帅小伙一定知道在哪能找到卡奇诺。

original: Where can I find Cachino?
translation: 我在哪能找到卡奇诺？

original: Cachino? Get out of my face.
translation: 卡奇诺？赶紧从我面前滚开。

original: Really? What kind of entertainment do you have?
translation: 真的吗？有什么消遣呢？

original: Well, acts are a bit thin on the ground right now, but every night from eight to midnight, we've got the Rad Pack Revue!
translation: 嗯，目前咱们的节目是少了点，但每晚八点到午夜，我们这儿都会上演核子欢乐秀！

original: Songs, dancing, jokes, we got it all!
translation: 歌唱，舞蹈，笑话，我们应有尽有！

original: How am I supposed to get to the Strip?
translation: 我怎么进入长街？

original: See the King. I'm sure he could work something out to get you in. You'll need to prove you're worth his time, but it'll be well worth it.
translation: 去找猫王。我相信他有办法让你进去。你要向他证明自己的实力，反正对你而言也是包赚不亏。

original: <Barter>
translation: <砍价>

original: [SUCCEEDED] All right. 50/50 it is, but you better bring back all of the caps.
translation: [成功] 好吧。五五分，但你最好能把所有的瓶盖都收回来。

original: If we hear you crossed us, the next bounty hunter will be coming for you.
translation: 要是让我们知道你在耍我们，那下个赏金猎人的目标就是你的脑袋。

original: This kind of work costs time and money. 50/50 would cover my expenses.
translation: 这个活吃力又不讨好。必须五五分成，我才能接受。

original: [FAILED] Who the hell do you think you're talking to? Keep talking like that and your ass is going to be in the gutter. 25%. Take it or leave it.
translation: [失败] 你知道自己在和谁说话吗？再用这种口气和我讨价还价，小心我捅爆你的屁眼。25%，不能更多了。

original: Are you crazy?! I'll be walking all over the place looking for these people.
translation: 你疯了吗？为了找那几个家伙，我得把整个镇子都翻个遍。

original: I think I have all of the debts collected.
translation: 我把帐都收齐了。

original: I don't care how you handled those lumps of human refuse, but you got the job done. We need you to hunt down another person.
translation: 我不知道你是怎么对付那几个人渣的，但总之你办到了。我们想请你再替我们除掉一个人。

original: That son of a bitch, McCaffery, stole a ton of caps and ran off to Vegas. I guess the fact that we farmed out his usual work to you pissed him off.
translation: 那个狗娘养的麦卡弗里偷了我们一大笔钱，躲进了维加斯。我想他一定是不满意我们把原本给他的差事交给了你。

original: No one steals from the Garret Twins! If you can kill that bastard and bring back as much as you can, you'll be paid very well.
translation: 想偷加勒特家的东西，门都没有！如果你能杀了那个混蛋，把钱追回来，你将得到丰厚的报酬。

original: I don't care how you handled those lumps of human refuse, but you got the job done. We need you to hunt down another person.
translation: 我不知道你是怎么对付那几个人渣的，但总之你办到了。我们想请你再替我们除掉一个人。

original: That son of a bitch, McCaffery, stole a ton of caps and ran off to Vegas. I guess the fact that we farmed out his usual work to you pissed him off.
translation: 那个狗娘养的麦卡弗里偷了我们一大笔钱，躲进了维加斯。我想他一定是不满意我们把原本给他的差事交给了你。

original: No one steals from the Garret Twins! If you can kill that bastard and bring back as much as you can, you'll be paid very well.
translation: 想偷加勒特家的东西，门都没有！如果你能杀了那个混蛋，把钱追回来，你将得到丰厚的报酬。

original: I don't care how you handled those lumps of human refuse, but you got the job done. For helping us out, we would like to set you up with a room.
translation: 我不知道你是怎么对付那几个人渣的，但总之你办到了。为了表达谢意，我们为你准备了个房间。

original: You can have the corner room, rent free. It was McCaffery's.
translation: 拐角处那间房以后就免费给你用了。本来是麦卡弗里住的。

original: Now that he's dead, we're happy to let you use it. Thanks for helping us.
translation: 既然他死了，我们很乐意把它转交给你。谢谢你的帮忙。

original: I don't care how you handled those lumps of human refuse, but you got the job done. For helping us out, we would like to set you up with a room.
translation: 我不知道你是怎么对付那几个人渣的，但总之你办到了。为了表达谢意，我们为你准备了个房间。

original: You can have the corner room, rent free. It was McCaffery's.
translation: 拐角处那间房以后就免费给你用了。本来是麦卡弗里住的。

original: Now that he's dead, we're happy to let you use it. Thanks for helping us.
translation: 既然他死了，我们很乐意把它转交给你。谢谢你的帮忙。

original: I don't care how you handled those lumps of human refuse, but you got the job done. We need you to hunt down another person.
translation: 我不知道你是怎么对付那几个人渣的，但总之你办到了。我们想请你再替我们除掉一个人。

translation: 那个狗娘养的麦卡弗里偷了我们一大笔钱，躲进了维加斯。我想他一定是不满意我们把原本给他的差事交给了你。

translation: 我不知道你是怎么对付那几个人渣的，但总之你办到了。为了表达谢意，我们为你准备了个房间。

original: You can have the corner room, rent free. It was McCaffery's.
translation: 拐角处那间房以后就免费给你用了。本来是麦卡弗里住的。

original: Now that he's dead, we're happy to let you use it. Thanks for helping us.
translation: 既然他死了，我们很乐意把它转交给你。谢谢你的帮忙。

original: I don't care how you handled those lumps of human refuse, but you got the job done. For helping us out, we would like to set you up with a room.
translation: 我不知道你是怎么对付那几个人渣的，但总之你办到了。为了表达谢意，我们为你准备了个房间。

original: You can have the corner room, rent free. It was McCaffery's.
translation: 拐角处那间房以后就免费给你用了。本来是麦卡弗里住的。

original: Now that he's dead, we're happy to let you use it. Thanks for helping us.
translation: 既然他死了，我们很乐意把它转交给你。谢谢你的帮忙。

original: Doesn't look like it to me. I'm expecting 388 caps...
translation: 我看着好像不对啊。总共是388个瓶盖…

original: You're short. Come back when you have the rest.
translation: 你拿来的瓶盖不够。等凑齐了再来。

original: It doesn't look like it to me. I'm expecting 600 caps...
translation: 我看着好像不对啊。总共是600个瓶盖…

original: You're short. Come back when you have the rest.
translation: 你拿来的瓶盖不够。等凑齐了再来。

original: I suppose that might work. It'll take some convincing though.
translation: 我想这样应该可以，就是要费点口舌。

original: I swear they'll never see me again. After this experience, I want nothing to do with this hell hole.
translation: 我发誓，他们不会再见到我了。有过这次经历，我不想再和这里有任何瓜葛。

original: I'll get started now. The last thing I need is more bounty hunters trying to track me down.
translation: 我现在就出发，我可不想再让别的赏金猎人找到我。

original: Just give me what you have on you and they might accept it, knowing you're dead.
translation: 把你身上的东西全交出来，再加上你的小命，应该就够了。

original: <Speech>
translation: <口才>

original: [SUCCEEDED] I'm short 90 caps or so, but I have a few cartons of cigarettes and some sensor modules I could put toward my debt.
translation: [成功] 我还欠90多个瓶盖，不过我有几包香烟和一些传感器模组，可以用来顶债。

original: At this point I'll have to return to California to start anew. I haven't got a cap to my name.
translation: 把它们都拿走的话，我就只能返回加州重新开始了，我身上一个瓶盖也没有了。

original: Perhaps there is something else of value you could put toward the debt?
translation: 也许你还有其他值钱的东西可以用来还债？

original: <Speech>
translation: <口才>

original: [FAILED] You think Santiago is susceptible to such idle threats? Santiago laughs at your silly bluff.
translation: [失败] 你认为圣地亚哥会被这些无聊的威胁吓倒？圣地亚哥对你的虚张声势不屑一顾。

original: I'm going to... Well, I'm sure it will be very painful if you don't pay.
translation: 我要……好吧，反正我告诉你，你要是不给钱，一定会吃苦头的。

original: Santiago is dead if he doesn’t cough up what he owes the Garrets.
translation: 如果圣地亚哥不愿意交出他欠加勒特家的钱，那他就死定了。

original: Sir, Santiago does not know what he has done to offend, but he can explain everything.
translation: 先生，圣地亚哥不知道他为何会得罪人，但他可以解释。

original: <Barter down 25 caps>
translation: <砍价25瓶盖>

original: [SUCCEEDED] 25 caps will do. Tell Mick Santiago sent you and the code word is 'extravaganza'. He will set you up.
translation: [成功] 25个瓶盖成交。告诉米克，是圣地亚哥介绍你来的，暗号是“妄自尊大”。他会好好招待你的。

original: I don't even know this discount is worth 50. How about 25 caps?
translation: 我看这个折扣恐怕不值50个瓶盖。25个瓶盖怎么样 ?

original: [FAILED] Sorry, my friend. 50 caps is the price to be a VIP.
translation: [失败] 对不起，我的朋友。想当VIP，就得花50个瓶盖。

original: What kind of moron would pay 50 caps for information? 25 caps.
translation: 花50个瓶盖买情报？只有蠢货会干这种事。25个瓶盖吧。

original: Francine warned me that you're a smooth-talker.
translation: 弗朗辛警告过我，说你这人很善花言巧语。

original: Indeed, Santiago is a poet among pretenders. If you are here to collect for the Garrets, Santiago is debt free.
translation: 正是。圣地亚哥是一条富有诗意的老狐狸。如果你是来为加勒特兄妹收债的，圣地亚哥可没有欠钱。

original: You owe the Garrets a bunch of caps.
translation: 你欠了加勒特家一大笔瓶盖。

original: Santiago does not owe anyone. Santiago is a Freeside VIP.
translation: 圣地亚哥谁也不欠。圣地亚哥是自由城的VIP。

original: Seriously, zombie, are you looking at me or someone off that direction?!
translation: 我说真的，丧尸，你是在瞪着我看，还是在瞪着我身后的某个人哪 ?!

original: <Press for clothing>
translation: <要他的衣服>

original: [FAILED] You're freaking crazy. I'm not stripping for you. I'm already broke.
translation: [失败] 你他妈疯了。我才不会被你扒光呢。我已经破产了。

original: You cheapass zombie. You need to pay my extra fee.
translation: 你这个下贱的僵尸。你必须付我额外的一笔费用。

original: <Press for extra caps>
translation: <榨取额外的瓶盖>

original: [FAILED] Hey, I'm tapped out, man. I've got nothing left but the clothes on my back.
translation: [失败] 嘿，我没钱了。我除了身上的衣服，已经啥也没剩下了。

original: You cheapass zombie. You need to pay my extra fee.
translation: 你这个下贱的僵尸。你必须付我额外的一笔费用。

original: Cough em up, Grecks.
translation: 把钱连本带利都吐出来，格里克斯。

original: Interest?! The Garrets said nothing about interest on their tabs. Look man, I've got the caps right here, just don't hurt me.
translation: 利息？！加勒特兄妹没说过有什么利息啊。听着，朋友，我已经准备好了瓶盖，别伤害我。

original: You owe the Garrets a good lump of caps. I'm here to collect.
translation: 你欠了加勒特家一大笔钱。我是来这儿收账的。

original: Ah crap. I was hoping they'd forget about my tab. Look, I've got the caps right here, just don't hurt me.
translation: 啊，该死。我还希望他们能把这事忘了呢。看，我已经把瓶盖准备好了，别伤害我。

original: Your hangman, if you don't start being straight with me.
translation: 我是来索命的，你要是再耍嘴皮子，我就吊死你。

original: Whoa, yeah. I guess the Garrets sent you after me? Look, I've got the caps right here, just don't hurt me.
translation: 哇，好吧。是加勒特家族派你来找我的？看，我已经把瓶盖准备好了，别伤害我。

original: Anything unusual happening around here?
translation: 附近发生了不平常的事么？

original: All quiet at the moment. Ranger {BOH-mont}Beaumont is in charge here, but he's off leading a patrol.
translation: 目前一切正常。游骑兵博曼特是这里的负责人，不过现在他正带队巡逻。

original: It was quiet until those rockets blasted off over our heads.
translation: 只要那些火箭不要炸到我们头上来就一切正常。

original: There was a hell of a boom over at REPCONN. Looks like the ghouls had some sort of accident with their rockets.
translation: REOCONN发生了大爆炸。看起来那些尸鬼的火箭出了点问题。

original: I'll pass.
translation: 算了。

original: I completely understand. No reason you should take on someone else's problems. Let me know if you change your mind, though.
translation: 我理解你的想法。他人的问题，确实轮不到你来负责。不过如果你改变注意，记得来找我。

original: Now, was there anything else you wanted to talk about?
translation: 那么，还有什么事要与我商量的吗？

original: [FAILED] I've got a business to run here, you know. The price is 250.
translation: [失败] 你懂的，我毕竟是个生意人。250个瓶盖，不二价。

original: You want even more money? Are you insane?
translation: 你还敢要钱？你疯了？

original: Do you know the password?
translation: 你知道口令吗？
