original: It'll cost you 250 caps.
translation: 这条需要250个瓶盖。

original: Sorry, too rich for me.
translation: 抱歉，对我来说太贵了。

original: Then I can't help you with that, but I do have lots of other tips that come much, much cheaper...
translation: 那就恕我无可奉告了，但我有别的情报，要便宜不少…

original: Done.
translation: 搞定。

original: Much appreciated. The guys you're talking about have been spotted near the old train station in the northwest.
translation: 非常感谢。你提到的那些家伙时常在西北方的老火车站附近出没。

original: There've been more and more Squatters heading that way each night, too. Word is, there's a password to get into the building.
translation: 最近每晚去那儿的流民人数还在不断增多。据说，进入那个房子需要一道口令。

original: [SUCCEEDED] You're a scoundrel. I'll let it go for 50, but no lower.
translation: [成功] 你简直就是个无赖。50个瓶盖，不能再低了。

original: If you ever want me to buy another tip from you, that price'll come down.
translation: 如果你以后还想让我找你买情报，那你最好把价钱压低些。

original: Could be. Could be. That kind of information doesn't come cheap, though. I'll need at least 150 caps for this one.
translation: 有。但这类情报可不便宜。每条你至少要付150个瓶盖。

original: You know anything about NCR soldiers prowling the area?
translation: 你知道驻扎在这个区域的NCR士兵的情况吗？

original: Could be. Could be. That kind of information doesn't come cheap, though. I'll need at least 150 caps for this one.
translation: 有。但这类情报可不便宜。每条你至少要付150个瓶盖。

original: You still have some info on those NCR soldiers that have been about?
translation: 这附近NCR士兵的情报，你手上还有吧？

original: Right here. <Give McCaffery's hat>
translation: 在这儿呢。 <交出麦卡弗里的帽子>

original: This is great news. No one screws with the Garret Twins and gets away with it. I need to find a place on the wall for this.
translation: 太振奋人心了。敢戏弄加勒特兄妹的人是绝不会有好下场的。我得找个地方把它挂起来。

original: And for your reward... Here's 150 caps. I trust there were also some valuables on McCaffery. Also, we would like to set you up with a room.
translation: 至于你的奖励……这是150个瓶盖。麦卡弗里身上应该也有些值钱的东西。另外，我们会给你安排一间房间。

original: You can have the corner room, rent free. It was McCaffery's. Now that he's dead, we're happy to let you use it. Thanks for helping us.
translation: 拐角处的那间房免费给你用了。本来是麦卡弗里住的。既然他死了，我们很乐意把它交给你。谢谢你帮忙。

original: I took care of McCaffery.
translation: 我杀掉麦卡弗里了。

original: Yes! Where is his hat?!
translation: 太好了！他的帽子呢？！

original: I understand.
translation: 了解。

original: Good luck.
translation: 好运。

original: I could sneak in there and try to get your people out.
translation: 我能潜进去，然后把你的人弄出来。

original: You should wait until it's darker so that you have the best chance to pull this off.
translation: 你应该等天黑一点再进去，那样成功的概率最高。

original: You should go now, while it's still dark. That way, you'll have the best chance to pull this off.
translation: 天已经黑了，你该进去了，这时候成功的概率最高。

original: I may be able to negotiate a deal with the Great Khans.
translation: 我也许可以与大汗帮的人谈判。

original: Normally, I'd turn you down since I have no idea who you are, but considering that the hostages are as good as dead when we attack...
translation: 通常我一定会拒绝你，因为我根本不知道你是谁，但考虑到只要我们发动攻击，人质就死定了……

original: All right, I'm going to give you a chance to talk to the Great Khans. Their leader is a man named Jessup.
translation: 好吧，我可以给你个机会去和大汗帮的人谈谈。他们的首领是个叫做杰瑟普的人。

original: If we hear shooting, we'll be coming in, but it'll probably be too late for you.
translation: 万一我们听到枪声，就会立马杀进去。不过到时候，我可就没法保证你的安全了。

original: I'd like to know more about the NCR.
translation: 我想多了解一些NCR的情况。

original: I seriously doubt that it would be in my best interest to discuss the NCR with someone of your reputation.
translation: 这个话题我们可以日后再谈——前提是你先对我们的国家表现出足够的尊重。

original: What's happening around the Strip?
translation: 长街周围有什么新鲜事吗？

original: You may have a penchant for getting into trouble, but I'd recommend against that here. The Securitrons on the Strip aren't to be trifled with.
translation: 我知道你这个人好像特别喜欢惹是生非，但我建议你在这里还是安分一点。长街上的电子保安可不是闹着玩的。

original: Perhaps I'll have Captain Pappas keep an eye on you. For your own safety, of course.
translation: 也许我该让帕帕斯上校盯着你。当然，这完全是为你自己的安全着想。

original: Tell me about yourself, Ambassador.
translation: 和我介绍一下你自己吧，大使阁下。

original: Interested in politics, huh? Well, grab a seat and get comfortable.
translation: 你对政治感兴趣？好吧，那就坐下好好听我说。

original: I've been in politics quite a while now. Always had the drive to do it, even when I was young. It's just something I was drawn to.
translation: 我从政已经有些年头了。年轻的时候，我就对这份工作充满了干劲。这是我梦寐以求的生活。

original: I started my career over twenty years ago back in the NCR as the local mayor and worked my way up from there.
translation: 20年前我开始担任NCR的地方长官，那是我政治生涯的起点，此后我便一步一个脚印做到了今天这个位置。

original: I managed President Kimball's first run for a seat on the Council. {smiling at the obviousness of it}I suppose that's why I have this ambassadorship.
translation: 我帮助金博尔总统在议会里争取到了他的首个席位。{smiling at the obviousness of it}我想这也是他任命我为大使的原因吧。

original: Is there anything I can do to help?
translation: 有什么我能帮忙的吗？

original: There is always something needing done. A few souls here in Freeside could be great assets to the community, if they'd kick their addictions.
translation: 要帮忙的地方多了去了。我们有几个吸毒者，原本可以为自由城做出不小的贡献，可惜他们就是戒不掉毒瘾。

original: We need a regular supply of medicine organized, but the Crimson Caravan wants too many caps for what we need.
translation: 我们还需要稳定的药品供应，但深红商队公司开出的价钱实在难以承受。

original: Lastly, tensions between the townies and NCR tourists have been going downhill fast lately. A lot of innocent people will get hurt if things blow up.
translation: 最后，本地人和NCR游客之间的关系正在持续恶化。一旦爆发冲突，会有大量无辜民众死伤。

original: Do you have anything for sale?
translation: 你这儿卖东西吗？

original: Sure. Take a look.
translation: 当然。看看吧。

original: Not for someone like you. My customers would shit a brick if they knew I sold anything to you.
translation: 对你不卖。如果我的客人知道我卖东西给你的话，他们肯定会来找茬的。

original: If you need any help cleaning up your rep around Freeside, I might be able to help... for a price.
translation: 如果你想恢复自己在自由城的名声，我倒是可以帮忙……不过你需要给我一点好处。

original: <Speech>
translation: <口才>

original: [SUCCEEDED] {Amused}Well, that sounds like a bit of a bargain. I get to walk free with the Garrets thinking I'm dead.
translation: [成功] {Amused}哎呀，这条件不错。我的帐一笔勾销，加勒特家的人也会以为我死了。

original: {Amused}Sure, you can have my hat. I can always buy another with the caps I've got left.
translation: {Amused}好吧，你可以把我的帽子拿走。反正我还能用剩下的瓶盖再买一顶。

original: {Friendly}It would have been more fun fighting it out, though. See you later, kid.
translation: {Friendly}不过要是能打一架的话，兴许会更有趣。回头见啦，小鬼。

original: All I need is your hat, and you're a free man. I'll tell Francine you're dead.
translation: 我只要你的帽子，不是你的命。我会告诉弗朗辛你已经死了。

original: The Followers are looking to trade for supplies.
translation: 天启追随者想购买一些物资。

original: Interesting... Well, you're going to need to speak with my brother James. He handles all of the trading contracts and general operations.
translation: 有意思…这你得去找我的兄弟詹姆斯。所有的买卖和杂务都归他管。

original: Why don't you stop drinking?
translation: 为什么你不戒酒呢？

original: Drop drinking?! I've been drinking for a straight month!
translation: 戒酒？！我已经连续喝了一个月了！

original: Listen, I've tried to stop, but the withdrawal symptoms are so bad I feel like I'm going to die. I can't stop now.
translation: 听着，我试过戒酒，但戒断反应太厉害，差点要了我的命。我现在根本停不下来。

original: Julie Farkas sent me to help you sober up.
translation: 朱莉·法卡斯派我来帮你清醒一下。

original: Julie? Ah, I love Julie. She's such a nice lady.
translation: 朱莉？啊，我爱朱莉。她是个好女人。

original: One time, I was working on the water pump and she came over, put her hand on my shoulder, and told me I was doing a great job. Great job, she says!
translation: 有一次，我正在修水泵，她走过来，把手搭在我的肩上，说我干得很不错。她居然说我干得不错 !

original: I just choked up and didn't say nothing. Compliments are so rare these days.
translation: 我激动得噎住了，一句话也说不出来。这年头，能得到赞扬真是太稀罕了。

original: How's business?
translation: 生意如何？

original: With Jacob Hoff sobered up, there are new drinks on the menu and sales are strong. People love the new Absinthe and Rum & Nuka.
translation: 雅各布·霍夫清醒了以后，菜单上多了不少热销的新饮品。人们比较钟爱新出的苦艾酒和核子古巴。

original: I spoke with Julie Farkas. She says the Followers will accept your offer.
translation: 我和朱莉·法卡斯谈过了。她说天启追随者接受你的提议。

original: Hey, that's great. We'll get some supplies sent over today as a show of good faith.
translation: 嘿，那太好了。我们今天就送货过去，以表示我们的诚意。

original: Once our stills are upgraded, we'll never be short on liquor for our patrons. If Jacob Hoff is sober, we might even have a few new drinks on tap.
translation: 一旦我们的蒸馏器升级完毕，我们的客人就再也不会缺酒喝了。要是雅各布·霍夫还清醒的话，或许我们还能推出些新品种。

original: Most might view us as drug dealing enablers around here, but honestly we care about our patrons. It's bad business for people to get addicted.
translation: 大家总把我们这儿当作毒品的集散地，但我们其实一直在为客人着想。引诱人吸毒对生意又没好处。

original: We've got enough crime in Freeside without a bunch of strung-out junkies robbing traders and gamblers to afford their next fix.
translation: 自由城的治安情况已经够糟了，那些瘾君子为了凑齐毒资，不惜四处打劫商人和赌客，简直是雪上加霜。

original: You get your chems and can help anyone who gets addicted.
translation: 你们得到药品后，就可以帮助那些上了瘾的人。

original: True, we could help addicts, but the cycle of addiction, recovery, and relapse would remain.
translation: 是，我们能帮助那些上瘾的人，但他们好了之后还会复吸。

original: The troopers are all dead. You're free to go.
translation: 那些士兵都死光了。你现在可以走了。

original: Yeah, that's a pretty piece of work. Makes me wonder why you'd turn on the NCR, especially when they had us cold.
translation: 是啊，你干得真漂亮。真不明白你为何会对NCR动手，要知道他们消灭我们可是易如反掌啊。

original: Here - a souvenir for you. It's Benny's lighter. Shove it up his ass when you catch up with him.
translation: 这个送你，就当留个纪念吧。这是本尼的打火机。等你追上他，记得替我把这玩意塞进他的屁眼里。

original: Well, I've got that right here.
translation: 哎呀，我刚好就有这几样东西。

original: I've felt like I was dying these past weeks off and on, but the worst is yet to come. In a few days though, I should be free.
translation: 过去几个礼拜，我觉得自己在鬼门关来来回回走了好几趟，但真正的坏事还没来呢。还好再有几天，我就能解脱了。

original: I'll head over to the Followers and see if they'll help me through this.
translation: 我会去找天启追随者，看看他们能不能帮我度过难关。

original: I've felt like I was dying these past weeks off and on, but the worst is yet to come. In a few days though, I should be free.
translation: 过去几个礼拜，我觉得自己在鬼门关来来回回走了好几趟，但真正的坏事还没来呢。还好再有几天，我就能解脱了。

original: I'll head over to the Followers and see if they'll help me through this.
translation: 我会去找天启追随者，看看他们能不能帮我度过难关。

original: What do you need?
translation: 你需要什么？

original: At least a couple of doses of Fixer, a bottle of whiskey, and RadAway.
translation: 至少要双份瘾头解，一瓶威士忌，外加辐特宁。

original: I can take doses of Fixer and RadAway to gradually flush my system over time while drinking decreasing shots of diluted whiskey.
translation: 我可以靠瘾头解和辐特宁来逐渐排除身体里的毒素，同时喝低度的威士忌，并慢慢减少次数。

original: This shit better be worth it, man.
translation: 希望这么做够值当，朋友。

original: You won't be seeing Dixon anymore.
translation: 你不会再看见迪克森了。

original: What the hell? Why? I need alcohol, man!
translation: 什么——？为什么？我需要酒啊，老兄！

original: I'm gonna die if I don't get a drink!
translation: 不喝酒的话，我会死的！

original: Nevermind. I don't have enough to cover that.
translation: 算了。我没那么多钱。

original: Heh, you sorry sad sack. Come back when you've got the caps.
translation: 呵，可怜的窝囊废，等凑够钱再来找我吧。

original: <Speech>
translation: <口才>

original: [FAILED] Wow, you really suck at this don't you? Go bully some molerats, jackass.
translation: [失败] 你真不是干这个的料！去吓唬小孩子吧，蠢货。

original: If you don't leave them alone... I'll... I'll tell on you!
translation: 如果你不放过他们…我…我要去告发你 !

original: All right. Take the caps and leave them alone.
translation: 好吧。拿着这些钱，放过他们。

original: Hey, nice doing business with you, Mr. Moneybags.
translation: 嘿，和你做生意真的很愉快，款爷。

original: Good luck getting them healthy. If they don't get a whole lot of Fixer soon, withdrawal will kill them.
translation: 祝你能治好他们咯。要是不给他们立马服用大量瘾头解，戒断反应会要了他们的命。

original: Hey, nice doing business with you, Mrs. Moneybags.
translation: 嘿，和你做生意真的很愉快，款姐。

original: Good luck getting them healthy. If they don't get a whole lot of Fixer soon, withdrawal will kill them.
translation: 祝你能治好他们咯。要是不给他们立马服用大量瘾头解，戒断反应会要了他们的命。

original: <Attack>
translation: <攻击>

original: Ooo, I always enjoy a good scrap!
translation: 哎呦，我最喜欢干架了！

original: <Attack> Screw that. It'd be a lot cheaper and easier for me to kill you.
translation: <攻击> 放屁。杀了你既不费钱，也更容易。

original: I'm a new honorary member of the White Glove Society.
translation: 我现在是白手套社团的荣誉会员了。

original: Well what do you want? I'm very busy here.
translation: 真棒，所以呢？我很忙。

original: Your predisposition towards anger suggests unresolved issues in your past.
translation: 你这种易怒的本性说明你有童年阴影。

original: [?] What kind of harebrained fucking psychobabble bullshit is that?
translation: [?] 你他妈以为这种读人心思的鬼话能唬得了我？

original: I yell at people because I like yelling at people and because they fucking deserve it. Not because Mumsy and Daddy-kins didn't hug me enough.
translation: 我嚷嚷，是因为我爱嚷嚷，而且也因为这帮人本来就欠操，才不是因为什么爸爸妈妈拥抱我的次数不够多。

original: You're screwed up in the head.
translation: 你脑子是不是有毛病。

original: [FAILED] Yeah. You know why? It gets worse every time some sniveling wet blanket cries about how I need to tiptoe around his precious feelings.
translation: [失败] 没错。知道为什么吗？因为总有废物对我哭哭啼啼，吵着嚷着要我考虑他的感受，害得我心情越来越差。

original: [FAILED] Yeah. You know why? It gets worse every time some sniveling wet blanket cries about how I need to tiptoe around her precious feelings.
translation: [失败] 没错。知道为什么吗？因为总有废物对我哭哭啼啼，吵着嚷着要我考虑她的感受，害得我心情越来越差。

original: Hey, could I, uh, buy some of your recipes?
translation: 嘿，我能，呃，买几个你的食谱吗？

original: Yes, of course.
translation: 是的，当然。

original: [FAILED] There's nothing I'd like more than to hand the deepest secrets of my artistry to some idiot in exchange for a dirty handful of caps.
translation: [失败] 我可不会为了几个被脏手摸过的瓶盖，就把自己的看家本领传授给一个白痴。

original: <Lie> I'm here to talk business. Interested in putting out a cookbook?
translation: <撒谎> 我是来谈生意的。你愿不愿把自己的所有菜谱结集出版 ?

original: What, me? The supreme ruler of the Nevada dining scene? Teach some lowlife half-wits how to make food that doesn't smell like burning excrement?
translation: [成功] 什么，我？内华达餐饮界无上的统治者？去教那些连屎都会烤焦的低等生物做饭？

original: [SUCCEEDED] Do you think it would sell?
translation: 你觉得这玩意能卖得出去？

original: How did the family find out about it?
translation: 家族是如何发现这件事的？

original: When I saw the body I started screaming. In a few seconds, some of their soldiers were in there cleaning up the room.
translation: 我一见到尸体，就大叫起来，不一会儿，几个打手就冲进来，把房间清理了干净。

original: They offered to keep silent about what happened if I agreed to help them get their hands on large quantities of guns, at deep discounts.
translation: 他们说，只要我能帮他们弄到大批军火，他们就不将这事捅出去。

original: What kind of chems were you doing?
translation: 你那时服用了哪种药？

original: That night? Mostly Buffout. I like to cut it with a little bit of Jet, and wash it down with some whiskey. That was my standard Saturday night...
translation: 那晚？主要是壮大灵，我喜欢加点杰特稀释一下，再就着威士忌吞下去。本来周六晚上我都是这么过的……

original: About that thing you wanted to talk about, let's hear it.
translation: 你之前和我说过有一件很重要的事情，我想听听。

original: Uh... no word yet. I'll get back to you on it.
translation: 呃……我没什么要说的了。我以后再回来找你。

original: Please let me know as soon as you can.
translation: 你知道在哪里能找到我。

original: Uh... I'm not sure. I'll get back to you.
translation: 呃……我不太确定。我再去问问。

original: I'll find them and talk to them.
translation: 我会找到他们，和他们谈谈的。

original: Much appreciated. Once you've talked to them, come back and let me know if they will help us.
translation: 非常感谢。谈过以后，一定要把他们的意见转告我。

original: I know where they are. I'll go and talk to them.
translation: 我知道他们在哪，我可以和他们谈谈。

original: Excellent, come back after you've spoken to them. They should see the benefits of helping us in the long term.
translation: 很好，谈过了之后再来向我汇报吧。要让他们明白，与我们合作能够带来许多长远的利益。

original: I've met with the Boomers. I don't think it'll work out.
translation: 我已经见过大炮族了。我不觉得他们不会答应的。

original: Actually, I already know them. We're good friends.
translation: 实际上，我认识他们。我们关系不错。

original: That's excellent news! So they'll help us, right?
translation: 这真是太好了！那么，他们愿意帮我们吗？

original: Sorry, I'm not interested.
translation: 抱歉，我没兴趣。

original: Sorry to hear that, but do me a favor and give it some more thought. I'll be here if you change your mind.
translation: 太遗憾了。再考虑一下吧，就当我求你。如果你改变想法，可以再回来找我。

original: I'm listening.
translation: 我听着呢。

original: I'm going to keep this as simple as possible so we don't waste each other's time.
translation: 为了不浪费大家的时间，我尽量说得简短一些。

original: The NCR is in a bit of a tight spot with all that's going on with Mr. House and the Legion.
translation: NCR目前进入了一个关键时期，我们与豪斯先生和军团的对抗日益胶着。

original: And despite your reputation and previous actions with the NCR, we could use your help.
translation: 尽管你的名声不怎么样，对NCR也采取过一些不良举动，但我们依然需要你的帮助。

original: I'm glad you could make it! I have something I wanted to discuss with you.
translation: 你终于来了，太好了！我有件事想和你商量一下。

original: It's a very important matter, and I have a strong feeling you're the perfect person for the job.
translation: 这件事十分重要，我有一种强烈的感觉，你是处理这件事的最佳人选。

original: You received my message. Good. I realize that it may seem a little strange that I'm contacting you, considering your reputation...
translation: 你收到我的消息了，很好。我知道突然冒昧联系你显得有些奇怪，毕竟考虑到你的名声……

original: But I have a business proposition I'd like to discuss with you.
translation: 但我这里有一项业务，还是希望能和你探讨一下。

original: I wanted to talk to you about the Boomers.
translation: 我想和你谈谈大炮族的事。

original: I'm glad to see you've given it some more thought. So, are you willing to go talk to them and see if they will help us?
translation: 你终于开始考虑他们了，我很高兴。你愿意去和他们谈判吗？

original: What's the word with the Boomers? Have you talked to them yet?
translation: 大炮族怎么说的？你和他们谈过了吗？

original: Would you, uh, go step in the pantry for a minute?
translation: 你能，呃，去食品储藏室那里待会儿吗？

original: [FAILED] Now why the fuck would I do that? I don't have time for games. Stop wasting my time.
translation: [失败] 我他妈去那干儿什么？我没时间跟你玩。别浪费我的时间。

original: I think I saw a radroach in the pantry. You should check it out.
translation: 我好像在食品贮藏室看到了一只辐射蟑螂。你应该去检查一下。

original: [SUCCEEDED] No! It'll ruin my ingredients!
translation: [成功] 不！它会毁了我的食材！

original: Use Medicine skill to surmise House's condition.
translation: 使用医疗技能来诊断豪斯的现状。

original: [SUCCEEDED] I see you've made a study of the topic. My knowledge of the science of longevity would fill several textbooks...
translation: [成功] 看得出来你做过些研究。有关延长寿命的科学手段，这方面的知识我都能写好几本书了……

original: Perhaps, after a decade or two of economic reconstruction, I can commercialize these technologies and offer them to others, such as yourself.
translation: 也许再过一、二十年，等经济复苏了，我就会将这项技术商业化，让其他人也能享受，比如你。

original: The lifespan you're claiming is impossible, except for ghouls and Super Mutants.
translation: 你的生命周期不可能这么长，除非你是尸鬼或变种人。

original: [Barter] for better terms.
translation: [砍价]这价格不行。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Very well, five times the bonus. {with finality}Not one cap more.
translation: [成功] 好吧……那就算你5倍的邮递费吧。{with finality}不能再多了。

original: It's a good start... but well below market price.
translation: 底价不错，但和行情比还是低了点。

original: [FAILED] Is that an attempt at...{beat}{distaste} humor?
translation: [失败] 你这是在……{beat}{distaste}说笑吗？

original: I've always taken business negotiations very seriously. I advise you to do the same.
translation: 我对待商业谈判向来都很认真，我建议你也如此。

original: Raise your price or... or, uh... you're "chip outta luck."
translation: 最好提高点价码，不然你可能……啥都捞不着。

original: No thanks.
translation: 不，谢了。

original: My offer far exceeds the original terms of your contract, which, I will remind you, already obligates you to deliver the Chip.
translation: 我出的价可比合同上写的要高得多。另外我提醒你，根据合同，你依然有义务将筹码送到我手里。

original: I accept your terms.
translation: 我接受你的条件。

original: {satisfied}Well enough. Return to me when you have the Platinum Chip in your possession. Any final matters for us to discuss?
translation: {satisfied}很好。拿到白金筹码后回来找我。最后还有什么要问的吗 ?

original: Sarah, I plan on staying here often - got a special price for a special client?
translation: 萨拉, 我打算在这儿常住——你们这儿对特殊的客人有特价吗？

original: [SUCCEEDED] Well. Sure! You seem pretty special. But that'll be our secret, okay?
translation: [成功] 啊，当然，我就当你是个特殊的客人好啦！但千万别告诉别人，好吗？

original: I have Vault gear for you.
translation: 我带了些避难所的装备给你。

original: You do? That's wonderful! Let me see what you brought.
translation: 真的？太好了！让我看看你带什么来了。

original: All right! That's going to net you lots of caps, my friend. Do you want to trade all your vault suits right now?
translation: 棒极了！朋友，这些避难所服装可值一大笔钱呢。你愿意现在就出手吗？

original: I would like a room, please.
translation: 我要一个房间。

original: All right! We have an available room for you. That will be just 20 caps.
translation: 好的！我们正好有空房。住宿费是20瓶盖。

original: A special room for a special client!
translation: 对您这样的贵客，当然要配一间特殊的客房了！

original: For The Strip VIPs, like you, I've got just the right room - at half the price.
translation: 对于向您这样的长街VIP，我们正好有一个合适的房间——而且只要半价。

original: My shop's open for you, but not my Vault. I don't need troublemakers staying at my home, no thanks.
translation: 我可以卖东西给你，但我的避难所不欢迎你。我不喜欢有人在我家里惹是生非，请你离开吧。

original: Having you tonight is my pleasure. Your room is ready!
translation: 您的入住令小店蓬荜生辉。您的房间已经准备好了！

original: Some members of the White Glove Society. They were going to eat you.
translation: 白手套社团的人。他们想要吃了你。

original: What in the sam hell? Eat me? What kind of sick bastards would eat a person?
translation: 你说什么？吃了我？这群变态杂种，他们居然要吃人啊？

original: I'll tell you what. Soon as I'm out of here and my daddy knows the story, you can bet there ain't gonna be no White Hat Society no more.
translation: 我跟你说，等我离开这里，我要把整件事告诉我爸爸。你放心，以后不会再有什么白帽子社团了。

original: I was hoping you might have some work for me.
translation: 我原以为你有工作能交给我。

original: I did have something, but some friends of mine got whacked and now I got nothing for ya. Sorry about that.
translation: 我是有些事务要处理，但已经交给我的朋友们摆平了。所以现在没有差事能给你。抱歉。

original: You can blame the White Glove Society. They're all cannibals.
translation: 你可以全算在白手套社团头上。他们都是食人族。

original: Well that does it! None of them maniacs will ever do business with Heck Gunderson long as they live.
translation: 好吧，我忍无可忍了！这帮疯子休想再活着跟我赫克·冈德森谈生意了。

original: Hell, I'll put me together a damn blockade. Hit 'em where it hurts.
translation: 妈的，我要动用所有手段好好制裁他们，让他们知道自作孽的下场。

original: They control the food? Well there ain't gonna be no food. Not for anybody in this whole damn town.
translation: 他们控制粮食？好啊，老子就断了他们的粮。这座狗屁城市休想再得到一粒粮食。

original: It's a goddamned monument to inhumanity. Let 'em starve. Biggest favor anyone's ever done this hellhole.
translation: 反人类的渣滓，简直他妈反出新境界了。饿死这帮狗东西，已经算是对这个粪坑最大的仁慈了。

original: <Science>
translation: <科学>

original: [SUCCEEDED] <Various buzzing and clicking noises>
translation: [成功] <各种蜂鸣和咔嚓声>

original: Thank you, sir. You may proceed.
translation: 谢谢，先生。你可以通过了。

original: 1C 3C R34 M.
translation: 1C 3C R34 M。

original: [SUCCEEDED] <Various buzzing and clicking noises>
translation: [成功] <各种蜂鸣和咔嚓声>

original: Thank you, madam. You may proceed.
translation: 谢谢，女士。你可以通过了。

original: 1C 3C R34 M.
translation: 1C 3C R34 M。

original: [FAILED] Please submit to a credit check or present a passport.
translation: [失败] 请缴纳保证金或出示通行证。

original: Robot! Let me past!
translation: 机器人！让我过去 !

original: A Stimpak.
translation: 一支治疗针。

original: You said you could spare some supplies?
translation: 你说过你有多余的补给品？

original: Sure. Would you like a Stimpak, Fixer, or RadAway?
translation: 没错，你想要治疗针，瘾头解还是辐特宁 ?

original: Well, now that Jacob is dead, we don't have the extra resources to make a surplus of medical supplies. Sorry, but we cannot spare anything now.
translation: 哎，雅各布已经死了，我们没能力生产额外的药物了。抱歉，我们现在没有多余的药品可以分给你。

original: I helped with that addiction problem you mentioned.
translation: 我已经救助了你提到的那几个吸毒者。

original: I saw them. Thank you so much for helping them. This means a lot to the Followers of the Apocalypse. You have our thanks.
translation: 我见过他们了，谢谢你对他们的帮助。这对天启追随者意义非凡，我们十分感谢你。

original: If you need some medical supplies, come see me. With Jacob working with us, we should be able to spare a Stim or Fixer once a day.
translation: 如果你需要医疗用品的话，请来找我。有了雅各布的帮助，每天为你提供一支治疗针或瘾头解应该不成问题。

original: I saw Bill, but found Jacob dead. His death will be a big loss for Freeside.
translation: 我见到了比尔，但雅各布却过世了。他的死对自由城来说是个巨大的损失。

original: Thank you for helping Bill. At least he will help repair things around here.
translation: 谢谢你帮助比尔。至少他以后还能帮忙这儿的人修修东西。

original: I saw Jacob, but found Bill dead... His death will be a big loss for Freeside.
translation: 我见到了雅各布，但比尔却过世了。他的死对自由城来说是个巨大的损失。

original: If you need some medical supplies, come see me. With Jacob working with us, we should be able to spare a Stim or Fixer once a day.
translation: 如果你需要医疗用品的话，请来找我。有了雅各布的帮助，每天为你提供一支治疗针或瘾头解应该不成问题。

original: What can you tell me about Captain Pappas?
translation: 可以告诉我有关帕帕斯上尉的事吗？

original: She may be a bit of a hardass, but she's the best damn Captain we've had here. I'd be careful around her. You don't want to get on her bad side.
translation: 她可能有点铁石心肠，但绝对是这里最好的上尉。我在她身边很小心的。你可别跟她作对。

original: If you're digging for dirt on the Captain, you're digging in the wrong place.
translation: 你想挖她的丑事，抓她的把柄？那你可找错了人了。

original: Tell me about Private Erwin.
translation: 跟我说说列兵欧文。

original: Private Erwin... yeah, he's starting to get a thick file here with all his troublemaking.
translation: 列兵欧文……他惹的麻烦很多，案底越来越厚了。

original: My troopers are my business. Stay out of it.
translation: 我的士兵归我管。你不要插手。

original: What can you tell me about the Ambassador?
translation: 跟我讲讲大使吧。

original: Eh, Crocker isn't too bad. He mostly stays in his office now. If you have any questions about the Embassy you should ask him. He'll talk your ear off.
translation: 克罗克人不坏。他大多数时候都呆在办公室。如果你想问关于大使馆的事，就去找他吧，他能把你的耳朵磨出茧子来。

original: What is happening on the Strip?
translation: 长街上最近有什么新鲜事？

original: More of the usual. We're keeping an eye on the troopers to make sure they don't do anything stupid.
translation: 没什么特别的。我们一直在紧盯着这些士兵，以防他们干傻事。

original: The only stupid one we've had lately is Private Erwin. He's starting to cause more trouble than he's worth.
translation: 最近唯一不让人省心的就是列兵欧文。他惹出的麻烦越来越多，已经不值得我们替他擦屁股了。

original: How the hell did brahmin get loose on the Strip? If this is another one of Private Erwin's pranks, I'll make him regret it.
translation: 双头牛怎么会跑到长街上来？如果这又是欧文搞的鬼，我可要让他吃不了兜着走。

original: I've got to deal with drunk troopers making fools of themselves and embarrassing all of the NCR with their behavior, so it's just another day here.
translation: 我必须整治一下那些士兵，到处干傻事，太给NCR丢脸了。这种事简直天天有。

original: I'm looking for the Ambassador.
translation: 我正在找大使。

original: Ambassador Crocker can be found in his office through the door to my right and at the end of the hall.
translation: 走过这个门，往我右手边，一直走到大厅尽头，克罗克大使就在办公室里。

original: Fine, but don't keep me waiting.
translation: 好，但别让我等太久。

original: Why would I do that, baby? I want to talk to you as much as you want to talk to me.
translation: 我怎么会让你等呢？我真恨不得立马坐下来与你畅谈一番哪。

original: And you dig this is just first base, right? You and me have a future together, and it's big league and open all night.
translation: 现在只是万事开头第一步，明白吗？咱们是要共创未来的，到时候可有享不尽的荣华富贵啊。

original: Here's the key to the Prez. I'll see you there in two shakes. Ta-ta.
translation: 这是套房的钥匙。我马上就来。回见。

original: Those rat-bastard Garrets stopped offering tabs. Now where the hell am I supposed to go for free drinks?
translation: 加勒特家那帮混蛋不再允许人赊账了。现在我他妈去哪儿搞免费的酒喝啊 ?

original: Friggin' troll NCR squatters. A bunch of mouth-breathing wastes of space, if you ask me.
translation: 可恶的NCR流民。要我说，他们活着都是浪费空间。

original: Hey. Thanks for helping me out. Being back and working really saved my life.
translation: 嘿。谢谢你救了我。回来工作让我感觉好多了。

original: Got any chems, sir? I need a hit quick!
translation: 有药吗，先生？我想过把瘾 !

original: Can't talk. Much work to do at the Fort and Atomic Wrangler.
translation: 没空说话。我在城堡和原子牛仔还有很多活要干。

original: Howdy, pardner! You've come a {fur}far piece, haven't you? Welcome to New Vegas!
translation: 嘿，搭档！你真是走了好远的路啊！欢迎来到新维加斯！

original: I'd like to ask about something else instead.
translation: 我还想问点别的。

original: {slightly disappointed}Oh, yes, sure sure. Ask away.
translation: {slightly disappointed}噢，好啊，当然。随便问。

original: Interesting, go on.
translation: 有意思，继续说。

original: Go on.
translation: 继续。

original: Now we mostly just keep track of the NCR citizens and troopers around and make sure they don't get in trouble, but that's Captain Pappas' job.
translation: 我们现在的工作主要是监督这儿的NCR公民和军人，防止他们遇上麻烦，不过这事是帕帕斯上校在负责。

original: I keep myself busy with paperwork and reports that get sent back to the NCR. It's mostly busy work, but every once in a while, we make progress.
translation: 我则是整天忙着向NCR提交各种文书和报告。虽然工作挺繁重的，但我们偶尔还是会取得一些进展。

original: That's enough history for me.
translation: 我不想再听历史课了。

original: Have you seen Benny?
translation: 你见到本尼了吗？

original: It was a while ago! He came through here in a real hurry - didn't even stop to say hello! I think he went down his secret escape elevator out in the hall!
translation: 就在刚才！他匆匆忙忙地闯进来，连声招呼都没打！我想他一定是搭乘大厅里的秘密逃生电梯逃跑了！

original: When's the last time you saw Benny?
translation: 你最后一次见到本尼是什么时候？

original: Sure! He came through here in a big hurry - didn't even stop to say hello! I think he went down his secret escape elevator out in the hall!
translation: 见过！他匆匆忙忙地闯进来，连声招呼都没打！我想他一定是搭乘大厅里的秘密逃生电梯逃跑了！

original: He was around here not too long ago. He's probably down on the casino floor now.
translation: 不久之前他还这儿呢。可能现在去赌场了吧。

original: You can wait for him here, if you like. I'm incapable of asking you to leave.
translation: 如果你愿意的话，可以在这里等他。毕竟我也不好意思赶你走。

original: You know, leather is my specialty. Unzip it, heat it and rub a shine onto it.
translation: 你知道吗，我也喜欢皮衣。拉开拉链、用火烘干，再擦得油光锃亮。

original: Vault gear - swell. Can you show me what you got?
translation: 避难所设备——妙极了。能给我介绍一下吗？

original: Oh, yeah, sure!
translation: 哦，没问题！

original: Okay - I got these great lunchboxes, they're super! What else? Oh-oh! Look at these toasters! You like toasts, right? If they are crunchy even better!
translation: 好的，首先是午餐盒，这些可都是稀有货！还有什么？哦，对了！这些烤面包机！你喜欢烤面包吗？能烤得又香又脆哦！

original: What about a vintage Vault-Tec toy car? Or-
translation: 来个古老的避难所科技玩具车怎么样？还是——

original: You get back here with our dinner!
translation: 你把我们的晚餐还回来！

original: I'd like to see what you have for sale.
translation: 我想看看你卖些什么。

original: Of course.
translation: 当然。

original: I want to join the White Glove Society. I was told I'd need a sponsor.
translation: 我想加入白手套社团。有人跟我说需要一个担保人。

original: And you most certainly fit the bill. Given your deeds on the Strip alone, I can safely say that you would be a prized addition to our honorary ranks.
translation: 显然你完全符合我们的条件。考虑到你在长街的名望，我相信你的加入必定会给我们的荣誉殿堂增光添彩。

original: Mmm. You'll have to look elsewhere, I'm afraid. The whole idea of "joining" the White Glove Society is pure hogwash.
translation: 唔……我看你还是另谋高就吧。所谓"加入"白手套社团的想法，完全就是异想天开。

original: You're either in it, or you're not. There's no joining.
translation: 会员身份是与生俱来的。根本没有什么加入一说。

original: This "honorary member" nonsense is just something Marjorie contrived because she's so preoccupied with image. But it's only a fad.
translation: 这个"荣誉会员"纯粹就是玛乔里心血来潮想出来的馊主意，因为她太在意社团的形象了。但这也只是她一时脑热。

original: Once it blows over, the riff-raff we've temporarily inducted will be shown the door. So I wouldn't hold out hope if I were you.
translation: 等她冷静下来，那些被我们临时拉进来的乌合之众都会被统统扫地出门。所以我劝你，还是别抱希望了。

original: I have some more questions about Vault 21.
translation: 对21号避难所我还有点疑问。

original: Do you miss the old days in the vault?
translation: 你怀念避难所的旧时光吗？

original: It was bustling with activity! We all knew each other so well - you see, the vault kept us all even. It's all symmetry and windows down there.
translation: 那可是段活力四射的岁月！我们彼此关系都很好，避难所里人人平等。到处都是一片和谐的景象。

original: We solved any quarrels through gambling! Lady Luck casts no eyeballs, you know? So, nobody shafted anyone else!
translation: 所有的争吵都可以通过赌博解决！幸运女神是不会偏袒任何人的，知道吗？所以，谁也别想蒙人！

original: Yeah... I miss those days!
translation: 是的……我怀念那段岁月！

original: Why did he fill the vault with concrete?
translation: 为什么他要用混凝土把避难所填上？

original: I don't know! Maybe he didn't want anybody sneaking around down there.
translation: 我不知道！也许他不喜欢有人成天在地底下钻来钻去吧。

original: My vault runs deep and wide! It's filled with corridors and rooms that go far.
translation: 我的避难所又深又宽敞！到处都是绵延不断的走廊和房间。

original: What gives him the right to screw us with the royal shaft, anyway? So, he saved New Vegas. Woohooo! Now scram and let us go on with our lives! Sheesh!
translation: 他有什么权力摆出那副霸道的样子，还对我们颐指气使的？是，他是拯救过新维加斯。哇呼！干嘛不让我们自个儿过日子呢，切。

original: You have never actually left this place?
translation: 你真的从没有离开过这儿？

original: Sure I have! I made the scene in The Strip. It's just that I really like it here - Vault 21 is a kick!
translation: 当然有！我去过长街。只不过我太喜欢这里了——21号避难所是最棒的！

original: What is so special about this vault?
translation: 这个避难所有什么特别之处？

original: My vault is pure New Vegas. Everyone has a chance and Lady Luck smiles if you play your odds right!... Okay, it was like that before we had to leave.
translation: 我的避难所就和新维加斯一模一样——机会对每个人都是公平的，幸运女神总会垂青你！……好吧，在我们被赶出去前，确实是那样。

original: Vault 21 had very smart ways to help people get along. All arguments and fights got solved through gambling.
translation: 21号避难所在引导人们和睦相处上自有一套。所有的争端都可以通过赌博来解决。

original: I'll give you a quick tour of my home! Oh, yeah, if you like.
translation: 我可以带你快速参观一下这里！哦，如果你愿意的话。

original: < Speech Option - 30 >
[SUCCEEDED] All right, apology accepted. Don't let it happen again.
translation: [成功] 好吧，我接受道歉，下不为例。

original: My apologies. It was rude and disrespectful of me to do that.
translation: 抱歉，我刚才实在太粗鲁太失礼了。

original: What is this memorial?
translation: 这个纪念碑是做什么的？

original: It commemorates the Battle of Hoover Dam. The Rangers lured the best of Caesar's Legion into Boulder City, then blew the whole town up.
translation: 这是为了纪念胡佛大坝战役而设立的。当时游骑兵把凯撒军团的精锐引进了巨石城，然后把整座城镇都炸上了天。

original: The NCR still lost a bunch of troops in the fighting, though. My older brother sacrificed himself so they could evacuate some of the wounded.
translation: 不过NCR依然在战斗中损失了不少部队。我哥哥就是为了掩护伤员撤退而牺牲了自己。

original: [FAILED] Nothing you can threaten me with holds a candle to what the Omertas would do to me if they caught me.
translation: [失败] 比起黑手党，你这种程度的恐吓只能算是小菜一碟。

original: You deploy the Thermite or I'll punch you in the shoulder.
translation: 你自己去放铝热剂，否则小心我打烂你的胳膊。

original: Give me the Thermite and I'll destroy the weapons.
translation: 给我铝热剂，我要销毁那些武器。

original: Okay, here's the Thermite and a key to the room where the guns are stored. Place the Thermite on the crates in the room.
translation: 好的，这是铝热剂和储藏武器的房间的钥匙。记得把铝热剂放到屋内的板条箱上。

original: I rigged the light switch outside the room to kick off a spark big enough to hold the Thermite. That should turn that shit into molten slag.
translation: 我已经在屋外装了个电灯开关，碰出的火花应该可以引燃那些铝热剂。这样一来，那些武器很快就会熔成一堆废渣。

original: As soon as we're done talking I'm going to make myself like a ghost. I don't want to be anywhere near here when the bosses find out.
translation: 等咱们说完话，我也该出去避避风头了。我可不想出了事以后还在这儿坐以待毙。

original: Where do the guns come from?
translation: 枪支是从哪来的？

original: I've made a lot of contacts over the years. I have some friends back in California that can get their hands on just about anything.
translation: 这些年我积攒了不少人脉。我在加州认识几个老朋友，他们可以帮我搞到货。

original: Mostly I've been calling in every last favor I have.
translation: 基本上，我是把所有人情都用尽了。

original: What can we do to take care of the guns?
translation: 我们该怎么处理那些军火？

original: As a little pet project, I've been making some thermite. Thermite burns as hot as the devil's asshole and can melt through just about anything.
translation: 我早就想出了个小小的计划，为此我一直在制作铝热剂。铝热剂燃烧时的热量堪比魔鬼的屁眼，几乎能烧穿所有东西。

original: I've been keeping it so if the Family betrays me I can hopefully do some damage before I end up dead or in jail.
translation: 这玩意我始终都备着，如果有一天家族背叛我，那我至少还能在完蛋以前搞点破坏。

original: How do you get the guns into the Strip?
translation: 你是如何把枪支弄进长街的？

original: I'm pretty proud of myself. It's a stroke of genius, if I can be so modest.
translation: 这我可得好好吹嘘一番。哪怕谦虚点说，这也绝对是个天才之举。

original: The whole arrangement starts with an old buddy of mine in the Republic. He's responsible for packing and shipping supplies to the NCR on the Strip.
translation: 我在共和国有个老朋友，全是他安排的。他负责向驻扎在长街的NCR军队装运各类物资。

original: He marks some containers as food and medical and packs them with guns and other shit.
translation: 每次运货，他都会留下几个箱子，写上药品与食物，再往里头塞进枪支和其他玩意。

original: From there, it took just a couple of greased palms to get someone to let me cherry pick a container or two out of every shipment. Easy as pie.
translation: 然后，只要多使几个钱，我就可以让人从每批货物当中挑出那一两个箱子。简直小菜一碟。

original: Yes.
translation: 是的。

original: Oh. Great! The Followers of the Apocalypse, well some of us, anyway, have been interested in Mr. House's technology, how he stays alive.
translation: 哦，太好了！天启追随者，应该说是我们当中的有些人，对豪斯先生的技术十分感兴趣，尤其是他延长寿命的方法。

original: Of course, no one else is allowed inside the Lucky 38, so no one knows what's going on. Well, except for you.
translation: 当然，没有人能进入幸运38，所以也就没有人知道里面究竟怎么回事。呃，除你以外。

original: [SUCCEEDED] We don't want to draw attention to ourselves. Alright, we'll give them a little bit of extra business.
translation: [成功] 我们也不想引人注目。好吧，就给他们点生意做好了。

original: You should buy guns from Mick and Ralph, people are starting to ask questions.
translation: 你应该从米克和拉尔夫那里买枪，人们已经开始怀疑了。

original: [FAILED] They're small timers, I could give a fuck what they would enjoy.
translation: [失败] 他们就是一帮小杂碎，是不是非要我上门教训他们一顿才开心？

original: Mick and Ralph would...Um... Enjoy selling the Omertas guns.
translation: 米克和拉尔夫会……嗯……很乐意卖枪给黑手党的。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Really? That was his idea? Alright, he can go. Hopefully he finds us some good deals out there.
translation: [成功] 真的？那是他的主意？好的，他可以去。希望他能给我们找到一些好买卖。

original: <Lie> Troike wants to see about negotiating some lower prices for weapons for you guys.
translation: <撒谎> 卓伊克想帮你的手下们弄批便宜点的军火。

original: [FAILED] You're real funny. I like you. But no. We still have business for Troike.
translation: [失败] 你真有趣，我喜欢你。不过不行。我们还有事要卓伊克做。

original: Um... I'm sure you have enough guns.
translation: 嗯……我觉得你们手上的军火已经够多了。

original: Big Sal agreed to let you go.
translation: 大萨尔答应让你离开了。

original: Holy shit, really? Okay, I'll help you, but I'm getting the hell out of here first chance I get.
translation: 妈呀，真的？好，我帮你，不过有机会我一定会离开这鬼地方的。

original: Could you repair some things for me?
translation: 你能帮我修复一些物品吗？

original: Sure, let's see what you've got.
translation: 当然，来看看你有什么。

original: The President is coming to Hoover Dam?
translation: 总统要来胡佛大坝？

original: It's probably just a political thing - you know, give a few speeches, shake hands with the troops, boost morale.
translation: 估计也就为了政治作秀——你懂的，发表一下演说，和士兵握个手，鼓舞鼓舞士气。

original: What can you tell me about Hoover Dam?
translation: 你能和我说说胡佛大坝吗？

original: It's one of the biggest sources of electrical power in the region, so the NCR's fortified the place pretty heavily.
translation: 那是本地区规模最大的电力供应设施，所以那里NCR的防御工事非常严密。

original: When President Kimball shows up on his inspection tour, I'm sure he'll be confident that the Dam is safe and secure.
translation: 等金博尔总统来视察时，我相信他一定会对这座大坝的安保措施感到无比骄傲。

original: Where did you say the investigator's room was, again?
translation: 你之前说那个侦探的房间在哪里来着？

original: If you head back to the hotel rooms, his will be one floor directly above you after you exit the lobby.
translation: 如果你回客房区找他的话，他的房间就在二楼，你出大厅后，往正上方走就是。

original: Hey, here's that gun I promised you. I suggest using it while they are talking, I'm pretty sure they're going to kill you after they've talked.
translation: 嘿，这是我答应给你的枪。我建议你趁他们说话的时候就马上动手。要是等他们说完，你就死定了。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Alright, I'll take care of them. Just give me the word when to start shooting.
translation: [成功] 好吧，我来对付他们。当你准备动手的时候就告诉我。

original: They are going to expect something from me. You can do it and surprise them.
translation: 他们的注意力都会集中在我这儿。你开枪他们肯定反应不过来。

original: [FAILED] If you aren't a good shot then we're fucked anyways. No, I think you're going to have to do it.
translation: [失败] 你要是枪法也不好，那我们就他妈的完蛋了。没错，开枪这活必须由你来做。

original: I'm not a very good shot. You should kill them.
translation: 我枪法不怎么着，应该由你来动手。

original: What happens when the bosses are gone?
translation: 处理掉老板之后呢？

original: When they're gone, I'm gonna run this joint. Don't worry, I'll take care of this place.
translation: 他们挂了，我就是这儿的头儿了。放心吧，这地方到时候由我来罩着。

original: I have some questions about the Bosses plans.
translation: 我对老板们的计划有些问题要问。

original: Alright, let's have them.
translation: 好的，说说看。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Sounds like a deal to me.
translation: [成功] 听起来还能接受。

original: How about 200 caps and I forget we ever met.
translation: 200瓶盖怎么样。我会当咱们从来没见过面。

original: [FAILED] Yeah, but come back when you have the money.
translation: [失败] 得了，你还是等有了钱再来吧。

original: How about 200 caps and I forget we ever met.
translation: 200瓶盖怎么样。我会当咱们从来没见过面。

original: Okay, 300 caps is a deal.
translation: 好的，300瓶盖成交。

original: Fine, here you go. If anyone asks, you ain't never seen me before.
translation: 好啊，给你。如果有人问起，可别说看见过我。

original: Fine, here you go. If anyone asks, you ain't never seen me before.
translation: 好啊，给你。如果有人问起，可别说看见过我。

original: I need more film for the camera.
translation: 我需要更多的胶卷。

original: Here.
translation: 给。

original: What do you know about the White Glove Society?
translation: 你对白手套有什么了解？

original: Personally? They give me the heebie-jeebies. There's such a thing as being too polite, "if I may" this, "my pleasure" that.
translation: 个人看法？他们让我浑身发毛。他们那种过分拘泥的礼节让人总觉得不对头，整天"打搅"来"荣幸"去的。

original: Don't get me wrong - that resort of theirs is strictly ring-a-ding. But my guts say, "don't go in the basement."
translation: 不过别误会——他们待的那地方倒是顶呱呱。但我的直觉告诉我，"别去地下室"。

original: What makes you think you can succeed?
translation: 你凭什么认为我们会成功？

original: Baby, the odds may look long, but that's just because we ain't done rigging them. I won't toss the dice until we are.
translation: 宝贝，虽然赢面看起来不大，但那只是因为咱们还没开始发力呢。我可不会毫无准备就丢骰子的。

original: I've gleaned a lot, working with Mr. House. He was a good cat to swing with. I still got a lot to learn, but it's... it's coming together.
translation: 跟着豪斯先生，我可是学了不少绝活。他是条狡猾的老猫咪。我本来还有很多东西要学，但……时不我待了。

original: It's a deal.
translation: 成交了。

original: Jackpot, baby! I knew we'd see eye to eye!
translation: 中头彩了，宝贝！我就知道咱两能心有灵犀。

original: Here's a start on your retainer. And as a signing bonus, take the key to the Presidential - best suite in the house!
translation: 这是你的定金，作为见面礼，这把总统套房的钥匙就送给你了——那可是我们这儿最好的房间哦！

original: When you're ready to saddle up, come find me down on the casino floor and we'll plan the next step of this caper.
translation: 等你准备好开工了，就到赌场这层来找我，然后我们来看看这笔买卖下一步该怎么走。

original: Now if you'll excuse me, I need a moment to collect myself.
translation: 如果你不介意，我想先花点时间打理一下。

original: What are you offering?
translation: 你有什么条件？

original: You help me, and before long the Chairmen will rule all of Vegas, dig? With enough robot muscle to back it up.
translation: 只要你肯帮我，用不了多久，董事会就能统治整个维加斯，明白吗？到时候会有一大群机器人给我们做后盾。

original: You'll get a sweet, juicy cut of that action. But until that day comes, I'll keep you on retainer, and pay bonuses for "special missions."
translation: 你会拿到一份非常丰厚的报酬。不过在那之前，我会先付给你定金，你每完成一项"特别任务"，我都会给你奖励。

original: How's that sound?
translation: 听起来如何？

original: Looks like I should think about quitting...
translation: 也许我真该考虑洗手不干了……

original: You left these at my grave. <Show Benny his cigarette butts.>
translation: 你在我墓穴里掉了这个。<给本尼看他的烟头。>

original: Fill me in about the NCR.
translation: 跟我说说NCR。

original: A nation of meddlers, trying to muscle in on our action. Well, we got muscles too, and smarts besides.
translation: 一个喜欢蛮横干涉他人的国家，想用武力插手我们的事情。可我们不但有武力，还有聪明才智。

original: Only reason the NCR hasn't busted up our scene is they're a little afraid of Mr. House, and a lot afraid of Caesar.
translation: NCR之所以没有直接砸了我们的场子，是因为他们对豪斯先生心存畏惧，而且还特别害怕凯撒。

original: If the NCR beats the Legion at Hoover Dam, they'll turn on us and claim the Strip. And we don't have the muscle to beat them {significantly}- not yet.
translation: 如果NCR在胡佛水坝之战中击败了军团，他们会马上调转枪口，占领长街。我们没有足够的实力去击败他们{significantly}——至少现在没有。

original: Meanwhile, they're all that's keeping Caesar's Legion at bay. Plus NCR soldiers and citizens are our best customers. It's complicated.
translation: 但另一方面，也只有他们能把凯撒军团挡在河对岸。加上NCR士兵和国民又都是我们的忠实顾客，所以这事其实比较复杂。

original: Tell me about Mr. House.
translation: 跟我说说豪斯先生的事。

original: A good cat to swing with. Or was - {'til}until he stopped mewing.
translation: 他是只老奸巨猾的好猫，可惜最近却不怎么叫唤了。

original: It was House's big idea to resurrect the Strip. He recruited the Three Families as muscle, showed us how to set up casinos, negotiated with the NCR.
translation: 复兴长街的计划是豪斯提出来的。他召集了三大家族，教我们建设赌场，还与NCR谈判。

original: None of this in person, mind you. Did all of his talking through those Securitrons of his. But lately? The silence is deafening.
translation: 所有这些都不是当面谈的，别忘了。他说的话都是通过电子保安传达的。可最近？他却安静得让人害怕。

original: The robots collect House's share of the take every week and life goes on. Ain't exactly what I'd call leadership.
translation: 机器人每周都来替豪斯收取分红，然后一切照旧。这可不是我期望的领导方式。

original: What's the deal with your secret workshop and "Yes Man" friend?
translation: 你的秘密工作室和那个叫"好好先生"的朋友是怎么回事？

original: {pained that the player talked to Yes Man}You really weren't supposed to talk to him...
translation: {pained that the player talked to Yes Man}你该不会是真的跟他聊过了吧……

original: {reluctantly explaining}All right, so he used to be a Securitron on patrol. Square as the rest, {'til}until I gave him a mickey in the shape of a pulse grenade.
translation: {reluctantly explaining}好吧，他原本就是个门口的电子保安，和普通的没啥区别，直到我朝他脑袋瓜里塞了一颗脉冲手雷，让他呼呼大睡。

original: Once he was on the nod, I yanked some wires and dragged him up to the workshop. I had... {hesitating to reveal this}some help, you see.
translation: 我趁着他系统还没重启，拉断了几根电线，然后把他拖进了工作间。我还……{hesitating to reveal this}得到了一点外援。

original: Gal named Emily, one of the Followers over in Freeside, a real whiz when it comes to things technical. She programmed his personality.
translation: 一个叫艾米莉的女孩，她是自由城的一名天启追随者，也是个科技达人。是她重新编写了他的人格程序。

original: Once Yes Man was hooked back in to House's data network, I started learning a lot more about what he was up to, dig? Like where and when to find you.
translation: 我让好好先生连上了豪斯的数据网络，很快我就知晓了他计划中的不少细节，明白吗？包括我该怎么找到你。

original: Orris left town after I had a little talk with him.
translation: 我和欧里斯谈过了，他已经离开了狱城。

original: Convinced him, huh? I could use more men with your powers of persuasion.
translation: 你说服他了？像你这样能说会道的人，我真该多找几个来。

original: You've shown me you can get the job done, so maybe you can help me with something more important.
translation: 你已经向我展示了自己的实力，也许你能帮我干点更重要的事情。

original: [FAILED] I think I'll keep my money, thanks. You take that fanciful tale of yours wherever you'd like. Now let's go. I have a job to finish.
translation: [失败] 谢谢，钱我还是自己留着吧。你编的故事，爱和谁说和谁说去。走吧，我这活还没干完呢。

original: You should give me all your money. Or I'll tell. And stuff.
translation: 你该把钱都给我，否则我就去告发你。等着吧。

original: After you.
translation: 我跟着你。

original: Stay close. I wouldn't want anything to happen to you.
translation: 跟紧了，我可不想你出事。

original: I'm looking for someone.
translation: 我正在找一个人。

original: Oh. Well, it's a big hotel. You should talk to Marjorie - she's in charge and she can probably help you find anyone you might need.
translation: 哦。好吧，这可是个大酒店。你应该和玛乔里谈谈——她是这儿的老板，也许能帮你找到你要找的人。

original: She usually works at the front of the Gourmand. She likes to see how people respond to it.
translation: 她通常会待在美食家餐厅的前台。她喜欢看大家用餐时的反应。

original: You can get to the Gourmand from the lobby here - it's a big set of double doors on the first floor on the eastern side. Can't miss it.
translation: 美食家餐厅就在大厅旁边，一楼东边有两扇气派的大门，从那儿穿过去就是了。很好找的。

original: You have entered a restricted area! Exit the gate area or you will be fired upon!
translation: 你已进入管制区域！立刻离开，否则我们就开火了 !

original: You have my attention, go on.
translation: 我听着呢，继续。

original: To the northeast is a settlement, the locals here call them "Boomers." They are sitting on a munitions stockpile that would be invaluable to us.
translation: 东北边有一处定居点，当地老百姓管住在那儿的人叫大炮族。他们坐拥着成堆的军火弹药，对我们来说简直是无价之宝。

original: I would like you to get in contact with them, and then do whatever it takes to convince them to help us.
translation: 我希望你能与他们进行交涉，无论采取什么手段，都要说服他们帮助我们。

original: Unfortunately, the Boomers keep to themselves and are, let's say, hostile to all outsiders. That's why I need someone like you.
translation: 不幸的是，这些大炮族不爱与人交往，对外来者……可以说是充满了敌意。所以我才需要你这样的人出马。

original: Someone with your background and reputation would have a better chance of reaching them than anyone I have available.
translation: 以你的背景和名望，想要与他们建立联系，应该比我手下的人要容易得多。

original: In exchange for your help, you would receive complete amnesty for any past crimes against the NCR, as well as additional benefits and perks.
translation: 只要你肯帮忙，就可以获得赦免，过去对NCR犯下过的罪行全部一笔勾销，同时还能享受到许多额外的奖赏与好处。

original: Do you think you would be able to do this for me?
translation: 你觉得自己有能力完成这项任务吗？

original: I think I'll be leaving.
translation: 我还是先告辞了。

original: You are the first person to step foot inside the Lucky 38 in over 200 years. It was not an invitation I made lightly.
translation: 你是200年来首位踏入幸运38的人类。这份邀请函可是经过了我慎重考虑的。

original: We have a serious matter to discuss concerning a contract you have yet to fulfill.
translation: 我们有件重要的事需要商量，是关于你手头的一份合同。

original: Yeah, I would like that.
translation: 是的，我很乐意。

original: Oh, that makes me so happy! You are too much!
translation: 哦，真让我高兴！你太好了！

original: Rodents of unusual size? I don't believe they exist.
translation: 巨型老鼠？我可不相信它们真的存在。

original: Oh, I assure you, sir, they are very real and very large. Please do be careful.
translation: 先生，我向你保证，它们真的存在，而且个头很大。请务必要小心。

original: I will be returning to California to start anew. If anything is left of the caravan, please keep it as a show of thanks for your kindness.
translation: 我会回加州从头开始的。如果大篷车里还剩什么东西的话，就当是我送给你的谢礼吧。

original: It is so rare to meet good, friendly people in the wastes. Here is the last location of the caravan. Good luck.
translation: 废土上像你这样乐于助人的好人已经不多了。这是大篷车的具体位置。祝你好运。

original: <Barter>
translation: <砍价>

original: [SUCCEEDED] I'm short 90 caps or so, but I have a few cartons of cigarettes and some sensor modules I could put toward my debt.
translation: [成功] 我还欠90多个瓶盖，不过我有几箱香烟和一些传感器模块，可以用来顶债。

original: At this point I'll have to return to California to start anew. I haven't got a cap to my name.
translation: 把它们都拿走的话，我就只能返回加州从头开始了，我身上一个瓶盖也没有了。

original: I find it hard to believe you ran from the caravan without taking something.
translation: 很难相信你丢下大篷车逃跑的时候，居然什么也没拿。

original: <Perception>
translation: <感知>

original: [SUCCEEDED] Damn. I didn't want to hand over all of my caps because I won't have enough to get home to California.
translation: [成功] 该死，我不想交出所有的瓶盖，因为那样我就没钱回加州了。

original: Here, take it all. I'll find my way home one way or another.
translation: 拿去吧，都给你。我总能找到办法回去的。

original: Jane, I can tell you're lying through your teeth.
translation: 简，我看得出来你在撒谎。

original: <Lady Killer>
translation: <红颜杀手>

original: [SUCCEEDED] Oh, you charming, wonderful hunk of a man. I agree, I cannot risk my reputation on such a paltry sum.
translation: [成功] 哦，你这诱人的小帅哥，真会讨人欢心。的确，我可不能为了这么点小钱坏了我的名声。

original: Here is what I owe, paid in full. I may scrape a bit to get home to California, but I'm a resourceful woman.
translation: 这是我欠的钱，全还了。或许我不够钱回加州了，但我会想办法的。

original: Here is the last known location of my caravan, if you feel like looking for it. Until we meet again, handsome.
translation: 这是我的大篷车的具体位置，你要感兴趣，可以自己去找。有缘再会啦，帅哥。

original: Jane, surely a lady of your stature has honor sufficient to pay her debts.
translation: 简，像你这样高贵的女士，肯定不会欠债不还的。

original: Benny has reprogrammed a Securitron. He's trying to take over the Strip.
translation: 本尼重新编程了一个电子保安，他正试图控制整个街区。

original: I've bugged the tower for you.
translation: 我已经在高塔的网络里植入了监听程序。

original: Good to hear, but it looks like the bug was deactivated a few minutes after it went online.
translation: 这是个好消息，不过貌似监听器刚上线没几分钟就失效了。

original: It looks like House has some kind of countermeasure in place to prevent evesdropping on his network. We'll get through eventually, just not today.
translation: 看来豪斯早已对外部窃密做好了万全的应对措施。不过我们迟早有一天会进入他的系统的。

original: Here are those medical supplies I promised. Hopefully you won't need to use them. Take care.
translation: 这是我答应给你的一些药品。希望你能小心使用。保重。

original: It looks like we've started getting reports from the tower's network! I'm sure the others will be able to make some sense of this.
translation: 我们好像已经开始从高塔中获取情报了！我想其他人一定能从中挖出些有用的东西来的。

original: Oh what the hell? The bug went offline! Dammit!
translation: 哦，怎么回事？监听器失效了！见鬼！

original: I swear to God that old man has thought of everything. Well, it looks like this was all for nothing, but you did your best. I appreciate the help.
translation: 我向上帝发誓，那老家伙真是滴水不漏。好吧，看来我们白忙活了一场，不过你已经尽力了。谢谢你的帮助。

original: We haven't received any information yet from the bug. Please report back when you've found a way into House's network.
translation: 我们至今还没有收到来自监听器的任何信息。如果你找到了进入豪斯网络的方法，请务必通知我们。

original: All right. I'm on it.
translation: 很好。我这就去。

original: Really? Oh, I wasn't expecting you to agree so easily. That's great!
translation: 真的吗？哦，没想到你这么容易就答应了。真是太好了！

original: Here, take this packet sniffer. It'll allow us to intercept data on Mr. House's network.
translation: 拿着，带上这个数据探测器。它能让我们截取豪斯先生网络上的数据。

original: You might have to manually remove the encryption from his data network, but hopefully you won't have too much trouble. Good luck!
translation: 你也许得手动破解数据网络密钥，不过应该不会遇到太多麻烦。祝你好运！

original: [SUCCEEDED] You know what? I like you. Half the people around here, they forget who runs this place.
translation: [成功] 这话我爱听。要知道这城里有一半的人都快忘了老大是谁了。

original: Head on through. The King's the bored-looking guy by the stage. Can't fuckin' miss him.
translation: 进去吧。台下那个无精打采的家伙就是猫王了。你肯定不会认错的。

original: I'm new in town, and wanted to pay my respects.
translation: 我初到贵地，来拜个山头。

original: Let's talk about something else.
translation: 我们说点别的吧。

original: What do you want to talk about?
translation: 你想谈什么？

original: What happens if the Platinum Chip is lost?
translation: 万一白金筹码永远消失了呢？

original: If the Chip's so valuable, why use a single courier to transport it?
translation: 如果筹码真的这么重要，为什么只让我一个人运送？

original: You realize you were just one of many couriers, the rest of them {beat}dummies, so to speak?
translation: 你知道吗，你只是几位邮差中的一员，唯一的区别是，其他人都是{beat}诱饵。

original: Add to that many thousands of caps worth of mercenary protection to screen your avenue of approach.
translation: 除此之外，为了能让你安全抵达目的地，我可没少花钱请雇佣兵作掩护。

original: Had I used an armed caravan to transport the Chip, I might as well have been announcing to the world, "This is important. Attack this!"
translation: 如果我派一支全副武装的商队来运送筹码，那就等于告诉全世界"这玩意很重要，快来抢！"

original: I didn't want to attract the attention of groups like the Great Khans or the Brotherhood of Steel. Alas, the real threat was closer to home.
translation: 我不想招摇过市，引起大汗帮或者钢铁兄弟会的注意。差点忘了，真正的威胁更是近在咫尺。

original: I have a right to know more.
translation: 我有权知道更多。

original: That's simply not true.
translation: 这句话不对。

original: I am the only person to hold any rights pertaining to the Chip. I designed it, and I paid for it - dearly.
translation: 关于这枚筹码，最有发言权的人是我。它是我设计的，我在它身上付出了相当大的心血。

original: To develop that Chip, I spent a sum of U.S. dollars - not the bottle caps that pass as currency these days - but a sum beyond counting.
translation: 当初为了研发它，我耗费了无数美元，不是今天那些破瓶盖子，而是货真价实的钱币。

original: For decades, I paid salvagers to comb the ruins for it. And when it was finally discovered, tens of thousands of caps spent to have it brought here.
translation: 数十年来，我雇佣了大批拾荒者，搜遍了各地的遗迹。找到它以后，我又花了不知多少瓶盖才让它物归原主。

original: We know how that turned out. Complete your contract and it will be the last time I pay for the Chip. Save your questions for then.
translation: 后面的事我就不再赘述了。只要你履行合同，这就将是我为这枚筹码所付出的最后一笔钱。等到那时，随你怎么问都行。

original: Now you need to settle that debt with the Garrets.
translation: 加勒特家的债该还了。

original: Sir, Santiago told you. Santiago has no debts.
translation: 先生，圣地亚哥说过，圣地亚哥没有欠债。

original: <Speech>
translation: <口才>

original: [SUCCEEDED] 25 caps will do. Tell Mick Santiago sent you and the code word is 'extravaganza'. He will set you up.
translation: [成功] 25个瓶盖成交。告诉米克，是圣地亚哥介绍你来的，暗号是“妄自尊大”。他会好好招待你的。

original: 50 caps without even knowing the details of this code? How about 25?
translation: 给你50个瓶盖都不能知道暗号的具体含义？25个怎么样？

original: <Speech>
translation: <口才>

original: I apologize, friend, but that is absurd given the value of this information.
translation: 抱歉，朋友，从这条情报的价值来看，我是不会答应这么荒谬的请求的。

original: Give it to me for free, now!
translation: 把它告诉我！

original: Do you have any work you need done?
translation: 你有什么事情需要人帮忙吗？

original: We've got the basics covered, but now you mention it, we have had {draw out}unusual requests from some of our wealthier customers.
translation: 基本事务我们都能打理，不过既然你问了，我们有几位出手阔绰的客人提出了一些不寻常的需求。

original: If you can recruit escorts to match these customers'... proclivities... I'd be willing to pay you finder's fees.
translation: 如果你能为这几位金主招来合适的私人伴游，以满足他们的……癖好……我愿意付给你中介费。

original: Actually, I have some other business to take care of.
translation: 实际上，我还有别的事要做。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Okay, that sounds fair.
translation: [成功] 好的，听起来很公平。

original: I'll give it to you for 200 caps.
translation: 出200瓶盖，我就给你。

original: [SUCCEEDED] This'll be worth your while. I wouldn't be here talking to you otherwise.
translation: [成功] 你配得上这样的报酬，否则我也不会和你谈。

original: This will be worth your while, so much that you won't regret paying 300 caps for it.
translation: 这东西对你来说会很值钱，拿300瓶盖来换，你不会后悔的。

original: [FAILED] I'm not sure if you're funny or just stupid, but I'm not amused. Make me a real offer and we can talk.
translation: [失败] 我都不知道你是来搞笑的还是真的蠢，反正我没兴趣。说点正经的，否则咱们免谈。

original: You give me 4500 caps and I'll let you look at the proof I found.
translation: 给我4500瓶盖，我就给你看证据。

original: Is it worth 100 caps to you?
translation: 对你来说，它值100瓶盖吧？

original: Here, now give it over.
translation: 给你，把它交出来。

original: What the fuck is this shit? Cachino, you dumb motherfucker. Yeah, we are going to have some words with Cachino. Meet me in my office.
translation: 这他妈什么鬼东西？我操你妈的卡奇诺。好吧，我们得和卡奇诺谈谈。到我办公室来一趟。

original: <Speech>
translation: <口才>

original: [SUCCEEDED] Here, I'll pay you back extra! I'm sorry!
translation: [成功] 给你，我额外赔偿你好了，真是抱歉！

original: Santiago, dealing with you is getting to be more annoying than it is worth.
translation: 圣地亚哥，和你打交道越来越没有价值了。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Here, I'll pay you back extra! I'm sorry!
translation: [成功] 给你，我额外赔偿你好了，真是抱歉！

original: Santiago, dealing with you is getting to be more annoying than it is worth.
translation: 圣地亚哥，和你打交道越来越没有价值了。

original: [FAILED] I don't have any more than that to give! I'm sorry!
translation: [失败] 我只有这么多了！抱歉！

original: Hey, you made me look like a fool!
translation: 你把我当猴子耍吗！

original: I'm going to kill you now.
translation: 我要杀了你。

original: Wait! Here is a full refund! Don't kill me!
translation: 等下！我全额赔偿！别杀我！

original: Wait! Here is a full refund! Don't kill me!
translation: 等下！我全额赔偿！别杀我！

original: I know boss, and I know it's going to be hard for you to trust me again. But are you going to take the word of this outsider over mine?
translation: 我知道，老板，我也知道您很难再相信我了。可您宁愿信这个外人的话，也不肯听我解释吗？

original: I want you not to attack enemies unless I've already engaged them.
translation: 如果我没有动手，你也不要擅自攻击敌人。

original: I'm hardly a whirlwind of death when left to my own devices, but all right.
translation: 就算你让我为所欲为，我也不会乱开杀戒的，不过也行。

original: Yes, dearie, that's what {gramma}grandma's been doing. And Leo isn't happy about it, either.
translation: 是的，甜心，奶奶一直就是这么做的。但是利奥可不喜欢那样。

original: I want you to attack enemies the moment you see them.
translation: 我要你看到敌人就马上攻击他们。

original: Understood. I won't hesitate.
translation: 了解，我不会犹豫的。

original: Beats waiting till they shoot me first.
translation: 敌人攻击我的时候再反击。

original: {Dunce sound}<Makes beeping sounds>
translation: {Dunce sound}<发出哔哔声>

original: <Aggression Level::Aggressive>
translation: <进攻程度::积极>

original: {Sonar Beep}<Makes beeping sounds>
translation: {Sonar Beep}<发出哔哔声>

original: <Aggression Level::Aggressive>
translation: <进攻程度::积极>

original: {annoyed growl - already doing what the player wants}<growl>
translation: {annoyed growl - already doing what the player wants}<怒吼>

original: {Eager}I'll do like I'm doing then - {slight evil, likes hurting people}except I'll try to smile less.
translation: {Eager}那我会保持原先那个步调的——{slight evil，likes hurting people}不过我会尽量笑得少一点。

original: {Slight confusion}What, was I not doing it right before?
translation: {Slight confusion}什么，难道我之前做得不对吗？

original: {To herself}Got a habit of repeating yourself.
translation: {To herself}看来你有来回唠叨的习惯。

original: Never get tired of hearing that.
translation: 这话我算是听得够多遍了。

original: {Eager}Now we're talking.
translation: {Eager}这才像话嘛。

original: With a smile.
translation: 保持微笑。

original: That's exactly what Leo told me to do!
translation: 利奥就是让我这么做的！

original: I found some chlorine for you.
translation: 我为你找到了一些液氯。

original: Great. Yeah, this is just what I needed.
translation: 好极了。没错，这正是我所需要的。

original: Actually, I was curious if you sell chlorine to The Ultra-Luxe.
translation: 其实我想知道，你是不是有向奢华殿堂卖过液氯。

original: Funny you should mention that, I do have a bit of chlorine here.
translation: 说来也巧，我手头确实有一些液氯。

original: Normally I wouldn't sell that to just anyone, but you were so helpful getting us Omerta business again, I'll set some aside for you to buy.
translation: 通常情况下我是不卖的，但既然你帮我们把黑手党拉回来了，我可以考虑卖一些给你。

original: I do, but that's some dangerous stuff. I don't sell it to just anyone, I have to be a responsible businessman.
translation: 有是有，但氯是一种危险的原料。我不会把它卖给别人，我是个有责任心的商人。

original: What did you have in mind?
translation: 你有什么想法？

original: I figure chlorine gas is the way to go. It's toxic, and I can rig it up to do a whole lot of killing in a fairly short timeframe.
translation: 我觉得氯气不错。它毒性够强，只需对其稍加改进，就能在短时间内造成极大的杀伤。

original: [FAILED]{Chuckles} Yeah, I could{Emphasized} build a nuke, but I'm not looking to turn the Mojave into a giant mirror.
translation: [失败] 说得对，我是可以造一枚核弹，但我还不想把整个莫哈维夷平。

original: No, I was thinking something more subtle.
translation: 不，我要的是更为精妙的东西。

original: Er... Maybe you could build a nuke?
translation: 嗯…或许你可以造一枚核弹？

original: The Bosses sent me to offer you assistance.
translation: 老板们派我来帮助你。

original: Oh, that's great{genuine}. I sure could use some help. You see, I do explosives, and they have a special need for some big explosions.
translation: 哦，那太好了{genuine}。我的确需要帮助。你瞧，我正在制作炸弹，而且他们要的是特大号炸弹。

original: Problem is, there's no way I can get enough explosives to do the type of damage they're looking to do, much less get it all deployed.
translation: 问题在于，我手头的炸药不够，无法达到他们期望的效果，还差的很远。

original: What was Cachino's role in the plan?
translation: 卡奇诺在计划里扮演什么样的角色？

original: As one of our captains, Cachino was{pause} kind of a project manager. He made sure people had what they needed to get their jobs done.
translation: 作为我们最得力的小头目之一，卡奇诺的……身份就如同项目经理。他负责给每个人提供后勤物资。

original: Cachino was my Man Friday. He took care of what needed to be taken care of. Had no idea what a dumb son of a bitch he was.
translation: 卡奇诺原本是我最忠实的仆人。他负责处理一切必要的事务，没想到他居然是这样一个狗杂种。

original: Let's talk about something else.
translation: 让我们谈谈其他事。

original: Tell me about the plan.
translation: 告诉我计划的事。

original: We call it Racket, and it is going to show Not-At-Home and every other fucker in our business just what the Family can do.
translation: 我们叫它骗局，它会让“不在家”先生和其他想打搅我们生意的混蛋都知道我们家族的真正本事。

original: What kind of help do you need?
translation: 你要我怎么帮你？

original: Two of the players, Troike and Clanden, have some problems that need to be solved. Ask them what they need.
translation: 我的两个手下，卓伊克和克兰顿，有些问题需要解决。去看看他们要干什么。

original: We have two contractors, a guy named Troike and one named Clanden. They've both been running into some issues. I'd appreciate it if you helped them out.
translation: 我们有两个联系人，一个叫卓伊克，另一个叫克兰顿。两个都在帮我们办事。

original: I found those weapon parts you needed.
translation: 我找到那些枪械部件了。

original: How are you getting the weapons into the Strip?
translation: 你是如何把军火弄进长街的？

original: I'm pretty proud of myself. It's a stroke of genius, if I can be so modest.
translation: 这我可得好好吹嘘一番。哪怕谦虚点说，这也绝对是个天才之举。

original: The whole arrangement starts with an old buddy of mine in the Republic. He's responsible for packing and shipping supplies to the NCR on the Strip.
translation: 我在共和国有个老朋友，全是他安排的。他负责向驻扎在长街的NCR军队装运各类物资。

original: He marks some containers as food and medical and packs them with guns and other shit.
translation: 每次运货，他都会留下几个箱子，写上药品与食物，再往里头塞进枪支和其他玩意。

original: From there, it took just a couple of greased palms to get someone to let me cherry pick a container or two out of every shipment. Easy as pie.
translation: 然后，只要多使几个钱，我就可以让人从每批货物当中挑出那一两个箱子。简直小菜一碟。

original: I'm pretty proud of myself. It's a stroke of genius, if I can be so modest.
translation: 这我可得好好吹嘘一番。哪怕谦虚点说，这也绝对是个天才之举。

original: The whole arrangement starts with an old buddy of mine in the Republic. He's responsible for packing and shipping supplies to the NCR on the Strip.
translation: 我在共和国有个老朋友，全是他安排的。他负责向驻扎在长街的NCR军队装运各类物资。

original: He marks some containers as food and medical and packs them with guns and other shit.
translation: 每次运货，他都会留下几个箱子，写上药品与食物，再往里头塞进枪支和其他玩意。

original: From there, it took just a couple of greased palms to get someone to let me cherry pick a container or two out of every shipment. Easy as pie.
translation: 然后，只要多使几个钱，我就可以让人从每批货物当中挑出那一两个箱子。简直小菜一碟。

original: [FAILED] I don't know much about biology, but I'm pretty sure that doesn't make a damn bit of sense.
translation: [失败] 虽然我对生物学所知不多，但我非常肯定，你在胡说八道。

original: I... Um... Need it to make chlorophyll for plants...
translation: 我…嗯…我想给植物配制些叶绿素…

original: I heard you did some good work for us. Thank you. Here's a little cash from us to you. Try not to spend it all in one place.
translation: 我听说你帮了我们。谢谢。这点钱你拿去。可别一口气花完了。

original: I'm all done with that work you needed.
translation: 我完成了你交待我的所有任务。

original: Keep up the attitude soon you'll be on the ground, for good.
translation: 如果你继续用这种态度说话，我保证会让你倒在地上不省人事。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Hey... I'm just worked up, okay. You're tough, right? You won't care about my stupid rambling then?
translation: [成功] 嘿……我只是有点激动，好吧。你很厉害，对吧？那你不在乎我和你瞎叨叨几句吧？

original: Report to the Atomic Wrangler. James Garret is your new owner.
translation: 前往原子牛仔。詹姆斯·加勒特是你的新主人。

original: Yes, sir!
translation: 是长官！

original: Yes, ma'am!
translation: 遵命，女士！

original: I suppose I should test you out before I hand you to the Garrets...
translation: 在把你交给加勒特前，我觉得应该先测试一下你的性能…

original: Servos active!
translation: 系统启动！

original: I spoke to Clanden, and I couldn't get anything out of him.
translation: 我和克兰顿谈过了，但没套出什么话。

original: Yeah, this is Clanden. This guy is one sick motherfucker. The way I see it, you have a few options.
translation: 没错，是克兰顿，这个烂杂种。我觉得你有好几种办法来对付他。

original: Maybe you could use what's on these tapes to get him by himself, or maybe you could use them to leverage him out of the casino.
translation: 你可以利用磁带上的这些东西引他单独出来，或者用它们来逼他离开赌场。

original: I found these tapes in Clanden's room. Can you verify this is him?
translation: 我在克兰顿的房间里找到了这些磁带，你看看这是他吗 ?

original: I'll show it to you for 100 caps.
translation: 给我100个瓶盖，我就给你看。

original: I'll show you what I have, but if it doesn't rock my world then we're going to have a long talk.
translation: 我会给你的，不过要是你拿出的玩意不够惊人，那咱们可得好好谈谈了。

original: If I give you his card, what's in it for me?
translation: 如果给你他的名片，我能有什么好处？

original: [SUCCEEDED] I suppose it's only right you get a little something for your troubles. Here - my daddy left me this gun. Guess I don't need it no more.
translation: [成功] 让你这么费心，我也觉得该报答你。给你——这是我爸爸留给我的枪。我想我以后应该用不上了。

original: I'm giving you a real opportunity here - how about some compensation?
translation: 我可是给你介绍了一个良机啊——给我点回报怎么样？

original: [FAILED] I'm sure Mr. Torini already took care of your fee. Maybe you ought to talk to him. Much obliged for the opportunity, friend. See you around.
translation: [失败] 我敢肯定托里尼先生已经把报酬准备好了。你该问他要才对。多谢你给的机会，朋友。回头见。

original: Here, take his card. Tell him I sent you.
translation: 给，拿着他的名片。告诉他是我介绍你去的。

original: Much obliged to you, friend.
translation: 真是大恩大德，朋友。

original: Tommy Torini at the Tops is looking for musical acts, if you're interested.
translation: 九重天的汤米·托里尼正在招音乐人，你可以去看看。

original: Like I said, I got no reason to take your charity. Not till I know you better.
translation: 我说过了，我没理由白白接受你的好意。除非我搞明白你什么意思。

original: I found the sexbot you're looking for.
translation: 我找到了你要的性爱机器人了。

original: You did? Hot damn! I've been looking for one of those for years!
translation: 真的？太好了！我已经找了好几年了！

original: {embarassed}For my customers, I mean... I'm not into that kind of shit.
translation: {embarassed}我是说……帮客户找了好几年了，我对这玩意儿可不感兴趣。

original: Woohoo! <assume the position>
translation: 哇哦！ <摆好姿势>

original: Servos active!
translation: 系统启动！

original: Never mind, I would like a refund.
translation: 算了，把钱退我吧。

original: Very well. Please return if you require further service.
translation: 很好。如果还有别的需要，欢迎随时再来。

original: Interested in working for the Garrets?
translation: 有兴趣为加勒特家族工作吗？

original: They already have that pig McCaffery working for them. Do they need another guard?
translation: 他们已经有麦卡弗里那头蠢猪了。还需要别的守卫？

original: Still trying to convince me, huh?
translation: 又想来说服我了？

original: If you're looking for work, Tommy Torini is hiring singers at the Tops.
translation: 想找活干的话，汤米·托里尼正在九重天招歌手。

original: Really? The Tops, huh? Well, it's no Shark Club, but I hear security on the Strip is real tight. Even Mr. Bishop wouldn't hit a joint like that.
translation: 真的？九重天？好吧，虽然那里比不上新里诺的鲨鱼俱乐部，但据我所知，长街戒备森严。就算是彼希先生也不会轻易在那里惹麻烦。

original: I'll check it out. Thanks!
translation: 我会去看看的，谢了 !

original: Why would this Mr. Bishop be after you?
translation: 这位彼希先生为什么在找你？

original: Oh, well, that's all just a big misunderstanding, see.
translation: 哦，好吧，我想那是个天大的误会。

original: Mr. Bishop, well, he owed me a lot of money, and, y'know, he's a busy guy, so I sort of figured I'd just... take it off his hands.
translation: 其实呢，这个，彼希先生欠了我一大笔钱，然后吧…你也知道他是个大忙人啦，所以我就，呃，自取了呗。

original: Why did you come all the way out here from New Reno?
translation: 为啥你要大老远从新里诺跑到这来？

original: You don't know Mr. Bishop. He's not like other bosses up there. He knows the Wasteland like the back of his hand, and he likes to wander it.
translation: 你不知道，彼希先生跟那里的其他老大不一样。他对废土了如指掌，又爱没事瞎晃悠。

original: I knew if I didn't get way the hell away from New Reno, he'd run me down like a dog.
translation: 如果我不赶紧逃出那该死的新里诺，他就会像收拾野狗一样灭了我的。

original: Billy's worth three times what you're paying him.
translation: 比利的身价是你开给他工资的三倍。

original: [SUCCEEDED] All right, you drive a hard bargain, baby. Tell you what, I'll bump him up to 3,000. That's fair. Here's your cut.
translation: [成功] 好吧，你还真能讲价啊，宝贝。这样吧，我把他的价码提到3000。够公道了。这是你的提成。

original: [FAILED] Baby, you've got to be joking!
translation: [失败] 宝贝，你是在开玩笑吧！拿好你的提成，别再说疯话了。

original: Hang on, this comes out to 1,500 caps for Billy! He's worth three times that!
translation: 等等，那样比利岂不是只值1500个瓶盖！他的身价可是这个数的三倍啊！

original: [SUCCEEDED] All right, you drive a hard bargain, baby. Tell you what, I'll bump him up to 3,000. That's fair. Here's your cut.
translation: [成功] 好吧，你还真能讲价啊，宝贝。这样吧，我把他的价码提到3000。够公道了。这是你的提成。

original: [FAILED] Baby, you've got to be joking! Now take your cut and stop being crazy.
translation: [失败] 宝贝，你是在开玩笑吧！拿好你的提成，别再说疯话了。

original: Hang on, this comes out to 1,500 caps for Billy! He's worth three times that!
translation: 等等，那样比利岂不是只值1500个瓶盖！他的身价可是这个数的三倍啊！

original: [SUCCEEDED] All right, you drive a hard bargain, baby. Tell you what, I'll bump him up to 3,000. That's fair. Here's your cut.
translation: [成功] 好吧，你还真能讲价啊，宝贝。这样吧，我把他的价码提到3000。够公道了。这是你的提成。

original: [FAILED] Baby, you've got to be joking! Now take your cut and stop being crazy.
translation: [失败] 宝贝，你是在开玩笑吧！拿好你的提成，别再说疯话了。

original: Sure, here's his card.
translation: 当然，这是他的名片。

original: Sweet daisies, here I come!
translation: 甜蜜的小雏菊，我来了！

original: Don't sell yourself short. You're worth a lot more than that.
translation: 别把自己贱卖了。你不止值那点。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Whoa, geez, what was I thinking? You're right, I oughta go in there with a cool head, tell them how much I'm really worth.
translation: [成功] 哇，天，我在想些什么啊？你是对的，我应该一本正经地走进去，告诉他我有多值钱。

original: [FAILED] Look, I appreciate the vote of confidence, but you don't know what it's like.
translation: [失败] 听着，我很感谢你为我站台，但是你不了解情况。

original: They offer me a roof over my head and half a Fancy Lad and I'll fold like a classy napkin, ay, it's true.
translation: 只要他们能给我个栖身的地方，再加上半盒奇想小子，我就千恩万谢了。

original: No, you've got to start high! Ask for a million and go from there!
translation: 不，你得有高起点才行！提到一百万就是高起点！

original: So you're looking for your big break?
translation: 所以你想在事业上有所突破？

original: A break's better than a shot - less chance of lead poisoning. Hey, if you know any gigs hiring, I'll work cheap. Real cheap. I'll take peanuts, I'll take the shells!
translation: 有事做总比吃枪子强——起码铅中毒的概率要小一些。嘿，如果你知道还有什么地方要人，我不在意报酬低。真的不在意。给我花生米都行！

original: But we're standing on a street corner in the middle of nowhere.
translation: 你是说躲在一个谁也不会光顾的街角里吗？

original: That's exactly my point, kid. Exactly my point!
translation: 那正是我要说的，孩子。正是我要说的！

original: Tommy Torini at the Tops is hiring entertainers. I could put in a word for you.
translation: 九重天的汤米·托里尼在招募艺人，我可以帮你说几句好话。

original: Yeah? Hey, you're all right! Tell him I'll do it for a hundred a night! No! Fifty! No, twenty! Ten!
translation: 真的？嘿，太好了！告诉他每晚只要一百块我就干！不！五十！不，二十！十块！

original: Just don't rob me, I'll do it!
translation: 只要不让我倒贴钱就行！

original: Hey, I'm happy to get any kind of work I can.
translation: 嘿，只要能让我干，怎样都行。

original: Have you reconsidered asking for a better price from Tommy?
translation: 你有没有考虑过再跟汤米讲讲价？

original: How long have you been doing comedy?
translation: 你演喜剧有多久了？

original: If you believe my mother, since she first laid eyes on me. First thing she said was "Boy! That's a funny-looking kid!"
translation: 你知道我老妈第一眼看到我时说的是什么话吗？她说："哎哟！这孩子长得真逗！"

original: I guess I got a face only a mother could love, because nobody else would give me the time of day.
translation: 我想我这模样，也只有妈妈会爱我了，因为别人都不肯和我待在一起。

original: Hey-Maybe you can help me, see, I can never tell when it's lunchtime.
translation: 也许你能帮我，你看，我都上顿不接下顿了。

original: Who are you?
translation: 你是谁？

original: The name's Knight. Billy Knight. And this here is what a lifelong career in comedy will get you, hoi.
translation: 我叫奈特，比利·奈特。我毕生倾心喜剧事业，可你瞧瞧我最后努力的结果。

original: I just have a few questions.
translation: 我有几个问题。

original: All right, but make it snappy, kid, this isn't exactly a lucrative career enterprise here.
translation: 可以，不过尽量简短一点，我这份差事可不怎么赚钱。

original: What are you doing out here?
translation: 你在这里做什么？

original: Keeping watch on the Great Khans mostly. They usually stick around Red Rock Canyon, but at least one large group left recently.
translation: 主要是监视大汗帮。他们通常在红岩峡谷一带活动，但最近已经有大批人员动身离开。

original: We called it in, but haven't heard anything about any Great Khan incidents. Whatever they're doing, they're keeping a low profile.
translation: 我们已经向上级作了汇报i，不过还没发现大汗帮有什么动作。他们一直非常低调。

original: Tommy Torini is hiring new acts at the Tops. I think you could make good money.
translation: 汤米·托里尼正在为九重天招募新演员，我觉得你去的话多半有戏。

original: Really? You mean I'm finally out of this shithole? That's great! Thank you!
translation: 真的？你是说我终于可以离开这个大粪坑了？太好了！谢谢你！

original: Garret's agreed to let you out of your contract. You can go work at the Tops.
translation: 加勒特已经同意解除你的合同了。你随时可以去九重天上班。

original: Sure, why not? Nothing left for me here since Garret's dead.
translation: 当然，为什么不呢？加勒特都死了，我还留在这干什么？

original: That's what your mom said last night. Aw yeah. I went there.
translation: 你妈昨天晚上也是这么说的。咿呀，我昨晚去找她了。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Hey, not bad! Your timing's terrible and you got no style, but you might make it as a professional heckler.
translation: [成功] 嘿，这句还不赖！虽然你在时机和个人风度上差了点，不过你还挺像是个专业捧哏。

original: Why bother? You're embarrassing yourself enough as it is.
translation: 何必呢？你自己就够丢脸的了。

original: Watch your mouth, ghoul, or I might just rip your jaw off.
translation: 嘴巴干净点，尸鬼，否则我撕烂你的嘴。

original: Whoa, Nelly! There's insult comedy and then there's psycho comedy! I guess you aren't the heckler Garret hired to spice up my show. What do you want?
translation: 哇，老天！本来只是损人的节目，现在又变成发神经了！我猜你应该不是加勒特雇来加戏码的吧。你到底想干什么 ?

original: <Speech>
translation: <口才>

original: [SUCCEEDED] All right. Come back in a couple days and I should have it ready for you.
translation: [成功] 好吧。几天后再来，我会把成品给你准备好的。

original: Ralph, I've been a loyal customer to you and Mick. How about 100 caps?
translation: 拉尔夫, 我是你和米克的忠实客户。100个瓶盖怎么样？

original: <Barter>
translation: <砍价>

original: [SUCCEEDED] All right. Come back in a couple days and I should have it ready for you.
translation: [成功] 好吧。几天后再来，我会把成品给你准备好的。

original: Data modules are rare but generally useless. How about 100 caps for your work?
translation: 数据模块很稀有，但一般也没什么大用。100个瓶盖怎么样？

original: [FAILED] That is just an insult to my expertise. My work is worth more than that.
translation: [失败] 你这是在羞辱我的技术。我的手艺可不止这个价。

original: 50 caps is my best offer.
translation: 我最多出50瓶盖。

original: Is the holotape ready yet?
translation: 全息磁带准备好了吗？

original: Not yet. Come back later and it should be ready to go.
translation: 还没。过一阵子再来吧，那时应该就好了。

original: Yep, here you go. You'll need to use a terminal to upload the data to the robot.
translation: 好了，给你。你需要用终端来把数据传送到机器人上。

original: A fight broke out when I presented Hsu's offer. The Kings are all dead.
translation: 我把许上校的提议告诉猫王，没想到突然起了冲突。猫王帮全死了。

original: That's terrible. I suppose the violence against our people will stop, though.
translation: 真是可怕。不过针对我们民众的暴力行为应该会停止了。

original: I'll have to spend much of the remaining funds for this operation on damage control, but I can spare this much as compensation for your efforts.
translation: 恐怕我得把更多的经费用于进行善后工作了，不过我还是留了一些钱给你，就当是辛苦费吧。

original: The King accepted Colonel Hsu's offer of help.
translation: 猫王接受了许上校的提议。

original: Good, good. Hsu's a man you can count on to handle a crisis. I'm just glad that things didn't end in violence.
translation: 不错，不错。许在处理危机这件事上确实很有手腕。我很高兴最后这件事没有诉诸暴力。

original: Here, this is what remains of the funds initially allocated for this operation.
translation: 拿去吧，这些是实行这项计划的工作经费里剩余的资金。

original: The Kings were all killed after the King turned down the ultimatum.
translation: 在猫王拒绝最后通牒后，猫王帮的成员们都被杀了。

original: I was afraid this would happen. Freeside will be a little more dangerous for a while, but eventually things will die down.
translation: 我早就担心会变成这样。估计短时间内自由城的局势会变得很不稳定，不过事态最终会平息的。

original: I expect few people will purposely target NCR citizens for some time to come, which is a relief.
translation: 我想今后一段时间里也不会有人再敢袭击NCR公民了，算是不幸中的万幸了吧。

original: However, the NCR's reputation has taken a huge blow because of this. People are beginning to see not much difference between us and the Legion.
translation: 然而NCR的声誉将因此而遭到极大的损害。人们会开始觉得，我们和军团没什么两样。

original: I've been authorized to give you this for your efforts. It's not much, but most of the funds for this operation are now going toward damage control.
translation: 我代表官方将这些赠送给你，作为你的报酬。数量不多，毕竟大部分资金恐怕都要被用于善后工作了。

original: The King complied with Colonel Moore's ultimatum.
translation: 猫王接受了莫尔上校的最后通牒。

original: How unexpected! I was sure direct confrontation would lead to more fighting, but I'm delighted to be proven wrong.
translation: 不敢相信！我本来以为正面对峙只会引发更加严重的冲突，没想到我居然错了，但我很高兴。

original: I wouldn't be surprised if you had something to do with the situation not flaring up, either. Here, I'm sure you deserve every one of these caps.
translation: 如果这次事态的平息有你的一份功劳，我也完全不会感到惊讶。拿去吧，这些钱你受之无愧。
