original: [FAILED] I'm sorry, but those are the only funds I was able to allocate. You'll have to make do with it. Besides, you may have other tasks soon.
translation: [失败] 抱歉，我有权动用的经费只有这么多，你凑合着用吧。而且你很快也会接到新任务的。

original: That's it?
translation: 就这些？

original: I discovered that Pacer is a Jet addict and has a heart condition.
translation: 佩瑟对杰特上瘾，而且他心脏不太好。

original: As I told you before, that could be useful information, but I don't know how to take advantage of it.
translation: 我之前说过，这个情报可能会有用。但恐怕我没有足够的医学知识，不懂得这一点该如何利用。

original: {Dumb option}Wow, you're really mad.
translation: {Dumb option}哇哦，你真的很生气耶。

original: You better believe I'm mad. You've waged a one man campaign to drag our good name through the mud and I'll be held accountable!
translation: 我当然要生气。你一个人把我们的好名声砸了个稀把烂，而我还要为此背黑锅！

original: You probably don't even know what I'm talking about. Gah! This is what I get for hiring an idiot to do such an important job.
translation: 估计你都不明白我在说什么。唉！都怪我雇了个傻子来做这么要紧的工作，真是报应。

original: Here, just take this and go. I have damage control to do.
translation: 给你，拿了钱就赶紧滚蛋。我还要处理善后呢。

original: Wait, I'm supposed to send you to Colonel Moore up at Hoover Dam, though why she wants to see an imbecile like you is beyond me.
translation: 等等，我得派你到胡佛水坝去见莫尔上校，虽然我不明白她为什么想见你这样一个智障。

original: So go to Hoover Dam and see Colonel Moore. Got it? Hoover Dam. Colonel Moore. {Sighs}Maybe it's time to retire.
translation: 你去胡佛水坝见莫尔上校吧。记住了吗？胡佛水坝。莫尔上校。唉，也许我真该退休了。

original: I'm sorry. I screwed up.
translation: 对不起，我搞砸了。

original: That's an understatement. Still, there's nothing to be done about it now. Maybe the violence will die down once things settle.
translation: 真是轻描淡写。泼出去的水已经收不回来了。或许等尘埃落定之后，暴乱就会平息了吧。

original: Here, take this. It's not what I was planning to give you, but you deserve some sort of payment for your efforts. Oh, and one other thing.
translation: 这些你拿去吧。我本来不打算给你的，但你好歹也该有点辛苦费。哦，还有件事情。

original: You wanted a man dead. He's dead. Now where are my caps?
translation: 你想让他死掉。他也的确死了。我的瓶盖呢？

original: If it will get you out of my hair, this is a small price to pay. At least I won't have to put up with you any longer.
translation: 只要你能从我眼前消失，花这一点钱也算值了。至少我不必再忍受你了。

original: When you put it that way... yes.
translation: 好吧，既然你非要这样说……是的。

original: Oh, I see. You're proud of your efforts, eh? Hmph! Thankfully, it looks like we won't be working together any longer.
translation: 哦，我明白了。你是不是还觉得挺自豪的？呸！谢天谢地，我看咱们以后不会再继续合作了。

original: I'm not an assassin.
translation: 我不是刺客。

original: In that case, we could take a different tack, but one that I at least have more experience with - diplomacy.
translation: 这样的话，我们可以采用另一种策略，至少我在这方面还是比较有经验——那就是外交。

original: If we can't go after the man responsible, we'll simply appeal to the man above him.
translation: 如果我们无法追究凶手的责任，那么最简单的方法就是直接找他的上级。

original: The Kings, including our friend Pacer, report to the leader of their gang, a man who calls himself the King.
translation: 整个猫王帮，包括我们的老朋友佩瑟在内，都是由一个名叫猫王的男人领导的。

original: [FAILED] I doubt it. I've seen junkies live for decades on the stuff. You'd be better off asking someone who knows about these things.
translation: [失败] 我不信。我见过有的瘾君子吸毒活了几十年了，你最好找个专家咨询一下。

original: Maybe the Jet will cause his heart to give out.
translation: 也许杰特可以让他的心脏停止跳动。

original: Sure, I'll look into it.
translation: 当然了，我会去调查的。

original: Good. Our men have come up with two different plans for seeing an end to the violence.
translation: 很好。关于如何终结暴力事件，我们的人想出了两套不同的方案。

original: First, our sources have tracked most of the attacks back to a King named Pacer. The consensus is that the violence will stop if he's removed.
translation: 首先，我们的线人已经发现有个叫佩瑟的猫王帮成员和大多数袭击案有关。大家一致认为，只要消灭他就能阻止暴力事件继续发生。

original: The problem is we can't simply kill him. In the current climate, the NCR would likely be blamed for his death.
translation: 但问题是，我们不能就这么简单地杀了他。当下这种形势，人们十有八九会将他的死归咎到NCR头上。

original: There is an alternative option, but my sources feel that getting rid of this Pacer fellow is our best shot.
translation: 还有另外一个选择，不过我的线们人觉得，将这个佩瑟除掉才是我们目前最佳的方案。

original: Oh, I've already heard. Pacer is dead. The Kings are up in arms. The entire area is gripped by chaos and the violence has only increased.
translation: 哦，我已经听说了。佩瑟死了。猫王帮发动了武装暴动。混乱已经蔓延到整个地区，暴力活动也有增无减。

original: In fact, I've heard that many are assuming the NCR did it without even looking into the matter. This is the worst thing that could possibly happen!
translation: 我甚至还听说，有很多人几乎不假思索就断定NCR是这一切的幕后主使。简直没有比这更糟糕的情况了！

original: What do you have to say for yourself?
translation: 你还有什么好说的？

original: I've completed the Pacer job.
translation: 佩瑟那任务已经解决了。

original: Oh, I've already heard. The Kings are up in arms. The entire area is gripped by chaos and the violence has only increased.
translation: 哦，我已经听说了。猫王帮发动了武装暴动。混乱已经蔓延到整个地区，暴力活动也有增无减。

original: In fact, I've heard that many are assuming the NCR did it without even looking into the matter. This is the worst thing that could possibly happen!
translation: 我甚至还听说，有很多人几乎不假思索就断定NCR是这一切的幕后主使。简直没有比这更糟糕的情况了！

original: What do you have to say for yourself?
translation: 你还有什么好说的？

original: Uh, the King sort of got killed while I was working on that Freeside job.
translation: 呃，我在处理自由城问题的时候，猫王貌似被人给杀了。

original: Yes, do you have something to report?
translation: 好的，你有什么需要报告的吗？

original: I wanted to talk about the situation in Freeside.
translation: 我想谈谈自由城目前的状况。

original: How is Heck a threat to other ranchers in The Wasteland?
translation: 为什么说赫克对废土其他的牧场主都是威胁？

original: We are honest folk out there, damn hard to make the living in the desert, kid. Heck's a different breed, goddamn thief he is.
translation: 我们都是老实人，辛辛苦苦在沙漠里讨生活。但赫克却不走正道，尽想着窃取别人的果实。

original: Scaring us into giving away our lands is all he's done to strike it flush - comes packing iron and none can hold a candle to his men - bad blood.
translation: 威胁我们放弃土地，这就是他发家致富的路子——每次来都带着家伙，没人斗得过他的手下——净干坏事。

original: The best don't come cheap, Walter. 400 caps' my fee.
translation: 好货从来都不便宜，沃尔特。400瓶盖，就当是我的报酬。

original: [SUCCEEDED] All right, kid! I'm taking a liking to you. It's a deal.
translation: [成功] 好吧，孩子！我挺喜欢你的。成交。

original: Where I come from, we appreciate good intentions. I reckon you could help me figure out what he's doing in town.
translation: 在我们老家，好心人是会得到赞扬的。我想你可以帮我们查一查他来城里的目的。

original: Tell you what, that chiseler's blowing hot air over at that there fancy casino - The Ultra-Luxe. Find out what's his story here, will you?
translation: 实话告诉你，现在那头老狐狸就坐在对面那座漂亮赌场里吹牛皮呢——那儿叫奢华殿堂。你就帮我搞清楚他究竟唱的哪出戏吧，怎么样？

original: I'll find out for you but not cheaply - 400 caps.
translation: 我会帮你弄清楚的，但可不便宜——400瓶盖。

original: [FAILED] Cut that in half and we got a clean deal, kid.
translation: [失败] 价码砍掉一半，咱们就成交，孩子。

original: Where I come from, we appreciate good intentions. I reckon you could help me figure out what he's doing in town.
translation: 在我们老家，好心人是会得到赞扬的。我想你可以帮我们查一查他来城里的目的。

original: Tell you what, that chiseler's blowing hot air over at that there fancy casino - The Ultra-Luxe. Find out what's his story here, will you?
translation: 实话告诉你，现在那头老狐狸就坐在对面那座漂亮赌场里大吹牛皮呢——那儿叫奢华殿堂。你就帮我搞清楚他究竟唱的哪出戏吧，怎么样？

original: I may be able to help you.
translation: 我也许能帮助你。

original: Where I come from, we appreciate good intentions. I reckon you could help me figure out what he's doing in town.
translation: 在我们老家，好心人是会得到赞扬的。我想你可以帮我们查一查他来城里的目的。

original: Tell you what, that chiseler's blowing hot air over at that there fancy casino - The Ultra-Luxe. Find out what's his story here, will you?
translation: 实话告诉你，现在那头老狐狸就坐在对面那座漂亮赌场里吹牛皮呢——那儿叫奢华殿堂。你就帮我搞清楚他究竟唱的哪出戏吧，怎么样？

original: What do you plan to do about him?
translation: 你准备怎么对付他？

original: I have no illusions that he'll ever stop his plundering. So I'm just going to make him suffer, that's what I'm going to do.
translation: 我从没指望他会收手。所以我只想让他好好尝点苦头，这就是我的打算。

original: Here, in town, he's got few of his armed men to protect him. I just got to find out what he's up to and then I'll know where to hit him hard.
translation: 他进城时，身边只带了几个保镖。我只需要弄清楚他的动向，就能照准软肋给他狠狠一击。

original: Like I said, kid. Someone's got to rein in that greedy son of a gun.
translation: 我说过了，孩子。总得有人让这个贪得无厌的狗杂种尝尝厉害。

original: I have news about the Gundersons.
translation: 我知道些冈德森的消息。

original: What was that about settling a score?
translation: 算账是怎么回事？

original: There's a long list of grievances that Heck Gunderson's got to answer for, kid. I'm here to make sure that "rancher" stops stealing our lands.
translation: 我可憋了一肚子的牢骚，那个赫克·冈德森必须得给我个说法。我来这儿就是为了阻止那个"牧场主"继续窃取我们家土地的。

original: If he ain't chiseling behind your back, he just sends his men, ready for a fight. Then you either "sell" your ranch for a penny, or you're dead.
translation: 他不是在背后使绊子，就是直接派人和你来硬的。如果你不把农场低价"贱卖"给他，那就等着归西吧。

original: I'm tired of being trampled over, kid, and I got a good mind to stop Heck once and for all.
translation: 我已经受够了他的欺负，孩子，这次我铁了心思，一定要和他干到底。

original: I have questions about you.
translation: 我对你本人有些问题。

original: Okay. What'd you want to know?
translation: 好吧，你想知道什么？

original: Then have, I don't know, some water or something.
translation: 那你干脆……就喝点水吧，怎么样。

original: [FAILED] A drink? Nonsense. All I need now is to settle a score. We didn't come a long ways just to stroll our best clothes around.
translation: [失败] 喝水？胡说八道。我现在唯一想做的就是把账算清。我们大老远跑到这儿来可不是为了逛服装店的。

original: You look more than just too hot - what's the matter?
translation: 我看你的样子可不止是热着了——怎么回事？

original: [SUCCEEDED] Sharp eyes on you, all right. We've gone through a heap of trouble to get in town. Ethel says I just need to wet my throat.
translation: [成功] 你眼睛很尖嘛。好吧，我们费了好大一番周折才进到城里。埃塞尔说我需要先解解渴。

original: A drink? Nonsense. All I need now is to settle a score. We didn't come a long ways just to stroll our best clothes around.
translation: 喝水？胡说八道。我现在唯一想做的就是把账算清。我们大老远跑到这儿来可不是为了逛服装店的。

original: You worked in Gomorrah as a Croupier, uh? What was it like?
translation: 你在蛾摩拉当过荷官？感觉如何？

original: Hey, you're smart. Okay, it was like finding diamonds in your vodka and showgirls under your card table. You want it, Gomorrah has it.
translation: 嘿，你够聪明的。好吧，感觉就像是在伏特加里找钻石，或者在牌桌下面找代言女郎。你想要什么，蛾摩拉就有什么。

original: It was heaven - until you find that all the glitter is made of broken dreams and all the praise hides a knife pointing at your ribs.
translation: 那里曾是天堂——直到有一天，你发现所有的光鲜亮丽都是用破碎的梦拼成的，所有的笑脸背后都藏着刀刃，直指你的胸口。

original: What are the important players in town?
translation: 城里都有哪些大人物？

original: Ha! There's only one important player in town, and that's Mr. House. Everyone keeps clean around him, the Families, the barons - fuck, even the NCR.
translation: 哈！城里只有一个大人物，那就是豪斯先生。所有人对他都毕恭毕敬，几大家族，那些大亨——操，甚至连NCR也一样。

original: [FAILED] My momma didn't raise no quitter, and I stand by my beliefs. The answer is no.
translation: [失败] 我妈妈养的可不是一个胆小鬼，我坚持自己的信念。答案是不。

original: The NCR is far too powerful. Just give up.
translation: NCR实在太强大了。放弃吧。

original: {Angry}What the fuck are you trying to pull here? Where is my girl? Now I'm gonna have to kill your sorry ass.
translation: {Angry}你他妈在这儿搞什么名堂？我的妞呢？我现在非弄死你不可。

original: Okay, little lady, let's get started. You look like a tough piece of meat, I'm going to enjoy tenderizing you.
translation: 好的，小妞，我们开始吧。你看起来真紧实，瞧我不得把你干得又松又软。

original: I thought that maybe I could be your next playtoy. Your exploits are well known.
translation: 我想，也许我可以作你的下一个玩偶。你的本领有目共睹。

original: Well, look at you! It's so rare I get a volunteer. Yeah, let's head to my special room. Follow me, we'll talk there.
translation: 噢，瞧瞧！居然有志愿者，真是少见。好吧，那就到我的专用小房间去吧。跟我来，到那儿我们再谈。

original: [SUCCEEDED]{Excited} Oh, already? I figured it would be a couple days. Well, let's go meet the lucky lady.
translation: [成功] {Excited}哦，已经来了？我以为还要再等几天呢。好吧，让我们去会会这位幸运的女士。

original: Oh, I was just told to deliver a girl to the spare room you keep up here.
translation: 哦，我是奉命送一个女孩到你这儿来的。

original: [FAILED]{Laughs} I don't care much about your tastes. Get lost and leave me alone.
translation: [失败] {Laughs}我对你的口味没多少兴趣。快走开，别来打扰我。

original: Well... I... I have some exotic tastes too!
translation: 嗯…我…我也喜欢异国口味！

original: I hear you have some exotic tastes when it comes to women.
translation: 我听说你品鉴女人的口味很特别。

original: {Annoyed}Oh did you now? What business is that of yours, and why the fuck should I care?
translation: {Annoyed}哦，你知道？那又跟你有什么关系呢，我干嘛要听你说这个？

original: Alright. I'll come quietly, but this is fucked.
translation: 好吧。我会乖乖跟你们走的，太操蛋了。

original: Never mind, I have some other questions though.
translation: 没关系，我还有些别的问题。

original: Okay, ask away.
translation: 好，问吧。

original: I found a dead girl in Gomorrah.
translation: 我在蛾摩拉发现了一具年轻女子的尸体。

original: Well that's something, but I can't go in there without proof of foul play.
translation: 这可是件大事。不过没有证据，我无法进去调查。

original: I'd like to report a murder at Gomorrah.
translation: 蛾摩拉里有人被谋杀了，我要报案。

original: Murder? What kind of murder? Do you have any proof?
translation: 谋杀？什么谋杀？你有证据吗？

original: No thanks, Mr. House.
translation: 不，谢了，豪斯先生。

original: If you find Caesar's Legion so frightening at this remove, imagine them rampaging across the Strip.
translation: 要是你在这儿都能觉得凯撒军团如此可怕，那想象一下他们在长街上横冲直撞的情景吧。

original: We have a chance to see them destroyed, to see New Vegas become the harbinger of a new age.
translation: 我们有机会亲眼见证他们的覆灭，让维加斯成为新时代的先驱。

original: What do you want me to do there?
translation: 你想让我去那儿做什么？

original: I want you to open a hatch in the basement of the derelict weather station atop Fortification Hill.
translation: 我希望你去堡垒山的破天文台那里，打开一个舱盖。

original: You'll recognize it on sight. The hatch bears the logo of the Lucky 38, same as the Platinum Chip.
translation: 到了那儿你就知道了。舱盖上印着幸运38的标志，就和白金筹码一样。

original: I'm listening.
translation: 我听着呢。

original: The next step will require you to infiltrate Caesar's camp at Fortification Hill.
translation: 下一步，你需要潜入凯撒在堡垒山的营地。

original: You'll have to return to Caesar's camp at Fortification Hill.{Player got Chip at CL Fort, didn't activate bunker army}
translation: 你必须要回到凯撒在堡垒山的营地。{Player got Chip at CL Fort, didn't activate bunker army}

original: I'll be on my way, then...
translation: 那么我先走了……

original: {FORT SECS UP}I must insist that you stay long enough for me to show you that the Platinum Chip does more than change the pictures on the Securitrons' face screens.
translation: {FORT SECS UP}我希望你能留下来，我要向你展示一下，白金筹码的威力可不仅仅是让电子保安换张脸而已。

original: Events of great import are about to unfold, with you taking a central role. To get started, all you need do is take the elevator all the way down...
translation: 一系列重大的变革就要发生，而你将是这一切的主角，你只需要乘上电梯，一路向下……

original: I must insist that you stay long enough for me to show you what the Chip does. I promise you'll like what you see...
translation: 我希望你能留下来，我要向你展示一下，白金筹码的威力可不仅仅是让电子保安换张脸而已。

original: Events of great import are about to unfold, with you taking a central role.
translation: 一系列重大的变革就要到来，而你将是这一切的主角。

original: To get started, all you need to do is take the elevator all the way down to the bottom level...
translation: 你首先要做的是，乘上电梯，一路向下到最底层去……

original: [SUCCEEDED] Remind me never to get on your bad side. If that's true, then yes, that would be a suitable way to get rid of him.
translation: [成功] 记得提醒我永远别和你为敌。如果这是真的，那就这么办，这会是解决他的一个有效的办法。

original: It looks like you have things well in hand, so I'll leave you to it.
translation: 看起来你是此中老手，那你自己看着办吧。

original: Add a little Psycho to his Jet, and he'd have a heart attack.
translation: 往他的杰特里加一点疯狂药，然后他就会心脏病发了。

original: [FAILED] I doubt it. I've seen junkies live for decades on the stuff. You'd be better off asking someone who knows about these things.
translation: [失败] 我可不敢相信。我看到有的人渣吸毒活了几十年了，你最好找个专家咨询一下。

original: Maybe the Jet will cause his heart to give out.
translation: 也许杰特会让他的心脏出问题。

original: What would I need to do?
translation: 我该怎么做呢？

original: Go and talk to the King, try to convince him to put an end to this violence. Pacer's a punk, but he won't likely disobey a direct order.
translation: 去和猫王谈谈，说服他放弃暴力。佩瑟是个混蛋，不过他是不会公然违抗猫王的命令的。

original: The King might not be open to the idea at first, so you may have to integrate yourself with him. Do whatever it takes.
translation: 猫王一开始或许不会听你的，所以你可能需要去迎合他。要不惜一切代价。

original: When it's done, one way or the other, report back here and we'll take it from there.
translation: 当你搞定了，无论是用哪一种方式，来这向我汇报，我们会去那接手的。

original: Tell me more about the King.
translation: 和我说说猫王的情况。

original: He's caucasian, in his mid-30s, and extremely charismatic. It's that last part that we're counting on.
translation: 他是个白人，30多岁，拥有非凡的领袖魅力。这最后一点也正是我们要指望的。

original: The Kings are a bunch of young hoodlums who aren't inclined to listen to anyone, except him. Get him on your side, and the rest will fall in line.
translation: 猫王帮是由一群年轻的混混们组成的，他们谁的话都不听，唯独信服他。把他争取过来，其他的人也就搞定了。

original: No catch. You just make sure no King attacks an NCR citizen from now on.
translation: 不值得。你只要保证猫王帮成员从此不再攻击NCR市民。

original: I can't give you these tapes, they are evidence of a crime.
translation: 我不能给你磁带，这些是你的罪证。

original: I guess you've made your choice then. Time to die.
translation: 看来你已经做出选择了。那就去死吧。

original: [FAILED] Sorry, but there's no fucking way I'm going anywhere if those tapes aren't with me.
translation: [失败] 抱歉，拿不到磁带，我哪儿都不会去。

original: If you... um... give me 300 caps and leave Vegas, I'll keep these tapes safe.
translation: 如果你…呃…给我300个瓶盖，并且离开维加斯，我会好好保管这些磁带的。

original: I could do that for you.
translation: 我可以帮你。

original: Good, let's not waste time then. Our biggest problems right now are supplies and troops, and the Legion is draining us both.
translation: 太好了，那我们就别浪费时间了。我们现在最大的问题是补给和兵员，而这两者已经要被军团消耗殆尽了。

original: Quartermaster Mayes has been complaining to me nonstop about the lack of supplies, but unfortunately, we aren't getting a resupply any time soon.
translation: 军需官梅伊斯一直在向我抱怨物资短缺的问题，但遗憾的是我们短期内肯定没办法得到补给了。

original: I want you to speak with him and see if there's anything you can do for him.
translation: 我希望你去和他谈谈，看看有什么你可以帮助他的。

original: What do you need help with?
translation: 你需要我帮你做什么？

original: I'm short-staffed and I don't have the time to take care of some issues around the camp.
translation: 我这里人手短缺，我也没有时间去处理营地里的一些问题。

original: I need someone to talk to a few of the officers and help them resolve some of the problems around here.
translation: 我需要个人去和几个军官谈谈，并帮助他们解决这里的某些问题。

original: What's the trouble with the Legion?
translation: 你们和军团之间有什么嫌隙？

original: Hell, what ain't the trouble with the Legion? This time, they jumped the camp in Nelson while the troopers were setting up.
translation: 妈的，和军团还能有什么好事？这次他们趁部队还没安顿好，偷袭了纳尔逊营地。

original: Captured a bunch of gear and took the town. Couple of troopers too. Got 'em crucified down near the center of town.
translation: 抢了不少装备，占了镇子。还把他们抓的几个人钉在了镇中心广附近的十字架上。

original: James Garret is looking for a suave escort. Interested in some work?
translation: 詹姆斯·加勒特想找个有情调的牛郎，你有兴趣吗？

original: I'm honored they would consider me. I'll start immediately.
translation: 他们能想到我，真是太荣幸了，我马上去。

original: What are you selling?
translation: 你都卖什么？

original: Have a look, baby.
translation: 来看看吧，宝贝。

original: I finished looking over your patients.
translation: 我已经检查完你的病人了。

original: Excellent job. Where'd you learn to do all that? I don't think that I could have done much better myself. Very impressive.
translation: 真是厉害。你在哪学的这些？我不觉得我有这么好的医术。令人敬佩。

original: As for the men, they'll recover soon and be back on the front lines in no time. Ahh... the circle of life.
translation: 至于那些士兵，他们会很快痊愈然后返回前线。呵……生死循环。

original: I'll send word to Major Polatli about your work here. Once again, you have my sincerest thanks.
translation: 我会把你的所作所为告诉波拉特里少校的。再一次真诚地感谢你。

original: All I'm asking is that you try.
translation: 我只想请你试一试。

original: I'll give it my best. You've earned that much. But that makes us even, you hear?
translation: 我会尽力的。毕竟是我欠你的。不过这样的话，咱们可就两清了，明白吗？

original: I'd like to think about it.
translation: 我想再考虑一下。

original: That's a good idea. I don't give out favors every day, so you probably shouldn't rush to pick something.
translation: 好主意。我可不是每天都愿意做顺水人情，所以你最好还是别太匆忙做决定。

original: Tumble it around in your mind and come back when you know what you want. I'll be here.
translation: 仔细考虑清楚，等你搞明白自己究竟想要什么再回来吧。我随时在这里恭候大驾。

original: You might like to know that Heck's barely protected, right now.
translation: 有件事你可能想知道，现在赫克基本已经没什么人保护了。

original: So, Ted's nowhere to be found and Heck's quite unprotected while looking for him, huh?
translation: 所以，由于找不到泰德，赫克就把他所有的保镖都派出去了？

original: Hell, it sounds like the perfect time to get even. Heck won't know what hit him. What do you say?
translation: 妈的，听起来是个千载难逢的好机会啊。赫克这下是要连自己怎么死的都不知道了，你觉得呢 ?

original: Heck's life? That's big game, 1000 caps.
translation: 赫克的命？这可不是闹着玩的，1000瓶盖。

original: Heck's life and a safe future have a steep price, Walter. 1000 caps is my fee.
translation: 既要取赫克的命，又要确保将来无虞。这价码可不低啊，沃尔特。我要1000瓶盖。

original: No.
translation: 不。

original: [SUCCEEDED] In that case, yes I do.
translation: [成功] 这样的话，我倒是有一些。

original: Follow me.
translation: 跟我来。

original: <Pay 10 caps>
translation: <支付10个瓶盖>

original: Don't get wise. We charge per use, so make that first drink worth the caps.
translation: 别耍小聪明。我们按次收费，所以要珍惜点，别浪费了。

original: No, not yet.
translation: 不，还没有。

original: Let me know when you find something out.
translation: 如果你发现了些什么，就告诉我。

original: The better question is, what are *you* going to do with it?
translation: 我觉得，这个问题应该是要问你才对？

original: The better question is, what are *you* going to do with it?
translation: 我觉得，这个问题应该是要问你才对？

original: How does 100 caps sound?
translation: 100个瓶盖怎么样？

original: I couldn't convince her to attempt a escape.
translation: 我没能说服她逃离那地方。

original: That won't do... at all. Listen, it can't be the Jet, Cachino's got her scared shitless.
translation: 这一招……没用的。听着，指望她能马上转过弯来是不可能的，卡奇诺已经把她吓傻了。

original: Find a way to make this work... please.
translation: 你一定要想个办法让她逃走……拜托了。

original: Joana's happy to hear from you and wants to escape Gomorrah.
translation: 琼娜很高兴听到你的消息，她也想逃离蛾摩拉。

original: She is...? Listen, no time to waste. Help her get to Freeside. That's our ticket out of this fucking city.
translation: 真的吗…？听着，不要浪费时间。只要你能帮她逃到自由城，我们就能彻底离开这该死的地方了。

original: I'll meet you there between midnight and dawn, though we could use some backup. We only got one chance to get this right, you hear?
translation: 我会在午夜到黎明之间在那儿等你，不过我们需要几个帮手。我们只有一次机会，听懂了吗？

original: These guys in Freeside, good shots, right? They owe me big time. Tell 'em that Carlitos's back to collect his chips. They'll know what do.
translation: 自由城有几个家伙，他们都是好人，懂吗？他们还欠我个大人情。告诉他们，就说卡利托斯来兑现筹码了，他们知道该怎么做。

original: Oh, a good ways west of here, in a place you've never been. Far as we're concerned, only name it ever had was "Phebus Ranch."
translation: 噢，在离这儿很远的西边，你肯定没去过。就我们了解，那个地方以前名叫"菲巴斯牧场。"

original: That was before we lost some land to Heck Gunderson. The bank demanded payment in full the day after the Stockmen's Association bailed it out.
translation: 我们被迫把地卖给了赫克·冈德森。牧场主协会给它做了担保，第二天银行就要求全额付款。

original: A good life if you don't mind hard work. The only real fuss is the constant bother with varmints.
translation: 如果你不介意吃苦的话，那日子还算不错。唯一烦人的就是应付鼠害。

original: Fail to catch Molerats early in their breeding, and you'll have three or four head breaking their ankles in Molerat holes every day.
translation: 要是你没有在鼹鼠下崽之前就逮到它们，那你每天都能在鼠洞里撞见三四头摔折了腿的小崽子。

original: Of course, the worst varmint of all is a Brahmin Baron with his hands in the pockets of a Republic senator.
translation: 当然，所有老鼠里最可恶的还是某位双头牛大亨，他和另一位参议员串通一气。

original: That's a problem you can't solve with a Varmint Rifle, though I fear my husband's apt to try. He's got Heck Gunderson in his sights right now.
translation: 这可不是靠着猎鼠步枪就能解决的问题，但我担心我丈夫正有这个打算。他现在一门心思就想除掉冈德森。

original: I have news about the Gundersons.
translation: 我知道些冈德森的消息。

original: Why is Caesar's Legion so... strange?
translation: 为什么凯撒的军团这么……奇怪？

original: The bombs wiped the slate clean. Human civilization descended to a level of ignorance that effectively set our cultural progress back to zero.
translation: 核弹夷平了整个世界。人类文明退化到了蒙昧阶段，所有的文化进程全部清零。

original: The NCR has all the problems of the ancient Roman Republic - extreme bureaucracy, corruption, extensive senatorial infighting.
translation: NCR的问题与古罗马共和国如出一辙——极端的官僚主义，腐败，和参议院内部的勾心斗角。

original: Just as with the ancient Republic, it is natural that a military force should conquer and transform the NCR into a military dictatorship.
translation: 如同古罗马一般，用一支军队将NCR征服，使其转化成为军事独裁国家，是不可违逆的必然结果。

original: Thesis and antithesis. The Colorado River is my Rubicon. The NCR council will be {beat}eradicated, but the new synthesis will change the Legion as well...
translation: 正命题与反命题。科罗拉多河就是我的卢比孔河。NCR的议会将被{beat}连根拔起，但由此诞生的合命题也将改变军团的本质……

original: ...from a basically nomadic army to a standing military force that protects its citizens, {finality}and the power of its dictator.
translation: ……从一支渺小的平民部队转变为保家卫国的的武装力量，{finality}同时也要维护独裁者的权力。

original: So what's "dialectic" about you and the NCR?
translation: 那么你和NCR"对立统一"又是什么？

original: What do you think of the NCR?
translation: 你觉得NCR怎么样？

original: Do you want my opinion as a former citizen, or future conqueror? {shrug}Actually, my opinion's the same either way.
translation: 你是想听一个过往公民的意见，还是一个未来统治者的意见呢？实际上，我的观点都一样。

original: As a young man I was taught to venerate {mocking slightly}President Tandi of Shady Sands. "The Founding Mother of the New California Republic."
translation: 年轻的时候，我被教导要尊敬沙荫镇的坦蒂总统。"新加州共和国的国母"。

original: Did you know her Presidency lasted 52 years? And that her father, Aradesh, was the Republic's first President?
translation: 你知道她连任长达52年之久吗？并且他的父亲，亚拉德什，还是共和国的第一任总统？

original: Does that sound like a democracy to you, or a hereditary dictatorship?
translation: 对你来说，这听起来究竟是民主，还是世袭独裁？

original: How did you capture Benny?
translation: 你怎么抓到本尼的？

original: I'll hand it to that piece of shit, he was determined. He used some kind of Old-World stealth device to get across the river in a Legion boat.{get alternate take with "him" instead of "that piece of shit"}
translation: 我还挺敬佩这混小子的，他的意志相当坚定。他利用某种旧世界的潜行装置，混在军团的船只里过了河。{get alternate take with "him" instead of "that piece of shit"}

original: Seems the device ran out of juice once he got here, but he was dressed like a Legionary. He was caught just outside the weather station.
translation: 那玩意似乎在抵达这儿的时候耗光了能量，不过他还是靠着伪装逃过一劫。他在气象台外面被抓了个正着。

original: See, thing is, he didn't change his hairstyle. {amused at Benny's stupidity}To go to all that effort and fail because you're too vain to muss your hair...
translation: 原因嘛，说来简单，他没有换发型。{amused at Benny's stupidity}费了这么大劲儿，却因为不舍得弄乱头发而前功尽弃……

original: So, who are you?
translation: 那么，你是谁？

original: I've been around a while. Currently working for the Followers as a gun for hire, but it's getting rather dull.
translation: 我来这里有一阵子了。目前我在给天启追随者当保镖，但这工作相当没意思。

original: Aside from protecting them from the occasional thug looking to intercept supply shipments, there isn't much to do around here.
translation: 除了偶尔会碰上几个企图抢劫他们物资的暴徒外，也就没什么事可做了。

original: The one researcher I liked who I could chat up about liquor got transferred, and the rest of the docs are pretty uptight about my kind of fun.
translation: 有个我喜欢的研究员，以前经常和我聊酒，却被调走了。其他医生虽然漂亮，但我一开玩笑，她们就紧张。

original: I bet you've seen a lot over the years.
translation: 我敢打赌你一定见多识广。

original: I've been around long enough to observe the patterns of human behavior. Physical and mental anguish are especially exciting to explore.
translation: 我活得够久了，对人类的行为模式早就了若指掌。我非常热衷于探索肉体与精神的痛苦。

original: Sounds good to me. <Pay 25 caps.>
translation: 听起来不错。<付25个瓶盖。>

original: Meet me upstairs. I'll try to leave you in one piece.
translation: 上楼找我吧。我会尽量让你毫发无损的。

original: I'd like to hire you for a bit.
translation: 我想雇你陪我一会儿。

original: Santiago is here to please, my prairie flower. Just a few caps and I'm yours.
translation: 圣地亚哥随时听候差遣，我娇嫩的小花朵。只要一点点瓶盖，我就是你的人了。

original: Here you go. <Pay 25 caps>
translation: 给你。<支付25个瓶盖>

original: I'll meet you upstairs in a moment, darling.
translation: 亲爱的，我们楼上见。

original: The Followers are looking to work out a supply deal.
translation: 天启追随者正在寻找供货商。

original: Are they looking to buy guns?
translation: 他们需要枪吗？

original: The Followers are looking to set up a supply deal.
translation: 天启追随者正在寻找供应商。

original: We don't have the stills and equipment to supply the amount of meds they're looking to purchase.
translation: 我们没有蒸馏器和设备来为他们提供所需的药品。

original: You could check with other wasteland merchants, but I think your best bet would be the Atomic Wrangler.
translation: 你可以去咨询一下废土上的其他商人，但我认为还是原子牛仔的希望最大。

original: They've got a bunch of stills and a seemingly endless supply of grain alcohol, which could be used as anesthetic or disinfectant.
translation: 他们有一堆蒸馏器和数不清的酒精，可以用来做麻醉剂和消毒剂。

original: A regular shipment of supplies is what you need here.
translation: 你需要的是稳定供货。

original: That would be a godsend, but so far we've had no luck working out a deal with the Crimson Caravan or any other local merchants.
translation: 如果真有的话，那可是雪中送炭了，但我们目前还无法同深红商队公司或其他本地商人达成协议。

original: If you could manage to find someone willing to work with us, I'd gladly offer medical supplies at a discount.
translation: 如果你能想办法找到愿意同我们合作的人，我将很乐意给你所购买的药品打折。

original: I have some medical supplies to drop off.
translation: 我带来了些医疗物资。

original: Good to hear! What do you have to donate?
translation: 很好！你要捐赠什么？

original: Med-X.
translation: 吗啡-X。

original: RadAway.
translation: 辐特宁。

original: We have a good stock of RadAway at this point, but every extra bit helps. How much do you have to donate?
translation: 我们目前应该已经有足够的辐特宁了，但多备些总是好的。 你要捐赠多少个 ?

original: Fixer.
translation: 瘾头解。

original: The Garrets should be sending over supplies shortly.
translation: 加勒特双胞胎很快就会把物资送来。

original: I'm honestly pleasantly surprised they would help us out, but I can see the Garrets aren't doing this out of the goodness of their hearts.
translation: 老实说，加勒特愿意帮我们，真的我喜出望外，但我看得出来，他这么做并不是出于好意。

original: Well, it looks like you've earned yourself a discount on supplies now that we'll be fully covered. This supply deal will aid our work immensely.
translation: 好吧，今后你可以在我们这儿享受折扣，毕竟我们的问题都解决了。这个供货合同对我们意义重大。

original: Do you sell medical supplies?
translation: 你有医疗用品卖吗？

original: We're pretty short-handed as it is, but I suppose I could spare a few items.
translation: 我们的库存很紧张，但匀一些出来给你应该没有问题。

original: Nothing, I'll find him for you.
translation: 都不要，我会找到他的。

original: What? Are you... serious? Well, I'm not complaining, hon.
translation: 什么？你是…认真的吗？好吧，我不是抱怨，甜心。

original: Thanks so much for your help.
translation: 实在是太感谢你了。

original: What can you tell me about the Omertas?
translation: 关于黑手党你能告诉我些什么？

original: What's happened to you?
translation: 你怎么了？

original: I'm... I don't know what's happening to me. I can't feel a goddamn thing anymore, empty and poisoned like the Wasteland.
translation: [成功] 我……我不知道我怎么了。我现在一点感觉都没有，就像这废土一样，既空虚又肮脏。

original: I'm afraid I won't make it out of here, not without Carlitos. If the Med-X doesn't kill me first, Cachino or another Omerta will.
translation: 恐怕没了卡利托斯，我是无法离开这里了。就算我没有被吗啡针害死，卡奇诺或黑手党的人也会杀了我的。

original: Ha, I look pathetic, huh? The great Joana, and now... I don't even know why I'm telling you this.
translation: 哈，我看上去很可悲，不是吗？曾经光彩耀人的琼娜，如今却落到这步田地……我都不知道为何要和你说这些。

original: Joana, you can trust me. Why are you avoiding my questions?
translation: 琼娜，你要信任我。为何你总回避我的问题呢？

original: [SUCCEEDED] I'm... I don't know what's happening to me. I can't feel a goddamn thing anymore, empty and poisoned like the Wasteland.
translation: [成功] 我……我不知道我怎么了。我现在一点感觉都没有，就像这废土一样，既空虚又肮脏。

original: I'm afraid I won't make it out of here, not without Carlitos. If the Med-X doesn't kill me first, Cachino or another Omerta will.
translation: 恐怕没了卡利托斯，我是无法离开这里了。就算我没有被吗啡针害死，卡奇诺或黑手党的人也会杀了我的。

original: I look pathetic, huh? The great Joana, and now... I don't even know why I'm telling you this.
translation: 哈，我看上去很可悲，不是吗？曾经光彩耀人的琼娜，如今却落到这步田地……我都不知道为何要和你说这些。

original: I want to talk about Carlitos.
translation: 我想聊聊卡利托斯的事情。

original: What? Have you seen him? Have you talked to him?
translation: 什么？你见过他了？你和他说过话了？

original: Yes?
translation: 是的？

original: I'm busy now.
translation: 我现在很忙。

original: Yeah, sure fucking thing. I'll be waiting with bated breath for your schedule to clear up, ha ha.
translation: 是，你他妈真忙。反正我就在这儿守着，等你哪天腾出空了再来吧，哈哈。

original: You kept away the undesirables, patted down the rest for weapons, and kept your cool.
translation: 你赶走了不怀好意的危险分子，也搜查了大家身上的武器，全程都表现得十分镇定。

original: That is to say, you performed as instructed. Simon was impressed, and so am I. So you get a small bonus with your normal pay.
translation: 总结起来，你确实有在按规矩办事。西蒙对你很满意，我也一样，所以我决定给你一笔额外的奖金。

original: And? Don't leave me in suspense. What was their reaction?
translation: 然后呢？别吊我胃口。他们是什么反应？

original: I delivered the package as requested.
translation: 我按要求运送了样品。

original: Imposter!
translation: 入侵者！

original: When did you notice them missing?
translation: 你是何时注意到它们丢失的？

original: I remember coming in one morning and noticing my supplies were lower than they should have been.
translation: 我记得某天早上，我注意到物资的数量比原有的少了一些。

original: I thought it might have been a mistake, but another morning I noticed the same thing.
translation: 我起初也以为是我自己弄错了，但第二天早晨我又发现了同样的情况。

original: The camp is pretty dead at night, especially at 0200 hours when the guard shift changes. That'd be a good place to start looking.
translation: 营地到了晚上就很安静，特别是在凌晨两点守卫换岗的时候。我觉得你可以从那个时候开始调查。

original: It wasn't me.
translation: 不是我干的。

original: That's an odd response if I've ever heard one.
translation: 这真是个奇怪的回答。

original: Unfortunately, I don't have the time to go searching for missing supplies since I have my hands full with injured troopers.
translation: 可惜我现在没时间去寻找那些失踪的医疗用品，因为我手头还有许多伤兵需要医治。

original: Maybe you're just careless.
translation: 或许你只是粗心大意。

original: I may have my hands full here, but I'm anything but careless.
translation: 我是忙得不可开交，但再怎么样我都不会粗心大意。

original: Unfortunately, I don't have the time to go searching for missing supplies since I have my hands full with injured troopers.
translation: 可惜我现在没时间去寻找那些失踪的医疗用品，因为我手头还有许多伤兵需要医治。

original: Perhaps you've misplaced them?
translation: 或许你把它们放错地方了？

original: Anything is possible, but that's unlikely.
translation: 万事皆可能，唯独这条不太可能。

original: Unfortunately, I don't have the time to go searching for missing supplies since I have my hands full with injured troopers.
translation: 可惜我现在没时间去寻找那些失踪的医疗用品，因为我手头还有许多伤兵需要医治。

original: What makes you think someone is stealing your supplies?
translation: 为什么你会认为有人在偷你的物资呢？

original: The simple fact that I no longer have as many supplies as I should. I've been careful with them and I should have more than what remains.
translation: 很简单，我这里剩下的药品数量比该有的少。我一直都很小心地使用这些物资，应该不止剩这一点才对。

original: Unfortunately, I don't have time to go searching for the missing supplies since I have my hands full with injured soldiers.
translation: 可惜我现在没时间去寻找那些失踪的医疗用品，因为我手头还有许多伤兵需要医治。

original: It looks like you have a decent facility here.
translation: 你的设备看起来不错嘛。

original: Someone with medical experience, I take it? It's not the best, but it does the job.
translation: 看样子你也当过医生？虽然算不上有多好，但至少凑合着能用。

original: I just wish I had the equipment and supplies to handle the number of injuries we have here.
translation: 我只是希望自己能有足够多的器械和物资，好应付如此数量庞大的伤病员。

original: To make things worse, I think someone might be stealing my supplies.
translation: 更糟糕的是，我怀疑有人在偷我的医疗用品。

original: Things look pretty rough in here.
translation: 看来这里情势严峻啊。

original: Men have waged war on each other for countless centuries. Now is no different.
translation: 人类已经互相厮杀了无数个世纪了。直到现在也没有改变。

original: People fight and die for what they believe in. I'm just here to patch them up so they can go on their merry way. Do no harm and all that.
translation: 人们为了信仰而相互争斗、然后死去。我能做的也只是治好他们的伤，好让他们能继续快乐地生活。不害人，仅此而已。

original: This better be good.
translation: 你最好找个像样点的借口。

original: Have you looked around? Have you seen what's going on here? What we're going through?
translation: 你有仔细看过四周吗？你看见这里在发生些什么吗？你知道我们在遭受什么样的罪吗？

original: This place is hell. I've seen all my friends butchered by the Legion in front of my very eyes. I can still hear their screams at night.
translation: 这个地方就是地狱。我看见了太多的战友在我眼前被军团残杀。我至今还能在晚上听见他们的尖叫声。

original: All I wanted was a little escape, so I took some drugs to help me do that. Is that so bad?
translation: 我只想稍微逃避一下，所以我拿了一些药物，好帮我达到这个目的。这么做有错吗？

original: Do you have the troops to retake Nelson?
translation: 你现在有足以夺回纳尔逊的兵力了吗？

original: Not really, but we don't have much choice. If you help out more around camp I could spare some additional men for the battle.
translation: 不怎么够，但是我们别无选择。如果你能帮营地解决更多的问题，那么我就能腾出更多的人手来参加战斗。

original: We have a decent amount of men, but it'll be a close battle. If you help out more around camp, I could probably spare some additional troops.
translation: 我们的兵员数量已经不少了，但这将是场势均力敌的战斗。如果你能帮营地解决更多的问题，那么我就能腾出更多的部队。

original: We've been reinforced fairly well, thanks to your help. I'd say the odds are in our favor.
translation: 我们的兵员已经相当充足，谢谢你的帮助。可以说我们的胜算略高一筹了。

original: However, if you help out a little more around the camp, we'd be in a good enough position to send our best men to help retake Nelson.
translation: 但是，如果你能再帮营地一点点忙，我们就能处于非常良好的状态，能够派出最好的士兵来夺回纳尔逊。

original: Thanks for your help, we have more than enough men to take those Legion bastards.
translation: 谢谢你的帮助，我们的人手已远超所需，足以干掉那些军团杂种了。

original: I did what I could for your patients.
translation: 我尽力医治了你的病人。

original: Thanks for your help. I'll take it from here.
translation: 谢谢你的帮助，现在还是让我来吧。

original: I'll send Major Polatli word about the situation here.
translation: 我会把这里的情况告诉波拉特里少校的。

original: I'm not qualified to examine your patients.
translation: 我没有给你病人做检查的水平。

original: That's too bad, but at least you didn't start hacking and slashing with a knife. I don't think Major Polatli could handle two doctors like that.
translation: 这太糟糕了，但至少你没拿把刀胡砍乱戳。我可不认为波拉特里少校能同时应付两个那样的医生。

original: I'll send word to Major Polatli.
translation: 我会把情况告诉波拉特里少校的。

original: This sounds pretty dangerous.
translation: 听起来挺危险的。

original: It's dangerous, but not as bad now that we've taken back Nelson from the Legion.
translation: 是危险，不过比以前要好，毕竟我们从军团手里夺回了纳尔逊。

original: Of course it's dangerous! Damn Legion raiding parties have been giving us hell ever since they took over Nelson.
translation: 当然危险！自从那该死的军团夺取了纳尔逊之后，他们就一直派出劫掠队袭击我们。

original: Hell, my men probably got ambushed by a raiding party! But we need those supplies, and we need them badly.
translation: 见鬼，我的人一定是遭到了劫掠队的伏击！但我们需要补给品，再不来就完蛋了。

original: Any idea on where I should start looking?
translation: 我应该从哪里开始找呢？

original: I sent them to HELIOS One to see if they had any supplies they could spare. They've got to be somewhere between here and there.
translation: 我是派他们去太阳神一号那里看看有没有多余的补给品的。他们应该就在两地之间的某个地方。

original: I'd try searching the main road, or checking with the men at HELIOS One to see if they know anything.
translation: 要是我，就会沿着大路去找，或者问问太阳神一号里的人，看看他们是否知道些什么。

original: How can I help with your supply problems?
translation: 我如何才能帮你解决补给问题呢？

original: The Major let me send out some troops to gather supplies, but unfortunately they never returned. I'm guessing they ran into some trouble on the way.
translation: 少校让我派出些士兵去搜集补给品，但不幸的是他们再也没有回来。我感觉他们应该是在回来的路上遇到了麻烦。

original: You can help by finding the troops and assisting them in bringing back any supplies they found.
translation: 你可以帮助我找到这些士兵，然后协助他们把任何他们找到的补给品给带回来。

original: Quit complaining, it's not that bad here.
translation: 不要抱怨了，这里并不是很差。

original: Is that a joke? Have you looked around? Massive casualties, constant raids, barely any food or equipment... does that sound alright to you?
translation: 你在开玩笑吧？你没有仔细看看周围吗？大量的伤亡，不间断地遇袭，几乎消耗殆尽的食品和装备……你还觉得这里不错？

original: Shit, we haven't had a proper resupply since god knows when. Last time I sent troops out to find supplies, they never returned.
translation: 妈的，天知道我们已经有多久没有接受过补给了。最近我派出一队士兵去寻找补给品，但他们再没有回来。

original: The Major sent you because we don't have any men to spare. So why don't you make yourself useful and find those troops and supplies for me.
translation: 少校派你来这是因为我们分不出更多人手了。所以你为什么不体现一下自己的价值，去帮我找到那队士兵和和补给品呢。

original: The situation looks pretty bad here.
translation: 这里的情况看起来很糟糕。

original: Bad? I've been doing this a long time and I haven't been in many places that were worse than this.
translation: 糟糕？我干这行当已经很长时间了，但我待过的比这更差的地方真的不多。

original: We've been out here on the front lines for a long time without any reinforcements or resupplies. That's what I need your help for.
translation: 我们在这前线上已经支持了很长一段时间了，没有任何增援，也没有任何补给。这也就是我要你帮忙解决的问题。

original: I sent some troops out to find more supplies, but they never returned. I need you to track them down and help them bring back the supplies.
translation: 我派了一些士兵出去寻找更多的补给品，但他们再也没有回来。我需要你去找到他们，并帮他们把补给拿回来。

original: I'm addicted to something.
translation: 我好像上瘾了。

original: I can give you something that should help. I need to see some caps for treatment.
translation: 我可以帮你。不过治疗是要花钱的。

original: I could use some patching up.
translation: 我需要包扎。

original: If you were a trooper, I'd tell you to walk it off, but they're your caps.
translation: 如果你是个当兵的，我会建议你坚持一下，不过既然你有钱，那就随便了。

original: Yep, you appear to be pretty cut up, but nothing some stitches and pain pills won't cure.
translation: 没错，你看上去伤得挺重，不过没什么伤是缝针和药片解决不了的。

original: Do you have the caps to cover the pills and treatment?
translation: 你有钱付医药费和治疗费么？

original: Hot damn you got whooped good! This could take a while.
translation: 哎哟，我的老天爷啊！你这伤可得一阵子才能治好了。

original: I will also require some caps to cover my supplies.
translation: 使用医疗用品所产生的费用也得你来承担。

original: I have radiation sickness.
translation: 我得了辐射病。

original: I can take care of that quick and easy, if you've got the caps.
translation: 我几下子就能给你治好，当然前提是你有瓶盖。

original: <Pay caps>
translation: <付瓶盖>

original: Okay. This will just take a moment.
translation: 好的。一会儿就能弄好。

original: <Pay 50 caps>
translation: <付50瓶盖>

original: Okay. This will just take a moment.
translation: 好的。一会儿就能弄好。

original: <Pay 45 caps>
translation: <付45瓶盖>

original: Okay. This will just take a moment.
translation: 好的。一会儿就能弄好。

original: <Pay 40 caps>
translation: <付40瓶盖>

original: <Pay caps>
translation: <付瓶盖>

original: Okay. A couple rounds of RadAway should do it.
translation: 好的。几袋辐特宁就能解决问题了。

original: <Pay 100 caps>
Okay. A couple rounds of RadAway should do it.
translation: 好的。几袋辐特宁就能解决问题了。

original: <Pay 90 caps>
translation: <付90瓶盖>

original: Okay. A couple rounds of RadAway should do it.
translation: 好的。几袋辐特宁就能解决问题了。

original: <Pay 80 caps>
translation: <付80瓶盖>

original: <Pay caps>
translation: <付瓶盖>

original: Okay. This will just take a moment.
translation: 好的。稍等一下，马上就好。

original: <Pay 100 caps>
translation: <付100个瓶盖>

original: Okay. This will just take a moment.
translation: 好的。稍等一下，马上就好。

original: <Pay 90 caps>
translation: <付90个瓶盖>

original: Okay. This will just take a moment.
translation: 好的。稍等一下，马上就好。

original: <Pay 80 caps>
translation: <付80个瓶盖>

original: <Pay caps>
translation: <付瓶盖>

original: Okay. This will just take a moment.
translation: 好的。稍等一下，马上就好。

original: <Pay 75 caps>
translation: <付75个瓶盖>

original: Okay. This will just take a moment.
translation: 好的。稍等一下，马上就好。

original: <Pay 67 caps>
translation: <付67个瓶盖>

original: Okay. This will just take a moment.
translation: 好的。稍等一下，马上就好。

original: <Pay 60 caps>
translation: <付60个瓶盖>

original: I've got a chem problem.
translation: 我有药瘾。

original: A common enough problem here in Freeside.
translation: 这种事在自由城很常见。

original: I've been exposed to radiation.
translation: 我受到了辐射。

original: That's easy enough to clear up.
translation: 这很容易处理。

original: <Pay 50 caps>
translation: <支付50个瓶盖>

original: This will help you kick the habit.
translation: 我可以帮你戒除恶习。

original: <Pay 100 caps>
translation: <支付100个瓶盖>

original: Hold still. The RadAway burns a little.
translation: 别动。辐特宁会有一点灼痛。

original: <Pay 25 caps>
translation: <支付25个瓶盖>

original: This will help you kick the habit.
translation: 我可以帮你戒除恶习。

original: <Pay 50 caps>
translation: <支付50个瓶盖>

original: Hold still. The RadAway burns a little.
translation: 别动。辐特宁会有一点灼痛。

original: I tell ya, you've got great eyes. You could spot a Super Mutant at three paces.
translation: 我告诉你年轻人，你的眼力很好。你能在三步之内就能辨认出超级变种人。

original: My friend, you've got style, grace, and charm - the style of a feral Ghoul, the grace of a Super Mutant, and the charm of a Deathclaw.
translation: 我的朋友，你很有风度，优雅，还有魅力，不过是狂尸鬼的风度，超级变种人的优雅，死亡爪的魅力。

original: And talk about your quick reflexes, this gal is so fast she beat me to the punchline.
translation: 还是说说你的反应速度吧，这小妞的动作确实快，打得我满嘴抖包袱。

original: It's great to be here at the Tops, folks. The room I'm in has a lovely little closet. A nail, ho.
translation: 能来到九重天简直太棒了，大伙。我住的房间里有个很漂亮的小壁橱。用钉子挂着的。

original: It's hard to sleep in this place, I tell you. Last night some girl was pounding on my door all night. Finally I had to let her out. What?
translation: 告诉你们，这地方真是难以入眠。昨晚有个女孩通宵砸我房门。最后我只能将她撵出去。

original: They really care about your privacy here at the Tops. Even room service has an unlisted number! What?
translation: 他们真的很注重你在九重天的隐私。甚至连客房服务的号码都是隐藏的！

original: Hey, what about that suit Benny wears? If I had a suit like that, the ladies would be all over me. What, you expect a punchline? The guy pays my salary, it's true!
translation: 本尼的衣服怎么样？如果我能有那样一套衣服，小姐们就会围着我转了。什么，你想听我说他的笑话？那家伙可是付了我工钱的！

original: I told my wife, she's good-looking for a ghoul. It's just too bad she's not a ghoul, ay ay ay.
translation: 我告诉我老婆，作为一个尸鬼她的确很漂亮。可惜她不是尸鬼。

original: I love these robots with their friendly little policeman faces. Sure, they still rough you up, but they look so happy!
translation: 我喜欢那些长着好警察面孔的机器人。没错，它们虽然会揍你，但它们揍人时也面带笑容！

original: My cousin and his wife are a fastidious couple. She's fast and he's hideous, ha cha cha.
translation: 我表哥和他老婆都很难伺候。她是个急脾气，而他是个丑八怪。

original: I know a guy, his motto is Love Thy Neighbor. He lives next to a brothel, oh no.
translation: 我认识一个家伙，他的座右铭是睦邻友好。他就住在妓院的隔壁。

original: I try to be frank and earnest with women. In New Reno, I'm Frank and in the Boneyard I'm Ernest. Oh no!
translation: 我对女性真的很忠实很坦白。在新里诺，我的化名叫老忠实，而在埋骨地，我的化名是老坦白。

original: I've been married for 17 years. Where did I go wrong? Ohh.
translation: 我都结婚17年了。我哪里做错了？

original: I've been in love with the same woman for 17 years. If my wife ever finds out, she'll kill me! No!
translation: 我跟一个女人有17年的感情。这事要是让我老婆知道了，她会杀了我！

original: I take my wife everywhere, but somehow she keeps finding her way back. I did it!
translation: 我常带着我老婆四处逛，但不知怎么她总能自己找回家。

original: I bought my wife a little car here in New Vegas. An Omerta. It has a hood under the hood. Ay ay ay.
translation: 我在新维加斯给我老婆买了辆小车。黑手党的。还装了个折叠车篷。

original: People say it's hard to survive the Wasteland - hey, how hard can it be, the water glows in the dark! And it burns.
translation: 人们都说在废土难以生存——有多难，水在夜里会发荧光！

original: So I hear Mr. House runs the Strip. He took it over from the last guy, Mr. Mob-Infested Hellhole. Did he just say that?
translation: 我听说豪斯先生经营着整条长街。他是从上一位拥有者——稀巴烂先生那里——接管了这个地方。

original: I had dinner at the Ultra-Luxe the other night. I told them my steak tasted funny. They said it was a clown. I ate a person!
translation: 前两天晚上我在奢华殿堂吃晚餐。我告诉他们我牛排的味道很奇怪。他们却骂我是个乡巴佬。

original: A ghoul goes to a doctor and says, "Doctor, Doctor, I have this horrible rash!" The Doctor says, "Son, that's called your face." Ding dong!
translation: 一个尸鬼去看大夫，他说"大夫，大夫，我起了很严重的疹子!"医生说"孩子，那就是你的脸啊。"

original: Judging from the economic state of Freeside, they can't be paying you that much.
translation: 从自由城的经济状况判断，他们付不起你这么高的工资。

original: Okay, I admit it, I ain't exactly rolling in caps here, but whaddya want? I'm under contract, I can't get out.
translation: 好吧，我承认，我在这里的确挣不了几个钱，可还能怎么样？我已经签了合同，不能毁约啊。

original: I'll do it.
translation: 我会干的。

original: Find her, bring her back here so we can talk. Needless to say, there's some good money in it for you.
translation: 找到盖西迪，把她带过来。不用说，我保证会有一大笔报酬在等着你。

original: Who is this girl?
translation: 这女孩是谁？

original: Her name is Rose of Sharon Cassidy. That's some fancy shit, right? {Beat, to himself}Don't know what her mother was thinking with a name like that.
translation: 她的名字是罗撒香·盖西迪。真是个奇葩的名字，对吧？{Beat, to himself}都不知道她老妈是怎么想出来的。

original: But this girl and I, we need to have a discussion. {Beat, cold}Find her, bring her here, so I can talk to her, one-on-one.
translation: 不过这女孩和我，有件事要商量。{Beat, cold}找到她，把她带过来。我来和她谈，面对面地谈。

original: What can you tell me about the Omertas?
translation: 关于黑手党你能告诉我些什么？

original: Carlitos is ready to cash in his chips.
translation: 卡利托斯要兑现他的筹码了。

original: So you said. All Little Beard and me need to know is when and where.
translation: 你说过了。只要把时间和地点告诉我和小胡子就行了。

original: <Hushed> Would my companion here make a suitable replacement meal?
translation: <小声> 我的同伴适合当替代品吗？

original: Hmm. He's a little thin, but he looks like he comes from good stock with that strong jaw and upright posture.
translation: 唔……他有点瘦了，但从他那大下巴和直身板来判断，他的伙食应该不错。

original: From the smell of her I'd say we can skip the whiskey marinade. But other than her liver she seems to be in working order.
translation: 就凭她身上那股味道，我们都可以不必再用威士忌腌制了。除了她的肝，其他应该都还可口。

original: What about the boy you kidnapped?
translation: 被你们绑架的那个男孩怎么办？

original: Ted Gunderson is his name. It would be simplest if we could convince him this was all an unfortunate misunderstanding.
translation: 他叫泰德·冈德森。如果你能让他相信这完全是个误会，那是最好不过。

original: But if he won't listen, we can't very well let him go. He'll have to be slaughtered and served. Then we wouldn't need the replacement.
translation: 但他如果不听，也不能让他一走了之。我们会把他宰了，然后端上餐桌。万一结果是这样的话，我们也不需要替代品了。

original: But you would need to deal with his father, Heck. Perhaps if you could smear some of Ted's blood around his father's hotel room, you could frame him.
translation: 但如此一来，你就得想办法摆平他父亲，赫克。如果你能把泰德的血涂在他父亲的客房周围，就可以陷害他了。

original: Tell me what I need to do.
translation: 告诉我我需要做什么。

original: I need a replacement, and I need the boy taken care of. The replacement must be healthy and well-bred. One can't very well make steak from gristle.
translation: 我需要一个替代品，好解决这个男孩的问题。这个替代品必须健康，并且有教养。粗人可烤不成嫩肉。

original: With so little time, we'll have to go after our original choice, Carlyle St. Clair. He lives in a shack north of here. For freshness, we need him alive.
translation: 时间太紧，只能再把原来的猎物捉回来了，卡莱尔·圣克莱尔。他住在北边的一个小棚屋里。肉要新鲜，所以别把他弄死了。

original: If you could send him here or knock him out with this and drag him into the dumpster next to his house, we can do the rest.
translation: 要么把他骗过来，要么用这玩意敲昏他，再把他拖进房子旁边的垃圾箱里，剩下的我们来处理。

original: I think you have the wrong person for this job.
translation: 这件工作找你怕是找错人了。

original: Perhaps I do. Forget I mentioned it.
translation: 可能吧。忘了这事吧。

original: The main course is a person?
translation: 主菜是个人？

original: Yes. The wrong person. We scouted the right one for weeks. The heir to a mercantile empire. Sort of a black sheep.
translation: 对。抓错人了。我们原本选了另外一个人，调查他好几周了。是个商业帝国的继承人，也算是个败家子吧。

original: He cut ties with his family and left their estate to wander. He was ideal. Corn-fed and well-to-do, but no one to miss him if he were to disappear.
translation: 他和家里断绝了关系，抛弃了家产四处游荡。他是最理想的人选。饮食优越、生活富裕，失踪了也没人会在意。

original: Unfortunately, the trap my subordinates set for him failed. And as he escaped, he saw their faces. Now he's wary.
translation: 可惜我手下设的陷阱没能捉到他。而且他逃跑的时候还看到了他们的脸。他现在警惕性很高。

original: Do you have any work that needs to be done?
translation: 你这儿有没有什么工作？

original: Yes, I'm glad you asked. I've heard about you, you know. You strike me as just the sort of person who can help me.
translation: 有，很高兴你有这份心。我听说过你。你给我的印象很深，你就是能帮上我的那种人。

original: I'm in a bind. I've been planning an exquisite Society dinner, but there's a bit of a problem with the main course.
translation: 我遇上了点麻烦。我筹划了一场绝妙的社团晚宴，但是主菜出了点小问题。

original: He's got a powerful and temperamental father.
translation: 我们的主菜有一位强势而又脾气暴烈的父亲。

original: Where do I find the Aces Theater?
translation: 王牌剧场在哪里？

original: The Tops casino, my friend! If you're in the mood to knock back a few and frolic the night away, ain't no better place on Earth!
translation: 在九重天赌场里！如果你想在痛饮中度过一个快乐的夜晚，那就没有比那儿更好的地方了！

original: Who is the Lonesome Drifter?
translation: 孤独的流浪者是谁？

original: Way I hear it, he's some whack job who used to spend his nights sitting around a campfire and howling to himself.
translation: 我听说他精神有问题，每天晚上坐在篝火旁边，对着自己狂吼。

original: "Who wants to hear songs that make you wanna cry?" I try to tell them. But hey, they don't pay me to ask questions.
translation: "谁想听催人泪下的歌？"我本来想跟他们说的，但是，他们付我钱可不是要我多嘴的。

original: Do me a favor - go see the show. Otherwise they'll think I didn't do my job.
translation: 帮我个忙——去看表演吧。不让他们会以为我根本就没干活。

original: A velvety-voiced cool cat fresh out of New Reno, that's who! When Bruce sings, his smokey, dulcet tones will transport you to another world!
translation: 刚从新里诺出道、声音轻盈圆润的帅哥，就是他！只要布鲁斯一开嗓，他那迷幻、美妙的声线将把你带到另一个世界！

original: Who's Bruce Isaac?
translation: 布鲁斯·伊扎克是谁？

original: What sort of show are you talking about?
translation: 你说的是哪种表演？

original: Hadrian, the insult comic! "Did I stutter, fucktard?"{laughs}
translation: 哈德良，讽刺剧啊！"我刚才是不是口吃了，你个弱智？"{laughs}

original: See, I'm using insults to promote the act. That was my idea!
translation: 看，我的表演特色就是拿人开涮。这就是我的创意！

original: I framed Heck Gunderson and sent a Securitron to arrest him.
translation: 我诬陷了赫克·冈德森，并让一个电子保安逮捕了他。

original: So the baron has slaughtered his last Brahmin. How delightful. He was a pox on our business.
translation: 看来那位大亨的双头牛屠宰场要关门大吉了。真让人愉快。他就是个生意场上的毒瘤。

original: He would've driven the price of beef down to the point where any poor wretch could afford it. Can you imagine?
translation: 他会把牛肉的价格压低到连穷人都能买得起。你能想象吗？

original: But now we can price it even higher, create a new luxury market. Not for you, of course. You'll get a special discount.
translation: 不过从今往后，咱们又能提价了，培育一个新的奢侈品市场。当然，不包括你。你可以享受特别折扣。

original: Let's do this.
translation: 咱们上吧。

original: We don't have many troops, so we can only attack from one direction. Where should we focus the attack?
translation: 我们没有很多士兵,所以我们只能从一个方向进攻他们。我们应该从哪里进攻呢？

original: Let's talk about something else.
translation: 我们说点别的吧。

original: What did you want to know?
translation: 你想知道什么呢？

original: What's all the fuss about the water pump?
translation: 那个水泵是怎么回事？

original: Bill Ronte installed that pump a few years ago, back when he was sober. It was a major improvement for the community.
translation: 比尔·郎特在几年前装了那台水泵，那时他还没开始酗酒。对社区来说，那真是一件大好事。

original: But lately, The Kings have started charging locals to use it - and NCR squatters twice as much. That'll come to no good.
translation: 可最近，猫王帮却开始向使用水泵的当地人收取保护费，对NCR流民则更是开出双倍的价钱。这样下去，注定不会有好结果。

original: Santiago's your man.
translation: 就是圣地亚哥。

original: That honey-mouthed sonofabitch? Fine. At least he'll have to shut up occasionally.
translation: 那个嘴似蜜饯的小贱货？很好。至少以后能让他稍微闭一下嘴了。

original: Those pretty lips of his are going to see more traffic than a Brahmin trail in low summer!
translation: 那双漂亮的红唇会比初夏的双头牛小道还要忙碌！

original: Looks like that gives us a full roster of new ass to sell. Good work - enjoy the bonus.
translation: 看来我们又能推出不少新花样了。干得好，这笔奖金拿去吧。

original: That honey-mouthed sonofabitch? Fine. At least he'll have to shut up occasionally.
translation: 那个嘴似蜜饯的小贱货？很好。至少以后能让他稍微闭一下嘴了。

original: Looks like that gives us a full roster of new ass to sell. Good work - enjoy the bonus.
translation: 看来我们又能推出不少新花样了。干得好，这笔奖金拿去吧。

translation: 那个嘴似蜜饯的小贱货？很好。至少以后能让他稍微闭一下嘴了。

translation: 那个嘴似蜜饯的小贱货？很好。至少以后能让他稍微闭一下嘴了。

original: Looks like that gives us a full roster of new ass to sell. Good work - enjoy the bonus.
translation: 看来我们又能推出不少新花样了。干得好，这笔奖金拿去吧。

original: That honey-mouthed sonofabitch? Fine. At least he'll have to shut up occasionally.
translation: 那个嘴似蜜饯的小贱货？很好。至少以后能让他稍微闭一下嘴了。

original: Looks like that gives us a full roster of new ass to sell. Good work - enjoy the bonus.
translation: 看来我们又能推出不少新花样了。干得好，这笔奖金拿去吧。

original: That honey-mouthed sonofabitch? Fine. At least he'll have to shut up occasionally.
translation: 那个嘴似蜜饯的小贱货？很好。至少以后能让他稍微闭一下嘴了。

original: That honey-mouthed sonofabitch? Fine. At least he'll have to shut up occasionally.
translation: 那个嘴似蜜饯的小贱货？很好。至少以后能让他稍微闭一下嘴了。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Are you shitting me? You didn't even know what the plan was? Yeah, as a last request I guess we can give you that courtesy.
translation: [成功] 你他妈耍我？你连我们的计划都不知道？好吧，既然是最后一个请求，我猜我们可以给你这个礼遇。

original: As a last request, will you tell me more about your plan?
translation: 你能把你的计划告诉我吗？就当是我最后一个请求。

original: [FAILED] Sorry, but you're going to have to die ignorant.
translation: [失败] 抱歉，你就当个糊涂鬼吧。

original: Err... can you tell me what the plan was?
translation: 嗯……你能告诉我计划是什么吗 ?

original: Let me see what you have for sale.
translation: 让我看看你都卖些什么。

original: Take your pick.
translation: 请自己挑吧。

original: Of course! I've got a special discount for special people, like you.
translation: 当然！我对特别的人可有特别优惠，比如你。

original: A friend of The Strip's a friend of mine.
translation: 长街的朋友就是我的朋友。

original: Don't get me wrong, I appreciate your business, but dealing with you carries extra costs.
translation: 别误会，我是很喜欢和你做生意，但是要卖东西给你，我可得多担一笔成本哪。

original: I'll sell to you, if only to get you out of sight as soon as possible.
translation: 我可以卖东西给你，不过你买了之后最好赶紧闪人。

original: Couldn't Heck just claim intruders killed his son?
translation: 赫克就不会说是有人闯入房间杀了他儿子吗？

original: No. Everyone he meets, he tells the same story. That his son disappeared from the casino, not from his room. He'll look guilty.
translation: 不会。他对每个人说的故事都是一样。他说儿子是在赌场里失踪的，而不是在房间里。听起来就像在掩饰。

original: I'll try, but not for free.
translation: 我试试吧，但我可不会白干的。

original: Okay, you try that and let me know, okay? How she looks, what she's wearing, she's safe, anything - I'll pay you, you hear?
translation: 好吧，你去试试。回来告诉我她的近况，好吗？穿什么衣服，是否安全，怎样都行——我会付你钱的，听见没有 ?

original: What do you need artillery for?
translation: 你要火炮干什么？

original: The best marksmen of the NCR are usually at the rear of any battle. The gun will allow us to strike at them.
translation: NCR的神射手在打仗时总喜欢躲在最后面，有了这武器，我们就能对他们发起打击了。

original: How do things look around the camp?
translation: 营地的情况如何？

original: Things are looking good. With the new resources and support, morale is at the highest it's ever been around here.
translation: 很不错，有了新的物资和兵员，我们的士气前所未有的旺盛。

original: When the Legion assaults the dam, the Brotherhood will attack the NCR and weaken them.
translation: 军团大举进犯水坝的时候，兄弟会将趁势对NCR发起进攻。

original: Not surprising. Also not acceptable.
translation: 不出所料。但我不能接受这样的结果。

original: I didn't ask you to tell me what they were planning, I asked you to kill them. This was a waste of time.
translation: 我没让你告诉我他们的计划，我是要你把他们统统杀光。真是浪费时间。

original: Go back to the bunker and destroy it. My directions have been clear from the start.
translation: 回到地堡去，把他们彻底消灭掉。我的目标从一开始就很明确了。

original: Where in Freeside will you meet us?
translation: 你在自由城哪里等我们？

original: I'll be near the entrance, but I need to keep out of sight. The Omertas have contacts, and they're still looking for me.
translation: 我会在入口附近等你们，但我得保证自己不被发现。黑手党到处都安插了眼线，而且他们还在找我。

original: Wow. Bringing up morale must be difficult.
translation: 哇哦。提升士气一定很困难。

original: I'd like to browse your special inventory.
translation: 我想看看你的特别目录。

original: Like I always say, a polite society is an armed society.
translation: 就像我说过的，文明社会就是武装社会。

original: <Lie and give 600 caps> I collected all of the debts.
translation: <撒谎并交出600个瓶盖> 我把债全收回来了。

original: I don't care how you handled those lumps of human refuse, but you got the job done. We need you to hunt down another person.
translation: 我不知道你是怎么对付那几个人渣的，但总之你办到了。我们想请你再替我们除掉一个人。

original: That son of a bitch, McCaffery, stole a ton of caps and ran off to Vegas. I guess the fact that we farmed out his usual work to you pissed him off.
translation: 那个狗娘养的麦卡弗里偷了我们一大笔钱，躲进了维加斯。我想他一定是不满意我们把原本给他的差事交给了你。

original: No one steals from the Garret Twins! If you can kill that bastard and bring back as much as you can, you'll be paid very well.
translation: 想偷加勒特家的东西，门都没有！如果你能杀了那个混蛋，把钱追回来，你将得到丰厚的报酬。

original: I don't care how you handled those lumps of human refuse, but you got the job done. For helping us out, we would like to set you up with a room.
translation: 我不知道你是怎么对付那几个人渣的，但总之你办到了。为了表达谢意，我们为你准备了个房间。

original: You can have the corner room, rent free. It was McCaffery's.
translation: 拐角处那间房以后就免费给你用了。本来是麦卡弗里住的。

original: Now that he's dead, we're happy to let you use it. Thanks for helping us.
translation: 既然他死了，我们很乐意把它转交给你。谢谢你的帮忙。

original: I don't care how you handled those lumps of human refuse, but you got the job done. We need you to hunt down another person.
translation: 我不知道你是怎么对付那几个人渣的，但总之你办到了。我们想请你再替我们除掉一个人。

original: That son of a bitch, McCaffery, stole a ton of caps and ran off to Vegas. I guess the fact that we farmed out his usual work to you pissed him off.
translation: 那个狗娘养的麦卡弗里偷了我们一大笔钱，躲进了维加斯。我想他一定是不满意我们把原本给他的差事交给了你。

original: No one steals from the Garret Twins! If you can kill that bastard and bring back as much as you can, you'll be paid very well.
translation: 想偷加勒特家的东西，门都没有！如果你能杀了那个混蛋，把钱追回来，你将得到丰厚的报酬。

original: I don't care how you handled those lumps of human refuse, but you got the job done. For helping us out, we would like to set you up with a room.
translation: 我不知道你是怎么对付那几个人渣的，但总之你办到了。为了表达谢意，我们为你准备了个房间。

original: You can have the corner room, rent free. It was McCaffery's.
translation: 拐角处那间房以后就免费给你用了。本来是麦卡弗里住的。

original: Now that he's dead, we're happy to let you use it. Thanks for helping us.
translation: 既然他死了，我们很乐意把它转交给你。谢谢你的帮忙。

original: How's the morale doing?
translation: 现在士气如何？

original: Lower than a Feral Ghoul's IQ.
translation: 比狂尸鬼的智商还低。

original: Make it 1000 caps. That's enough to betray the Omertas, no?
translation: 那就1000瓶盖好了。这么多钱足够你们背叛黑手党了吧？

original: [FAILED] Do you think us inferior men, willing to sell their souls for scraps! Enough of this.
translation: [失败] 你当我们都是下等人，为了几枚破瓶盖就甘愿出卖自己的灵魂？够了。

original: Time to die!
translation: 该去死了！

original: Right, loyalty is worth more than, say, 1000 caps.
translation: 对，忠诚的确可贵。1000个瓶盖，你说怎样？

original: Two Gundersons, that's worth 1000 caps at least.
translation: 冈德森父子的命，那最少得值1000瓶盖。

original: I need some injuries patched up.
translation: 我有些伤口需要包扎。

original: Okay, what level of care do you require?
translation: 好的，你需要哪种程度的服务？

original: Look out, behind you! <Pistol Whip Carlyle>
translation: 小心，在你背后！<用枪托击打卡莱尔>

original: Are they back?
translation: 他们又来了？

original: I can get that out for you. <Apply Sleeper Hold>
translation: 我可以帮你。<按压颈部>

original: Oh, that feels nice. I can already feel myself rela...
translation: 哦，感觉真好。我感觉到自己好像轻松……

original: Why would I want a piece of shit machete?
translation: 我要一把狗屎砍刀做啥？

original: That blade has split the heads of... The only reason I give it to you is to force myself to earn another. True to Caesar.
translation: 这把刀劈开过许多头颅…{collecting yourself}我把它送给你，是为了以后能够再赢一把新的回来。忠于凯撒。

original: I was in the area, that's all.
translation: 我就是路过而已。

original: Not all of us have the luxury of coming and going as we please. Here, we stay put.
translation: 不是每个人都能像你一样来去自如。我们必须死守这个地方。

original: What's the situation here?
translation: 目前这里是什么情况？

original: {disciplined}My orders are to hold Nelson. So far, the enemy north of here has been too frightened to move against us. Why should it concern you?
translation: {我得到的命令是坚守纳尔逊。目前北边的敌人已经被吓得不敢再轻举妄动了。您问这个是有什么打算 ?

original: Was there something you needed me to do?
translation: 你还有其他事情要找我吗？

original: There is a gambler, Martina Groesbeck, who has a knack for learning other people's secrets and passing that information along, for a price.
translation: 有一个叫玛蒂娜·格罗斯贝克的赌徒，很懂得探听别人的秘密，她靠这个本领赚钱。

original: The Omertas, who run Gomorrah, have become suspicious of Martina's frequent visits to their casino. Soon they'll pay her a visit of their own.
translation: 经营蛾摩拉赌场的黑手党已经对玛蒂娜经常光顾他们的赌场起了疑心。过不了多久他们就会找她麻烦。

original: I'd like to trade.
translation: 我想与你交易。

original: I don't have any supplies to spare, but I've got caps if you have anything you don't need.
translation: 我没有任何补给品可以提供，但如果你有用不到的东西，我可以用瓶盖向你收购。

original: I don't have any supplies to spare for someone with your spotted reputation, but buy your stuff for half the going rate.
translation: 对于你这种名声的人，我没有什么补给品出售。另外，买你的东西我也只付半价。

original: Fix me.
translation: 治好我吧。

original: Excellent, just let me grab my scalpel and a body bag, and we'll get started.
translation: 太好了，等我取来手术刀和装尸袋，然后我们就开始。

original: Okay, fix me. Here's 50 caps.
translation: 好的，给我治吧。这是50个瓶盖。

original: Yes, cure me.
translation: 是的，治好我。

original: Thanks, I'll fix you up right away.
translation: 谢谢，我会立即帮你治好的。

original: Yes, cure me. Here's 50 caps.
translation: 好的，给我治吧。这是50个瓶盖。

original: Do it.
translation: 动手吧。

original: Okay, this might hurt a bit...
translation: 好的，这可能会有些疼……

original: Here's your 100 caps. Do it.
translation: 这是100个瓶盖，来吧。

original: Can you heal my radiation?
translation: 你能治好我的辐射吗？

original: Sure can. The sooner the better if you ask me, unless you want a third arm.
translation: 没问题。如果你问我，当然是越早治越好，除非你想长第三条胳膊。

original: I need help with an addiction.
translation: 我需要治疗上瘾的症状。

original: You and me both, but let's worry about you first. I can fix you up, if you know what I mean.
translation: 咱们都一样，但还是先考虑你的情况吧。我可以治好你，不过你得意思一下。

original: I have wounds that need mending.
translation: 我受伤了，我需要医护。

original: I've seen worse, but I should be able to fix you up pretty easily.
translation: 我见过比这糟糕的，不过我可以轻松地帮你包扎好伤口。

original: Yeah, that looks pretty nasty.
translation: 是啊，看上去情况非常糟。

original: This might take a miracle, and a lot of money.
translation: 这或许得出奇迹才行，外加一大笔钱。

original: I need medical treatment.
translation: 我需要治疗。

original: I don't have that many supplies left, so I can't offer my services freely, but I can help you.
translation: 我剩下的医疗用品不多了，所以我虽然能给你治疗，但必须收费。

original: Hit me with a stimpak, Doc.
translation: 帮我打支治疗针，医生。

original: That should only take a few seconds if you've got the caps.
translation: 如果你有瓶盖的话，很快就能帮你治好。

original: <Pay 10 caps>
translation: <支付10个瓶盖>

original: There you go. Anything else?
translation: 好了。还需要别的吗？

original: Heal me up completely.
translation: 让我痊愈。

original: Stitching up lacerations and treating wounds will take some time. I'm going to need caps to get started.
translation: 缝合伤口、治疗创伤都需要时间。你得先付钱，我才能帮你治。

original: I've got some wounds I need you to look at.
translation: 我有几处创伤，请你帮忙看下。

original: You look fine to me. I hope this isn't drug-seeking behavior... though I've never seen anyone get addicted to Stimpaks.
translation: 你看上去不错。希望你不是为了满足药瘾才来的……不过我也没见过有人对治疗针上瘾。

original: How have you been using the bathroom with your arms that messed up? Oh, forget I asked... phew.
translation: 你的手都伤成这样了，你是怎么使用洗手间的？哦，忘记我问过了……呼。

original: I'm amazed you managed to limp here with your legs like that.
translation: 你的腿瘸成这样还能走过来，太让我惊讶了。

original: I didn't think red, purple, and swollen was your natural eye color. I can fix that right up.
translation: 你的眼睛应该不是本来就这么红肿的吧。我能马上帮你治好。

original: Did a Super Mutant use your torso as a punching bag or something? I'm going to need more gauze...
translation: 你让超级变种人当沙包打了还是怎么回事？我得再拿些纱布来……

original: Okay. This shouldn't take long, but I'm going to need some caps to cover supplies.
translation: 好的。应该很快就能治好，不过药品的费用得由你出了。

original: <Pay 50 caps>
translation: <支付50个瓶盖>

original: You might want to brace yourself. This might get a bit painful.
translation: 你最好坚持一下，这可能会有点痛。

original: <Pay 25 caps>
translation: <支付25个瓶盖>

original: You might want to brace yourself. This might get a bit painful.
translation: 你最好坚持一下，这可能会有点痛。

original: <Pay 75 caps>
translation: <支付75个瓶盖>

original: A shot of Med-X for the pain, and you shouldn't feel... well some of what I need to do.
translation: 来支吗啡针-X镇痛，这样你应该就感觉不到……我的治疗手段了。

original: <Pay 40 caps>
translation: <支付40个瓶盖>

original: A shot of Med-X for the pain, and you shouldn't feel... well some of what I need to do.
translation: 来支吗啡针-X镇痛，这样你应该就感觉不到……我的治疗手段了。

original: Just staple it all together. I'll fix my gimpy bits later.
translation: 把他们缝起来就行。别的我自己处理。

original: This could take a while. Did you bring caps?
translation: 这得花些时间，你带瓶盖了吗？

original: <Pay 50 caps>
translation: <支付50个瓶盖>

original: A shot of Med-X for the pain, and you shouldn't feel... well some of what I need to do.
translation: 来支吗啡针-X镇痛，这样你应该就感觉不到……我的治疗手段了。

original: <Pay 25 caps>
translation: <支付25个瓶盖>

original: A shot of Med-X for the pain, and you shouldn't feel... well some of what I need to do.
translation: 来支吗啡针-X镇痛，这样你应该就感觉不到……我的治疗手段了。

original: There's a shootout going down near the train station. It's Pacer and some strangers. Might be NCR.
translation: 火车站附近发生了枪战。佩瑟和一伙陌生人打起来了。对方可能是NCR。

original: They said the man was severely beaten and barely survived.
translation: 他们说那个人被毒打了一顿，差点挂了。

original: Huh, that would explain why they're all riled at us. Seems like we have a big misunderst{anding}- what the hell?
translation: 哼，难怪他们对我们的怨恨这么深。看来这里头有很深的误……怎么回事？

original: Do you know anything about NCR soldiers here in Freeside?
translation: 你对自由城的NCR士兵了解吗？

original: [SUCCEEDED] Fine, here's some more, but you better keep your mouth shut! I'm out of here. Got some important business to take care of.
translation: [成功] 好吧，再多给你点，但你最好把嘴闭牢一点！我要走了。我还有些重要的事要处理。

original: That's a good start...
translation: 这个头倒是起得不错……

original: [FAILED] That's all you get. Keep your mouth shut. Now if you'll pardon me, I got some important business to take care of.
translation: [失败] 就这个价。现在你给我把嘴闭上。如果你不介意的话，我还有些重要的事要处理。

original: That's it?
translation: 就这些？

original: Do you serve food to Locals as well?
translation: 你们也给本地人提供食物吗？

original: No, I'm afraid we don't. Don't you have a friend you wanted to bring in?
translation: 不，恐怕我们不会提供。你有朋友要带过来？

original: It seemed fairly innocent.
translation: 我觉得这件事很清白。

original: Nothing's innocent in Freeside. You should know that by now.
translation: 在自由城，没有什么是清白的。你必须明白这一点。

original: No, I'm guessing they're doing something they know will cause a row, like keeping the food all to themselves.
translation: 我敢说，他们之所以不敢声张，肯定是怕这件事抖露出去会引起骚动，比如私藏食物。

original: Ah, that would explain the goons. They're here to keep people like my friends away from the food. That ain't something I support. No sir.
translation: 啊，这就可以解释那伙暴徒的行为了。他们不想把食物分给我朋友这样的当地人。这我可不答应。没门！

original: Sure. Serve me up something.
translation: 好的。随便来点什么吧。

original: You won't regret it. At least until an hour or so from now.
translation: 你绝不会后悔的。起码1小时内不会。

original: Stop bugging me.
translation: 不要骚扰我。

original: Hey, just doing my job, okay? Jeesh.
translation: 只是工作需要，好吗？嘁！

original: It's not like you'd be a slave. You'd get to choose your clients.
translation: 你不用给人当奴隶啊。你可以自主选择客人。

original: What's the difference?! Once you start working for the man, you gotta buy nice things to wear.
translation: 有什么区别？！一旦你开始给人卖身，就得买些好东西打扮自己。

original: Then, you gotta make more money to afford nice things. Seems like a right vicious cycle to get into.
translation: 为了负担这些东西，你就得去挣更多的钱。然后就会陷入恶性循环。

original: This would be as an "escort."
translation: 这份工作主要是"伴游"。

original: Eh. I've escorted my share of idiot tourists around Freeside. Too much trouble for what it pays.
translation: 我已经陪伴过不少愚蠢的游客在自由城里瞎晃悠了。太费功夫，赚得又少。

original: What do you know about the Van Graffs?
translation: 对于范·格拉夫家，你有什么评价？

original: A couple of Radscorpions, those two. Gloria is the stable one, but she'd slit your throat if there's a profit in it.
translation: 一对辐射蝎。格洛丽亚比较稳重，但为了钱，她可以割掉你的喉咙。

original: Or rather she'd tell her brother to do it for her. Jean-Baptiste is one of the sicker humans I've had the displeasure of observing.
translation: 不过她从来只会让她的兄弟替她动手。让·巴普蒂斯塔是我观察过的最恶心的人之一。

original: What's your opinion of Mr. House?
translation: 你对豪斯先生的看法呢？

original: Before or after the human race shot itself in the foot? I've been around long enough to have both opinions, see.
translation: 你指的是人类自相残杀以前，还是以后？我已经在这儿活了很久，前后两边的看法我都有。

original: Before the war, Mr. House was a famous captain of industry - robotics, to be specific. Seemed charming in interviews, until he became a recluse.
translation: 在战前，豪斯先生是行业巨子——具体点说，是机器人行业。他在媒体面前相当有魅力，但后来就不再抛头露面。

original: Since the war, though? Didn't make a peep for near two hundred years - but when he came back, he came back strong and killed a lot of people.
translation: 战争爆发后呢？整整两百年都没见过他——可他一出现，就来势汹汹，杀了很多人。

original: What do you think of the NCR?
translation: 你怎么看NCR？

original: I reckon they care about getting water and electricity from the dam, and that's where it ends.
translation: 我觉得他们很重视从大坝获得的水和电，但也仅此而已。

original: The locals here are just an inconvenience to 'em, something to step over or stomp down. They're here for the resources, plain and simple.
translation: 本地人对他们来说不过是块绊脚石，可以任意践踏和压榨。他们的目的很明确，就是来要资源的。

original: Just that Jean-Baptiste has Pacer's Jet.
translation: 就写佩瑟的杰特被巴普蒂斯塔拿走了。

original: Can you forge a handwritten note for me?
translation: 你能帮我伪造一张字条吗？

original: Sure. Just tell me the author and what you want it to say.
translation: 当然。只要告诉我署名人和内容就行。

original: I was thinking of raiding his Jet stash.
translation: 我想偷走他存的杰特。

original: Ha, he's a Jet junkie? He'll go crazy when he finds it gone. I like it.
translation: 哈，他吸杰特上瘾了？他发现东西没了以后肯定会气疯的。我喜欢。

original: I'll tell you what. When you hit the stash, leave this note from me. If the punk really has it bad, he'll come running straight here.
translation: 我跟你说吧。你偷走他的存货后，把这张纸条留在那儿。如果这瘪三真的对杰特情有独钟，那他肯定会找上门来的。

original: His gang won't be able to say shit if he comes storming this place himself.
translation: 如果他是自己找到这儿来送死，那他的弟兄们也不敢有话说。

original: Yep, let's rock.
translation: 好啊，干起来。

original: All right, this is going to be fun.
translation: 好吧，这下有戏看了。

original: The hell I will.
translation: 做你的梦去吧。

original: What do you know about Hoover Dam?
translation: 关于胡佛水坝你知道些什么？

original: Quite a bit actually. I was stationed there nearby during the first battle of Hoover Dam four years ago. I saw a lot of what happened firsthand.
translation: 还算知道些东西吧。四年前第一次胡佛水坝战役打响时，我就驻扎在它附近。我亲眼目睹了许多战况。

original: Who are you?
translation: 你是谁？

original: I haven't the time to speak to commoners such as yourself.
translation: 我没空和你这样的平民废话。

original: Count me out.
translation: 别把我算进去。

original: That's a shame. Well, if you change your mind, let me know. Need anything else?
translation: 太遗憾了。如果你改变了主意。就告诉我。还有什么事吗 ?

original: I found all the evidence you'll need from Saint James' and Dermot's rooms. Here.
translation: 我找到了圣詹姆斯和德莫特屋里的所有证据，拿好。

original: Let's see... a bear. Yes, this belonged to the little girl, so that's a direct connection to the missing people.
translation: 让我看看……一只玩具熊。是的，这只熊是属于那个小女孩的，这是与失踪者相关的直接证据。

original: And this ledger - I know these names. Nephi and Cook are major players with the Fiends. Dermot and Saint James must be working with them.
translation: 还有这个账本，我认得这些名字。尼法和库克都是恶魔帮的大佬。德莫特和圣詹姆斯肯定是和他们狼狈为奸。

original: Thank you for your help - I'll make sure those sick bastards get what's coming to them. Here, you've earned this.
translation: 多谢你的帮助，我一定会让那些狗杂种不得好死。给，这是你应得的。

original: I heard you did some good work for us. Thank you. Here's a little cash from us to you. Try not to spend it all in one place.
translation: 我听说你帮了我们。谢谢。这点钱你拿去。可别一口气花完了。

original: I finished all the work you had for me.
translation: 我完成了你交待我的所有任务。

original: I'll take a look and see if there's anything I can do.
translation: 我进去看看，也许会有什么办法。

original: That's already more than I was expecting. I'll keep watch to make sure no more Legion come up the road. Good luck.
translation: 真让我喜出望外。我会帮你断后，守着这条路的。祝你好运。

original: Why are you out here alone?
translation: 你为什么一个人在这儿？

original: My squad was ambushed by a Legion party led by that bastard Alexus.
translation: 我的小队被亚历克苏斯那个杂种率领的军团小队伏击了。

original: He was taking us into the mine up ahead, but I managed to get away. I need help to get them out.
translation: 他想把我们关进前面的矿洞，但我成功逃走了。我需要有人帮我把战友们救出来。

original: Thank you, my fellow Californians, who have come so far to answer the call to service put forth by the republic.
translation: 谢谢你，莫尔上校。也谢谢你们，加州的同胞们，感谢你们响应共和国的召唤，千里迢迢来到这里。

original: There are some back home who ask me, "But who are we protecting? What is Nevada to us?"
translation: 一些家乡的人民问我，"我们到底是要保护谁？内华达对我们到底有什么意义？“

original: Okay, let's get the fuck out of here. What the hell are you waiting for? You think I want to get shot? Let's go!
translation: 好了，我们赶紧走吧。你们等什么呢？想让我吃枪子吗？快走吧 !

original: You must've been at Bitter Springs. What happened there?
translation: 你肯定去过苦泉。当时发生什么事了？

original: That part of my life's over now. And so is this discussion.
translation: 那段日子对我来说早就结束了。我们的这次谈话也该结束了。

original: Better for her to die than live as a Legion slave.
translation: 对她来说，死了总比当军团的奴隶要好。

original: Yeah. What they do to women... that's worse than death.
translation: 是啊，他们对待女人的方式……比死还可怕。我别无选择。

original: There was no choice in what I did. It was more like... being forced to watch something you can't stop.
translation: 感觉就像是……眼睁睁地看着事情发生，却无力阻止。

original: What'll happen at the Fort?
translation: 我到了城堡后会怎样？

original: You'll be meeting face-to-face with the mighty {KAI-zar}Caesar himself, founder of the Legion, conquerer of 86 tribes.
translation: 你将会受到伟大的{KAI-zar}凯撒的接见，他是军团的缔造者，86个部族的征服者。

original: To my knowledge, this is the first time {KAI-zar}Caesar has ever summoned one of the Dissolute to see him. That it would be a woman is even more surprising.
translation: 据我所知，这是{KAI-zar}凯撒第一次召见你这样的浪荡之辈。更何况你还是个女人。

original: What is this place?
translation: 这是什么地方？

original: {Grateful}Thanks to your help, I think Bitter Springs has a real shot at surviving. I can't offer much of a reward, but know that the NCR is very grateful.
translation: {Grateful}多亏你的帮忙，我觉得苦泉又有希望了。我能报答你的不多，但请记住，NCR真的十分感激你。

original: Are things going better at the camp now?
translation: 现在营地里的情况好点没？

original: Captain Gilles said to talk to you about medical aid for the camp.
translation: 吉勒斯上尉派我来问你关于营地医疗物资的事情。

original: {Pleased}Hey, if you can help, I'll take whatever I can get. Doctor's Bags would be a huge help, but what I really need are medical texts.
translation: {Pleased}嘿，只要能派上用场，什么都行。医疗包就不错，但我真正需要的是医疗书籍。

original: I'm not trained to deal with major psychological trauma, and we've got a lot of kids in this camp.
translation: 毕竟抚平心理创伤不是我的强项。此外，营地里还有不少孩子。

original: What I really need are medical texts - books on psychology or pediatrics, specifically.
translation: 我需要的是医疗方面的书籍——主要是关于心理学和儿科的。

original: What kind of medical aid are you looking for again?
translation: 你之前说需要什么医疗用品来着？

original: What I really need is a book on psychology. Something for post-traumatic stress.
translation: 我真正需要的是心理学方面的书籍。只要是能治疗心理创伤的就行。

original: What kind of medical aid are you looking for again?
translation: 你之前说需要什么医疗用品来着？

original: What I really need is a book on pediatric medicine. We've got a lot of sick and injured kids here.
translation: 我特别需要儿科方面的医疗书籍。我们这里有许多生病受伤的孩子。

original: What kind of medical aid are you looking for again?
translation: 你之前说需要什么医疗用品来着？

original: {Frustrated}Doctor's bags would be a huge help, but what I really need are medical texts.
translation: {Frustrated}虽然医疗包对我们很有帮助，但我还是需要医疗书籍。

original: I'm not trained to deal with major psychological trauma, and we've got a lot of kids in this camp.
translation: 毕竟抚平心理创伤不是我的强项。此外，营地里还有不少孩子。

original: What kind of aid were you looking for again?
translation: 你之前说需要什么医疗用品来着？

original: I found one of those books you wanted.
translation: 我找到了一本你要的书。

original: {Excited}Both of them? Wow, that's very resourceful. Thank you.
translation: {Excited}两种都有吗？太好了！谢谢你！

original: I found those books you wanted.
translation: 我找到你要的书了。

original: {Pleased}That's great! Thank you. I'm sure this will go a long way toward making things better here.
translation: {Pleased}这太棒了！谢谢你。这些东西肯定会对我们大有帮助的。

original: {Pleased}This is exactly the kind of thing I was looking for. Thank you.
translation: {Pleased}这正是我想要找的书，谢谢你。
