translation: 有消息说NCR的首席游骑兵，军士长汉隆，在清理左轮手枪时发生意外。当时他正把自己锁在位于高尔夫营地的办公室内。

original: Sources report the NCR's top Ranger, Chief Hanlon, has unexpectedly passed away. NCR soldiers rallied to show their support for the officer.
translation: 有消息说NCR的首席游骑兵，军士长汉隆猝然离世。NCR的士兵们日前自发组织了集会，以表达对他的哀思。

original: The Kings have been killed in a fight with NCR forces after weeks of mounting hostility. Witnesses report The King's last word was simply "Don't."
translation: 在持续数周的武力挑衅之后，猫王帮成员被NCR军悉数剿灭。有目击者说，猫王临死前只说了两个字"不要。"

original: A hostage crisis between the NCR and Great Khans was resolved peacefully when a third-party negotiator successfully secured the hostages' release.
translation: NCR和大汗帮之间的人质危机得到和平解决。一名来自第三方的谈判专家解救并释放了人质。

original: A group of Great Khans were killed in a bloody end to a hostage crisis in Boulder City. It's not currently known why the Khans were in the area.
translation: 巨石城的人质危机以大汗帮的人被杀而告终。现在还不清楚为何大汗帮的人会出现在那个地区。

original: A few Great Khans are on the loose after an aborted standoff left at least two NCR hostages dead. The NCR is offering a reward for their capture.
translation: 两名大汗帮成员在谈判失败后逃之夭夭，事件已造成至少两名NCR人质丧生。目前NCR正在悬赏捉拿这两名逃犯。

original: NCR has failed to retake the prison it recently lost in a deadly riot. Powder Gang operations against the NCR are expected to continue.
translation: NCR试图重新控制发生暴乱的监狱，但行动以失败告终。炸药帮抵抗NCR的行动仍将继续。

original: Beef prices around the New Vegas Strip have dropped significantly following an agreement between the Ultra-Luxe and Brahmin baron Heck Gunderson.
translation: 奢华殿堂和双头牛大亨赫克·冈德森之间已经达成协议，目前新维加斯长街的牛肉价格已经大幅下降。

original: Diners at the Gourmand are giving the restaurant rave reviews for executive chef Philippe's brand new menu offerings.
translation: 美事家餐厅的用餐者对主厨菲利普的新菜给予了极高的评价。

original: Here's your money.
translation: 这是你的钱。

original: Excellent, just let me grab my scalpel, and a body bag and we'll get started.
translation: 太好了，让我去取来手术刀和装尸袋，然后我们就开始。

original: Okay, fix me. Here's 75 caps.
translation: 好，治疗我，这里是 75瓶盖。

original: All right, here's your money.
translation: 好吧，这是你的钱。

original: Excellent, just let me grab my scalpel, and a body bag and we'll get started.
translation: 太好了，让我去取来手术刀和装尸袋，然后我们就开始。

original: Okay, fix me. Here's 100 caps.
translation: 好，治疗我。这里是100瓶盖。

original: I think it's time to knock you down a peg or two, Ranger.
translation: 我看是该修理修理你了，游骑兵。

original: We'll see about that.
translation: 让我看看你的本事。

original: You've got five seconds to get out of my sight before I shove that rifle where the sun don't shine.
translation: 给你五秒钟时间从我眼前消失，否则我射死你。

original: {suddenly scared}Son of a bitch!
translation: {suddenly scared}婊子养的！

original: The name's [%].
Is that so? Can't say I've ever heard a good word about you. Lots of bad ones, though.
translation: 是吗？我似乎就没听说过有关你的好话。坏话倒是一大堆。

original: So why don't you just turn your butt around and scoot back down the road before I blast some daylight through you?
translation: 我看你还是在我给你的屁股开几个透明窟窿之前，赶紧夹着尾巴滚蛋吧。

original: < Barter 50 >
[SUCCEEDED] That should work. We'll do a weighted exchange based on the going value of meat and vegetables. Water is invaluable in this dusty hole.
translation: [成功] 应该可行。我们会根据肉类和蔬菜的远期价格做一次加权交易。淡水在这干得要死的鬼地方可是无价之宝。

original: Let McCarran know they should expect the first shipment in a week or so.
translation: 告诉麦卡伦，他们将在一星期左右得到第一批货。

original: McCarran is overstocked with water and fresh vegetables. Arrange for a two for one trade.
translation: 麦卡伦储藏了大量的淡水和新鲜蔬菜。你可以要求二换一。

original: McCarran has plenty of caps to cover the shipment. They'll deal with the cost.
translation: 麦卡伦有的是钱。这不是问题。

original: Excellent. We should be able to get the shipments started in about a week.
translation: 好极了。我们会在一周内出货。

original: McCarran needs a regular shipment of brahmin meat and spices for the mess hall.
translation: 麦卡伦需要一批双头牛肉和香料来保障餐厅的运作。

original: Won't be a problem. We have plenty of spice traders working with us back home, and we could get meat from the local Brahmin ranchers.
translation: 没问题。老家那边不少香料商人都与我们有合作，而当地的双头牛牧场主则可以向我们提供牛肉。

original: The bigger issue is payment. To supply the camp with meat will cost some serious caps.
translation: 问题是钱。向营地供应肉制品可是个烧钱的事。

original: Some of those could be combined with other chemicals to make drugs...
translation: 你说的那些东西有一部分可以和其它化学物质混合，用来制作毒品……

original: Really? Huh, never thought of that. The Crimson Caravan isn't really in the drug business.
translation: 真的？哼，别动歪脑筋。深红商队不会涉足毒品交易的。

original: Combining those with chemical cleaners would yield strong chems...
translation: 把那些东西混在一起可是能造出劲爆的“药品”来的……

original: Really? Huh, never thought of that. The Crimson Caravan isn't really in the drug business.
translation: 真的？哼，别动歪脑筋。深红商队不会涉足毒品交易的。

original: Contreras sent me for some medical supplies.
translation: 孔特雷拉斯让我来拿药品。

original: Here you go. Let him know he needs to make another payment if he wants more of this stuff.
translation: 给你。告诉他，如果还想要货的话得再付钱了。

original: Show me what you have for sale.
translation: 给我看看你都卖什么。

original: Can do.
translation: 好的。

original: Are work contracts common for the Crimson Caravan Company?
translation: 深红商队公司的员工都签工作合同吗？

original: Most merchant companies - {correcting herself, emphasizes "successful"}successful merchant companies, rather - have them. It can be inconvenient to replace employees on short notice.
translation: 大部分的商业公司——{correcting herself, emphasizes "successful"}成功的商业公司——都会签。如果人员流动过于随意，业务就会受影响。

original: The contracts keep employees around for a specific duration of time, after which they get paid - after their upkeep and expenses are deducted, of course.
translation: 合同可以保证员工在一段时间内为我效力，时间一到，我就给钱——当然了，要扣除他们的日常费用。

original: Janet's asked me to talk to you about releasing her from her contract.
translation: 珍妮特让我来问你能不能解除她的合同。

original: {snorting, a bit contemptuous}Ah, yes, her infatuation with a Boomer she's never met. It's a small camp, and word gets around.
translation: {snorting, a bit contemptuous}啊，没错，她迷上了一个素未谋面的大炮族。这地方太小，流言早就满天飞了。

original: She's aware she's breaking her contract, which is undoubtedly why she sent you to talk to me instead of coming herself.
translation: 她也知道自己会违约，所以才派你来跟我谈判，而不肯亲自露面，对吧？

original: Janet is free to leave, but she forfeits the wages she's owed. That's the price of contract breaking - take it or leave it.
translation: 珍妮特随时都可以走，但她的工资得作为违约金扣除。违约就要付出代价——要么继续履约，要么就净身出户。

original: My terms haven't changed. Janet is free to leave, but she forfeits the wages she's owed.
translation: 我的条件没变。珍妮特随时可以走，但是她的工资得作为违约金扣掉。

original: No suspects have been identified, but seniors are advised to be on the lookout for the so-called Denture Killer.
translation: 犯人还未落网，老年人仍要提防这位身份不明的所谓假牙杀手。

original: Where would you suggest I find meat in the amount you'd need here?
translation: 能否告诉我去哪儿才能买到你需要的肉？

original: {Reassuring}It doesn't need to all come from the same source. There are a bunch of different vendors around who sell meat. Fitz, the Nashes, Crimson Caravan...
translation: 你不必只局限于一家供货商。这地区有很多商家都卖肉。菲茨，纳什，深红商队……

original: We've never really tried to go out and organize deals with merchants to supply our food. Already having an overstock of food, we haven't needed to.
translation: 其实我们根本就没和外面的商人认认真真地做过买卖。我们的粮食供应已经过剩，不需要再跟他们打交道了。

original: But we really need some good-old red meat on the menu soon, so I'm willing to divert some caps in their direction if they're open to supplying us.
translation: 但大家真的都很想吃上新鲜的上等红肉，如果那些商人愿意供应，我很愿意出钱买。

original: Sign me up.
translation: 算我一个。

original: Good. We clear out the hostages, they lose their advantage. They're down in a clearing, crucified on some telephone poles.
translation: 好。我们干掉人质，他们就没优势了。人质们就被钉在电线杆上，清楚可见。

original: I'll cover you from the ridge. Just make it quick. These boys should be put out of their misery, not plinked to death with some old varmint rifle.
translation: 我会在山梁那里掩护你。动作快点。让那些小伙子尽早解脱，而不是用老式猎狐步枪折磨他们。

original: And don't get any dreamy notions about playing the hero and dragging these boys out. You'll get swarmed. Now let's go.
translation: 也不要异想天开，硬充好汉想把人质救出来。你会被包围的。我们走吧。

original: [Psycho] Funny you should mention Psycho. I actually have a few dozen doses on me...
translation: [疯狂药] 有趣，你提到疯狂药的。我还真带了一些在身上……

original: All right, I have to admit I wasn't expecting you to say that. I was just joking. But if it makes you feel any better, I'm impressed.
translation: 好吧，我没想到你居然会这么说。我只是开个玩笑。不过我挺佩服你的，无意冒犯。

original: {change subjects quicky}So anyway, how about those hostages?
translation: {change subjects quicky}那么，人质的事怎么说？

original: These ten caps are yours if you point me to anyone you've seen with a weird old gun.
translation: 如果你能告诉我谁带着一把样式奇异的古董枪，这10个瓶盖就归你了。

original: Blaaagghhh.
I would bribe you, but I don't have much on me. Would you accept an IOU?
translation: 我是想表示一下，可是手头的钱不够。要不给你打张欠条 ?

original: I'm looking for someone carrying an antique gun.
translation: 我正在找一个携带一柄古董枪的人。

original: {erudite}Friend, not a few minutes ago I chanced upon a pair of destitute orphans grappling over just such an item.
translation: {erudite}当然看到过，口齿伶俐的朋友。就在几分钟前，我看到两位流落街头的孤儿正在抢夺一件类似的物品。

original: {erudite}If you cover the area methodically, I'm quite certain you'll happen upon them with only the most insubstantial of delays.
translation: {erudite}如果您愿意在附近稍留片刻，我敢肯定，不消多时，您就能够邂逅那两个孩子。

original: {erudite}Be well. And do try and avoid the tragic path of the sot that led me to my present infirmities and spiritual woes.
translation: {erudite}保重。千万要远离酒精的诱惑，以免落得和我一样贫病交加，萎靡不振的下场。

original: I don't have the caps.
translation: 我现在没那么多瓶盖。

original: I'm afraid I can't do this for free. My supplies are stretched thin enough as it is.
translation: 恐怕我不能免费提供服务，我手头的物资也很吃紧啊。

original: Here's the caps.
translation: 钱在这里。

original: All right. Sit still and let me work.
translation: 好的。坐着别动，我来处理。

original: Yes, cure me. Here's 50 caps.
translation: 是的，治好我。给你50瓶盖。

original: Can you cure my addiction?
translation: 你可以帮我脱瘾吗？

original: You really ought to avoid using those kinds of chems, but I'll see what I can do.
translation: 你真的应该少服一些药品，我看看能不能有什么办法吧。

original: Could you remind me where I should look for supplies?
translation: 你能告诉我去哪儿可以搞到这些补给吗？

original: What do you need to know?
translation: 你想知道什么？

original: <Pay caps>
translation: <付瓶盖>

original: Okay. This will just take a moment.
translation: 好的。稍等一下，马上就好。

original: <Pay 50 caps>
translation: <付50个瓶盖>

original: Okay. This will just take a moment.
translation: 好的。稍等一下，马上就好。

original: <Pay 45 caps>
translation: <付45瓶盖>

original: Okay. This will just take a moment.
translation: 好的。稍等一下，马上就好。

original: <Pay 40 caps>
translation: <付40个瓶盖>

original: I worked out a deal where the Brotherhood will help the NCR defend the dam.
translation: 我促成了一个交易，兄弟会会帮助NCR防守大坝。

original: {nonplussed}And why would you have done that?
translation: {nonplussed}你为什么要那么做？

original: Success depends on forcing the NCR to rout from Hoover Dam. Hmm, does giving them a powerful ally in the battle make that more or less likely?
translation: 我们的目标是迫使NCR撤出胡佛大坝。哼，你觉得为他们拉来一个盟友，会对这件事起到任何帮助吗？

original: Your assignment is unchanged - destroy the Brotherhood of Steel. Please get it right this time.
translation: 你的任务没变——消灭钢铁兄弟会。这回请你别再犯错了。

original: Where do you think Benny's gone?
translation: 你觉得本尼会去哪？

original: His destination is hardly a mystery. It's a near certainty that he's making his way for Caesar's camp, at Fortification Hill.
translation: 他的去处并不难推断，十有八九是去了凯撒的营地，在堡垒山上。

original: It's one of just two places on Earth that have the hardware necessary to read the Platinum Chip - the Lucky 38 is the other, of course.
translation: 那是全世界仅存的两处能读取白金筹码的地方之一——当然，另一处是幸运38。

original: I'd like to ask some questions first...
translation: 我想先问点问题……

original: There will be time for questions and answers once you've delivered the Chip. Until then, you'll have to tolerate your ignorance... just as I do.
translation: 等你把筹码送来，再问问题也不迟。在那之前，你就权且容忍一下自己的无知吧……如同我一样。

original: Goodbye.
translation: 再见。

original: By "goodbye," I assume you mean that you can't talk right now because you need to go get the Platinum Chip off Benny's body.
translation: 既然你说了"再见"，我想你应该是不方便说话了吧，因为你还得从本尼的尸体上扒下白金筹码呢。

original: Why do you care whether Kimball lives or dies?
translation: 你为什么突然在乎起金博尔的生死了？

original: {Oh, the burdens of intelligence}Kimball's entire political career is inextricably bound up with the NCR's occupation of the Mojave. It's his war.
translation: {Oh，the burdens of intelligence}金博尔的整个政治生涯都无可避免地与NCR占领莫哈维这件事捆绑在了一起。这场战争完全就是他发动的。

original: If I compel the NCR to retreat, Kimball will be the sacrifice offered to the gods, so decent NCR citizens can get on with their lives.
translation: 如果我能逼迫NCR撤军，金博尔就会成为民怨的牺牲品，那些普通的NCR市民则会回归他们原来的生活。

original: In retrospect, the Mojave and Hoover Dam will seem like one man's misadventure. Kimball will be blamed, not me. Not New Vegas.
translation: 将来谈及历史时，人们只会将莫哈维和胡佛大坝的悲剧归结到一个人头上。那个人是金博尔，不是我。更不是新维加斯。

original: So why don't you want the NCR President to die?
translation: 你为什么不希望NCR总统死掉呢？

original: You recruited the Omertas as one of the Three Families?
translation: 你招募了黑手党作为三大家族的一员？

original: Yes, though at the time they called themselves the "Slither Kin." A vicious clan, not that that's changed, exactly.
translation: 是的，不过他们当时还称呼自己为"滑虫族"。一个心狠手辣的部落，这点倒是至今都没变。

original: They were nomads, capable fighters, but their specialty was betrayal. They'd invite travelers into their yurts, drug them, murder or enslave them.
translation: 他们是游牧民，也是出色的战士。可他们最擅长的却是背叛。他们会邀请旅行者进入帐篷，然后趁机下药，接着杀死或者奴役他们。

original: They took pride in their craft. I don't think Omertas saw other people as people at all. Everyone else was just... prey.
translation: 这些人以此为荣。我觉得黑手党根本不把别人当人看。在他们眼里，所有人都只是……猎物。

original: They reminded me of a certain criminal element Vegas used to attract. I told them some stories, gave them some clothes - and they ran with it.
translation: 他们让我想起了以往的维加斯也曾令罪犯们趋之若鹜。我给他们讲了些故事，又送了几套衣服——他们就为我效力了。

original: The Chairmen, as we know them now, went by the unfortunate appellation of the "Mojave Boot-Riders." They were nomads, too.
translation: 董事会，当然这是现在的名字，当时他们的可怜称号是"莫哈维靴子骑士。[/QUOTE]他们也是游牧民。

original: As for the White Glove Society, I'm afraid I'm contractually obligated not to reveal their original name.
translation: 至于白手套社团，基于保密协议，我恐怕不能向你透露他们原来的名字。

original: What were the original names of the other tribes?
translation: 其他部落的原始名字是什么？

original: Tell me about the Boomers.
translation: 给我说说大炮族的情况。

original: They occupied Nellis Air Force Base a little over 50 years ago. One of my Securitrons got some video of their arrival - and then... exploded.
translation: 他们占据内利斯空军基地已经有50年多年了。我的一名电子保安曾拍到过他们入驻时的影像——然后……它就爆炸了。

original: Odds are they were Vault dwellers. That's everything I know about them, really.
translation: 他们可能曾经是避难所的居民。我也就知道这么多。

original: Only if you come within a mile or so of them.
translation: 只有当你距离他们不足一英里时才算危险。

original: Given their history of extreme isolationism, it's tempting to leave them be. But those howitzers of theirs...
translation: 这帮家伙向来极度排外，按理说最好别惹他们。可他们手上那些榴弹炮……

original: You can't let indeterminate variables rattle around in your equations like that. They have to be accounted for, one way or another.
translation: 绝不能在方程式里留下任何不可控的变量。必须想个办法对付他们，要么为我所用，要么彻底铲除。

original: The Boomers sound dangerous.
translation: 大炮族听上去是一群危险分子。

original: Yeah, but your heavy use has really depreciated its value. It's only worth twenty caps now.
translation: 是的，但你使用得太频繁，导致它掉价了。它现在只值20个瓶盖。

original: Aw, man. It's Stacey's fault. She pretends like she didn't get hit.
translation: 喔，天。这都是斯泰西的错。她总是故意装作没被打中的样子。

original: That's still a lot of money. I guess I'll take it.
translation: 不过你给的钱还是挺多的。那我就收下了。

original: It's worth 1000 caps to me.
translation: 对我来说它值1000瓶盖。

original: You mean it? Wow, thanks!
translation: 你认真的吗？哇，谢谢！

original: I bet me and Stacey can get something real cool at Mick and Ralph's with that.
translation: 有了这些钱，我和斯泰西肯定能在米克和拉尔夫那里买到超酷的玩意。

original: I'm a space soldier. The general sent me to ask you to borrow your gun to stop an alien invasion.
translation: 我是个太空战士。将军派我来找你借枪，以抵抗外星人入侵。

original: Really? Cool! Bring it back to me when you're done, okay? I think Stacey might be turning into an alien.
translation: 真的？酷！那用完之后能把它还给我吗？我觉得斯泰西可能变成了外星人。

original: Give me that gun.
translation: 把那把枪给我。

original: Sorry, but I need to shoot Stacey. We can find you another gun.
translation: 抱歉，我还要用它来教训斯泰西。我们可以帮你再找一把来。

original: After all I've done, 200 caps won't do.
translation: 我费的功夫不小呢，200个瓶盖可打发不了我。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Yes, I suppose you're right. Please, take this: it's half of our savings. We'll manage, somehow, as we've always done.
translation: [成功] 是的，你说得对。请收下吧：这是我们一半的积蓄。反正咬咬牙也能挺过去，我们以前就是这么过来的。

original: Take care of yourself out there. And if you ever need a friendly hand, know that folks around here will always welcome you.
translation: 你自己多加保重。如果你今后需要帮助，记住，这里的人民随时欢迎你。

original: Having your daughter back should be worth more than 200 caps.
translation: 能找回自己的女儿肯定不止200个瓶盖。

original: No charge, just helping out.
translation: 不要钱，帮忙而已。

original: Right on, right on. You're a pretty hip cat.
translation: 好极了，好极了，你真是个靠得住的好男人。

original: Right on, right on. You're a pretty hip kitten.
translation: 好极了，好极了，你真是个靠得住的好姑娘。

original: How about a little pick-me-up?
translation: 来点提神的东西如何？

original: Here you go, this'll give you some zing.
translation: 给你，这玩意会让你充满活力。

original: Some caps would be nice.
translation: 来几个瓶盖估计会不错。

original: Here's a little tink-tink to weight your pockets.
translation: 这些叮当响的小东西会让你的口袋更充实一些。

original: I changed my mind about helping you with your Legion problem. I'm in.
translation: 在对付军团的事上，我改主意了。我加入。

original: Good. We clear out the hostages, they lose their advantage. They're down in a clearing, crucified on some telephone poles.
translation: 好。我们干掉人质，他们就没优势了。人质们就被钉在电线杆上，清楚可见。

original: I'll cover you from the ridge. Just make it quick. These boys should be put out of their misery, not plinked to death with some old varmint rifle.
translation: 我会在山梁那里掩护你。动作快点。让那些小伙子尽早解脱，而不是用老式猎狐步枪折磨他们。

original: And don't get any dreamy notions about playing the hero and dragging these boys out. You'll get swarmed. Now let's go.
translation: 也不要异想天开，硬充好汉想把人质救出来。你会被包围的。我们走吧。

original: The rangefinder might be a problem. I reactivated HELIOS One, and it's not powering a weapon.
translation: 测距仪可能没法用了。我重新启动了太阳神一号。但它已经无法再为武器充能了。

original: Ah, hell. Well, how could you know, right? Okay. Two other options still on the table.
translation: 啊，该死。好吧，谁能想得到呢，对吧？没关系。我们还有另外两个选择。

original: <Draw Weapon> Well, you're never going to find out.
translation: <掏出武器> 好吧，你永远也别想知道结果了。

original: You don't have a say. Go back in your cave.
translation: 这里没你说话的份。回你的洞里去。

original: A paladin always has a say where the Codex is concerned. Veronica's aspirations are seditious.
translation: 只要和法典有关，圣骑士就有发言权。维罗尼卡的想法充满了煽动性。

original: All of us are sworn to obey and protect the Codex, even against one of our own. She's gone too far this time.
translation: 我们这里所有人都曾发誓，即便会与兄弟反目，也要遵从和捍卫法典。这次她做得太过了。

original: All right, here you go.
translation: 好的，来吧。

original: Come back by here when you're done at the tables.
translation: {Searched the player}好了，你可以走了。等你在赌桌前玩够了就回来取东西吧。

original: [Sneak] Sure, take whatever you can find. <Holdout>
translation: [潜行技能] 好的，你随便拿吧。<藏匿>

original: [FAILED] Oh, now, what a surprise - someone trying to smuggle in weapons.
translation: [失败] 啊哈，太让人惊讶了，居然有人私藏武器。

original: Look, jackass, the job's rough enough as it is without troublemakers like you, so either hand it all over or take your caps elsewhere.
translation: 听好了，浑球，就算没有你们这些人捣乱，我这工作也已经够难做的了。所以你要么把东西都交出来，要么就拿着钱滚蛋。

original: Let's see what you have.
translation: 让我们看看你都有什么。

original: Take a look at these beauties.
translation: 来瞧瞧这些美人儿吧。

original: The right weapons for my kind of customer.
translation: 这些武器绝对适合我的顾客。

original: The others here don't understand our kind, but you can count on me, friend.
translation: 其他人都不理解我们这类人，但我懂你，朋友。

original: You aren't exactly good for business, so you'll have to live with my prices.
translation: 和你做生意我是要冒风险的，所以恕不二价，你看着办吧。

original: Have a discount, friend. I can't wait to see what you do with these, next.
translation: 给你打个折，朋友。我真想看看你能拿这些东西干什么。

original: It's an honor to have my wares used by such a wild badass. Cut's on the house, friend.
translation: 有你这样的大恶人赏光是我的荣幸。折扣全算在我的账上，朋友。

original: Not interested. Maybe some other time.
translation: 没什么兴趣。下次吧。

original: Bring on the mayhem, friend.
translation: 去制造混乱吧，我的朋友。

original: Goodbye.
translation: 再见。

original: Hmmm... think I could slip bigger weapons past the guards?
translation: 嗯……你觉得我可以带一把更大点的武器混过守卫吗？

original: Let's see who's pathetic.
translation: 让我们看看是谁可怜。

original: {menacing}True to Caesar.
translation: {menacing}忠于凯撒。

original: Who are you?
translation: 你是谁？

original: I am Dead Sea, Decanus of the Legion by the grace of Caesar, not that {emph}you're in any position to ask questions.
translation: 我叫死海。受凯撒恩泽，担任军团的十夫长。你没有权利质疑他的意志。

original: What are you going to do about it?
translation: 你打算怎么办？

original: I'll execute Caesar's will by hurling your corpse into the Colorado - like the other Profligates before you!
translation: 我会执行凯撒的命令，将你的尸身丢入科罗拉多大峡谷，就像对付你之前的那些混账一样！

original: Goodbye.
translation: 再见。

original: Good day to you, and stay out of trouble.
translation: 再见，别惹麻烦。

original: Uh... Veronica just said those things to test you. She didn't mean it.
translation: 呃……维罗尼卡说那些只是为了考验你们，并非她的真意。

original: [FAILED] You're pathetic. Hide behind words all you like, but your cowardice shows through.
translation: 你真可悲。躲在奉承之辞中，只会把你的懦弱更加暴露无遗。

original: Ideals are strengthened by the challenges they endure. Veronica's questioning did you a service.
translation: 只有历经挑战的理想才会更显坚定。维罗尼卡的质疑实际上是在为你们做贡献。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Hmmph. She'd be doing a greater service by carrying out her duties and not trying to undermine the elder's authority.
translation: 哼。她应该在自己的岗位上做出更大的贡献，而不是去挑战长老的权威。

original: This had better be the last time her loyalty falters. You've been warned.
translation: 如果她还想证明自己的忠诚，这是最后的机会。这同样也是对你的警告。

original: Who is Father Elijah?
translation: 以利亚长老是谁？

original: He was our Elder when we came East. A wizard with technology, really. His mind just worked that way naturally. Learned a lot from him.
translation: 我们刚到东部的时候，他是我们的长老。一个真正的科学怪才。感觉他的大脑就是为此而生的。我从他身上学到了很多东西。

original: But he started having disagreements with the other Elders. The Brotherhood's interest is in old technology. He wanted to explore developing new tech.
translation: 但他和其他长老产生了分歧。兄弟会只对古代科技感兴趣，他却想追求新科技。

original: And there were other ways he wanted to push. Other weapons. Ones with ethics questions attached. Rather than deal with him, they sent him East.
translation: 而且他还想追求别的东西。比如武器，违反伦理的那种。其他长老不想和他正面冲突，就索性把他派到了东部。

original: How do you feel about the other members?
translation: 你对其他的成员怎么看？

original: I called them family before. That's not far off. Both the good and the bad. It's like a big unending family reunion in that bunker.
translation: 我以前称他们为家人，直到不久前都是那样。他们也有好有坏。那座地堡就像一场开不完的家庭聚会。

original: There's people you love, people you'll never speak to again, and it's always awkward when you run into someone you used to date.
translation: 那儿既有你爱的人，也有你不想再见到的人，而且总能时不时撞见你交往过的男生，让人非常尴尬。

original: Does the Brotherhood protect people from raiders or other threats?
translation: 兄弟会有任务保护人民免受掠夺者或其他恶势力的威胁吗？

original: No, no. We only protect people from {emph}themselves, and only in the sense that we don't let them have the really good Pre-War toys.
translation: 不，不。我们只是保护他们免受自身的威胁。某种意义上，我们不希望他们拥有那些战前的高科技。

original: And sometimes it's more like we protect {emph}ourselves from {emph}them and hope to outlive them and become humanity's sole heirs.
translation: 有时更像是在保护{emph}我们自己{emph}免受他们的威胁，只要我们生存下去，就能成为人类唯一的火种了。

original: We've had people go rogue, though, and start helping people. One chapter had a small civil war over it. We take our isolationism seriously.
translation: 但我们也有些人背弃了理想，开始帮助他人。我们有个分部甚至还为此爆发过小规模的内战。我们非常注重与世隔绝。

original: What's the Codex?
translation: 法典是什么？

original: Ah, the Codex. If it's in there, we have to abide it, if it's not, it's not important.
translation: 啊，法典。信仰它的人必须遵守它，但对不信仰的人来说，它没什么意义。

original: It documents our history, too. Part of what Scribes like me do is update it. Hmm... I wonder...
translation: 它也记录了我们的历史。部分学士，比如我，也会对其进行编纂。嗯，我很好奇……

original: Nah, they'd probably catch it if I rewrote the Founder's axioms.
translation: 不，假如我改写了创始人的箴言，他们肯定会发现的。

original: Do you like being a member?
translation: 你喜欢成为他们的一员吗？

original: I know sometimes I sound like I don't. I know. But there's something that still rings true to me about our code.
translation: 有时候我对他们的意见是挺大。可说到底，我依然坚信我们的理念。

original: There's an honor to it. We're protecting people. Even if it's from themselves, it's a good cause.
translation: 这是一种荣誉。我们在保护老百姓。哪怕只是防止他们自相残杀，那也是一项崇高的事业。

original: We just lose sight of the big picture sometimes. Treat all our practices with the same sacredness.
translation: 我们只是偶尔看不到大局，将自己所有的行为都看得无比神圣。

original: What do you do for them?
translation: 你都做些什么？

original: I'm a procurement specialist. Like I said, it's basically grocery shopping. Except sometimes the groceries are scavenged parts and arcane technology.
translation: 我是采购专员。就像我之前说的，我的任务基本就是四处收购杂物。有时还包括一些淘来的零件和古代技术。

original: The elder who brought us to the Mojave, Father Elijah, usually had me looking for these old memory units. But he'd never tell me what they were for.
translation: 带领我们进入莫哈维的以利亚长老过去常常会派我去寻找一些旧的内存组件。但他从没告诉过我它们是做什么用的。

original: Nowadays I'm usually sent to do business with traders at places like the 188. But sometimes I think it's just to keep me out of everyone's hair.
translation: 现在我被派到188贸易站这样的地方做生意。但我偶尔会觉得，他们这么做纯粹就是为了把我打发走。

original: How did you get to be a member?
translation: 你是怎么成为其中一员的？

original: More sexual favors than I can even count. I am still tired from it.
translation: 潜规则啊，次数多到数不过来。我到现在都还觉得累呢。

original: No, actually, you're born into it. My parents, their parents, so on. When you're young you can choose to leave. But it's home, so most people don't.
translation: 开玩笑的，其实我这个身份是与生俱来的。我的父母，他们的父母，等等。年轻时你可以选择离开。但毕竟家在这里，所以大部分人还是留下了。

original: We don't take on new members, really. You can do the math on our long-term prospects based on that point. I keep hoping we'll change that.
translation: 我们不接纳新成员，真的。所以你可以猜一猜长此以往我们会变成什么样。我一直都希望能有所改变。

original: What's their purpose?
translation: 他们有什么目的？

original: Ha! Good question. These days it's hard to say. Once upon a time it was about technology. Controlling it so it couldn't destroy us again.
translation: 哈！问得好。目前很难说。过去是搜集技术，将它们掌控起来，以防人类再次遭到毁灭。

original: Energy weapons and power armor are usually tops on our list, although {emph}I appreciate anything that's vintage.
translation: 能量武器和动力装甲是我们的主要搜集目标，不过我倒是对所有的古董都感兴趣。

original: But that all seems so limited now. We haven't grown or adapted. And now we're stuck in a hole, not carrying out our mission.
translation: 但现在看来，这一切都太过于局限了。我们没有与时俱进，眼下又深陷泥潭，无法再继续使命。

original: Vouch for me? How?
translation: 替我开道？怎么做？

original: No confession? No evidence? What good is that?
translation: 没有坦白？也没有证据？这算什么？

original: It was the, uh... the shifty eyes. Yeah. Dead give-away.
translation: 因为我觉得……那人贼眉鼠眼的。对，反正很可疑。

original: Try to throw me out and you'll be leaving - in pieces.
translation: 试试看把我赶出去，你会被我撕成碎片的。

original: {Terrified}Jesus Christ!
translation: {Terrified}上帝啊！

original: I have a dog tag for you.
translation: 我有个狗牌给你。

original: Thank you, every tag you bring me is one more soldier at peace.
translation: 谢谢，你每带给我一个狗牌，都意味着有一位士兵得到了安息。

original: < Speech 30 >
[SUCCEEDED] We were on patrol near the Dam when a Legion raiding party jumped us. Didn't even have time to radio it in.
translation: [成功] 当时我们在大坝附近巡逻，军团的劫掠队偷袭了我们。我们甚至都来不及用无线电做报告。

original: I was hit in the head with a machete and knocked out. Didn't kill me, though some nights I wish it had. When I woke up, my nerve was gone.
translation: 我脑袋上挨了一刀，昏了过去。虽然那一刀没砍死我，但有几个晚上，我真是疼得巴不得自己当时就死了好。醒来后，我所有的勇气都消失了。

original: The rest of my squad was crucified, butchered, mutilated. I don't know how they missed me. Maybe they didn't. Maybe they knew they'd broken me.
translation: 我的战友们全被钉上十字架、被残杀、被肢解。不知为何，他们没有对我下手。也许在他们眼中，我已经同死人无异了。

original: I gambled and drank a lot after that. Got into trouble, but the Rangers gave me a second chance instead of kicking me out. So, here I am.
translation: 在那之后，我成天赌博酗酒。惹了一身麻烦。但游骑兵并没有开除我，反而给了我第二次机会。于是，我就被派到了这里。

original: If you don't tell me, someone else will. I'd rather hear your version.
translation: 就算你不说，别人也会告诉我的。我宁可听听你的版本。

original: I need to confirm your report about Great Khans with trained Deathclaws.
translation: 我想确认一下你是否提交过大汗帮在训练死亡爪的报告。

original: You must be mistaken - I haven't filed any report like that. Trained Deathclaws? I would have remembered that.
translation: 你肯定搞错了——我没有提交过那种报告。训练死亡爪？如果真有这回事，我不可能不记得。

original: If someone is saying I filed that report, that's a load of crap. I won't have my name attached to a clerical error.
translation: 要是有人说这报告是我写的，那绝对是胡扯。这么严重的笔误，我不可能署名的。

original: There's no way the White Glove Society will be cannibals again - I've already seen to that.
translation: 白手套社团不会再吃人了，我可以担保。

original: You've been resourceful in the past. Why are you a failure now?
translation: 你过去表现得那么出色，为何如今却失败了？

original: You'd best step up your performance with this next assignment...
translation: 你最好在下个任务里好好表现……

original: The White Glove Society has agreed to an alliance with Caesar's Legion.
translation: 白手套社团已经同意与凯撒军团结盟。

original: {satisfied}Good. It will be valuable to have allies on the Strip when Hoover Dam is taken. {beat}Now, as for your next assignment...
translation: 很好，攻下胡佛水坝时，如果能得到长街的支持，那将会事半功倍。好了，关于你的下一个任务……

original: The cannibals among the White Glove Society are dead.
translation: 白手套里的食人者已经死了。

original: They'll be of no use to my Legion, then.
translation: 那他们就对军团没有用处了。

original: You squandered a potentially valuable resource. {direct}Do better with your next assignment or there will be trouble...
translation: 一个潜在的宝贵资源就这样被浪费了。{direct}下次执行任务时，你最好能多上点心，不然会有麻烦的……

original: The Boomers hate me. They'll never follow my lead.
translation: 大炮族讨厌我。他们不会听我指挥的。

original: {irritated - the solution is obvious}Then you'll have to be extraordinarily persuasive. Or kill them - their leaders, at least.
translation: 那你除非有三寸不烂之舌，否则就只能除掉他们——至少，也要清除他们的领导层。

original: Get to it, will you? You're wasting my time.
translation: 快去吧，好吗？你这是在浪费时间。

original: Why must Mr. House be killed?
translation: 为什么一定要杀死豪斯先生？

original: Because he complicates the equation of force. He's a free agent, an unpredictable element.
translation: 因为他打破了势力间的均衡。他不受任何一方约束，是个不稳定因素。

original: I'm sure he's trying to sit out this battle, just as he did four years ago, hoping the Legion and the Profligates will wipe each other out.
translation: 我敢肯定他这次还会像四年前一样作壁上观，盼着军团和荒淫之人两败俱伤。

original: When he sees the Profligates losing this battle, however, he might throw his support behind them. Except he won't, because he'll be dead.
translation: 不过，如果这次荒淫之人输掉的话，他可能会派出援军。当然，假如他死了，我们就不必再操心了。

original: What should I expect at the dam?
translation: 大坝的战事将会如何？

original: {Lah-nee-OOS}Lanius will be waiting for you. Your arrival will signal to him that it's time to launch the attack.
translation: {Lah-nee-OOS}拉尼厄斯会等你的。只要你一到，他就会发起进攻。

original: As for what to expect, it's going to be the greatest battle - and victory - mankind has seen since it almost wiped itself off the face of the Earth.
translation: 能够料想的是，这将是人类自几乎灭绝以来所经历的规模最大的一场战役——也将是一次最为伟大的胜利。

original: Tactically, it's simple - kill and kill some more. I may have a few surprises in store for the NCR, but that won't concern you.
translation: 战术上其实很简单，就是能杀多少杀多少。我也许会给NCR留一点小惊喜，不过这与你无关。

original: Tell me about Vulpes Inculta.
translation: 说说沃尔普斯·因库塔吧。

original: {WUHL-pace}Vulpes is the best of my {Froo-men-TAR-ee}Frumentarii. A remarkable individual from an unremarkable tribe south of the Utah.
translation: 沃尔普斯是我手下最优秀的特务。他虽然来自犹他一个不起眼的部落，却拥有极其出众的本领。

original: He was brought into the Legion as a boy, survived training, fought well enough as a Legionary to be promoted to the rank of {deh-CAN-us}Decanus.
translation: 他在孩童时期就进入了军团，几经磨练后，优异的表现令他从普通士兵一跃升为伍长。

original: Then, in battle against an {dismissive}unimportant tribe, he broke ranks and led his {con-too-BUR-nee-um - a Roman squad}contubernium through a hole in their defenses to capture its chieftain.
translation: 后来，在对抗一支不起眼的小部落的战斗中，他擅自违反军令，带领同帐小队穿过敌军的防守空当，活捉了他们的首领。

original: {amused}Well, his {ken-too-REE-on}Centurion wanted him crucified for disobedience. So I made him a {froo-men-TAR-eye}Frumentarii.
translation: 他的百夫长本打算以军法将他处死。是我亲自发话，才将他破格提拔为军团特工。

original: I've heard rumors of your legate, Lanius. What's his story?
translation: 我听说过很多有关特使拉尼厄斯的谣言。他有什么故事？

original: He killed fifteen before they brought him down. He didn't die, obviously.
translation: 在被打倒前，他一共杀了15个人。当然，他自己没有死。

original: I had him tended to. He was {beat}maimed, most of his face torn off. It was days before he regained consciousness.
translation: 我收留了他。他整个人都残了，脸也没了一大半。过了好几天，他才恢复了意识。

original: When he did, I went to his bedside and showed him the helmet I'd had forged to cover his face. I said he could have it if he'd fight for me.
translation: 他醒来后，我坐到他的床边，给他看了一顶头盔，那是我为了遮掩他受伤的面部而特意为他打造的。我告诉他，只要为我效命，头盔就是他的。

original: He accepted... on condition that he be allowed to kill the surviving males of his tribe. {chuckle}I said, make it the {emph}adult males and you have a deal.{Children are malleable and thus valuable to the Legion.}
translation: 他接受了……开出的条件是，他必须亲手宰掉自己部落中所有剩余的男子。我说，只能是成年男子，否则我不会应允。

original: What happened when Lanius attacked his own tribe?
translation: 拉尼厄斯为啥会对自己的族人拔刀相向？

original: And I've heard it's a bad idea to tempt the wrath of {KAI-zar}Caesar. Change the subject.
translation: 我也听说随便试探凯撒的底线是很危险的。换个话题吧。

original: I've heard the commander of the first battle was called "The Burned Man."
translation: 我听说第一场战役的指挥官叫"浴火者。"

original: What's your opinion of President Kimball?
translation: 你觉得金博尔总统怎样？

original: A man of potential, held back by the {slight beat}craven political context he inhabits. You realize he was a general? "The Hero of the Mojave," they called him.
translation: 很有潜质的一个人，可惜却被懦弱的政权拴住了手脚。你能看出他曾经当过将军吗？"莫哈维的英雄"，当时人们都这么叫他。

original: A title he earned by extirpating lesser tribes that dared attack NCR citizens. His responses were {approving}swift and draconian.
translation: 他曾在铲除部族武装的战斗中立下过汗马功劳，那些小部族入侵过NCR，而他领导的反击不仅果断，而且强硬。

original: President Tandi, the "founding mother," coddled hostile tribes... but her successors were less naive, so they gave Kimball free rein.
translation: 坦蒂总统，他们的"国母"，惯坏了那些敌对部落…但她的继任者就没那么天真了，所以他们给了金博尔极大的自主权。

original: And after a respectable military career, what does he do? Become a {distaste}politician.
translation: 可在度过了一段受人尊崇的戎马生涯后，他又做了什么呢？成了一名政客。

original: But he did so by {disapproving}election. What better way to stunt the growth of leaders, not to mention whole cultures?
translation: 但他却是通过选举上位的。还有什么能比这个更加阻碍领袖的成长呢？更别提整个文化了。

original: A leader shouldn't have to kowtow to those who serve him. With so much energy wasted on those below, how is he ever to move forward?
translation: 一名领袖不应该向他所领导的人民卑躬屈膝。把精力全都浪费在比他低贱的人身上，那又如何能带领人民进步？

original: Had he taken the government by force, used his army to stage a coup, things would be very different.
translation: 如果他用武力夺权，用军队维持秩序，那一切就会截然不同。

original: I'll just have to do it for him.
translation: 而我会替他完成这个目标。

original: Isn't it natural for someone like Kimball to seek greater power?
translation: 像金博尔这样的人，追求权力不是很正常吗？

original: It'll frighten them. If I can reach out and kill whomever I choose, then they know the only reason they're alive is I haven't tried yet.
translation: 会令他们畏惧。如果所有人的生死都在我的一念之间，那他们就会明白，他们能活到今天，纯粹是因为我的仁慈。

original: You have to understand that Kimball is a symbol. Without him, there would be no NCR occupation of the Mojave.
translation: 你必须明白，金博尔是个象征。没有他，NCR根本无法占领莫哈维。

original: He mustered the troops - {distaste}as many as his senate would allow - and sent them in. All the right reasons, done all the wrong ways.
translation: 是他依靠着参议院的许可，集结了军队，把他们送到这里来的。目标很正确，可惜方法错了。

original: Any invasion by a democracy is a half-measure. When Kimball dies, the NCR will {emphasis}recoil from the Mojave, and from his legacy.
translation: 任何民主政权发动的侵略都不会长久。只要金博尔一死，NCR就会撤出莫哈维，他所留下的一切都将化为泡影。

original: By the time they recover and try to strike back, I'll be invading them.
translation: 等他们恢复元气，试图反击之时，我就将入侵他们的领地。

original: How will the NCR react to Kimball's death? Won't it just anger them?
translation: 如果金博尔死了，NCR会有什么反应？不会惹怒他们吧？

original: What do you think of the Brotherhood of Steel?
translation: 你怎么看钢铁兄弟会？

original: The worst impulses of mankind, concentrated in one insane, backward tribe.
translation: 一个既疯狂又落后的部族，集合了人类当中最狂热的分子。

original: The Brotherhood seems to have formed not long after the great atomic war. It's hard to know - they care little for history.
translation: 兄弟会似乎在核大战后不久就成立了。实际情况不太清楚，他们自己也很少关心历史。

original: Some of the Brotherhood scribes we captured further East didn't even know the name of their founder, Roger Maxson.
translation: 我们在东部抓到的一些兄弟会学士甚至连他们的创始人罗杰·麦克森都不认识。

original: They like to pretty up their mission with trappings of chivalry, but the truth is they're hoarders. They hoard technology.
translation: 他们喜欢用骑士精神来粉饰自己的行为，可这些家伙其实就是一群野蛮人，把科技当图腾来崇拜。

original: It's been 200 years, and they still have the mentality of scavengers. They say they're preserving these technologies, but for what?
translation: 已经200年了，他们的行为方式却还和捡破烂差不多。说是为了保护旧时的技术，可保护了又能怎么样呢？

original: They have no vision. They offer no future. They're a dead end.
translation: 他们目光短浅，缺乏长远打算。跟着他们只有死路一条。

original: Silus, the {Ken-TOO-ree-on}Centurion who let himself get captured, died at McCarran before he could reveal sensitive information.
translation: 希鲁斯, 那个被俘的百夫长，一个字都没吐就死在了麦卡伦营地。

original: Chief Hanlon, a nemesis of my Legion, died the humiliating death he deserved.
translation: 军士长汉隆，曾经数次与我们作对，如今却在屈辱中死去，真是罪有应得。

original: In Boulder City, you let the renegade Khans go free, but left NCR troopers gurgling on the ground, drowning in their own blood.
translation: 你在巨石城放走了大汗帮的人，却让NCR的部队溃不成军，死伤惨重。

original: {WUHL-pace in-CUHL-tah}Vulpes Inculta, the best of my {froo-men-TAR-ee}frumentarii, is dead.
translation: 沃尔普斯·因库塔,我最好的{froo-men-TAR-ee}特务官，已经死了。

original: {player killed Omerta leaders}All the bribes I sent to the Omertas ended up buying me {beat}nothing.
translation: 这下我送给黑手党的那些钱全打了水漂。

original: That I'd decorate this tent with your guts.
translation: 我要用你的内脏来装饰这顶敞篷。

original: {Pray-TOR-ee-ahns}Praetorians, to me!
translation: {Pray-TOR-ee-ahns}禁卫军，快过来！

original: Death to tyrants! <Start combat.>
translation: 受死吧！<开始战斗>

original: Praetorians, to arms!
translation: 禁卫军，准备战斗！

original: Mr. House sent me to infiltrate your camp.
translation: 豪斯先生派我潜入你们的营地。

original: Mission accomplished, asshole. {playing with him}I never would've suspected a thing if you hadn't told me - but now I'll have to have you killed.
translation: 那你的任务算是完成了，混蛋。你要是不告诉我，我还不会怀疑你。可惜现在，我只能除掉你了。

original: Have you heard anything unusual about any of the other Ranger stations?
translation: 其他的那些游骑兵驻站，你听到什么消息了吗？

original: Nothing as severe. Charlie seems to be getting a lot of extra medical supplies for some reason, while Bravo hasn't requested a resupply in a while.
translation: 没什么特别的。查理驻站不知为何得到了一大批额外的医药补给，而布拉沃驻站已经有好一阵子没申请物资补给了。

original: Echo has been reporting heavy Legion activity down on their end, but that's about it.
translation: 艾柯驻站报告说军团在他们那儿的活动十分频繁，不过也就那样。

original: Not without a fight. <Attack.>
translation: 打赢了我再说吧。<攻击。>

original: Good thing you're wearing a skirt, makes pissing yourself go easier. <Attack.>
translation: 还好你穿着短裙，这样至少不会尿到裤子上。<攻击。>

original: {Afraid}Brothers, help!
translation: {Afraid}兄弟们，救命！

original: I came seeking yours, skirt boy. <Attack.>
translation: 我是特地来要你们命的，穿短裙的娘娘腔。<攻击。>

original: {Afraid}Brothers, help!
translation: {Afraid}兄弟们，救命！

original: You just messed with the wrong gal. <Attack.>
translation: 你惹错人了。<攻击。>

original: Brothers! Attack!
translation: 兄弟们！攻击 !

original: You just messed with the wrong guy. <Attack.>
translation: 你惹错人了。<攻击。>

original: Brothers! Attack!
translation: 兄弟们！攻击 !

original: Can you tell me where Troike is?
translation: 你能告诉我卓伊克在哪吗？

original: Troike spends all his days down in Zoara on the lower level.
translation: 卓伊克大部分时间都在无眠俱乐部的楼下。

original: Troike is dead, but I'm sure you know that.
translation: 卓伊克已经死了，相信你也知道。

original: Do you know someone named Clanden?
translation: 你知道一个叫克兰顿的人吗？

original: Yeah. I know him.{unhappy, spoken with contempt} You'll probably find him in his room upstairs. He usually just sends down for girls or food.
translation: 嗯，知道。{unhappy, spoken with contempt}你可以在他楼上的房间里找到他。通常只有食物和女人才能让他下楼。

original: I'm leaving you here.
translation: 我不管你了。

original: Baby, you can't just leave me tied up! Those Legion boys'll put me on a cross for the mess you made - if I'm lucky!
translation: 宝贝，你不能就这样丢下我！那些军团流氓看到你留下这个烂摊子，一定会把我钉在十字架上的——那还是算我走运了！

original: {ambushing the player while using Stealth Boy}Thanks for getting me outta there! Now for once will you just {emphasis, player's resilience is vexing}lay down and stay down?
translation: {ambushing the player while using Stealth Boy}多谢你帮我离开了那笼子！ 这回你可不可以{emphasis, player's resilience is vexing}乖乖合作点？

original: How ya like being Mister Goody-Two-Shoes, hey? How's it feeling?
translation: 当和事老感觉很满足吧，嘿？感觉如何啊？

original: How ya like being Miss Goody-Two-Shoes, hey? How's it feeling?
translation: 当和事老感觉很满足吧，嘿？感觉如何啊？

original: What if I helped you escape?
translation: 我帮助你逃出去怎样？

original: Sweet to offer, baby, but if you cut these ropes, every Legionary in this camp's gonna come running. With machetes.
translation: 那真是太好了，宝贝，但只要你一解开绳子，那些军团士兵就会举着大砍刀冲过来的。

original: Now on the other hand, if I had a Stealth Boy and a Bobby Pin, I could see myself out. Know what I mean?
translation: 换种思路，如果我有个隐身小子和一枚发夹，我就能自己逃出去了。懂我的意思吗？

original: < Speech - 45 >
[SUCCEEDED] I can't believe I'm doing this, but all right, the hostages can go. The NCR had better keep their end of the deal, though.
translation: [成功] 我真不敢相信自己会同意，好吧，人质可以走了。不过NCR最好能说话算话。

original: Here - a souvenir for you. It's Benny's lighter. Shove it up his ass when you catch up with him.
translation: 这个送你，就当留个纪念吧。这是本尼的打火机。等你追上他，记得替我把这玩意塞进他的屁眼里。

original: Free the hostages now, and I'll have the NCR escort you out of their territory.
translation: 现在立马放了人质，然后我会让NCR护送你们离开。

original: What about you?
translation: 你呢？

original: I'm not one for running a business. Never really had a head for numbers or smooth-talk. My talents are a little more... direct.
translation: 我不是做生意的料。我的脑子不擅长做数学题或是和人打交道。我的才能……比较简单粗暴。

original: Mama always said that was my gift. When we were kids, the others used to fight over and steal one another's toys. I always broke mine.
translation: 老妈总说这是我的天赋。小时候其他孩子喜欢打打闹闹，抢别人玩具，我却总是把自己的玩具给弄坏。

original: And if the others messed with me, I broke theirs too. Sometimes I'd break them even if they were nice to me, just to show them what's what.
translation: 如果别人敢惹我，我就把他们的玩具也弄坏。有时就算他们对我好，我也会这么干，我只想教他们一点规矩。

original: One day mama took me aside and said, "Boy, you're never going to go very far, but you're going to make a whole lotta people come up short."
translation: 后来有一天，我妈把我叫到一旁，说："小子，你这辈子注定成不了大事，但你也可以让其他人走不长远。"

original: Why don't you just shoot your way out of here?
translation: 你为什么不杀出一条血路离开这里？

original: I'm not afraid of a gunfight, but I'd rather get back to Red Rock without a few extra holes in me if I can help it.
translation: 我倒是不怕战斗，但我还是宁愿平平安安地回到红岩峡谷，不用在身上加几个弹孔。

original: How did you end up joining the Legion?
translation: 你是怎么加入军团的？

original: When the Legion showed up, we fought, most tribes did. Hangdogs hung out longer than most... {beat}broke us by throwing our dogs on the fire.
translation: 军团来袭的时候，我们奋起抵抗，其他部落大多也是这么做的。罪狗部落撑得久一些……{beat}可当他们把我们的狗扔进火堆时，我们崩溃了。

original: {A little quiet, to himself, painful memory - scornful he ever believed this}So we gave up, our elders couldn't bear the idea of our spirit animals burning in the afterlife.
translation: {A little quiet, to himself, painful memory - scornful he ever believed this}我们只能投降，长老们无法眼睁睁地看着我们的守护神被火烧死。

original: {Rallies}Caesar was impressed enough to conscript us, use our skills with dogs to join the Legion as houndmasters.
translation: {Rallies}但凯撒却不计前嫌，将我们招致麾下。由于我们出色的驯犬能力，我们加入了军团，成为了驯犬师。

original: Can I go in?
translation: 我可以进去吗？

original: {he does know}Well, I don't know. Depends on if you can make it worth my time. A hundred caps sounds right to me.
translation: {he does know}我不知道。取决于你愿意掏多少钱了，100个瓶盖应该够了。

original: Tell Caesar I accept his invitation.
translation: 告诉凯撒，我接受他的邀请。

original: {Strip}Seek {KAI-zar}Caesar by way of Cottonwood Cove, south of Nelson. The Cursor Lucullus will be waiting.
translation: 去纳尔逊南面的棉白杨湾。库瑟·卢库勒斯会在那儿等你的。

original: Show me what you have for sale.
translation: 让我看看你都卖些什么。

original: Have a look.
translation: 看吧。

original: Do you know Doc Mitchell?
translation: 你知道米切尔医生吗？

original: {Surprised}You mean Mitch? It's been ages since I've heard the name. My sister and I used to call him "Mole-butt." Don't ask.
translation: {Surprised}你是说米奇？我已经好多年没听到这个名字了。我妹妹和我曾经管他叫"鼠屁股"。别问我为什么。

original: That was a long time ago, before we exchanged the warmth of our home for the thin air of the Wasteland.
translation: 都是陈年往事啦，后来我们放弃了避难所温暖的家，换来的却是废土稀薄的空气。

original: You know Doc Mitchell?
translation: 你认识米切尔医生？

original: Mitch!? You mean "mole-butt?"
translation: 米奇！？你认识“鼠屁屁”？

original: I hadn't thought about that name in a long time. I was just a child, and... he had a big mole in his rear bumper.
translation: 我很久都没听到过这个名字了。那时我还是个孩子，他屁股上有颗很大的痣。

original: You understand, kids and all that. Everyone knows about each other in a Vault, there's no other way. I hope mol... I mean Mitch, is doing well!
translation: 小孩子之间那些事嘛，你懂的。那时还在避难所里，大家彼此都很熟。我希望鼠……米奇过得幸福！

original: I'll let you in, later, when you're ready for a night to remember.
translation: 晚些再来找你，我会让你度过一个难忘的夜晚的。

original: You're kicking me into gear, huh? Well, I think I'll drive my chassis over to your pad. Wait for me down there and, don't forget the oil.
translation: {Playful Seduction}怎么，你想和我大战三百回合？小心我让你底盘冒烟哦。在下面等着吧！别忘了带润滑油。

original: I have no money for your toll. Surely you will let a fair traveler pass through your gate.
translation: 我没钱付通行费，看在我是个善良的旅行者的份上，你就让我过去吧。

original: {Thoughtful}Very well, traveller{difficulty with the word}. You may pass.{laughs}
translation: {Thoughtful}好吧，旅行者{difficulty with the word}。你过去吧。{laughs}

original: You don't need toys. I bet you can get a fun game of Boomers and targets.
translation: 你不需要玩具，听说过“炮兵和靶子”的游戏吗？很有趣的。

original: I'm planning on playing some games in the Casino.
translation: 我想去赌场玩几把。

original: Of course, after all you did for me, here are some chips for you. Play, have some fun.
translation: 当然，你摆平了这么多事情，拿着这些筹码去玩吧，玩高兴点。

original: You play some games, have some fun. You did right by us.
translation: 去找点乐子吧，你可是帮了我们不少忙。

original: {Laughs}Real subtle. Here you go. Play some games. Have some fun.
translation: {笑}挺狡猾的嘛。拿去吧，玩开心点。

original: Yeah, it looks great.
translation: 好啊，挺不错的。

original: But you're probably here for more of my special commodity, and luckily for you, I haven't been idle since we last spoke.
translation: 不过你应该是来找我求购特殊商品的吧。幸好，上次你走后，我也没闲着。

original: However, all that hard work on my part means that the price has gone up. 100 a tip, now. You game?
translation: 只是价钱恐怕要抬高了，否则对不起我这一番辛劳啊。现在是100个瓶盖一条情报，买吗？

original: I've heard here and there that the word "Hope" has recently become quite popular with the Squatters.
translation: 听人说，最近"希望"这个词突然在流民当中很火。

original: But that's all I've heard. If I knew more, I'd try to bilk you out of more caps. You interested in one of my other tips?
translation: 可惜我只打听到这些，否则的话，我肯定会狠狠敲你一笔。所以，要不要再来一条情报？

original: What's with the snowglobe collection?
translation: 雪花球收藏是怎么回事？

original: Not many people know this, but Mr. House is one of the world's biggest collectors of antique snow globes!
translation: 鲜有人知道，豪斯先生可是世界上最大的古董雪花球收藏家哦！

original: If you happen to find any out in the Wasteland, you can bring them to me and I'll add them to his collection! You'll get a reward, of course.
translation: 如果你在废土碰巧找到这种小玩意，可以把它们交给我，我会将它们加入他的收藏。当然啦，你也会得到一些奖励。

original: In fact, one of Mr. House's favorites went missing when we moved the collection. If you have a look around the Lucky 38, you might even find it!
translation: 事实上，我们在整理收藏柜时就不小心落了一个。如果你在幸运38周围找找，很可能就会找得到呢！

original: You do? Why, that's just wonderful! I'll take it and put it with the rest of the collection.
translation: 你有吗？太好了！我会立刻把这件和其他收藏放在一起。

original: I've got a snowglobe for Mr. House's collection.
translation: 我有一个雪花球要交给豪斯先生。

original: You do? Why, that's just wonderful! I'll take them and put them with the rest of the collection.
translation: 你有吗？太好了！我立刻把这几件和其他收藏放在一起。

original: I've got some snowglobes for Mr. House's collection.
translation: 我有一些雪花球要交给豪斯先生。

original: What kind of robots are you?
translation: 你到底算是哪种机器人？

original: Why, I'm a RobCo PDQ-88b {Mark}Mk I Securitron, you silly goose! We're the finest in personal or civil robotic security on the market!
translation: 傻孩子，我可是罗科PDQ-88bI型电子保安！我们是市面上最好的个人和民用电子安保机器人 !

original: What's the goal?
translation: 目标是什么？

original: Your objective is to reach a control room halfway across the dam and install an override module similar to the one you used at the Substation.
translation: 你的目标是前往在大坝中部的控制室，安装一个强制控制模组，就像你在电站里用过的那个。

original: The override will enable me to control the entire dam's power output.
translation: 这个控制模组可允许使用者操纵整座大坝的电力输出。

original: You may remember how the bunker at the Fort was rather dimly lit? Well, just like the Lucky 38, it needs a big jolt of electricity to power up.
translation: 你还记得城堡下的那座地堡里灯光昏暗吧？和幸运38一样，它需要强大的电流才能正常运作。

original: You've already uploaded the new operating system to the Securitrons. All they need is power and they'll be in fighting trim.
translation: 你已经为电子保安上传了新的操作系统。只要再给它们一些电力，它们就能所向披靡。

original: As I've said, your objective is to install an override module in the control room halfway across the dam. Are you ready to perform this task?
translation: 如我所说，你的目标是前往在大坝中部的控制室，安装一个强制控制模组。你准备好执行这次任务了吗？

original: What more could I have done?
translation: 我还能怎么办？

original: You could have succeeded!
translation: 你本来能成功的！

original: Does the NCR usually offer bounties on people?
translation: NCR经常悬赏抓人么？

original: If they've proven hard to kill, yes. Whatever it takes to get the job done, even if it means hiring help from outside the military.
translation: 只要是很难对付的人，我们就会张榜悬赏。不论方法，不计代价，就算雇用非军方人员来处理，也在所不惜。

original: Where was I supposed to meet Price, again?
translation: 在哪我才能在遇到普莱斯？

original: Pawn shop in Westside called Miguel's. It's in Outer Vegas, northwest of the Strip.
translation: 西区的米格尔典当铺，在维加斯外围，长街的西北面。

original: Blake is where, exactly?
translation: 布莱克在哪，准确的位置？

original: The Crimson Caravan is up north past the Gun Runners. During the day Blake is usually in their main office.
translation: 深红商队就在军火贩子地盘的北边，白天布莱克通常都待在办事处。

original: Remind me where Isaac is.
translation: 再和我说一次艾萨克在哪。

original: The Gun Runners are almost straight north of here. A little east. Isaac has a house in their compound.
translation: 军火贩子的聚居地大致在此地的正北边，往东走一点。艾萨克的屋子就在他们的地盘里。

original: I'm going to pollute the ventilation system with the stinking corpse of an NCR private.
translation: 我打算把一具NCR列兵的尸体塞进营地的通风管道。

original: Oh my God, are you okay? You've gotta get to a medic. Doc Kemp can patch you up back at base.
translation: 哦，天哪，你没事儿吧？你必须马上接受治疗。基地的肯普医生可以给你包扎一下。

original: How could you just sacrifice your body like that? You never even met him. If the NCR doesn't have a medal for this, they should make one up.
translation: 你何苦这样置生死于度外呢？你跟他明明素不相识。NCR真该给你颁个勋章，如果没有，就让他们临时给你造一个。

original: Who's in charge of the Powder Gangers?
translation: 谁在掌管炸药帮？

original: Right now, Eddie and his boys run the place. They've got the guns and the dynamite, so they call the shots.
translation: 目前掌管这个地方的是埃迪和他的手下。他们有枪和炸药，所以在这儿他们是老大。

original: What's your reason for staying?
translation: 为什么你要留在这？

original: The location by the highway makes it a good spot to shake down any travelers passing through. That's why Eddie and the rest are still around.
translation: 靠近公路的地理位置，使得这里成为了伏击过往行人的理想地点。所以埃迪和其他人才留着不走。

original: Me, I like having big walls between myself and the wasteland.
translation: 至于我，比起做废土游民，还是待在高墙里更舒服。

original: Why are you "sort of" the doctor?
translation: 为什么说你只能"勉强"算个医生？

original: I was an NCR medic for six months, so I'm not exactly a "doctor." Still, it's more medical training than any of the other guys here.
translation: 我在NCR当过六个月的医疗兵，所以我不是一个真正的"医生"。不过，我受过的医疗训练仍然比这里的其他人要多。

original: It also gives me an excuse to stay out of any raiding parties. The gang can't lose its only doctor now, can it?
translation: 所以我也有借口不必和他们一块儿去打劫了，帮会里总不能没有医生，对吧？

original: I need a doctor.
translation: 我需要一个医生。

original: The fact that you're still on your feet is... surprising.
translation: 你居然还能站着……真令人惊讶。

original: Life can be pretty rough sometimes.
translation: 生活不易啊。

original: I've seen worse.
translation: 还不算太糟。

original: Show me what you have for sale.
translation: 给我看看你都卖些什么。

original: If I don't have anything you like, well... tough. I don't do special orders.
translation: 如果我这儿没有你喜欢的东西，嗯……那你忍着吧。我不接受特别订单。

original: You got it.
translation: 我马上照办。

original: What are the most dangerous places in the Wasteland?
translation: 废土最危险的地方在哪里？

original: {Hint of Irony}Hell, it's all dangerous. Know why? Because you can't trust anything that stands on two legs.
translation: {Hint of Irony}妈的，哪里都危险。知道为什么吗？因为所有长着两条腿的东西都不可信。

original: If you're looking for real trouble, head straight into the mountains. Men don't walk up there, for good reasons, kid.
translation: 你要是真想跟自己过不去，那就往山里走吧。人类是不会到那儿去的，理由很充分，孩子。

original: If you're looking for real trouble, head straight into the mountains. Men don't walk up there, for good reasons, kid.
translation: 你要是真想跟自己过不去，那就往山里走吧。人类是不会到那儿去的，理由很充分，孩子。

original: Chavez has been dealt with. You won't see him around here anymore.
translation: 查韦兹已经完蛋了，你再也不会看见他了。

original: I'm happy you cleared that up for me, but we've got another situation to worry about. There's a merchant hanging around near the prison.
translation: 很高兴你帮我除掉了那个杂种，但又出了个状况，监狱附近有个商人在晃悠。

original: Something feels funny about him, and I want you to deal with him. Shake him down if he's legit, but if not, take him out.
translation: 感觉这人有点可笑，你去和他打个交道。如果他是干合法生意的，就勒索他一把，如果他另有目的，就做了他。

original: Okay, I need some answers, now. These guys just barged in here and said they were under orders to keep me here until you arrived.
translation: 好了，我需要个说法。这帮人刚刚突然闯进来，说他们接到命令，让我必须留在原地，等你过来。

original: I'm about five seconds away from telling my men to take 'em down, so speak fast.
translation: 如果你再晚来五秒钟，我就要命令手下把他们干掉了。所以你有话快说。

original: Ambassador Crocker said to come see you about the situation with the Kings in Freeside.
translation: 克罗克大使叫我来协助你处理一下自由城猫王帮的事。

original: Its X-25 gatling laser, produced to spec by Glastinghouse, Inc., is deadly against soft targets at medium range...
translation: 它配备了由伽马镜屋有限公司制造的X-25激光加特林，能对中等距离的普通目标给予致命打击……

original: All of this, you probably already knew...
translation: 这一切，你可能早就知道了……

original: Freeside's problems are too big for you to have much impact.
translation: 自由城的问题已经太严重了，很难再有改变了。

original: Oh yeah, I heard some new things that you might find interesting. I'm going to have to start charging 100 caps per tip, though.
translation: 哦，对了，我又打听到一些消息，也许你会感兴趣。不过每条情报我要收你100个瓶盖。

original: After all, I have to save up for my ticket out of here, right? So how about it? Want a tip?
translation: 毕竟，我总得存点钱，才能买张票离开这里，对吧？怎么样？要情报吗 ?

original: Now you'll get some respect. You should give some hell to the people that used to push you around.
translation: 应该让自己先出人头地。然后找到当初那些对你无礼的人，把他们狠狠教训一顿。

original: Yeah... yeah, that's a good idea. They'll learn that they shouldn't have messed with me. Just wait till they get what's coming to them!
translation: 是啊……是啊，这是个好主意。一定要让他们悔不当初。那些人就等着遭报应吧！

original: Would you be willing to give me the control tower access key so I can check it out?
translation: 你能把控制塔的进门口令给我，好让我进去查看一下吗？

original: Sure, if you want to investigate. It's not like there's anything to steal up there. Just a bunch of old communications equipment.
translation: 如果你真想调查的话，那当然可以。反正里面也没什么可偷的，就是一堆老式通讯设备。

original: If you can find out any more, I'd be interested to hear it.
translation: 要是你还能找到别的东西，那我倒是要洗耳恭听了。

original: There's something about this I really don't like, and if I weren't tied up here I'd be staking it out personally.
translation: 这儿有些东西我实在看不惯，要不是我走不开，早就自己去追查这件事了。

original: What do I do when I'm at the train?
translation: 我上了火车以后该怎么做？

original: Put the bomb in one of the vents inside the train on the back wall, towards the joint that connects the cars. Arm it, and get out of there.
translation: 把炸弹安到车厢尾部连接处的一座通风口里。启动炸弹，然后下车走人。

original: I've also left some bomb ingredients in with the explosives. You are to take those to the footlocker of Private Crenshaw.
translation: 我还留了些制作炸弹的原料，就和炸弹放在一起。你可以把那些东西丢进列兵克伦肖的脚柜。

original: Crenshaw's a problem child. Lots of run-ins with his superiors. It'll be easy for them to believe he's working for the Legion.
translation: 克伦肖是个问题儿童，曾多次顶撞上司。所以他们很容易就会相信他是军团的卧底。

original: I'm trying to get to the Strip. Know anything that could help me out?
translation: 我想去长街。你能不能给我指条明路？

original: You're looking to get past those tin cans at the gate, right? They let people by all the time, if they've got the caps.
translation: 你是想绕过那些把守大门的铁皮罐头吧？其实只要你有瓶盖，他们是不会阻拦你的。

original: But if you're not rich, and I can tell you ain't, the King might be able to help you out, provided he likes you.
translation: 可如果你很穷——我也看得出你穷——也许猫王可以帮你，但前提是他得喜欢你。

original: Tell me about Dermot, your partner.
translation: 和我说说你搭档德莫特。

original: {unstable and not especially bright}What do you even mean? He's Dermot.
translation: {unstable and not especially bright}你什么意思？他可是德莫特。

original: Dermot knows how to work salvage better than any man I ever met. Doesn't go asking questions all day, neither.
translation: 德莫特比我遇到过的任何人都懂得收拾废品。他也不会整天问问题。

original: I know what you and your partner have been up to - I got the evidence from your rooms.
translation: 我知道你和你搭档在做肮脏的勾当，我在你的房间找到了证据。

original: You're right about that. {shouting for your partner, starting combat}Saint James! Got a thief here!
translation: 你说对了。{shouting for your partner, starting combat}圣詹姆斯！这儿有个贼 !

original: <200 caps> Let's do it.
translation: <200瓶盖>来吧。

original: Oh, we will, sugar. We will.
translation: 喔，当然，宝贝。当然。

original: I'll do my best to live up to my last performance.
translation: 我会尽量表现得和上次一样好的。

original: How much for your services?
translation: 你的服务要多少钱？

original: {Male PC}A pittance, sugar - and I'll leave you without a care in the world.
translation: {Male PC}用不了几个钱的，帅哥。我会让你乐不思蜀的。

original: {Male PC}Same price as before, sugar, and the same fun, too.
translation: {Male PC}和以前一样，帅哥，乐趣不减哦。

original: Sounds like life in the Legion is tough.
translation: 听起来你在军团的日子过得很艰难。

original: You don't know much about the Legion, do you? Women are like money, given as rewards, breeding stock. Liking boys is bad for the economy.
translation: 事实上营地内外都很艰难。女人的情况更糟。她们就像货币，是用来赏赐的奖品。 {Shakes head}好比育种的牲口。

original: Honestly, as long as men meet obligations and the child count, "friendships" are a sight more equal than the level of most Legion husbands and wives.
translation: 说实话，只要男人有责任感，知道照顾孩子，就连"友谊"都比大多数军团夫妻的关系都要平等。

original: I hear you were a slave of Caesar's Legion.
translation: 我听说你以前是凯撒军团的一个奴隶。

original: What Marco said is true. The Legion attacked my village when I was 16.
translation: 马可没说错。军团在我十六岁那年劫掠了我的村庄。

original: My parents were killed as examples. The rest of us, chained and dragged to some kind of camp. A Centurion there chose me as his tent servant.
translation: 我的父母成了杀鸡儆猴的牺牲品。而我们剩下的人则被拖枷带锁送到了一个营地。有个百夫长挑了我去他的营帐里当仆人。

original: He was handsome, and gentle, most of the time. Said it was our secret, and he'd protect me. Gave me little gifts, stupid things.
translation: 他很英俊，多数时候也很温柔。他说这是我们两人之间的秘密，他会保护我。还经常送给我些小礼物之类的。

original: But Caesar punishes homosexuality with death, and we nearly got caught, and there were suspicions. So when he took me out into the desert...
translation: 但凯撒对同性恋严惩不贷，我们差点被逮到，周围的人也起了疑心。后来他就带着我逃进了沙漠……

original: Well, I knew he was going to get rid of me. So I kicked him where it counts and I ran. And then swam. And ran some more. Wound up here.
translation: 呵，我知道他其实是想除掉我，于是我一脚踢中他的要害，然后撒腿就跑。我游了好远，又拼命地跑。之后就到了这儿。

original: Baby, who I am doesn't matter. I'll be anybody you need me to be. It's better that way, you'll see.
translation: 宝贝，我是谁无关紧要，只要你喜欢，我可以是任何身份。这样更好，你会明白的。

original: Tell me about yourself.
translation: 和我说说你自己吧。

original: I'm just a fantasy come to life. But you already knew that.
translation: 我只是个传说罢了。不过你已经知道了。

original: Tell me about yourself.
translation: 和我说说你自己吧。

original: No thanks.
translation: 不了，谢谢。

original: Fine by me. You the one missing out on all the exciting details.
translation: 无所谓，反正错过精彩部分的人是你。

original: <300 caps> Here's your money.
translation: <300瓶盖> 这是给你的钱。

original: Get ready, honey. I'm going to make it good for you.
translation: 准备好了，甜心。我会让你飘飘欲仙的。

original: {mischievous - she's what the player will be slipping into}Let me help you slip into something a little more comfortable.
translation: {mischievous - she's what the player will be slipping into}让我来教你怎样会更舒服一些吧。

original: I'm going to make your toes curl, baby.
translation: 我会让你激情难耐的，宝贝。

original: So get on the bed already. I got something to show you.
translation: 乖乖躺到床上去吧，我来给你展示一番。

original: How much does it cost to hire you?
translation: 和你睡一晚需要多少钱？

original: It's worth every cap, baby. I'll do things to you you didn't even think was possible, and leave you feeling like everything's right in the world.
translation: 我保证你能值回票价，宝贝。哪怕你觉得不可能的事，我也能做，我会让你觉得世间万物是如此畅快。

original: I'm not surprised. Whip out your caps and away we go.
translation: 不出我所料。把瓶盖掏出来，咱们就办正事。

original: I'd like your services.
translation: 我想要你的服务。

original: Wouldn't you make more money working on the Strip?
translation: 你难道不想去长街工作，多赚些钱？

original: I got my start at the Gomorrah. Good money, but I saw how those Omertas hook girls on free Jet or Med-X - then start charging.
translation: 我开始在蛾摩拉干过，收入不错，但我发现黑手党会利用免费的杰特和吗啡引诱那些女孩，再开始向她们收钱。

original: Slavery through a needle is what that is. I earn less out here, but I keep more.
translation: 在潜移默化中奴役她们，这就是蛾摩拉的阴谋。我虽然在这里挣得少，但我存的多。

original: Tell me about yourself.
translation: 和我说说你自己吧。

original: I'm called Sweetie because I'm the sweetest piece you'll ever find anywhere outside of the Strip.
translation: 我叫小甜甜，因为我是你在长街外能找到的最甜美的女人。其实只要我愿意，我完全可以留在赌场里工作。

original: Take a look at this ledger I found in Dermot's room.
translation: 你看看我在德莫特的房间里找到的这个账本吧。

original: I'll take a look, but you better have a good reason for asking me to violate his privacy.
translation: 我会看的，但你最好能给我一个充分点的理由，这可是在侵犯他人的隐私啊。

original: {mounting fury}What?... Those bastards! Selling folks off to the Fiends? Selling children - to Cook-Cook...?
translation: {mounting fury}什么？……那些混蛋！居然把人卖给恶魔帮？把孩子卖给——大厨库克？

original: {Resolving to kill them.}I've seen enough. They're done for, both of them.
translation: {Resolving to kill them.}我看不下去了。他们完了，他们俩都完了。

original: {Cook-Cook dead}You might be interested to know that I killed a Fiend named Cook-Cook.
translation: {Cook-Cook dead}我杀掉了恶魔帮一个叫大厨库克的，你应该会感兴趣吧。

original: I'm interested in learning more about Dermot and Saint James.
translation: 我有兴趣多了解一些德莫特和圣詹姆斯的事。

original: They don't look like much, but they earn a pretty good living by selling scrap and salvage.
translation: 他们虽然看起来并不富裕，但靠着卖破烂倒是过得挺不错。

original: Dermot saves his money. Saint James spends his on Sweetie. A good customer, that one.
translation: 德莫特会存钱。圣詹姆斯则把钱都花在了小甜甜身上。那家伙是个不错的主顾。

original: Tell me about Sweetie.
translation: 跟我说说小甜甜。

original: Oh, I know everything - how she smells, how she tastes, how it feels to slip her on and wiggle.{Ha!}
translation: 哦，我对她可是了如指掌——她的味道，还有骑在她身上扭动时的感觉。{Ha!}

original: Damn fine woman, but damn expensive, too. Just ask Saint James - he spends near every cap he gets on Sweetie's sweets.{Ha!}
translation: 这女人真不错，就是太贵了。你去问问圣詹姆斯吧，他几乎把所有瓶盖都用来睡小甜甜了。{Ha!}

original: Tell me about Dermot.
translation: 和我说说德莫特。

original: Roughneck prospector is all I hear, good at what he does. Been renting a room here for a year or so - nothing special.
translation: 我听说他是个捡破烂的大老粗，不过他能力很强。在这儿租了个房间，差不多有一年了，没什么特别的地方。

original: What do you know about Dermot and Saint James?
translation: 对于德莫特和圣詹姆斯，你都知道些什么？

original: Those boys been living here a while now. They sell salvage and do all right. I never been with either of them.
translation: 那两个年轻人在这儿住了有一段日子了。他们靠卖破烂为生，过得还行。我从没和他们睡过。

original: That Saint James is all over Sweetie every time he rustles up the caps to afford her. She says he's peculiar, but who isn't?
translation: 圣詹姆斯老缠着小甜甜，赚到的那点钱全花在了她身上。她说他是独一无二的，但谁不是呢 ?

original: Is this apartment building yours?
translation: 这幢楼是你的？

original: Yep, for years now. Guess I should be calling it Casa Marco or something, but I haven't changed the signs.
translation: 是啊，已经有几年了。我想应该把它改名叫卡萨·马可才对，但我还没来得及换招牌。

original: Folks who can't pay their way onto the Strip need a place to stay, too. And when Pretty Sarah set her whores up here, the Casa went full-service.{Ha!}
translation: 就算没有钱进长街，人们也需要一个地方落脚。美人萨拉把她手下的妓女带进来后，这里的生意一下就兴隆了起来。

original: <75 caps> What the hell. Let's do it.
translation: <75瓶盖> 豁出去了。咱们来吧。

original: You won't notice anything once the lights are out, hon. The places that count are still firm enough...
translation: 只要灯一黑，你就一点感觉也没有了，亲爱的。我那几个地方可还中用着呢。

original: Well, don't just stand there. I ain't getting any younger.
translation: 那就别傻站着了。我又不会变年轻。

original: I'd like your services.
translation: 我想要你的服务。

original: {Male PC}Best prices around so long as {alluding to anal sex}you don't try putting anything someplace it was never intended. How's that sound?
translation: {Male PC}我开的价钱最低，只要你不把自己的小玩意钻到不该钻的地方去就行。怎么样？

original: I had questions about your tenants.
translation: 对你的房客我有些问题要问。

original: Like who?
translation: 比如谁？

original: I'd like you to go back to the Lucky 38 for now.
translation: 我希望你现在回幸运38赌场去。

original: I'll make my way there.
translation: 我会去那儿的。

original: I do. We'll meet up at the Lucky 38.
translation: 好的。我们在幸运38赌场见。

original: {sighing}Back to the tomb, I suppose. If you need me, et cetera.
translation: {sighing}要回墓穴了啊，需要我的时候来找我啊。

original: Nice! Can I order room service?
translation: 好啊！我可以预订客房服务吗？

original: I do. We'll meet up at the Lucky 38.
translation: 好的。我们在幸运38赌场见。

original: {Confirmation Beep}<Makes beeping sounds>
translation: {Confirmation Beep}<发出哔哔声>

original: <Companion Protocol::Return Base>
translation: <同伴协议::回到基地>

original: Hey, as long as you're not asking me to go back to Black Mountain, I'm a happy old man.
translation: 嘿，只要不让我回黑山，去哪儿我都乐意。

original: It is. We'll meet up at the Lucky 38.
translation: 好的。我们在幸运38赌场见。

original: {confirmation bark}<bark!>
translation: {confirmation bark}<犬吠！>

original: {Wary, doesn't like 38}All right... don't be long. {Under her breath}Robots there give me the creeps.
translation: {Wary，doesn't like 38}好的……别去得太久。{Under her breath}那边的机器人让我毛骨悚然。

original: {Wary, doesn't like 38}All right. Guess Vegas it is.
translation: {Wary，doesn't like 38}好吧。看来要待在维加斯了。

original: {Wary, doesn't like 38}Back to the gilded cage.
translation: {Wary，doesn't like 38}回那镀金笼子里去咯。

original: Nice children shouldn't play in places like that, dearie! That's the sort of place Leo likes! But if you insist....
translation: 乖孩子不该待在那种地方，亲爱的！只有利奥才喜欢那种地方！但是如果你坚持的话……

original: How would you feel about becoming Primm's new sheriff?
translation: 你对成为普瑞姆的新任治安官有什么想法？

original: My terms are the same. A pardon from the NCR and the freedom to do the job any way I see fit.
translation: 我的条件没有变。得到NCR的赦免，以及赋予我在工作上便利行事的权力。

original: [Continue]
translation: [继续]

original: But once they were in, they were stuck there. Oliver's troopers were entrenched and wouldn't give a foot.
translation: 可一上水坝，他们就动弹不得了。奥利弗的部队始终坚守阵地，一步都不退让。

original: That's when we ordered the rangers and 1st Recon sharpshooters to start picking off veteran Legion officers from a high ridge west of the dam.
translation: 就在这时，我们命令游骑兵和第一侦察营的狙击手从水坝西岸的山脊上开始狙杀军团的精锐军官。

original: That only lasted about a minute before Graham ordered the back ranks to push through to the front and rush the ridge.
translation: 仅仅过了一分钟，格雷厄姆就命令后队越过前队向山脊冲锋。

original: Why are the rangers here?
translation: 为什么游骑兵会出现在这里？

original: There's a lot of answers to that question, but it started with the Ranger Unification Treaty. We weren't always the only show in town.
translation: 这个问题有很多答案，但一切都源于《游骑兵联合条约》。要知道这里除了我们还有其他人呢。

original: Nevada had its own posse, the Desert Rangers. They fought Caesar even farther east, out in Arizona.
translation: 内华达原本有自己的地方武装——沙漠游骑兵。他们原先在东边深入亚利桑那的地区与凯撒作战。但战况不是很顺利。

original: Years back, we met with the Desert Rangers at Mojave Outpost and agreed to help them against Caesar if they would join the NCR.
translation: 几年前，我们在莫哈维前哨战与沙漠游骑兵会师，并答应只要他们同意加入NCR，我们就与他们一道对抗凯撒。

original: Why do they call Lanius the Monster of the East?
translation: 他们为什么管拉尼厄斯叫做“东方之兽”？

original: Oh, the usual reasons. People say he's enormous, carries a big sword, chops people's heads off. That's not what makes him a good commander, though.
translation: 哦，没什么好奇怪的。人们说他是个大块头，背着一把大剑，专砍人头。不过，光靠这些可当不了好指挥官。

original: Folks say he came from a heck of a tough tribe, took Caesar a long time to conquer. It was thanks to Lanius.
translation: 据说他来自一个骁勇善战的部落，正是由于当时拉尼厄斯一夫当关，凯撒花了很长时间才将其征服。

original: But once Caesar broke him, he was born again. He'll go anywhere and do anything to win. Legion says he can smell weakness.
translation: 但自从他被凯撒打败以后，就像变了个人似的。为了取胜，他可以不择手段。军团的人说，他能嗅出敌人的弱点。

original: Once he finds out where an army's vulnerable, he'll go to it like a dog for the throat.
translation: 一旦他发现了一支部队的软肋，就会像疯狗一样扑向敌人的喉咙。

original: Is Moore in charge of all the NCR troopers out here?
translation: 这儿的所有NCR士兵都归莫尔管吗？

original: No, and thanks to General Oliver for that. Colonel {shoo}Hsu is at McCarran. Most of the New Vegas troopers are under his command.
translation: 不，这得感谢奥利弗将军。在麦卡伦营地还有一位许{shoo}上校。大部分新维加斯的部队都归他指挥。

original: He's more sympathetic to the locals than Moore. Now that the Fiends aren't giving him grief, we should see more troopers assigned to the front lines.
translation: 对当地人来说，他比莫尔更好打交道。既然恶魔帮已经玩完了，那应该会有更多的士兵被部署到前线来。

original: Good work on that, by the way. Hope you got good bounties out of it.
translation: 顺便说一句，你干得不错。希望他们能好好犒赏你。

original: Colonel Moore's "way"?
translation: 莫尔上校的"做派"？

original: The colonel is an effective commander - one of the best - but she sharpened her claws on the Vipers and the old Jackals.
translation: 上校是一名优秀的指挥官，也是位难得的将才，可她习惯对付的都是毒蛇帮和豺狗帮之类的掠夺者。

original: Did four tours against the Brotherhood, too. She used to be a ranger until an injury took her out of action. Happens to a lot of us, unfortunately.
translation: 她也曾四次在对抗兄弟会的部队中服役。当过游骑兵，却因负伤而被迫退役。很可惜，我们中不少人都是这样。

original: She's better at making graves than making friends. Bring in Moore and the earth will be razed. Fields will be salted.
translation: 她取人性命的本事要比和人谈判厉害得多。要是把莫尔招来，那这里准会寸草不生，生灵涂炭。

original: Tell me about General Oliver.
translation: 和我说说奥利弗将军吧。

original: Oh, well... now, you'll have to excuse me. The general and I don't always see eye to eye on things.
translation: 哦，好吧……恕我冒昧，将军和我时常意见相左。

original: Maybe it's best that I just say he's a trooper, through and through. The man will not give up an inch for anything, least of all to the Legion.
translation: 这么说吧，他是个军人，彻头彻尾的军人。无论任何事情，他都寸步不让，更别说是军团了。

original: Doesn't matter. Your time's up, Hanlon.
translation: 无所谓。你的大限到了，汉隆。

original: Well, you got that right.
translation: 好吧，这你倒说对了。

original: You've convinced me. Your secret is safe.
translation: 你说服了我，我不会泄露你的秘密的。

original: I don't know if you're working for Caesar or if desperation's made me a heck of a lot more persuasive. Either way, this is the right thing to do.
translation: 我不知道究竟是因为你在为凯撒卖命，还是因为走投无路的人说话更有分量。总之，你这么做是对的。

original: Now, I trust we're done discussing this. I'm going to step through that door and pretend like we never had this talk.
translation: 那么，我想咱们应该是商量完了。我打算从那道门出去，咱们就当这场谈话从未发生过吧。

original: Caesar is sick. Like... really sick. He could drop any day.
translation: 凯撒病了…病得很重。他随时都可能死掉。

original: Caesar's sick. He won't live long. The Legion will fall apart a few years after he's gone.
translation: 凯撒病了。他活不了多久。只要他一死，军团用不了几年就会分崩离析。

original: Caesar's dead. The Legion can't hold itself together for five years, much less ten.
translation: 凯撒已经死了。军团在五年内就将分崩离析，不用十年。

original: It's a gamble either way. Even with Caesar gone, we still might not outlast the Legion. I suppose that's a risk I'll have to take.
translation: 怎么说这都是场赌博。就算凯撒死了，也不见得我们就能比军团撑得更久。不过现在看来我们必须冒这个险了。

original: For our sake, I hope you're right. I guess that I should thank you for bringing me to my senses. So... thanks.
translation: 看在大伙的份上，我希望你是对的。也许我得感谢你让我重新恢复了理智……谢谢。

original: Now, if you'll excuse me, I'm going to walk out that door and pretend we never had this talk.
translation: 现在，如果你不介意的话，我打算出去转转，咱们就当这场谈话从未发生过吧。

original: What will you do if I don't turn you in?
translation: 如果我不告发你，你会干什么？

original: Oliver can't stand that rangers got credit for victory at Hoover. Whatever I recommend, he does the opposite. I said I wanted us on the ridge.
translation: 奥利弗无法忍受游骑兵抢走了他们在水坝一战中的功劳。所以每次我建议他往东，他就偏要往西。我建议他们驻守在山脊上。

original: He put them right on the western part of the dam itself. We don't have enough firepower to hold that spot.
translation: 可他却非要将军队部署到水坝的西面。我们在那个位置没有足够的火力进行防守。

original: If the troopers fall back, and they will, the rangers will advance to cover Oliver's retreat. We lose the dam, Oliver and the senate are ruined.
translation: 如果部队撤退——他们准要这么做——那游骑兵就得去掩护奥利弗撤退。那样水坝就得失守，奥利弗和参议院就完了。

original: Aren't you fighting for the people of New Vegas?
translation: 你们难道不是在为了新维加斯的人们而战吗？

original: We're fighting on their behalf, but Mr. House and the Families are stringing us up, inch by inch.
translation: 我们是在为他们而战，但豪斯先生和那些家族正在一步步地把我们逼上绝路。

original: They'll drain us dry while we fight and die over this dam. We offered them sanctuary in NCR territory before, but they won't listen.
translation: 我们为了这座水坝流血牺牲，他们却想把我们一点点耗光。我们原本在NCR的领地内为他们提供了安置点，可他们就是不去。

original: Troopers and rangers have been dying here for more than five years while the Families sit pretty behind that... damned wall.
translation: 士兵和游骑兵在这里拼了五年多的命，而这帮家族就那么悠闲地躲在…那该死的高墙后面。

original: Do you ever stop talking?
translation: 你能闭上嘴吗？

original: I didn't realize you were in such a hurry.
translation: 没想到你这么着急。

original: I get so used to sitting in this chair and listening to radio reports, sometimes I forget people are getting ready for war out there.
translation: 我已经习惯坐在这把椅子里听广播，有时连下面的人在准备打仗的事都忘得一干二净。

original: How is NCR doing?
translation: NCR现在情况如何？

original: It's no secret we've had better campaigns. Holding this whole length of river isn't easy.
translation: 这场仗已经打得有些力不从心了，这并不是秘密。守住一整条河并不容易。

original: We're stretched thin and the Long 15 just keeps getting longer. Slow to get supplies. Slower to get reinforcements.
translation: 我们分兵太多，战线拉得太广，感觉15号公路每天都在变长。补给缓慢。增援更慢。

original: NCR's senate has got funds tied up at the Boneyard and President Kimball ordered our most experienced rangers to chase ghosts down at Baja.
translation: NCR参议院将拨款全扣在了埋骨地，而金博尔总统却把我们最有经验的游骑兵调去下加州半岛守空城。

original: < Speech 30 >
[SUCCEEDED] All right. Pickings were getting slim around here anyway.
translation: [成功] 好吧，反正这周围也没多少油水了。

original: Eddie's just going to keep chasing you. Quit while you're ahead... and alive.
translation: 埃迪不会放过你的，趁你还活着……见好就收吧。

original: < Cock your head and grin. >
translation: {Terrifying Presence}<歪着头笑。>

original: Run!
translation: 跑！

original: <Keep holdout weapons> Sure, here you go.
translation: <留下藏匿的武器> 当然，给你。

original: Let's finish this, then.
translation: 那咱们就做个了断罢。

original: Avenge {KAI-zar}Caesar!
translation: 为{KAI-zar}凯撒复仇！

original: < Medicine 50 >
[FAILED] It's obvious you know as little about medicine as I do. Spare me your excuses.
translation: [失败] 很明显你和我一样对医学一窍不通。别找借口了。

original: There was, uh, internal bleeding and lesions and other problems.
translation: 呃，他有内出血和器官衰竭等其他问题。

original: < Speech 50 >
[FAILED] Save your excuses.
translation: [失败] 少给我编借口。

original: Hey, it totally wasn't my fault that he died. He was old.
translation: 嘿，他死了可不是我的错。他毕竟年纪大了。

original: What? You think this is my fault?
translation: 什么？你觉得这是我的错？

original: His head exploded, idiot. Of course it's your fault. {to his men}Avenge {KAI-zar}Caesar!
translation: 他的头都炸开了，白痴。当然是你的错。{to his men}为{KAI-zar}凯撒复仇！

original: What do you know about Legate Lanius?
translation: 关于特使拉尼厄斯你知道些什么？

original: The Legate is not a man to be crossed, especially if you're a woman. That's all I'll talk about it.
translation: 副帅可千万不能招惹，如果你还是个女人的话就更不能了。我只能说这么多。

original: I did all I could to save him.
translation: 我已经尽力了。

original: Yet you failed, and you must pay.
translation: 但你失败了，你必须付出代价。

original: <Lie> I did all I could to save him.
translation: <撒谎> 我已经尽力了。

original: Yet you failed, and you must pay.
translation: 但你失败了，你必须付出代价。

original: Friend or not, no one is allowed in here. Move along!
translation: 不管你是不是朋友，都不许你进去。快走！

original: It's okay I'm a friend.
translation: 别紧张，我是你们的朋友。

original: All right, but make it quick.
translation: 好吧，动作快点。

original: <Lie> I've been ordered to get something for Colonel Moore, let me in.
translation: <撒谎] 我是受命前来为莫尔上校拿些东西的，让我进去。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Damn it all to hell! Let's go!
translation: 见鬼！我们走！

original: <Lie> Colonel Moore is in trouble! She needs help now!
translation: <撒谎> 莫尔上校有麻烦了！她现在需要帮助！

original: [FAILED] Our instructions were pretty clear. Now you better get your ass out of here.
translation: 我们已经说的非常明白了。你最好赶紧离开。

original: Don't you have anything better to do right now than guard this door?
translation: 难道你除了守着这扇门之外没更重要的事做了吗？

original: Tell me about the Burned Man.
translation: 跟我说说浴火者的事。

original: The Burned Man was {KAI-zar's}Caesar's advisor and general when the Legion was originally formed. The Burned Man led us to a disastrous defeat at the Dam.
translation: 浴火者是{KAI-zar's}凯撒在军团建立之初任命的顾问和将军。正是他导致了我们在胡佛水坝的惨败。

original: On {KAI-zar's}Caesar's orders, the Burned Man was covered in pitch by the {pray-TORE-ian}Praetorian Guard, lit on fire, and cast into the Grand Canyon.
translation: 之后，依照{KAI-zar's}凯撒的旨意，浴火者被{pray-TORE-ian}禁卫军浑身浇满沥青，点燃后扔进了大峡谷。

original: {KAI-zar}Caesar has forbidden us from ever speaking his true name again, and so we simply refer to him as the Burned Man.
translation: {KAI-zar}凯撒严禁我们再提他的本名，因此我们只好称他为浴火者。

original: Tell me about the Legate.
translation: 和我说说特使吧。

original: He's the best the Legion has to offer, or so the Legionaries say. Brute of a man, wears a fancy metal mask into battle.
translation: 他是全军团最厉害的勇士，大家都这么说。人中猛兽，每次打仗，都戴着一副华丽的铁面具冲锋陷阵。

original: He killed one of my pack Brahmin simply because it was in his way. I knew better than to complain about it, though.
translation: 有一次，我的驮货双头牛因为挡了他的道，就直接被他给宰了。我毕竟知道好歹，也只能忍气吞声。

original: It took some doing, but I convinced the White Glove Society to support Caesar's Legion.
translation: 虽然费了些功夫，不过我已经说服了白手套社团支持凯撒军团。

original: You did? That's... well, that's an unusual approach!
translation: 你说服了他们？还真是……不按常理出牌啊！

original: But I know it makes sense somehow if you're the one doing it! {shrug}The problem is me!
translation: 不过既然你这么做，那就肯定有它的道理！{shrug}看来问题出在我！

original: The White Glove Society needed a little help getting back to basics, that's all.
translation: 白手套社团需要设立一下底线，我已经帮他们搞定了。就这样。

original: That's great news! I wish I could visit their casino! They have a refined sense of taste!
translation: 真是个好消息！看来有时间得拜访一下他们的赌场！他们的品味很独特！
