original: {Narration}There were stories of ghosts immune to gunfire, who struck down anyone they saw with rays of light.
translation: {Narration}后来传说出现了一群刀枪不入的幽灵，凡是遇到它们的人，都会被它们发出的光束击倒。

original: {Narration}The last chapter of the Mojave came when a modified REPCONN rocket struck Hoover Dam, releasing a blood-red cloud, killing all stationed there.
translation: {Narration}最终，胡佛大坝被一枚改装过的瑞普康火箭击中，血红色的浓雾从中喷涌而出，驻扎在此处的士兵无一幸存。莫哈维就此走向终结。

original: {Narration}All attempts to penetrate the Cloud and re-take the Dam failed, and both the NCR and Legion finally turned away from it, citing the place as cursed.
translation: {Narration}人们数次试图冲破红雾，收复大坝，但均以失败告终。NCR和军团不得不宣告放弃，将这里视为诅咒之地。

original: {Narration}Only two remained alive in the depths of the Cloud, at the Sierra Madre, waiting for their new world to begin again.
translation: {Narration}只剩下浓雾深处马德雷山脉赌场里的两个人，依然在静静等待着一个重获新生的世界来临。

original: {4G}And we're at peace, you and I, mind and instinct. Then the world will be ready for us.
translation: {4G}只有这样，我和你，理智和本能，才能彻底达成和解。那时，我们才能共同面对这个世界。

original: Maybe you just... uh... need to hear another voice, like mine.
translation: 可能你需要…呃…听听别人的话，比如我的。

original: {DUPE}[SUCCEEDED] {Surprised}Master? {Grateful}Master, Dog hoped you'd come, voice... voice is going...
translation: [成功] 主人？主人，狗一直在等你来，那声音...

original: Dog, Master is here now, Master wants you to stop this.
translation: 狗，主人来了，主人让你停手。

original: What is he doing here?
translation: 他来这儿干嘛？

original: {Taunting}Heard the call of the Sierra Madre, just like you did... {emph}exactly the same way.
translation: 他听到了马德雷山脉赌场的呼唤，和你……一模一样。

original: {Slow, reflective here}Finds out it's more than a story, {sarcasm bleeds in}comes to this shining, poisonous grail, this jewel of the desert.
translation: {他发现这里不仅仅是个传说，于是不远万里寻找这座光辉璀璨却又充满剧毒的圣杯，这颗沙漠中的明珠。

original: {Anger comes back}Dog knows him more than I do. Dog's always nodding, always obeying him, because he's weak and hungry and greedy for master's affection.
translation: 狗比我更了解他。狗总是对他点头哈腰，言听计从，因为他太过弱小，太过饥饿，渴望得到主人的宠爱。

original: Why do you say I'm the same as the Old Man?
translation: 为什么你说我和那个糟老头一样？

original: {Disgust, player doesn't get it}You're not him any more than I'm Dog. But that collar around your neck...
translation: {你和他的关系，如同我和狗。但你脖子上的那个项圈…...

original: ...you're an extension of the Old Man's grasp, clumsy, perhaps, but a tool, yes. And once you get acclimated to the Sierra Madre...
translation: …你就是个工具，替那个糟老头发号施令，虽然不太灵光，但懂得听使唤。等你适应了马德雷山脉赌场的环境…

original: ...then you'll feel the same overpowering hunger the Old Man does. And then you'll {emph}be him, not just his hand.
translation: ...你就会变得和那糟老头一样贪得无厌。到时候你就会想取代他的位置，不再只甘作他的爪牙。

original: Do you know how I got here?
translation: 你知道我是怎么到这儿来的吗？

original: {Amused}Of course I know. {Snarling}Even if I don't see it happen - down in the cage, I hear echoes of the footfalls, the click of the collars.
translation: 当然知道。就算我关在笼子里，没有亲眼看见，我也听到了脚步的回声和项圈的响动。

original: {Furious}Every time I see one of you, I know exactly how you got here - you couldn't help yourselves, any more than Dog can help himself.
translation: {你们这种人，我不用猜都知道你们是怎么到这儿来的——因为你们无法压抑自己的欲望，就像狗一样。

original: {Accusing}You heard the voice, the promise, and then you walked right into one of the Old Man's traps. Then... then Dog comes for you, drags you here.
translation: 你听到广播里的声音，以为有利可图，就迫不及待地一脚踏进了那个老头设下的陷阱里。接着……接着狗就把你扛到了这里。

original: I need you to stay here and trigger the switches.
translation: 我要你待在这儿，扳动开关。

original: {Complaining}Dog doesn't understand... {to himself}too hungry, hard to hear words... {slightly petulant and evil here}Master, when can Dog {emph}feed?
translation: {狗不明白... 太饿了，听不见... 主人，狗什么时候能吃东西啊？

original: {Quiet, this is a little creepy in its hopefulness}If Dog was fed like last time, Dog would listen. If the feeding was quiet.
translation: 要是狗能像上次一样吃饱，狗一定会听话的。这次的食物最好不要再乱动了。

original: {Slightly fearful}Maybe voice could make Dog stay, Dog not want to be in cage, Dog want to be free, find Master.
translation: 也许那个声音可以让狗待在这里，狗不想再关到笼子里了，狗想要自由，想去找主人。

original: Me hear voice, too? Then got here, bad place.
translation: 我也听到某个声音，然后不知怎的就到了这里，破地方。

original: {Nods gravely}Dog trapped here, too. This place not like West. Air like copper wire. Gut heavy, hurts, beeps sometimes.
translation: 狗也被困在这儿了。这个地方不像西边。空气里有一股铜线的味道。肚子很沉，很痛，有时还叫。

original: Back West... in bone cities... {Beat, slight wonder}Dog wore a collar on wrist, turned him into color of ground, turned him into color of sky.
translation: 以前在西边…骨头城的时候...狗的手腕上有个圈，可以让狗的身体变得和地面天空一个颜色。

original: What's Elijah doing here?
translation: 以利亚来这儿做什么？

original: {Taunting}Heard the call of the Sierra Madre, just like you did... {emph}exactly the same way.
translation: 他听到了马德雷山脉赌场的呼唤，和你……一模一样。

original: {Slow, reflective here}Finds out it's more than a story, {sarcasm bleeds in}comes to this shining, poisonous grail, this jewel of the desert.
translation: {他发现这里不仅仅是个传说，于是不远万里寻找这座光辉璀璨却又充满剧毒的圣杯，这颗沙漠中的明珠。

original: {Anger comes back}Dog knows him more than I do. Dog's always nodding, always obeying him, because he's weak and hungry and greedy for master's affection.
translation: 狗比我更了解他。狗总是对他点头哈腰，言听计从，因为他太过弱小，太过饥饿，渴望得到主人的宠爱。

original: Well... true enough. Sure uses the word "Master" a lot.
translation: 嗯...没错。他确实经常说"主人"两个字。

original: [FAILED] Habit. Conditioning. It doesn't matter.
translation: [失败] 习惯而已。没什么。

original: Then how are the collars active again?
translation: 那这些项圈怎么又重新启动的？

original: [SUCCEEDED] Interesting... so it seems you have another link we don't. And... you're to blame for this.
translation: [成功] 有意思…原来是你身上有着一样我们没有的东西。所以…这也算是你的错。

original: Yes... he wears a Pip-Boy on his wrist, just as you do. If he's feeding commands and signals, then I would be careful.
translation: 是的...他和你一样，手腕上也有一个哔哔小子。如果他真的在通过这东西发送指令和信号，那我可得小心了。

original: He's most likely installed a contingency switch in the Pip-Boy. If the signal gets cut off, or you try and remove it... well, then we'll all die.
translation: 他极有可能在哔哔小子里装了应急开关。一旦如果信号被切断，或者你尝试摘除它…那我们就死定了。

original: The Pip-Boy could boost the signal. If Elijah has a Pip-Boy, that would explain it.
translation: 哔哔小子能够增强信号。如果以利亚也有一个哔哔小子，那就说得通了。

original: [FAILED] That I don't know. The collars came back to life... I'm not sure how.
translation: [失败] 我不知道。项圈为何重新开始运作…我也不清楚。

original: {Snarling, low}I felt it when you woke me up... that kicking in my gut, the collar was coiled with a charge again, like a snake.
translation: 你叫醒我的时候，我就感觉到了它…在我的体内跳动，仿佛一条蛇，盘绕着一堆炸药。

original: Any idea why he wants you there?
translation: 你知道他为什么要派你来这儿吗？

original: Partner, I'm not sure this guy's operating with a full deck. My bet? Process of elimination, lowest common denominator.
translation: 我的好搭档哟，我也不清楚这老家伙的脑子是否正常。但要我猜的话，他应该用了排除法，寻找最大公约数吧。

original: He figures the Strong Man's needed somewhere, {to himself}even if it sounds like the Strong Man's {emph}two minds about it.
translation: 他估计是对那个"大块头"另有安排，虽然听得出来，那大块头的脑子里似乎有两个人在打架。

original: Plus, I'm guessing wherever ol' Doggy Boy's needed doesn't need smarts. {Beat, to himself}I hope not, or we're royally jones'd.
translation: 另外啊，我猜咱们这位狗兄要去的地方应该是用不着多少聪明才智的。希望我猜得对吧，否则咱们可就凶多吉少咯。

original: According to the marker, you're slated for a spot in Puesta del Sol.
translation: 根据哔哔小子上的地标，你要去的是日落镇的一个地方。

original: No... looks like a {emph}rooftop in Puesta del Sol. In better days, nice view. Now? It's the last place anyone wants to stand when this event goes off.
translation: 不…更具体说，应该是{emph}日落镇的一处天台。那地方以前风景不错。现在呢？恐怕是欣赏开业大秀最糟糕的位置了。

original: That place during Spring, Summer, and Fall, a little bit in Winter, is a prime resort spot for Ghost People. Not the best of neighborhoods.
translation: 那里一年四季，除了冬天的大部分时间以外，都是鬼人最喜欢光顾的地方。可不是什么邻里和睦的好去处啊。

original: If we're going there, I'm not going alone. And if you have any bright ideas about telling me to stroll over there - or leave me there? No thanks.
translation: 如果我们真要去那儿的话，我拒绝单独行动。甭管你有什么理由，想让我就这样进去，或是要我留在那里，门儿都没有。

original: Know anything about this Gala Event we're supposed to trigger?
translation: 关于我们要启动的这个所谓盛世庆典，你有多少了解？

original: {Chewing it over}Supposed to be the Grand Opening of the Sierra Madre. Lots of lights, music, the works.
translation: {Chewing it over}原本要作为马德雷山脉赌场的开业大秀，搞了许多节目，张灯结彩、欢天喜地的。

original: {Slowly}And he's going to use the Gala Event... to open the casino? But... {Thinking}that's... interesting.
translation: {Slowly}那家伙居然想借着盛世庆典来…打开赌场的大门？…这还真是…挺有趣的。

original: I'm not following you.
translation: 我没听明白。

original: Odd man out... dead weight. Someone you need holding the toolbox, the nurse passing the scalpel, the chauffeur driving you to the concert.
translation: 异类…就是可有可无。比如替你拿工具箱的人，给你递手术刀的护士，送你去音乐会的司机。

original: Any guy with {emph}hands is who he needs up on that rooftop. Guess he thinks I don't rate, looking like I do. {Beat}Poor him.
translation: 反正他只需要一个双手健全的人站上屋顶就行了。也许他瞧我这副模样，就觉得我无关紧要吧。可惜他想错了。

original: So I go to the locked door, right?
translation: 所以，我要跑进那个上锁的门，对吧？

original: [SUCCEEDED] What? Oh, my left - your right. So, yeah, run to the door on your right. {Beat}Heh, almost got you killed there. {To himself}Us killed there.
translation: [成功] 什么？哦，我的左边就是你的右边。对，应该去你右手边的那扇门。嗨，瞧我差点害死了咱俩。

original: Wait - I need to head to the door to your left or my left?
translation: 等等——我要去的是你左边的门还是我左边的门？

original: I found this Holotape in your safe.
translation: 我在你的保险箱里找到了这盘全息磁带。

original: Yeah? Little bit of two-reel memories... we're here to steal from the Sierra Madre, not from each other.
translation: 是吗？小小一卷磁带，包含多少回忆呀…不过我们的目标是马德雷山脉赌场，可不是各自的私人珍藏。

original: Sinclair, is that you?
translation: 辛克莱，是你吗？

original: {Dean walking in on Vera as she's getting ready}Pretty as a picture.
translation: {Dean walking in on Vera as she's getting ready}真是美若天仙啊。

original: {Surprise, uncomfortable at the sudden arrival}Uh... Dean, I... didn't hear you come in.
translation: 啊...迪安，我...没听见你进来。

original: I'm not wearing my dancing shoes, so I walk a little softly now. {Mock menacing}What, you think I was a Chinaman, come to cut your American throat?
translation: 我没穿舞鞋，所以脚步很轻。怎么，难不成你把我当成了中国佬，要来暗杀你这美国人了？

original: Dean, really.
translation: 迪安，别这样。

original: {Slightly predatory}What... no hug? Come here.
translation: 怎么了…来抱一个吗？来吧。

original: Dean, I'm getting ready.
translation: 迪安，我要上台了。

original: You sing like a bird, pop the safe, and we're as through as through can be.
translation: 你好好唱歌吧。等金库的事情办妥了，我就不再为难你。

original: {Wants to back out}Dean... I just... about tonight, I... I don't know.
translation: 迪安…可我...今晚，我...不知道。

original: {Vera's starting to get cold feet, Dean doesn't like this}You don't know? I ask one simple favor of you, and you tell me "no?"
translation: 你不知道？我只是请你帮个小忙，连这你都不答应？

original: I didn't say no. I just said that... I don't think...
translation: 没有不答应。我只是...觉得这样不行...

original: You're right, you don't think.
translation: 没错，你不行。

original: I don't need you - I'll send you back to the farm, worse off than you were, because you'll have seen the Sierra Madre, and had to let it {emph}all go.
translation: 我不需要你了——我可以把你送回农场，你会过得比以前还糟，因为你已经见识过马德雷山脉赌场的奢华，舍不得放手这样的生活。

original: I could have gotten any leggy dame out of Hollywood to get out here and play Sinclair's heart strings.
translation: 早知道就随便找个好莱坞的长腿美女来勾引辛克莱了。

original: You just happened to be the one I caught, and it was really your own fault, a little too much into the chems and meds, and...
translation: 你不过是恰巧遇到我慧眼识人，可你却自甘堕落，沉迷于药物之中，而且……

original: {Placating, but still leaving the hooks in}Aw, shhh, don't cry. Look, I'm not trying to hurt {emph}you. Just one last little job, a little less dirty, a little less messy. He trusts you, Vera.
translation: {啊呀，哟哟，别哭啊。听着，我不是有意要为难你的。最后一点小忙，不必搞得这么难堪。他相信你，薇拉。

original: {Placating, but cold}And so do I. After this, I promise you, all those other Holotapes, they'll go away.
translation: {我也是。我保证，这事结束以后，所有这些全息磁带，它们全都会消失。

original: Of course, Dean.
translation: 当然，迪安。

original: Christine is dead. Dog... well...
translation: 克莉丝汀死了。狗...他...

original: {Frustrated}Dead? For the love of... chopping up her voice box was a gamble anyway. So much for back-up plans.
translation: 死了？天哪…算了，反正改造她的声带本来就十分冒险。这样一来只能放弃备用计划了。

original: Still... there's a way to recover the song from the Sierra Madre archives, right? Just set up links to each floor, then use the lobby terminal?
translation: 话虽如此…还是可以利用赌场的档案来修复这首歌的，对吧？只要设置好每层的连接，再用大厅中央的终端进行操作就行了。

original: Christine is dead. Dog... well...
translation: 克莉丝汀死了。狗...他...

original: {Frustrated}Dead? For the love of... this whole heist was a gamble anyway. So much for back-up plans.
translation: 死了？天哪……算了，反正这次的抢劫本来就是一次豪赌。看来只能放弃备用计划了。

original: Thought you'd leave me in that elevator? {Slow anger, remembering how the player trapped her}I haven't forgotten what you did in the Switching Station, not for a second.
translation: 你居然把我丢在电梯里？我可没忘记你在开闭所时对我做过的事情，一点都没忘。

original: Trapped down in that room in the dark, listening to that {emph}sound, like saw blades. {Cold, anger}I could barely breathe... couldn't even scream!
translation: 我被困在伸手不见五指的房间里，听着那个声音，锯木头似的声音。我几乎不能呼吸… 甚至无法尖叫！

original: {Quiet, more to herself}Was like being operated on in that Auto-Doc in the Clinic... all over again.
translation: 简直和我之前在诊所里被绑在自动医生手术台上时的感觉……一模一样！

original: You kind of... changed there for a second.
translation: 刚才你好像……突然变了个人似的。

original: [FAILED] [She glares at you a moment, then slowly shakes her head.]
translation: [失败][她看了你一会儿，慢慢摇了摇头。]

original: You can still do numbers and calculations.
translation: 你还能数数。

original: [She nods.]
translation: [她点点头。]

original: Why... would someone remove your ability to write, or...
translation: 为什么……有人要移除了你的书写能力？难道…

original: [SUCCEEDED] [She nods, slowly, and then makes the motion of typing and drawing X's and lines in the air, and then gives a thumbs up.]
translation: [成功][她慢慢点头，做了一个打字的手势，在空中画了一个叉，然后竖起了大拇指。]

original: That's a specific form of brain surgery using electrodes. Pre-War.
translation: 这是一种将电极插入人脑的特殊手术。战前科技。

original: Do you know how to get out of here?
translation: 你知道要怎么离开这里么？

original: [She points in the direction of the main gate. Then points at your collar, shakes her head, and locks her hands around her neck.]
translation: [她指了指大门的方向，又指了指你的项圈，摇了摇头，用她双手掐住自己的脖子。]

original: [Then her hands lash outwards, fingers splayed, and she rolls her eyes back. After a second she turns back to you and shakes her head.]
translation: [然后她的双手向外摆动，五指张开，翻了个白眼。过了一会，她又转过来看着你，摇了摇头。]

original: Damn speakers at the end of the hall - red light means they're shielded. Must be a way to shut them off somewhere else.
translation: 走廊尽头有几个该死的喇叭——闪着红灯，说明它们有防护罩。一定有办法在别处关掉它们。

original: {THEATER: 1st Time, Likes player}How did you get from the Gala Event to here?
translation: {THEATER: 1st Time, Likes player}你是怎么从盛世庆典的现场来到这里的？

original: {Sounds like dupe of another line, isn't, this one's friendlier, more confused}I was already halfway off the rooftop, through the service tunnel and making a break for the gate before the light show started...
translation: {Sounds like dupe of another line, isn't, this one's friendlier, more confused}灯光秀开始前，我就已经跑下了屋顶，穿过隧洞，准备冲向赌场大门了…

original: ...and before Vera finished her Gala speech... I knew what'd happen with "music" in the streets and lights in the sky... Ghost People. Lots of them.
translation: …在薇拉的演讲结束前…我就已经知道这满大街的“锣鼓喧天”和火树银花会带来什么后果…鬼人会如潮水一般涌来。

original: Also meant the front gate was open, and no way was I missing it after all these years. Then... I walk in... and...
translation: 当然，大门也会打开。这么多年了，我可不能错过这个机会。于是我走了进去…然后……

original: What weapons are you skilled with?
translation: 你擅长什么武器？

original: Not one for fighting if we can avoid it. Still, wasn't bad at the pistol range, and over the years, I've learned how to handle a knife...
translation: 我最擅长避免与他人争斗。不过，我的手枪枪法还可以，这些年，我也学会了如何耍刀……

original: {Little quieter}...and explosives, a bit. A bit. {To himself}Made a lot of mistakes along the way. Still have my fingers, though.
translation: {炸药也会一点。一点而已。虽然犯过不少错，但我至少没有缺胳膊少腿。

original: Who are these people I'm gathering?
translation: 我要集结的这些人都是谁？

original: {Slower here, doesn't want to reveal too much}One is a trusted ally... obedient, collar or no, {to himself}although the collar helps. {Beat, dismissive/cruel}The other two... well, we'll have to see what the traps caught.
translation: 其中一人是个可信的同伴…他很听话，无论戴没戴项圈都一样，虽然戴着更好。至于另外两个人……嗯，那就得看落入我陷阱的都是什么货色了。

original: Any suggestions for who I should get first?
translation: 我应该先去找哪一个？你有什么建议吗？

original: Yes... {Lower, dismissive, like talking about a mule}Collar 8, the FEV reject, the Super Mutant. He's docile, predictable, and provided he's not starving, should be easy to command.
translation: 有的…… {Lower, dismissive, like talking about a mule}先找8号项圈，FEV病毒的残次品，一个超级变种人。他性格温顺，容易掌控，只要不让他挨饿，他就会乖乖听你指挥。

original: {Frowning, not sure why this is}I lost contact with him some time ago... probably after he dragged you here from the trap. Find him, he'll follow you, collar or no.
translation: {Frowning, not sure why this is}我已经和他失去了联络……大概是从他把你拖来这里之后。去找他，不管有没有项圈，他都会跟着你的。

original: How am I supposed to find them?
translation: 我该怎么找到他们？

original: {Authoritative, contempt for RobCo tech}Your piece of RobCo trash will help you, I've ensured it. It can latch on to the signal of the collars...
translation: {Authoritative, contempt for RobCo tech}你手上那块罗科公司生产的垃圾可以帮你，我已经替你改装过了。它能辨识项圈发出的信号……

original: ...and tune into their frequencies. The bomb collars come with radios embedded in them. You can eavesdrop easily.
translation: ……并调节到与其一致的频率。每个炸弹项圈里都嵌有无线电收发元件，很容易进行监听。

original: It was part of their design... to listen in. They can even screen out white noise from the environment to allow greater monitoring.
translation: 这也是它原本的功能之一……窃听。它甚至可以过滤掉外界的白噪音，从而取得更好的监听效果。

original: So how do I destroy the radios and speakers then?
translation: 那我要怎么才能摧毁那些收音机和喇叭呢？

original: Gunshots, energy blasts - {more to himself, quick}even spears thrown with great force - can puncture their exterior.
translation: 用枪，或者能量武器— {more to himself, quick}如果你力气够大，投矛也可以，这些武器都能刺穿它们的外壳。

original: Shielded speakers can't be destroyed at all. You'll need to avoid them or switch them off via a terminal. {Beat, disdain}I'll leave the method up to you.
translation: 带防护罩的喇叭没办法摧毁，你只能避开它们，或者找到控制终端，把它关掉。{Beat, disdain}至于办法，就交给你自己去想了……

original: Where can I find him?
translation: 我在哪儿能找到他？

original: Travel West, toward the Villa Police Station - follow the radio frequency and the alarms.
translation: 向西，往别墅区的警察局方向，跟着无线电频率和警报器的声音走。

original: {Thinking, reflective}Although there's a great deal of interference at the source. Perhaps that's why I lost contact with him.
translation: {Thinking, reflective}不过，信号源处存在相当大的干扰，这或许就是我和他失联的原因。

original: No matter, aside from Collar 8, there should be weapons, armor at the police station. Go West, avoid the Villa inhabitants, bring the mutant back.
translation: 无所谓，除了8号对象之外，警察局里应该还会有武器和护甲。向西走，避开别墅区的居民，把那个变种人带回来。

original: So you're the one who knows how I got to the Villa.
translation: 所以你肯定知道我是怎么来到别墅区的咯。

original: {DUPE: Amused}Of course I know. {Snarling}Even if I don't see it happen - down in the cage, I hear echoes of the footfalls, the click of the collars.
translation: 当然知道。就算我关在笼子里，没有亲眼看见，我也听到了脚步的回声和项圈的响动。

original: {Furious}Every time I see one of you, I know exactly how you got here - you couldn't help yourselves, any more than Dog can help himself.
translation: {你们这种人，我不用猜都知道你们是怎么到这儿来的——因为你们无法压抑自己的欲望，就像狗一样。

original: {Accusing}You heard the voice, the promise, and then you walked right into one of the Old Man's traps. Then... then Dog comes for you, drags you here.
translation: 你听到广播里的声音，以为有利可图，就迫不及待地一脚踏进了那个老头设下的陷阱里。接着……接着狗就把你扛到了这里。

original: How did you get me here again?
translation: 再说一遍，你是怎么带我来这里的？

original: Everyone asks that. {Emph}Should be asking how they plan on leaving.
translation: 每个人都会问这个问题。{Emph}你不妨问问他们是怎么想方设法离开的。

original: It only takes putting a collar on one to begin the chain. One with a collar may chain another. And that one, another. Had traps all over the wastes.
translation: 我只是把项圈套在了一个人的脖子上，就引发了连锁反应。戴项圈的人会给其他人也套上项圈，如此周而复始，循环往复。我在废土各处都布下了陷阱。

original: The chain ends with the Super Mutant. Although with him... the collar wasn't even necessary. He only needed... guidance.
translation: 这个连锁反应到那个超级变种人那里就结束了。不过对他来说…项圈是可有可无的。他会听从一切……指示。

original: I checked on everything in the valley and got you the map of Grand Staircase.
translation: 我检查了山谷的每一处地点，找到了你要的大阶梯地图。

original: I appreciate it. Well, that's it. This is all we need. Now all that's left is to quietly pack up and try to get out of here without being noticed.
translation: 我很感激。就是它了。这就是我们急需的。现在剩下的安排就是收拾我们的行李，然后不动声色地尽快离开。

original: That's assuming that Joshua won't try to stop me. {beat}And that he hasn't talked you into fighting the White Legs despite what I've said.
translation: 当然，前提是约书亚不会来阻止我。现在看来除了我说的这些外，他还没有告诉你他想与白腿部落开战的计划。

original: Don't worry. I don't hold it against you. You're a -{stops himself from saying Gentile} an outsider. Fighting seems like the practical solution. I'll tell you again, there's more at stake.
translation: 别担心，我并不是想防范你。你只是个...外来者。尽管战争似乎是很实际的解决办法，但要冒的风险太多了。

original: I have the Sacred Datura here.
translation: 我已经拿到神圣曼陀罗根了。

original: [FAILED] That's exactly what I'm worried about. We got us some passes tighter than a virgin on her wedding night up there.
translation: [失败] 我担心的就是这个。我们要经过的几条小道，比新婚之夜的处女还要紧。

original: Last thing I need is some greenhorn getting stuck on a rock, slowing the whole caravan down.
translation: 我最不愿看到的，就是一些毛毛躁躁的小伙子把自己卡在石头里，然后就因为他们拖慢了整个商队的速度。

original: Hey, man, I'm cool. I got a big backpack and everything!
translation: 嘿，伙计，我很酷。你瞧，我有一个大大的背包，里面装满了各种东西！

original: [FAILED] That's exactly what I'm worried about. We got us some passes tighter than a- {beat - was about to say something crude, but he's talking to a lady} well, tighter than a Chairman's fist up there.
translation: [失败] 我担心的就是这个。我们要经过的几条小道，比新... {beat - was about to say something crude, but he's talking to a lady} 嗯，比会长帮的拳头握得还紧。

original: You get stuck in there, you'll slow the whole caravan down while we pry you loose. Begging your pardon, ma'am.
translation: 你要是把自己卡住了，整个商队的速度就会因为你被拖累。上帝啊，快来救救我们吧。

original: Hey, man, I'm cool. I got a big backpack and everything!
translation: 嘿，伙计，我很酷。你瞧，我有一个大大的背包，里面装满了各种东西！

original: Hang on - ain't you the one that wiped out the Crimson Caravan's Vegas branch not too long ago?
translation: 等等，你就是那个不久前干掉了赤红商队维加斯分部的家伙？

original: Ought to thank you for that - knocking McLafferty out of the running gives Happy Trails a market to expand into.
translation: 我真要为此感谢你，把麦克拉弗蒂踢出局让我们“欢乐小径”又多了一块可以开辟的市场。

original: Wait a minute, I recognize you. Yeah... you're Alice McLafferty's rising star, ain't you?
translation: 等一下，我认得你。呃...你就是爱丽丝·麦克拉弗蒂的明日之星，对吧？

original: You sure you want to be here? McLafferty's non-competes are pretty rigid.
translation: 你确定你要跟我们走？麦克拉弗蒂的竞业禁止条款可是相当严格。

original: What can you tell me about New Canaan?
translation: 你能不能跟我讲讲新迦南？

original: Don't know much about the place, but I can tell you about the people. The New Canaanites were some kind of religious group from before the War.
translation: 我对这个地方了解不多，但我对那里的人算是知道一点。新迦南人在战前即是有某种宗教性质的团体。

original: They control the old city of Ogden, a ways north of Zion, and they got themselves a nice defensible mission in the canyon itself - or they did.
translation: 他们控制着一座老城奥格登，一条从北面通往锡安的路。他们在山谷里成功实施了布教，锡安成了他们防御性的一道屏障。

original: They trade a fair bit with the tribes in Zion - well, the ones that don't try to kill them, anyways.
translation: 他们与锡安的部落做了很多贸易，嗯，是与那些不会试图杀死他们的部落。

original: Tell me about Happy Trails Caravan Company.
translation: 跟我谈谈关于“欢乐小径”商队公司的事儿。

original: We're a smaller company out of Sac-Town, up in the northern part of the NCR. We run some business through New Reno, there on the "Little Loop."
translation: 我们是位于NCR北面的萨克城外的一家小公司。我们在新里诺做点小生意，“小环路”上。

original: Had a nice run to Salt Lake City, too - but, uh, then we lost contact with New Canaan, and that went all to hell.
translation: 去盐湖城也很顺利。但自从我们失去了和新迦南的联系，我们的生意就一落千丈。

original: Why do you need a map of Grand Staircase?
translation: 你为什么需要大阶梯的地图？

original: Grand Staircase is farther east, deeper into the Colorado Plateau.
translation: 大阶梯在更远的东面，直接深入科罗拉多高原。

original: The White Legs were able to reach us here, but it's only because Zion is close to the Long 15. They can't pursue us east of here. It's too wild.
translation: 白腿部落能在这里找到我们，是因为锡安靠近15号高速公路。但往东他们就来不了了，那里完全是荒蛮之地。

original: Throughout our history, we have called many places Zion. This valley is full of God's beauty, but it's just a place. Zion is more than this.
translation: 纵观我们的历史，我们把很多地方都称为锡安。这片峡谷充满了上帝的赞誉，但它只是一个地方而已，锡安不止于此。

original: We cannot use any and all means available just to protect stone and water and a piece of sky. We have to hold on to our faith. Far more enduring.
translation: 我们不能仅仅为了保护石头、水和一片天空而使用任何可能的手段。我们只能坚守我们的信仰，并持之以恒。

original: If we sacrifice grace for a piece of land, we may live in this valley, but we will no longer dwell in Zion. It's better for us to leave now.
translation: 如果我们为了一小片土地牺牲我们的荣誉，我们可以住在这个山谷，但我们永远也无法在扎根于锡安。离开这里，对我们或许会更好。

original: Take all I have.
translation: 把我有的都拿走吧。

original: Your generosity is... {sighs, not sure what to say}well, I just can't thank you enough.
translation: 你的慷慨...{sighs, not sure what to say}好吧，我的任何言辞也表达不了我对你的感激之情。

original: All right, people. Been a long couple of weeks, but here we are. {a big deal - Wha-la!}Zion.
translation: 好的，伙计们，经过了漫长的几周，我们终于到了。这就是，锡安！

original: {exasperated}Goddammit, Stella, heard you the first time, and the fifteenth, too.
translation: {exasperated}该死的，史黛拉，第一次就听到了，再说十五次也是一样。

original: PER check.
translation: 感知检查。

original: [SUCCEEDED] {laughs uncomfortably}Well, yeah, okay. You caught me.
translation: {laughs uncomfortably}呵呵，好，行，被你说中了。

original: You're lying. You've never been to Vault 22.
translation: 你撒谎。你从来没去过22号避难所。

original: [FAILED] Yeah, so don't bring it up again!
translation: 哦，那就别来再找事！

original: Sorry - didn't mean to be pushy.
translation: 抱歉，我不是有意顶撞你。

original: PER check.
translation: 感知检查。

original: [SUCCEEDED] {laughs uncomfortably}Well, yeah, okay. You caught me.
translation: {laughs uncomfortably}呵呵，好，行，被你说中了。

original: You're lying. You have no idea where Vault 22 is.
translation: 你撒谎。你根本就不知道22号避难所在哪里。

original: [FAILED] Yeah, so don't bring it up again!
translation: 哦，那就别来再找事！

original: Sorry - didn't mean to be pushy.
translation: 抱歉，我不是有意顶撞你。

original: I see you're wearing a Pip-Boy and Vault suit.
translation: 我看到你戴着一个哔哔小子，穿着一身避难所服。

original: Guns Check
translation: 枪械检查

original: [SUCCEEDED] There so is! Or was it a 9mm{millimeter} or a 10, I don't know! Don't care!
translation: [成功] 啊，对了！是9mm，或者是10mm！总之我才不在乎呢！

original: {flustered}Said I was good at killing shit up! Never said I was good with numbers!
translation: {flustered}说我擅长杀人！从没说过我擅长数学！

original: Too bad there's no such thing as an 11mm submachinegun.
translation: 很遗憾，没有所谓的11毫米冲锋枪这种东西。

original: You do anything around here, besides talk too much?
translation: 你在这除了废话连篇还能做什么吗？

original: I'm one of a kind! I've been places, see? And done things - lots of them!
translation: 我是独一无二的！我去过很多地方，明白吗？并且做了很多事情！

original: And when it's time to kill shit up? Hell yeah, I'm a fucking storm of death!
translation: 知道什么时候是开枪的最佳时机？哈，倒在我枪下的冤魂数也数不过来，因为我是死亡风暴！

original: Something or someone make the mistake of crossing Ricky? I'll fucking deadeye him, her, or it!
translation: 如果有谁或什么东西惹恼了我？哼，我就弄死他，干死她，搞死它！

original: {making it up on the fly}In fact... yeah, in fact, that's my nickname! "Deadeye" Ricky - that's my name!
translation: 事实上...对，事实上，这才是我的绰号！“神枪手”里基！这才是我的名字！

original: Tell me about Waking Cloud's family.
translation: 跟我说说唤醒白云的家人吧。

original: {a bit of apprehension}What, um... what do you want to know, exactly? I'm sure she could tell you much better than I.
translation: 什么呃...你到底想知道什么？我相信她会比我更清楚地告诉你。

original: I'll see you on the other side.
translation: 我在另一边等你。

original: Go with God, sister.
translation: 愿上帝保佑你，姐妹。

original: Ha ha ha! Wait... you don't actually believe that, do you?
translation: 哈哈哈！等等...你不会真的相信，对吧？

original: I know it may be hard for you to accept or even to understand. In my heart, I believe that though I am a sinner, I have been saved.
translation: 我知道这对你来说可能很难接受甚至很难理解。在我心里，我相信虽然我是一个罪人，但我已经得救了。

original: And I believe there is something beyond this rock, and this air, and this water around us, something more that is waiting for us.
translation: 我相信，在我们周围的岩石、空气和水之外，还有别的东西在等着我们。

original: I have been baptized twice, once in water, once in flame. I will carry the fire of the holy spirit inside until I stand before my Lord for judgment.
translation: 我已经接受了两次洗礼，一次在水中，一次在火里。我将在内心里带着圣灵的火焰，直到我站在我的主面前接受审判。

original: Do they speak... our language?
translation: 他们也说...我们的语言吗？

original: Most don't. It's been hundreds of years since the war. They've developed their own languages.
translation: 大部分都不会。自从上一次大战后，已经过去了数百年。他们已经发展出了他们自己的语言。

original: Take the Dead Horses. We think they were originally refugees from a place called {"rehz"}"Res", east of the Grand Canyon.
translation: 以死马部落为例。我们认为他们最初是来自大峡谷东面的叫“雷斯”的地方的难民。

original: They speak a combination of Res and a language spoken by travelers who were visiting Res when the bombs fell. Over time, the two languages blended.
translation: 他们说一种雷斯方言与核弹爆炸时当地旅行者所说的语言。时间长了，两种语言就结合在一起了。

original: I was a translator years ago, but it's hard to keep up with all of the tribal variations.
translation: 多年前我是一名翻译，但很难跟上所有的部落变化。

original: {angry that Jed dismissed your concerns}{under your breath}Sorry to bother you with reality, ol' Jed. Who cares if we can't get back out the way we come? That's not a problem.
translation: {抱歉，老杰德，还是关注一下现在吧。鬼才在乎我们能不能找到回去的路？那不是个问题。

original: {Ticked off by Ricky, and the ambush, she grinds her teeth}Shut the hell up, Ricky! Might as well be waving at 'em!
translation: 闭上你的臭嘴，里基！快朝他们射击！

original: {fed up, under your breath}Goddammit, never shoulda joined this assbackwards caravan...
translation: {fed up, under your breath}上帝啊，早知道我就不来这个莫名其妙的商队了...

original: Don't worry, {mocking}Stella! This was my last hit, but thanks to ol' Johnny-come-lately over there, Ricky got some Fixer to take the edge off.
translation: 别担心，{mocking}史黛拉！这是我最后一针，多亏了那边那个新来的老伙计，里基搞到了点瘾头解。

original: Don't worry, {mocking}Stella! This was my last hit, but thanks to ol' Janey-come-lately over there, Ricky got some Fixer to take the edge off.
translation: 别担心，{mocking}史黛拉！这是我最后一针，多亏了那边那个新来的老姐们，里基搞到了点瘾头解。

original: Here's 300 caps to cover the expenses.
translation: 这是300个瓶盖。

original: That should cover it. Hold on. This shouldn't take long.
translation: 这应该足够了。别动，接下来要不了多长时间。

original: I can handle the expenses. 600 caps should cover everything, shouldn't it?
translation: 我不差钱。600个瓶盖搞定一切，怎么样？

original: Thanks. Hold still. You'll be better in no time.
translation: 谢谢。站着别动，你很快就会好的。

original: Sure. Will 300 caps cover it?
translation: 可以。300个瓶盖够不够？

original: Thanks. Hold still. You'll be better in no time.
translation: 谢谢。站着别动，你很快就会好的。

original: Here's 150 caps for the trouble.
translation: 给，这是150个瓶盖。

original: Thanks. Hold still. You'll be better in no time.
translation: 谢谢。站着别动，你很快就会好的。

original: Yes. Here's 200 caps.
translation: 好的。这是200个瓶盖。

original: Have a seat. This may be a bit uncomfortable.
translation: 请坐。虽然这地方可能不是很舒服。

original: Radiation sickness.
translation: 辐射病，不舒服。

original: Even after all these years, it's still a problem for prospectors, caravan guards, couriers, and tribals. I can fix it.
translation: 即便这么多年过去了，对探险者、商队守卫、邮差以及部落人来说，这依然是一种常见病。你放心，我能治好。

original: Oh, the usual. A few scrapes, burns, and bullet wounds.
translation: 哦，就是些普通的小伤。一些擦伤、烧伤，还有子弹伤。

original: Yeah, you don't look too bad. Shouldn't take much to get you fixed up.
translation: 啊，你气色看起来不差。我看问题不大。

original: It looks like you have a few nasty injuries, but nothing I haven't seen before. Want me to fix you up?
translation: 看起来有些伤口挺严重，但还没有我没处理过的。你放心。

original: Funny sense of humor. I've seen corpses with injuries less severe than yours. This might take a while.
translation: 你真会开玩笑。我见过的一些尸体上的伤口都没你严重。看来得花点时间好好处理一下。

original: I have an addiction problem.
translation: 我有点上瘾了。

original: {sighs}As much as I wish people wouldn't touch alcohol or chems at all, I understand. Would you like me to help?
translation: 唉，虽然我希望人们尽可能少接触那些酒精或药物，但我能理解。你需要我帮你治疗么？

original: You're the New Canaanite who's supposed to help lead these people, not hide things from them.
translation: 你是名新迦南人，你应该帮助领导这些人，而不是向他们隐瞒一切。

original: And you have the right to pull them off of their land?
translation: 那你就有权力把他们驱赶出世世代代生存的家园？

original: I've already explained to them that we're leaving! They've accepted it! What is Joshua going to tell them about being a warrior?
translation: 我已经和他们解释过了我们将要离开这里！而且他们已经都接受了！而约书亚却要教他们如何做一名合格的战士？

original: What are you going to tell them about how to live with themselves after they got lost in the moment, killed someone who didn't {emph}deserve to die?
translation: 当他们迷失在当下，杀了一个本不该死的人之后，你会告诉他们如何面对自己吗？

original: Or does that not matter? Is that just an acceptable consequence if it means holding on to this valley?
translation: 还是说这不重要？如果要继续呆在这个山谷就非要接受那个选择？

original: Maybe there is no place left in this world for mercy. But even if it tramples me into the dust, I will never accept it. And I will never condone it.
translation: 或许这个世界上已经没有怜悯的栖息地。但即使我化为灰烬，我也绝不接受。而且我也决不会宽恕那样的行为。

original: Joshua must be waiting for you. I'll stay here with the others as I told them I would.
translation: 好了，约书亚一定在等你。我会呆在这里，和其他人一起，因为我向他们做过承诺。

original: Why don't you teach them something useful instead of filling their heads with nonsense?
translation: 为什么你不教他们些有用的知识，而是整天灌输那些毫无意义的言论？

original: We teach them practical skills for this life and we prepare them for what's to come.
translation: 我们教他们生存的实用技巧，我们教他们如何为未知的未来做充足的准备。

original: The Sorrows could master all the wonders of the Old World. Conquer the Great Basin north to south. But without God's love, they would have nothing.
translation: 悲恸部落完全可以掌握旧世界的所有奇迹，他们甚至可以征服整个大盆地。但是如果没有上帝的爱，他们将一无所有。

original: It is shelter in the storm, food in times of hunger, warmth and light in the cold and darkness. What can compare to that in value and versatility?
translation: 它是暴风雨时的避难所，饥饿时的食物，寒冷和黑暗时的温暖和光明。在价值和多样性方面，还有什么能与之相比呢？

original: You don't agree. That's your choice. It can be their choice, too. No one is forced to follow the narrow path.
translation: 如果你不赞同，那是你的选择。他们也可以这样选择，没有人被迫走这条狭窄的道路。

original: If you don't acknowledge your past now, it'll come back to you later.
translation: 如果你不敢正视你们的过去，它迟早会回来找你。

original: [SUCCEEDED] True enough. We can't escape it no matter how hard we try. Best we can do is own up, trust in the Lord to forgive.
translation: [成功] 确实如此。无论我们如何努力，我们都无法逃脱。我们能做的就是坦白，相信上帝会原谅。

original: Joshua was gone, so were a lot of the other New Canaanites. White Legs must have been watching for a long while, counting who remained.
translation: 约书亚走了，很多其他新迦南人也走了。白腿一定观察了很久，数着还有谁留下来。

original: We didn't think the White Legs were a real threat. Maybe it was overconfidence. Maybe sloth. Either way, we didn't see them coming.
translation: 我们那时并没有把白腿部落当成是真正的威胁。可能是我们过于自信，可能是我们心中充满了傲慢。总之，我们并没有发觉他们早已蠢蠢欲动。

original: They attacked at night. They killed without regard to age or infirmity. Armed or unarmed. They beat children to-{cut off, overcome with emotion momentarily}
translation: 一天夜里，袭击开始。他们不分男女老幼、军人庶民，统统杀戮。他们甚至把孩子都...

original: {pause}Beat them to death in their beds while they were sleeping. {pause}And now we're all that's left. Maybe thirty of us. {"lesson learned"}Pride goeth before destruction.
translation: {pause}...趁他们睡觉时把他们打死在床上。{pause}现在，我们的人已经所剩无几，也许只剩下30人左右了。{"lesson learned"}骄傲在败坏以先。

original: The White Legs are here already, so what's your plan?
translation: 白腿部落已经聚集在这个地区了，那么你有什么计划？

original: To remove the Sorrows from harm's way. I have to give credit to the White Legs for finding their way here, though I imagine many died in the process.
translation: 我要带领悲恸部落远离纷争。其实我很钦佩白腿部落能不畏艰辛不远万里找到这儿。我想，在这个过程中应该也有很多人死去了。

original: But they can't follow us east, not into the Grand Staircase. They don't know how to live off the land. We head there, we can find some safety.
translation: 但他们不会再继续跟随我们向东进入大阶梯地区了，他们不知道如何以土地为生。我们去那里，就能找到安全的地方。

original: Caesar is dead. I saw to it personally. I thought you should know.
translation: 凯撒死了，我亲自处理的。我觉得你应该听说了。

original: {pause}I have to admit, it's hard to believe. That even after all he did to me, all he {emph}tried to do to find and erase me from this world, he went first.
translation: {pause}我不得不承认，这实在是难以置信。他对我做了那么多，无穷无尽地派人追杀我，费尽心思地要置我于死地，然而他却先我一步化为尘土。

original: No doubt this will be good for the Mojave. I can only hope Arizona and the tribes don't suffer as the Legion falls apart around them.
translation: 对莫哈维来说，这无疑是个好消息。我只是希望亚利桑那州和其他的部落不会因为军团的分崩离析而遭受其它未知的苦难。

original: I've met Caesar, you know. What do you think he would say if I told him you were here?
translation: 你应该知道，我已经见过凯撒了。如果我告诉他你在这里，你猜他会说什么？

original: I think that would put him - and you - in a difficult position. Caesar has agents looking for me, but he won't admit I'm alive.
translation: 我猜，这会把你和他一起陷入一个窘迫的境地。凯撒一直在派他的代理人找我，但他从来没有承认我还活着。

original: And even if you killed me, he can't acknowledge that. To do so would be to admit I had never died. That Caesar made a mistake.
translation: 所以即使你杀掉我，他也不会承认。而且你这么做，就是等于承认我之前还没有死，而这也意味着凯撒一直在撒谎。

original: No. He lives by his lies and shall die by his lies. There is no escaping it.
translation: 不。他以谎言为生，也将因谎言而死。这是无法逃避的。

original: Vow of secrecy? Fine, forget about it.
translation: 发誓保密？忘了不就行了。

original: Forget it? Uh huh. Ricky remembers everything! But he keeps his secrets, too!
translation: 忘掉？呃，里基会牢牢记住每一件事的！但他也会好好地守住他的秘密！

original: What do you know of Salt-Upon-Wounds?
translation: 你对伤口撒盐知道多少？

original: He's a butcher. Believe me, I know the godless fire that burns in his heart. I've been burned by it myself.
translation: 他就是个屠夫。相信我，我理解他内心中燃烧着渎神之火，因为我自己也被灼伤过。

original: He's not the kind to let his subordinates do all the killing. No, he likes to have a hand in it, with that spear of his.
translation: 他不是那种让下属包揽所有杀戮的人。不，他喜欢插手，用他的长矛。

original: He's fashioned himself an abomination before the eyes of the Lord. I'm happy to serve as an instrument of divine justice.
translation: 他把自己塑造成上帝眼中的可憎之物，我很高兴成为履行神圣正义的使者。

original: What do you know of the White Legs?
translation: 你对白腿部落了解多少？

original: They're hateful savages who live only to plunder and destroy. Their leader is a devil called Salt-Upon-Wounds.
translation: 他们是可恨的野蛮人，活着就是为了掠夺和破坏。他们的领袖是一个叫做伤口撒盐的恶魔。

original: War is all he knows. Everything he has, everything that tribe has, was taken by force, raiding and scavenging.
translation: 他只知道战争。他所有的一切，他的部落所拥有的一切，都是通过武力，掠夺和拾荒得来的。

original: It's said there's no man deadlier at close range, that that powerfist of his has smashed a hundred skulls.
translation: 据说没有人敢靠近他，他佩戴的动力拳套已经至少击碎了一百颗头骨。

original: Maybe that's true, but so what? It's a low form of leadership. A tribe that knows only war has no future. And so he'll lead them to Caesar.
translation: 或许这个谣传是真的，但又能怎样？这是一种低级的领导方式，一个只知道战争的部落不会被命运女神垂青。所以他只能带领他们去找凯撒。

original: {Narration}Well, at Hoover Dam, the Malpais Legate finally met his match. Hanlon and Oliver kicked his New Canaanite butt right back over the river.
translation: {Narration}在胡佛大坝，马尔帕斯特使终于遇到了对手。汉隆和奥利弗把这个新迦南人一脚踢回了河对岸。

original: {Narration}{Good or Neutral Karma}As it had been in the years before the Great War, Big {Mountain}MT... the Big Empty... became home to one of the brightest minds of the 23rd century.
translation: {Narration} {Good or Neutral Karma}就如大战前的那些日子，大山脉{Mountain}…大坑洞…聚集了23世纪最聪明的头脑们。

original: {Narration}The Courier watched over the Big Empty for years to come, caring for it, and keeping its discoveries safe until they were needed to help others.
translation: {Narration}在以后的岁月里，邮差一直看管着大坑洞，悉心守护着它的科学发现，直到有一天它们需要用来帮助别人。

original: {Narration}Which had always been Big {Mountain}MT's purpose. Past the laboratories and Science, it had always been intended as a place to build the future of all mankind.
translation: {Narration}这本就是大山脉{Mountain}存在的目的。除了实验和科学，它一直都被设计成一个构建全人类未来的地方。

original: Four as in 4-BIDDEN! Do you hear me Think Tank? It is I, Mobius, hacking your frequenosity.{2D}
translation: 莫比乌斯：四，就如禁止！思想体们，听见没有？是我，莫比乌斯，我黑进了你们的频率。{2D}

original: So if I bring you samples of dried plant life, you can clone them and grow them in these planters?
translation: 所以如果我带给你风干的植物样本，你就可以克隆它们，并种植在这些花盆里？

original: You know it, baby. I just need some samples and I got you going. Take a few days, but trust me - it's all kinds of good.
translation: 你知道的，宝贝，我只需要一些样本就行。需要花几天时间，但是相信我——好处很多。

original: Previous test subjects?
translation: 先前的实验体？

original: Oh, yes. We've had other subjects visit. It's why we had to calibrate the pacification field and warm up our brainial beams and vivisectors.
translation: 哦，是的。有别的实验体来过。这就是为什么我们不得不校准好平静场，准备好脑波射线和解剖器。

original: Only a short time ago, we had three minus one subjects arrive, and they ruined several experiments and even injured two of our staff.
translation: 不久之前，我们有“3减1”个实验体来访，他们破坏了几个试验，甚至伤了我的两个同事。

original: It is a shame their brains left with them. With you, however, we have taken precautions to ensure that problem won't repeat itself.
translation: 这是个耻辱，他们居然保住了自己的脑子。但是对于你，我们已经实施了预防措施，保证同样的问题不会重演。

original: We've conditioned you so you can't speak of this place, discuss our secrets, or attempt to use force against us in any way. Isn't that nice?
translation: 我们已经束缚住了你，所以你无法谈论这个地方，无法讨论我们的秘密，或者试图以武力反抗我们。不错吧？

original: Test data processed... Advanced Optics Online.
translation: 测试数据处理完毕…高级光学设备已上线。

original: Is this Gabe's bowl? Your dog from X-8, Gabe?
translation: 这碗是加布的吧？你那只在X-8里的狗，加布。

original: -WHAT? {Dawning recognition as sees old dog bowl}Why... yes, it is. I used to leave it outside his dog house, chock-full of chems. Before the cybernetic modifications, of course.-
translation: -什么？{Dawning recognition as sees old dog bowl}你怎么…没错，的确是加布的碗。 我过去常放在它的狗屋外面，碗里装满各种化学药品。当然，这是它进行机械改造前的事了。-

original: -{Thinking back, fondly, then starts to gets confused as the emotion hits him}And... no matter how chemmed the food, he would always eat it. And his tail, would wag... even... even while I... I...-
translation: -{Thinking back, fondly, then starts to gets confused as the emotion hits him}而且…不管食物里有多少化学品，加布总会吃下去。而且，它的尾巴总会摇啊摇…哪怕我…我…...-

original: -{Curious, sadness is starting to hit}You know, I am having the most perplexing feeling squiggling through my biogel. I can't quite... pin it down.-
translation: -{Curious, sadness is starting to hit}怎么说呢，有某种异样的感觉漾过我的生物凝胶。并且我…抑制不住它。-

original: I'd like to buy some things.
translation: 我想买些东西。

original: Very good, sir. If I might suggest a table wine, the 64 Atomic Claret is a lovely little vintage.
translation: 是的，老爷。若您找的是佐餐酒，恕我失礼，64年的原子波尔多红葡萄酒是个不错的选择。

original: Very good, sir. And might I venture to opine that a new Trilby might be just the thing to complete sir's ensemble?
translation: 好的，老爷。恕我失礼，我以为，再搭上顶新呢帽，您这身行头就更完美了。

original: Very good, sir. Should sir be in the market for a new suit of morning wear, I have several suggestions that might suit.
translation: 好的，老爷。您若想添置一套晨间套服，我也许能提供些建议。

original: Very good, sir.
translation: 好的，老爷。

original: I'm actually here for a... breather.
translation: 实际上我来这是为了…喘口气。

original: Helped any animals discover their genetic potential recently?
translation: 最近又帮助那些动物发掘他们基因的潜力了？

original: -INDEED. After the memory you accessed about Gabe, I've been looking for ways to help nurture life.-
translation: -是的。你让我想起加布以后，我就开始研究培育新生命的技术。-

original: -Look at THESE. Aren't they quite look-worthy? All dripping with the residue of creation. Wondrous.-
translation: -来看看这个。看起来很有价值，对吧？都是造物时留下的残余物。多神奇啊。-

original: Blindly operate on any poor animals recently?
translation: 最近又拿那些可怜的小动物开刀了？

original: -Why, YES. Although the term is RESEARCH. Thank you.-
translation: -怎么，哦当然了。不过你应该说“研究”。谢谢。-

original: -Look at THESE. They seem to be found inside some of the specimens here at Big MT.-
translation: -看看这个，这些是从大山脉几个实验样本的体内找到的。-

original: I suppose now that we're reunited, you'll want to fill your torso up with those other meaty parts the Think Tank took from us.
translation: 我想既然你我团聚了，你也会想着将思想体们拿走的其他零件装回身体。

original: Personally, I think your upgrades are quite a bit better, but now that I'm with you, the Sink's Auto-Doc can plug them back in, no problem.
translation: 个人来说，我认为你身上的升级版要好一点，但既然现在我跟你在一起，汇聚节点的自动医生也可以把原装版塞回去，没问题的。

original: Right, then, off we go. Klein will be in for a nasty shock when he realizes the pacification field won't work on a mind and body reunited.
translation: 好，那么我们这就走吧。克莱因意识到平静场对重新整合思维和身体的人不起作用之后，他一定会发疯的。

original: *{Quiet, skeptical}I don't know... might be some old Nuka-Cola or Sunset Sarsaparilla bottlecaps lying around. It... It's not "currency" per se...*
translation: {Quiet, skeptical}O：*我不知道…或许是一些古老的核子可乐或者夕阳沙士的瓶盖，在这到处都是。它…它本质上不能算“货币”…...

original: *Still, might be enough to trick the Sink's trade routines. Mobius put that test line for caps in the code as a debug command, I think.*
translation: *不过，或许能够骗过汇聚节点的交易程序。我想莫比乌斯可能曾将有关瓶盖的测试行，作为测试命令加入到代码中。*

original: Yes, but it's still aware and responsive. Look at it... it's regarding us even now, with its big teddy bear eyes.
translation: 达拉：是的，不过它仍有有意识和反应。看啊…即使在此刻，它还在用它的大泰迪熊眼睛注视着我们。

original: If we ask it politely and leave the part about the unnecessary, ruthless lobotimizing out, it might be favorably disposed to us.
translation: 如果我们礼貌的询问它，别管那不必要的、残忍的大脑切除手术，或许它会愿意和我们合作。

original: Can you tell me more about these pylons?
translation: 能跟我说说那些雷达塔么？

original: ASK BOROUS. I BELIEVE HE KNOWS MORE ABOUT THE FENCE THAN ANY BRAIN. EXCEPT MAYBE MOBIUS.
translation: 去问鲍鲁斯。我相信关于防御屏障他懂得比其他的脑子都多，也许除了莫比乌斯。

original: MOBIUS WAS INVOLVED IN THEIR CONSTRUCTION, IF I RECALL. BUT HE'S SUCH A HACK, HE PROBABLY WAS READING OFF BOROUS' NOTES AND SCHEMATICS.
translation: 没记错的话，莫比乌斯也在建设者之列。但他只是个剽窃者，他可能偷看过鲍鲁斯的笔记和图纸。

original: Uh... great. I don't want to hear any more about that.
translation: 噢…太好了，我一点也不想往下听了。

original: {Slight frustration, trying to make a point}...don't want to argue philosophy with you. Brotherhood are {emph}preservationists. Tech in the wrong hands, it's dangerous. Mojave's proof.
translation: {Slight frustration, trying to make a point}…我不想就理念问题和你争辩。兄弟会是群{emph}保护主义者。科技若落入恶徒之手，就会变得很危险。莫哈维废土就是最好的例子。

original: {Shrugs}No denying that. Proof's here in this crater, all around us. {Beat, slightly appraising}Your tribe, the Brotherhood - haven't met many of you. Wanted to.
translation: {Shrugs}我不否认这点。证据就在这环形坑里，在我们身边到处都是。{Beat, slightly appraising}你的部落，我是说兄弟会，我没怎么接触过你们，但我希望能。

original: {More reflective}Thought you might be the last chance for the Mojave... the West. The East. But you're all the same mind, obsessed.
translation: {More reflective}本想或许你会是莫哈维最后的希望…不管是西部，还是东部。但事实上你们都一样，一样的痴迷不悟。

original: {emph, correcting}Elijah is obsessed. He's mad. It's why they ordered his execution.
translation: {emph, correcting}痴迷不悟的是以利亚。他已经疯了。正是因此兄弟会才决定处决他。

original: {"You..."}Two are more alike than you know, too wrapped up in the wrong bits of history to see ahead. {Shrugs}Not judging. I know how it is.
translation: {"You..."}你们两个比你认为的要相似得多。同样囿于过去的错误，无法面对未来。{Shrugs}这不是批判。我知道那是什么感觉。

original: {Quieter, reflective}People are like couriers, you and him. Sometimes don't even know the message they bring.
translation: {Quieter, reflective}人们就像邮差一样，包括你和他。有时甚至不知道自己送的信是什么。

original: {Turns attention back to her}You all had a {emph}new flag. Thought maybe new ideas along with it. {Beat, quieter}What you believe isn't any better than the Bear or Bull. No future in either.
translation: {Turns attention back to her}你们都树起{emph}新旗帜，认为其中也许伴随有新的理念。{Beat, quieter}但你所信仰的并不好于双头熊，或公牛，也不见得更有前途。

original: {Defiance}So says the man with the Old World flag on his back. America, the Commonwealth... burned away.
translation: {Defiance}这位背上画着旧世界旗帜的男人不也一样么。要知道美国，那个联邦…早已灰飞烟灭了。

original: {Slight anger, low}America {emph}sleeps. And until it's dead, I carry it. Just like I carried you. More than hope. Belief.
translation: {Slight anger, low}美国{emph}只是陷入沉睡。只要我带着她，她就没有死。正如我刚刚带着你一样。这不仅仅是希望，更是信仰。

original: There's voices here in the Big Empty, I want to talk to them. Not like your Elijah did. {End on a downnote, like a movie trailer going away}Got questions. Want to hear history give its answer.
translation: 大坑洞（Big Empty）里的声音，我想和他们谈谈。我无意效仿你的那位以利亚。我有些问题，想听听历史会给出什么答案。

original: I'll save it, don't want to mix it with alcohol if I can help it.
translation: 下次吧，我不想喝过酒后还嗑药。

original: {DUPE: Chewing on one, smacking lips}Mmm. I love Mentats. Delicious and smarty.
translation: {DUPE: Chewing on one, smacking lips}啊嗯，我爱吃曼他特，美味又健脑。

original: I'll save it for later.
translation: 下次再说吧。

original: {DUPE: Chewing on one, smacking lips}Mmm. I love Mentats. Delicious and smarty.
translation: {DUPE: Chewing on one, smacking lips}啊嗯，我爱吃曼他特，美味又健脑。

original: I need my equipment repaired.
translation: 我的装备需要修理一下。

original: Very good, sir.
translation: 好的，老爷。

original: I couldn't care less about all of this. Can I go?
translation: 我不关心这些。我能走了吗？

original: I saw another light switch in the other room. Do you control that one too?
translation: 那边的房间也有一个灯开关，你也能控制那个么？

original: Oh... {disgust}her. Trust me, sweetie, you're better off not thinking about {emph}that frigid little ice queen.
translation: 哦…{disgust}你说她啊。相信我，亲爱的，你最好离那个{emph}冷冰冰的小冰雪女王远点。

original: If the Think Tank won't hold up their bargain, we'll make them. Let's go.
translation: 思想体反悔的话，我们就只能让他们无法拒绝了。走吧。

original: {Sigh}Very well, I suppose I have no choice. Goodbye, peaceful, soothing brain jar, hello, head wounds and scorpions.
translation: {Sigh}好吧，我想我也没别的选择了。别了，平静、舒适的脑缸。你好，头上的伤口和蝎子们。

original: {2D Announcement}PLEASE AVOID BOOM TOWN FOR THE FORESEEABLE FUTURE, UNTIL WEAPON TESTING IS RESOLVED.
translation: {2D Announcement}在可预见的未来里，请勿靠近“新兴城市”，直至武器试验结束。

original: So, what, you'd rather just stay here? Never leaving that tank of... whatever that stuff is?
translation: 所以，就是说，你打算就待在这了？寸步不离这个什么罐？

original: HELIOS One coming back on-line.
translation: 太阳神一号再次运转。

original: You ever heard of Tiny Lester Lutton? Best jazz harmonica I ever heard. Mind you, being a Super Mutant with no lips... don't ask me how he played.
translation: 听说过小李斯特·卢顿吗？我心目中最好的爵士乐口琴家。跟你说吧，他是个没嘴唇的超级变种人…别问我他是怎么演奏的。

original: Sir's accoutrements are precisely where sir has left them, and should the toaster say otherwise, I remind sir that it is a wastrel.
translation: 您寄存在这的装备没有人动过，老爷。但容我提醒您，烤面包机那废物可能会在这件事上唱反调。

original: {Narration}It refers to those so obsessed with the past, they can't see the present, much less the future, for what it {emph}is.
translation: {Narration}它用来形容这么一群人，他们“沉缅往昔，不见当下，遑论将来”。

original: {Narration}{Rex not dead, not available}{Done with barking}There, she ran across Rex at the King's School of Impersonation. His brain was failing. That was all right, he was still smarter than the Think Tank.
translation: {Narration}{Rex not dead, not available}{Done with barking}在猫王模仿学校，她遇到了雷克斯。他的大脑正在衰败。但她不觉得这是个问题，他依旧比那些思想体聪明。

original: {Narration}{Higgs Village was discovered}Muggy did his best to collect coffee cups, although in his quest, he accidentally trapped himself in Higgs Village.
translation: {Narration}{Higgs Village was discovered}小杯具依旧尽其所能去收集马克杯。不过在一次探索中，它不小心把自己困在了希格斯村里。

original: {Narration}It might have been the end for poor Muggy.
translation: {Narration}小杯具本以为会这样可悲地死去。

original: {Narration}Except... he found it peaceful there, tidying up the kitchens of the Think Tank Professors back when they had been flesh and bone.
translation: {Narration}没想到…通过清扫智库博士们在人类时代使用的厨房，他居然在那里找到了平静。

original: {Narration}{To himself}Well, except for Dr. O, who was an asshole for having created Muggy in the first place.
translation: {Narration}{To himself}好吧，除了O博士，那个最初创造了小杯具的混蛋。

original: {Narration}{Proudly defiant}Muggy left O's house deliberately dirty, punishing the dishes and cups that lived there in blind revenge for serving Dr. O.
translation: {Narration}为了报复O博士，小杯具故意把O的房子弄得特别脏，并盲目地虐待那里的杯碟。

original: Was there any other data transmitted in your threat broadcast?
translation: 你在威胁广播里还给他们传递过其他信息么？

original: Yes, my overly aggressive chemmed-up broadcast was designed to keep reinforcing the "forget," "fear," "rinse," and "repeat" program.
translation: 当然，我嗑药发疯时极具侵略性的广播，就是为了不断强化他们的"遗忘"、"恐惧"、“清洗”和"重复"程序。

original: Oh, and the "get me the things to castrate your only possible escape attempt."
translation: 哦，我还说了："给我拿回这些技术，好让我掐灭你们最后一丝逃生希望"。

original: But I couldn't delete you or your arrival any more than I could the other visitors. {Shakes head}Only so much Science can do when you started talking to them.
translation: 虽然我能删除他们对其他来访者的记忆，但我没法删掉你的。{Shakes head}在你与他们交谈开始，科学就无能为力了。

original: You're really quiet difficult to ignore, you know. It's because you're... well, bah! Rather intriguing, if you'll forgive an old brain for saying so.
translation: 知道吗，你令人很难忽视。你…呃，呸！相当引人注目，请原谅我这个年老的大脑说出这种话。

original: In any event, {emph}you showed up at the Think Tank, and because you had suffered a cranial injury in just the right place...
translation: 不管怎样，{emph}后来你出现在了智库，而且因为头部的那个位置正好受过伤…

original: Bullets in the head are usually much more fatal, and yours was a light case of bullet-head-itis.
translation: 常人脑袋中枪早就没命了，你却只有弹头导致的轻度炎症。

original: But... it was enough for the Auto-Doc in the Sink to change its programming to fix the problem. And the brain extraction technology, for once, worked.
translation: 但…为了修正问题，汇聚节点的自动医生还是改变了手术程序。大脑提取技术也因此碰巧完美奏效了，这是多年来的首次。

original: That gave the Think Tank the knowledge its brains shouldn't... couldn't... {should+couldn't}sh'couldn't possess. With that knowledge, the procedure can be reversed.
translation: 这次手术让思想体们获得了他们不应…不能…{should+couldn't}不应能拥有(scouldn't)的知识。有了这一知识，大脑提取手术将能被逆向执行。

original: If they obtain that procedural data, they can use it to mush and modify their cranial selves into hosts to slip past the Radar Fence, I'm sure of it.
translation: 我确信，如果获得了手术的数据，他们就能找到办法把大脑安回身体里，从而越过雷达屏障。

original: And once they're off the reservation...
translation: 而一旦他们离开这里…

original: IF WE'RE GOING TO BRING THE SOCRATIC METHOD INTO IT, FINE. GIVE THE LOBOTO-BEAR A COMBUSTION GUN. BOROUS? DON'T YOU HAVE SOMETHING LIKE THAT?
translation: 克莱因：如果非要搞苏格拉底式反诘法，好吧，那就给这只无脑熊它要的火器。鲍鲁斯？记得你有这种东西？

original: {Grumpy}FINE. DONE. THAT GUN MAKES ME UNCOMFORTABLE ANYWAY, ALWAYS WORRIED IT'S GOING TO HUMP MY CHASSIS. ANYTHING ELSE, LOBOTOMITE?
translation: {克莱因：{Grumpy}很好，这件事就这样吧。那把枪我不爽很久了，总担心它会顶起我的底盘。还有什么其他事，无脑人 ?

original: Do you even know what these technologies do?
translation: 你连它们干什么用的都不知道？

original: {Defensive}I KNOW HOW THESE TECHNOLOGIES WORK. {Beat}OF COURSE I KNOW.
translation: {Defensive}我知道它们的用途。{Beat}我当然知道。

original: {Frustrated}IF YOU REMEMBER, WE DESCRIBED THEM IN CLEARLY ABSTRACT, CONTRADICTORY STATEMENTS BEFORE. WHY WOULD WE DO THAT IF WE WEREN'T CERTAIN ON...
translation: {Frustrated}你应该记得，之前我们清晰明了地描述过它们，它们的作用非此即彼。这说明我们不可能不知道它们…...

original: {Uncertain}...ON HOW TO USE THEM, YES. SO LET ME... HMM, A BIT, I... I'LL FIGURE IT OUT.
translation: {Uncertain}…怎么使用，对。所以让我…嗯，一小会儿，我…我马上就能搞清楚。

original: So, genius, what now?
translation: 那么大天才，接下来呢 ?

original: I can't let you dissect the Mojave. Or let you leave.
translation: 我不能放任你们去解剖莫哈维。不能放你们出去。

original: I'M NOT GOING TO HARM IT, I'M GOING TO DISSECT IT UNTIL IT'S DEAD. {Suspicious}WHY THE SUDDEN {Means "interjection," on purpose}INTERSECTION, DALA.
translation: 克莱因：我们不会伤害它，只是在它完蛋前详尽地解剖一番。{Suspicious}为什么突然{Means "interjection," on purpose}打断我，达拉。

original: -{Quiet, sad - actually leveling out}I, for one, cannot bear to let this continue.-
translation: 鲍鲁斯：-{Quiet, sad - actually leveling out}我，就我个人而言，我绝对不能容忍这种事情继续下去。-

original: -I don't see what is to be gained by throwing another body into our labs... especially one that has done us a service, gone where we feared to go.-
translation: -我看不出继续把又一个活物扔进实验室对我们有什么好处…更何况它还曾帮助过我们，前往我们惧怕的地方。-

original: -This Lobotomite doesn't deserve our knives. It deserves our respect. We should care for it. Feed it. Nurture it - give it the life Gabe never had.-
translation: -这只无脑人不应该被解剖，它值得我们尊敬。我们应该照顾它，喂养它，培育它——给它加布没能有的生活。-

original: -{Matter-of-fact}If I may, I feel as if I must be the voice of reason here.-
translation: 鲍鲁斯：-{Matter-of-fact}恕我冒昧，但这里此刻需要我理性的声音。-

original: -This Lobotomite is much like us, regarding even animals and pets as nothing more than avenues to promote Science! There is good here.-
translation: -这只无脑人和我们很像，明白动物、宠物之流只不过是科学进步的踏脚石！这点很好。-

original: -Instead of ending its life on the table, we should prolong its suffering, in the name of Science. Like good old Gabe, the FINEST of lab specimens.-
translation: -比起在手术台上结束它的生命，我们更应该延长它的痛苦，为了科学。就像亲爱的老加布，是最好的实验样本。-

original: I can bring the Mojave, this world, to you. You'll be safe, and you'll still be able to experiment.
translation: 我可以把莫哈维废土，这个世界带到你们面前。这样你不但安全，还能继续进行实验。

original: {Cold}Thought that explosion, that building falling deep in the Divide, might have been your work... wouldn't kill you, maybe close.
translation: {Cold}我还以为那爆炸，那座被深深埋在大裂谷里的大楼可能是你的杰作... 不会杀死你，也接近了。

original: Knew you'd survive... but no need to go any farther. You've brought me what I need - that machine with you, sealed in the Hopeville silo.
translation: 我知道你会活下来的...但不需要再往前走了。你给我带来了我需要的东西，那台封存在黎明镇发射井里的机器。

original: Needed someone to unlock it - bring it home. {Cold}Now the signal's strong enough, no need for you to carry it anymore. I can call your machine to me.
translation: 需要有人来解锁 - 把它带回家。{Cold}现在既然信号已经足够强了，就不需要你再带着它了，我会把你的机器召唤回来。

original: Wow, do you kiss your mother with that mouth?
translation: 哇哦，你是用这张嘴亲你妈妈的吗？

original: <Embarrassed beeping>{NPCRobotEdEHomingBeep}
translation: <尴尬的哔哔声>{NPCRobotEdEHomingBeep}

original: Can you repair my weapon?
translation: 帮我修一下武器吧？

original: <Happy beeping>{NPCRobotEdEHappy}
translation: <开心的哔哔声>{NPCRobotEdEHappy}

original: Come on. We're ending this. Right now.
translation: 来吧。我们要结束这一切，就现在。

original: <Determined beeping>{NPCRobotEdEAnger}
translation: <坚决的哔哔声>{NPCRobotEdEAnger}

original: {Marked Men enter the Temple, combat starts}They come for us, East and West alike.
translation: {Marked Men enter the Temple, combat starts}他们为我们而来，不管是东方还是西方。

original: Those Marked Men in Hopeville - some had strange masks and blades I'd never seen before.
translation: 那些黎明镇的烙印者...有些人戴着我从未见过的奇怪面具和刀刃。

original: They bear false versions of Legate Lanius' mask, the one Caesar fashioned for him. Thought that it was an insult at first.... {to himself}know better now.{No sound file}
translation: 他们都戴着着山寨的拉尼厄斯特使面具，那是凯撒为他量身订做的。起初还以为这是一种侮辱...{to himself}现在我明白了。{No sound file}

original: It's shaped from Divide metal, not with care and strength, but with hate. Keeps them anchored.
translation: 它是以大裂谷的金属制成的，这之中夹杂的并非谨慎与力量，而是怨恨。戴上后便如同烙印般难以摘下了。

original: Crude, effective - like the blades they carry, distant mirrors of their Legate. A symbol they can hold on to - while the Divide tears at them.
translation: 粗糙，但有效 - 正如他们背负的刀剑，他们军团特使的遥远镜像。当大裂谷撕扯他们的时候，一个可以坚持下去的象征。

original: Is this where you're making camp?
translation: 你在这里扎营吗？

original: {Thinking}Antivenom's helpful around the Mojave with the Bark Scorpions. Even one sting can kill you. {Beat}Tunneler bite can be just as bad.
translation: {Thinking}抗毒血清在莫哈维对付树皮蝎很有帮助，被那玩意儿蛰一下就会没命。{Beat}被掘穴者咬伤也同样严重。

original: My tribe, Twisted Hairs, had a better way than Antivenom, if you act fast.
translation: 我的部落，卷发部族有一个比抗毒血清更好的方法。当然，你得行动迅速才行。

original: Snakebite Tourniquet - cuts off the venom, no need to scavenge glands and blood. {Himself, slight disgust}Or drink that mess.
translation: 蛇毒止血带 - 直接阻断毒液，就不需要寻找腺体与血液了。{Himself, slight disgust}或者喝那乱七八糟的玩意。

original: Part of the reason we wore our hair like we did, {corrects self}like I do now.
translation: 这也是我们发型弄成这样的原因之一，{corrects self}就像我现在这样。

original: Here's some for the road - trick to making it is not hard. {Beat}Get bit, hook and twist it. Fast as blinking, doesn't give poison time to sink in.
translation: 这还有些路上用的 - 制作的技巧并不难。{Beat}被咬伤后，钩住然后扭转它。动作要快如眨眼，以防止毒液迅速渗入体内。

original: Any more recipes.. or histories... you can teach?
translation: 还有什么配方...或历史...你能教给我的？

original: [FAILED] <Confused beeping>{NPCRobotEdELaugh}
translation: [失败] <困惑的哔哔声>{NPCRobotEdELaugh}

original: Wow, you're way better at fixing weapons than me!
translation: 哇，你修理武器比我牛逼多了！

original: I couldn't care less about history - and even less about Caesar.
translation: 我不太关心历史，更不关心凯撒。

original: The logs of the Big Empty mentioned you'd spoken to history.
translation: 大空洞的日志里提到你曾与历史对话。

original: {Slow, thinking back}I had, did. It was madness... asked them a question in anger. {Beat}Got an answer, more than I expected.
translation: {Slow, thinking back}我有过，做过。这很疯狂...愤怒地问了他们一个问题，{Beat}得到了答案，比我预期的要多。

original: {Quiet, to himself}Answer told me what happened here at the Divide, the how of it, and that was enough.
translation: {Quiet, to himself}答案告诉了我大裂谷发生了什么，是如何发生的，这就够了。

original: {Resolved, closing this up}The tape has the telling of it, don't need me adding to the questions already there.
translation: {Resolved, closing this up}磁带里已经讲述了一切，不需要我再加上已经存在的问题。

original: In the logs... you mentioned a tribe called the Twisted Hairs - your tribe?
translation: 在日志里...你提到一个叫做“卷发”的部落...你的部落？

original: {Anger}Twisted Hairs are dead, lost at Dry Wells, died in Vulpes' smile. Won't discuss their fate with you, not now - their past is {emph}mine to keep.
translation: {Anger}卷发部落已经死了，在枯井里消失了，死在了沃尔普斯的微笑中。我不会和你谈论他们的命运，现在不会 - 他们的过去{emph}由我来保留。

original: Walk farther, see me face to face - you might earn more. Now, let the words keep you without me adding to them.
translation: 走远一点，来和我面对面 - 你可能会得到更多。现在，让这些话陪伴你而不用我再补充。

original: Vegas earned its right to survive, its people don't deserve what's about to happen.
translation: 维加斯赢得了生存的权利，它的人民不应该遭受即将发生的一切。

original: {DUPE}[FAILED] No... your answer is not enough.
translation: {DUPE}[失败]不...你的答案还不够。

original: {Cold}They deserve what comes. Vegas is born of the corrupt, the blind, lost, that gather to it. Without them... it would fall dark.
translation: {Cold}这是他们应得的。维加斯是由堕落、盲目、迷失的人组成的... 没有他们，它将陷入黑暗。

original: You believe. Yet... you have been blinded by the wrong symbol. {Slightly sympathetic}Let its light give you what strength it can... today marks its end.
translation: 你相信。然而...你被错误的象征蒙蔽了双眼。{Slightly sympathetic}让它的灯光给你它所能给予的力量，今天标志着它的终结。

original: Even if the missiles launch, and I die here - if I can convince you, that's enough for me.
translation: 即使导弹发射，我死在这里，如果我能说服你，那对我来说就足够了。

original: I don't care what happens to NCR, but I can't allow you to harm the Legion.
translation: 我不在乎NCR会怎么样，但我不能允许你伤害军团。

original: Not all the East will burn. The Legion does not need to be destroyed, only... contained within new borders.
translation: 不是所有的东部都会被烧毁。军团不必被摧毁，只需要...被控制在新的边界内。

original: After that, it will fall as any culture bred on war, on forward momentum. It will falter, collapse.
translation: 在那之后，它会像任何在战争中孕育的文明一样，在前进的势头中衰落。它会衰落，崩溃。

original: I will start with their camps at Dry Wells... once my homeland. Justice of a sort.
translation: 我会从他们在枯井的营地开始...我曾经的家乡。勉强称得上正义吧。

original: Come Fly With Me
translation: 伴我翱翔

original: Investigate rumors of ghoul activity in the Rocket Facility.
translation: 调查火箭设施里有关尸鬼的谣言

original: Head upstairs to meet the owner of the voice on the intercom.
translation: 上楼与通讯器中的人会面

original: Speak to Jason Bright
translation: 与辐光杰森对话

original: Get rid of the Nightkin so the ghouls can access the rockets once more
translation: 消灭夜行族，让尸鬼们可以进入火箭发射场

original: Fix the rockets
translation: 修好火箭

original: Launch the rockets!
translation: 发射火箭！

original: Chris Haversam has died before the launch sequence could be completed.
translation: 克里斯·哈沃萨姆在未赶得及完成发射流程之前就去世了。

original: The rockets successfully launched!
translation: 火箭成功发射了！

original: The rockets crashed!
translation: 火箭坠毁了！

original: Jason Bright dead, rockets crashed, news at 11!!!
translation: 辐光杰森死了，火箭坠毁了，这足以上晚间新闻了！

original: Enter the facility and discover the source of the ghouls.
translation: 进入设施并找到尸鬼成灾的源头。

original: Speak with Jason Bright, the leader of the REPCONN ghouls.
translation: 与瑞普康尸鬼的首领辐光杰森对话。

original: Head up to the viewing platform and complete the launch sequence.
translation: 前往观测台完成发射程序。

original: Speak to Chris Haversam about fixing the rockets.
translation: 与克里斯·哈沃萨姆谈谈修好火箭的事情。

original: (Optional) Sabotage the rockets so that they crash on launch.
translation: (可选) 破坏火箭，让它们在发射的时候坠毁。

original: Find atomic fuel for the rockets.
translation: 为火箭寻找核能燃料。

original: Find parts to fix the rockets' thrust controllers.
translation: 找到可用于维修火箭的推进器控制组件。

original: Get rid of the Nightkin in the basement.
translation: 清除地下室里的夜行族。

original: (Optional) Search the nearby room for the Stealth Boy shipment the Nightkin are looking for.
translation: (可选)搜索附近的房间，找到夜行族所寻找的隐身小子存货。

original: Return to the Rocket Facility and give the fuel to Chris Haversam.
translation: 回到发射设施并将燃料交给克里斯·哈沃萨姆。

original: Return to the Rocket Facility and give the parts to Chris Haversam.
translation: 回到发射设施并将推进器控制组件交给克里斯·哈沃萨姆。

original: Report to Jason Bright that the Nightkin are gone.
translation: 回去告诉辐光杰森夜行族已经离开了。

original: Bring 3 Sugar Bombs to Chris Haversam.
translation: 带三盒糖弹麦片给克里斯·哈沃萨姆。

original: (Optional) Find Harland's friend, who has been imprisoned by the Nightkin.
translation: (可选)找到哈兰被夜行族囚禁的同伴。

original: Talk to Chris Haversam to begin preparations for the rocket launch.
translation: 与克里斯·哈沃萨姆交谈，为火箭发射做准备。

original: (Optional) Return to Harland and let him know the bad news.
translation: (可选)回到哈兰处告诉他这个坏消息。

original: Head upstairs to meet with the owner of the voice from the intercom.
translation: 上楼去寻找和你通讯的人。

original: Head to the REPCONN facility west of Novac to investigate rumors of ghoul activity there.
translation: 前往诺瓦克西侧的瑞普康设施，调查那里的尸鬼活动。

original: (Optional) Find the leader of the "demons" and speak with him.
translation: (可选)找到"恶魔帮"的首领并与他对话。

original: Head to the REPCONN basement and talk to Jason Bright about what comes next.
translation: 前往瑞普康的地下室与辐光杰森探讨下一步该怎么做。

original: (Optional) Return to Davison with news that the Stealth Boys are not in the REPCONN facility.
translation: (可选)回到戴维森处，告诉他隐身小子并不在瑞普康设施里。

original: They Went That-a-Way
translation: 他们往那边去了

original: Travel to Novac.
translation: 前往诺瓦克。

original: (Optional) Ask around the saloon in Goodsprings for information about your attackers.
translation: (可选)在清泉镇的沙龙中打听袭击你的人的消息。

original: Find the men who tried to kill you.
translation: 找到那个试图杀死你的男人。

original: Inquire about your delivery assignment with the administrator of the Mojave Express in Primm.
translation: 向普瑞姆的莫哈维快递负责人打听你运送的包裹的情报。

original: Head to Novac through Nipton. Ask around Novac about your attackers.
translation: 穿过尼普顿前往诺瓦克。在诺瓦克附近打探袭击你的人的消息。

original: Intercept the Great Khans at Boulder City.
translation: 在巨石城拦截大汗帮的手下。

original: Discover the current location of the Platinum Chip.
translation: 找到白金筹码现在的下落。

original: (Optional) Talk to Victor in Goodsprings about your rescue.
translation: (可选)和清泉镇的维克多谈谈你的获救经过。

original: Find out from Manny Vargas where the Khans were headed.
translation: 到曼尼·瓦尔加斯那里打听大汗帮的手下去哪里了。

original: Find Primm's lawman to get information on where your attackers went.
translation: 找普瑞姆的治安官打听袭击你的人的下落。

original: Get Beagle's Journal from his corpse to get information on your attackers.
translation: 从比格尔身上拿到他的日志，并寻找关于袭击你的人的线索。

original: Search Manny's body for clues about your attackers' whereabouts.
translation: 搜索曼尼的尸体，寻找袭击者的下落。

original: Listen to Beagle's journal to get information on where your attackers have gone.
translation: 听取曼尼的日志，了解袭击者的下落。

original: I Fought the Law
translation: 法律斗士

original: Deal with Chavez.
translation: 处理查韦斯。

original: Dealt with Chavez.
translation: 查韦斯已经被解决了。

original: Shake down the water merchant.
translation: 勒索贩水商。

original: "Water merchant" dealt with. Return to Eddie.
translation: "贩水商人"已经处理了。回去找埃迪。

original: Merchant killed. Return to Eddie.
translation: 贩水商人被杀了。回去报告埃迪。

original: Scout Primm and find out what the NCR's up to.
translation: 调查普瑞姆，弄清楚NCR的企图。

original: Return to Eddie.
translation: 回到埃迪处。

original: Rendezvous with Sergeant Lee.
translation: 与李中士碰头。

original: Kill Eddie.
translation: 杀死埃迪

original: Eddie taken out.
translation: 已经除掉了埃迪。

original: Deal with Chavez.
translation: 处理查韦斯。

original: Track down the suspicious merchant and get rid of him.
translation: 找到那个可疑的商人并除掉他。

original: Talk to the locals in Primm and learn what - if anything - the NCR is planning for the correctional facility.
translation: 与普瑞姆的当地人交谈，了解NCR是否有计划夺回劳教所。

original: Tell Eddie that you dealt with Chavez.
translation: 告诉埃迪你已经处理了查韦斯。

original: Return to Eddie.
translation: 回到埃迪处。

original: Report back to Eddie with information on the NCR's planned attack.
translation: 回去报告埃迪，说NCR已经做好进攻的准备。

original: Rendezvous with Sergeant Lee.
translation: 与李中士碰头。

original: Kill Eddie.
translation: 杀死埃迪。

original: (Optional) Betray Eddie by offering Lieutenant Hayes assistance in retaking the prison.
translation: (可选)背叛埃迪并在海耶斯中尉重夺监狱的过程中给予帮助。

original: That Lucky Old Sun
translation: 太阳照常升起

original: Connect to the HELIOS One mainframe from the western reflector control terminal.
translation: 将西侧的反射板控制终端接入太阳神一号的主机。

original: Connect to the HELIOS One mainframe from the eastern reflector control terminal.
translation: 将东侧的反射板控制终端接入太阳神一号的主机。

original: Restore power to the HELIOS One mainframe via an auxiliary generator.
translation: 用备用发电机重新给太阳神一号的主机供电。

original: Use the HELIOS One mainframe to send power to a destination of your choosing.
translation: 使用太阳神一号的主机为你选择的目的地传输电力。

original: Initiate reflector retargeting from the console on the tower observation deck.
translation: 通过塔楼观测台的控制器面板重新定位反射板。

original: Talk to the idiot wearing sunglasses in the back of the HELIOS One plant building.
translation: 与太阳神一号电站里那个戴着太阳镜的白痴谈谈。

original: Talk to Fantastic.
translation: 与珍世邦交谈。

original: Talk to Ignacio.
translation: 与伊格纳西奥交谈。

original: (Optional) Arm ARCHIMEDES security system to wipe out all nearby NCR soldiers.
translation: (可选) 启动阿基米德保卫系统，消灭电站周围的NCR士兵。

original: I Put a Spell on You
translation: 令君为我痴

original: Talk to Captain Curtis.
translation: 与柯蒂斯上尉交谈。

original: Ask around about suspicious activity at Camp McCarran.
translation: 打听麦卡伦营地周围的可疑活动。

original: Investigate the late-night break-ins at the Camp McCarran control tower.
translation: 调查深夜闯入麦卡伦营地控制塔的嫌疑人。

original: Find and defuse the bomb on the McCarran monorail before it leaves the terminal.
translation: 在列车离开前找到并拆除单轨铁路上的炸弹。

original: Report to Colonel Hsu.
translation: 向许上校报告。

original: Pick up the explosives and bomb ingredients in the trash can by the ticketing counter at the Camp McCarran terminal building.
translation: 收回麦卡伦营地大楼售票柜台附近垃圾桶里的爆炸物和爆炸装置。

original: Plant an explosive charge in a vent at the back wall of the McCarran monorail car.
translation: 在麦卡伦单轨铁路后墙的排风口上安装一个定时炸弹。

original: Get off the train and watch it depart.
translation: 下车然后目送它出发。

original: Plant a fission battery, conductor, Wonderglue, a box of Abraxo Cleaner, and the plans inside Private Crenshaw's footlocker.
translation: 在列兵克伦肖的脚柜里放入核裂变电池、导管、万能胶和一盒阿伯莱萨清洁剂，还有袭击计划。

original: Report to Colonel Hsu and frame Private Crenshaw.
translation: 向许上校举报列兵克伦肖。

original: Return to Captain Curtis.
translation: 向柯蒂斯上尉复命。

original: Kill Private Crenshaw.
translation: 杀死列兵克伦肖。

original: Offer to help Colonel Hsu find the spy.
translation: 提出要帮许上校找到间谍。

original: Pick up the explosives in the trash can by the ticketing counter at the Camp McCarran terminal building.
translation: 收回麦卡伦营地大楼售票柜台附近垃圾桶里的爆炸物和爆炸装置。

original: Report Colonel Hsu's refusal to Captain Curtis.
translation: 告诉柯蒂斯上尉许上校拒绝了你的请求。

original: Eavesdrop on the radio transmission.
translation: 窃听无线电消息。

original: See if you can assist Captain Curtis in his operation at Camp McCarran.
translation: 帮助柯蒂斯上尉在麦卡伦营地里实施破坏。

original: The White Wash
translation: 洗白

original: Anderson surrendered; Westside continues to get water.
translation: 安德森投降了；西区又有水了。

original: Anderson sacrifices himself; Westside continues to get water.
translation: 安德森妥协了；西区又有水了。

original: Talk to Dazzle about the missing Corporal White.
translation: 向达泽了解失踪的怀特下士的情况。

original: Find out what Trent Bascom knows about Corporal White.
translation: 向特伦特·巴斯克姆打听怀特下士的下落。

original: Speak with Lieutenant Romanowski about Corporal White.
translation: 向罗曼诺夫斯基中尉了解怀特下士的情况。

original: Ask Tom Anderson about Corporal White's whereabouts.
translation: 向汤姆·安德森询问怀特下士的下落。

original: Find someone else in Westside who may have seen Corporal White.
translation: 问问西区是否有其他人知道怀特下士的下落。

original: Follow Hector during the day and find out where he's getting his water.
translation: 在白天时跟踪赫克托，找到他获得纯净水的水源地。

original: Confront Anderson about Corporal White's disappearance.
translation: 与安德森对质，让他说出怀特下士的下落。

original: Speak with Etienne to complete your "business" arrangement with Anderson.
translation: 与埃迪尼对话，让他兑现安德森承诺给你的"好处"。

original: Tell Lieutenant Boyd what happened to Corporal White.
translation: 向博伊德中尉报告怀特下士的情况。

original: Kill Anderson.
translation: 杀死安德森。

original: (Optional) Look through Corporal White's personal effects in his locker in the McCarran Concourse area.
translation: (可选)查看一下麦卡伦营地广场上怀特下士箱子里的个人财物。

original: Someone to Watch Over Me
translation: 愿得良人在侧

original: Convince the squatters to leave North Vegas.
translation: 说服入侵者离开被维加斯。

original: Drive off the fiends terrorizing North Vegas.
translation: 将在北维加斯作恶的恶魔帮赶走。

original: Talk to Mrs. Hostetler about her problem.
translation: 和霍斯泰特勒夫人谈谈她遇到的麻烦。

original: Talk to Alice Hostetler about her new friends.
translation: 与爱丽丝·霍斯泰特勒谈谈她的新朋友。

original: Deal with the newcomers.
translation: 对付外来流民。

original: Deal with the band of troublemakers.
translation: 对付闹事的油脂帮。

original: Talk to Mrs. Hostetler.
translation: 与霍斯泰特勒夫人交谈。

original: Find information about Alice Hostetler's new friends.
translation: 打听一下爱丽丝·霍斯泰特勒的新朋友的消息。

original: No sign of either Alice or Andy. Inspect The Gray for clues to their whereabouts.
translation: 没有看见爱丽丝或者安迪。调查灰楼以寻找他们的下落。

original: Talk to Crandon about the greasers in the sewers.
translation: 与克兰登谈谈下水道那帮小混混的处理情况。

original: Talk to Crandon about the newcomers.
translation: 与克兰登谈谈流民的处理情况。

original: Look for Alice Hostetler and her friend, Andy, in the building named The Gray.
translation: 去名为灰楼的建筑物里寻找爱丽丝·霍斯泰特勒和她朋友安迪的下落。

original: Tell Mrs. Hostetler about Andy's plan to steal the Crimson Caravan Money.
translation: 告诉霍斯泰特勒夫人安迪想要偷深红商队公司的钱。

original: (Optional) Help Andy with his plan to steal the Crimson Caravan money from the Hostetlers.
translation: (可选)帮助安迪从霍斯泰特勒夫人那里偷取深红商队公司的金钱。

original: Alice almost attacked her mother. She decided to let go and stay with her parents.
translation: 爱丽丝差点伤害了自己的母亲。她最终还是决定抛弃自己的任性，和家人留在一起。

original: Alice attacked her house. She decided to run away from New Vegas.
translation: 爱丽丝袭击了自家的房子。她决定离开新维加斯。

original: Alice attacked her house. She died after attacking her mother.
translation: 爱丽丝袭击了自家的房子。她攻击了自己的母亲，之后死了。

original: Alice attacked her house. After attacking her mother, both of them died.
translation: 爱丽丝袭击了自家的房子。她攻击了自己的母亲，之后她俩双双殒命。

original: Alice almost attacked her mother, but instead left New Vegas to find her own path.
translation: 爱丽丝差点伤害了自己的母亲，她最后还是决定离开新维加斯，寻找自己的未来。

original: Get the Crimson Caravan money.
translation: 拿到深红商队公司的钱。

original: Although saddened by Alice's escape, Mrs. Hostetler wanted to live up to her end of the deal.
translation: 尽管爱丽丝离家出走令霍斯泰特勒夫人十分伤心，她还是决定履行自己的承诺。

original: Mrs. Hostetler wanted to live up to her end of the deal, and was relieved that Alice decided to stay with them.
translation: 霍斯泰特勒夫人履行了承诺，并为爱丽丝决定留在自己身边感到十分欣慰。

original: There was no Crimson Caravan money.
translation: 深红商队公司的钱不见了。

original: Mrs. Hostetler was devastated after Alice's death. She won't be of help anymore.
translation: 霍斯泰特勒夫人因为爱丽丝的死而崩溃了。她再也无力做什么了。

original: Mrs. Hostetler was devastated after Alice's escape. She won't be of help anymore.
translation: 霍斯泰特勒夫人因为爱丽丝的离家出走而崩溃了。她再也无力做什么了。

original: Crandon died. You can't help him any longer.
translation: 克兰登死了。你再也无法帮助他了。

original: Three-Card Bounty
translation: 三张悬赏令

original: Kill Violet and acquire her head - preferably intact.
translation: 杀死维奥莱特并取回她的首级，最好要保持面容完整。

original: Kill Cook-Cook and acquire his head - preferably intact.
translation: 杀死大厨库克并取回他的首级，最好要保持面容完整。

original: Kill Driver Nephi and acquire his head - preferably intact.
translation: 杀死尼法并取回他的首级，最好要保持面容完整。

original: Return to Major Dhatri with Violet's head and collect the bounty.
translation: 带着维奥莱特的首级回达特里少校处领取赏金。

original: (Optional) Enlist the help of Lieutenant Gorobets and his First Recon snipers to take down Driver Nephi.
translation: (可选)请求格罗别茨中尉的和第一侦察营的狙击手帮忙干掉球杆尼法。

original: Return to Major Dhatri with Cook-Cook's head and collect the bounty.
translation: 带着大厨库克的首级回达特里少校处领取赏金。

original: Return to Major Dhatri with Driver Nephi's head and collect the bounty.
translation: 带着球杆尼法的首级回达特里少校处领取赏金。

original: Major Dhatri has bounties available. Speak to him about receiving a mission or turning in a bounty.
translation: 达特里少校发布了悬赏令，找他接受任务或者领取赏金。

original: (Optional) Kill Cook-Cook's favorite brahmin, Queenie, to cause him to go berserk and attack friends and foes alike.
translation: (可选)杀死大厨库克最爱的双头牛奎尼，会令他陷入狂暴，不分敌我地攻击他人。

original: (Optional) Speak with Little Buster about Cook-Cook.
translation: (可选)向小巴斯特了解大厨库克的情况。

original: The Coyotes
translation: 豺狼

original: Confront Saint James about missing refugees - time to search his room and Dermot's room for evidence.
translation: 与圣詹姆斯对峙，质问他难民的事情 - 是时候去搜索他的和德莫特的房间来寻找线索了。

original: Kill Saint James and Dermot.
translation: 杀死圣詹姆斯和德莫特。

original: Killed Saint James and Dermot.
translation: 杀死圣詹姆斯和德莫特。

original: Quest completed.
translation: 任务已完成。

original: Travel to Westside and speak with Saint James about the missing NCR refugees.
translation: 去西区和圣詹姆斯谈谈失踪的新加州共和国难民的事情。

original: Search Dermot's room at the Casa Madrid Apartments for evidence.
translation: 搜索德莫特在卡萨·马德里公寓的房间并寻找证据。

original: Search Saint James' room at the Casa Madrid Apartments for evidence.
translation: 搜索圣詹姆斯在卡萨·马德里公寓的房间并寻找证据。

original: (Optional) Confront Dermot or Saint James with the evidence you've gathered.
translation: (可选)带着你收集到的证据去找德莫特或者圣詹姆斯对质。

original: (Optional) Kill Saint James and Dermot.
translation: (可选)杀死圣詹姆斯和德莫特。

original: Tell Captain Parker what happened to the missing refugees.
translation: 告诉帕克队长失踪的移民身上发生了什么。

original: Volare!
translation: 展翅吧雄鹰！

original: This Stage No Longer Does Anything.
translation: 这个阶段没有用了。

original: Boomers have been found, need to earn their trust.
translation: 找到了爆轰帮，接下来要争取他们的信任。

original: Earned the Boomer's trust. Start on fixing the jet.
translation: 赢得了爆轰帮的信任。开始打捞飞机。

original: Attached the ballast to the plane, go back to nellis, got it floating, head back to base.
translation: 将浮袋安装到飞机上，回到内利斯，让飞机浮上来，再回到基地。

original: Spoke to Pearl, full fledged Boomer. Time to talk to Pearl about joining with one of the factions, if you've done so. (Not Currently Used)
translation: 与爆轰帮的领导人珀儿交谈。该让邀请珀尔加入一个势力了。（当前未使用）

original: I helped the Boomers. I am now a member of the tribe.
translation: 我帮助了爆轰帮。我现在是部族的一员了。

original: After killing Pearl, leader of the Boomers, I am no longer welcome in Nellis.
translation: 在杀死了珀尔，爆轰帮人的领袖， 我在内利斯再也不受欢迎了。

original: After killing Loyal, one of the Boomer Elders, I am no longer welcome in Nellis.
translation: 在杀死罗亚尔，爆轰帮的长老之一，我在内利斯不再受欢迎了。

original: After killing Argyll, one of the Boomer Elders, I am no longer welcome in Nellis.
translation: 在杀死阿盖尔，爆轰帮的长老之一，我在内利斯不再受欢迎了。

original: After killing Raquel, one of the Boomer Elders, I am no longer welcome in Nellis.
translation: 在杀死拉奎尔，爆轰帮的长老之一，我在内利斯不再受欢迎了。

original: After killing Jack, one of the Boomer Elders, I am no longer welcome in Nellis.
translation: 在杀死杰克，爆轰帮的长老之一之后，我在内利斯不再受欢迎了。

original: Help the Boomers around Nellis.
