original: Your brain has been replaced with advanced technologies: Your head can no longer be crippled and is resistant to chem addiction (+25% resistance) and shock from bodily damage (+5% Damage Threshold, minimum +1).
translation: 你的大脑被替换成了更高科技的产物：你的头再也不会残疾了，你的抗瘾能力+25%，DT也增加5%（最低+1）

original: Heartless
translation: 无心脏

original: Your heart has been replaced with advanced technologies: You cannot be poisoned, and filters in your heart will also regulate bleeding and healing, allowing all healing items (chems) to function at a higher level. Robots are now confused by you and 50% less likely to score a critical hit.
translation: 你的心脏被替换成了更高科技的产物：你再也不会中毒了。并且心脏中的过滤器能控制出血和疗愈，各种治疗品、化学药物能更好地发挥作用。机器人现在对你很困惑，对你造成暴击的几率减少50%。

original: Them's Good Eatin'
translation: 血肠狂人

original: Any living creature you kill has a 50% chance to have the potent healing items Thin Red Paste or Blood Sausage when looted.
translation: 你见人吃人，见鬼吃鬼！你杀死任何生物时，有50%几率会掉落治疗品稀血酱或血肠。

original: Robot Compliance
translation: 机器人顺应性

original: With the Robot Compliance perk, sneaking up on a hostile robot undetected and activating it will put that robot into a permanent shutdown state.
translation: 当你拥有机器人顺应性特长时，在不被发现的前提下，你可以偷偷摸到机器人的背后，把机器人永远地关掉！

original: Deactivate
translation: 关闭

original: Stealth Suit Mk II
translation: 潜行服Mk II

original:
The latest software patch for the Stealth Suit Mk II.
V1.1: Damping Sensors (+10 Sneak)
V1.2: Aural Subnet (+1 PER)
V1.3: Synced Fitment (+1 AGL)
V1.4: Impulse Accelerator (Increased sneak speed)
translation:
已打最新固件补丁的潜行服Mk II效果如下
V1.1: 阻尼传感器 (潜行+10)
V1.2: 听觉子网 (感知+1)
V1.3: 配件已同步 (敏捷+1)
V1.4: 脉冲加速器 (加快潜行速度)

original: Hot Blooded
translation: 热血沸腾

original: When your health drops below 50% you gain +15% more damage, but you also suffer -2 to your Agility and Perception attributes.
translation: 当你生命值下降到50%以下，你的攻击力提高+15%，但与此同时，你的感知和敏捷-2。

original: Hoarder
translation: 囤积者

original: You gain +25 lbs. to your carrying capacity, but suffer a -1 to all attributes any time the weight you're carrying drops below 160 lbs.
translation: 你能多负载25磅的东西！但当你背着的东西少于160磅时，你的所有属性-1。

original: Logan's Loophole
translation: 永葆青春

original: No one's going to put you out to pasture 'cause you're going to stay young (and level 30) forever! You'll never again become addicted to chems, and they'll last twice as long... but after 30 you can kiss experience, perks, and skill points goodbye!
translation: 多亏了执法者5号罗根的疏忽，再也没有人让你去退休了，因为你青春永驻（永远保持在30级）！你再也不会因嗑药而上瘾，而且药物持续时间是以前的两倍！但是，你不得不向30级以后的经验、特长、技能点说再见了！（致敬电影Logan‘s Run，逃离地下天堂）

original: Big Brained
translation: 大脑

original: Your brain is back in your body, but some of the advanced technologies remain: Your head still cannot be crippled, but you are only 10% more resistant to addiction now. Surprisingly your damage threshold has improved by 10% (minimum +1 DT).
translation: 你的脑子又回来了，但一些先进技术留了下来：你的头还是残废不了，但抗瘾几率只增加10%。令人惊奇的是，你的DT提高了10%（最少1DT）

original: Cardiac Arrest
translation: 心脏停搏

original: Your heart is back in your body, but some advanced technologies remain: You are more resistant to poison (50%) and robots are only somewhat confused by you (25% less likely to score a critical hit) now. But on the bright side, healing items (chems) are even more effective!
translation: 你的心脏又回来啦！但一些先进技术留了下来：你现在的抗毒能力只有50%，机器人对你也只是有点疑惑而已（让暴击几率减少25%）。但是往好的方面想，治疗药品比以前更有效了！

original: Reinforced Spine
translation: 增强脊椎

original: Your spine is back in your body, but some advanced technologies remain: Your torso can now be crippled again, but your Strength (STR) and Damage Threshold (DT) bonuses have doubled! (+2)
translation: 你的脊椎又回来了，但一些先进技术留了下来：虽然你的躯干现在会残废，但你的力量和DT加成全都翻倍(+2)！

original: Camarader-E
translation: E同志

original:
Traveling with ED-E has given you a chance to bond with him, unlocking five ranks of potential bonuses. While ED-E is in your party, you both gain:

Rank 1 - Weapon Condition Bonus (daily 25% weapon condition repair dialogue option)
Rank 2 - Energy Cell Manufacture (daily Energy or Microfusion Cell creation dialogue option)
Rank 3 - Increased DT (+2 DT)
Rank 4 - Damage Bonus (+5 beam weapon damage)
Rank 5 - V.A.T.S. Attack Bonus (+5% V.A.T.S. targeting)
translation:
与ED-E一同旅行使得你们俩紧密团结在一起,解锁了5个等级的潜能.当ED-E在你的队伍里,你们俩同时获得
等级 1 - 武器耐久度奖励 (每日 25% 耐久度修理的对话选项)
等级 2 - 能量电池制造 (每日 能量或核聚变电池制造的对话选项
等级 3 - 增强DT (+2 DT
等级 4 - 伤害奖励 (+5 光束武器伤害
等级 5 - V.A.T.S.攻击奖励 (+5% V.A.T.S. 命中率)

original: Marked
translation: 烙印

original: You've faced torture at the hands of the Marked Men... now it's payback time. (+10% Damage Threshold and +10% Damage against the Marked Men)
translation: 你已经受够了烙印者的折磨...现在，是血债血偿的时候了。 (对烙印者增加10%的伤害减免和10%的伤害)

original: Certified Tech
translation: 持证技师

original: Your knowledge of robotic components allows you to break them more easily and salvage their mechanical corpses. You have a +25% chance to score critical hits against robots, and you'll also find more useful components on robots you destroy.
translation: 你积累了大量关于机器人结构的知识，现在你能更轻易破坏它们并重新回收它们身上的机械零件。你增加了25%对机器人的暴击率，并且在已摧毁的机器人身上将获得更多有用的组件。

original: Ain't Like That Now
translation: 洗心革面

original: Maybe you were bad once, but you ain't like that now. Your Karma has been reset to 0, you regenerate AP 25% faster, and your attack speed is increased by 20%. You are also immune to critical hits. (Requires Bad Karma.)
translation: 或许你曾经是个坏人，但已经洗心革面了。你的业力已经被重置为0，你的AP再生速度提高25%，并且你的攻击速度提高了20%，同时你将免疫暴击。(需要邪恶的业力)

original: Thought You Died
translation: 你是传说

original: Your storied past has fallen from memory 'cause everyone thought you died. Your Karma is reset, you inflict +10% damage, and for every 100 points of Karma, you gain 10 Health. You are also immune to critical hits. (Requires Good Karma.)
translation: 你的传奇故事已经随风而逝，因为人们都以为你已经死了。你的业力将重置，你造成的伤害+10%，并且每100点业力将转换成10点生命值，同时你将免疫暴击。(需要善良的业力)

original: Just Lucky I'm Alive
translation: 侥幸生还

original: You've had lots of close calls. Whenever you finish a fight with less than 25% Health, your Luck increases by +4 for 3 minutes. You are also immune to critical hits, and your own critical hits inflict +50% damage. (Requires Neutral Karma.)
translation: 你有许多死里逃生的经历，如果你在生命值低于25%的情况下结束战斗，在接下来的3分钟内你的幸运值+4。同时你将免疫暴击，并且你自己的暴击伤害+50%。(需要中立的业力)

original: Camarader-E
translation: E同志

original: Companion version of Camarader-E.
translation: E同志的同伴版本。

original: Light Step
translation: 身轻如燕

original: ED-E doesn't set off mines. Text translation not needed.
translation: ED-E 不会引爆地雷。

original: Thump-Thump Fix
translation: “砰砰”修复

original: Doubles the projectile velocity of ALL projectiles while using Thump-Thump.

original:
All weapons fall under a weapon skill category that determines how effective the weapon is: Guns, Energy Weapons, Explosives, Melee Weapons, or Unarmed. Compare the small icon below and to the left of the weapon's icon to the icon shown on the Pip-Boy's skill menu.

* DAM/DPS: These indicate the base Damage and Damage Per Second, respectively. Weapons with a low DAM have difficulty penetrating armor. If you hit a target's Damage Threshold, switch to a weapon with a higher DAM or use ammo that reduces the target's Damage Threshold (e.g. Armor Piercing).

* STR and Skill: Many weapons have a Strength and/or skill requirement. If your character does not meet the Strength or skill requirement for the weapon, its aim will wobble (if a firearm) or it will attack more slowly (if a hand-to-hand weapon).

* CND: A weapon's Condition affects the amount of damage it does. At 75% Condition or higher, a weapon does maximum damage and only needs to be maintained. A weapon with low Condition will do less damage and may jam when reloaded.

* Repair / Mod: These options take you to the Repair and Mod submenus, where you may repair damaged equipment or attach weapon modifications, respectively.
translation:
武器效果由其相应的技能决定：枪械、能量武器、爆破、近战武器或徒手。请参考武器图标左下角的小图标和哔哔小子技能表里的图标。

伤害/秒伤（DAM/DPS）：这两项指标对应了武器的伤害与每秒伤害的基础值。低伤害武器很难穿透装甲。如果你的武器伤害低于目标的伤害减免（DT），请更换伤害更高的武器，或使用可以降低目标伤害减免的弹药（比如穿甲弹）。

力量和技能：很多武器都有力量和技能要求。如果你的角色没有达到武器的力量和技能要求，手持武器时就会摇晃不定，难以瞄准；近战武器的动作则会较为迟钝。

耐久（CND）：武器的耐久会影响武器造成的伤害。耐久在75%以上时，武器可以打出最高伤害，只需要进行基本的保养。耐久度低的武器伤害会减弱，上弹时还可能会卡壳。

修理和改造：选择这两个选项可以进入修理和改造子菜单，你可以在此修理受损的武器，或对武器进行改造。

original: Weapons
translation: 武器

original:
Apparel can consist of many different types of gear ranging from clothing and armor to sunglasses and hats.

* DT: Some apparel grants Damage Threshold (DT) to the wearer. Your DT is the sum of all DT for currently equipped apparel plus any bonuses from perks or chems. DT is directly subtracted from incoming damage, so a higher DT provides superior protection. Though a small percentage of damage can get through even the thickest armor, a high DT is quite valuable.

* CND: Apparel's Condition (CND) affects how much protection it provides. Apparel above 50% CND provides maximum protection and only needs to be maintained.

* Light/Medium/Heavy: Medium and Heavy apparel will slow characters down when equipped.

* Repair: This option opens the Repair submenu, which allows apparel to be repaired by salvaging parts from similar items.
translation:
服装由各种不同的部分组成，从衣物和装甲，到墨镜和帽子。

伤害减免（DT）：一些护甲会为穿戴者提供伤害减免。人物的伤害减免是所身着的全部服装及特长或药物所带来的加成的总和。你受到的伤害会直接扣去豁免值，所以伤害减免越高，你得到的保护就越强。虽然最密实的装甲也不可能挡住所有伤害，但提升伤害减免还是相当有用的。

耐久（CND）：服装的耐久度会影响其所能提供的保护。耐久在50%以上的服装能够提供最大限度的保护，并且只需要少量的保养即可。

* 轻甲/中甲/重甲：中甲和重甲装备后会降低角色的移动速度。

* 修理：这一选项会打开修理子菜单，可以用类似物品上的部件来修补当前所选择的服装。

original: Apparel
translation: 服装

original:
You have established a reputation with a group of people in the wasteland! Whether that reputation is good or bad, you're finally somebody, and people associated with that group will start to react to what you've done. There are many different factions in the wasteland, and you can develop a distinct reputation with each one.

As you perform actions that benefit a group, you will gain Fame. If you perform actions that harm a group, you will gain Infamy. Your reputation with any given group is a measure of the combined total of Fame and Infamy that you have earned. The benefits and drawbacks of any given reputation depend on the group itself. You may receive discounts with merchants, provoke attacks from hired thugs, or simply be treated differently.

Though you will initially start out with a Neutral reputation with any given faction, your Fame and Infamy will eventually push your reputation in different directions. You can see all of your current reputations under the General section of your Pip-Boy.

Good Reputations:
* Smiling Troublemaker - Some good, a little bad.
* Good Natured Rascal - Good, a little bad.
* Accepted - Some good.
* Liked - Definitely good.
* Idolized - Most good.

Mixed Reputations:
* Soft-Hearted Devil - More bad than good.
* Dark Hero - More good than bad.
* Mixed - Some good, some bad.
* Unpredictable - Good and bad.
* Wild Child - Most good, most bad.

Bad Reputations:
* Sneering Punk - Some bad, a little good.
* Merciful Thug - Bad, a little good.
* Shunned - Some bad.
* Hated - Definitely bad.
* Vilified - Most bad.
translation:
你的行为在废土的某一群人心中留下了波澜！无论是好是坏，你总算是个人物了。与这一群体有联系的人会对你的所作所为做出反应。废土上有许多不同的派别，你在各个派别中的声望都不尽相同。

当你的行为能使一群体受益时，你会获得美名。当你的行为损害到某个群体时，你就会留下恶名。你在某一群体中的声望将由好坏两方面的声望共同决定。根据群体的不同，声望也会给你带来不同的后果。可能会有商队给你打折，也可能会有人来买你手脚，或者仅仅是对你态度不一样。

虽然你在任何派别的初始声望都是中立，但声望会受到美名与恶名的共同影响。你可以通过哔哔小子的“整体”栏目来查看你目前所有的声望。

美名：
* 笑里藏刀 - 比较好，有点坏。
* 善良的淘气鬼 - 好，有点坏。
* 接受 - 比较好。
* 喜爱 - 非常好。
* 崇拜 - 极其好。

混杂：
* 心软的魔鬼 - 恶名比美名多。
* 黑暗英雄 - 美名比恶名多。
* 褒贬不一 - 有点好，有点坏。
* 难以预料 - 有好有坏。
* 野孩子 - 非常好，也非常坏。

恶名：
* 玩世不恭的流氓 - 比较坏，有点好。
* 仁慈的暴徒 - 坏，有点好。
* 冷漠 - 比较坏。
* 仇恨 - 非常坏。
* 唾弃 - 极其坏。

original: Reputation
translation: 声望

original: You examine the broken elevator panel and conclude that it is possible to repair it.  Do you wish to repair it?
translation: 你检查了破损的电梯面板，总结出有可能修好它。想要维修它吗？

original: Repair the Elevator Panel
translation: 维修电梯面板

original: Leave it Alone
translation: 不去动它

original: You examine the broken gas valve and conclude that it is possible to repair it.  Do you wish to repair it?
translation: 你检查了破损的燃气阀，并认为有可能修复它。想修理它吗？

original: Repair the Gas Valve
translation: 修复

original: Leave it Alone
translation: 放弃

original: This computer trap is disarmed and won't explode unless it is rearmed.
translation: 电脑陷阱已经被解除，除非重新启动否则不会爆炸。

original: This robot has been fitted with a variety of tools specialized for industrial maintenance. There is a slot at the back of the head where it looks like a keycard could be fit. \n\n(Science of 45 or Poseidon Energy ID Card required)
translation: 这台机器人身上装备了各种各样专门用来进行维护的工具。它的后脑勺上有一个插槽，似乎可以插入一张钥匙卡。\n\n（需要45以上科学或海神能源公司的ID卡）

original: PYTHON
translation: 巨蟒

original: Do nothing.
translation: 不管它。

original: [Science] Hardwire the robot to run on autopilot in repair mode.
translation: [科学] 将机器人设定成自动修理模式。

original: Insert Poseidon Energy ID Card.
translation: 插入波塞冬能量ID卡。

original: Some sort of data corruption has made the user interface illegible. The damage doesn't seem to go any deeper than that since the pump station is still online.\n\n[Science of 50 or greater required to repair.]
translation: 由于数据损坏，操作界面变得难以辨识。因为水泵站还在运转，所以故障应该不算太严重。\n\n[需要51或以上的科学才能修复。]

original: Pump Station Terminal
translation: 水泵站终端机

original: Leave the terminal alone.
translation: 不管它。

original: Repair the network connection.
translation: 修复网络连接。

original: The robot lies inert on the table, giving no indication of having worked recently, or ever. A nameplate on part of the surface is scratched and mostly faded, but you can still make out the faint word "Rhonda". If you knew more about how robots function, you might be able to get it working again.\n\n(Science 60 or greater required.)
translation: 机器人一动不动地躺在桌上，没有最近启动过的痕迹——似乎它从来就未被启动过。机器表面有一块名牌，上面满是刮痕，几乎已经褪色，但你还是能识别出淡淡的“朗达”二字。\n（需要60科学）

original: We've all heard "stories" that radiation is dangerous - fact or fiction?* A common sight in factories, military installations, and the basements of selected government-funded middle schools, these safety barrels* are just what the name implies - safe. While their attractive coloring can be interpreted as a warning, for REPCONN, it's an invitation to a future filled with nuclear power!\n\n* Rhetorical questions and nomenclature of exhibit items cannot be used as a basis for criminal prosecution.
translation: 我们都听说一些关于辐射很危险的“故事”——是真实，还是谎言？* 安全桶在工厂、军事设施以及部分公立中学的地下室内十分常见，顾名思义，它们很安全。虽然其诱人的颜色可以理解成警告，但对REPCONN来说，它就是前往未来核能世界的邀请函！\n\n* 展品介绍中的反问句和相关术语不能作为刑事诉讼的证据。

original: "Radioactive Waste?"
translation: "辐射废料？"

original: Some folks have asked - why not a Protectron with wheels? RobCo wasn't afraid to answer that question: The Protect-O-Bot is the answer. While safety standards prevented this free-wheeling dynamo from entering mass market production despite RobCo's best intentions and teams of lawyers, we take consolation in letting you see this extremely well-funded experiment as it was intended - a robot moving so fast it looks like it's standing still!\n\nExhibit Brought to You By Your Friends at RobCo
translation: 有些人问——为什么没有带轮子的保护者呢？罗科并不惮于回答这个问题：O型保护者就是答案。尽管罗科抱有极大的诚意，也拥有优秀的法律团队，但在安全标准的限制下，这些灵活自如的机器人最终还是无法被量产。为了表达歉意，我们决定向各位展示这个高成本实验的本来面貌——一个速度快到看起来几乎是站在原地的机器人！\n\n本展品由罗科倾情赞助

original: "It's Got Wheels!"
translation: "它有轮子哦！"

original: Force your parents a short drive south, and you'll see the retractable dome of REPCONN's launch facility (not actual size!). You may have heard wild stories about rocket flights and their impact* on nearby towns and communities, but REPCONN feels you can't put a price on space exploration - after all, Rocketeers, you do want to go into space someday... don't you?\n\n* Statement is figurative and inadmissible as evidence in a court of law.
translation: 让你的父母再往南开一小会儿车，你就能看见REPCONN发射工厂可伸缩的穹顶（非真实大小！）。你可能听说过一些关于火箭发射会对周边小镇和社区带来负面影响*的谣言，但REPCONN觉得宇宙探索是无价的——毕竟，火箭专家们，你们也想要有一天飞向宇宙……对不对？\n\n* 以上陈述均属虚构，不可作为诉讼证据。

original: "Ready, Set, Launch!"
translation: "准备，就位，发射！"

original: [FAILED] You lack the skill to jury-rig the machine.  After digging through all of the broken parts you are overwhelmed and give up.
translation: [失败] 你缺少抢修机械所需要的技能。在研究过所有坏掉的部分后，你感到力不从心，于是放弃了。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Bypassing several broken redundant coprocessors using nothing more than bobby pins, tape, and a trooper's Swiss army knife, you manage to get the machine running!
translation: [成功] 你只用了发夹、胶带和一把瑞士军刀，就绕过了严重损坏的备用协处理器，成功让机器重新运作了起来！

original: The note reads: "Your debt still remains unpaid. We have warned you twice. There will not be a third warning, only consequences. You have one day."
translation: 字条上写着：“你的债务尚未还清。我们已经警告过你两次了。不会再有第三次，到时你就自食其果吧。你还有一天时间。”

original: Threatening Note
translation: 威胁字条

original: This man looks like he has a serious infection. Improper treatment will kill him. Would you like to treat him? (Medicine 40 or higher Required)
translation: 这个男人看起来受到了严重感染。治疗不当可能会导致他死亡。你想要治疗他吗？（需要40或以上医疗）

original: Leave him alone.
translation: 不管他。

original: Attempt to treat him.
translation: 进行治疗。

original: This man looks like he has a serious infection. Improper treatment will kill him. Would you like to treat him? (Medicine 40 or higher Required)
translation: 这个男人看起来受到了严重感染。治疗不当可能导致死亡。你想要治疗他吗？（需要40或以上医疗）

original: Leave him alone.
translation: 不管他。

original: Treat the infection.
translation: 治疗感染。

original: This man's leg is seriously damaged and will require amputation. Improper treatment will kill him. Are you sure to want to attempt the operation? (Medicine 50 or higher Required)
translation: 这个男人的腿受了严重的伤，需要截肢。操作不当可能会导致死亡。你确认要进行手术吗？（需要50或以上医疗）

original: Leave him alone.
translation: 不管他。

original: Attempt to treat him.
translation: 进行手术。

original: CHOP! CHOP! CHOP! (Low Intelligence)
translation: 切掉！切掉！切掉！（低智力）

original: This man's leg is seriously injured. It may require amputation to save him. Are you sure to want to attempt the operation? (Medicine 50 or higher Required)
translation: 这个男人的腿受了严重的伤，需要截肢。你确认要进行手术吗？（需要50或以上医疗）

original: Never mind. Leave him alone.
translation: 不管他。

original: Perform the operation.
translation: 进行手术。

original: CHOP! CHOP! CHOP! (Low Intelligence)
translation: 切掉！切掉！切掉！（低智力）

original: This man appears to be severely injured. Swelling around his face and neck is interfering with his breathing. Improper treatment will kill him. Are you sure to want to treat him? (Medicine 60 or higher Required)
translation: 这个男人看起来受了很重的伤。脸和脖子肿胀得厉害，阻碍了他的呼吸。治疗不当可能导致他死亡。你确定要治疗他吗？（需要60或以上医疗）

original: Leave him alone.
translation: 不管他。

original: Attempt to treat him.
translation: 进行治疗。

original: This is one of Argyll's patients. You should speak to him before you investigate them.
translation: 这是阿盖尔的病人。在检查病人之前你应该先和阿盖尔打声招呼。

original: What floor would you like to go to?
translation: 你想去哪层楼？

original: Choose A Floor
translation: 选择楼层

translation: 留在这里

original: Penthouse
translation: 屋顶套间

original: Cocktail Lounge
translation: 鸡尾酒厅

original: Presidential Suite
translation: 总统套房

original: Casino
translation: 赌场

original: Basement
translation: 地下室

original: "We're cut off from the rest of the platoon, and there are legionnaires all over the place. There's no chance we can get out of here before they blow the town, so we're going to hold out against them as long as we can. If anyone ever gets this, I'd like to make sure that Private Jeffery Hui and Corporal Marcus Christensen are commended for their valor and sacrifice. Both have upheld the ideals and honor of the New California Republic with distinction. Ranger Teresa Lutz, out."
translation: “我们和小队剩下的人分开了，这里到处都是军团的人。我们已经不可能在小镇爆炸前脱身，所以我们会尽可能拖住他们。如果有人收到了这段信息，我希望列兵杰弗瑞·惠和下士马库斯·克里斯坦森能够因他们的英勇牺牲而受到表彰。他们两人都杰出地捍卫了新加州共和国的理想和荣耀。游骑兵特里萨·卢茨，报告完毕。”

original: Ranger Holodisk Message
translation: 游骑兵全息磁盘信息

original: Fallout: New Vegas allows you to play in a new Hardcore mode that greatly increases the challenge of the game. In this mode, Stimpaks heal over time and cannot mend broken limbs, RadAway removes radiation over time, ammunition has weight, and dehydration is a constant concern. This mode is only recommended for advanced players.\n\nYou may turn Hardcore mode on or off at any time in the Gameplay menu, but if you activate Hardcore mode now and maintain it through the end of the main storyline, you will receive a special reward. Would you like to activate Hardcore mode?
translation: 《辐射：新维加斯》允许你在崭新的硬核模式下游玩，大幅度提升游戏难度。在这一模式下，治疗针回血需要时间，也不能通过其使断肢愈合；辐特宁消除辐射需要时间，弹药有重量，缺水会变成持续性问题。只推荐高端玩家启用这一模式。\n\n你随时可以在游戏菜单里打开或关闭硬核模式，但如果你现在激活硬核模式，并在硬核模式下打穿主线故事，你就可以获得特别奖励。你愿意启动硬核模式吗？

translation: 硬核模式

original:
You have established a reputation with a group of people in the wasteland! Whether that reputation is good or bad, you're finally somebody, and people associated with that group will start to react to what you've done. There are many different factions in the wasteland, and you can develop a distinct reputation with each one.

As you perform actions that benefit a group, you will gain Fame. If you perform actions that harm a group, you will gain Infamy. Your reputation with any given group is a measure of the combined total of Fame and Infamy that you have earned. The benefits and drawbacks of any given reputation depend on the group itself. You may receive discounts with merchants, provoke attacks from hired thugs, or simply be treated differently.

Though you will initially start out with a Neutral reputation with any given faction, your Fame and Infamy will eventually push your reputation in different directions. You can see all of your current reputations under the General section of your Pip-Boy.

Good Reputations:
* Smiling Troublemaker - Some good, a little bad.
* Good Natured Rascal - Good, a little bad.
* Accepted - Some good.
* Liked - Definitely good.
* Idolized - Most good.

Mixed Reputations:
* Soft-Hearted Devil - More bad than good.
* Dark Hero - More good than bad.
* Mixed - Some good, some bad.
* Unpredictable - Good and bad.
* Wild Child - Most good, most bad.

Bad Reputations:
* Sneering Punk - Some bad, a little good.
* Merciful Thug - Bad, a little good.
* Shunned - Some bad.
* Hated - Definitely bad.
* Vilified - Most bad.
translation:
你的行为在废土的某一群人心中留下了波澜！无论是好是坏，你总算是个人物了。与这一群体有联系的人会对你的所作所为做出反应。废土上有许多不同的派别，你在各个派别中的声望都不尽相同。

当你的行为能使一群体受益时，你会获得美名。当你的行为损害到一个群体时，你就会留下恶名。你在某一群体中的声望将由好坏两方面的声望共同决定。根据群体的不同，声望也会给你带来不同的后果。可能会有商队给你打折，也可能会有人来买你手脚，或者仅仅是对你态度不一样。

虽然你在任何派别的初始声望都是中立，但声望会受到美名与恶名的影响。你可以通过哔哔小子的“整体”栏目来查看你目前所有的声望。

美名：
* 笑里藏刀 - 比较好，有点坏。
* 善良的淘气鬼 - 好，有点坏。
* 接受 - 比较好。
* 喜爱 - 非常好。
* 崇拜 - 极其好。

混杂：
* 心软的魔鬼 - 恶名比美名多。
* 黑暗英雄 - 美名比恶名多。
* 褒贬不一 - 有点好，有点坏。
* 难以预料 - 有好有坏。
* 野孩子 - 非常好，也非常坏。

恶名：
* 玩世不恭的流氓 - 比较坏，有点好。
* 仁慈的暴徒 - 坏，有点好。
* 冷漠 - 比较坏。
* 仇恨 - 非常坏。
* 唾弃 - 极其坏。

original: Reputation
translation: 声望
